mobShortDesc: The master archaeologist is looking suspiciously at you.
mobLongDesc: The Master Archeologist is wearing grey pants and a white shirt. His coat is made of brown leather and has strange markings and symbols on it. Some of them looks like the cavern wall near the entrance.

mobShortDesc: An ant is crawling on the beach.
mobLongDesc: The ant is crawling around on the beach close to the anthill.

mobShortDesc: An archaeologist is studying an old parchment.
mobLongDesc: The archaeologist's clothes are dirty and ragged. He is wearing a brown coat over his clothes that are just ragged. The way he studies his documents leaves no room for interest in clothing. He wears a big hat to shield him from working in the sun.

mobShortDesc: A student is standing here looking curiously at a small stone.
mobLongDesc: The student is in his youth and looks eager in his studies. His eyes are watchful and register every detail. He looks rather skinny, and you hear him mutter about getting something to eat.

mobShortDesc: The Bone Dragon is standing in a nest of bones.
mobLongDesc: The dragon is made of shiny white bone and even if its wings are only bone, it can still fly. On the long tail a long sharp bone spike quivers with a desire to kill.

mobShortDesc: A beast covered with thick white fur and icy scales look around the cavern in search of food.
mobLongDesc: The monster has thick white fur and white icy scales cover its belly. The long head is basically a huge mouth set with sharp point fangs of what looks like ice. The dead black eyes glare back at you.

mobShortDesc: The Demon Carpenter is standing at a table smiling with glee.
mobLongDesc: The demon is larger that any ogre and has dark red skin. In his right hand he holds his mighty hammer. Two large wings stretch out from his back casting looming shadows on the walls.

mobShortDesc: A golden scaled viper is slithering around the hall.
mobLongDesc: With golden scales the viper looks as if it's made of gold. Deep red eyes looks at you hungrily, its fangs dripping poison ready to tear.

mobShortDesc: A large rib is sticking out of the inside of the toad.
mobLongDesc: Destroying the rib, might be painful to the toad.

mobShortDesc: A gigantic toad is lurking in a corner.
mobLongDesc: The toad is huge and with its big mouth, it could easily eat a man whole. With its sharp teeth, it would no be a pleasant experience. The skin looks though and not easy to penetrate.

mobShortDesc: A long fungus-covered tentacle is writhing on the ground.
mobLongDesc: The tentacle has a sicky green color and it stinks of death. Its fungus pores give off grey smoke and leaves the room in a thin grey mist.

mobShortDesc: A large powerful black horse is blowing fumes from its nostrils.
mobLongDesc: The black stallion is massive and twice the size of a regular horse. Its powerful legs and hooves will deal fierceful damage to whomever gets in its way.

mobShortDesc: A long shadow stretches over the floor in front of you.
mobLongDesc: The shadow has no visible features other that a manlike outline.

mobShortDesc: A long shadow stretches over the floor in front of you.
mobLongDesc: The shadow has no visible features other that a manlike outline.

mobShortDesc: A long shadow stretches over the floor in front of you.
mobLongDesc: The shadow has no visible features other that a manlike outline.

mobShortDesc: A long shadow stretches over the floor in front of you.
mobLongDesc: The shadow has no visible features other that a manlike outline.

mobShortDesc: Here stands the third mummy of the Sphinx
mobLongDesc: You are looking at the third mummy of this ancient Sphinx. He looks much like the other mummies you have seen. He looks old and worn, but thousands of years has that affect.

mobShortDesc: Here stands the second mummy of the Sphinx
mobLongDesc: Here stands the second ancient mummy. He is much like the first one you encountered. His wraps are tattered and torn from centuries of aging.

mobShortDesc: Here stands the first mummy of the Sphinx.
mobLongDesc: This is the first mummy you have found in the Sphinx. His wraps are tattered and torn , and he appears to have been here for centuries!

mobShortDesc: Here stands the mummy of Tutankhamen.
mobLongDesc: Here stands the mummy of the great pharaoh Tutankhamen. He is thousands of years old and really shows his age. He looks like an easy kill, but then things aren't always what they seem!

mobShortDesc: An ancient egyptian priest is praying here.
mobLongDesc: Standing in front of you blocking your way is an ancient priest not less than 1000 years old. From the looks of it you have intruded on something.

mobShortDesc: A vampire bat hangs from the ceiling.
mobLongDesc: Hanging from the ceiling is a vampire bat. His only source of food being unwary passer by's. So you best be careful!

mobShortDesc: Crawling about the ground is a Two hundred year old snake
mobLongDesc: On the ground in front of you crawls a 200 year old snake. The snake appears to be unaffected by time. Although he has no arms or legs his attack can be lethal!

mobShortDesc: Here stands an Ancient Mummy , his only purpose is to protect the SPHINX!
mobLongDesc: Here stands a mummy about 1000 years old. His wraps are tattered and torn from centuries of protecting the Sphinx from the likes of you!

mobShortDesc: A harmless old woman peers up at you.
mobLongDesc: Her skin bears so many wrinkles, you judge her to be centuries old.  Lined and worn, her skin resembles the trees of the forest around you.  She is stooped over and totters along slowly, carefully planning each step before she takes it.  As you watch her, you realize she is gathering herbs and flowers, probably to make medicines from.  She looks up at your face, and as she speaks, you are entranced.  Her voice carries all the power and wisdom of hundreds of years of learning.

mobShortDesc: An Ogre lumbers towards you, filling your heart with fear.
mobLongDesc: This is the nastiest, smelliest creature you've ever had the displeasure to meet.  From his hairy toes to his pointy, wart-covered nose, there is nothing to relieve the ugliness you bear witness to.  As he begins to speak, you gag at the foul stench of his breath.  Just as you are recovering from the shock of repulsion, you remember that ogres eat PEOPLE!  Perhaps you should get a little farther away...

mobShortDesc: A Unicorn is here, pawing the ground and stamping nervously.
mobLongDesc: More beautiful than anything you've ever seen.  He is a magnificent white horse with a magical aura, and a single, wickedly sharp horn.  He seems at once innocent and ancient, and the wisdom of the ages shines through his dark flashing eyes.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-ALIGNMENT DETECT-INVISIBLE DETECT-MAGIC SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY PROTECT-EVIL INFRAVISION DODGE HIDE DUAL

mobShortDesc: A Nyad is swimming peacefully here.
mobLongDesc: This beautiful woman is swimming here joyfully, at one with the water. As you catch a rare glimpse of her, she swims over with a powerful kick, hoping to find out exactly what you are.
actionFlags: SPEC SENTINEL SCAVENGER ISNPC STAY-ZONE MEMORY

mobShortDesc: A Dryad is peeking from behind a tree.
mobLongDesc: A beautiful young woman peeks shyly back at you.  She is forever bound to her tree, and separation from it would mean her death.  Her tree tells her of things going on above the canopy of the forest, so this young nymph seems unusually wise.

mobShortDesc: A Faerie flutters nearby.
mobLongDesc: With her transluscent wings and golden skin, she seems unimaginably beautiful. But as she grins at you, you notice her sharp little teeth, and wonder about just how friendly she is, and exactly what faeries like to eat...
actionFlags: SPEC SENTINEL ISNPC AGGRESSIVE STAY-ZONE WIMPY MEMORY

mobShortDesc: A Faerie flutters nearby.
mobLongDesc: With her transluscent wings and golden skin, she seems unimaginably beautiful. But as she grins at you, you notice her sharp little teeth, and wonder about just how friendly she is, and exactly what faeries like to eat...
actionFlags: SPEC SENTINEL ISNPC AGGRESSIVE STAY-ZONE WIMPY MEMORY

mobShortDesc: A Brownie flits around here, almost too small to see.
mobLongDesc: Dressed in all greens and browns, this small creature blends into the forest to near invisibility.  At first glance, she seems friendly enough, but then you remember that brownies are infamous for creating mischief.
actionFlags: SPEC SENTINEL SCAVENGER ISNPC AGGRESSIVE STAY-ZONE WIMPY MEMORY

mobShortDesc: A Brownie flits around here, almost too small to see.
mobLongDesc: Dressed in all greens and browns, this small creature blends into the forest to near invisibility.  At first glance, she seems friendly enough, but then you remember that brownies are infamous for creating mischief.
actionFlags: SPEC SENTINEL SCAVENGER ISNPC AGGRESSIVE STAY-ZONE WIMPY MEMORY

mobShortDesc: A black furred rabbit with red eyes is glaring at you.
mobLongDesc: With the darkest evilest looking fur you ever have seen this rabbit stands the size of a horse. His red eyes burning red like hot coals. His breath reeks of carrots, that isn't so bad. His ears look like police batons ready to to beat you like the weak little human you are.

mobShortDesc: A large red rabbit his flexing his muscles.
mobLongDesc: His fur is the deepest darkest red you have ever seen. He has a large Ireland flag tattoo on his backside, which he wags in your face with great joy. In his paws he is holding a shot of whisky and a bottle of beer.

mobShortDesc: A white rabbit is beckoning you to follow.
mobLongDesc: Her fur is snow as white without a spec of dirt, soil, or any imperfection anywhere to be seen. Her pink little nose is as cute as a pink rabbit nose. She has a small bow tied to her white cotton tail.

mobShortDesc: A small brown rabbit is sniffing the ground.
mobLongDesc: It has a very small and timid body. The small rabbit shakes with the force of a thousand rattlesnakes as you look at it. He waves a small piece of wood at you.

mobShortDesc: A strange rabbit-like creature is dancing here.
mobLongDesc: With a rabbit body this is the strangest creature you have ever seen. It has small deer like antlers protruding from its heads. On hits back it has eagle wings.  He bares his vampire fangs at you as he lets out a large clucking noise, which very much so

mobShortDesc: Mishaabooz is sitting on the ground with his legs crossed.
mobLongDesc: His fur is brown, while his ears are painted blue.  He is hold a tomahawk. He looks deep in thought and very peaceful. Around his neck is hanging small bones and a tobacco pouch.

mobShortDesc: A large and burly red rabbit struts by
mobLongDesc: Standing before you is a legendary red rabbit .He is a very large rabbit, when he moves about he leaves paw prints in his wake. As he notices you he kicks dust into your face blinding you. By the looks of it he is getting ready for a fight.

mobShortDesc: A white rabbit is here
mobLongDesc: This rabbit has fur the color of snow. It has one ear, and doesn't seem to be affected by it. With amazing grace this rabbit hops out of sight only to return just as quickly as it left.

mobShortDesc: A large black-furred rabbit stands guard here.
mobLongDesc: A very large black-furred rabbit looks back at you. His eyes gleam with pride and valor. He sniffs the air as he notices you. These must be the defenders of this warren. By the looks of it he is well built for the job.

mobShortDesc: Kalulu is wearing a giant black and yellow mask.
mobLongDesc: Wearing a black and yellow mask on his face its hard to tell he is a rabbit. His fur is dyed black and yellow, he looks like a giant bumble bee. In his paws he is holding a large shield and a large spear. He waves the spear wildly in the air.

mobShortDesc: Centzon Totochtin is standing here twirling a baton.
mobLongDesc: Standing on his two back legs, he is a god-like creature. Towering over you his fur his brown and covered in blood and flesh. He is carrying a large red baton with a nasty looking rusty bladed on the end of it. He is smiling clearly insane.

mobShortDesc: A blank of primal clay stands here, waiting to be shaped.
mobLongDesc: A blank of primal clay, waiting to be shaped.

mobShortDesc: A blank of primal clay stands here, waiting to be shaped.
mobLongDesc: A blank of primal clay, waiting to be shaped.

mobLongDesc: A blank of primal clay, waiting to be shaped.

mobShortDesc: A Crazy Haired Man sits cackling.
mobLongDesc: A man cackles with glee as he stares at the tables around the world.  His eyes widen as he looks at what he should do next.

mobShortDesc: A Creature peaks out from behind a pillar.
mobLongDesc: A giant lumbering monster with four legs and six arms stands its ground. It holds random weapons including a hammer and a pike. Each random is twirling independently.

mobShortDesc: A Red and Brown Spider slowly crawls along the ceiling.
mobLongDesc: The spider smiles and continues to work on his web.  His eight eyes focus diligently on the numerous threads being spun to produce the web.  The long black legs slowly move around to get the optimal position.

mobShortDesc: A Small Hammer with a Wooden Handle struggles against the hooks that bind him.
mobLongDesc: A metal hammer with a wooden handle sits against the shelves.  Its googly eyes wander in different directions as it hops, seemingly looking at nothing in particular.

mobShortDesc: Buffalo buffalo Buffalo buffalo buffalo buffalo Buffalo buffalo.
mobLongDesc: There is a sign around its neck.  "Yes, this is quite a weird creation.  I have no idea either.  Bob"

mobShortDesc: A Cockney Sparrow marches around the room.
mobLongDesc: A very talkative sparrow marches around the room.  Oi!  It begins to ramble and you have no idea what it is on about.

mobShortDesc: A Smaller Green Pepper stands ready to attack.
mobLongDesc: A strong and sleek female looks dashing in her outfit. A cape billows behind her, looking more imposing then her teammates.

mobShortDesc: A Blob of Sherbert slides down the melting mountain.
mobLongDesc: A giant mound of multi colored ice cream, its layers sliding and moving around each other. A mouth can be seen amongst the colors, looking for something else to consume.

mobShortDesc: A Large Machine groans as it shakes paint cans.
mobLongDesc: A large metal machine covered in splotches of different colored paint. Its multiple buttons flash in odd patterns as the machine slowly rumbles back and forth.

mobShortDesc: A Fluffy Glowing Cat-Rabbit bounces around.
mobLongDesc: A small ball of fluff rolls and hops around on the soft, luscious grass. It emites small squeaks of glee as it admires and plays with the flowers.

mobShortDesc: A Wooden Raft floats in the middle of the pool.
mobLongDesc: Strong oak and pine planks are lashed together, forming the base of the raft. A small mast extends towards the sky holding a sail that billows in the wind.

mobShortDesc: A Large Caped Bunch of Cabbage stands idle.
mobLongDesc: A stout but old man attempts to stand tall though age has clearly taken its toll.  Ready to bring the fight one last time.

mobShortDesc: A Large Light Bulb slowly watches your movement around the room.
mobLongDesc: A sturdy yet cracked bulb.  Its light flickers as it shorts out.

mobShortDesc: A Large Bundle of Carrots gleam in the light.
mobLongDesc: A tasty looking bunch of orange carrots.

mobShortDesc: A Large Moving Rose Bush waves in the breeze.
mobLongDesc: A prickly green bush covered in red flowers and thorns that shimmer in the light.

mobShortDesc: A Large Brocolli stands next to the cabbage.
mobLongDesc: A man with a large B on his chest stands in a "heroic" pose and attempts to look imposing. Green bunches can be seen sprouting from the limbs.

mobShortDesc: A Tall Godlike Cat sits in the corner.
mobLongDesc: A small brown and white cat sits in the corner. Its white hat wilting to the side.

mobShortDesc: A Big and Large Zombie lifts tree trunks.
mobLongDesc: A bulk of massive muscles and bulging limbs flexes with every move.

mobShortDesc: A Blurry Undead Mass runs around the room.
mobLongDesc: A figure of imposing presence despite decay forming at its sides.  Empty eye sockets are menacing to anything appearing in the room.

mobShortDesc: A Large Zombie smashes the ground with a hammer.
mobLongDesc: A zombie swings a large hammer back and forth.  Smiling and waiting for the next thing to smash

mobName: Fleet Commander Explodes in your Face
mobShortDesc: A Zombie with a Commanders Hat emerges from the ground.
mobLongDesc: A large undead mass wearing a tattered navy uniform stands at attention. The clothes are needed pressed and medals adorn the jacket.

mobShortDesc: A Pair of Cross Looking Bells approaches.
mobLongDesc: A large brass bell sways back and forth even though it is attached to nothing.

mobShortDesc: A Very Muscular Pink Sheep lounges in a chair.
mobLongDesc: A small and yet quite adorable sheep hops around happily enjoying the fluffy wool chairs

mobShortDesc: A Giant Bag of Tea froths at the mouth.
mobLongDesc: A large white bag sits in front of you. Random bones can be seen inside the bag as the string twirls at the top, waiting to ensare its next victim.

mobShortDesc: A Tough Looking Punk roams, itching for a fight.
mobLongDesc: A very muscular person covered in tattoos stands and flexes.  He intently stares ahead and looks ready for a fight.

mobShortDesc: An Average Looking Guy slowly walks around the room.
mobLongDesc: A male of average height slowly paces the room and stares in random directions.

mobShortDesc: A Small Puny Man sits crying to himself.
mobLongDesc: A shriveled and disheveled man sits on the floor, crying and waiting for the end.

mobShortDesc: Here in the shadows, the pecious beast awaits you next move.
mobLongDesc: A compact creature, the pecious beast has a skin covered in a thick slime.  Supported by powerful hind legs, the beast could spring forward at any time.  Extending from its long mouth are two six inch fangs. Filling the gap between these fangs are short razor like teeth. It is hard to distinguish the point where the beast's head stops and body starts.

mobShortDesc: Floating a few feet in front of you is an unearthly apparition.
mobLongDesc: The ghostly creture that floats before you is not of this realm. It's unwrapped body is a translucent mixture of dust and slime.  Two small appendages project forword from its upper torso.  No legs can be seen, as it appears never to touch the ground.

mobShortDesc: An animated corpse towers before you.
mobLongDesc: Returned to life by an ancient magician, the animated corpse has been forsaken to these ancient tombs to live out an uneventful existence until the end of time.

mobShortDesc: A demonic spirit manifests itself before you.
mobLongDesc: As in the lifetime before this one, the demonic spirit lives to do the bidding of the dark side.  The spirit is a creture of undefinable shape and color.  It's eyes however glint with that certain evil you have seen in many of the dark creatures.

mobShortDesc: Levitating here is an individual of great divinity.
mobLongDesc: The individual that stands before you is here for one reason and one reason only.  It is he that provides the balance between good and evil.  Without out him every ounce of sin and evil in these tunnels would be set forth to reak havoc on the world.

mobShortDesc: A grave robber shifts in and out of the shadows here.
mobLongDesc: Barely visible to you, a grave robber has become adept at hiding in the shadows of these dark tunnels.  Like you he searches these tunnels for treasures and riches.

mobShortDesc: Before you stands the manifestation of all that is evil.
mobLongDesc: Centuries of evil have spawned the evil being that stands before you. Its eyes are little more then a glimmering flame that offer you no idea of what lurkes within the evil beast.  From inside its mouth you see a twisted mangle of teeth.  Tattered rags cover a body that must be a thousand years old.

mobShortDesc: This pile of trash reeks of toxic fumes!
mobLongDesc: This pile of trash has been constructed to resemble a humanoid form.  It wears some basic armor and wields nothing but its fists.  Its construction reminds you of a scarecrow.  Needless to say, this fellow reeks of pure garbage.

mobShortDesc: A cleric is here, worshiping the god of garbage.
mobLongDesc: This cleric is dressed in dark green robes stained with garbage and raw sewage. Her symbol appears to be to the god of garbage and she smells as bad as the rest of this place.  Upon closer inspection, her face seems rotted, almost to the point of undead texture, yet she maintains some human features, such as hair and eyelids.
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST

mobShortDesc: A golem made of rotting garbage rises from the floor.
mobLongDesc: This golem is constructed from the various debris found within the sewers. It reeks of garbage and is completely silent and doesn't seem to like the fact that you stand before it.  The trash that composes its body has begun to rot and the mere thought of touching it makes you sick.

mobShortDesc: The faint outline of a holy knight hovers here, searching for something.
mobLongDesc: This shining figure looks like it is searching for someone, or something. His face has an expression of pure sadness and he gazes at you, longing to ask for help, yet no words come from him mouth.  From the faint outline of his body that is visible, he looks like one of the famous paladins of Midgaard that has met his untimely demise too soon.
affectedByFlags: INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY SPHERE PROTECT-EVIL DODGE PROTECT-GOOD INVUL

mobShortDesc: A zombie that looks like a halfling wanders about.
mobLongDesc: This creature looks like an undead version of a halfling.  It is short and looks relatively weak, yet reeks of zombie flesh.  It moans occasionally and it's grey twisted flesh is only covered by some tattered rags.  It's mouth is stink.

mobShortDesc: A small doll lies here, waiting to attack an unfortunate victim.
mobLongDesc: This evil looking thing resembles a small doll crafted to look very much like a living being.  You almost swear you recognize the face, but as soon as you almost get there, it seems to swirl and take on a new image. There are obvious stitches covering its body and its eyes seem to look right through you.
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST

mobShortDesc: A large mass of slime floats here.
mobLongDesc: It's green and looks like a giant mound of slime.
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST

mobShortDesc: A mound of garbage rises and attacks!
mobLongDesc: This mound of garbage looks utterly disgusting and smells worse than anything you have ever smelled before.  It has bits of trash and garbage composing its skin and the remains of old weapons and armor can be seen, sharp as ever.

mobShortDesc: An electric eel swims here, ready to take a bite out of your hide!
mobLongDesc: This eel is nearly six feet long!  It is covered with dark gray scales and the sewage seems to have stained them in certain places.  It looks like it is a very mean fellow, but takes little notice of you.  The teeth on it do look very dangerous and small arcs of electricity can be seen every so often.

mobShortDesc: A tremendous thorn creature is here twitching in the wind.
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.

mobShortDesc: A huge whirlwind thunders across the room.
mobLongDesc: At first it looks like an ordinary whirlwind, but as you look closer you see a person inside the whirlwind. He wears ragged torn clothes and grins strangely as he spins around creating the tornado. In his hands he holds a huge flail sparkling with electricity.
affectedByFlags: SANCTUARY SPHERE DODGE FLY INVUL DUAL FURY

mobShortDesc: A searing hot flame is darting across the floor here.
mobLongDesc: This creature has humanoid shape but is made entirely from lava. It stands upright on what would be legs and has powerful arms on its side. The creature is surrounded by an everburning flame combusting anything flammable when it comes to close. Now and then a pseudopod of lava is spouted out in any direction, fizzling and burning until it hardens and turns too rock.

mobShortDesc: Heral the Earth Elemental is here creating small earthquakes.
mobLongDesc: This creature looks like a huge unfinished rock sculpture. Large feet pop out below the large boulder and six powerful arms line the sides of it. The whole rock body seems to bulge here and there. Somethimes you think you can see the features of a humanoid face on the large rock surface but it only appears for a moment and is then gone.

mobShortDesc: A huge water elemental is here swirling like a whirlpool.
mobLongDesc: This creature resembles a large flying stingray. The outer side is black while its underside is gray. A large crystalline stinger swoops back and fourth at the end of its tail. A large mouth lined with rows of tiny razorsharp teeth gapes at you.

mobShortDesc: Saulot the Dragonkine Arch-Mage is pacing back and forth the room.
mobLongDesc: This huge reptilian creature stands over 30 feet tall. Covering it's shoulders is a robe made from black scales. It's entire silver body is covered with scales reflecting a burning light. Powerful arms flex and prepare for battle, while the  creature holds a dagger the size of a shortsword in his right hand and a huge and dusty grimoire firmly graped in the left. The creature flashes its razorsharp teeth and slowly wags it's spiked tail back and forth.

mobShortDesc: A Dragonkine Elementalist is here comtemplating the sky.
mobLongDesc: This reptilian creature rises seven feet above the ground and has extremely powerful legs and arms. A heavy tail thumps rythmically on the cround creating a horrible and distracting drumming noise. The creature is draped in thick brown robes and on its head it wears a large leather coif. A pair of black leather boots protect its feet. As you watch closely you realize this creature has no scales. It's skin consists of a hard rocklike material making for good protection.

mobShortDesc: A Dragonkine Wizard saunters about in deep thought.
mobLongDesc: This reptillian creature is a mere six feet tall. It walks upright but has rather slim and weak looking arms. A thin and long tail grows out the back of the reptile. It wears large blue robes filled with strange arcane symbols woven with a golden thread. On its head it wears a large pointy hat, this one too is filled with the same arcane symbols. It holds a large wooden staff, carved with the stranges runes and wards, in its right hand. A pair of sandals peek out from beneath the robe revealing a scaled foot.
affectedByFlags: INVISIBLE DETECT-INVISIBLE SANCTUARY SPHERE INFRAVISION DUAL

mobShortDesc: A Dragonkine Necromancer is here pondering his dark art.
mobLongDesc: This reptillian creature walks upright on two powerful legs. Its arms are also powerful and a tail stretches out five feet to enlargen the whole creature. This creature wears filthy ragged black robes and a dark hood conceals most of its face. It husks slightly as it walks towards you seemingly unaware of you and indeed the whole world.

mobShortDesc: The Dragonkine Admiral sits here studying a large map.
mobLongDesc: This dragonlike creature is even taller than the others on this vessel. She measures a massive ten feet in height and her tail prolongs her body with another seven feet. She wears a beautiful shirt in the most exotic colors and baggy purple pants. Dangling on her right side is a thin rapier while a pair of daggers decorate her left side. Around her neck she wears a elegantly crafted torc made from black obsidian.
affectedByFlags: INVISIBLE DETECT-INVISIBLE SANCTUARY SPHERE DODGE INVUL FURY

mobShortDesc: A Dragonkine Sailor is strolling along the ship.
mobLongDesc: A large dragonlike cerature standing upright on two legs. He measures nearly seven feet in height and another five feet extends into a heavy looking tail. The reptilian creature wear a combination of beautiful and majestic clothing colors matching to perfection. A glinting silver sabre dangles from a belt at his side. He wears a red scarf with a dragonlike skull on his head.

mobShortDesc: A River Steed is swimming here.
mobLongDesc: This strange creature looks like a seaworm with fins. A large set of teeth shine as the river steed opens its huge mouth. Drooling a slimy green substance it approaches you.
actionFlags: ISNPC AGGRESSIVE AGGCL AGGNI AGGNO AGGCO AGGGOOD

mobShortDesc: A huge blue dragon is here spanning its wings.
mobLongDesc: A large creature with the lower body of the lion and the upper body of a bird. It's fur is slightly ragged and razor sharp claws grows on its paws.

mobShortDesc: A huge silver dragon spreads her wings in defiance at you.
mobLongDesc: This creature you immediately recognize as a huge silver dragon. It's scales flash in the light and it's muscles bulge beneath a scaled hide. Large powerful legs support the awsome body and powerful claws prepare for attack. Behind a tails swoops up and down.

mobShortDesc: A huge green dragon is standing here steaming from it's nostrils.
mobLongDesc: This creature is recognizable as one of the greatest green dragons alive. It's entire body stretches out an enormous 150 feet. Slender yet powerful legs support the body while sharp claws prepare to attack. A huge tail thomps the ground in a horrible rythm.

mobShortDesc: A huge black dragon is here gnawing on some old bones.
mobLongDesc: This is a fierce dragon standing upright on two powerful hind legs. Its huge body covered entirely in black scales. A huge tails wings back and fourth creating a hissing sound. Two huge reptilian eyes gaze almost satisfactory down at you.

mobShortDesc: A creature made from thorns is standing here.
mobLongDesc: A strange creature made entirely from thorns twitching and twirling as it approaches you.

mobShortDesc: A blank of primal clay stands here, waiting to be shaped
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.

mobShortDesc: The armies high commander stands here studying maps strewn across the table.
mobLongDesc: This is a steadfast man. One with a slow and steady reserve, a quick thinking mind, and a great strategist. Every move he makes seems calculated, the look in his eyes seems deep and piercing.
mobImmune: ELECTRIC POISON PUMMEL SLEEP BLINDNESS DRAIN DISINTEGRATE SUMMON BACKSTAB AMBUSH
attackType: PUMMEL PUNCH DISARM SPELL SKILL SPELL SKILL

mobShortDesc: The Fiend of Blasphemy is here guarding his sunken world.
mobLongDesc: Poised before you is a towering fiend, Ruler of this underworld domain.  At times this awful creature shimmers and you feel the dank air crackle with its released energy.  Where there should be a face is a fetureless void.

mobShortDesc: A ShopKeeper is standing here.
mobLongDesc: The owner of the General Shop.

mobShortDesc: The Baker is standing here.
mobLongDesc: The Baker seems fat and complacent, making a living selling sweets to merchants of death.

mobShortDesc: A Blacksmith is here welcoming you to his shop.
mobLongDesc: The owner of the Armour/Weapon Shop.

mobShortDesc: A Wizard is standing here.
mobLongDesc: The owner of the Magic Shop.

mobShortDesc: Kulzaren the leader of the brigand glares at you from atop his throne.
mobLongDesc: Kulzaren is surprisingly average build for a man of his position. He adorns himself in armor of the finest quality.  You have a hard time believing this man would head such an untamed army.  He then turns your way and his piercing stare burns through you.

mobShortDesc: One of Kulzaren's Aides is standing here.
mobLongDesc: You are looking at one of Kulzaren's aides.  He is dressed in fine armor bearing the same coat of arms you noticed on the flag and door outside the house.  They are all extremely loyal to the brigand leader and would be honored to die for him.

mobShortDesc: A Spirit is floating in front of you.
mobLongDesc: This is an undead servant of Sadyra.

mobShortDesc: Sadyra is here making strange gestures over a bubbling cauldron.
mobLongDesc: You are unable to get any sense of relative age or appearance of this woman. In fact you can't be sure she is in fact human due to the heavy red robe covering her from head to toe.  Her face too is heavily shadowed due to the hood pulled over her head.  A strange red aura engulfs her adding to the sinister appearance of the Wizard.  She turns to you with burning eyes.

mobShortDesc: A travelling merchant standing here eyeing you fondly.
mobLongDesc: This man's claim to fame is to trade to as many towns and villages all over the globe.  He begins to rummage through his belt making note of his current inventory.

mobShortDesc: Calanar the brigand champion eyes you suspiciously.
mobLongDesc: A giant of a man that tanned skin seems as tough as the fine bronze armor he wears on his body.  Looking into his eye you see the piercing stare of a warrior, his very stare invokes fear in the heart of his prey.  You have no doubt he would be a formidable foe.

mobShortDesc: A Brigand is standing here.
mobLongDesc: The brigand standing before you has dark leatherer skin and built solidly.  His armor has seen it's day as has his sword.

mobShortDesc: Papi's favorite cat is resting here, purring gently.
mobLongDesc: This is just about the most huggable cat you have ever seen! You notice that the cat has exceptionally big claws - guess it's nothing to worry about as long as you leave it alone.

mobShortDesc: A waitress is standing here smiling broadly.
mobLongDesc: A bright smile beams on her cute face as she trips over her own feet. Giggling at her own bad luck, Beatrice straightens out her formal dress attire and proceeds to clean tables.

mobShortDesc: A waiter is here, making sure that you are enjoying your stay.
mobLongDesc: A full suit and a pair of thick glasses droop slightly over his nose, this clean-shaven man nods as if annoyed as he swiftly walks over and cleans the tables.  He works long, hard hours -- an expression of boredom is visible on his face, making you wonder if he deserves your tip or not.

mobShortDesc: A Restaurant Attendant sits here diligently waiting on your next order.
mobLongDesc: Dressed in a nicely pressed suit, this elegant looking attendant sits here casually blowing bubble gum.  She waits here impatiently for you to order something, but doesn't seen to care much because she gets paid whether or not you receive your food.

mobShortDesc: A huge bear of a man stands here with arms crossed, blocking your way.
mobLongDesc: A huge burly man stands tall before you, eyes gazing down trying to make you feel meek.  He is the bouncer of this luxurious establishment, guarding these doors making sure the right people go in and the wrong ones don't.  So don't mess with him, he looks like he has had a very bad day.

zoneName: Camely, Black Tower, Chairhien, by Alexander
mobShortDesc: Tallanvor is standing here.
mobLongDesc: He is tall and good looking, young with dark eyes that watches you carefully. His only duty it to protect his queen.

zoneName: Camely, Black Tower, Chairhien, by Alexander
mobShortDesc: A member of the queens guard is protecting the castle.
mobLongDesc: Long white collars hung down over his mail and plate, and his cloak and undercoat is red. His conical helmet shines like silver. Thin red streamers flutter beneath the head of his lance. A cage of steel bars mask his face.

zoneName: Camely, Black Tower, Chairhien, by Alexander
mobShortDesc: Rahvin is standing here.
mobLongDesc: Rahvin is tall and large. He is dark and very handsome. He is youthful except for the white streaks at his temples. His eyes are almost black.

zoneName: Camely, Black Tower, Chairhien, by Alexander
mobShortDesc: Morgase, Queen of Andor, is standing here.
mobLongDesc: Morgase Trakand is beautiful, matured and ripened. Her face and figure, her presence, fill the room like a light. She has a rich, warm voice. She has blue eyes and long red-gold curls.

zoneName: Camely, Black Tower, Chairhien, by Alexander
mobShortDesc: A rioter is looking around for fight.
mobLongDesc: The rioter has a frenzied look, looking around for something to pillage or burn. His clothes are worn and torn in several places showing several bloody wounds.

zoneName: Camely, Black Tower, Chairhien, by Alexander
mobShortDesc: A blank of primal clay stands here, waiting to be shaped
mobLongDesc: The librarian wears a brown robe covering her from neck to feet. In her hand she holds an old manuscript.

zoneName: Camely, Black Tower, Chairhien, by Alexander
mobShortDesc: A man in a black coat is standing here.
mobLongDesc: The asha'man has a long black coat hanging to his knees. Under the coat he  wears a black shirt with two pins, one on each side. One with a sword and the other with a dragon in silver.
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST

zoneName: Camely, Black Tower, Chairhien, by Alexander
mobShortDesc: Mazrim Taim is standing here.
mobLongDesc: He has black hair, with a dark face, and the tilted eyes, hooked nose and high cheekbones of a Saldaean. He looks like he is in his thirties.

zoneName: Camely, Black Tower, Chairhien, by Alexander
mobShortDesc: Demandred is standing here.
mobLongDesc: A high dark and handsome man is standing before you. Over his hooked nose, dark eyes fix you gaze with hate. He is clothed all in black except for silver threading on his coat.

mobShortDesc: A corpse-like figure stands here, fulfilling his ancient duty.
mobLongDesc: Despite his corpse-like features and dead, almost lifeless eyes, Maladin is, in fact, very much alive and well.  Cursed to maintain and guard the Vaults for all eternity he really doesn't get out much and one might say that he lives for his work.
mobImmune: FIRE ELECTRIC POISON PUMMEL KICK PUNCH SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DRAIN DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE CLAIR SUMMON HIT BLUDGEON PIERCE SLASH WHIP CLAW BITE STING CRUSH HACK CHOP SLICE BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT

mobShortDesc: Edgar the Swordpupil/Believer is standing here
mobLongDesc: You see before you the great Edgar!  Adorned in the finest adamantine armor, he bulges his huge muscles, and frightens you into submission. Best step cautiously around me!

mobShortDesc: A goblin is here, wandering through the hallways..
The bandit leader is here, giving you an icy glare.
mobLongDesc: He has the bandits under his control and will do anything to get you out of here.

mobShortDesc: A bandit is here, eyeing you suspiciously.
mobLongDesc: He has obviously made this room a hideout, and doesnt like you intruding.

mobShortDesc: A crab spider drops from the ceiling and attacks!
A huge beetle sits on a dusty carpet here.
mobLongDesc: Funny, he seems to be glowing..

mobShortDesc: A priestess of Set kneels at the altar here.
mobLongDesc: She looks at you through blackened eyes.. you can tell shes been through a lot in her life.

mobShortDesc: A huge white wolf jumps up and pounces on you!
mobLongDesc: Its drooling at you.. better not let it get what it wants, would ruin your whole day.

mobShortDesc: A giant shrew scuttles around the room..
mobLongDesc: The shrew has no eyes, and "sees" with its ears..

mobShortDesc: A large, rust-brown kobold stands here, eyeing you suspiciously.
mobLongDesc: He doesnt know whether to trust you or not.

mobShortDesc: A stirge flies towards you at great speed and attacks!
mobLongDesc: It does NOT look happy about you being here.

mobShortDesc: You see a man lying on a bed peacefully.
A goblin is here, arguing over a few coins on the floor.
mobLongDesc: He looks scrawny, hungry perhaps?

mobShortDesc: A Priestess is here making offerings for Aldor.
mobLongDesc: This young girl was once a follower of Edrick, but now Aldor has her making offerings to him as the price of her continuing existence.

mobShortDesc: A Prisoner of Aldor is standing here.
mobLongDesc: This man, once a loyal follower of Edrick, is now confined to a cell by the evil Aldor.

mobShortDesc: An Animated Knight is here, protecting Aldor.
mobLongDesc: You look at the knight, only  notice it is an empty suit of armor. Aldor is truly powerful to create such a beast.

mobShortDesc: A Flying Dragon is here, waiting for is master.
mobLongDesc: This mighty dragon is the pet of the evil Aldor.  It looks very strong and powerful.

mobShortDesc: A rat is here, running about the floor.
mobLongDesc: The rat is a small brown rodent, kinda cute actually.

mobShortDesc: An Old Cook is standing here.
mobLongDesc: She once cooked for the great Edrick, but now she is a slave of the evil Aldor.

mobShortDesc: The Spirit of Edrick's Guard is here, haunting the Castle.
mobLongDesc: This spirit was once a mighty guard for the great king Edrick, but now it haunts the halls of this old castle.

mobShortDesc: A Small Wyvern is flying here.
mobLongDesc: The wyvern is very small so he should not cause you too much trouble.

mobShortDesc: The evil Warlock Aldor is here, summoning evil.
mobLongDesc: Aldor is an evil looking man.  Let's not make him angry.

mobShortDesc: God exists.
mobLongDesc: God is nothing like South Park.
affectedByFlags: BLIND INVISIBLE DETECT-ALIGNMENT DETECT-INVISIBLE DETECT-MAGIC SENSE-LIFE HOLD SANCTUARY GROUP CONFUSION CURSE SPHERE POISON PROTECT-EVIL PARALYSIS INFRAVISION STATUE SLEEP DODGE SNEAK HIDE ANIMATE CHARM PROTECT-GOOD FLY SUBDUE IMINV INVUL DUAL FURY

mobShortDesc: A blank of primal clay stands here, waiting to be shaped
mobLongDesc: As your eyes concentrate on the skeleton a crimson flash of light flows from its eye-sockets and strikes you.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-ALIGNMENT DETECT-INVISIBLE DETECT-MAGIC SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY PROTECT-EVIL INFRAVISION STATUE PROTECT-GOOD INVUL DUAL

mobLongDesc: As your eyes concentrate on the skeleton a crimson flash of light flows from its eye-sockets and strikes you.

mobKeywords: skeleton skeletal magi king wiseman larvandad
mobShortDesc: A blank of primal clay stands here, waiting to be shaped
mobLongDesc: As your eyes concentrate on the skeleton a crimson flash of light flows from its eye-sockets and strikes you.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-ALIGNMENT DETECT-INVISIBLE DETECT-MAGIC SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY PROTECT-EVIL INFRAVISION STATUE PROTECT-GOOD INVUL DUAL
mobImmune: POISON PUMMEL PUNCH CHARM DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE STING BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT

mobShortDesc: The Archbishop is kneeling here with his head bowed down in prayer.
mobLongDesc: An old, grey-haired man in his sixties and with a long, well-tended beard is wearing a chasuble that is heavily embroidered with gold on the chest, while it is made of gold-cloth around the neck and hanging over his arms.  He is wearing a golden mitre.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-ALIGNMENT DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY PROTECT-EVIL INFRAVISION DUAL
mobImmune: SLEEP CHARM DRAIN DISINTEGRATE SUMMON BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT

mobShortDesc: An old priest is standing here, facing west towards the nave with his arms crossed and a solemn look on his face.
mobLongDesc: The grey-haired man, possibly in his fifties and with a long, well-tended beard, is wearing a heavily decorated chasuble over his alb.  A stole lined with gold decorations hangs around his neck.  The cincture around his waist is worn over the stole.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-ALIGNMENT DETECT-INVISIBLE DETECT-MAGIC SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY PROTECT-EVIL
mobImmune: SLEEP CHARM DRAIN SUMMON BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST

mobShortDesc: A priest walks determinently over the cathedral floor.
mobLongDesc: The middle-aged man wears a chasuble embroidered with the christian cross in gold over his alb.  He wears a stole lined with gold decorations around his neck.  The cincture around his waist is worn over the stole.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-ALIGNMENT DETECT-INVISIBLE DETECT-MAGIC SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY PROTECT-EVIL
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST

mobShortDesc: A deacon stands here with his arms crossed.
mobLongDesc: The deacon is wearing an alb and a long, wide-sleeved tunic. He wears a stole lined with gold decorations over his left shoulder, which is tied cross-wise at his right side under the cincture.

mobShortDesc: An acolyte is walking casually around the cathedral.
mobLongDesc: The young man is wearing a white surplice with lace inserts over the long, black cassock.  The acolyte is an aspiring member of the clergy and performs different kinds of altar duties.

zoneName: Cavern of Lost Souls II, by Liner
mobShortDesc: An insectile creature scuttles quickly to meet you, ample jaws spreading wide.
mobLongDesc: A towering, brown insect extends its grasping appendages toward you as its ample mandibles snap back and forth in the air, oozing saliva.  These creatures have taken over the ancient mines as their own, and you have happened upon their nest. Its tenuous gaze flicks over your body as it rapidly approaches.

zoneName: Cavern of Lost Souls II, by Liner
mobShortDesc: The raging spirit of an ancient horror turns to slay you in its gaze.
mobLongDesc: A blood-spackled spectre unfurls its tenebrous shrouds as you approach. Its form is long and sleek, eyes blazing deep scarlet and teeth elongating to the likeness of needles. Its anger is apparent as it rushes to dispatch of you.
mobImmune: FIRE ELECTRIC PUMMEL KICK PUNCH BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT

zoneName: Cavern of Lost Souls II, by Liner
mobShortDesc: A broken spirit trembles like a leaf in the soft breeze.
mobLongDesc: A disembodied figure floats briefly into your field of vision. Cowering away, it tucks its tattered shape of a head under its arm and begins such an unearthly whimper that your ears fairly ring. It appears to be larger than the other spiritual inhabitants of these caves and in such torment that no man could ever endure.
mobImmune: FIRE ELECTRIC PUMMEL KICK PUNCH BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT

zoneName: Cavern of Lost Souls II, by Liner
mobShortDesc: The sorrowful vision of a lost soul passes quickly before you.
mobLongDesc: A lonely apparition glides effortlessly along the subterranean breeze. It appears to be the soul of a would-be adventurer, one of the many who became lost or met with some unnatural death in these endless caverns.  It gently caresses your shoulder and conveys the deep sorrow buried within its translucent eyes.

zoneName: Cavern of Lost Souls II, by Liner
mobName: The soul of a mining slave
mobShortDesc: A wispy image of a miner flashes briefly across the wall.
mobLongDesc: The departed soul of an ancient mining slave floats neatly along the ground as if walking.  It carries a pickaxe and a dim candle in its wispy hands.  A ghostly echo of a whistle drifts to your ears as it returns to whatever spectral work it was consumed with before you arrived.

zoneName: Cavern of Lost Souls II, by Liner
mobShortDesc: The sorrowful vision of a lost soul passes quickly before you.
mobLongDesc: A lonely apparition glides effortlessly along the subterranean breeze. It appears to be the soul of a would-be adventurer, one of the many who became lost or met with some unnatural death in these endless caverns.  It gently caresses your shoulder and conveys the deep sorrow buried within its translucent eyes.

zoneName: Cavern of Lost Souls II, by Liner
mobShortDesc: An insectile creature scuttles quickly to meet you, ample jaws spreading wide.
mobLongDesc: A towering, brown insect extends its grasping appendages toward you as its ample mandibles snap back and forth in the air, oozing saliva.  These creatures have taken over the ancient mines as their own, and you have happened upon their nest. Its tenuous gaze flicks over your body as it rapidly approaches.

zoneName: Cavern of Lost Souls I, by Liner
mobShortDesc: A sturdy captain barks incoherent orders as he pilots the giant barge.
mobLongDesc: A lumbering beast of a man stands at the prow of the barge. His legs, like the trunks of a tree, are firmly planted on either side of the center, perfectly balanced.  His left eye is covered by a sinister patch, and a ragged bandanna circles his neck.  Scars stand out like thunderbolts on his great powerful arms as he steers the craft along.

zoneName: Cavern of Lost Souls I, by Liner
mobShortDesc: A weary man sits quietly behind his table, waiting to take your money.
mobLongDesc: A thin figure sits quietly here, staring at you with mild interest.  His winter attire is almost tailored, a fur-lined coat and hat made from choice furs and not the ragged scraps most inhabitants are forced to purchase.  He rolls a gold coin steadily across his deft fingers, waiting for you to either purchase a pass or leave.

zoneName: Cavern of Lost Souls I, by Liner
mobShortDesc: A jolly figure towers over the stacks of baubles, offering a good deal.
mobLongDesc: A hardened mountain of a man stands towering over you.  His arms extend to assault you with a double-handshake greeting and his eyes sparkle with the warmth of friendship and the prospect of another sale.  His mouth begins running speedily with the voice of a skilled entrepreneur, but his eyes never leave your own as he displays his wares.

zoneName: Cavern of Lost Souls I, by Liner
mobShortDesc: A young girl rolls playfully in the snowbanks, smiling at the sky.
mobLongDesc: A young girl frolics in the soft plumes of snow, oblivious to you and impervious to the cutting cold.  Her face is red and full of life, full of youth; her eyes are wide and glittering with the purity and joy only children can experience.

zoneName: Cavern of Lost Souls I, by Liner
mobShortDesc: A boy wrapped in a bundle of fur screams happily as he makes a snowball.
mobLongDesc: A young boy dances happily along the snowdrift path, oblivious to you and impervious to the cutting cold.  His face is red and full of life, full of youth; his eyes are wide and glittering with the purity and joy only children can experience.

zoneName: Cavern of Lost Souls I, by Liner
mobShortDesc: A young boy sits impatiently here, barely glancing in your direction.
mobLongDesc: A young boy sits quietly beneath a shaggy mop of red curls.  A gentle grin touches his lips as he gestures for you to be quiet and turns his rapt attention back to the sleeping form of his grandfather.  He brandishes a tiny feather with which he tickles the old man's nose.

zoneName: Cavern of Lost Souls I, by Liner
mobShortDesc: An ancient man lay snoring away in the corner beneath a pile of furs.
mobLongDesc: An ancient man slumbers soundly here on a worn cot.  His brow is wide and shows evidence of the extent of his years.  Flowing white wisps of hair peek out from beneath a hide cap, and his eyelids roll as his snores echo within the shelter.

zoneName: Cavern of Lost Souls I, by Liner
mobShortDesc: One of the fort's few inhabitants tends her crop in the harsh cold.
mobLongDesc: This weary woman picks incessantly at the dead ground here, trying to coax forth plants for her family's barren table.  Her eyes are gray and solemn, and a single tear tumbles over the landscape of her face as she realizes the futility of her effort.

zoneName: Cavern of Lost Souls I, by Liner
mobShortDesc: A drooling imp cavorts among the dim recesses of the caverns.
mobLongDesc: A squat, impish creature scurries along the cavern floor here, gibbering and cackling to itself.  Its luminescent green eyes flash to burning orange as it approaches.  A tiny, dark shroud engulfs its body and matching boots patter along the bare rock. It appears to be a lower minion of the revenant forms, perhaps merely an apprentice.

zoneName: Cavern of Lost Souls I, by Liner
mobShortDesc: A squat man with a scraggly beard bends forward to greet you.
mobLongDesc: A well-built man stands wrapped in huge, flowing furs.  His hair is shaggy and unkempt, his face cracked and worn by years of harsh cold and dangerous excursions.  He regards you with mild curiosity then warm greeting as he sees the toils and mark of the adventurer in your eyes.  He extends a hand and offers a portion of his latest kill, bidding you to stay a while.

zoneName: Cavern of Lost Souls I, by Liner
mobShortDesc: A blubbering, mewling form envelops you in a cloud of vapor.
mobLongDesc: A flowing robe parts slowly within the darkness to reveal a ghastly figure within.  Tendrils of sulfurous smoke drift elegantly from tiny pores within its dull, red skin.  Blotches of black, open oozing sores, and tiny red welts pucker and shift over its chest and face as it regards you with tremendous anger.  A cloud of vapor erupts around you as it raises its arms to cast a spell.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-ALIGNMENT DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY INFRAVISION DODGE

zoneName: Cavern of Lost Souls I, by Liner
mobShortDesc: Tajte, emissary of sufferance, writhes in relished agony as her gaze falls upon you.
mobLongDesc: A silent, human-like form regards you with disdain as you invade the recesses of her domain.  She is the epitome of mortal fear, mother of nightmares, squalid mistress of broken dreams.  She torments and breaks the stolen souls which reside here.  Her glistening hair whips back from a furrowed brow as she impales you with her horrible gaze.
mobImmune: FIRE ELECTRIC POISON PUMMEL KICK PUNCH DRAIN DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT

zoneName: Cavern of Lost Souls I, by Liner
mobShortDesc: Tajjo, emissary of death, wanders these burrows leaving a trail of poisoned earth.
mobLongDesc: A silent, human-like form regards you with disdain as you invade the recesses of his domain.  He is the bane of existence, a demon with only one purpose to serve, and that is death itself.  His face breaks into a demented snarl as he saunters forth to claim your mortal soul and condemn you to these catacombs for eternity.
mobImmune: FIRE ELECTRIC POISON PUMMEL KICK PUNCH DRAIN DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT

zoneName: Cavern of Lost Souls I, by Liner
mobShortDesc: A writhing vine slips out of the overgrowth and taps you tentatively.
mobLongDesc: The languid extension of the surrounding overgrowth dips forward to probe its environment.  Ganoid scales like the surface of this alien plant, and murderous thorns jut out to hold its prey.  Almost with a mind of its own, its tip aligns with your eyes and whips forward to attack!

mobShortDesc: A black king's bishop is standing here.
mobLongDesc: A happy bishop who can do everything in an incredibly quick motion.

mobShortDesc: A black king's knight is standing here.
mobLongDesc: The most powerful soldier of the black chess, it is responsible to the king's safety. It has a head of a horse and a body of mankind, it might be a relative of the centaur family.
actionFlags: SPEC SENTINEL SCAVENGER ISNPC AGGRESSIVE STAY-ZONE

mobShortDesc: A black king's castle is standing here.
mobLongDesc: A creature which looks like a building against attack. There are two arms and two legs attached to this particular piece. Its job is to protect the king.

mobShortDesc: The black king is standing here.
mobLongDesc: Unlike most kings, he does not enjoy the feeling of being powerful. He gave all his power to the queen, yet he is still a very tough fighter.

mobShortDesc: The black queen is standing here
mobLongDesc: She is the most respected and powerful figure in the black chess. She is bad-tempered and gets mad easily, watch out!

mobShortDesc: A black queen's bishop is standing here.
mobLongDesc: A happy bishop who can do everything in an incredibly quick motion.

mobShortDesc: A black queen's knight is standing here.
mobLongDesc: The most powerful soldier of the black chess, it is responsible to the Queen's safety. It has a head of a horse and a body of mankind, it might be a relative of the centaur family.
actionFlags: SPEC SENTINEL SCAVENGER ISNPC AGGRESSIVE STAY-ZONE

mobShortDesc: A black queen's castle is standing here.
mobLongDesc: A creature which looks like a building against attack. There are two arms and two legs attached to this particular piece. Its job is to protect the Queen.

mobShortDesc: A black pawn is standing here.
mobLongDesc: A protector of its own colour, also a very brave solider, one that never flee and walk away from away battle. It is waiting to be promoted to be a more important piece in its class.

mobShortDesc: A white king's bishop is standing here.
mobLongDesc: A happy bishop who can do everything in an incredibly quick motion.

mobShortDesc: A white king's knight is standing here.
mobLongDesc: The most powerful soldier of the white chess, it is responsible to the king's safety. It has a head of a horse and a body of mankind, it might be a relative of the centaur family.

mobShortDesc: A white king's castle is standing here.
mobLongDesc: A creature which looks like a building against attack. There are two arms and two legs attached to this particular piece. Its job is to protect the king.

mobShortDesc: The white king is standing here.
mobLongDesc: Unlike most kings, he does not enjoy the feeling of being powerful. He gave all his power to the queen, yet he is still a very tough fighter.

mobShortDesc: The white queen is standing here
mobLongDesc: She is the most respected and powerful figure in the white chess. She is bad-tempered and gets mad easily, watch out!

mobShortDesc: A white queen's bishop is standing here.
mobLongDesc: A happy bishop who can do everything in an incredibly quick motion.

mobShortDesc: A white queen's knight is standing here.
mobLongDesc: The most powerful soldier of the white chess, it is responsible to the Queen's safety. It has a head of a horse and a body of mankind, it might be a relative of the centaur family.

mobShortDesc: A white queen's castle is standing here.
mobLongDesc: A creature which looks like a building against attack. There are two arms and two legs attached to this particular piece. Its job is to protect the Queen.

mobShortDesc: A white pawn is standing here.
mobLongDesc: A protector of its own colour, also a very brave solider, one that never flee and walk away from away battle. It is waiting to be promoted to be a more important piece in its class.

mobShortDesc: A white chessmaster is standing here.
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.

mobShortDesc: A black king's bishop is standing here.
mobLongDesc: A happy bishop who can do everything in an incredibly quick motion.

mobShortDesc: A black king's knight is standing here.
mobLongDesc: The most powerful soilder of the black chess, it is responsible to the king's safety. It has a head of a horse and a body of mankind, it might be a relative of the centaur family.
actionFlags: SPEC SENTINEL SCAVENGER ISNPC AGGRESSIVE STAY-ZONE

mobShortDesc: A black king's castle is standing here.
mobLongDesc: A creature which looks like a building against attack. There are two arms and two legs attached to this particular piece. Its job is to protect the king.

mobShortDesc: The black king is standing here.
mobLongDesc: Unlike most kings, he does not enjoy the feeling of being powerful. He gave all his power to the queen, yet he is still a very tough fighter.

mobLongDesc: A protector of its own colour, also a very brave solider, one that never flee and walk away from away battle. It is waiting to be promoted to be a more important piece in its class.

mobShortDesc: A clever wizard is here making potions.
mobLongDesc: He is a very clever person and he can make some very powerful magic items.

mobShortDesc: The Food ShopKeeper is here frying a polar bear.
mobLongDesc: This man has a very greedy face.

mobShortDesc: A drunk is here sleeping like a pig.
mobLongDesc: A drunken and dissolve man.

mobShortDesc: A Cornelius Guard is here protecting the City.
mobLongDesc: A very tough guard who is here to protect his city.

mobShortDesc: A polar bear is here looking for something to eat.
mobLongDesc: A white giant bear which usually lives in North Pole. It looks very angry.

mobShortDesc: An inhabitant is in his own house and sleeps like a pig here.
mobLongDesc: He is the commoner of the city of Cornelius, leave him alone because he is in a bad mood.

mobShortDesc: Nergal, Lord of corruption stands here, oozing.
mobLongDesc: His stomach protrudes, bloated and white.  Open sores and pustules burst upon his skin, even as you look at him.  One touch of his skin is sure to bring about endless agony.

mobShortDesc: Erishkigal, mistress of death, lays here contemplating you.
mobLongDesc: A beautiful shapely woman with dark hair and very pale skin.  The way her coal black eyes burn deep into your soul gives you the chills.
actionFlags: SPEC SENTINEL ISNPC AGGRESSIVE STAY-ZONE ARM

mobShortDesc: A diseased, skeletal figure stalks his lord's enemies.
mobLongDesc: Emaciated and putrefying, Nergal's bodyguards are hideous to behold. Even more hideous is the fact that they blend with the night and move with a mystic silent grace.

mobShortDesc: A larvae is here, squirming on the floor.
mobLongDesc: These larvae are anywhere from 1 to 4 feet long, in varying stages of development.  All have at least vaguely humanoid looking heads that are grossly misshapen.

mobShortDesc: A man with an impressive red mullet is practicing intently here.
mobLongDesc: A somewhat terrifying, but strangely friendly figure stands here. His hair is cropped short at the top, but falls into a long tail at the back. He seems to be pre-occupied with performing what appear to be "martial arts" moves, but upon seeing you, prepares himself for training...

mobShortDesc: The chillest dude ever sits quietly at the counter, sipping from a small cup.
mobLongDesc: Resplendent in fresh flannel pajama bottoms and a chunky sweater, a middle-aged man sits here, pondering the vastness of exsitence. His wisdom, certainly beyond his years, attracts you to interrupt his excogiation and ask for guidance, or more certainly a task to bring enlightenment.

mobShortDesc: Durion the self-medicating chemist is here, tasting his own brew...
mobLongDesc: Wearing a silvery grey silken lab-coat and thick black horn-rimmed glasses, this tall skinny figure of an elf looks down on you with a grin on his face.  Looking into his big black dilated pupils you can clearly see that this man is under the influence of heavy drugs and is in no way suited to medicate, let alone operate on anyone! Is that blood on his hands? Where are his gloves??

mobShortDesc: Faelwen the treasurer is here, sorting out recent acquisitions...
mobLongDesc: A petite woodelf maiden stand before you, her hair brown and braided.  She is wearing a pair of round silver-rimmed glasses on her little nose, a silvery silk blouse, and a tight, green wool skirt.

mobShortDesc: A Massive Bearicorn is here, ready to train you in the ways of war.
mobLongDesc: A Massive Bearicorn is here, ready to train you in the ways of war. This enormous snow-white creature stands nearly ten feet in length, with a massive four-foot spiraling horn protruding from its head.  It looks at you with an appraising eye, as though wondering what you could possibly want of it. Then it opens its massive jaw to let out a stretching yawn, revealing row upon row of incisors, before curling up and settling down for a nap.

mobShortDesc: A beautiful narwhal floats in mid-air here, tidying her wares.
mobLongDesc: This medium-sized toothed whale seems quite content to be floating in the middle of the air, rather than in her natural Arctic environment.  Her lush silver skin reflects the light that drifts in from overhead, while her horn glimmers with a luminance of its own.  She appears to be restocking shelves with various wares that adventurers depend upon.

mobKeywords: unicorn vault guard creature equus horse white
mobShortDesc: A creature of untainted white, with a glorious spiraling horn stands here, guarding something.
mobLongDesc: The most noble Equus, this magnificent stallion stands with head held high, his wispy beard fluttering in the wind.  From his head protrudes a horn of unspeakable beauty, radiating with power and sensual energy.  His muscles ripple beneath his shimmering coat, and you cannot help but feel a bit in awe by the sheer majesty of this creature.

mobShortDesc: A maiden stands here, her unicorn steed by her side.
mobLongDesc: This beautiful maiden has long flowing blonde hair, cascading down around her shoulders.  She wears a dress of cloud white, symbolizing the purity that has allowed her to tame such a noble beast.  She smiles at you as you approach, and gestures to show she has rooms you may rest in.

mobShortDesc: Joseph the Giant Grizzly Panda is squatting here eating some leaves.
mobLongDesc: A Giant Grizzly Panda is squatting here.

mobShortDesc: Sharak grins widely as he sees you approach, seems he gets few visitors.
mobLongDesc: Sharak is a stocky dwarf haliling from the strong and proud peoples of the Helventia Mountains.  Unusually friendly for a dwarf he greets you with a jovial wink and strong nudge in the side.  You can tell that he takes great pride in his wears and this shop of his.

mobShortDesc: Deyshall the Chief Instructor stands here with an air of deadly competence.
mobLongDesc: He is a noble looking man in his late thirties who has been using a sword since before he could walk.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-ALIGNMENT DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY SPHERE INFRAVISION DODGE INVUL

mobShortDesc: A little black cat is standing here, waiting to serve her mistress.
mobLongDesc: You notice the small black cat slink in and out of the shadows of the room silently as if she weren't a real part of this world.

mobShortDesc: A jolly innkeeper stands here, waiting to cater to your every need.
mobLongDesc: A plump innkeeper stands before you with a big smile, listening to your every problem and hoping for the next drink order and a big tip!  How about another round of ale for everyone?!?

mobShortDesc: Azura the Amazon vault guard is standing here.
mobLongDesc: The guard stands what looks to you to be at least 10 feet tall. Shadows of the passing day flicker and move across his unblinking face. Could anything get past this guy?

mobShortDesc: An aging wizard stands here, slowly stirring his cauldron.
mobLongDesc: An aging wizard stands before you, slowly stirring his potion mixture in the large stone cauldron.  The wizard is dressed in a long blue robe laiden with sparkling gems depicting a starry night sky. You wonder, could this be the traveling mage who created the Saber-Tooth Tiger that protects this town?

mobShortDesc: The grand marble statue of the Saber-Tooth Tiger stands guard here.
mobLongDesc: A grand marble Saber-Toothed Tiger, who was famed to have saved this quaint town, stands guard here.

mobShortDesc: Achmed the Vault Guard is standing here.
mobLongDesc: At the edge of your vision you see a diminutive figure, robed in black silk, standing in the corner. Shadows cast by the flickering torches seem to wrap around Achmed the Vault Guard and cloak him in darkness. You can feel the subtle waves of violence that roll over you when Achmed returns your look.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE DETECT-MAGIC SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY SPHERE INFRAVISION DODGE INVUL
mobImmune: FIRE ELECTRIC POISON PUMMEL KICK PUNCH SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DRAIN DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE CLAIR SUMMON HIT BLUDGEON PIERCE SLASH WHIP CLAW BITE STING CRUSH HACK CHOP SLICE BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT

mobShortDesc: Grunthor the Vigilant stands before you barring the way.
mobLongDesc: Barring your way into the inner halls of the Newbitorium stands the immense figure of Grunthor the Vigilant. Captured as a young boy in the Bolg lands far South of the Maelstrom, Grunthor has grown to be over 7 feet tall. With the width of 3 men, Grunthor could crush you with a single look of his metallic blue eyes.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY SPHERE INFRAVISION FLY INVUL FURY
mobImmune: FIRE ELECTRIC POISON PARALYSIS DISINTEGRATE SUMMON

mobShortDesc: Raven is here protecting the Dark Legion vaults.
mobLongDesc: You gaze into the eyes of the most viscious warrior the Legion has ever come across.  Raven the Tempest has served the Legion faithfully for decades, though her cruel, and torturous ways were not always smiled upon.  Raven has been known for toying with her victims.  She has a flair for fighting, and enjoys every second she gets to make her enemy suffer.  Her ways were so cruel and evil that the Legion had to keep her in the castle, where she was not such a threat.  She was then only used when it was very neccesary that the Legion needed a strong fighter.  Now, she is in charge of making sure the castle vaults are safe and in order.  She also gets a chance at the Catherine Wheel, when a punishment is due to an enemy.  Be careful what you do to her, or you may be her next victim.

mobShortDesc: Veim is here guarding the private chambers.
mobLongDesc: You see a rather young man wielding a curved sabre standing before you.  Though he doesn't look all that harmless, he is actually one of the greatest fighters the Legion has ever seen. Like Greedle, Veim is one of the oldest surviving members of the Legion.  Though Veim appears to be young he is actually very ancient, his dark magic transforms him.  Veim is now incapable of continuing his fighting career, so he has decided to aid the Legion by taking care of the castle.  He says he will stay until the Legion dominates the world, then he will pass his time and enter his long awaited peace.

mobShortDesc: Holo the Demon-Protector swoops above your head here.
mobLongDesc: Before you stands a tremendous demon.  His eyes blaze the colour of scarlet, they watch you intsenly from above as he swoops just about your head.  His flesh is black and red, and his huge wings stretch out from his back in a large span.  He has a very muscular build and his claws and fangs are incredibly sharp and long.  He has two huge horns jutting from his head, they glow with magical power. Holo, the Dark Demon is a gift from the Gods of Dark Legion. The gods gave Holo to the Legion for extra protection against anyone, or thing that may dared challenge the Legion. For centuries Holo has served, sacrificing the blood of many for his creators and for his clan.

mobShortDesc: Greedle the Witch is here stirring a strange mixture.
mobLongDesc: You see an very old woman slowly stirring a huge spoon into her black cauldron. She has long white hair draping down her back and partially covering her face.  This is Greedle, the witch.  Greedle was once a wandering gypsy until she found the Dark Legion, where she retired her nomadic roots and became a practitioner of more dark spells.  Using her ancient knowledge as a gypsy and the power of the Legion, Greedle has become one of the most powerful people in the Legion.  Though, her century old age keeps her from fighting, she still proves herself useful in many ways.

mobShortDesc: A pleasant looking tree nymph hums softly to herself as she prances about.
mobLongDesc: Fair skinned and lithe, this oak tree nymph bears a pleasant beauty akin to that of the sun cresting over a hillside as it bathes a lush emerald vale in its morning light. A creature of the forest if there ever was, Echo bears a mischievous smile as she slowly, gracefully floats throughout the glade. Her features are that of the forest: bundles of hair striking strong association to the thin branches of a tree, skin occasionally textured with that of an oak's crinkled bark and dressed, if the word could be applied, in a thin veil of moss and leaves, covering just enough to peak curiosity.
mobImmune: FIRE ELECTRIC POISON PUMMEL KICK PUNCH SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DRAIN DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE SUMMON HIT BLUDGEON PIERCE SLASH WHIP CLAW BITE STING CRUSH HACK CHOP SLICE BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT

mobShortDesc: A giant tree-like creature, clad in green and gray bark, stands here.
mobLongDesc: Rumours abound that the Entwives were wiped out, but the creature before you stands as contrarian proof. She has enormous trunk-like legs, ending in seven toes, all covered in the same bark coloured skin as her trunk... torso... whatever. Despite the eradication of much of her kin she seems in relatively good spirits, aware of the ebb and flow of life. A loud creaking accompanies her cracking a smile and she welcomes you into the grand hall with grandmotherly warmth and kindness.
mobImmune: FIRE ELECTRIC POISON PUMMEL KICK PUNCH SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DRAIN DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE SUMMON HIT BLUDGEON PIERCE SLASH WHIP CLAW BITE STING CRUSH HACK CHOP SLICE BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT

mobShortDesc: A small pixie hovers about, busying herself in the garden.
mobLongDesc: One of the Little Folk, this exuberant pixie works in happy service for the denizens of this fine hall. Her wage is paid in pizza, and her brethren look upon her status with awe. A faint green aura surrounds her foot-tall form and on her back is a pair of wings much like those of a dragonfly.

mobShortDesc: A thin, gaunt figure twitches uncontrollably, his paladin garb in tatters.
mobLongDesc: Once an aspiring and hopeful paladin, this snivelling beast is no more than a pathetic ensemble of feces, dirty rags, and endless tears.  It took less than a full hour to reduce this shining example of the paladin class to a quivering, self-defecating slug...  Perhaps it would be merciful to put him out of his misery...  then again, it is quite amusing watching him just _twitch_ every now and then.

mobShortDesc: Lilith grins evilly, serving up grails of blood and paladin steaks.
mobLongDesc: A succulent vixen, this demon princess openly flaunts her well-formed body, taking great pleasure in the reactions she elicits from every male who just _happens_ to glance her way.  Lilith takes especial pleasure in teasing the normally chaste and upright paladins who futilely try to resist their darker, bestial animal passions.  She winks at you, offering a rusty fork...

mobShortDesc: Tantalus stands in a pool of dirty water, looking extremely bored.
mobLongDesc: Though his robes appear to be somewhat bedraggled and worn, they appear to be more like an old, favorite bathrobe than tattered rags.  Equally, though Tantalus appears a bit slimmer than most men of his age, he's not exactly a starving soul who hasn't had a bite to eat in eons...  His present job is to store items away in the vaults of these caverns, which are cleverly hidden by the long, wavering shadows cast by the flickering torches.  It doesn't seem too bad a profession -- locking valuables up and wetting your feet once in a while...

mobShortDesc: A lovely demoness waits here, offering her "services" to all.
mobLongDesc: This lovely demoness is the perfect realization of all of those dreams you wouldn't dream of telling to your mother.  From the looks of the way she's coyly smiling at you, it seems as if she can read your mind like an open book...  She doesn't look as if she minds in the slightest, the vixen...

mobShortDesc: Ugly is casually lounging about here, looking quite ... beautiful, in fact.
mobLongDesc: Whoever named this drop-dead gorgeous demon had a strange sense of humor - Ugly has to be one of the most delectable creatures known to all womanhood! His firm body and soft, bedroom eyes can make any female jump through the gates of hell!  There probably have already been a few...

mobShortDesc: A chained up man is here, whimpering in fear.
mobLongDesc: Chained and shackled by the ankles, this helpless soul whimpers backwards at your approach.  Judging from his torn armor and other equipment accessories, he used to be a frequent mudder that has made a wrong turn for the worst.  Evidently, he was purged for crimes committed on this plane, and has to spend his entire existence as a Diabolik training dummy. He talks frequently to himself, and screams horrifically when recounting the incidents up to and upon his day of judgement -- over and over again.

mobShortDesc: A man stands here, head hidden behind his black hood.
mobLongDesc: Within the shadows on the room, this man stands there, head hidden behind his black hood.  He senses your presence and knows of your desires. Lifting his arms, he motions those in need of rest and holds back those who are not.  He is known only as the hooded man, a receptionist that guards the flaming gateway to Diabolik Sanctuary.  Though he may seem frail, he is not helpless.  He will destroy any one person, who does not belong or tries to force themselves into the gate.

mobShortDesc: Gruumsh, the bartender floats near the bar looking for just the right drink.
mobLongDesc: You see a rather rotund beholder, a doubly unusual sight in that beholders are supposed to hate humans with a passion. Word has it that many years ago, Gruumsh was rescued from a magical trap set by an archmage seeking to unlock the secrets of the magic of beholder eyes by the ancestral founders of the clan, and has remained unwaveringly loyal to it ever since.

mobShortDesc: The Master at Arms is here, diligently guarding the Armory's stores.
mobLongDesc: Standing in front of the door to the clan's vault is a behemoth of a man standing easily three heads taller then you and wearing on his hip an enormous two-handed sword which it looks like he would wield as deftly as a dagger given his extraordinary size. He nods at you slightly and stands aside, recognizing you as one of the people he's not supposed to kill.
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST PUNCH

mobShortDesc: [1] A large marble gargoyle statue is perched atop a glistening fountain here.
mobLongDesc: You see an enormous animated marble gargoyle, its massive arms ending in extremely sharp claws that could easily rend the finest armor in the land. Its eyes shine with an unearthly glow and it makes absolutely no sound when it moves.
actionFlags: SENTINEL ISNPC STAY-ZONE MEMORY FLY SHIELD
mobImmune: FIRE ELECTRIC POISON PUMMEL KICK PUNCH SLEEP CHARM PARALYSIS DRAIN DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE

mobShortDesc: Charlie, a rushing dove sits on the guitar.
mobLongDesc: Charlie is a redeyed dove grinding its teeth tuning Doobie's guitar. As you look at him, he offers you a big fat reefer.

mobShortDesc: Durion the self-medicating chemist is here, tasting his own brew...
mobLongDesc: Wearing a silvery grey silken lab-coat, and thick black horn-rimmed glasses, this tall skinny figure of an elf looks down on you with a grin on his face. Looking into his big black dilated pupils you can clearly see that this man is under the influence of heavy drugs and is in no way suited to medicate let alone operate on anyone! Is that blood on his hands? Where is his gloves??

mobShortDesc: Faelwen the treasurer is here, sorting out recent acquisitions...
mobLongDesc: A petite woodelf maiden stand before you, her hair brown and braided. She is wearing a pair of round silver-rimmed glasses on her little nose,  a silvery silk blouse, and a tight green wool skirt.

mobName: Dressed in the garb of kings, this mountain of a man smiles up at you.
mobShortDesc: This enormous man standing before you is dressed in the robes of kings, but seems to be slightly uncomfortable in his garb. In your attempts to figure out why, your memory flashes back to the temple archives where the name Radvan Emir suddenly becomes recognizable. As you recall, Radvan was the premiere weapon smith for the order of Void Walkers when it was originally founded. He personally crafted every weapon that was used by the order, back during a time where its membership numbered in the hundreds. Now, despite still possessing the massive physical strength necessary for his old job, he regales you with a story how he has been retired for nearly 200 years, but could not bear to leave the order behind.
