So, he has taken up shop in the amphitheater in order to be a continued service to his brothers.
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.

mobName: An enormous cloud of black mist floats in front of you, shaped like a man.
mobShortDesc: As your gaze settles on this being before you, your mind cannot fathom its origin or nature. Humanoid in design, Astir Nil is merely a shadow of what he once was. As recorded in the temple's archives, Astir was a member of an elite group of explorers known as Void Shadows, mages of the old order who spent so much time in the vast abyss of the Void that their bodies had been permanently transformed into what you see before you today. His skin does not seem to possess any texture at all, does not even seem to be solid for that matter. His body seems to be constructed of none other than a finely shaped cloud of pitch black mist, giving him his humanoid appearance, but at the same time it is very clear that he is incorporeal in nature. Yet despite his otherworldly consistency, buried into his face are two piercing emerald eyes that narrow as you take his entire visage in.
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.

mobName: A man adorned in full plate mail has been etched out of solid stone.
mobShortDesc: Adorned from head to toe in what seems to be a completely solid suit of gleaming stone plate mail, Acam Nor stands completely still, causing you to wonder if there is really a man inside that suit of armor after all. You see no kinks in the armor, no place where a joint could bend, and wonder if there is even a man inside, would he be able to actually move? Your ponderances come to a sudden halt as Acam kneels down momentarily to remove his helmet and place it next to him on the floor, then quickly resumes his posture as a sentry of the vault. During all of this, it has occurred to you that while his armor seems to be made of solid stone, it is more accurately described as a suit of solid magic.. magic unknown to any mortal, that is merely shaped to appear as stone, and seems to be flexible as any cloth you have ever seen. Underneath his helmet is the aged face of an elder human man, but according to temple lore, Acam Nor has been an elder human man long before the temple was ever erected.
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.

mobName: A gorgeous elven woman is here taking an inventory of everything you carry.
mobShortDesc: Standing before you is what seems to be none other than a completely ageless young elven woman. You remember the name from the temple's archives, but seem to recall that Calla Canodor was one of the great up and coming mages of the order. Only you remember this to be a fact that is almost seven hundred years old, and are suddenly perplexed by the nature of the woman standing before you. She flashes you a mischievous look as though she understands your confusion, and you can only assume that some of the old magic possessed by the creators of the order is responsible for her current condition. Dressed in a silken robe, her golden tresses are held together with a variety of jewelry adorning her seemingly perfect elven profile.
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.

mobShortDesc: A Massive Bearicorn is here, ready to train you in the ways of war.
mobLongDesc: A Massive Bearicorn is here, ready to train you in the ways of war. This enormous snow-white creature stands nearly ten feet in length, with a massive four-foot spiraling horn protruding from its head.  It looks at you with an appraising eye, as though wondering what you could possibly want of it. Then it opens its massive jaw to let out a stretching yawn, revealing row upon row of incisors, before curling up and settling down for a nap.

mobShortDesc: A beautiful narwhal floats in mid-air here, tidying her wares.
mobLongDesc: This medium-sized toothed whale seems quite content to be floating in the middle of the air, rather than in her natural Arctic environment.  Her lush silver skin reflects the light that drifts in from overhead, while her horn glimmers with a luminance of its own.  She appears to be restocking shelves with various wares that adventurers depend upon.

mobKeywords: unicorn vault guard creature equus horse white
mobShortDesc: A creature of untainted white, with a glorious spiraling horn stands here, guarding something.
mobLongDesc: The most noble Equus, this magnificent stallion stands with head held high, his wispy beard fluttering in the wind.  From his head protrudes a horn of unspeakable beauty, radiating with power and sensual energy.  His muscles ripple beneath his shimmering coat, and you cannot help but feel a bit in awe by the sheer majesty of this creature.

mobShortDesc: A maiden stands here, her unicorn steed by her side.
mobLongDesc: This beautiful maiden has long flowing blonde hair, cascading down around her shoulders.  She wears a dress of cloud white, symbolizing the purity that has allowed her to tame such a noble beast.  She smiles at you as you approach, and gestures to show she has rooms you may rest in.

mobShortDesc: Vrelh the Incubus stands here.
mobLongDesc: The guard stands what looks to you to be at least 10 feet tall. Shadows of the passing day flicker and move across his unblinking face. Could anything get past this guy?

mobShortDesc: Joseph the Giant Grizzly Panda is squatting here eating some leaves.
mobLongDesc: A Giant Grizzly Panda is squatting here.

mobShortDesc: Sharak grins widely as he sees you approach, seems he gets few visitors.
mobLongDesc: Sharak is a stocky dwarf haliling from the strong and proud peoples of the Helventia Mountains.  Unusually friendly for a dwarf he greets you with a jovial wink and strong nudge in the side.  You can tell that he takes great pride in his wears and this shop of his.

mobShortDesc: Deyshall the Chief Instructor stands here with an air of deadly competence.
mobLongDesc: He is a noble looking man in his late thirties who has been using a sword since before he could walk.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-ALIGNMENT DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY SPHERE INFRAVISION DODGE INVUL

mobShortDesc: A little black cat is standing here, waiting to serve her mistress.
mobLongDesc: You notice the small black cat slink in and out of the shadows of the room silently as if she weren't a real part of this world.

mobShortDesc: A jolly innkeeper stands here, waiting to cater to your every need.
mobLongDesc: A plump innkeeper stands before you with a big smile, listening to your every problem and hoping for the next drink order and a big tip!  How about another round of ale for everyone?!?

mobShortDesc: Azura the Amazon vault guard is standing here.
mobLongDesc: The guard stands what looks to you to be at least 10 feet tall. Shadows of the passing day flicker and move across his unblinking face. Could anything get past this guy?

mobShortDesc: An aging wizard stands here, slowly stirring his cauldron.
mobLongDesc: An aging wizard stands before you, slowly stirring his potion mixture in the large stone cauldron.  The wizard is dressed in a long blue robe laiden with sparkling gems depicting a starry night sky. You wonder, could this be the traveling mage who created the Saber-Tooth Tiger that protects this town?

mobShortDesc: The grand marble statue of the Saber-Tooth Tiger stands guard here.
mobLongDesc: A grand marble Saber-Toothed Tiger, who was famed to have saved this quaint town, stands guard here.

mobShortDesc: Achmed the Vault Guard is standing here.
mobLongDesc: At the edge of your vision you see a diminutive figure, robed in black silk, standing in the corner. Shadows cast by the flickering torches seem to wrap around Achmed the Vault Guard and cloak him in darkness. You can feel the subtle waves of violence that roll over you when Achmed returns your look.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE DETECT-MAGIC SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY SPHERE INFRAVISION DODGE INVUL
mobImmune: FIRE ELECTRIC POISON PUMMEL KICK PUNCH SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DRAIN DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE CLAIR SUMMON HIT BLUDGEON PIERCE SLASH WHIP CLAW BITE STING CRUSH HACK CHOP SLICE BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT

mobShortDesc: Grunthor the Vigilant stands before you barring the way.
mobLongDesc: Barring your way into the inner halls of the Newbitorium stands the immense figure of Grunthor the Vigilant. Captured as a young boy in the Bolg lands far South of the Maelstrom, Grunthor has grown to be over 7 feet tall. With the width of 3 men, Grunthor could crush you with a single look of his metallic blue eyes.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY SPHERE INFRAVISION FLY INVUL FURY
mobImmune: FIRE ELECTRIC POISON PARALYSIS DISINTEGRATE SUMMON

mobShortDesc: Raven is here protecting the Dark Legion vaults.
mobLongDesc: You gaze into the eyes of the most viscious warrior the Legion has ever come across.  Raven the Tempest has served the Legion faithfully for decades, though her cruel, and torturous ways were not always smiled upon.  Raven has been known for toying with her victims.  She has a flair for fighting, and enjoys every second she gets to make her enemy suffer.  Her ways were so cruel and evil that the Legion had to keep her in the castle, where she was not such a threat.  She was then only used when it was very neccesary that the Legion needed a strong fighter.  Now, she is in charge of making sure the castle vaults are safe and in order.  She also gets a chance at the Catherine Wheel, when a punishment is due to an enemy.  Be careful what you do to her, or you may be her next victim.

mobShortDesc: Veim is here guarding the private chambers.
mobLongDesc: You see a rather young man wielding a curved sabre standing before you.  Though he doesn't look all that harmless, he is actually one of the greatest fighters the Legion has ever seen. Like Greedle, Veim is one of the oldest surviving members of the Legion.  Though Veim appears to be young he is actually very ancient, his dark magic transforms him.  Veim is now incapable of continuing his fighting career, so he has decided to aid the Legion by taking care of the castle.  He says he will stay until the Legion dominates the world, then he will pass his time and enter his long awaited peace.

mobShortDesc: Holo the Demon-Protector swoops above your head here.
mobLongDesc: Before you stands a tremendous demon.  His eyes blaze the colour of scarlet, they watch you intsenly from above as he swoops just about your head.  His flesh is black and red, and his huge wings stretch out from his back in a large span.  He has a very muscular build and his claws and fangs are incredibly sharp and long.  He has two huge horns jutting from his head, they glow with magical power. Holo, the Dark Demon is a gift from the Gods of Dark Legion. The gods gave Holo to the Legion for extra protection against anyone, or thing that may dared challenge the Legion. For centuries Holo has served, sacrificing the blood of many for his creators and for his clan.

mobShortDesc: Greedle the Witch is here stirring a strange mixture.
mobLongDesc: You see an very old woman slowly stirring a huge spoon into her black cauldron. She has long white hair draping down her back and partially covering her face.  This is Greedle, the witch.  Greedle was once a wandering gypsy until she found the Dark Legion, where she retired her nomadic roots and became a practitioner of more dark spells.  Using her ancient knowledge as a gypsy and the power of the Legion, Greedle has become one of the most powerful people in the Legion.  Though, her century old age keeps her from fighting, she still proves herself useful in many ways.

mobShortDesc: Luna, the temptress of the Moon waits patiently for fresh blood.
mobLongDesc: Luna's tall figure radiates as you enter the small room she has made her boudoir and personal fun center.  Long luscious brown-red hair layers over her firm shoulders and back.  As you peer into her glowing forest green eyes she smiles back exposing blood-stained fangs.  This devilish vamp has welcomed many visitors but few leave as they came.  This is truly one temptress that should not be toyed with.  As you look away and gaze around the rest of the room she smiles evilly and examines your pitiful figure. It almost seems as if she's analyzing her prey... It's clear that

mobName: Mond, the Guardian of Blood Moon
mobShortDesc: Mond rests on his haunches faithfully awaiting the return of his masters.
mobLongDesc: Mond the lupine guardian eyes you carefully and steadily.  His hair is fading from pitch black to light grey in some areas, but he's agile and ferocious as ever.  For years he has guarded this hall diligently and each night his howl can be heard across the land as the moon creeps into the night sky.  His eyes illuminate the room with their incredible flourescence. Mond faithfully helps the followers of the Blood Moon maintain their chambers and is always here upon their arrival.  Despite his old age and apparently inactivity he's in perfect fighting condition should the situation require such action.

mobShortDesc: A rubber ducky floats happily amidst the suds and bubbles.
mobLongDesc: Yellow and cheery, the rubber ducky floats happily through these warm waters everyday as they are constantly refilled and heated. Despite that he smells rather fowl from spending too much time in the bath tub.  However, he greets bathers with his warm smile and squeaky personality.

mobShortDesc: A thin, gaunt figure twitches uncontrollably, his paladin garb in tatters.
mobLongDesc: Once an aspiring and hopeful paladin, this snivelling beast is no more than a pathetic ensemble of feces, dirty rags, and endless tears.  It took less than a full hour to reduce this shining example of the paladin class to a quivering, self-defecating slug...  Perhaps it would be merciful to put him out of his misery...  then again, it is quite amusing watching him just _twitch_ every now and then.

mobShortDesc: Lilith grins evilly, serving up grails of blood and paladin steaks.
mobLongDesc: A succulent vixen, this demon princess openly flaunts her well-formed body, taking great pleasure in the reactions she elicits from every male who just _happens_ to glance her way.  Lilith takes especial pleasure in teasing the normally chaste and upright paladins who futilely try to resist their darker, bestial animal passions.  She winks at you, offering a rusty fork...

mobShortDesc: Tantalus stands in a pool of dirty water, looking extremely bored.
mobLongDesc: Though his robes appear to be somewhat bedraggled and worn, they appear to be more like an old, favorite bathrobe than tattered rags.  Equally, though Tantalus appears a bit slimmer than most men of his age, he's not exactly a starving soul who hasn't had a bite to eat in eons...  His present job is to store items away in the vaults of these caverns, which are cleverly hidden by the long, wavering shadows cast by the flickering torches.  It doesn't seem too bad a profession -- locking valuables up and wetting your feet once in a while...

mobShortDesc: A lovely demoness waits here, offering her "services" to all.
mobLongDesc: This lovely demoness is the perfect realization of all of those dreams you wouldn't dream of telling to your mother.  From the looks of the way she's coyly smiling at you, it seems as if she can read your mind like an open book...  She doesn't look as if she minds in the slightest, the vixen...

mobShortDesc: Ugly is casually lounging about here, looking quite ... beautiful, in fact.
mobLongDesc: Whoever named this drop-dead gorgeous demon had a strange sense of humor - Ugly has to be one of the most delectable creatures known to all womanhood! His firm body and soft, bedroom eyes can make any female jump through the gates of hell!  There probably have already been a few...

mobShortDesc: A chained up man is here, whimpering in fear.
mobLongDesc: Chained and shackled by the ankles, this helpless soul whimpers backwards at your approach.  Judging from his torn armor and other equipment accessories, he used to be a frequent mudder that has made a wrong turn for the worst.  Evidently, he was purged for crimes committed on this plane, and has to spend his entire existence as a Diabolik training dummy. He talks frequently to himself, and screams horrifically when recounting the incidents up to and upon his day of judgement -- over and over again.

mobShortDesc: A man stands here, head hidden behind his black hood.
mobLongDesc: Within the shadows on the room, this man stands there, head hidden behind his black hood.  He senses your presence and knows of your desires. Lifting his arms, he motions those in need of rest and holds back those who are not.  He is known only as the hooded man, a receptionist that guards the flaming gateway to Diabolik Sanctuary.  Though he may seem frail, he is not helpless.  He will destroy any one person, who does not belong or tries to force themselves into the gate.

mobShortDesc: Gruumsh, the bartender floats near the bar looking for just the right drink.
mobLongDesc: You see a rather rotund beholder, a doubly unusual sight in that beholders are supposed to hate humans with a passion. Word has it that many years ago, Gruumsh was rescued from a magical trap set by an archmage seeking to unlock the secrets of the magic of beholder eyes by the ancestral founders of the clan, and has remained unwaveringly loyal to it ever since.

mobShortDesc: The Master at Arms is here, diligently guarding the Armory's stores.
mobLongDesc: Standing in front of the door to the clan's vault is a behemoth of a man standing easily three heads taller then you and wearing on his hip an enormous two-handed sword which it looks like he would wield as deftly as a dagger given his extraordinary size. He nods at you slightly and stands aside, recognizing you as one of the people he's not supposed to kill.
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST PUNCH

mobShortDesc: [1] A large marble gargoyle statue is perched atop a glistening fountain here.
mobLongDesc: You see an enormous animated marble gargoyle, its massive arms ending in extremely sharp claws that could easily rend the finest armor in the land. Its eyes shine with an unearthly glow and it makes absolutely no sound when it moves.
actionFlags: SENTINEL ISNPC STAY-ZONE MEMORY FLY SHIELD
mobImmune: FIRE ELECTRIC POISON PUMMEL KICK PUNCH SLEEP CHARM PARALYSIS DRAIN DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE

mobShortDesc: Charlie, a rushing dove sits on the guitar.
mobLongDesc: Charlie is a redeyed dove grinding its teeth tuning Doobie's guitar. As you look at him, he offers you a big fat reefer.

mobShortDesc: a SiiDii is standing here, performing the horse stance...
mobLongDesc: A shaolin beginner. He is wearing a white suit made from cotton. He is also wearing a brown belt around his waist.

mobShortDesc: A lithe scaled warrior is sneaking around here.
mobLongDesc: A lizard warrior who seems to be making maps of the region for his master.

mobShortDesc: A man in dark robes is standing here.
mobLongDesc: A relatively young man, Marcus is just beginning to show the signs of age. Looking to be in his mid-thirties, it is hard to believe the stories that he is actually centuries old.
mobImmune: FIRE ELECTRIC POISON SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DRAIN

mobShortDesc: A huge, red dragon is here, licking his lips hungrily.
mobLongDesc: You have heard legends of this beast!! Pyrak the Red! The deadliest dragon that ever existed upon this world. Intelligent and cunning, he is considered to be the greatest menace to ever terrorize the innocent farmers and herders of the world. He is a scourge, but a scourge that you can rid the world of. That is, if you are strong enough.
actionFlags: SENTINEL SCAVENGER ISNPC AGGRESSIVE MEMORY SHIELD
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SANCTUARY PROTECT-EVIL INFRAVISION DODGE INVUL DUAL

mobShortDesc: A large, reddish-scaled lizard is roaming the volcano.
mobLongDesc: While this lizard looks big to you, you realize that it is just a baby. You also realize that if this is a baby, you might not want to meet the parent.

mobShortDesc: A troll is here making "foot soup"... he's adding the feet right now.
mobLongDesc: You see a large troll with a pained look on his face. As you look down, you notice a long jagged gash in his finger.

mobShortDesc: A scaly green soldier of the high lord's armies is patrolling the grounds.
mobLongDesc: This Large muscular lizard looks to be the cross between a monitor and a gnoll. It stands about 7 feet tall and has a massive tail dragging the ground behind it.

mobShortDesc: A burly dwarf stands here chained to a stake.
mobLongDesc: The many scars crossing this dwarf's back have daunted his spirit none at all. He looks at you with sheer hatred and you are certain that, given a chance, he'd kill you.

mobShortDesc: A beautiful golden haired elf maiden is chained here.
mobLongDesc: This beautiful maiden has seen happier times. Some of the scars on her back seem only freshly healed. She looks at you with longing eyes and states that she will do ANYTHING to be free of this cruel place.

mobKeywords: highlord kiri torin dragon high lord
mobShortDesc: The master of the Fortress stands here, planning his next conquest.
mobLongDesc: As your gazes meet, you remember the statues in front of the Fortress... It is your last conscious thought.
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST

mobShortDesc: A large, menacing, scaled warrior stands here, ready to defend his master.
mobLongDesc: This Guard stands at least a foot taller than the largest one seen patrolling the grounds. Another species, perhaps?  Whatever the case may be, judging from sheer size and build alone, this one looks much tougher than the ones outside.

mobShortDesc: A man in dark robes is standing here.
mobLongDesc: A relatively young man, Marcus is just beginning to show the signs of age. Looking to be in his mid-thirties, it is hard to believe the stories that he is actually centuries old.
mobImmune: FIRE ELECTRIC POISON SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DRAIN

mobShortDesc: A huge reddish creature with large bat wings is standing here!
mobLongDesc: The sight is simply awesome. A huge red creature with the face of a canine and large bat wings is here. Fully 9 feet tall and at least 2000 lbs, he is probably the most frightening creature you have ever met.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY SPHERE DODGE DUAL

mobShortDesc: A ghostly figure is here cleaning up the room.
mobLongDesc: A transparent figure is here tidying up the room.

mobShortDesc: A huge white and black cat is crouched and snarling here!
mobLongDesc: Phasteus, Marcus' familiar and mount, is here. Fully 6' high at the shoulder... not a beast to meet when he is hungry.... Speaking of which...

mobShortDesc: A Lifelike Crystalline Statue of a warrior stands here.
mobLongDesc: A large statue of a well-muscled warrior, seemingly waiting patiently for the next call to arms.

mobShortDesc: A riding horse shakes its mane here.
mobLongDesc: This tall, slender horse is a light chestnut in color, with a white stripe down its forehead. It prances and capers about as it considers the idea of galloping through wonderful forests and plains, whinnying in horsey delight, its shaggy mane cascading over its neck.

mobShortDesc: The urinal fairy flutters around you head, emiting a strong and familiar odor.
mobLongDesc: She drops you a little wink as she flies around rapidly.

mobShortDesc: A greasy Italian plumber bends over in front of you here.
mobLongDesc: A huge handlebar moustache hides most of this italian plumber's features, thank god.

mobName: Darth Maul, Lord of the Sith
mobShortDesc: Darth Maul, Lord of the Sith, is directing his troops here.
mobLongDesc: This is the Lord of the Sith! See him dance!
actionFlags: SENTINEL ISNPC STAY-ZONE WIMPY OPEN-DOOR MEMORY FLY AGGGOOD AGGRANDOM
affectedByFlags: DETECT-ALIGNMENT DETECT-INVISIBLE DETECT-MAGIC SENSE-LIFE PROTECT-EVIL INFRAVISION STATUE DODGE SNEAK HIDE PROTECT-GOOD DUAL
mobImmune: POISON PUMMEL PUNCH SLEEP CHARM DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE SUMMON SLASH
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST
attackTarget: RAN_ROOM RAN_ROOM RAN_ROOM RAN_ROOM RAN_ROOM SELF RAN_ROOM RAN_ROOM RAN_ROOM RAN_ROOM
attackSpell: UNKNOWN: 203 meteor call_lightning UNKNOWN: 135 searing_orb iron_skin cloud_of_confusion debilitate poison chill_touch

mobShortDesc: One of the dreaded Sith is slinking here in the shadows.
mobLongDesc: ARRRRRRGH!
affectedByFlags: DETECT-ALIGNMENT DETECT-INVISIBLE DETECT-MAGIC SENSE-LIFE INFRAVISION DODGE SNEAK PROTECT-GOOD
mobImmune: FIRE SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS SUMMON AMBUSH

mobShortDesc: The Ancient Statue of Justice stands tall here, motionless.
mobLongDesc: Gazing into her eyes, you feel at ease knowing your evil deeds have been cleansed and forgiven.  As you turn to stone, Lady Justice gently whispers to you, "Justice is done."
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SPHERE PROTECT-EVIL STATUE DODGE INVUL DUAL

mobShortDesc: The First Lieutenant paces around here nervously.
mobLongDesc: One of the captain's most trustworthy men, Lieutenant Jobs would die for his commanding officer.  However, in recent weeks, the Lieutenant have questioned some of the captain's orders.  But his loyalty remains rigid and he does everything possible to please his superior.

mobShortDesc: The Captain of the Guard snarls at you with drunken rage!
mobLongDesc: Bags of line are visible right underneath his eyes.  A tired demeanor is clearly imprinted on his face.  You would be too if you were in command of an army of guards and soldiers.  He doesn't even have time out to spend the money he makes, which is a generous amount -- and you know what money does to a person... The captain has gotten sloppy and reckless in recent times, but overall, he has been doing the same job for over 500 hundred years -- and he does it well.

mobShortDesc: a huge, trained attack dog is sitting here growling at you!
mobLongDesc: This huge scruffy mutt drools from his mouth, snarling at you with distaste. He's a trained attack dog, taught the most vicious and violent ways to kill. He will attack anyone he notices -- and won't stop till that person is shredded ground beef.  His sole obedience is towards his master, the captain of the guard -- who on many occasions, have used prison inmates as feeding grounds for these shabby canines.

mobShortDesc: The Warden of Da'Sharr rests here, anticipating your arrival.
mobLongDesc: You gaze into the eyes of the undead lord and see years of accumulated wisdom and authority.  His troops follow his commands to the letter and his influence on the neighboring town has made him renowned in the lands throughout.  Gypsies call him "Modeuur" in their language for the "dead, but yet living." They serve him unwilling, giving the vampire information in the outside world -- in the exchange for their continual existence.  Not a bad deal, until one day the warden got sloppy and decided to make examples of some of the gypsies as a showing of his hold and power.  It wasn't long until these few gypsies retaliated and casted down their powers to rid themselves of this nemesis. That was five centuries ago, and now he is back and ready to take over where he left off.  Modeuur rests here calmly, grinning broadly as you approach. His skin is pale in color and eyes are of dull grey, staring at you with hypnotic gaze.  Beware of this one, he is seasoned and has years of wisdom behind him.
affectedByFlags: SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY SPHERE INFRAVISION DODGE INVUL FURY

mobShortDesc: A Blind Sage rests here comfortably, waiting to serve his master.
mobLongDesc: Blind, mute and deaf--Voldra serves his master, the warden of Da'Sharr with the utmost obedience.  His milky white eyes glares forward with un-emotion and non-passiveness. One side of his face is burned severely, leaving a deep scar that will forever tarnish his appearance.  Bony, age-spotted hands caresses a crystal ball which glows slightly, illuminating the dark room.  The ancient artifact would reveal nothing to the casual observer, however to the one trained in these mystic arts--the crystal ball has much to say.  Voldra serves the warden, and serves him well.  Gypsy stories say that Voldra and the warden were once very close childhood friends, but a freak accident blinded the sage and made him unattuned to the senses around him.  Since then, the warden felt it in his heart to lock up his "friend", give him water, food and a roof over his head -- In exchange for his services, which he is to serve for the rest of his existence.  Though blind and mute, Voldra communicates through written language, jotting down all of his "for-seeings" on sheets of paper.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY SPHERE INFRAVISION INVUL DUAL

mobShortDesc: An Animate Skeleton shambles about the room, looking quite pissed.
mobLongDesc: Laughing hysterically, the animate beast's glowing eyes pierces deep into your soul.  You scream in ultimate anguish, as you turn to stone slowly from the feet up. Didn't your mother ever tell you there'd be days like this?
affectedByFlags: SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY SPHERE INFRAVISION STATUE DUAL FURY

mobShortDesc: A pair of red eyes and six walking legs, dwells here in the shadows.
mobLongDesc: Clearly out of place, this six legged spider-like dark elf was taken from his safe haven the underdark, and caged here for the enjoyment of the warden. Piercing red eyes and fuming snarl, this drider is not pleased to be locked up here like some zoo animal.  Half Drow and Half Spider, this drider makes for an excellent exhibition.  Driders are usually the punished dark elves put in this state for their unsatisfactory deeds in the eyes of Lloth, God of the underdark -- and forced to spend their remaining years in their arachnid state, roaming the caverns killing everything in sight. Driders are especially a rare find, and the warden wasted no time to acquire this beast.

mobShortDesc: A Thick-maned beast crouches here, snarling at your entrance.
mobLongDesc: Half wolf and half dwarf, this were-beast is a spawn of evil creation.  No-one knows of his origins or history, nor would any one dare to ask -- for he kills everything in his sight, dead and living.  It is said that the warden success- fully dragged him into this place and has been here for centuries.  He vows one day to obtain his revenge, and at nights -- howls can be heard from this cell calling to the heavens.  He stands no more than three feet from head to toe, but don't let his small appearance fool you, he can kill you where you stand...A canine like muzzle supports a wet black snout, can smell a man from miles away.  Round ears lay flat against the beast's broad skull, along with sharp yellow fangs that can rip apart and snap a person in two.  A thick mane grows from the back of his neck, rich and something seemingly lively about it. A very impressive adversary that may be better off left alone...

mobShortDesc: A Gypsy is shackled in chains here.
mobLongDesc: Shackled in chains, this gypsy winces in pain with every movement.  Blood covers her wrists and looks extremely dehydrated.  Her torn shirt reveals her thin and pale figure, whip marks and older scars make for some erotic pleasure the abductor has experienced.  She looks as if she hasn't been fed in weeks, right to say -- haven't been fed at all.  Obviously, she was left to die and to use her as an example to gain discipline from the gypsy clans bordering Da'Sharr.  Dry tears line her face and her sky blue eyes tell you to end her suffering, rather than continue on in this state.

mobShortDesc: A shackled man is slumped up against the wall here, in most obvious pain.
mobLongDesc: Blood flows freely from his mouth along with visible traces of dry blood that line uncleansed.  His eyes are swollen shut, and his groans for death rather than to spend another day in this state, saddens you.  Closer examination, reveals puncture marks on his neck, and pale complexion of blood that is drained away from his face.  You are no expert in undead physiology, but it doesn't take a genius to realize that this man has been bitten by a vampire. Intestines dangle from his wide open guts, maggots and vermin feast heartily on them.  He open his eyes wide and looks in the direction of the wooden stake in his hand.  "Only with the powers of the stake, can the warden be defeated!" he screams in agony.  With that last statement, he slumps back unconscious.

mobShortDesc: An Elite Guard towers over you is standing here.
mobLongDesc: He wears a fur coat and looks like a walking tank.  Mostly known for their enthusiasm for punishing prisoners, they enjoy their line of work. In fact they encourage them to escape!  Thus, prompting them into action. Keep in mind that once they start, you better say your prayers -- when they're done, you'd be nothing more than a slab of steak on the pavement.

mobShortDesc: The intimate inmate stands here, eyeing you with drooling interest.
mobLongDesc: Buck naked and extremely wet, Benjamin winks in your direction hinting at something. You shudder at the thought, and try to ignore his insinuating presence. Out of no where, Ben screams in frantic horror, (or pleasure) ..he had just dropped his only bar of soap. Why don't you be a nice guy and help him out?  *wink* *wink*

mobShortDesc: A Hairy-looking Roach crawls around here, searching for its dinner.
mobLongDesc: A 3x3 inch roach crawls around here, looking VERY HUNGRY.  It usually eats trash and whatever it finds lying around, but this cockroach looks viciously hungry and could go for human flesh right about now.

mobShortDesc: Rizzo the Prison Cook stands here stirring endlessly.
mobLongDesc: This is Rizzo--Da'Sharr's official cook extraordinaire. Unfortunately, he don't cook to well, or at least not so good.  Da'Sharr couldn't afford a real cook so they hired an illegal immigrant REAL CHEAP.  He works for below minimum and enjoys what he does... which is illuminating the overpopulation in the cells. Ever since he took over, there has been more room than ever for newer inmates! Which is good for the tax payers, but one things for sure.. You're not going to catch the warden or the mayor eating this slop.
actionFlags: SENTINEL SCAVENGER ISNPC STAY-ZONE MEMORY ARM

mobShortDesc: Milhouse the star roach of "Special Entrie Platter made in Heaven" (TM)
mobLongDesc: Milhouse the star roach of "Special Entrie Platter made in Heaven" (TM) is here and giving you an earful -- He just wont stop talking!  Standing on his hind legs, Milhouse looks to be 5 inches high off the ground. Scrawny-looking and pathetic, this cockroach doesn't seem like much of a threat.

mobShortDesc: A spectral figure of a guard is here, roaming the halls.
mobLongDesc: This ghastly, disformed figure of a guard floats around here serving his master, the warden of this facility obediently.  He was once flesh and blood, but dark powers of this domain corrupted this innocent soul.  He now searches in hate for other living beings in the quest to kill those he used to walk among -- as his eternal torment.

mobShortDesc: The Gatekeeper of Da'Sharr is standing guard here.
mobLongDesc: A tall, imposing guard stands here on his watch, making sure no one gets past the gates.  He glares in your direction as a warning to keep your distance or else he'll shred you to pieces.

mobShortDesc: A Ragged Gypsy is standing here, contemplating the situation.
mobLongDesc: An old woman stands here looking worried.  Bags and wrinkles line her face, her eyes deep in thought.  A hood is draped over her head, but you can see the white mane that is her hair.  Gypsies of her age usually the elder leader of her clan and have accumulated many stories over the years.  But gypsies are shunned upon in the civilized world, so they usually do their business of fortune telling away from any large community.  This gypsy paces around in circles looking like she's waiting for someone.

zoneName: Dark Spire, by Oceana and Zorak
mobShortDesc: A Large and Gray Giant Clam
mobLongDesc: The white on the shell has mostly faded, leaving only a cracked gray shell before you.  It slowly opens its mouth letting out large streams of bubbles before slamming back shut. A shiny rock can be seen within its mouth as it opens and closes.

zoneName: Dark Spire, by Oceana and Zorak
mobShortDesc: A Large and Gray Giant Clam
mobLongDesc: A large clam with a grey and white shell sits closed as you enter the room. Small streams of bubbles can be seen leaking from the edges of the shell.

zoneName: Dark Spire, by Oceana and Zorak
mobShortDesc: A Large and Gray Giant Clam
mobLongDesc: A large clam with a grey and white shell sits wide open as water flows through its mouth. It waits in anticipation for anything to crawl into its mouth.

zoneName: Dark Spire, by Oceana and Zorak
mobName: A Dark Phantom of the Seas
mobShortDesc: A Dark and Spooky Phantom of the Ocean
mobLongDesc: An ethereal creature comprised of purple and black energy floats above the ocean. A subtle glow of energy and magic is emitting from the ghost like form. Its eyes glow dark orange as it stares through you.

zoneName: Dark Spire, by Oceana and Zorak
mobName: A Dark Phantom of the Seas
mobShortDesc: A Dark and Spooky Phantom of the Ocean
mobLongDesc: An ethereal creature comprised of purple and black energy floats above the ocean. A subtle glow of energy and magic is emitting from the ghost like form. Its eyes glow dark green as it stares through you.

zoneName: Dark Spire, by Oceana and Zorak
mobName: A Dark Phantom of the Seas
mobShortDesc: A Dark and Spooky Phantom of the Ocean
mobLongDesc: An ethereal creature comprised of purple and black energy floats above the ocean. A subtle glow of energy and magic is emitting from the ghost like form. Its eyes glow dark black as it stares through you.

zoneName: Dark Spire, by Oceana and Zorak
mobName: A Dark Phantom of the Seas
mobShortDesc: A Dark and Spooky Phantom of the Ocean
mobLongDesc: An ethereal creature comprised of purple and black energy floats above the ocean. A subtle glow of energy and magic is emitting from the ghost like form. Its eyes glow dark blue as it stares through you.

zoneName: Dark Spire, by Oceana and Zorak
mobName: A Dark Phantom of the Seas
mobShortDesc: A Dark and Spooky Phantom of the Ocean
mobLongDesc: An ethereal creature comprised of purple and black energy floats above the ocean. A subtle glow of energy and magic is emitting from the ghost like form. Its eyes glow dark red as it stares through you.

zoneName: Dark Spire, by Oceana and Zorak
mobShortDesc: A Large Purple Elemental pulses quickly.
mobLongDesc: Purple energy pours out of the large pulsing ball of energy.  Light is absorbed into its all black core as its body takes form.  Hollow eyes, black as its core form in what appears to be its head.

zoneName: Dark Spire, by Oceana and Zorak
mobShortDesc: A Robed man walks around the room.
mobLongDesc: A tiny man covered in a standard white lab coat runs around the room in a hectic fashion. Holding both vials and jars of random ingredients, he tosses them into boiling pots as ramblings continue to spurt from his mouth. The areas around his face show t
attackType: PUNCH CLAW PUNCH SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST
attackTarget: RAN_ROOM RAN_GROUP GROUP RAN_ROOM RAN_ROOM LEADER BUFFER LEADER BUFFER
attackSpell: disrupt_sanctuary cloud_of_confusion earthquake disrupt_sanctuary harm lethal_fire

zoneName: Dark Spire, by Oceana and Zorak
mobShortDesc: A Scaled Lizard flicks its tongue
mobLongDesc: A large orange and green lizard slowly moves about the room, flicking a forked tongue to and from all the other creatures in the room.  Its large, bulbous eyes rotate independently watching in all directions, watching for anything delicious to cross its

zoneName: Dark Spire, by Oceana and Zorak
mobShortDesc: A Large Demon paces the room
mobLongDesc: Black Horns cover his face as they extend upwards. The four separate points form an odd square in relation to the fangs jutting from his mouth. The red skin blends into the black skin covering his folded wings.

zoneName: Dark Spire, by Oceana and Zorak
mobShortDesc: A Stone Statues sits staring at the ceiling
mobLongDesc: Large stone ears sit on top of a stone face, forever stuck with the same forlorn expression.  The stone is smooth and has a gray matte color. It looks expertly carved as there are no cracks or blemishes on the stone.

zoneName: Dark Spire, by Oceana and Zorak
mobShortDesc: A Half Furry Man Begins to Grow Fangs
mobLongDesc: A large male stands almost seven feet in the air even though he is hunched over. His legs are bulging outwards as muscle tears through the pant legs and his shoes have been shredded by large feet and claws  that immerge from the ripped soles. Large gray

zoneName: Dark Spire, by Oceana and Zorak
mobShortDesc: A Shrunken Dragon roars at the room.
mobLongDesc: A black dragon paces around the room, its wings reaching around six feet in length when fully spread. Its large muscles flex and bulge as it stomps around on the ground, but it still only stands around four feet tall. It is cute and dangerous all at the

zoneName: Dark Spire, by Oceana and Zorak
mobShortDesc: A bird with large feathers made of ice.
mobLongDesc: A large blue and green bird stands seven feet into the air. Its large feathers on its back and tail are covered in a thin sheet of blue ice that glows in the blue light in the cavern. Its large black eyes stare at anything that moves in the room.

zoneName: Dark Spire, by Oceana and Zorak
mobShortDesc: A Vampire stares blankly around the room.
mobLongDesc: The vampire looks dead, its eyes hollow and head hanging low. However, it also just seems to mope around the room, barely looking at anything happening. Its fangs still glean in the light around the room, and it seems to twitch ever so slightly at the s

zoneName: Dark Spire, by Oceana and Zorak
mobShortDesc: A Hungry Looking Swarm of Fish
mobLongDesc: A large group of fish swim together, barring their tiny teeth. Their silvery scales shimmer in the light cast throughout the room.

zoneName: Dark Spire, by Oceana and Zorak
mobShortDesc: A Large Beast with Seven Tentacles
mobLongDesc: A large slimy beast swims around in the sewage as its numerous tentacles roam float freely in the gunk. Its large pink body and curved beak make a disgusting sound as it screeches.

zoneName: Dark Spire, by Oceana and Zorak
mobShortDesc: A stumpy troll sits here, peacefully gazing at the small brook.
mobLongDesc: The Domovoi is a short troll, barely as tall as a young lad. Yet he is built very strongly, and his ropy muscles ripple beneath his ragged, dusty clothing. His dull grey hair is tousled and cowlick-ridden, and it has never even heard tales of combs or their like. The Domovoi smiles peacefully as he takes a rest from his life's work of keeping his bridge tidy, and watches the glimmering surface of the small eddy of the brook which chuckles merrily beneath his bridge.

zoneName: Dark Spire, by Oceana and Zorak
mobName: Theurgi, Leader of the Dark Spire
mobShortDesc: A Man paces the room, holding a Dark Staff
mobLongDesc: A large suave man paces around the room, dressed in pretty plain clothing outside of a rich and colorful cloak that descends to  the floor.
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST
attackTarget: BUFFER RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP LEADER RAN_ROOM RAN_ROOM
attackSpell: iceball iceball cloud_of_confusion lethal_fire wrath_of_god thunderball

zoneName: Dark Spire, by Oceana and Zorak
mobShortDesc: A fearsome were-beast turns his head to look at you, yellow eyes gleaming...
mobLongDesc: Covered in short, sable fur, Tamur stands only slightly hunched over. His eyes gleam a fierce, mad yellow; the pupils narrow stripes of black running vertically. His huge canines jut out from under a large, black, damp nose. His whiskers quiver and a stream of drool dangles from his lower lip. Tamur's sharp claws make no sound as he erotically extends them from the tips of his furred fingers.

zoneName: Dark Spire, by Oceana and Zorak
mobShortDesc: [1] A massive pile of gold glitters alluringly here.
mobLongDesc: A massive pile of gold lies here, seemingly stuck together somehow...

zoneName: Dark Spire, by Oceana and Zorak
mobShortDesc: A suit of armor comes to life to guard the museum's treasures.
mobLongDesc: A classic suit of full steel platemail creaks forward from its eternal sleep to stop your thievery of the museum's treasures. A greenish glow radiates from behind the visor of his sturdy helm. The full length tower shield held by the armor has a beautiful crest of a locust etched into it.

zoneName: Dark Spire, by Oceana and Zorak
mobShortDesc: A dwarf wearing a blood-red cap stands here, grinning.
mobLongDesc: A short, hunchbacked dwarf stands here, picking his sharp canines with a gleaming knife. He wears a red skullcap, dyed with human blood, and a necklace made of fingerbones.

zoneName: Dark Spire, by Oceana and Zorak
mobShortDesc: A demonic horse's head rises from the water here, red eyes gleaming.
mobLongDesc: The Pookah is a small horse, almost as small as a pony. However, it is covered by water plants, and it has very sharp teeth and glowing red eyes. You even notice that it has sharp claws on its paws, as it neighs a demonic sound and attacks you with them.

zoneName: Dark Spire, by Oceana and Zorak
mobShortDesc: The water bubbles slightly as it feels your presence.
mobLongDesc: The watery muck monster mobilizes its body into a humanoid form to put an end to this infernal intrusion. Large flowing hands reach out to grab and once again absorb the energy of foolish prey.

zoneName: Dark Spire, by Oceana and Zorak
mobShortDesc: A willowy woman stands here screaming, the mist visible behind her.
mobLongDesc: As you look at the Banshee, she turns her shriek directly at you!!!

zoneName: Dark Spire, by Oceana and Zorak
mobShortDesc: A bloodthirsty chigger is waiting to spring on its next victim.
mobLongDesc: This fattened chigger has had many hosts for dinner, maybe you are next on his menu. It pauses only a moment before springing at your jugular.

zoneName: Dark Spire, by Oceana and Zorak
mobShortDesc: A strange creature skulks here, a cross between a rat and a wolf!
mobLongDesc: Huge yellow fangs, green, glowing eyes, and a naked tail. This lovely beast likes both fresh AND rotted meat, so he may save some of you for later.
affectedByFlags: INVISIBLE DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE INFRAVISION DODGE DUAL

zoneName: Dark Spire, by Oceana and Zorak
mobShortDesc: A filthy Ogre squats in a pile of his own waste here, scratching himself.
mobLongDesc: A tremendous Ogre scratches his furry head with a scabrous hand as you look at him. He seems very confused and very angry. You can tell this because he grunts, snarls, and attacks you!
actionFlags: SENTINEL ISNPC AGGRESSIVE AGGTH MEMORY AGGNI AGGAP

mobShortDesc: A knight holding only a torch and a sword stands here, ready for battle.
mobLongDesc: Here stands a withered, old knight who has seen more battles than you have seen sunsets.  His old, chipped bone sword and his ancient torch are artifacts treasured by all.  He is the oldest thing alive, if you consider him to be alive at all.  He's won many battles, and been defeated many times, but how can you kill something that's already dead...?
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST

mobShortDesc: A large root is sticking up out of the ground here.
mobLongDesc: This enormous root stares back at you with glowing red eyes.  Unfortunately for you, you're screwed.  I hope you have someone to get your gear.

mobShortDesc: A wrinkled vampire stands here, sipping on a martini.
mobLongDesc: As you gaze at this ancient undead being, he seems to smile and starts to chuckle to himself in a deep, coarse voice.  His black and red robes are made from silk and his two fangs stick out of his mouth slightly, for time has withered his once youthful skin.  His blood-stained lips part as he drops his martini and opens his mouth widely to emit a loud hissing sound.

mobShortDesc: A very dark wraith quickly darts about here.
mobLongDesc: This newly-born spirit to the underworld is completely black.  You can't see any features, it's just a large blob of black resembling the shape of a person in tattered robes.  He moves quickly and as you glance at him he runs to hide behind something.  He stares at you in complete fear and just as you decide he's harmless he attacks...

mobShortDesc: A large, black unicorn wildly gallops around you.
mobLongDesc: This black horse stands about two meters tall at the shoulder and has a shiny, black mane.  A large horn about a meter long sticks out of the top of this wild beast's forehead.  As he prances about you see the muscles in his legs flex and can tell he'd put up quite a fight.  He whinnies and leaps over tombstones left and right.  As he gets up on his hind legs he towers over you as if he were on top of the world.

mobShortDesc: An Ugly Troll stands here scratching his head.
mobLongDesc: A large, blue, muscular beast stands here grooming himself.  His long, grey, ratty hair is tangled in many knots and his nose sticks out about ten centimeters.  His grimace shows he has about three teeth left.  His body is covered in warts, and he hides his shame with nothing but a loincloth.  As he grooms himself with one hand, he scratches himself with another.  Although he is shorter than six feet, he sure looks as if he could tear you apart.

mobShortDesc: An enormous hobgoblin is digging in the dirt, searching for food.
mobLongDesc: This large, orange-skinned creature oozes with a sticky mucus.  His talons extend almost as long as does your arm.  He stands at a proud three meters tall and flexes his muscles while walking towards you.  As he grins you can see his razor-sharp teeth and his tongue, which falls out revealing that it is just about as long as his claws are.  His bright red eyes send fear into the hearts and minds of all mortals.

mobShortDesc: A large centaur stands here, preparing for battle.
mobLongDesc: Here stands a genetic fluke of nature.  His upper body is that of a man, muscles bulging and long, wavy-brown hair blowing in the wind.  His left hand grips a large shield, while his right hand is clutched in a fist as he prepares for battle.  The lower portion of his body is that of a horse.  The short, brown fur is nicely groomed and his tail flicks as he coldly gazes at you. The muscles in his legs prove that he could easily outrun you over any terrain and his upper bust heaves as he breaths heavily and gallops about.

mobShortDesc: A Large Stone Structure paces slowly about here.
mobLongDesc: This gargoyle is made from pure marble.  It stands about ten feet tall and looks to weigh about five tons.  It slowly walks back and forth in front of the gate, blocking any desire of further progression.  It is very smooth and is white and black speckled.  It grunts as it passes you, not even noticing your presence.

mobShortDesc: Xykloqtium, the great Pit Fiend General stands here, flexing its wings.
mobLongDesc: Standing just over three meters tall Xykloqtium is short for the standards of its kind.  However, three meters and over five hundred kilograms is simply not enough to contain the sheer horror that is a Pit Fiend.  Having spent more than a thousand years in the torments of the deepest, most terrible regions of the Abyss, Xykloqtium is one of the most deeply changed and powerful demons ever produced.  Pit Fiends are the result of the unceasing torture and dementation of a greater demon into something even more fearsome.  Covered in a thick red hide the color of smoldering blood and outfitted with a pair of huge wyvern- like wings, Xykloqtium is a terrifying sight to behold.
actionFlags: ISNPC AGGRESSIVE STAY-ZONE MEMORY FLY AGGRANDOM
affectedByFlags: DETECT-ALIGNMENT DETECT-INVISIBLE DETECT-MAGIC SENSE-LIFE SPHERE INFRAVISION DODGE PROTECT-GOOD FLY INVUL DUAL
mobImmune: FIRE POISON PUMMEL SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DISINTEGRATE CLAIR SUMMON
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST TRAMPLE TAILSLAM BITE CLAW KICK PUNCH
attackTarget: RAN_GROUP ROOM ROOM RAN_GROUP ROOM ROOM RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP

mobKeywords: chaos avatar darkness being evil anti-paladin
mobShortDesc: A being of pure evil sneaks about, ready to strike his next opponent.
mobLongDesc: Once a man of some race of the world, Chaos is now almost unrecognizable as such.  A swirling mass of smoke and darkness makes a barely tangible outline of what his body may once have looked like.  No defining features can be made out of his blurry figure except for the fact that every part of him is frightening and evil.  Crimson orbs burn from dark sockets and an evil grin of wicked teeth made from pure shadow is fixed upon what once passed for a face.  Hideous laughter erupts from his location in a thousand different voices, as if the souls of the underworld are channeling their amusement through his body about some unknown and sinister joke.
actionFlags: SENTINEL ISNPC AGGRESSIVE STAY-ZONE MEMORY AGGRANDOM
affectedByFlags: DETECT-ALIGNMENT DETECT-INVISIBLE DETECT-MAGIC SENSE-LIFE SPHERE INFRAVISION DODGE SNEAK HIDE PROTECT-GOOD INVUL
mobImmune: FIRE POISON PUMMEL SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DRAIN DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE CLAIR SUMMON

mobShortDesc: A light-shrouded figure stands here, preparing to battle a great force.
mobLongDesc: Standing tall and proud amidst the disorder of his surroundings is a man unlike any other.  Long white hair cascades from his head, with not a strand overlapping another, perfectly-straight and cut with precision.  Everything about him speaks of order and control.  He is slightly taller than the average human but looks much the same, save for his eyes which are shining blue orbs of pure light.  Law is clad in shining silver and gold armor that displays perfect symmetry in design.  His only weapon is a massive two-handed sword that glows with a dull light the same color as his eyes and which leaves a slight trail of frost behind its every movement.  Law radiates the energy of a being that is directly touched by a divine force.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-ALIGNMENT DETECT-INVISIBLE DETECT-MAGIC SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY SPHERE PROTECT-EVIL INFRAVISION FURY
mobImmune: FIRE POISON PUMMEL SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DRAIN DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE CLAIR SUMMON
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST DISARM SPELL CAST PUMMEL KICK SPELL CAST
attackTarget: SELF SELF RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP

mobShortDesc: Aniston Blackbane, the Ex-General of Zyca Kingdom is here, blocking the path.
mobLongDesc: Aniston Blackbane is a tall and sinister looking man with black hair and dark features.  He once served as a general in the Zyca Kingdom's grand army, along with his half-brother Stram, but both were expelled for evil-intended conduct. Plainly put, Aniston is a killer, and is extremely proficient at his craft.  He has seen countless battles and yet has little physical scarring to show for it. Oddly enough, even a dozen years after expulsion from the Zyca Kingdom, Aniston still wears the battle-garb and much of the armor of his former station with one notable change--every place once emblazoned with a 'Z' has been scratched out or marked over in some way.  While not particularly large in stature, Aniston Blackbane stands ever at the ready, performing his chosen task with utter determination.
mobImmune: KICK PUNCH SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DISINTEGRATE SUMMON

mobShortDesc: Tohiri, the Legendary Healer of The Daimyo studies her surroundings intently.
mobLongDesc: Tohiri is an ancient woman but she wears her years proudly.  She is a relic of the old days when the people of The Daimyo walked the world beside their gods. Her clothing is simple, consisting of a light-green silk robe embroidered with a dragon wrapped about a lotus stem and flower.  Her silver-gray hair is wrapped tightly and held up in a bun on the top of her head by a pair of wooden chopsticks.  Her sandaled feet, just visible below her robe, seem to glide over the floor as she walks about making hardly a sound.  She seems to be muttering something quietly to herself in her own language, perhaps a prayer of some sort.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-ALIGNMENT DETECT-INVISIBLE DETECT-MAGIC SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY SPHERE PROTECT-EVIL INFRAVISION INVUL DUAL
mobImmune: POISON SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DRAIN DISINTEGRATE CLAIR SUMMON
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST BASH
attackTarget: SELF RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP ROOM SELF RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP
attackSpell: miracle super_harm flamestrike earthquake heal dispel_magic

mobShortDesc: Stram, the Ex-Commando Captain of Zyca Kingdom stands here, poised for action.
mobLongDesc: Once a battle-mage captain in the army of Zyca Kingdom in the west, Stram Blackbane is a formidable man indeed.  A long black and purple robe drawn around the waist, complete with cloak and hood, drapes his muscular frame, embroidered with magical symbols around the half-length sleeves and collar as well as several other locations.  Stram wears his hood back, proudly displaying his short spiked hair and battle-scarred face.  He has no preferred method of combat, sometimes hacking his enemies to pieces and other times disintegrating them into a pile of ash--whichever method gets the job done.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY INFRAVISION PROTECT-GOOD DUAL
mobImmune: CHARM BLINDNESS DISINTEGRATE CLAIR SUMMON ASSAULT

mobShortDesc: Velxok, Archmage of The Canticle searches the area with keen interest.
mobLongDesc: At first glance, this hunched over figure of a man looks humble and quiet.  A second glance brings a sense of dread as the malice in his eyes becomes all too clear.  Velxok has devoted several human lifetimes to the pursuit of magic and its ultimate control, leaving him twisted and broken in more dimensions than just the physical.  He is dressed simply and all in black--a most terrible black--that makes his thick robe and wilted but still pointed hat seem sinister indeed.  The only other item about him is a gnarled staff of misshapen black wood that he clutches in one of his twisted hands.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-ALIGNMENT DETECT-INVISIBLE DETECT-MAGIC SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY SPHERE INFRAVISION PROTECT-GOOD INVUL
mobImmune: SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DISINTEGRATE CLAIR SUMMON
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST
attackTarget: RAN_GROUP ROOM RAN_GROUP ROOM RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP
attackSpell: wrath_of_ancients conflagration thunderball death_spray electric_shock frost_bolt vampiric_touch lethal_fire meteor fireball

mobShortDesc: Trysta, the Wandering Minstrel of Lorien is here, humming to herself.
mobLongDesc: A beautiful elven woman stands here, humming to herself with a voice like music itself.  She is lightly armed with only a short sword at her side and a small crossbow over her shoulder.  Her clothing is standard traveling affair but colored most beautifully a shimmering coral blue.  With her golden hair tied back, the tips of slightly pointed ears can be seen, studded with opalescent earrings that catch the light from the torch that she carries.  This young woman seems to take in every detail of her surroundings with a curiosity akin to that of a child.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE DETECT-MAGIC SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY SPHERE PROTECT-EVIL INFRAVISION DODGE
mobImmune: SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DISINTEGRATE SUMMON

mobShortDesc: Shomed, the Nomad Hero of the Tarion Desert, lies in wait here.
mobLongDesc: A tall man with proud, angular features stands here in defiance of his surroundings.  He wears a sand-colored robe and a white head-cloth wrapped around his brow.  Strangely enough, even in this cold place, this creature of the land wears no cover upon his feet which are darkly colored and calloused from wear.  Armed only with a huge axe, this bear of a man looks more dangerous than a real bear could ever be.  A master of traps and tracking his prey, Shomed seems to be on a hunt of his own at this very moment.
mobImmune: PUMMEL SLEEP CHARM DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE SUMMON AMBUSH

mobShortDesc: Shadowraith, the Deadly Assassin of Jal-Pur is here, biding her time.
mobLongDesc: A black-garbed figure is all that can describe this being.  It moves with a stealthy flow, not making a sound.  Two long sword hilts reach from either of its shoulders, ready to draw at a moments notice.  Two smaller blades attached at the hip look deadly indeed, with two more even smaller weapons sheathed in each cloth-wrapped boot.  This thing is a walking artillery, ready to deal out death to any in the way.  Two eyes stare icily from behind a black silk veil, taking in every detail of the surroundings.
mobImmune: POISON PUMMEL SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS DISINTEGRATE SUMMON ASSAULT

mobShortDesc: Myrdon, the Master Thief of Zyekia is here, gathering crystals.
mobLongDesc: Myrdon is a short, thin man probably in his mid-thirties.  A finely groomed moustache and goatee adorn the angular features of his face.  He wears no hat upon his head, which is completely bald--a sharp contrast to his facial hair. His clothes are drably colored, but perfectly-tailored and fine looking, seeming to be made to not stand out in any way.  Numerous small bags and leather pouches hang from his belt and his backpack but no sound comes from them as he shifts about.  He appears to be armed with only two small, well crafted daggers, which he wears easily in sheaths on his hips.
mobImmune: SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS DISINTEGRATE SUMMON BACKSTAB AMBUSH

mobShortDesc: A Demon Spawn wanders the mists, seeking its next victim.
mobLongDesc: Grotesque and ungainly-looking, demon spawn are a disturbing sight to look upon.  These creatures are the beginnings of what will eventually become full- fledged demons--that is, if they survive the torments that the transformation requires.  Demons are the result of corrupt mortals or beings from other planes of existence that have been twisted by greed and the desire to torture and kill.  Every spawn looks different as each retains some semblance of its former shape, but all are unmistakably evil.  Some will fail and become the fodder of demonkind--the misshapen lemures--while others will fill the ranks of the greater demons and may even attain the status of Pit Fiend, the ultimate killing-machine.

mobShortDesc: A Baatezu Warrior roams the area, waiting for orders.
mobLongDesc: One of the most fearsome denizens of the outer planes, Baatezu look like something out of the most terrible nightmare ever dreamed.  These creatures are the second in command in their home plane, candidates for transformation one day into the most feared demon of all: the Pit Fiend.  Only vaguely humanoid in shape, these greater demons are covered with jagged green scales and sport a pair of leathery bat-like wings.  A long, wickedly-barbed tail sprouts from the base of its back.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-ALIGNMENT DETECT-INVISIBLE INFRAVISION DODGE PROTECT-GOOD DUAL

mobShortDesc: A Gelugon Guardian blocks entry beyond its station.
mobLongDesc: The super-elite guards and protectors of demonkind, Gelugons resemble humanoid insects that stand over ten feet tall on their hind legs.  Powerful chitinous mandibles take up much of the facial area of this thing, set just beneath bulbous multifaceted eyes.  Gelugons are protected by a thick exoskeleton of closely interlocking plates, which end in sharp protrusions all around its body.  Having not the necessary parts to speak, these hideous demons communicate by means of telepathy and are adept at blocking mind attacks. Gelugons are fearless, relentless warriors that serve their more powerful masters to the limits of their existence.
affectedByFlags: SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY SPHERE DODGE PROTECT-GOOD DUAL

mobShortDesc: A hellcat prowls the area, searching for prey.
mobLongDesc: Hellcats are an evil incarnation of some ancient ancestor to great cats. Looking like a tusked lion with stark white fur, these predators from the outer planes live and breathe only to kill and serve their masters.  Demons most often use these creatures for hunting down victims and intruders, as well as guard-beasts.  Hellcats have superb senses of smell and hearing, but also have the ability to sense the thought patterns of nearby creatures.  Massive clawed paws and wickedly sharp teeth flex and grind, waiting for a fresh meal of flesh to tear into.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-ALIGNMENT DETECT-INVISIBLE DETECT-MAGIC SENSE-LIFE INFRAVISION DODGE SNEAK PROTECT-GOOD
mobImmune: FIRE SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS SUMMON AMBUSH

mobShortDesc: An Osyluth Patroller makes its rounds, alert to any intruders.
mobLongDesc: Standing nearly three meters tall, the Osyluth is a terrible sight indeed. Thin and bony, this lesser demon serves as the main workforce of demonkind. Osyluths share the same origins as imps, but are much larger and do not have wings.  Sickly grey skin stretches tautly over its angular features and bony protrusions.  The Osyluth has incredibly long arms and fingers, tipped with sharp claws used to strike at its opponents.  Like imps, the Osyluth wields a dangerous barbed tail--similar to that of a scorpion--which it takes great pleasure in impaling its victims with.

mobShortDesc: A dark purple spider-like insect chews upon the remains of its last victim.
mobLongDesc: Large and spider-like, the bebilith stalker is a terrifying monster.  A lesser demon from the abyss, this creature is most often summoned to the material plane to serve as a guardian or protector of some sort.  Curiously, this terror has only six legs instead of the usual eight for an arachnid.  Two larger appendages, similar to crab pincers, sprout from near its drooling maw.  The arms lack actual pincers, having instead sharp-bladed endings made of the same material as the creature's shell.  Efficient killers, bebiliths never miss an opportunity to deal out death.
actionFlags: SENTINEL SCAVENGER ISNPC AGGRESSIVE STAY-ZONE MEMORY AGGRANDOM
affectedByFlags: DETECT-ALIGNMENT DETECT-INVISIBLE DETECT-MAGIC SENSE-LIFE INFRAVISION PROTECT-GOOD DUAL
mobImmune: POISON PUMMEL SLEEP CHARM SUMMON AMBUSH

mobShortDesc: A hideous mound of flesh shambles about, drooling blood.
mobLongDesc: The appearance of a lemure is beyond the definition of disgusting.  Only vaguely humanoid in shape, these trembling mounds of flesh are mindless servants of the more powerful demons.  Bones fill this creature in seemingly haphazard locations, serving only to keep the putrid thing from collapsing in on itself.  Though it has no will of its own, it is proficient in the ways of killing, using jagged claws and teeth to rip its victims apart.

mobShortDesc: A wicked little demon hops about here, seeking a victim to torment.
mobLongDesc: This insidious little creature darts about the air on its small wings, looking for something to torture or kill.  A small bead of poison drips from a large stinger at the end of a bony tail that constantly whips back and forth, seeking soft flesh.  The imp's eyes are tiny red dots on an otherwise black fleshy body.  This foul denizen of the lower planes is the weakest of it's sort, and stands only about half a meter tall.  While not particularly intelligent, the imp seems cunning enough to overcome a weak opponent.

mobShortDesc: A juvenile basilisk is here, devouring some recent prey.
mobLongDesc: The basilisk is one of the most feared denizens of the underdark.  Its ability to turn other living things to stone with a sheer glance gives it a great advantage over other predators.  The basilisk can consume its statue-made victims by secreting saliva upon the section it wishes to dine upon.  The chemical reaction turns the affected area back into living flesh for consumption.  This particular basilisk is smaller than usual, and lighter colored, which indicates that it has not grown to its full size.  When you catch the gleam in its eye however, you realize it should be treated with the full respect due to such a monster.
mobImmune: FIRE ELECTRIC POISON PUMMEL KICK PUNCH SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS

mobShortDesc: An angry ice troll is here, defending its territory.
mobLongDesc: The ice troll is a fearsome monster, originally from the plane of ice.  It is said that long ago, a wizard of great power opened a planer gate to this place and summoned forth an entire army of trolls.  Now, they are rare to find but not unheard of in remote areas.  A thin mist hovers around this large angular creature.  Jagged white teeth drip half-frozen water droplets onto the ground, leaving small icicles upon the troll's chin.
actionFlags: SENTINEL SCAVENGER ISNPC AGGRESSIVE STAY-ZONE MEMORY

mobShortDesc: A large, furry white beast with sharp teeth growls with rage.
mobLongDesc: A great hairy beast, the mountain yeti is a primordial leftover from an age long past.  Humanoid in stature, this shaggy creature stands erect on it's huge hind legs.  Large arms and clawed hands look as if they were designed specifically for ripping small creatures apart.  With red-stained teeth and ice blue eyes, this beast looks around with savage hunger for anything to eat.

mobShortDesc: The master archaeologist is looking suspiciously at you.
mobLongDesc: The Master Archeologist is wearing grey pants and a white shirt. His coat is made of brown leather and has strange markings and symbols on it. Some of them looks like the cavern wall near the entrance.

mobShortDesc: An ant is crawling on the beach.
mobLongDesc: The ant is crawling around on the beach close to the anthill.

mobShortDesc: An archaeologist is studying an old parchment.
mobLongDesc: The archaeologist's clothes are dirty and ragged. He is wearing a brown coat over his clothes that are just ragged. The way he studies his documents leaves no room for interest in clothing. He wears a big hat to shield him from working in the sun.

mobShortDesc: A student is standing here looking curiously at a small stone.
mobLongDesc: The student is in his youth and looks eager in his studies. His eyes are watchful and register every detail. He looks rather skinny, and you hear him mutter about getting something to eat.

mobShortDesc: The Ant Shopkeeper stands here, ready to sell his goods.
actionFlags: SPEC SENTINEL SCAVENGER ISNPC STAY-ZONE MEMORY ARM
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SANCTUARY INFRAVISION DODGE INVUL DUAL FURY

mobShortDesc: The Ant Shopkeeper stands here, ready to sell his goods.
actionFlags: SPEC SENTINEL SCAVENGER ISNPC STAY-ZONE MEMORY ARM
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SANCTUARY INFRAVISION DODGE INVUL DUAL FURY

mobShortDesc: The uber huge queen ant snaps her mandibles, antennae twitching madly.
mobLongDesc: The uber queen ant has jaws that could swallow a caravan. Her long armoured legs pound the cave floor with deafening thuds as she scuttles around. Her thick carapace glints with golden light, looking other-worldly.
affectedByFlags: INVISIBLE DETECT-INVISIBLE SANCTUARY INFRAVISION DODGE INVUL DUAL
mobImmune: SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DISINTEGRATE CLAIR SUMMON HIT BLUDGEON CLAW BITE STING CRUSH BACKSTAB

mobShortDesc: Something is drifting in the river... it looks like a log.
mobLongDesc: The crackled skin of this huge creature shows its ancient ridges with that with which to show this croc respect. Its teeth have grown to sizes unheard of in that but of fairy tales. With a choking feeling, you feel your body turn hard under his gaze, and realize your mistake at once.
affectedByFlags: INVISIBLE DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE INFRAVISION DODGE INVUL

mobShortDesc: You can see something purple hiding under the mud.
mobLongDesc: Striking purple lobes flex and expand as this treacherous worm moves within the mud. Its large fang shaped teeth, show that this is no ordinary worm, even though its huge size gives you that impression already. Its glistening skin is almost translucent under your light, letting you see its many veins as the swell and pump its blood through its body.
affectedByFlags: INVISIBLE DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE INFRAVISION DODGE INVUL

mobShortDesc: A salamander is hiding behind the trees.
mobLongDesc: This slick, green scaled creature slithers through the swamps undetected. His biggest fear is those which carry the magic to sense his presence. Like those of the basilisk family, as he gazes deep into your eyes, you feel all your limbs harden, as your soul leaves your body.
affectedByFlags: INVISIBLE DETECT-INVISIBLE SANCTUARY INFRAVISION STATUE DODGE SNEAK HIDE DUAL FURY

mobShortDesc: Big Stone stands tall and firm, the king of his kind.
mobLongDesc: As the king of the stoned ones, his duty throughout the land is to make sure and preserve the message that his kind send. Once, he was a simple adventurer, but by a strange twist of fate, crossed the Ettin Wizard, and his life has never been the same. Take heed of this warning he sends, and never trust a two-head monster in dark robes.

mobShortDesc: A Huge Stoned Oak softly sways in the light gusts of wind.
mobLongDesc: As each gust blows by, not only does it bring bad smells, but you watch in amazement as each part of this tree moves in unison. As grey, and hard as rock, you can't imagine what must have happened for it to be turned to this hard and encrusted texture. As you turn to look away, you see it yawn, and realize it is quite alive.

mobShortDesc: The Dark Ettin Wizard utters the words 'uljdeusos' as he attacks!
mobLongDesc: An old wizard sporting long black hair looks through his books for just the right spell. Wearing dark robes, special made to preserve both his ugly heads, it flutters and skitters across the floor with every movement he makes. As you look at him he turns and prepares to attack you.
actionFlags: SPEC SENTINEL SCAVENGER ISNPC AGGRESSIVE STAY-ZONE AGGWA MEMORY ARM
affectedByFlags: INVISIBLE DETECT-INVISIBLE SANCTUARY INFRAVISION INVUL DUAL FURY

mobShortDesc: A ghost of an Ettin is wailing here, in a frightening way.
mobLongDesc: This ghastly ghost wails with horror at the realization that he is dead. He no longer holds color in his eyes, but a horribly frightening white, translucent hole where eyes used to be in both his heads. No longer is his body grey, but the pale white of the dead.

mobShortDesc: The Angry Ettin wife stands here, ready to hit you with her rolling pin.
mobLongDesc: This wife of the highly ranked chief, seems to be angry at the world. But perhaps it is only due to her husband working overtime today. Grotesque grey skin wrinkles and bonds with the flaps of fatty tissue hanging from her chest.

mobShortDesc: A Large Ettin screams from both heads, looking for prey.
mobLongDesc: Both of his over-inflated heads scream with rage as they look about with a vicious terror to find someone, or something, to ravage. The dark grey skin of this monstrosity shows tears and rips all along his flank and arms. With another hideous scream, his wild eyes look upon you with victory.

mobShortDesc: An Ettin stands here, poised to defend its land.
mobLongDesc: A large two-headed giant with muscular legs and arms, he looks like an excellent fighter. If anything, his endurance might just be high. Huge eyes, black with no whites, peer from each head, taking in all of you. His grey skin ripples, as he assesses the danger.

mobShortDesc: The Chief of the Ettins relaxes in his office, waiting for reports.
mobLongDesc: With his two monstrous heads peering at two things at once, you can tell that this is a well seasoned warrior, well-deserved of his job. His armor boasts of many metals, glimmering with the pride you can see in his eyes. As his one head reads reports, the other seems to be looking right at you.
actionFlags: SENTINEL SCAVENGER ISNPC AGGRESSIVE STAY-ZONE MEMORY ARM
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SANCTUARY INFRAVISION DODGE DUAL FURY

mobShortDesc: A Black Worm slithers in the mud, wanting to make you its next meal.
mobLongDesc: The Black Worm is covered by mud and slime as it slithers semi-hidden in the muck of this swampy territory. Small beads for eyes peer from one end of this hideous thing. As you look a bit closer, you can see what appear to be fangs, proving that this is no ordinary dirt worm.

mobShortDesc: The King Cobra sways and hisses as it looks for its next meal.
mobLongDesc: The King Cobra is a large snake with sharp and poisonous teeth. Since the dawn of history it has been here guarding the entrance to the Ettin village. This large monster has some special skills and quite the poisonous bite.
actionFlags: SENTINEL SCAVENGER ISNPC AGGRESSIVE STAY-ZONE MEMORY

mobShortDesc: A gigantic mushroom grows up from the mush of the land here.
mobLongDesc: HEEHEE... FOOD! Wait!! It seems to have eyes with in the circular dots all around it's head. As you look closer, you become sure that this is indeed a living creature. From within the fans under it's cap, you can make out the shapely arms of this planted animal.

mobShortDesc: The King spider crouches over his treasure, maddened by your presence.
mobLongDesc: Large and hairy, this black spider wears the crown of his kind. His huge jaws and muscular legs twitch and flitter across the floor. Just as your eyes focus in on the one huge eye in the middle of his forehead, you feel your body crumble and break as it turns to stone.
affectedByFlags: INVISIBLE DETECT-INVISIBLE SANCTUARY INFRAVISION STATUE DODGE INVUL DUAL

mobShortDesc: The Chief of the Guards over-looks his many guardlings.
mobLongDesc: The Chief of the Guards looks very confident, but he's always ready to blow his horn and command the guards to attack you. The black fuzz which showers his whole body comes to attention, as all the hundreds of his eyes focus in on you.
actionFlags: SCAVENGER ISNPC AGGRESSIVE STAY-ZONE WIMPY MEMORY ARM

mobShortDesc: The spider guard crouches on his legs, looking for intruders.
mobLongDesc: One of the best fighters spiders can offer, this guard peers with his many eyes for intruders within his arena. With the slighter chitter of his mouth, strings of web can flow around anyone not meant to be here, capturing them for this guards next meal.

mobShortDesc: The lost adventurer looks around for an escape from his captors.
mobLongDesc: The lost adventurer looks very angry! Maybe because he can't find the way back to Midgaard. His rage and terror, as well as lack of food, has made him into a crazed man. You can see the terror and rage in his wood brown eyes. What used to be magnificent armor, is now encroached with dirt and bugs as he scavenges for some sign of escape.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SANCTUARY INFRAVISION DODGE DUAL FURY

mobShortDesc: The Dragon Guard stands guarding the others of his kind.
mobLongDesc: The dragon guard stands at attention with his excellent armor and equipment. His large black belly looks like an onyx treasure as he breathes, and it expands. As his eyes begin to focus on you, the emerald green of them springs to life, ready for a good fight.
actionFlags: SENTINEL SCAVENGER ISNPC AGGRESSIVE MEMORY ARM
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SANCTUARY INFRAVISION DODGE DUAL FURY

mobShortDesc: The White Dragon shakes the room as his snoring slumber progresses.
