mobLongDesc: Beautiful white scales glitter and gleam in the light of the room. The soft rise and fall of this beast's body causes kaleidoscopes to form on the rock walls as the light reflects off it. His diamond shaped eyes show off the many layers of lids, as they flicker and move.

mobShortDesc: The huge mosquito is buzzing around the swamp causing mischief.
mobLongDesc: For a mosquito, this is quite a large one. It's stinger, almost as large as a sword, swivels and swerves along the swamps paths looking for that perfect victim. You can see a large pouch on it's back, with a collection of odds and ends within it.
actionFlags: SCAVENGER ISNPC AGGRESSIVE STAY-ZONE WIMPY MEMORY

mobShortDesc: The huge ancient dragon is standing here, defending his treasury.
mobLongDesc: The huge ancient dragon gazes fire towards you as you look at it. The glistening scales are the last thing you see as you feel your body turn rock solid and turn to stone.
actionFlags: SENTINEL SCAVENGER ISNPC AGGRESSIVE STAY-ZONE MEMORY ARM
affectedByFlags: INVISIBLE DETECT-INVISIBLE SANCTUARY INFRAVISION STATUE DODGE DUAL

mobShortDesc: An ant guard is guarding the gate entrance from intruders.
mobLongDesc: The ant guard spits over his left shoulder as he looks in your general direction. The dirt under his nails and on his clothing, shows that he is not afraid to roll around and get dirty if things progress that far. His long sword scrapes the ground, as it gleams in the light.
actionFlags: SENTINEL SCAVENGER ISNPC AGGRESSIVE STAY-ZONE MEMORY

mobShortDesc: An ant gatemaster is here guarding the gate from intruders.
mobLongDesc: The ant gatemaster holds the key to the village. His devilish ways, and excellent fighting skills earned him this high post. His duty in life is to protect his village from those who might seek to destroy it.
actionFlags: SENTINEL SCAVENGER ISNPC AGGRESSIVE STAY-ZONE MEMORY

mobShortDesc: An ant guard stands here guarding the village proper.
mobLongDesc: The ant guard looks like strong and good fighter, for all his legs could also be construed as hands. With the ability to grasp many weapons at a time, this guard is to be feared. His agile moves could out do the best of fighters.

mobShortDesc: The huge queen ant snaps and gnaws her teeth as she crouches here.
mobLongDesc: The queen ant has huge jaws that easily could cut you to pieces. Her long tenuous legs twitch and creep into position to fight you. As you look deep into her eyes, a light flashes, and you become stone.
actionFlags: SPEC SENTINEL ISNPC AGGRESSIVE STAY-ZONE MEMORY
affectedByFlags: INVISIBLE DETECT-INVISIBLE SANCTUARY INFRAVISION STATUE DODGE INVUL DUAL

zoneName: Druid Forest, by Shun and Awl
mobShortDesc: A black insect, fully three feet long, shrieks at you with devilish fury!
mobLongDesc: This gigantic locust shrieks as you turn your eyes to it. It's carapace is obsidian, and its multifaceted eyes glow red.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-ALIGNMENT DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE INFRAVISION FLY DUAL

zoneName: Druid Forest, by Shun and Awl
mobShortDesc: A Dark Wolf stalks the woods in search of prey.
mobLongDesc: As you look into his eyes, you can see the souls of lost travelers that have been devoured by this monster.

zoneName: Druid Forest, by Shun and Awl
mobShortDesc: The Druid Protector is here, on watch against intruders.
mobLongDesc: Icy blue eyes stare back at you, unblinking.  The druid warrior has never known defeat, and will not any time soon.  You shiver as you see cables of blood-engorged veins and muscles running down his gargantuan arms.
actionFlags: SENTINEL ISNPC AGGRESSIVE AGGCL AGGNI ARM

zoneName: Druid Forest, by Shun and Awl
mobShortDesc: The Druid searches for intruders while casually strolling the forest.
mobLongDesc: He lives for the sole purpose of protecting the forest.  Try to harm him and you'd best be prepared to pay the Reaper.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SANCTUARY SPHERE PROTECT-EVIL DODGE DUAL

zoneName: Druid Forest, by Shun and Awl
mobShortDesc: A Dark Wolf stalks the woods in search of prey.
mobLongDesc: As you look into his eyes, you can see the souls of lost travelers that have been devoured by this monster.

zoneName: Druid Forest, by Shun and Awl
mobShortDesc: The Dark Druid Guardian is here, protecting his home.
mobLongDesc: Shadows cover most of his face, but what you can make out seems to be a hard man.  Unblinking, he attacks you with the fierceness of a panther.
affectedByFlags: INVISIBLE SANCTUARY INFRAVISION DODGE INVUL FURY

mobShortDesc: An old man made of wax stands here, looking decrepit.
mobLongDesc: This poor creature was once a man, but some dastard has coated him in wax and animated his corpse to stand guard here! A small nametag is illegible under the thick wax encrusting this thing's chest. Like many curators, the man has the air of being... slightly eccentric. As you look into the man's eyes, you seem to read a plea in their inky depths.... he simply wants the nightmare to end.

mobShortDesc: A sleek black panther blinks at you with bright green eyes here.
mobLongDesc: Covered in short, black fur, this small female panther is of a strange, magical breed of Southern Vilosian cats bonded to Quaratt, the Panther Queen. Who knows how long this being of a magical nature will remain on this plane? She could vanish as quickly as she appeared at any second!

mobShortDesc: A wispy woman made of frozen grey vapor writhes in the air currents.
mobLongDesc: This djinn appears to be composed entirely of grey vapor, shaped by small, localized gusts of wind into the form of a tall, slender woman. Where this elemental creature's eyes would be, black holes encircled by tiny icicles seem to descend to the pits of a lower world. As the vaporous djinn opens her mouth to silently scream, you see what appear to be tiny people trying to crawl from inside of her!
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE INFRAVISION DODGE INVUL DUAL
mobImmune: KICK DISINTEGRATE HIT BLUDGEON PIERCE SLASH WHIP CLAW BITE STING CRUSH HACK CHOP SLICE BACKSTAB ASSAULT

mobShortDesc: A flaming, manlike figure leans against the wall here, grinning.
mobLongDesc: This strange, elemental creature is covered in orange flames from head to foot. He is taller than a normal man by about a head, and his smile is composed of bright red embers, as are his eyes. He leaps from place to place like sparks leap from a burning, pitchy log. There is no way past this magical creature other than fighting him.
mobImmune: KICK PUNCH SLEEP CHARM DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE HIT BLUDGEON PIERCE SLASH WHIP CLAW BITE STING CRUSH HACK CHOP SLICE BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT

mobShortDesc: Lemouro the Tracker stands here, gruffly scowling at you.
mobLongDesc: Lemouro is an ancient, grizzled man, but he still looms erect as he ever did, glaring down at you with steel-blue eyes from beneath beetling grey brows. His nearly white hair reaches to his waist, travelling over the furry expanse of his jacket. Every single thread of clothing on this legendary tracker is made of some animal hide, and odds are that he killed it himself. It is this man who put NAMETAGS on Tomek and Gorgo, the ferocious Fur Beasts. This man captured the mighty Khallaq and Quaratt, the Panther Queen. His tremendous hands are covered with small scars from skinning beasts and from hard-fought battles, and they look as though they could easily crush your spine. Lemouro is even more impressive than his fearsome legend.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SPHERE INFRAVISION DODGE PROTECT-GOOD DUAL

mobShortDesc: A small child with long fangs and short black fur growls at you.
mobLongDesc: This poor child must be the offspring of Scratch Mama and Lemouro the Tracker. Legends say that Lemouro and Scratch Mama were cursed by Quaratt when Scratch Mama conspired to capture the jungle queen, and this must be the result. This poor child lives a tortured existence, torn between his humanity and his bestial nature. His body ripples with muscles not found on small children, and his fangs drip with spittle. He glares at you with glowing yellow eyes, the madness within them nearly unbearable. Somebody should put this poor creature out of its misery.

mobShortDesc: An ancient black woman hums and sings as she washes dishes here.
mobLongDesc: This gentle old creature is bent over at the waist and looks like a somewhat chubby jackknife. This woman has seen the passing of many seasons, and one wonders how long she has spent in this ice- entombed cabin. Her walnut skin is riven with the crevasses and canyons of age, but her ice-grey eyes twinkle merrily from under her shriveled brow. As she smiles, you realize that she is missing most of her teeth, and she wears dentures made of what could only be carven Fur Beast tooth. It strikes you then that this cheerful old woman is none other than Scratch Mama, legendary wife of Lemouro the Tracker. The legends say that she was none other than the dark high priestess of Quaratt for the Mujambik tribe of Southern Vilosia. Lemouro, the cold-blooded northerner, however, is fabled to have turned this sultry, evil priestess into a merry housewife.
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST

mobShortDesc: A naked woman covered in icy rime and dangling icicles stands here.
mobLongDesc: This beautiful woman stands with a hand on her hip, smirking with bluish-purple lips. A white, frosty rime fails to cover her head-to- foot nakedness, as do the various small icicles hanging from the frozen ends of her greenish hair, her delicate chin, her small nose, the lobes of her blue ears, the tips of her icy fingers, and even the tips of her erect nipples. She seems to be what folklore refers to as an Ice Naiad: a spirit of a woman murdered by drowning in frigid waters. Not a true naiad, the Ice Naiad is more of a vicious ghost. Since the only women typically drowned in frigid waters by the more northern tribes were witches and murderers themselves, the Ice Naiads tend to be evil themselves.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY SPHERE INFRAVISION DODGE DUAL

mobShortDesc: A quivering Kimagee, its hide loosely attached to its body, darts around.
mobLongDesc: This Kimagee is a rather small creature, but extremely vicious for its size. Pound for pound, this eight ounce creature is the most ferocious predator ever to live. What is even more terrible is the fact that they usually travel in large packs. Kimagee are known to spend up to half of their lives in frigid waters, as they subsist mainly on fish, but they are just as capable on land as they are agile in the water. Kimagee fur is prized by the upper classes for its warmth and its stark white beauty. Indeed, it looks like this Kimagee was previously hunted for its hide, which now hangs loosely from its body.

mobShortDesc: A small, weasel-like white creature chitters madly at you.
mobLongDesc: This Kimagee is a rather small creature, but extremely vicious for its size. Pound for pound, this eight ounce creature is the most ferocious predator ever to live. What is even more terrible is the fact that they usually travel in large packs. Kimagee are known to spend up to half of their lives in frigid waters, as they subsist mainly on fish, but they are just as capable on land as they are agile in the water. Kimagee fur is prized by the upper classes for its warmth and its stark white beauty. However, few trappers dare to hunt Kimagee, for packs have been known to stay by their fallen comrades and fight off scavengers until the bitter end.

mobShortDesc: A massive ball of white hair roars ferociously at you.
mobLongDesc: This creature is about twice as big as his cousin, Gorgo. Also, Tomek is alive and well, not some ensorcelled wax creation. His gigantic canines are stained brown with the amount of blood he has drunk in his long lifetime, and his pebble-like eyes glint at you in mawkish innocence. Tomek has ears at least three feet long, their tips quivering at the slightest noise. The Fur Beast itself is a good three meters high at the shoulder and about the same in length. Tomek has almost pure white fur, save where it is stained with blood. Someone has placed a nametag around this beast's neck, as well.
affectedByFlags: SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY INFRAVISION PROTECT-GOOD INVUL DUAL

mobShortDesc: A large black panther hisses menacingly at you.
mobLongDesc: This is no ordinary cat, it's a six foot long black panther with massive white teeth and large ivory claws. Its muscles ripple beneath its short black fur, and it screams a strange roar as it leaps to attack you!

mobShortDesc: A long snake with tiny legs murmurs strangely here, blinking.
mobLongDesc: This strange, black snake-like creature has white tufts of hair about its long, pointed ears. Tiny, clawed legs protrude from four equidistant points on its basically bilateral body. Huge green eyes blink at you in opposing rhythm as the Gembal Snake's long orange tongue flicks in and out.

mobShortDesc: A slender woman covered in short black fur lazily blinks at you.
mobLongDesc: As you gaze at this divine being, your heart feels as if it is about to burst from your chest. The raw sensuality of this woman assaults everybody, male or female, with an incredible force. Her slender, well-muscled body is covered in short black fur, like the jungle creatures she rules over. This bestial effect only serves to enhance her beauty, as do the vertical-pupiled glowing yellow eyes which she gazes at you languorously with. Quaratt, if you recall correctly, is a mythical goddess of the ancient tribes of Southern Vilosia. What she would be doing so far north of her homeland is a mystery.... Rather than pondering that, perhaps you should ponder getting away from her... the myths say that her beauty is only exceeded by her ferocity.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SPHERE INFRAVISION DODGE PROTECT-GOOD INVUL

mobShortDesc: A strange cross between an ape and a fish lurks in the muck here.
mobLongDesc: A pair of luminous fisheyes stare at you out of a massive, fanged white ape's face. This strange beast is covered in scars and has strange jewelry dangling from every odd protuberance. If this beast is truly the mythical Khallaq of Southern Vilosia, then it must be thousands of years old. As you ponder the oddity of finding a decidedly southern beast here in these more temperate regions, the mighty Khallaq shrieks a strange, gurgling howl and swims rapidly toward you!
affectedByFlags: SANCTUARY INFRAVISION DODGE HIDE PROTECT-GOOD DUAL

mobShortDesc: A dark image of the sorcerer Hakeem floats before your eyes.
mobLongDesc: No longer blessed with corporeal shape, the wraith of Hakeem is no less intimidating than the man for it. His eyes flick over what was once his domain and settle upon you, burning resentment evident for having upset his plans.  At least ghosts can't hurt you... right?
mobImmune: PUMMEL KICK PUNCH SLEEP DISINTEGRATE HIT BLUDGEON PIERCE SLASH WHIP CLAW BITE STING CRUSH HACK CHOP BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT

mobShortDesc: A short old sorcerer stands here, his tiny body held up with wax supports.
mobLongDesc: Hakeem snarls in irritation as you look at him. Having conquered this museum, all he wants to do now is make more of his diabolical "creations" like Gorgo and the poor proto-horse. In order to do this, he must remain living, and Hakeem long ago sold whatever soul he had left in order to complete what he considers his work. After he tells you this, he attacks.

mobShortDesc: A girl of about sixteen sits her, obsessively brushing her hair.
mobLongDesc: Jenny's face explodes in a fascinating display of nervous tics when you look at her. She looks to be about sixteen years old, and has a scar on her left breast--revealed by her low-cut nightgown--that looks horribly like a brand. Her impossibly long hair swirls about her frail body in great auburn waves, and you can almost believe that it has a life of its own.

mobShortDesc: A huge ball of fur twitches in the corner, whimpering.
mobLongDesc: This poor animal was once a wax figure, as you can tell by the bits of wire protruding from its flesh here and there. It is about 8 feet high at what looks like a shoulder, and looks almost completely spherical due to the huge amounts of dark sable fur covering it. Two bright points shine from where you suppose this creature's head to be... they look like immense tusks, almost like a boar's. A nametag on a collar about its neck reads, "Gorgo, scurge ov the Verjii Caverns"

mobShortDesc: A wax representation of a half-lizard proto-horse stands here, grunting.
mobLongDesc: This proto-horse is half reptile, half mammal. Its pre-hooves are cloven, with vestigial claws growing from the horny tips. Its teeth are small and pointed, and it is made entirely of wax. It wears a saddle, which is obviously that which the smashed figure against the wall here rode before the horse got angry.

mobShortDesc: An old janitor, covered in wax and dressed in a knight's costume, is here.
mobLongDesc: This poor old man's eyes gleam with an intense light. It seems that he's under some sort of spell. Either that, or something has driven him mad. You usually wouldn't be afraid of a mere janitor, but Bill looks as though he's seen a fight or two in his lifetime. In fact, his lifetime might have been quite long so far...

mobShortDesc: An ancient knight made of wax and wood is standing here.
mobLongDesc: The wax knight is a little shorter than most humans today. He is wearing tattered clothing dating from the time of the great battle for Vilosia. A nametag on his chest reads "General Maximilion Faze", which triggers a twinge of memory from your schooldays... Wasn't he the Butcher of....

mobName: A Locust from the Green Hell
mobShortDesc: A long, vicious black locust hailing from the Green Hell buzzes angrily at you.
mobLongDesc: The body of this fierce insectoid is fully twelve feet long, and armored with thick black plates almost impenetrable by normal weapons. Above its gigantic, gleaming red eyes stand long, orange, hairy eyebrows only found on the mythical Green Hell Locusts. These fierce beasts were long ago banished to the few, scattered caverns which were naturally strong enough to withstand their massive digging claws.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY SPHERE PROTECT-EVIL INFRAVISION DODGE PROTECT-GOOD FLY DUAL FURY

mobShortDesc: An alchemist wanders by in search of magical herbs.
mobLongDesc: Rare herbs are rumored to only grow here, within the canyon.

mobShortDesc: A Hurricane rages across the sky.
mobLongDesc: A humanoid figure seems to be trapped in the rushing wind.

mobLongDesc: A humanoid figure trapped in stone seems alive.

mobShortDesc: The Ice Bandit strikes cold fear in your heart.
mobLongDesc: A humanoid figure encased in ice but still apparently alive.

mobShortDesc: The Magneto considers zapping you for the heck of it.
mobLongDesc: A humanoid figure seems to be trapped in the field of magnetism.
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST

mobShortDesc: The Blue Flame burns mysteriously here.
mobLongDesc: As you look, you see what seems to be a face and almost a humanoid figure somehow trapped in the fire.

mobShortDesc: A large eddie current swirls junk around here.
mobLongDesc: The magical eddie current is a manifestation of air elemental.

mobShortDesc: A large dust cloud is swirling around the room.
mobLongDesc: The magical dust cloud is a cross between air and earth.

mobShortDesc: An oversized particle.
mobLongDesc: The magical manifestation of energy.

mobShortDesc: The air is magically misty here.
mobLongDesc: The magical mist is a cross between water and air.

mobShortDesc: A huge mud monster slops around.
mobLongDesc: The magical mud monster is a cross between water and earth.

mobShortDesc: A huge lava beast spews from place to place.
mobLongDesc: The magical lava beast is a cross between fire and earth.

mobShortDesc: A large blob of acid eats away at the stone aimlessly.
mobLongDesc: The magical blob of acid is a cross between lightning and water.

mobShortDesc: A large spark of electricity crackles here.
mobLongDesc: Zipping from place to place at the speed of light is tough work.
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST

mobShortDesc: A large boulder.
mobLongDesc: It seems to be a living boulder!

mobShortDesc: A frozen, snowflake, water elemental.
mobLongDesc: It looks a little blue.

mobShortDesc: A large flickering flame elemental is here.
mobLongDesc: It smolders along the grass aimlessly

mobShortDesc: A large puddle of water elemental.
mobLongDesc: It trickles along the ground and gets your feet wet.

mobShortDesc: The Ruler of the Water elementals.
mobLongDesc: As you look at him he changes to mist, which swirls around you.  Just as you get scared, it reforms into elemental form.

mobShortDesc: The Ruler of the Lightning elementals.
mobLongDesc: As you examine him there is a blinding, flash of light followed by a deafening boom!  You rub the spots from your, and as you finish you see the ruler standing over you...grinning.

mobShortDesc: The Ruler of the Earth elementals stands before you.
mobLongDesc: He looks as old as the earth itself. He seems to know all the knowledge and secrets of the Earth. You can't really tell where he begins and the rock wall ends.
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST

mobShortDesc: A substantial elemental power blows by.
mobLongDesc: A substantial elemental, a resident of the canyon.

mobShortDesc: A gargantuan-sized elemental presence can be felt here.
mobLongDesc: A gargantuan elemental, a resident of the canyon.

mobShortDesc: A hulking, rather non-descript elemental thing wanders about.
mobLongDesc: A hulking elemental, it's an odd looking thing.  What is it really?

mobShortDesc: The Elemental Guardian of the canyon.
mobLongDesc: You can't tell which kind of elemental it is, maybe it's a bit of all of them?
attackType: KICK PUNCH SPELL SKILL SPELL SKILL SPELL SKILL SPELL SKILL

mobShortDesc: A colossal elemental form wanders about.
mobLongDesc: Rather large for an elemental form, Its presence is quite unsettling.
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST

mobShortDesc: A huge cyclops snarls at you hungrily!
mobLongDesc: This huge cyclops must be the finest specimen anywhere. He towers well above you, and his bulging muscles are truly impressive. The cyclops seems to be rather hungry. I wonder what it likes to eat?

mobShortDesc: A muscular mountain goat carefully makes its way along the mountain.
mobLongDesc: You are able to clearly make out large well-defined muscles on the abnormally large goat.

mobShortDesc: A three eyed winged creature with a body the size of a horse is here.
mobLongDesc: The creature's head is covered with short horns. It has a long snout with hard ridges, and powerful jaws that look like they could shear through an arm. The creature has a long, graceful neck, and a long, thin tail. The winged beast is wrapped in leathery gray skin.

mobShortDesc: A three eyed winged creature with a body the size of a horse is here.
mobLongDesc: The creature's head is covered with short horns. It has a long snout with hard ridges, and powerful jaws that look like they could shear through an arm. The creature has a long, graceful neck, and a long, thin tail. The winged beast is wrapped in leathery gray skin.

mobShortDesc: A terrifying Mountainous Grolem is here, staring at you intently.
mobLongDesc: a Mountainous Grolem towers above you. The beast has knobby, hairless gray-green skin, and is roughly the size of an elephant. The massive creature has three eyes, large claws, and a massive beak. When walking the Grolem waddles awkwardly on it's four powerful legs, but it can lunge quickly at anything that gets too close.

mobShortDesc: An Enormous Grolem is here, awkwardly waddling in your direction.
mobLongDesc: The Grolem has knobby, hairless, gray-green skin, and is roughly the size of a large bear. The creature has three eyes, large claws, and a massive beak. When walking, the beast waddles awkwardly on it's four powerful legs, but it can lunge quickly at anything that gets too close.

mobShortDesc: A Massive Grolem is here, barking loudly to the others.
mobLongDesc: The Grolem has knobby, hairless, gray-green skin, and is roughly the size of a large bear. The creature has three eyes, large claws, and a massive beak. When walking, the beast waddles awkwardly on it's four powerful legs, but it can lunge quickly at anything that gets too close.

mobShortDesc: Sidhon stands here, fingering the pommel of his longsword.
mobLongDesc: Sidhon stands over seven feet tall, with sharp, graceful features. His grey eyes are clear and striking, and his long blonde hair is tied up in a bun.  He wears light leather armor, and walks with an easy saunter that belies great agility.  His simple yew bow seems to be in pristine condition, but the pommel of his sword is well worn.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE PROTECT-EVIL INFRAVISION DODGE DUAL
mobImmune: PUMMEL SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS BACKSTAB AMBUSH

mobShortDesc: An Animated Tree attacks you by swinging it's branches.
mobLongDesc: This tree has risen from the ground to walk on its roots. With each step, it appears to be closing in on you. With a swing of one of it's branches, you feel a harsh breeze over your head and prepare to leave, or be attacked by this ornery tree.

mobShortDesc: An Elven Beastmaster is resting his body after a hard day of hunting.
mobLongDesc: Long silvery hair covers the sleeping face, but the stature of his muscular body hints of the explosive strength lying within his frame. Definitively a terrible opponent for any man, when awake. Obviously, hunting monsters pays off.

mobShortDesc: A blood thirsty piranha is eagerly trying to bite your leg off.
mobLongDesc: This small fish seems to be nothing but teeth, sharp and vicious teeth. The whole 10" body is silvery in color and has a saw-edged belly. Those teeth close in a scissor-bite dangerously close to your feet.

mobShortDesc: A treeant wavers here as it attempts to look like a tree.
mobLongDesc: You are looking at a tree. No, wait! The tree limbs start moving and a face appears in the middle of the trunk. The "skin" is a thick, textured, brown bark. It says, 'Leave my trees in peace!' with a frown.

mobShortDesc: A small mole is burrowing its way through the soil.
mobLongDesc: A small mole has just stuck it's head above ground and is looking at you curiously. The light glistens off its black upon black eyes. Brown, smooth fur envelopes the body of this mole, as the dirt masks it in a dull sheen.

mobShortDesc: An innocent looking elven child is playing with her friends.
mobLongDesc: This little elven girl is always ready for some innocent mischief when the protective eye of her mother slips away. No matter how wild'n'playful, this child is polite and kind to her fellow elves. Strawberry locks of red hair twist and curl around her elven face.

mobShortDesc: An Elven Woman watches over her children while they play.
mobLongDesc: Sitting in front of a hut, on a small bench, an elven woman has a look of peace and restfulness on her face. The playing of her children obviously brings joy to her. The light from through the trees plays and dances on her face, just as her children do in the garden. The light in her eyes twinkles and sparkles with the motion of light.

mobShortDesc: A black, sticky lump rests heavily on the floor.
mobLongDesc: The Black Pudding is a 8 feet wide lump of black sticky substance. When it occasionally moves, the floor sizzles underneath it. Small ripples go through the "body" of the pudding, sending tiny lumps of it around itself.

mobShortDesc: A small, fuzzy squirrel skitters from branch to branch nearby.
mobLongDesc: This small, happy-looking squirrel is hopping in the trees, from branch to branch. Every now and again, it stops to chew on a nut. Tiny black eyes evaluate you from a distance as it lets loose a loud chirping bark.

mobShortDesc: A huge owlbear snaps it's beak at you menacingly.
mobLongDesc: A huge owlbear is perched in front of you. You can sense it's power, in the raw strength embodied in it's gigantic paws. Sleek feathers cascade down its back. A tiny glint sparks in its eyes as it snaps it's beak at you in warning.

mobShortDesc: A sleek and beautiful black panther is pacing back and forth.
mobLongDesc: Never before have you seen such a wonderful beast. Truly, the cat's sleek muscles and graceful movements define it as a silent hunter of the night. Emerald green eyes shift back and forth, as though looking for it's next meal.

mobShortDesc: An Elven Alchemist pulls his cart along as he sells his potions and scrolls.
mobLongDesc: This elven alchemist looks very powerful. He points at the sign on his cart and says, 'Take a look at that.' Then he peeks into a cabinet and picks out some potions and scrolls to replace the previous ones he sold. With a smile and a nod, he puts out some more of them on the shelf.
affectedByFlags: SANCTUARY PROTECT-EVIL DODGE INVUL DUAL FURY

mobShortDesc: An Elven Gardenkeeper is digging a hole to plant yet another tree.
mobLongDesc: A young, handsome elf, looking fairly strong and able-bodied, is putting his shovel to the best possible. With a wheelbarrow full of seedlings, he definitely has plans of digging a hole for the newborn trees. Brown curls frame his elven face. A tiny droplet of sweat wiggles down his nose, watering the hole he has just finished.

mobShortDesc: An Elven Gardenkeeper is tending to her flowers and bulbs.
mobLongDesc: A beautiful young elven lady is looking after the flowers in the garden. She whispers something to them, and they immediately grow stronger, as well as bigger. She kisses each one on the petal, before moving to the next. Her golden hair is tied back away from her face with a vine from the local foliage.

mobShortDesc: An Elven Sage stands browsing through some ancient tomes.
mobLongDesc: This sage is absolutely the oldest elf you have ever seen. She is spending her time browsing through the huge tomes and scrolls, with vigor and enthusiasm like there would be no tomorrow. Tiny wooden spectacles sit on her dainty nose. The tomes of knowledge here are so large, they hide you from her vision, thus she doesn't notice you at first.

mobShortDesc: An village guard is stands here, looking very alert.
mobLongDesc: An elven guard is here just as a precaution, not to persecute you or slay you for the tiniest offence. His thick chainmail covers him well, leaving no part of his torso uncovered. With the glint of a smile, he reminds you that, regardless of his position here, mind your manners.

mobShortDesc: The Elven Druid is sitting on a large wooden bench, grinding something together.
mobLongDesc: This Druid is grinding many kind of seeds with a grinding stone. The dust has all the colors you can find in a forest, and then some. A small wisp of hair has fallen across her face. Her hands look worn and smooth, almost like that of a water stone.

mobShortDesc: An Elven Druid is here, gathering seeds from strange plants.
mobLongDesc: This Druid is busy with preparing to tonight's ceremony by gathering the seeds of several different plants. The olive tint of his skin radiates life. Although he looks no older then an average adult, his eyes speak volumes of words, showing the true age of this elf.

mobShortDesc: The Elven Archdruid is walking back and forth, tending to the plants.
mobLongDesc: The Archdruid looks old, which is uncommon for elves. Wisdom unattainable for us short-lived humans, is visible in her eyes. Her main concern seems to be the surrounding nature's welfare.

mobShortDesc: A giant endaredichon is here, stamping its huge legs on the grass.
mobLongDesc: This is a very large and ponderous beast not found native to any other land outside of Emithoynarthe.  It looks pleasant enough and does not seem to mind the presence of other creatures.  However, it looks like it could be very dangerous in a fight if it were angered or disturbed in a violent way.

mobShortDesc: An Endmed is here grazing, not seeming to pay any heed to its surroundings.
mobLongDesc: Endmeds are large creatures that walk about on four legs and consume everything in their path like a living vacuum.  Its mouth spends much of the time almost buried into the ground, rooting for the choicest parts of plants to eat as it grazes. Its eyes look about lazily, never seeming to be very concerned about its surroundings or any possibility of danger.

mobShortDesc: A cute little taraun moves about, grazing on the abundant vegetation.
mobLongDesc: This is a cute little animal that would do nicely as a pet.  Although tarauns have quite the temper when angered, they tend to stay to themselves and graze quietly unless disturbed.  They move about quickly and quietly and seem to be focused on devouring every tasty morsel they can find.

mobShortDesc: The Tower Observer moves about, performing his daily tasks.
mobLongDesc: The Tower Observer is a very old man that moves about slowly and deliberately but with an undeniable grace.  It is his duty to make note of all that goes on within the lands of Emithoynarthe and to chronicle the activity in an immense tome.  His robes are plain and old-looking, though they are in very good condition and show no sign of wear or discoloration.  A stark contrast to the drabness of his robes is his bright red cloak that he wears proudly upon his stooped shoulders.  His eyes gleam with the magical light and intensity of the war-mage that he must have been in his youth.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-ALIGNMENT DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY SPHERE PROTECT-EVIL INFRAVISION FLY INVUL DUAL
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST
attackTarget: SELF RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP
attackSpell: miracle iceball lethal_fire firebreath frost_bolt meteor

mobKeywords: creature large hideous mutated rat yeti human
mobShortDesc: A large, hideously mutated creature shambles about, seeking fresh prey.
mobLongDesc: Yuck!  This must be one of the most disgusting and deformed creatures that ever was.  It appears to be a mix between a large rat, a yeti and a human or some other similar being.  It is hard to imagine this thing ever looking like a human, except that its eyes seem to be nearly unchanged from those of a man's. Is this perhaps a long-lost adventurer that fell into a deep dark place and was lost to the world outside?  If such deformity like this could happen to anyone, might it be wise to stay away from wherever this thing came from?  The creature makes many guttural and disgusting sounds as it moves about in its trundling way.

mobShortDesc: A large mutated rat crawls around here, looking mighty dangerous.
mobLongDesc: This is a larger and much more developed version of a rat, though the fact that it was once ever a rat is hard to discern.  A large and deformed ear grows on its back and it is entirely lacking regular ears of its own.  The creature has large eyes which are located at unusual and misalignment parts of its head. The nose is very over-developed and droops at the tip.  However its teeth look very sharp and pointy and dangerous indeed.  The beast looks hungry and ready to nip at anything that gets too close.

mobShortDesc: A mutated Rat crawls around here, looking deformed and ugly.
mobLongDesc: This was once a rat, though its lineage is hard to make out now.  A large and deformed ear grows on its back and it is entirely lacking regular ears of its own.  The creature has large eyes which are located at unusual and misalignment parts of its head.  The nose is very over-developed and droops at the tip. However its teeth look very sharp and pointy and dangerous indeed.  The beast looks hungry and ready to nip at anything that gets too close.

mobShortDesc: A nasty sea turtle walks around here, seeking a suitable place to rest.
mobLongDesc: This is a giant sea-dwelling turtle and it is quite large and dangerous.  It would be unwise to step in its path as it may not like it.  These turtles are known to attack full-grown men and devour them when they are hungry or in the mood to devour flesh and hear their victims scream in agony.

mobShortDesc: The Ship's Ghost floats about here, encircled by his loyal albatross friends.
mobLongDesc: This is the ghost of one of the prisoners that was held in captivity on the old ship that it now haunts.  He was captured and wrongly accused of killing an albatross, though in actuality he loved the birds dearly.  He died in captivity because of mistreatment and lack of food and returned as a ghost to haunt the pirate's ship for all eternity.  He killed the entire crew by summoning a storm that washed them all to sea and grounded the ship, though did not destroy it. The albatross' love him for putting an end to the misdeeds of the captain and he now has the power to summon them in times of need.
mobImmune: POISON PUMMEL SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DRAIN DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE SUMMON PIERCE STING BACKSTAB

mobName: The Mighty King of Ancient Emithoynarthe
mobShortDesc: The Mighty King of Ancient Emithoynarthe stands here, lusting for intruders to kill!
mobLongDesc: Emithoynarthe, the Ancient King of the Golden Empire stands tall and proud, dressed in his battle armor and flowing cape.  He is an enormous man, standing over seven feet tall and built entirely of muscle.  His long raven-black hair hangs from beneath the golden crown that he wears upon his solemn head.  His armor and weapons look dangerous and powerful indeed, but the true measure of his might is contained within his eyes.  The dark-green orbs flicker with an internal light that seems to be the reflection of some flame that burns within him.  He gazes around, surveying all that he owns and controls, making sure to seek out and destroy anything that does not belong to him.  The Lord of the Land is not a forgiving man.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-ALIGNMENT DETECT-INVISIBLE DETECT-MAGIC SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY SPHERE PROTECT-EVIL INFRAVISION STATUE DODGE PROTECT-GOOD INVUL DUAL
mobImmune: FIRE ELECTRIC POISON PUMMEL KICK PUNCH SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DRAIN CLAIR SUMMON BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT
attackType: SPELL CAST PUNCH SPELL CAST PUMMEL

mobShortDesc: The Guard of the Gates stands here, guarding his master from intruders.
mobLongDesc: A giant of a man is in charge of guarding the Great Gates of Emithoynarthe and is the personal bodyguard of the King.  He wears a heavy steel helmet upon his head and a set of blue-colored chain mail, scared by many battles, over his sturdy shoulders.  His boots are solid and well-worn, covered in dust as though he has not moved from this spot in a very long time.  He knows no fear and has slain countless men that have dared to challenge him.  His sword gleams in the light and reflects its newly-sharpened image to any that gaze upon it.  It is this man's duty to slay all that get in his way.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-ALIGNMENT DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY PROTECT-EVIL INFRAVISION DODGE PROTECT-GOOD INVUL DUAL

mobShortDesc: The Guardian of the Gateway is here, keeping the unworthy from passing.
mobLongDesc: The Guardian of the Gateway wears a full crimson robe that covers all of the body that you assume him to have. His arms are folded before him with his hands hidden by the baggy sleeves. The hem of the robe reaches the ground, but doesn't look at all soiled. He towers over you by a few feet. You can't tell by looking at him and the surroundings if he just got here or if he has been standing here for a thousand years.

mobShortDesc: Pan, the god of the forest, stands here playing a melody on his flute.
mobLongDesc: Pan is the god of the forest. He protects the delicate balance of all the plants and creatures. He is a satyr himself, a man's torso on a goat's body, and he loves to stand on the bank of this mystical lake and play melodies on his special flute.
affectedByFlags: SPHERE PROTECT-EVIL INFRAVISION DODGE SNEAK DUAL

mobShortDesc: A small rabbit is peeking out at you from under a shrub.
mobLongDesc: He is a small, grayish rabbit with both ears raised alertly. His nose twitches intermittently as he sizes you up as friend or foe.

mobShortDesc: Nyla the Nymph is floating about the forest, humming a sweet tune.
mobLongDesc: Nyla is one of the many forest nymphs. The Nymphs are miniscule fairies who strive to protect the forest and the natural balance that exists in it. Nyla is the only fairy trusting enough to allow herself to be seen by mortals, while the rest of her kind hide in their natural environment. She has tiny translucent wings, a bright pinkish skin tone, and bright yellow hair. She is wearing a tiny jeweled dress and matching tiara. She smiles at you brightly and continues on her way, humming merrily.

mobShortDesc: A wild deer stops grazing and eyes you suspiciously
mobLongDesc: This is a fully matured doe. She is very sleek and slender and without a scar or blemish. She appears to be doing very well in this forest area.

mobShortDesc: A minotaur stomps wildly, shaking the very ground you walk on.
mobLongDesc: This creature is very powerful and intimidating. It has a bull's head atop the very large and strong body of a man. It stomps wildly on the ground causing the earth to tremble. Minotaur's are very territorial and very easily angered. They are widely feared by mortal men and rumored to be the cause of most earthquakes.

mobShortDesc: A satyr shyly hides from you in a bush nearby.
mobLongDesc: From the waist down this amazing creature is a goat. Above the waist he is a very shy, kind and gentle man. Satyrs are lovers of the forest who guard it's safety with their lives. They are held by the people as symbols of peace and good fortune.
affectedByFlags: INVISIBLE PROTECT-EVIL INFRAVISION DODGE SNEAK HIDE DUAL

mobShortDesc: A centaur is stomping proudly here, not taking notice to your presence.
mobLongDesc: This mystical creature has the torso of a man on top of a complete horses body. He strides around on all four hooves and watches over the smaller forest creatures. Many centaurs were troublemakers and gave the breed a reputation for disorderly conduct. They got drunk, kidnapped maidens and started fights. Even so, people consider centaurs to be a symbol of all that is good and right in the world. Although they are hidden from they untrained eye, centaurs don't hide from people. When you spot and approach him he stays standing stout and proud.
affectedByFlags: PROTECT-EVIL INFRAVISION DODGE SNEAK HIDE DUAL

mobShortDesc: A surly rooster crows loudly while clawing the ground angrily.
mobLongDesc: Capped by a bright red comb and wattle, this young cockerel appears to be a trained fighter. There's a possibility that Elago has begun dangerous and diabolical experiments on this aggressive bird. If so, lord help whosoever encounters it once Elago's hand has tainted its behavior with his demented alchemy.

mobShortDesc: A chubby enfan rushes about, his chef's hat teetering as he runs.
mobLongDesc: A puff-cheeked enfan's smile shines through a flour-spattered face. Clad in a blue-green plaid apron and a stained chef's hat, this tubby enfan is the mastermind behind all of the bakery's delights. Clearly he taste-tests the merchandise himself, since his figure is much more robust than the average enfan. It also seems that he is sporting a loaf of banana bread as shoes...

mobShortDesc: After shuffling, an enfan with a visor deals cards to the table.
mobLongDesc: The rake in Jarve's casino is a considerable tax on the play judging by the quality of dress which the dealer is afforded. Dressed in a neatly pressed frilly shirt, and a smooth-cut pair of silk pants, he exudes style. Marked by the traditional attire of a dealer - a red garter on his left sleeve, and a slightly tinted visor - he sits comfortably at the table slowly raking in significant percentages of every pot.

mobShortDesc: A gambler wearing two shirts and a smug grin, plays with his chips.
mobLongDesc: With a gem-encrusted belt, and a silk cloak wrapped around his shoulders, this gambler must surely be winning incredible sums of money. Some of the stacks of chips in front of him look to be shoulder-high to a halfling. He fastidiously counts his money over and over again as if worried it will have walked away when he wasn't paying attention.

mobShortDesc: A gambler lacking a shirt pounds his fists on the table.
mobLongDesc: Shirtless, and from the looks of things, soon to be pantless as well, this unfortunate gambler has had a turn of bad luck. His face is hidden behind his hands, unable to bring himself to watch as the cards are dealt. It stands to reason that he is still here only because he can't afford to get anywhere with what he has left. Under his breath he mutters about "One last long shot" and how that will bring him back into the good graces of Lady Luck.

mobShortDesc: Cloaked in green, an elven tourist wanders the city streets.
mobLongDesc: A pointy-eared, young face peers back at you from beneath a green hat. Wearing a tunic and a brilliant forest-green cloak he tours the streets of Orshingal. On his belt he has a thin scabbard with a short but fierce-looking sword.

mobShortDesc: A flaming effigy swirls around, phasing in and out of corporeal form.
mobLongDesc: Flames swirl and twist constantly, briefly forming corporeal features of a horned, firey daemon. The room seems to swell and boil as the daemon flexes its grotesque form. Summoned from the depths of hell, this horror of the underworld came into being through the dark magic of the pagan Enfans of olde. As far as you can tell,

mobShortDesc: A cute receptionist whistles as she happily sorts stacks of papers.
mobLongDesc: A beautiful young enfan smiles confidently back at you. She has been welcoming personal guests of the mayor's and tourists, travellers, and adventurers to Orshingal for some time, yet still she seems excited by every new face to come through her door. In her time here she's had to deal with all manner of troublemakers, and her features reveal at least remedial combat training.

mobShortDesc: An awkwardly large mouse plods around here, unsure of his surroundings.
mobLongDesc: The potion used by Elago to enlarge this poor rodent lacked the purity of elvish concoctions, which has caused the mouse's features to be strangely disproportional to its original stature. The abrupt change in scenery has startled and alarmed the mouse, coupled with the potion's attitudinal ingredients it has left the furry rodent bubbling with fury. He grinds his now enormous teeth grind loudly together as he rhythmically slams his tail against the wooden floorboards.

mobShortDesc: A crazed enfan mutters to himself while fumbling with some vials.
mobLongDesc: Clad in a make-shift jacket made from an old throw-rug, this enfan appears to have been awake for weeks. A look of fierce intensity fills his eyes with wariness and rage. His hair is a tangled mess of Gordian proportions. Beakers and vials of multi- colored potions stick out of pockets which seem to cover his entire jacket.

mobShortDesc: Withered by his possession, the dark priest utters incantations quietly.
mobLongDesc: Consumed by the hatred of the gods he once worshipped, this dark priest has become possessed by the forces of darkness. Although the curse has kept him alive for centuries, his soul has died, leaving nothing but a vacant hole which has filled with despair over time. He is an aberration, disfigured by evil and consumed by hatred, his only wish is to condemn others to the life he leads.

mobShortDesc: Eternally cursed, this misty spirit haunts the underground library.
mobLongDesc: Wispy trails of a gloomy mist form the ethereal shape of an enfan. Centuries old, cursed by the very gods they worshipped, these sorrowful souls long for a release from their misery.
mobImmune: PUMMEL KICK PUNCH BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT

mobShortDesc: Mumbling incoherently to himself, a very drunk dwarf pounds another ale.
mobLongDesc: This poor dwarf must have been in here a while, judging from all the empty mugs at his table. He barely has the strength to keep his head up as he wavers back and forth with each small movement. The somewhat humorous sight of the dwarf chatting to himself as he pours ale down the front of his beard brings a smile to your face.

mobKeywords: fyona wife barkeep tender bar bartender
mobShortDesc: Fyona the barkeep scrubs some mugs clean while tending the bar.
mobLongDesc: A gorgeous enfan stares at you through the bottom of a glass mug as she checks its cleanliness. Fyona, Jarve's wife, runs their bar, in many cases, with an iron fist. After years of dealing with troublesome adventurers pumped full of too much ale, she's become a rather battle-hardened enfan.

mobShortDesc: Walking about solemnly, an enfan priest studies some ancient texts.
mobLongDesc: Wrapped in a silky white robe with intricate embroidery, this devoted enfan focuses his attention on the pages of the book in his hands. This particular enfan has dedicated his life to the church, and looks after the chapel night and day, always wary of evil and its followers. Although he has a slightly more serious look on his face, you still detect a hint of a smile beneath his purposeful gaze. As he walks, he basks in the warmth of a holy aura surrounding his body and soul.
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST

mobShortDesc: Peering around curiously, looking lost, a star-nosed mole pouts.
mobLongDesc: Matted fur with clumps of dirt cover the entire mole's body. Although seemingly harmless, the claw marks on the wall indicate a more ferocious beast than a quick glance might reveal. The mole seems ambivalent to your presence in his burrow, and continues to wallow in despair.

mobShortDesc: Running around playfully, a child narrowly avoids being stepped on.
mobLongDesc: A small enfan child smiles widely at you, regarding you as he does all the tourists and travellers that frequent Orshingal. Although clearly a young teen, his face looks remarkably baby like which must be some characteristic of enfan youth.

mobShortDesc: A rather important looking enfan rests comfortably in his chair.
mobLongDesc: Resting comfortably in a fluffy chair at his desk, the mayor sits authoritatively doing absolutely nothing. Despite being relatively lazy, he has done wonderful things for the city of Orshingal, and all enfans. As the son of the previous mayor, he is expected to continue the lineage and bear a child to take his place. For now though, he seems healthy and happy as he governs the enfans. Although the mayor is considerably older and wiser than most, it does not show in his face, or stature. Like all enfans he is constantly smiling and has young, childish features. Noticing your presence, he nods his head in welcome.

mobKeywords: jarve enfan owner jovial restauranteur restaurant
mobShortDesc: A jovial enfan strolls around his restaurant greeting customers.
mobLongDesc: Jarve's portly belly sticks out from beneath his tight, simple clothing. Slightly over-sized for an enfan, Jarve doubles as not only the owner of his restaurant but also as the bouncer. His rumbling laughter shakes the furniture in the room. He welcomes any and all visitors to his restaurant, passed down through his family for ages.

mobShortDesc: The warlock toils with the magical creations sold at this shop.
mobLongDesc: Cloaked in the loose-fitting robes of a magician, the warlock shuffles across the wooden floor methodically. This mystical enfan's eyes are hidden within the shadow from his sorcerer's cap, but his welcoming voice bellows from deep in his belly. Although seemingly aloof at times, the warlock is renowned throughout the land for his friendly services and his ardent dedication to his craft.

mobShortDesc: The Enfan Baker urges customers to purchase some of his goods.
mobLongDesc: Significantly more robust than the average enfan, the baker has obviously had his fair share of his tasty treats. Cheerful and welcoming, he smiles at every person that walks through the door in hopes of making yet another sale. He wears a remarkably clean apron, and a chef's hat perched atop his head, which waves about as he shuffles around behind the counter.

mobShortDesc: An attractive young enfan citizen is here, whistling to herself.
mobLongDesc: Sauntering through the streets on her casual daily walk, this attractive enfan smiles innocently at a passerby. She appears to be slightly taller than a halfling, except that she has a much gentler face and presence. She wears simple clothes and continues about her business without paying much attention to you.

mobShortDesc: An enfan citizen strolls happily about, enjoying his simple life.
mobLongDesc: This relatively petite humanoid wanders rather aimlessly but cheerfully through Ershteep. Wearing simple clothes and an amicable grin, he saunters about without a care in the world.

mobShortDesc: A powerful Enfan guard is here, protecting Orshingal.
mobLongDesc: The Enfan guard maintains an air of authority within Ershteep; even though enfans are known for their kindness, they tend to be very protective of Orshingal and one another. Resting on the Enfan guard's shoulders is a shirt of worn chainmail. With a pike in hand, he readily awaits any troublemakers. Despite his duty as a guard, he has the same welcoming face that all enfans seem to wear amiably.

mobShortDesc: a green vine waits amongst his brothers, seeking to grasp a victim in wake.
mobLongDesc: This green vine stretches from within the tunnel walls, trying to grasp you with it's fine green handle.  You try to avoid it's hold, but underestimate it's strength.  Now this overgrowth has a firm grip on your leg and the other grip around your mouth...
actionFlags: SENTINEL ISNPC AGGRESSIVE AGGEVIL AGGGOOD AGGNEUT

mobShortDesc: A Patrol Soldier is here, marching mechanically in single file.
mobLongDesc: A dark, shadowy figure lurks around here -- very aware of your presence and quickly moves into a well-rehearsed battle stance.

mobShortDesc: The patrol's darkmage stands here, preparing to cast his destructive spells.
mobLongDesc: A powerful wizard in drowish sense, but not as important as the female cleric, handmaiden of Dagoor -- this dangerous mage waits in silent gesture to casts his spells, grabbing at a spell book under his arm.
actionFlags: SENTINEL ISNPC AGGRESSIVE AGGCL AGGMU SHIELD

mobShortDesc: The patrol's cleric is here, chanting something under her breath.
mobLongDesc: Flanking behind the leader of the patrol, this priestess of Dagoor chants a few verses and waits for the right moment to unleash her fury.
affectedByFlags: SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY SPHERE INFRAVISION DODGE PROTECT-GOOD

attackSpell: heal harm flamestrike fear evil_word layhands hold recover_mana

mobShortDesc: The Leader of this Patrol is standing here, barking out orders.
mobLongDesc: Armed with a pair of weapons, this dark figure appears to be leading a drow patrol party around the city limits, making sure all is in order.  Apparently, he doesn't take your presence here as common and quickly screams out orders to his patrol...

mobShortDesc: A Dying Drider is lying here immobile and helpless.
mobLongDesc: This poor creature seems to have been cursed with bad luck twice over, not only was it damned to spent its days trapped in its abominable form, but it seems to have been caught in this passageway during the last cave-in. Its legs are hopelessly shattered beneath it, and its thorax split open wide, greenish fluids oozing from it, slowly ebbing away the pitiful creature's life. As you raise your blade to end its suffering, it tries to rasp out some words with its last breath.....

mobShortDesc: A disfigured form shambles into your walking path.
mobLongDesc: You lock stares into the eyes of darkness as it stares at you back...
affectedByFlags: DETECT-ALIGNMENT DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE INFRAVISION DODGE DUAL

mobShortDesc: a Huge, Scruffy-looking Koala Bear stands here, laughing heartily at you.
mobLongDesc: You laughed at the sight of a puny koala bear.  Are you laughing now?

mobShortDesc: The Titanic Mushroom-Stalk is here, standing tall.
mobLongDesc: Standing tall above you is the King of the Myconids.  He doesn't seem to notice your presence and goes about his business.  His height is impressive, and the way he just snapped that boulder in half is pretty impressive as well. He doesn't care for your entrance, just don't mess with him...
affectedByFlags: DETECT-ALIGNMENT DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY INFRAVISION DODGE DUAL

mobShortDesc: A disfigured form shambles into your walking path.
mobLongDesc: You lock stares into the eyes of darkness as it stares at you back...
affectedByFlags: DETECT-ALIGNMENT DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE INFRAVISION DODGE DUAL

mobShortDesc: A disfigured form shambles into your walking path.
mobLongDesc: You lock stares into the eyes of darkness as it stares at you back...

mobLongDesc: You lock stares into the eyes of darkness as it stares at you back...
affectedByFlags: DETECT-ALIGNMENT DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE INFRAVISION DODGE DUAL

mobShortDesc: A gnome warrior is here, poking his weapon into the skeletal remains.
mobLongDesc: Before you stands a proud gnome warrior.  He appears to be out of breath, but grinning mightily after slaying the last of the skeletal warriors.  He is a seasoned warrior and a veteran with the blade.

mobShortDesc: a skeletal form of a huge lizard lurks about in the water.
mobLongDesc: Made from all bone, this little thing has a bone to pick with you.

mobShortDesc: a skeletal form of a huge lizard lurks about in the water.
mobLongDesc: Made from all bone, this little thing has a bone to pick with you.
