mobShortDesc: a skeletal form of a huge lizard lurks about in the water.
mobLongDesc: Made from all bone, this little thing has a bone to pick with you.

mobShortDesc: a skeletal form of a huge lizard lurks about in the water.
mobLongDesc: Made from all bone, this little thing has a bone to pick with you.

mobShortDesc: a skeletal form of a huge lizard lurks about in the water.
mobLongDesc: Made from all bone, this little thing has a bone to pick with you.

mobShortDesc: The Arachnid Queen is resting upon her throne, basking in her power.
mobLongDesc: As you look into the face of a goddess, she looks back at you, with a vengeance.  Don't you know it's blasphemy to stare at such power before you die?  You can contemplate your mistakes now, as a stone figure.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY SPHERE INFRAVISION STATUE DODGE INVUL

mobShortDesc: a midget two-headed koala bear is roaming around here in her thin hula skirt.
mobLongDesc: Tugging on your leg is a cute koala bear in a hot pink skirt, asking you want some lemonade.  She carries a wooden tray full of drinks and wears a flower bonnet on her head.  Tripping over her own two feet, she quickly composes herself and giggles with a sly wink.

mobShortDesc: A slender drow female is here, red blazing a ruby red
mobLongDesc: Her red gaze is too much for you to resist as you look into her eyes and see a sad smile.  You drop your guard as you are mesmerized by her beauty, and turn to stone where you stand.  The sounds of your sword clanking on the floor is the last thing you hear...
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY SPHERE INFRAVISION STATUE DODGE PROTECT-GOOD INVUL

mobShortDesc: A Colossal Wyrm rests here, blood dripping from its jaw.
mobLongDesc: Twenty feet in diameter and grotesque in appearance, this huge body of a wyrm is a sight to behold.  You can feel the constant shifting of weight when it moves about, shaking the tunnels for miles.  It doesn't appear to have eyes of any kind, but it's jaws are quite sharp -- and if you don't move out of this lair anytime soon, you will be grinded up flesh under his jagged teeth.

mobShortDesc: A Denizen of the Lower Planes is standing here, flames scorching from his brow.
mobLongDesc: Before you stands a ten-armed flaring red demon with two sharp protruding horns. He is Glabrezu, the denizen summoned from the lower planes by Dagoor herself to protect this chamber from any unwanted intruders.  He complies with any wishes the Spider Goddess may want from him and sits here waiting for foolish victims that to stumble in.  His specialty is snapping off heads from torsos and eating their brains for dinner.

mobShortDesc: A Wyrm of the Deep roams around here, itching to devour some flesh.
mobLongDesc: You make out from what appears to be a grayish skinned wyrm, about 10 feet in diameter, dragging it's heavy body around -- constantly digging at the tunnel walls. It seems to ignore you and happily digs away at rock, however all those preconceptions are thrown out the window once it notices you.

mobShortDesc: A Huge, Muscular Drider roams around here, whip in hand.
mobLongDesc: Dagoor has appoint this fellow, Garaek as her overseer among the mists of the drider community.  He is a drider himself, muscular in frame and takes no sh*t from anyone.  If anyone tries anything to displease his queen, he will make sure that individual feels much pain, Garaek style.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY SPHERE INFRAVISION DODGE DUAL

mobShortDesc: A Carrion Crawler scurries around here, searching for disposed carcasses.
mobLongDesc: Feeding mainly upon rotting corpses, these carrion crawlers can be thought of as scavengers of the subterranean abode.  Unfortunately, when such food becomes scarce, these monstrous beings will not hesitate to attack and kill the living.  A fetid odor accompanies these beasts, followed quickly by the slender, writhing tentacles which lash out from the head to paralyze it's victims. Be wary of this creature and take caution to stay out of it's path.
actionFlags: SCAVENGER ISNPC AGGRESSIVE STAY-ZONE MEMORY AGGCO

mobShortDesc: An Eight-Legged Arachnid form shambles around, seeking to quench it's bloodlust.
mobLongDesc: These strange creatures have the head and torso of a drow and the legs and lower body of a giant spider.  Only Dagoor, the dark goddess, can create such abominations -- usually done for the sake of punishment of disloyalty, real or perceived. Because they live under Dagoor's displeasure, these driders are outcasts from their own communities and thus are forced to find home elsewhere.  Known to be violent and aggressive, they favor blood over all types of food, stalking their victims in relentless fashion.

mobShortDesc: Swirling into place is a purple haze, heeding the call of Dagoor.
mobLongDesc: Materializing before you as a wave of purple gas, this Yochlol takes form and heeds the call of it's master, the Spider Queen.  Armed with flailing tentacles and vicious razor-sharp teeth, this adversary from the outer planes is a formidable opponent.

mobShortDesc: A beautiful white-maned unicorn trots around here.
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.

mobShortDesc: A sleek, muscular panther paces about here.
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.

mobShortDesc: Stationed here is a slender drow elf, weapons drawn.
mobLongDesc: A glint of light flashes from this elfish descendant's eye, grinning at you with evil intent.  Once, dark elves were a part of the elven race which roamed the world's forests, but their selfish inclinations and fascination with the ways of evil caused a civil war amongst the elves.  Eventually, these drow elves were forced into the depths of the earth, and since then few have seen a dark elf. Hopefully you will live this encounter, for they are a merciless race.

mobShortDesc: A Huge Mushroom-Stalk shambles around here.
mobLongDesc: This mushroom walks around mindlessly and without any indication of contentment from life.  They are impressively huge however, towering a good 10 feet tall.  However, they seem a little green around the edges...
actionFlags: SCAVENGER ISNPC WIMPY MEMORY ARM SHIELD

mobShortDesc: A Spider roams around the entrance of this compound, seeking intruders.
mobLongDesc: Crawling around here is the appointed spider of this house.  Endowed with sharp fangs, eight legs and a savage attitude -- this spider guard wont give up his position of the gate.

mobShortDesc: A Spider roams around the entrance of this compound, seeking intruders.
mobLongDesc: Crawling around here is the appointed spider of this house.  Endowed with sharp fangs, eight legs and a savage attitude -- this spider guard wont give up his position of the gate.

mobShortDesc: The House Wizard of Yjarrm is sitting here, juggling balls of flame.
mobLongDesc: Only a small novice in the art of spellcasting, this so called wizard feverishly conducts his experiments, hoping to revolutionize the world...

mobShortDesc: A Spider roams around the entrance of this compound, seeking intruders.
mobLongDesc: Crawling around here is the appointed spider of this house.  Endowed with sharp fangs, eight legs and a savage attitude -- this spider guard wont give up his position of the gate.

mobShortDesc: A figure in the shadows examines you coolly, hands caressing a hidden weapon.
mobLongDesc: Hiding in the shadows, this slender drow elf studies you in the corner. However, in a short while reveals himself and wields his short-sword. Growling and waving his weapon dangerously, you back away.  Maybe you should reconsider fighting such a powerful foe.

mobShortDesc: From the shadows emerges a drow elf, weapons blazing a red hue.
mobLongDesc: Hiding his face in the dark, this looming figure marks your every move -- watching you with his innate ability of infravision.  He seems to be following you for some reason unknown and doing a good job, for you have not detected any trackers tagging behind.  Before completing your next thought, this dark elf draws his weapons and greets your with a snarl.

mobShortDesc: A Huge Lizard paces around here, diligently waiting for his master.
mobLongDesc: Green scaled and two sharp horns, this fine creature makes for a good riding mount in the underground.  He shows signs of intelligence as you into his eyes -- almost telling you to watch who you fight, for he seems confident in kicking your ass.

mobName: Statue of Dagoor the Arachnid Queen
mobShortDesc: [1] A Jade Statue of the Arachnid Queen looms here, guarding the city gates.
mobLongDesc: These animated stone constructs are guarding the border of their city. They might look and seem inanimate, but their sense are keen and can kill you if you try to pass through these gates.  They possess sharp-tipped mandibles and their saw-edged legs are studded with a magical treated jade. Their eyes look vacant and undisturbed, but in actually, they never stop moving, scanning the area for intruders and unwanted guests.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE PROTECT-EVIL INFRAVISION PROTECT-GOOD DUAL FURY

mobShortDesc: A Duergar Dwarf is here with his caravan, ready to move into city limits.
mobLongDesc: Before you stands a devious grinning dark dwarf, bring his wares into Eryndlyn looking for a market.  He knows that dealing with such a dangerous race is hazardous to his health, but worth the riches if he succeeds in selling his products.

mobShortDesc: A Towering Rock Elemental is here, watching over the gnomes.
mobLongDesc: Created from the ashes and rock of the earth, this elemental watches over the gnome camp from drow invaders.  Blue flames flashes from his eyes, arms crosses and standing tall -- this guardian looks very intimidating.

mobShortDesc: A deep gnome is standing here happily, mining the stone.
mobLongDesc: This deep gnome loves his art, and that art is mining the rock of these caverns. Completely hairless, this short creature of the dark is much in tune with the stone.  It is said that these gnomes have the power to call upon the powers of stone elements to aid them battle, especially with the drow city not far away from this location.  They are fearless fighters, though you cannot picture them as being violent.

mobShortDesc: a spider crawls along the floor here, pincers seeking blood.
mobLongDesc: They are nicknamed "soul spiders" because they are the servants of Dagoor summoned from her dark extraplanar domain by rituals of worship and supplication to the Spider Goddess.  They are tireless hunters, often discovering their own gates or portals to other planes.  Vicious and cruel in their attacks on weaker creatures, myrlochar act as though they are on a perpetual hunting and killing spree -- till they encounter an opponent strong enough to slay them.

mobShortDesc: A Spider roams around the entrance of this compound, seeking intruders.
mobLongDesc: Crawling around here is the appointed spider of this house.  Endowed with sharp fangs, eight legs and a savage attitude -- this spider guard wont give up his position of the gate.

mobShortDesc: The Leader of this Patrol is standing here, barking out orders.
mobLongDesc: Armed with a pair of weapons, this dark figure appears to be leading a drow patrol party around the city limits, making sure all is in order.  Apparently, he doesn't take your presence here as common and quickly screams out orders to his patrol...

mobShortDesc: A Drow Matron Mother rests here high upon her throne.
mobLongDesc: You are looking upon the eyes of the second ranked Matron mother of this city.  She is wise beyond her years and vast are her powers.  Zaboral-Hashal has seen much and will watch for her opportunity to move into the first rank.  Laughing diabolically, she knows her time will come when she will reign at the very top. Chaos rules this society, friendship and peace are irrelevant.

mobShortDesc: A Drow Matron Mother rests here high upon her throne.
mobLongDesc: You are looking upon the eyes of the fourth ranked Matron mother of this city.  Quehvar, a young matron mother by drow standards, has a hungry desire to move up in rank.  Known for her vicious fire in battle, she is also a persistent political figure in the drow ranks.  Most undoubtedly, we can expect high things in the future from this dark elf.

mobShortDesc: A Drow Matron Mother rests here high upon her throne.
mobLongDesc: You are looking upon the eyes of the third ranked Matron mother of this city.  Yjarrm, old, but a resourceful Matron mother, has been in the ranks of third for practically all of her existence.  Her house is well respected and has a nice complement of forces at her command.  However, Yjaarm has lost her fire and desire to fight -- a fault in her trait which could lead to her demise.

mobShortDesc: The patrol's darkmage stands here, preparing to cast his destructive spells.
mobLongDesc: A powerful wizard in drowish sense, but not as important as the female cleric, handmaiden of Dagoor -- this dangerous mage waits in silent gesture to casts his spells, grabbing at a spell book under his arm.
actionFlags: SENTINEL ISNPC AGGRESSIVE AGGCL AGGMU SHIELD
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST
attackTarget: RAN_GROUP BUFFER RAN_ROOM BUFFER BUFFER RAN_GROUP SELF RAN_ROOM SELF
attackSpell: poison colour_spray searing_orb vampiric_touch poison_smoke blindness_dust imp_invisibility death_spray recover_mana

mobShortDesc: The patrol's cleric is here, chanting something under her breath.
mobLongDesc: Flanking behind the leader of the patrol, this priestess of Dagoor chants a few verses and waits for the right moment to unleash her fury.
affectedByFlags: SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY SPHERE INFRAVISION DODGE PROTECT-GOOD
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST
attackTarget: GROUP RAN_GROUP RAN_ROOM BUFFER RAN_ROOM SELF RAN_GROUP SELF
attackSpell: heal harm flamestrike fear evil_word layhands hold recover_mana

mobShortDesc: A Patrol Soldier is here, marching mechanically in single file.
mobLongDesc: A dark, shadowy figure lurks around here -- very aware of your presence and quickly moves into a well-rehearsed battle stance.

mobShortDesc: A Goblin Slave wails in fear as you make your approach.
mobLongDesc: This pathetic goblin screams in horror as you approach him.  He tries to scurry away and thinks by hiding behind a rock that he is safe in this drowish community. You almost feel sorry for the thing, for slaves of any kind are whipping posts for its master.

mobShortDesc: A one-eyed, ten-tentacle monstrosity hovers before you, arms crossed.
mobLongDesc: Not much is known about the illithids, however, they are dangerous adversaries by reputation for they can easily control the weak-mined and naive.  They are known simply as the "mind-flayers" and they can destroy you with one thought. They stand about 6 feet tall, with hideous mauve skin that glistens with slime. The head is octopus-like with a single eye and ten dangling tentacles.  They are also known for their skill in magic and battle tactics.
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST

mobShortDesc: A Drow Matron Mother rests here high upon her throne.
mobLongDesc: This is the fabled matron mother of the first house of Eryndlyn.  She has been here since the dawn of the city's birth and looks as if she can withstand another major turn in the city's history.  Matron Tzjar-Fey looks to be tired, but strong in her ways of Dagoor.  She is 6 centuries old, but drow history records her younger than her actual age.  She sits on her throne, fuming and diabolical, wondering why intruders are in her private chambers.
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST

mobShortDesc: A Matron Mother of a lower house is here, screaming out orders.
mobLongDesc: Bellowing and screaming in rage, this matron mother does not look happy.  You have violated her house and now she will look to end your pitiful existence.

mobShortDesc: The Weaponmaster of Tzjar-Fey is here, crouched in a fighting stance.
mobLongDesc: Armed with dueling scimitars, this drow elf is extremely dangerous and carries the reputation of the best killer in his craft.  Scars and battle wounds cover his body, along with a muscular build and sharp eye which makes him most feared in the realm of the drow.  Snarling fiercely at you, he charges!

mobShortDesc: A drow donned in black robes is here, his hands outstretched.
mobLongDesc: Eyes closes and hands swirling in the air in silent trance, this drow elf is in the mists of casting a powerful spell.  Apparently, his job is to recharge the stone pillar in the center of town -- the time clock of the drow elves, and is not aware of any dangers surrounding him.  This is a routine trip by drow standards and only apprentices embark on this opportunity for practice.

mobShortDesc: A Drow Priestess is standing here, snarling in rage!
mobLongDesc: These dark elves are the daughters of the house's matron mother, and after decades of intensive discipline and training, they attain the ranks of priestess and high priestess of Dagoor.  In this matriarchal society, it is only the women who has the upper hand and it is they that are the more feared gender, for the females attain the more powerful spells under Dagoor's omnipotent guidance.

mobShortDesc: A Powerful Spellcaster stands here, deep in a trance.
mobLongDesc: A black hood draped over his face, this dark elf looks extremely dangerous and could very well kill you with a single word.  Levitating in mid air, he studies you calmly, trying to figure out how you got into his humble home.
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST

mobShortDesc: With a twirl of his cape, this drow elf reveals his concealed weapons.
mobLongDesc: This Drow elf isn't a commoner by any sense.  Raised in a powerful ranked house, this drow carries along a class which has importance in this city's hierarchy.  I'd beware if I were you, drow nobles are given the finest education in butchering 101.

mobShortDesc: a drow soldier walks around here, making his rounds.
mobLongDesc: Peering from above his perched Lizard mount, this drow rider does his routine runs about the city.  He is armed with a sharp dirk, and a cowl behind his hooded cloak.  His sight is keen and sharp, and always on the lookout for intruders.  He always checks over his shoulders for backstabbers and trots slowly with his lizard.

mobShortDesc: An Orc slave is standing here, cringing in fear at your approach.
mobLongDesc: This pathetic orc slave screams in horror as you approach him.  He tries to scurry away and thinks by hiding behind a rock that he is safe in this drowish community. You almost feel sorry for the thing, for slaves of any kind are whipping posts for its master.

mobShortDesc: The scaled Basilisk crawls towards you slowly.
mobLongDesc: The basilisk is a reptilian monster. It has eight legs, and a strong toothy jaws. It is dull brown with yellowish underbelly. It's eyes are glowing pale green.

mobShortDesc: The Guardian Naga looks kindly at you.
mobLongDesc: The naga are a snake-liked creature. She is covered in green-gold scale with silvery triangles along her back. Her eyes are golden. She notice that you look at her, and she says: 'Watch out. This way leads to some evil creatures'.

mobShortDesc: The Sea Hag is swimming around here
mobLongDesc: The sea hag is so ghastly looking that you fell's the deepest fear: Big yellow eyes and sharp teeth. Its ears are very big, and it have small sharp horns. This type of monsters are one of the greatest haters of beauty (Next after Medusa).

mobShortDesc: The Red fierce-looking dragon stares at you angrily
mobLongDesc: The red dragon stares at you, angrily, as it wakes when you arrives.  It says 'Oh, human YOU woke me up...Hsssss', while it moves closer ,'Can one NEVER sleep in peace..Hssss'.

mobShortDesc: Madam Esther is standing here, trying to sell dust.
mobLongDesc: She is very big standing here, smiling to you. She looks like the mother of the town, sometimes playing with the children, sometimes helping the old people, with their daily work. All this in spite of her own hard work.

mobShortDesc: The morkoth are standing here, waiting for someone to KILL!
mobLongDesc: It's a five feet tall, shadow monster. This has the shape between a human and a rat. It breaths very heavily, while it stares at you.

mobShortDesc: The chr-eff'n are crawling here, looking around with it's yellow eyes.
mobLongDesc: The head and torso of a chr-eff'n is copper-covered, with yellow ,glowing eyes. The lower body is in an orange shading.

mobShortDesc: The gnoll chieftain is here, howling with rage!!
mobLongDesc: This is the toughest looking gnoll you have ever seen.  He is huge. And his weapon's belt is loaded with scalps.  He must be favored by his evil gods.

mobShortDesc: A huge gnoll stands here picking his teeth.
mobLongDesc: Yep this is a gnoll.  You can tell because it looks like a humanoid jackal. Smells like one too.  Still, he looks pretty tough.

mobShortDesc: Stranger, the guardian of Ripper, has arrived and attacks!
mobLongDesc: Stranger is dressed in dark robes and a mask and hood.  You can not really make out his features.  But his sword looks deadly!  Have you considered leaving?

mobShortDesc: A rat is here getting crumbs off the floor.
mobLongDesc: Hey, it is a rat ok?  You know, small, black, little red eyes...

mobShortDesc: A fiery bushboogie is here plotting your death!
mobLongDesc: ARGH!!  You can not really see it closely, but you know it is composed of fire.  And you know it is fast.

mobShortDesc: A huge rat is here gnawing on old pizza crusts.
mobLongDesc: Ok.  It is a really big rat.  It is about the size of a saint-bernard!

mobShortDesc: A large Orc stands here, he has many battle scars.
mobLongDesc: This orc has seen lots of battles.  The number of his scars and the fact that he is here means he won lots of battles too.  Yep, he definitely looks tough.

mobShortDesc: Ripper, a huge statue, towers over you.
mobLongDesc: Ripper's eyes glow as you look at it.  It is truly the epitome of evil. And its face...  Just looking at it makes you rigid with fear.  Wait a second you are getting rigid but it is not from fear...  Maybe looking at Riper was not such a good idea.

mobShortDesc: An evil merchant is here ready for battle.
mobLongDesc: This is not your usual merchant.  This merchant is large, strong and looks like he has had to fight for a profit more than once.

mobShortDesc: An evil orc stands here, grinning at you.
mobLongDesc: An evil orc is grinning at you.  There are flecks of foam around his mouth. Maybe he is rabid.  Now isn't that a cheerful thought.  Running is always an option.

zoneName: Falme, Amador, Far Madding, Teleronriad, by Alexander
mobShortDesc: Lanfear is standing here.
mobLongDesc: She is incredibly beautiful and graceful. She has pale, smooth skin, long, black hair and eyes dark as night. She dresses in white with silver jewelry.

zoneName: Falme, Amador, Far Madding, Teleronriad, by Alexander
mobShortDesc: A large bestial animal is walking here.
mobLongDesc: Weighing in at three hundred to five hundred pounds, the grolm is the size of a large bear, only with the gray green coloration and skin texture of very tough frogs.

zoneName: Falme, Amador, Far Madding, Teleronriad, by Alexander
mobShortDesc: A suldam and domani is standing here, connected by a silver leash.
mobLongDesc: Two women, one in gray with a collar with a silver leash connection the woman to a bracelet on the other woman's wrist. The other woman is clad in white with a symbol of forked lightning on the dress.
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST

zoneName: Falme, Amador, Far Madding, Teleronriad, by Alexander
mobShortDesc: A raken is flying here.
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.

zoneName: Falme, Amador, Far Madding, Teleronriad, by Alexander
mobShortDesc: A seanchen captain  is commanding his soldiers.
mobLongDesc: The guard wears a shining breastplate with a symbol of a raven on the chest. The helmet looks very much like some monstrous insect's head, with thin red plumes like feelers, and the wearer seems to be peering out through mandibles.

zoneName: Falme, Amador, Far Madding, Teleronriad, by Alexander
mobShortDesc: A seanchen guard is patrolling here.
mobLongDesc: The guard wears a shining breastplate with a symbol of a raven on the chest.

zoneName: Falme, Amador, Far Madding, Teleronriad, by Alexander
mobShortDesc: Turak is standing here.
mobLongDesc: Turak is tall and hair dark eyes. His head is completely shaved and the first two fingernails of each hand are lacquered blue.

zoneName: Falme, Amador, Far Madding, Teleronriad, by Alexander
mobShortDesc: Bawler is standing by his desk, looking up at you as you come close.
mobLongDesc: The secretary wears a white shirt under his brown west. His hair is dark with streaks of grey. His eyes are large and blue. His eyes seems to notice everything around him.

zoneName: Falme, Amador, Far Madding, Teleronriad, by Alexander
mobShortDesc: A whitecloak is walking the hallway.
mobLongDesc: The whitecloak is wearing an armor polished to perfection with the sunburst of the children of the light on the breast. A snow white cloak hangs aroundhis shoulders.

zoneName: Falme, Amador, Far Madding, Teleronriad, by Alexander
mobShortDesc: Rhadam Asunawa is standing here.
mobLongDesc: Rhadam Asunawa is tall and graying with a gaunt face and deep-set eyes and thick gray eyebrows. He wears a snowy white cloak with only the red shepherd's crook of the questioners.

zoneName: Falme, Amador, Far Madding, Teleronriad, by Alexander
mobShortDesc: Padrion Niall is standing here.
mobLongDesc: Pedron Niall is all sinew and bone, with hair completely hair. He has dark eyes starring at you intently.

zoneName: Falme, Amador, Far Madding, Teleronriad, by Alexander
mobShortDesc: A gatekeeper is guarding the gate.
mobLongDesc: A large guard in shining armor is protecting the gate. He keeps a close eye on the people approaching the gate.

zoneName: Falme, Amador, Far Madding, Teleronriad, by Alexander
mobShortDesc: The citizen has a ragged brown cloak and worn boots. Living conditions are hard in a city and many citizens cant afford spending money on new clothes.
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.

zoneName: Falme, Amador, Far Madding, Teleronriad, by Alexander
mobShortDesc: A man with a dark cloak is walking here trying not to bee seen.
mobLongDesc: The man is wearing a dark cloak and tries to keep his face hidden. In the large crowd nobody seems to care about him, even if he seems glare at people passing by.

mobShortDesc: A gigantic, obese black locust lurches towards you here, mandibles dripping.
mobLongDesc: This foul insectoid is fully fifteen feet long, and over seven feet in diameter. Long antennae probe the darkness, and its legs are somehow peripheral. Black armored plates cover its rotund body and give it the aspect of some kind of demon. As a matter of fact, this can only be the legendary Brown Hell Locust, banished to caverns beneath the earth because of their gluttony.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY SPHERE PROTECT-EVIL INFRAVISION DODGE PROTECT-GOOD FLY DUAL FURY

mobShortDesc: A white beach lizard scuttles along here, almost invisible in the sand.
mobLongDesc: This tiny little lizard must live on whatever small insect happens to be foolish enough to land on the burning white sand of this beach. Almost perfectly camouflaged, you are hard-pressed to even be able to see this tiny lizard.

mobShortDesc: A burly little sea otter trundles along the beach here, leaving webby footprints.
mobLongDesc: This cute little fellow has a pudgy belly, long bristly whiskers, and a zen-like stare on its face. These creatures are generally considered holy by any civilized people because they are obviously connected with some higher plane. This is evidenced by this one's quick little chuckle and mad scratching at its ear.

mobShortDesc: A gigantic creature with eight tentacles swims about in the muck here.
mobLongDesc: A gigantic purplish blob of protoplasm, the only thing that gives this horrendous, filthy creature any definition are its eight tentacles, which radiate from the base of its massive body. Two gleaming yellow eyes stare at you blankly, the slit pupils sideways. You hear some kind of strange clacking sound from somewhere within this beast, and it doesn't sound pleasant.

mobShortDesc: A whirling cloud of dust flies around here.
mobLongDesc: A gigantic whirling cloud of dust and wind, this strange nether creature is probably what drove poor Yuri mad. Not the greatest sorcerer, the dumb alchemist somehow stumbled upon a way to summon an elemental far too powerful for his meagre skills.
mobImmune: FIRE ELECTRIC PUMMEL KICK PUNCH CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE SUMMON

mobShortDesc: A short madman wearing a long white coat putters about the lab.
mobLongDesc: A short man wearing a long white coat, this strange madman has grey hair which sticks out at odd angles all over his head. His eyes don't seem to be pointing in the same direction, and a constant stream of drool from his lower lip has encrusted on the lapels of his coat. He mutters something like "hurguk snepat" and bustles towards you with a beaker full of lizard organs in his hand.
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST
attackTarget: BUFFER BUFFER RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP SELF SELF
attackSpell: lightning_bolt dispel_sanctuary lethal_fire fireball sanctuary heal

mobShortDesc: A large red hunting spider scuttles about on the sand here.
mobLongDesc: This spider is fully two hands across, from leg-tip to leg-tip. Its multifaceted eyes look at you warily as you invade its domain, and you can see venom droplets on the tip of its large mandibles.

mobShortDesc: A gigantic spiked toad gazes at you from within the pool.
mobLongDesc: This is one of the largest amphibians you have ever seen, at least seven feet in length. It gazes at you with basilisk eyes from beneath a brow laden with long, horny spikes. Deep green skin pebbled with greyish lumps of horny armor and the odd patch of long spikes make this creature a disgusting and frightening apparition to behold.

mobShortDesc: A gigantic furry white bear shambles around here angrily.
mobLongDesc: Fully twelve feet long, this huge bear is completely white, from his nose to his stubby tail. Even the great beast's eyes are white, and the tongue and gums are a pale shade of blue. Probably hailing from the far north of the world, this creature has been tamed somehow and is entrapped in this tower for the sole purpose of guarding the secrets which lie above it.

mobShortDesc: A skeletal knight shambles towards you, armor clanking.
mobLongDesc: This strange creature is simply a human skeleton dressed up in a knight's armor and enchanted to defend this tower. Its eyes glow an odd yellowish color through the visor of its helm, and it approaches you with a single obvious purpose in mind: to expel you from this place at all costs. Oddly enough, you notice a dusting rag tucked into its belt.

mobShortDesc: A gigantic blob of fungus oozes towards you.
mobLongDesc: This awful thing has no visible sensory organs or even limbs. The only way to describe it is, well, as a blob. A fuzzy coating of pale green fungus covers it, except in a few spots where toadstools grow from the creature's body. It seems that somebody must have ensorcelled this once-benign accumulation of small fungal organisms into some kind of guard-beast!

mobShortDesc: A parrot-like bird perches here, its plumage a shifting red and orange.
mobLongDesc: As you gaze at this bird, you notice that its plumage is an amazingly strange, almost magical variety of reds. As hard as you stare, you cannot stop the pattern's semblance of movement. It almost looks as if this bird is on fire! This effect is aided by the tall crest of red feathers it raises and flutters on the top of its head.
attackType: SPELL SKILL SPELL SKILL SPELL SKILL

mobShortDesc: A large plant towers over you here, its fleshy maw gaping.
mobLongDesc: This foul creation is fully eight feet tall, with a bulbous "mouth" well over three feet in diameter. Small, vine-like fronds extend from various points on its trunk, and these wave slowly through the hot air. A small stream of sappy drool dribbles down from one side of the "mouth" as this thing senses your presence.

mobShortDesc: A gigantic red-rumped ape searches for grubs under the junk heap.
mobLongDesc: This giant simian has a red rear end and is covered entirely with short, bristly black fur. It has a very pronounced dog-like snout and long, pointed teeth. Its human-like hands are quite capable of clutching simple objects, but they are now busily engaged in scratching the aforementioned red rump.

mobShortDesc: A long yellow millipede scuttles surreally across the sand here.
mobLongDesc: This hideous insect is at least three feet in length, and glows with an unearthly light. Long pincer-mandibles clack loudly as it rushes towards you across the sand, its hundreds of legs scuttling like mad to create the effect of effortless gliding.

mobShortDesc: The Grand Poobah stands here, glaring about haughtily.
mobLongDesc: This young boy of about twelve years wears a tin badge on his chest which is inscribed with the words, "Thee Grannt Pewbah!!" This child is obviously the ruler of the children who dwell on the bluffs, and he actually wears a rusted iron gauntlet on his left hand. A long scar runs down his left cheek and his chest.

mobShortDesc: A lost child scavenges about here, eyeing you warily.
mobLongDesc: This young child wears rags and seaweed, and looks as though he hasn't bathed in years. Even though he is only a child, you suspect he's quite good at defending himself. After all, he seems to have lived outside of civilization for some time.

mobShortDesc: A cabin boy whistles a merry pirate tune while mopping up some vomit.
mobLongDesc: This silly little boy wears knickers and a white shirt, and cleans up after every mess the pirates make. However, when those pirates were stuck in the doldrums many years ago, they found another use for the cabin boy. His eyes go blank and he starts whimpering when poor little John Thomas remembers how he got to play "diseased whore" on the deck of the ship those years past....

mobShortDesc: The first mate of the lost pirates stands here, tapping his wooden leg.
mobLongDesc: This grumpy old pirate is the cleanest of the lot, his brass buttons shiny and his wooden leg recently refinished. He stands in the corner of this room and smokes his pipe, scowling at the antics of his captain's crew. He looks, well, very bored.

mobShortDesc: A lost pirate lies in a drunken stupor in a corner here.
mobLongDesc: Alcohol-laden grunts and snores erupt from this revolting piece of human refuse as he sleeps away a massive drinking spree. An eyepatch covers one of his eyes, and he scratches his belly with a tarnished silver hook which substitutes for one of his hands.

mobShortDesc: A lost pirate is singing badly and doing a mad jig here.
mobLongDesc: This disgusting old pirate cackles as you look at him, displaying a mouth full of black and rotting stumps. He wears tattered rags and a kerchief to cover his balding head. Simple gold and silver jewelry decorate his gigantic, veined red nose and his outrageously large ears. He does an extra-high leap to finish a complex step in his jig, and then breathes his filthy breath on you before continuing.

mobShortDesc: An old pirate captain hobbles about on his peg leg here, swearing.
mobLongDesc: From his eyepatch to his peg leg, this grizzled old sea-dog fits the picture-book image of a Pirate Captain. However, this poor fellow seems to have lost his ship and his bearings, as he has made himself a home on this desert beach. The skeleton of a parrot still clutches on to this grey-bearded man's epaulette, and the strange pirate seems to be talking to it.
attackType: SPELL SKILL PUMMEL SPELL CAST SPELL CAST DISARM KICK PUNCH
attackTarget: BUFFER BUFFER SELF SELF BUFFER BUFFER BUFFER

mobShortDesc: A lost sailor has made a home for himself here.
mobLongDesc: This sad old man makes his living off the detritus thrown off ships and brought to him by the currents of the ocean. He must be a bit daft, however, considering that civilization is so close.

mobShortDesc: A twisted dwarf stands here, fuming.
mobLongDesc: This twisted creature looks as if it has never seen the end of the stone age. A long black beard extends from its jaw to the ground, above the beard glitter two tiny black eyes. You see that its teeth have been sharpened somewhat as it opens its mouth. However, under all of this wild exterior you see that this creature is simply some kind of dwarf which has been twisted from its original roots to the strange beast-like thing you see before you.

mobShortDesc: A tiny sand flea hops about on the sand here.
mobLongDesc: This tiny creature looks almost antediluvian, some prehistoric monster shrunk down to a millionth of its size and placed on the beach here. However, all it is is a tiny little crustacean, easily crushed.

mobShortDesc: A fiddler crab waves it pincers rhythmically here.
mobLongDesc: A small crab with a greenish-blue body, the remarkable thing about this crab is the gigantic size difference between one pincer and the other. One of the pincers is minute and almost peripheral, while the other is huge in proportion to the rest of the creature. Always advancing with the large claw facing danger, this little crab is almost menacing.

mobShortDesc: A hermit crab scuttles about here, looking for food.
mobLongDesc: This tiny creature has made its dwelling within the shell of some poor conch. All that show from under the shell are two pincers, one larger than the other, and a pair of eyes on stalks. It scuttles sideways along the ground here, pausing occasionally to sniff at a clump of dried seaweed.

mobShortDesc: A waitress is standing here smiling broadly.
mobLongDesc: A bright smile beams on her cute face as she trips over her own feet. Giggling at her own bad luck, Beatrice straightens out her formal dress attire and proceeds to clean tables.

mobShortDesc: A waiter is here, making sure that you are enjoying your stay.
mobLongDesc: A full suit and a pair of thick glasses droop slightly over his nose, this clean-shaven man nods as if annoyed as he swiftly walks over and cleans the tables.  He works long, hard hours -- an expression of boredom is visible on his face, making you wonder if he deserves your tip or not.

mobShortDesc: A Restaurant Attendant sits here diligently waiting on your next order.
mobLongDesc: Dressed in a nicely pressed suit, this elegant looking attendant sits here casually blowing bubble gum.  She waits here impatiently for you to order something, but doesn't seen to care much because she gets paid whether or not you receive your food.

mobShortDesc: A huge bear of a man stands here with arms crossed, blocking your way.
mobLongDesc: A huge burly man stands tall before you, eyes gazing down trying to make you feel meek.  He is the bouncer of this luxurious establishment, guarding these doors making sure the right people go in and the wrong ones don't.  So don't mess with him, he looks like he has had a very bad day.

mobShortDesc: Your guardian is here taking care of the low level players.
A Red Fido is standing here.
mobLongDesc: It is a level 3 fido.

mobShortDesc: A Blue Fido is standing here.
mobLongDesc: It is a level 2 fido.

mobShortDesc: A Yellow Fido is standing here.
mobLongDesc: It is a level 1 fido.

mobShortDesc: A lazy looking chef is sitting here, tired from cooking meals.
mobLongDesc: This is a poor and overworked chef.  He spends most of his day around the kitchen, because someone actually pays him for it.  He looks tired and could use some rest, but if that happened, - Who would cook in this mansion?  Dressed in a floppy hat and holding a dirty kitchen knife, this chef is extremely worn out.

mobShortDesc: A giant pile of organic junk is lying here.
mobLongDesc: This monster looks as if it is completely composed of garbage, it has undoubtedly survived off whatever food scraps have been thrown it's way. For the most part it seems pretty docile.
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST
attackTarget: ROOM ROOM RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP
attackSpell: poison_smoke blindness_dust paralyze poison blindness sleep satiate

mobShortDesc: A giant wolf is chained here.
mobLongDesc: This wolf is about half the size of your average grizzly bear!

mobShortDesc: A wolf sized spider is standing here.
mobLongDesc: This spider is approximately the same size as your average wolf!

mobShortDesc: A mithril statue of a dwarf stand here, ready to pound his enemies into submission.
mobLongDesc: The mithril statue stands tall, an aura of righteousness flowing around him, you watch as he holds his hammer and contemplates your next move.
affectedByFlags: SANCTUARY SPHERE PROTECT-EVIL STATUE INVUL DUAL

mobShortDesc: A giant adamantine statue of a dwarf stands here, ready to defend his comrades!
mobLongDesc: This short adamantine statue of a disgruntled dwarf stares back at you with his diamond eyes He is obviously the meat shield of this rag tag group of tiny heroes.  Holding his halberd tightly, a grin comes across his face as his gaze meets yours.
affectedByFlags: SANCTUARY SPHERE PROTECT-EVIL STATUE DODGE INVUL DUAL

mobShortDesc: A wooden statue of a gnome stands here, muttering to himself.
mobLongDesc: You see a wooden statue of a short, fat gnome.  He bahs at you and looks rather annoyed that you are even here.  There is something strange about his mannerisms.
affectedByFlags: SANCTUARY SPHERE STATUE PROTECT-GOOD IMINV INVUL
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST

mobShortDesc: A golden statue of a halfing is crouching here, ready to annihilate his target!
mobLongDesc: This short golden statue of a halfling stands here, holding his flintlock and dagger. Just as you begin to observe him his hands seem to disappear, along with some of your stuff!
affectedByFlags: SANCTUARY SPHERE PROTECT-EVIL STATUE DODGE PROTECT-GOOD INVUL FURY

mobShortDesc: A monstrous abomination is here, screaming in agony!
mobLongDesc: Before you is an abomination to all mankind.  Whatever it is, it appears to have stitched random bits of flesh onto its body.  His one eye is wide open, as he has used pins to keep it that way.  He is constantly screaming in agony, almost completely oblivious of the fact that he is the only one here.  Whatever has happened to this place you can be almost certain he is the cause of it.  Standing just shy of seven feet tall, he glares down at you, waiting to add your flesh to his already deformed body.

mobShortDesc: A Giant Spider is standing here.
mobLongDesc: Although you may not describe it as massive.  It is, however, giant!

mobShortDesc: A Massive Spider is standing here.
mobLongDesc: This spider is not only giant, but it is massive!

mobShortDesc: A small red and purple beetle is here, skittering about.
mobLongDesc: This red and purple beetle is about the size of a small dog and does not reveal much interest in you. The only thing it appears to be interested in is chewing its boxes.

mobShortDesc: A large red and purple beetle is here, hissing at you!
mobLongDesc: This is one huge beetle!  It is covered in various reds and purples and hisses at you as you near her.  Although she seems pretty docile, she will protect her young at any cost!

mobShortDesc: A giant of immense proportions is standing here.
mobLongDesc: This nine foot giant towers above you, weighting to crush you like a bug!

mobShortDesc: A huge stone gargoyle is standing here!
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.

mobShortDesc: A very large goblin is here.
mobLongDesc: Although a pretty big goblin, he does seem pretty docile.  He does not fear you, you question how much you can trust him.

mobShortDesc: A dryad sproutling is here, inspecting the area.
mobLongDesc: A freshly born dryad.  These beings are born with century's worth of knowledge, and are nearly as strong as their older kin.
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST PUMMEL

mobShortDesc: A nymph sproutling is here, inspecting the area.
mobLongDesc: A freshly born nymph.  These beings are born with century's worth of knowledge, and are nearly as strong as their older kin.
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST

mobShortDesc: A large, ancient tree stands here, watching over the grove.
mobLongDesc: Hamadryad's are ancient beings.  They are said to be the product of an ancient nymph or dyrad, possessing an ancient tree in an area containing strong, natural magics.  They often guard over groves, druidic circles, or any forest containing the fae and their kin.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY SPHERE PROTECT-EVIL PROTECT-GOOD INVUL DUAL
mobImmune: SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DRAIN DISINTEGRATE SUMMON BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST TRAMPLE PUMMEL
attackTarget: GROUP RAN_GROUP GROUP RAN_GROUP SELF GROUP RAN_GROUP

mobShortDesc: A dryad is here, inspecting the area.
mobLongDesc: Dryads are known for the frivolous nature, and lack of attention span.  They are known to guard their homelands, as much as they are known for wandering off and seeking entertainment elsewhere.
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST PUMMEL

mobShortDesc: A wood nymph is here, inspecting the area.
mobLongDesc: Wood Nymphs are tricksters and powerful magic users.  They are known for guarding their kin, and tricking lessering beings with their cunning and beauty.
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST

mobShortDesc: Ahardenauk, the ancient, black dragon, is resting here.
mobLongDesc: Ahardenauk surrounds himself in gold, jewels, and treasures as much as he surrounds himself in rotting, putrid, decaying flesh. He is a black dragon, and the king of his region.  Few would dare challenge such a creature on their terms, and certainly only a fool would challenge him on his terms.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE DETECT-MAGIC SANCTUARY SPHERE PROTECT-EVIL PROTECT-GOOD FLY INVUL DUAL
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST BITE TAILSLAM TRAMPLE
attackTarget: RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP

mobShortDesc: A large orb with several, stalked eyes is floating here.
mobLongDesc: The behold hovers here, with nine, tendril-like stalks protruding from it's orb-shaped body.  In the center of it's body is one, large, eye and a mouth.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE DETECT-MAGIC SANCTUARY SPHERE PROTECT-EVIL PROTECT-GOOD FLY INVUL DUAL
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST
attackTarget: RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP SELF GROUP GROUP GROUP GROUP RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP
attackSpell: vampiric_touch thunderball paralyze miracle death_spray blindness_dust poison_smoke UNKNOWN: 131 super_harm fear

mobShortDesc: A frogman stands here, on alert and ready to attack!
mobLongDesc: The bullywug are a primitive race.  Often living in caves and marshes.  It is said their meat is slightly poisonous, and thus they roam free around large, natural predators without fear of attack.  They are herbivores, but they are aggressive towards most humanoids.

mobShortDesc: A large, reptilian monster stalks the waters here.
mobLongDesc: The crocodiles of this marsh have grown extremely large due to a lack of any sort of predator.  It is an apex, and will likely continue to hunt this marsh for quite some time.

mobShortDesc: An undead wizard hovers here, muttering to itself.
mobLongDesc: The Lich is a powerful, undead wizard.  It's decayed features prevent any form of identification as to who or what it was in it's former life.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SANCTUARY SPHERE PROTECT-EVIL DODGE PROTECT-GOOD FLY INVUL DUAL
attackType: DISARM SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST PUMMEL SPELL CAST
attackTarget: RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP GROUP GROUP RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP

mobShortDesc: A decaying warhorse is trotting here.
mobLongDesc: A decayed warhorse trots the battlefield.  The decayed remains of its former rider have either disintegrated in time, or have melded with the remains of the undead mount.

mobShortDesc: A glowing, white orb hovers around the room chaotically.
mobLongDesc: The spirit of some, long dead being darts around the room in no real, discernable pattern.  It gives off an almost, supernatural aura.
actionFlags: ISNPC STAY-ZONE AGGCL AGGMU MEMORY AGGPA
affectedByFlags: INVISIBLE DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SPHERE DODGE SNEAK HIDE FLY INVUL
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST

mobShortDesc: A spirit wanders here, looking for battle.
mobLongDesc: An spirit, covered in ectoplasmic armor and weaponry, wanders the battlefield.

mobShortDesc: A hulking, shambling corpse wanders the immediate area.
mobLongDesc: A large, hulking body wanders with a purpose that is likely lost, even upon itself.

mobShortDesc: A walking corpse, dressed as a knight, is wandering here.
mobLongDesc: A lifeless husk roams the battlefield.  Looking to finish a fight that likely ended long ago.

mobShortDesc: A man wanders here, aimlessly.
mobLongDesc: The man looks as if he's been wandering without direction for quite some time.  He is covered with mud, and dirt.  His hair is unkempt, and gross.  It should be noted, he appears more than capable of defending himself.

mobShortDesc: The Warden is standing here, guarding the Grand Chamber.
mobLongDesc: The warden, also known as the head guard, spends the majority of his day doing paperwork. He manages guard shifts, and oversees all operations beneath the "Hall of Champions". The most important of his duties is to be sure all procedures are executed properly when escorting monsters out of their chambers.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SANCTUARY SPHERE DODGE INVUL DUAL
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST DISARM PUNCH

mobShortDesc: The Champion of the Mercenary's Guild stands here, guarding the back room.
mobLongDesc: The Champion of the Mercenary's Guild stands guard over the back room.  In recent months he was known as the "One Man Army".  Because of his vast resume, and lifelong list of accomplishments, he has been promoted to be next in line as leader of the Guild.

mobShortDesc: Warren, the legendary crusader, is praying here.
mobLongDesc: Warren stands here, ready for battle at any moment.  Although he has given up his crusading lifestyle, it stands no secret that he is looking for any excuse to pick up his adventures where he left off.

mobShortDesc: Jobo the bandit king is hiding here, waiting to ambush his next target.
mobLongDesc: Jobo is known worldwide for her mischief.  She steals from unsuspecting travelers, and those who catch her in the act are either disposed of, or witnessed her "disappearing act".  Very few individuals are aware that they have been victim to her cunning.

mobShortDesc: Prax, the mercenary leader, is standing here.
mobLongDesc: Prax was once a member of the Roman Army.  His combat training is nearly unmatched, along with his short fuse.  It is said no one person has ever challenged him and lived to tell the tale, even groups have only survived by sacrificing one while the others fled in terror.  He stands tall, and does not seemed threatened by your presence.
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST BASH PUMMEL SPELL SKILL
attackTarget: RAN_ROOM ROOM ROOM RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP

mobShortDesc: The gladiatorial champion, Wilfred the Axe, is standing here.
mobLongDesc: Although definitely not the brightest bult on the tree, he very well may be the sharpest tool in the shed.  His prowess in the Arena is legendary, only a fool would challenge him.
attackType: SPELL SKILL BASH PUNCH SPELL SKILL

mobShortDesc: A demon of immense power stands before you.
mobLongDesc: Destined to spend eternity chained inside this crypt, Abhoraz waits patiently for for some unsuspecting adventurer to free him.  According to local history, he was one of many adventurers to save the town from some gargantuan.  However, soon after he was not to be trusted to roam free, and was bound to this tomb.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SANCTUARY INFRAVISION DODGE PROTECT-GOOD IMINV FURY
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST PUMMEL SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST
attackTarget: RAN_ROOM RAN_ROOM RAN_ROOM RAN_ROOM RAN_GROUP ROOM ROOM RAN_ROOM RAN_ROOM RAN_ROOM
attackSpell: energy_drain UNKNOWN: 242 fear sleep  poison_smoke blindness_dust paralyze curse vampiric_touch

mobShortDesc: Freya, the master chanter, is standing here.
mobLongDesc: Freya is the announcer for the "Hall of Champions".  She is known for her ability to rally a crowd, but also known for her prowess in a fight.  She stands guard over the entrance to the bastile below the Halls.
affectedByFlags: INVISIBLE DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY SPHERE DODGE SNEAK FLY DUAL

mobShortDesc: Jabon the Bladesinger is standing here.
mobLongDesc: A master bladesinger, Jabon seem very well practiced.  He spends most of his time managing and distributing jobs for other mercenaries, and very rarely taking any for himself.  However, his unique skill set and mastery in combat would make him quite the formidable foe.
affectedByFlags: INVISIBLE DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY PROTECT-EVIL DODGE SNEAK PROTECT-GOOD FLY DUAL

mobShortDesc: Baros, the grand templar, is praying here.
mobLongDesc: Baros is about average height, balding, and a little on the heavy side.  He is the last remaining member from the former temple of the "Sunguards".  Although a little out of shape, he still looks as if he could hold his own.
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST
attackTarget: RAN_GROUP ROOM SELF SELF ROOM SELF
attackSpell: super_harm searing_orb miracle heal holy_word orb_of_protection

mobShortDesc: The Town Cryer is here doing what he does best.
mobLongDesc: The Town Cryer stands in town, shouting irrelevent news.  He is a former champion from the Arena.  Local legend says he was capable of withstanding any number of attacks from any number of foes.  Nobody knows exactly where he came from, it is said he was found outside of town with no memory, it is possible he was one of the many soldiers who assisted Polo Fay with his struggles.
affectedByFlags: SANCTUARY SPHERE PROTECT-EVIL DODGE PROTECT-GOOD INVUL

mobKeywords: hamster miniature giant space mini furball
mobShortDesc: A miniature furball is here, scurrying about.
Obervon's only gravekeeper is here.
mobLongDesc: He is old, probably been at this job for years.  However, despite his age he is very well fit.  He beams a smile in your direction as you look at him.

mobShortDesc: A guard is here guarding the cells.
mobLongDesc: The cell guards are well trained, and capable of holding their own.  Despite this fact, they may have the worst job in town.  The fatality rates are high, most of them quit to become mercenaries, they are always under staffed, and they are not paid very well.

mobShortDesc: A battle-worn soldier of fortune is here, taking a break.
mobLongDesc: This soldier has been emotionally devastated through years, possibly even decades, of killing human beings for money.  He is quiet, and although watching the room intently, pays no real attention to any one individual.

mobShortDesc: A hireling is sitting here, awaiting his first job.
mobLongDesc: Optomistic, and not completely without morals, this guy has probably not taken a job yet.  Although he is in the building, it is doubtful he really grasps the concepts behind the term "sword for hire".

mobShortDesc: A mercenary is here, counting his coin.
mobLongDesc: Judging by his manner, he is new to this profession.  Perhaps he was a guard, soldier, or just had some form of combat training in the past. But, regardless, the concept of fighting for money seems relatively new to him.

mobShortDesc: A legionnaire is here, waiting for his payment.
mobLongDesc: This man carries himself well.  He openly prides himself on his fighting capabilities, and of the previous jobs he has done.  Judging by his manner, it is doubtful he would show any remorse over slitting your throat.

mobName: An Ethereal Figure of a Guard
mobShortDesc: A blurry image is barely visible as it moves in and out of the shadows.
mobLongDesc: You can barely make out an outline of a guard.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY SPHERE DODGE HIDE IMINV INVUL

mobShortDesc: An ettin is here pounding on the walls and screaming in a fit of rage!
mobLongDesc: He screams, and gestures aggressively.  It's almost as if he never stops screaming, and his muscles appear to always be fully bulged.  It is a wonder how he can keep functioning at a pace like this.  But the real question is...does he sleep?

mobShortDesc: An ancient shopkeer from beyond the mountains is standing here, reciting old sales pitches.
mobLongDesc: He is a very large man.  He is above average height, and his trememdous girth consists of both fat and muscle.  The guards must be bringing him three dinners, because there is no way someone should be this big off a prison diet.

mobShortDesc: The Sultan Cobra is slithering around here, waiting to strike it's prey.
mobLongDesc: This cobra's hood is full of vibrant and beautiful colors.  The rest of its body is covered in different patterns.  Obviously this cobra projects itself as the alpha male.
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST TAILSLAM SPELL CAST
attackTarget: RAN_ROOM RAN_ROOM RAN_ROOM RAN_ROOM RAN_ROOM RAN_ROOM RAN_ROOM
attackSpell: paralyze poison_smoke chill_touch sleep energy_drain  blindness_dust

mobShortDesc: The former master of some pagoda is meditating here.
mobLongDesc: This sinister looking bushi is here, awaiting battle.  He wears heavy armor, with the crest of a red dragon on it.  In preparation for his next battle, he is here doing some awkward looking stretches, bending his body into nearly impossible poses.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SANCTUARY SPHERE PROTECT-EVIL INFRAVISION DODGE DUAL
attackType: PUMMEL DISARM SPELL CAST SPELL CAST

mobShortDesc: A enormous beast of fur is lying here, growling towards the door.
mobLongDesc: This thing is a big puffy ball of fur.  Its cheeks are round an buffy.  It has two large, black, beady eyes.  It has a pink nose at the end of it's snout, with several large whiskers protruding from it.  Finally it has two round ears coming out of the top of its head.

mobShortDesc: Syszivexkeya, the beast of legend is lying here.
mobLongDesc: This legendary beast has been the downfall of many adventurers.  Its name was given to it because the few challengers that could be dragged away from its grasp only lived long enough to utter a few incomprehensible vowel noises. Thus it was given a name to match its victims last words.

mobShortDesc: A priest of Polo Fay is standing here.
mobLongDesc: The priests of Polo Fay's chapel are rumored to pocket a portion of each donation.  Their corruption is although heard of far and wide, has never actually been observed.

mobShortDesc: The Restaurant of Polo Fay's only waiter is standing here, ready to take your order.
mobLongDesc: This old man stands here, waiting to serve.  After years of service, even the most complicated of orders and tasks create little more than an automated response out of him.
affectedByFlags: SANCTUARY SPHERE PROTECT-EVIL DODGE PROTECT-GOOD INVUL

mobShortDesc: One of Chef Orelle's cooks is standing here.
mobLongDesc: This cook serves as an apprentice to Chef Van Micharrd Orrelle.  He stands here, doing everything he's told.

mobShortDesc: Chef Van Micharrd Orrelle is here, cooking to his heart's desire.
mobLongDesc: He is about 178 cm tall, probably weighs 84 kg or so.  He has a buzz cut hairstyle, and he is blonde.  His skin is pale, probably from being indoors all day.  Surprisingly, even in the heat of the kitchen, there is little sweat on his brow.
affectedByFlags: SANCTUARY SPHERE PROTECT-EVIL DODGE INVUL DUAL
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL SKILL SPELL CAST

mobShortDesc: One of Obervon's noble citizens is standing here.
mobLongDesc: She is clearly a trophy wife to some other rich person in Obervon.

mobShortDesc: One of Obervon's noble citizens is standing here.
mobLongDesc: Being a noble in Obervon means he has been one of the lucky investors in the local "Hall of Champions".  He is definitely not affraid to wear bright colors, even in a city infamous for its "Mercenary's Guild".

mobShortDesc: A citizen of Obervon is standing here.
mobLongDesc: This is one of Obervon's many citzens, she spends her day wandering the streets, giving thanks to Polo Fay, perhaps even dining in at the local restaurant.

mobShortDesc: A citizen of Obervon is standing here.
mobLongDesc: This is one of Obervon's many citizens, he spends his day wandering the streets, giving thanks to Polo Fay, perhaps even dining in at the local restaurant.

mobShortDesc: A bishop of Polo Fay is standing here.
mobLongDesc: Being self proclaimed bishop of this gallery, he really has no duties. He spends his days wandering about, giving thanks to Polo Fay on occassion.

mobShortDesc: One of Obervon's city guards is standing here.
mobLongDesc: The guard is here, whistling to himself.  Obviously he is very bored, and waiting to get off duty.  It's a wonder how Obervon has such a low crime rate.

mobShortDesc: Griswold the Blacksmith is standing here.
mobLongDesc: This tall, round man carries himself as if he was a proud warrior in a previous life.  However, now he stands over his forge crafting weapons of unmatched power.
affectedByFlags: SANCTUARY SPHERE PROTECT-EVIL DODGE PROTECT-GOOD INVUL

mobShortDesc: A blank of primal clay stands here, waiting to be shaped
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.

mobShortDesc: A lady of unimaginable beauty stands before you.
mobLongDesc: Cloaked in an irridescent robe of shimmering blues and greens, the beauty of the lady before you cannot be captured in words or poems of man; she is simply breathtaking. Long auburn locks of hair fall past her shoulders, upon her head sits an opalescent diadem which emits a faint glow, bathing her in an aurora of radiant light that only further enhances her enchanting beauty. Her luscious skin is a milky white other than the faint rosy hue of her cheeks. Held deli- cately in her left hand is a thin twiggy wand whose power you cannot even begin to comprehend. Brilliant, twinkling blue eyes stare out at you from the pale palette of her fair face and within them you glimpse a dangerous flicker of mischievous menace.

mobShortDesc: An exceptionally well-read, enormous wwrm writhes here before you.
mobLongDesc: Although many worms have a slimy film covering them, this segmented beast is dry to the point of chapping and cracking. Its brown-grey skin is uniform in colour save for a jet-black spectacled pattern on its head, pigmented glasses for eyes it doesn't have. A wavy, crimson tongue-like lobe on its crown weaves to and fro, sampling the air in what must be a sensory capacity; though it also bears a faint resem- blance to a rooster's cockscomb.

mobShortDesc: An engorged book claps its covers together menacingly.
mobLongDesc: The ancient tome has been enlarged ten fold, and somehow simultan- eously imbued with the power of flight. It hovers several inches off the ground while strange gutturul groans emanate from within. While previously the binding was nothing more than flimsy old leather, now at ten-times size it acts as an incredibly thick hide for this odd creature.

mobShortDesc: A blank of primal clay stands here, waiting to be shaped
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.

mobShortDesc: An armoured suit of jet-black steel stands before you.
mobLongDesc: Despite its empty appearance, there is a phantasmal, shadowy presence lurking within this stalking suit of steel. Exceptionally well-armoured, yet deceptively graceful, it prowls the halls of the Enchantress's castle; sometimes as it moves you catch glimpses of a wispy dark form betwixt the panels of heavy platemail, but these moments are too fleeting to gain any sense of the true nature of whatever dwells within. Suddenly a haunting, other-worldly growl echoes forth and the Darknut reaches for its giant abyssal blade...
mobImmune: PUMMEL SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS DISINTEGRATE HIT WHIP STING

mobShortDesc: An empty, enchanted suit of armour stalks around noisily.
mobLongDesc: Animated by the powerful magic of the Enchantress, this ancient relic of battles long since passed has been appointed guardian of the castle. A full three meters tall the battle-hardened steel of the armour clanks, the joints scrape, and the steps echo as this soulless puppet shuffles about.

mobShortDesc: A strange anthropomorphic golem made from the wrought-iron gates.
mobLongDesc: The gates that once protected the castle have been animated by the magic of the Enchantress. No weak points on this strange golem can be easily identified; it has no eyes or nose or any real dis- cernible facial features. Enormous long arms extend from a dense labyrinth of twisting iron set atop two short stumps for legs.
mobImmune: FIRE POISON PUMMEL KICK SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DRAIN DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE SUMMON PIERCE SLASH WHIP CLAW BITE STING HACK CHOP SLICE BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT

mobShortDesc: A giant, gnarled juniper shuffles back and forth on its roots.
mobLongDesc: An animated juniper holds a smoothed, twigless branch aloft like a shinai. Trailing an iced mane of scaled leaves and small, cloudy-blue berries, it stalks through the forest. With each precise strike a rumbling kiai echoes forth from the gnarled tree. Recruited by the beautiful Enchantress for its sturdiness and wintry nature, she imbued these gnarled junipers with the ancient art of Kendo.
mobImmune: PUMMEL CHARM BLINDNESS DISEMBOWEL SUMMON WHIP CLAW BITE STING

mobShortDesc: An alluring viny shrub creeps along, exuding a pleasant odor.
mobLongDesc: A lithe writhing shrub waves an attractive array of fruits and flowers in your direction. Tantalizing aromas and undefinable allures draw you towards the odd annual. Clumps of bright red cherry-like berries hang alongside petal whorls, the shrub lifts its leaves to reveal these treats like a lady of the night flaunts her own ample assets.
mobImmune: PUMMEL CHARM BLINDNESS DISEMBOWEL SUMMON WHIP CLAW BITE STING

mobKeywords: cactus cactaceae doom bloom blooming echinopsis
mobShortDesc: A squat, prickly cactus with an ominously long flower tube.
mobLongDesc: A dense, bulbous spheroid marked by longitudinal prickers is somehow disturbingly more alive than a plant should be. Much to your surprise, it appears capable of movement through some sort of shuffling waddle that gives it mobility through the dogwood forest. Cacti here, in the forest, is at odds with all records of their usual habitat. Then again, much here is out of place; the Enchantress' magic has turned this once beautiful and serene realm into a distopia of strangeness - exaggerated seasons, agg- ressive flora and animated inanimates.
mobImmune: PUMMEL CHARM BLINDNESS DISEMBOWEL SUMMON WHIP CLAW BITE STING

mobShortDesc: The dragon-faced flower of an antirrhinum maji sniffs the air.
mobLongDesc: The resemblence of the flowered "face" of this plant to that of a young red dragon is uncanny. No doubt this similarity is even more pronounced with the infusion of the Enchantress' magic into this snapdragon than its unenlivened cousins elsewhere. The maji inclines its head toward you and hiccups, expelling a small puff of black smoke through its "nostrils". Apparently the likeness to a dragon goes beyond the purely visual.
mobImmune: PUMMEL CHARM BLINDNESS DISEMBOWEL SUMMON WHIP CLAW BITE STING

mobShortDesc: The White Dragon stands before you, guarding his kingdom.
mobLongDesc: You see the ruler of this kingdom, who is watching everything through a crystal ball in the center of his room.  He is completely white with a thin layer of frost covering him.  His beady white eyes gaze in your direction and he attacks!
actionFlags: SENTINEL SCAVENGER ISNPC AGGRESSIVE STAY-ZONE MEMORY FLY SHIELD
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY SPHERE PROTECT-EVIL INFRAVISION INVUL DUAL FURY

mobShortDesc: A Frost Giant stands here building a rather large house.
mobLongDesc: This frost giant stands a good 15 feet off the ground.  Everything about him including his facial features are large.  He seems hard at work building a house for himself out of large ice blocks.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY INFRAVISION DODGE INVUL DUAL FURY

mobShortDesc: A Giant Constrictor Snake slithers past you.
mobLongDesc: This snake can literally squeeze the life out of you.  You can see just how muscular it is by the way it's back ripples as it moves.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY INFRAVISION STATUE INVUL DUAL FURY

mobShortDesc: A Winter Wolf stands here, waiting for something to eat.
mobLongDesc: A pure white winter wolf stands before you.  It is the most beautiful animal you've ever seen.  His eyes are light blue and reflect the light of your lantern.  Spending much time looking at this beautiful animal, you forgot that he's going to eat you if you stick around.
actionFlags: SENTINEL SCAVENGER ISNPC AGGRESSIVE STAY-ZONE MEMORY
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY INFRAVISION DODGE INVUL FURY

mobShortDesc: An Ice Toad is here, ready to fight.
mobLongDesc: You see a rather large ice toad.  Unlike the other creatures you have encountered so far, this one likes his home here, however he does not like people invading his territory.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY INFRAVISION DODGE INVUL DUAL FURY

mobShortDesc: You can barely make out a Lost Tribesman, hiding in the shadows.
mobLongDesc: This tribesman probably wandered his way in here years ago and has not found a way out since then.  You notice he has scars on his eyes, maybe from battle or maybe his own madness.

mobShortDesc: A Brown Bear is standing here blocking your way.
mobLongDesc: The brown bear you see in front of you doesn't look like it wants to fight.  It seems he's looking for a way out, just like you should be. However, you might not cross his path or he might decide otherwise...

mobShortDesc: A Huge Walrus is laying here.
mobLongDesc: You see a huge walrus basking in the sun rays reflecting off of the mother pearl.  As nice and cuddly as he looks, getting too close to him might invite him to take off your head with one swipe of his tail.  Turn back now or pay the price.

mobShortDesc: A seal is here swimming in circles around you.
mobLongDesc: The seal has a light coat of fur which makes him a fast swimmer.

mobShortDesc: A weary captain rests here.
mobLongDesc: You see an old captain, weary from his unfortunate crash into an iceberg.

mobShortDesc: A Cambrian Hermit eyes you from the shadows.
mobLongDesc: The Cambrian Hermit doesn't want to be bothered with the normal everyday life.  At one time  he was a wealthy man with many  friends, however for some mysterious  reason he has secluded  himself from  everyone but  his guards for the past 5 billion years or so...
actionFlags: SENTINEL ISNPC NICE-THIEF STAY-ZONE MEMORY FLY

mobShortDesc: The Cambrian Warrior stands here, guarding a large stone door.
mobLongDesc: The Cambrian Warrior is very old, but don't let his age deceive you.

mobShortDesc: A penguin waddles along in the snow.
mobLongDesc: The suns rays reflect off of the snow, making the penguins black body shine.

mobShortDesc: A giant polar bear stands here watching over his family.
mobLongDesc: You see a giant polar bear which seems to worry more about his family than you.

mobShortDesc: A polar bear stands here searching for food.
mobLongDesc: The polar bears white fur makes it hard to see it among the snow and ice.

mobShortDesc: A baby polar bear stands here, looking for its mother.
mobLongDesc: You see a baby polar bear standing no more than 4 feet tall.

mobName: The King of the Frost Giants
mobShortDesc: The King of the Frost Giants is sitting here on his throne made of ice.
mobLongDesc: Majestic in every sense, and stronger than any other giant, this giant stands before you watching your every move.  It would be advisable to think twice about attacking this giant.
actionFlags: SPEC SENTINEL SCAVENGER ISNPC MEMORY ARM
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY INFRAVISION DODGE INVUL DUAL FURY

mobShortDesc: The Captain of the Guard stands here blocking all passage to the south.
mobLongDesc: This giant is by far the largest you've seen.  He stands a good 20 feet tall, and has arms the size of tree trunks.  You have the touch of the butterflies as you think about fighting this giant.
actionFlags: SENTINEL SCAVENGER ISNPC STAY-ZONE MEMORY ARM
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY INFRAVISION DODGE DUAL FURY

mobShortDesc: A pair of eyes leap out at you from out of the dark.
mobLongDesc: This is a large wolf with white fur and large fangs.  He has a hungry look in his eye as he starts to claw you to shreds.

mobShortDesc: A frost giant noble points at you and yells 'GUARDS!! Take out this trash!'
mobLongDesc: This giant is one of the aristocracy of the kingdom.  He is lavishly dressed in the best silk, and wears expensive jewelry.

mobShortDesc: An elite frost giant guard is watching over his master's house.
mobLongDesc: This giant looks like he knows what he's doing as he skillfully carves you apart.
actionFlags: SENTINEL SCAVENGER ISNPC AGGRESSIVE STAY-ZONE MEMORY ARM

mobShortDesc: A child of a frost giant is standing here.
mobLongDesc: A snot-nosed punk with beady little eyes.  He gets pissed at you when you start to kill him mother, and so joins the fray.
actionFlags: SENTINEL SCAVENGER ISNPC AGGRESSIVE STAY-ZONE MEMORY

mobShortDesc: The wife of a frost giant scowls at you angrily for invading her privacy.
mobLongDesc: A homely looking woman, but big as a tree, strong as an ox, and about as smart as one too.
actionFlags: SENTINEL SCAVENGER ISNPC AGGRESSIVE STAY-ZONE MEMORY

mobShortDesc: A frost giant guard is standing here glaring at you.
mobLongDesc: A large muscular giant that looks like he could breaks you if he touched you.  He glares at you menacingly.
actionFlags: SENTINEL SCAVENGER ISNPC STAY-ZONE MEMORY ARM

mobShortDesc: A yeti leaps at you and attacks!
mobLongDesc: A yeti is bearing down on you with HUGE fangs!  Better get out of the way before he devours you!

mobShortDesc: The rabid rat scurries towards you.  Its eyes glowing deep red.
mobLongDesc: They scurry into the shadows and attack en-masse.

mobShortDesc: The guardian naga slithers toward you to protect her lair.
mobLongDesc: You are intruders, and you must die.

mobShortDesc: The nile crocodile swallows the last of his rat appetizer.
mobLongDesc: I bet you're next!

mobShortDesc: A black pudding oozes towards you.
mobLongDesc: It is gelatinous and gooey.

mobShortDesc: A rust monster squats here, eagerly eyeing your armor and weapons.
mobLongDesc: It looks hungry.

mobShortDesc: An ornate chest sits in the corner.
mobLongDesc: It looks well made.

mobShortDesc: Anubis sits in his throne, wearing a glowing key.
mobLongDesc: He has the body of a man, and the head of a jackal.

mobShortDesc: A statue of Akinra stands here, and blocks your path.
mobLongDesc: He looks really mean.

mobShortDesc: A mummy gasps in astonishment at your success thus far.
mobLongDesc: He looks like he wants to change your luck.

mobShortDesc: A spectre stands here, reaching out for you.
mobLongDesc: He looks sad.

mobShortDesc: A stone golem stands here
mobLongDesc: He looks large and granite.

mobShortDesc: A clay golem stands here.
mobLongDesc: He is large, and ceramic.

mobShortDesc: A large iron golem stands here.
mobLongDesc: He is large, and metallic.

mobShortDesc: Polaris, the polar star, who commands the whole Universe, stands before you!
mobLongDesc: He is the Master of the Universe, the most powerful!  Even the King and the Queen obey him. As you look at him you notice he is actually a STAR, with dazzling bright light... Maybe you shouldn't have come here at all?

mobShortDesc: Cepheus, the king of the Universe, is sitting on his throne.
mobLongDesc: He is the King of Might as well as of the Universe. You suddenly feel very weak and useless in front of him.

mobShortDesc: Cassiopeia, the queen of the Universe, is sitting on her throne.
mobLongDesc: She is also the Queen of Dignity; facing her, you feel that all your dignity has gone.

mobShortDesc: Ursa Major the bear is the last defense against any intruders..
mobLongDesc: The Huge Bear which resides in the northern skies is here. You think you'd better turn back. At least you have got a chance of survival.

mobShortDesc: Pisces the fish, is jealous of your approach...
mobLongDesc: He was once a very handsome man but now has turned into an ugly big fish. So he becomes jealous of any living thing which is more handsome than him. So maybe he is not jealous of you?

mobShortDesc: Pisces the mermaid is sitting here, waiting for your help.
mobLongDesc: She has been forced to serve her husband, who had been cursed to turn into a fish and she deserves your pity.

mobShortDesc: The beautiful Aquarius is standing here, holding THE vessel.
mobLongDesc: The pretty Water Bearer is smiling at you, you think you'd better give her a hand with holding the vessel.

mobShortDesc: Capricorn is here, feeling bored..He wants a fight!
mobLongDesc: You see a mean-looking ram here. He used to be a fierce fighter in the ancient war but now the gods have decided to put him here, to live out the rest of his days in peace.

mobShortDesc: Sagittarius the centaur is waiting to let go of his well aimed arrow...
mobLongDesc: He is a centaur and more, he is a well trained archer. No one can escape his arrows.

mobShortDesc: Scorpio is gradually moving his tail towards you, waiting to put an end to some mortals.
mobLongDesc: Ever since he killed Orion in the myths, he has been punished by having Sagittarius' arrow aimed at his heart forever.

mobShortDesc: Libra, the fair and just, is staring at you, weighing up the sins of your past.
mobLongDesc: He is a wise old man and can see people's thoughts through their eyes..Now all he can see from you is greed and stupidity.

mobShortDesc: Virgo is sitting here, winking at you suggestively..You are alarmed!
mobLongDesc: From what you have seen, you now realize that legends are legends, and Virgo may not be the maid of chastity and purity at all! But still she looks gorgeous and is waiting for your first move, whatever it is...

mobShortDesc: Leo the lion is roaring at you, he is ready for a strike!
