mobLongDesc: His metallic skin means that he could be the one which was killed by Hercules during his first Labour. His skin is so weapon-proof that Hercules had to use his bare hands to tear the lion into two from its mouth!

mobShortDesc: Cancer the crab is here, hoarding the treasure away from you.
mobLongDesc: You see a gigantic crab(YES, it is bigger than you!) with a crushed shell. Legend has it that he was crushed by Hercules when he was sent by Hera to kill him. So Hera made Cancer a constellation for his work.

mobShortDesc: Gemini is hiding from his brother, grinning evilly at you.
mobLongDesc: As soon as you see him you see the most imperfect man you have ever seen. How can there be such a contrast? You wonder...
actionFlags: SENTINEL SCAVENGER ISNPC AGGRESSIVE STAY-ZONE WIMPY

mobShortDesc: Gemini is looking for his brother, have you seen him?
mobLongDesc: As soon as you see him you know that he is the most perfect man you have seen. You can't find any imperfections on him.

mobShortDesc: Taurus wants to leave, but has been forced to stay as a guardian here.
mobLongDesc: You see a wild-looking bull with a bad temper. He is well-built and looks like he can fight well. Indeed, he has fought with Orion before and survived.

mobShortDesc: Aries is sitting here, welcoming you.
mobLongDesc: You see a white goat here, the first guardian of the Zodiac, also the ruler of Spring. He looks as if he is expecting you.

mobShortDesc: A baby draco is crawling on the Draco's body.
mobLongDesc: You see a tiny creature which looks like a dragon except that its body resembles a snake. Gosh, is this a draco, you wonder, is this the thing we are on now?

mobShortDesc: The gigantic Head of Draco lurks out from beneath and prepares to roast you.
mobLongDesc: This evil-looking head is even larger than a giant. He is the last guardian before entering the inner galaxy. His neck is flexing in a random fashion so that hitting the head is certainly not easy.

mobShortDesc: The Pleiades are here, weeping for the loss of their sisters.
mobLongDesc: These are the seven sisters of the Myths, and as for why they are here, no one knows; even the writer himself has forgotten (couldn't be bothered to look it up).

mobShortDesc: Orion is still hunting for Scorpio.
mobLongDesc: He is the legendary hunter who almost defeated Taurus the bull, but got killed by Scorpio. The gods put them both up as constellations but one appears on one side of the sky and the other the other side so they will never meet.

mobShortDesc: The wild pegasus is grazing peacefully.
mobLongDesc: It is the legendary horse with wings on its back.

mobShortDesc: The Mighty Hercules is working hard for his extra Labours for the Gods.
mobLongDesc: He has been put to do the Ten Labours-Ten impossible tasks, by Hera, the queen goddess, who disliked him. But he finished them all and at the end was granted immortality. He is a very brave and strong fighter...don't mess with him.

mobShortDesc: The poor Andromeda is chained to the wall, suffering...
mobLongDesc: She was once a princess of beauty. However, her beauty has led to A Goddess' jealousy and she has to suffer here endlessly, 'til the time when Perseus comes.

mobShortDesc: A huge nebula is here, its shape resembles a horsehead.
mobLongDesc: You can only make out its shape from the darkness. He was cursed to stay in here and his face may never be seen by anyone again.

mobShortDesc: A white, but tiny dwarf is trying to sneak away from duty.
mobLongDesc: Like the red giant, he is also appointed to stand guard for the galaxy. But somehow he manages to escape. Though tiny,it looks as if it can take a lot of hits!

mobShortDesc: An enormous, red supergiant is forced to protect the galaxy.
mobLongDesc: You notice the giant is not as tough as his name sounds...Still he can be very powerful.

mobShortDesc: A speedy comet, who is waiting to crush your head in.
mobLongDesc: You see the offspring of Halley's comet and it is here just to wipe everything out.

mobShortDesc: A young nebula, waiting to become a star.
mobLongDesc: It hasn't got a definite shape, it is just a cloud of mist.

mobShortDesc: A beautiful white star is smiling at you.
mobLongDesc: You can't tell what the star looks like, she is too bright!

mobShortDesc: A poor mudder, who is lost in this place.
mobLongDesc: You will become him if you are not careful.

mobShortDesc: A blank of primal clay stands here, waiting to be shaped
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.

mobShortDesc: A blank of primal clay stands here, waiting to be shaped
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.

mobShortDesc: A blank of primal clay stands here, waiting to be shaped
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.

mobShortDesc: A blank of primal clay stands here, waiting to be shaped
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.

mobShortDesc: A blank of primal clay stands here, waiting to be shaped
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.

mobShortDesc: A blank of primal clay stands here, waiting to be shaped
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.

mobShortDesc: A blank of primal clay stands here, waiting to be shaped
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.

mobShortDesc: The barbarian chief stands here.
mobLongDesc: The barbarian chief stands before you.  He is big, his is muscular he is tattooed and he is mean.  He is the best warrior in the village. You should be careful of this man.

mobShortDesc: A tall female barbarian villager goes about her business here.
mobLongDesc: This is a very tall, healthy speciman of womanhood.  She seems every bit as capable as her male counterparts here in the village.  She lacks the tattoos that the men have but that doesn't really make her any less fearsome.

mobShortDesc: A tall, heavily muscled barbarian warrior stands here, glaring at you.
mobLongDesc: Before you stands a tall, heavily muscled man.  Scars from many battles line his exposed skin.  Tattoos adorn him in many patterns and in several places.

mobShortDesc: A barbarian tribesman with colorful tattoos stands here.
mobLongDesc: This tribesman is tall and muscular like the rest of his people. He does not seem to be devoted to martial combat though, perhaps he fulfills a different role in the village.

zoneName: Glacial Tunnels of Remorhaz, by Ursum
mobShortDesc: a thin, smooth humanoid stands naked here, motionless.
mobLongDesc: This humanoid creature is thin and smooth. Her skin is a deep purple and her eyes are empty darkness. She stands still, silent and effortless, floating delicately on the surface of the ice. Her body is flatter than a human's, and her face is longer, stretched across her large jaw. She stands still, aware, alive.

zoneName: Glacial Tunnels of Remorhaz, by Ursum
mobShortDesc: a rough, sleek humanoid is here, stalking.
mobLongDesc: This creature has a rough human form, with thin quick limbs. It can stand on all four limbs, or only its legs, moving with speed and versatility. It has thick, cupped ears, curved towards the front of its head. Its eyes are solid black, and farther apart than those of a standard humanoid. Its claws are long and thick, and its teeth are rough and sharp.

zoneName: Glacial Tunnels of Remorhaz, by Ursum
mobShortDesc: a rough, stout humanoid is here, standing alert.
mobLongDesc: This creature is vaguely human, with four limbs and opposable thumbs. The creature stands crouched, resting lightly on its fore-limbs, but most of its weight rests on the back. Its eyes are solid dark, and its skin is stretched tight against its large jaw. The creature also has long, firm claws instead of nails.

zoneName: Glacial Tunnels of Remorhaz, by Ursum
mobShortDesc: a small, white, fur-covered creature is here with large fangs.
mobLongDesc: This creature is covered in a thick white fur, and it is hard to discern any of its features through the fur. Its one defining trait is a long hooked fang that gashes out from the blurry fur. The creature moves quickly along the edges of the ice, somehow sliding or gliding on it at incredible speeds.

zoneName: Glacial Tunnels of Remorhaz, by Ursum
mobShortDesc: a small creature is here, with soft blue features and translucent wings.
mobLongDesc: This faerie is no more than eighteen inches tall, but it fills the focus of your sight. Its deep blue skin is soft and flowing. Its eyes seem a steady pull into their endless dark. Its wings are barely outlined by the quick flashes of color they reflect.
mobImmune: FIRE ELECTRIC PUMMEL PUNCH BACKSTAB ASSAULT

zoneName: Glacial Tunnels of Remorhaz, by Ursum
mobShortDesc: A large white bear is hibernating here.
mobLongDesc: You see a large bear with pure bluish-white fur. It blends in very well with the frost and ice of its cave. It has enormous claws and deep blue eyes.

zoneName: Glacial Tunnels of Remorhaz, by Ursum
mobShortDesc: A large white dragon with enormous ice wings is perched here.
mobLongDesc: You see a white dragon whose fangs, claws, and wings appear to be made of ice. It has a wingspan of about fifty feet, and is over sixty feet long, but its entire presence seems difficult to believe. However, you have a feeling it could convince you of its existence with great haste of it so desired.
mobImmune: PUMMEL KICK PUNCH BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT

zoneName: Glacial Tunnels of Remorhaz, by Ursum
mobShortDesc: A large snake with seven heads slithers through the tunnel here.
mobLongDesc: You see a large blue snake with its body split at the center, where seven separate necks and heads lead out. Each head appears to be a formidable opponent and with such a massive body supporting them, this monster is a deadly combination.

zoneName: Glacial Tunnels of Remorhaz, by Ursum
mobShortDesc: A large toad sits here, covered in frost.
mobLongDesc: You see a large frost covered toad. Its skin beneath the frost is a deep blue and its eyes reflect light. Its back is covered in sharp icicles and you would not want to step on it.

zoneName: Glacial Tunnels of Remorhaz, by Ursum
mobShortDesc: A small white dragonoid creature flies here, flapping its wings of ice.
mobLongDesc: You see a small white dragonette. Its wings, claws, eyes, and fangs seem to be made of ice. It is rather small but you have a feeling that wouldn't affect its decision to tear you to shreds if you upset it.

zoneName: Glacial Tunnels of Remorhaz, by Ursum
mobShortDesc: A silvery fox with a white tail is on the prowl here.
mobLongDesc: This fox wears thick silver fur and a white tail. It is completely silver aside from its white tail and its white eyes. It is only about three feet long, but with its razor sharp teeth and claws combined with its copious dexterity, it can pack its share of punch.

zoneName: Glacial Tunnels of Remorhaz, by Ursum
mobShortDesc: A large white yeti blends into the snow here.
mobLongDesc: You see a large creature with white fur. It is completely white and almost entirely camouflaged in the snowbank. It has large white fangs and you pray it doesn't have the dexterity necessary to bite you with them.
mobImmune: PUMMEL KICK PUNCH BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT

zoneName: Glacial Tunnels of Remorhaz, by Ursum
mobShortDesc: A large two headed creature with deep blue skin is standing tall here.
mobLongDesc: You see a blue humanoid with two heads. It seems to be completely hairless, but then again you were too sheepish to check under its loins. It has four pure black eyes which always seem to be looking at you.

zoneName: Glacial Tunnels of Remorhaz, by Ursum
mobShortDesc: The Great Ice Burrower itself is here, melting the ice around it.
mobLongDesc: You see a large scaly insectoid. It secretes heat all around it, melting through the ice. It has large bug eyes and a hard underbelly. All of its legs are located within the first third of its massive sixty foot long body, making the rest a sort of tail which it swings with surprising ease.

zoneName: Goblin Kingdom and Marsh Cave, by BobaNight
mobShortDesc: The ghastly corpse of a long-dead dwarf shambles about, moaning to itself.
mobLongDesc: The putrid half-decayed form of a dwarven warrior shambles about aimlessly, moaning incomprehensible sounds to the ever-listening dark.  Puss and various types of insects and worms leak out of huge gaping sores that cover this being's taut flesh.  Bits of tattered clothing and armor still cling to their owner, seemingly reluctant to completely fall away even in the face of its death.  Dim crimson light glows from the empty sockets of the zombie's face, their evil intent the only hint of purpose that the ghastly form portrays.
mobImmune: ELECTRIC POISON PUMMEL SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DRAIN DISEMBOWEL BACKSTAB

zoneName: Goblin Kingdom and Marsh Cave, by BobaNight
mobShortDesc: A small pixie is here, flitting about on his iridescent wings.
mobLongDesc: Tilik is a rather mean-spirited prankster, even for one of his own kind.  After stealing the rings off of his pixie prince's fingers and cutting him on each cheek because "blood is funny", Tilik was surprised to find that all of a sudden everyone wanted him locked up or dead.  After countless minutes of teleportative fleeing, lazy Tilik grew bored of that game.  But, curiosity brutally murdered the fairy, as pixies like to say, and he found himself lured into the deep underground caverns below a goblin den.  There he found a nice muddy hole to live in and plenty of shiny trinkets to steal from the treasure piles of nearby denizens of the dark.
actionFlags: SENTINEL SCAVENGER ISNPC NICE-THIEF STAY-ZONE MEMORY
affectedByFlags: DETECT-ALIGNMENT DETECT-INVISIBLE DETECT-MAGIC SANCTUARY INFRAVISION DODGE FLY
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST DISARM

zoneName: Goblin Kingdom and Marsh Cave, by BobaNight
mobShortDesc: A young black dragon lies curled here, resting in a half-sleep.
mobLongDesc: This is a young dragon by all appearances, yet its youth and inexperience do little to diminish the aura of power and strength that it projects.  Its glistening black scales sparkle with a light that seems almost of their own. Unlike older dragons of its kind, this particular one seems more alert and less lethargic, a product of the creatures youth and desire to grow and conquer. Huge corded muscles ripple beneath the serpentine surface of its body, causing its wings and claws to flex in response.  Though small compared to an adult wyrm, its body is over a dozen meters long and looks to weigh an equal amount in metric tons.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-ALIGNMENT DETECT-INVISIBLE DETECT-MAGIC SENSE-LIFE PROTECT-GOOD DUAL

zoneName: Goblin Kingdom and Marsh Cave, by BobaNight
mobShortDesc: A large troll is here, diligently tending to his herd of giant crabs.
mobLongDesc: The old crab herder is a large but hunched-over and weary-looking troll who has become a hermit after being cast out of his tribe for a long-forgotten crime. Banished to the underdark, he has taken to herding the giant crabs that dwell there in order to survive.  His great regenerative powers allow him to survive the various nips and bites the crabs often times inflict.  He can often be seen grumbling to himself and singing in a sing-song voice about crabs and the drinking of heavy malt liquor...  Perhaps his mind is not what it used to be.

zoneName: Goblin Kingdom and Marsh Cave, by BobaNight
mobKeywords: crab giant pale-white pale white subterranean
mobShortDesc: A giant crab with a pale-white carapace scuttles about, clacking its pincers.
mobLongDesc: This is a type of giant crab not found anywhere else in the world.  Countless ages of dwelling underground has transformed these creatures, encouraging adaptation to the harsh environment in order to survive.  The thick armored shell that it wears is ghostly white, disrupted only by thin blue vein-like structures that thread their way along its surface in a myriad of random shapes.  The crab has no visible eye-stalks, instead having two large membranous holes that pulsate and serve some unknown function.  As unusual as this creature is, the general shape of the critter is similar to that of its smaller surface cousins, down to the general design and purpose of its two massive pincers.

zoneName: Goblin Kingdom and Marsh Cave, by BobaNight
mobShortDesc: A horridly smelly goblin squats in the filth, muttering to himself.
mobLongDesc: This is Grug, the infamous goblin weapons inventor of the powerful Kraznor Clan.  The poor insane fellow was forced to flee his home caves, though not because his inventions nearly always backfired on their users, killing the lot of them, for that is the goblin way.  Instead, he was forced into exile because he refused to wear proper goblin-issue rags, opting to wear nothing but a loincloth and his very long beard (even goblins have fashion standards).  In lonely desperation, Grug now lives in the filthy caverns below his old home, hiding from the other monsters in the caves and frantically spends his time building new inventions that might one day win back the trust of his clan-mates, and possibly acceptance for his partial-nudity.

zoneName: Goblin Kingdom and Marsh Cave, by BobaNight
mobKeywords: muckdweller humanoid creature mud clay muck
mobShortDesc: A small humanoid creature made from mud and clay is here, holding a stone club.
mobLongDesc: This creature, known as a muckdweller, is a short, tough-looking fellow made of mud and clay.  The surface of its 'skin' undulates and flows about its body, as the murky substance it is made from flows about its form.  The creature stands at slightly less than one meter high; however, its solidity and the fact that it is carrying a large staff made of a single shaft of rock makes it look imposing nonetheless.

zoneName: Goblin Kingdom and Marsh Cave, by BobaNight
mobShortDesc: A creature composed entirely of sickly yellow-orange pudding meanders about.
mobLongDesc: This foul creature is a sickening conglomeration of some type of yellow-orange pudding-like substance.  Pustules of oozing fluid pop and smear across the gelatinous surface of the thing, leaking out a putrid slew of disgusting matter.  It has no identifiable features, but seems to creep along keeping its body oriented in the same position as much as possible.
mobImmune: ELECTRIC POISON PUMMEL SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DISEMBOWEL BACKSTAB

zoneName: Goblin Kingdom and Marsh Cave, by BobaNight
mobShortDesc: An amorphous mass of green mold oozes about, scouring the floor for food.
mobLongDesc: What can only be described as a mass of dark green mold shuffles about here, sweeping across the floor in its flattened disc-like shape.  The entire surface of its body undulates in a steady pulse, almost as if it were breathing.  A thin trail of spores is left behind in its wake as it moves about from place to place.
mobImmune: POISON PUMMEL SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DISEMBOWEL BACKSTAB

zoneName: Goblin Kingdom and Marsh Cave, by BobaNight
mobShortDesc: Chief Druxlor is here, asleep on his throne.
mobLongDesc: Druxlor the goblin chief is quite a figure.  Standing no more than three and a half feet tall and being nearly as wide, one brings to mind the question of how he became the leader of these smelly creatures.  However, the gleam in his eye and the way he strokes his axe could give some clues...

zoneName: Goblin Kingdom and Marsh Cave, by BobaNight
mobName: Quareen, High Priestess of the Kraznor Clan
mobShortDesc: Quareen, high priestess of the Kraznor Clan, stands here muttering to herself.
mobLongDesc: The high priestess Quareen smiles knowingly to herself.  Apparently this is where the real power of the tribe rests. Utterly ruthless and evil, this priestess kills on a whim and prefers her meals raw and bleeding.

zoneName: Goblin Kingdom and Marsh Cave, by BobaNight
mobShortDesc: The keeper of the gate stands here, barring your way.
mobLongDesc: The Keeper of the Gate is a truly ominous figure.  He towers over the other goblins of his clan at over a meter and a half tall and is as wide as a moderately-sized barrel.  With a snarl perpetually on his lips, he stands here performing his duty with un-goblin-like zeal.

zoneName: Goblin Kingdom and Marsh Cave, by BobaNight
mobShortDesc: An elite goblin guard stands here, keeping watch over his clan's caves.
mobLongDesc: This is one of Clan Kraznor's elite goblin guards.  These are the best-trained and heavily-equipped fighters in all of the clan.  This particular guard is wearing mismatched pieces of studded leather armor that appear to have once been decent gear, but now have begun to rot, even as the goblin wears it.

zoneName: Goblin Kingdom and Marsh Cave, by BobaNight
mobShortDesc: A goblin sentry is standing about here, lazily performing his duties.
mobLongDesc: The sentry looks bored out of his mind as he stands at his post.  His shoulders are slumped and he seems to have trouble staying awake.  Besides earning a lukewarm meal and a hole to live in, this goblin has little to look forward to as rewards for his lifelong job.

zoneName: Goblin Kingdom and Marsh Cave, by BobaNight
mobShortDesc: A goblin miner stands here, chipping away at the walls.
mobLongDesc: This miner is still under the illusion that some extraordinary gems or precious metals might still be found in these walls.  The saddening truth is that dwarven miners are not known to leave anything of value behind, even when being chased out of their caves. This poor fellow has a long and pointless existence ahead of him.

zoneName: Goblin Kingdom and Marsh Cave, by BobaNight
mobShortDesc: A male goblin peasant is going about his work here.
mobLongDesc: This peasant appears to be rather content and at peace, if that is possible for a goblin.  He toils along at his duties day-in and day-out for the greater good of his clan.

zoneName: Goblin Kingdom and Marsh Cave, by BobaNight
mobShortDesc: A female goblin peasant is going about her daily chores here.
mobLongDesc: This peasant has lived a happy and ignorant life as a female goblin.  Seldom allowed out of her home cave, this brief treat to see the tunnels that the rest of the tribe lives and works in could be a once in a lifetime experience for her.

zoneName: Goblin Kingdom and Marsh Cave, by BobaNight
mobShortDesc: A snarak is hiding here, waiting for its next meal.
mobLongDesc: The snarak is a type of parasite commonly associated with goblins.  Every tribe always has a group of snaraks that live in tandem with them, feeding off of their waste.  In return the goblins can hunt and eat the snaraks as tasty snacks, thus perpetuating the cycle of life.

mobShortDesc: A Hooligan is here, looking to pilfer some coin or chip.
mobLongDesc: The Hooligans are known ruffians of Uber Mustafa.  Often performing violent acts for the man for a handful of poker chips, coin, or even a simple favor. They are not to be trusted, and should be avoided at all costs!
attackType: SPELL CAST PUMMEL BASH PUNCH DISARM

mobShortDesc: Uber Mustafa stands in the corner, murmuring to himself as he counts his coin.
mobLongDesc: Uber Mustafa is a shark and a cheat.  Those who turn down his offer or game wind up beaten or broken.  Those who accept often wind up penniless or in indentured servitude.  Rumor has it, he has an army of ruffians at his beck and call, eagerly awaiting him to owe them a favor, or reduce their debt.
attackType: DISARM SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL SKILL
attackTarget: RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP ROOM SELF RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP ROOM
attackSpell: conflagration cloud_of_confusion power_of_faith meteor dispel_sanctuary UNKNOWN: 68

mobShortDesc: The Magus stands here uttering strange mantras.
mobLongDesc: He is the last of the Mahayogis of this realm and the final remnant of the cult of Vasmakhai. He wears a black robe with strange symbols embroidered on it. He has pitch black skin and a long beard. You can feel fear building up in your heart as he makes strange gestures in the air with his fingers and conjures up the demons of hell to aid him in killing you.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SPHERE INFRAVISION DODGE INVUL DUAL FURY

mobShortDesc: The Healer is piercing his body with small needles here.
mobLongDesc: You see the naked body of a frail and gaunt man with a bald head. As he puts needles into various parts of his body, you see that all his muscles are very well toned. He appears grim, yet has a gentle expression on his face.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SPHERE INFRAVISION DODGE INVUL

mobShortDesc: A Disciple is sitting here in a deep yoga trance.
mobLongDesc: You see the tall and lanky figure of the disciple who is infuriated at the distraction your intrusion has caused him. He is wearing nothing except a small red loincloth. He is one who has yet to learn forgiveness and will make you pay for your folly.

mobShortDesc: A Devotee is here practicing some yoga rituals.
mobLongDesc: You see a man dressed in a plain yellow robe with a hood on his head. He is stretching out on the floor following some pattern of moves. Sweat trickles down his face as he puts himself through the same set of stances in an effort to perfect his control over the body.

mobShortDesc: A Devotee sits here studying some manuscripts.
mobLongDesc: You see a man dressed in a plain grey robe with a hood on his head. The hood is drawn back to reveal his ageless face. He is totally engrossed in his work and you feel that your entrance has escaped his notice. He has a serene smile on his face and seems to be in complete control of his emotions.

mobShortDesc: A Devotee stands here with his head bowed down in prayer.
mobLongDesc: You see a man dressed in a plain brown robe with a hood on his head. The hood covers his face completely and you feel that he has not noticed you coming into the room. He is fit and in very good shape.

mobShortDesc: An Adept stands here contemplating the mysteries of the universe.
mobLongDesc: You see the mild and meek mannered adept standing here trying to delve into the mysteries of the universe. He is a small and frail bodied person who has turned to join this cult in an attempt to find happiness in his life.

mobShortDesc: The Protector of the Faith stands guard here.
mobLongDesc: You see the figure of a bald man, in a shining white armor. Once upon a time he was the Guru's right hand, but he has now forsaken the path of Dharma to assume the duties of protecting the Golden Pagoda from intruders. His face is grim and expressionless, and you cannot make out his age since his eyebrows are shaved.

mobShortDesc: A Jal-Purian Bedouin stands here taking care of his business.
mobLongDesc: You see a simple man dressed in white desert robes and a flowing headdress. As he opens his mouth to spit in the sand, you glimpse at his teeth capped with pure gold. He seems to be minding his own business and does not seem to mind the heat nor does he acknowledge your presence.

mobShortDesc: Fawaz the Phrenologist is here labeling some medicine vials and potions.
mobLongDesc: You see a middle aged man of average height standing here studying some health charts. Fawaz the Phrenologist is a very successful healer around these parts but his medicine tastes most foul ! He wears some fancy charms around his wrists and neck and grabs your wrist to analyze your pulse.

mobShortDesc: Damar sits here watching over his dates and coconuts.
mobLongDesc: You see a stout and jovial fellow shouting out greetings to all passers-by. Damar the date-salesman wears a bright pink robe with an electric blue turban on his head. He seems to be smiling constantly and offers you a juicy coconut to quench your thirst.

mobShortDesc: Peshtoon the Painter is here mixing some colors on his palette.
mobLongDesc: You see an eccentric painter standing here trying to paint an abstract painting. Peshtoon stands here dressed in clothes which are splattered with all the colors of the rainbow. He turns his head to one side to study his latest masterpiece and then goes into a frenzy of slashing some artistic strokes on the canvas.

mobShortDesc: Mustafa is here trying to mark a pair of dice.
mobLongDesc: Mustafa is the owner of the local gambling establishment of the Sultanate. He is a scoundrel and a first rate cheater, not to be trusted at any game. Mustafa wears a green kaftan and some matching leggings. He seems to be leering at your armor as he sees you walk into his Dice Den.

mobShortDesc: Hakkan the Slaver is here whipping and flaying his slaves into shape.
mobLongDesc: Before you stands a huge and majestic man with bulging muscles. Hakkan the Slaver wears a short leather skirt held together with a silver belt. He cracks his whip and shouts at his slaves to get in line to present them to some nobles. He is bare chested and wears a pair of bronze gauntlets on his hands.

mobShortDesc: Zegna the Seamstress is here modeling a dress for her customers.
mobLongDesc: Zegna is the expert seamstress of Jal-Pur and all the nobles get their garments stitched at her boutique. Though she is quite popular, no one has ever seen her. She wears a black flowing dress from her shoulders to her feet, and a long black veil covers her face. She seems to bow as you enter her humble shop.

mobShortDesc: Fahad the Kebab Maker is here preparing Falafels.
mobLongDesc: Fahad the falafel salesman and kebab maker extraordinaire stands here tending his stall. He is a young man wearing a white hat and a soiled red shirt. You feel dizzy as you see him flip a bunch of falafels over the grill and stick some kebabs into his oven at the same time.

mobShortDesc: Kamal the Charioteer is here fixing a spoke onto a wheel.
mobLongDesc: Kamal is a short and wiry young man. he is an expert at horse riding, chariot racing and jousting. He is an extremely agile gladiator himself. You see Kamal dressed in a plain red tunic with tall leather boots and a bronze helmet with green plumes in it.

mobShortDesc: Omar the Opium Dealer comes up and offers you a small pipe.
mobLongDesc: You see a dirty and stinking thug before you. Omar is a man of little courtesy and he starts swearing at you as soon as he notices that you aren't one of his regular customers. Omar wears a dirty flea ridden kaftan and has a small dagger hidden into his belt.

mobShortDesc: Benu the Bellydancer is here performing a sensuous dance.
mobLongDesc: Benu is the harlot of the Sultanate and quite an attractive one at that ! She wears a skimpy dress made out of virtually transparent silk and a short veil for teasers. The drunken slobs swear that once she begins to move her hips to the music, no one can resist her seductive advances.

mobShortDesc: Kesh the Kaftan Weaver sits here embroidering a gown.
mobLongDesc: You see a handsome man standing behind the counter offering to show you his wares. Kesh is a kaftan weaver from some far off land and has a rare collection of exotic dresses and accessories for the rich. He wears a garb of china silk dyed in a bright orange color. On his head he wears a blue turban clasped together with a diamond brooch.

mobShortDesc: Hama the Tobacconist is here arranging cigars in his humidor.
mobLongDesc: You see a rotund man coughing away as he arranges his cigars and other smokables. Hama the tobacconist has the best collection of tobacco in the Sultanate and it is said that the Grand Emir gets his cigars from here also. As you come closer you notice that Hama's lips are burnt black and his fingers are stained yellow from the nicotine.

mobShortDesc: Bassoun the Barber stands here giving someone a quick haircut.
mobLongDesc: Bassoun the barber is a lanky man with a balding scalp and neatly trimmed beard and moustache. He is the best coiffure in the Sultanate and also the biggest gossip around. If there's some news you want - he's the right person to get it from first-hand ! He wears a long white apron and has a pair of scissors in his hands.

mobShortDesc: Nisha the Masseuse cracks her knuckles to give you a relaxing rub down.
mobLongDesc: Your senses are inflamed as you see Nisha. She is an extremely sensuous woman wearing a skimpy little blouse and a wraparound towel skirt. She is an expert at giving all kinds of massages which she has learnt from her family members. She cracks her fingers and beckons you to lie down on the massage table to try out one of her famous rub downs.

mobShortDesc: Das the Bartender is mixing some cool drinks behind the bar.
mobLongDesc: You see a simpleton of a man standing here mixing some refreshing drinks. He is wearing a loose-fitting apron. Das the Bartender is a slow-witted man who took to bartending because he could not learn any other trade. He stands here trying to look as if he really knows what he is doing.

mobShortDesc: Fatima the Fortune Teller sits here gazing into the mists of her crystal ball.
mobLongDesc: You see an old hag of a woman sitting here gazing into a crystal ball. Fatima the fortune-teller is a gypsy and an ugly one at that. She wears long purple robes with black symbols drawn into it. She is cock-eyed and seems to be drooling as she speaks. Her eyes seem to light up and she cackles as she observes something in her mystical ball.

mobShortDesc: Casim the Cobbler is here fixing a sole onto a worn out shoe.
mobLongDesc: You see a simple middle-aged man with strong arms and rugged hands. From his shabby attire you can make out how poor Casim really is. Casim seems to be humming a strange tune and his face lights up in a huge grin at the sight of a new customer. He tries to grab at your boots as you enter his shop.

mobShortDesc: Ali the Carpet Salesman is here dusting his fine carpets and shawls.
mobLongDesc: Ali the carpet salesman is a very popular boy around these parts - a favorite of all the young maidens. He is a dashing lad in his teens wearing a tiny vest and a red hat. His charming smile and innocent eyes make you feel at ease with him and he uses this to his advantage as he tries to sell you a carpet.

mobShortDesc: Abdul the Astrologer is here studying some celestial maps.
mobLongDesc: You see an elderly gentleman dressed in white robes peering over some charts on the table. Abdul is the renowned astrologer around these parts and charges a pittance to advise all those who believe in the powers of the Zodiac. He gestures to you to come and have a look at something new that he has discovered on his charts.

mobShortDesc: Tarek the Tinker is here fixing some weird contraption.
mobLongDesc: You see an old man wearing a thick pince-nez on his nose bending over some weird contraption. He seems to be completely involved with what he is trying to repair and does not notice you. He is wearing an old robe and a pair of socks which don't match. There is a wild glint in his eyes.

mobShortDesc: Magan stands here making some delicious sandwiches.
mobLongDesc: You see a short stocky fellow with a small moustache making some cheese here. Magan has a flock of sheep and cows with whose milk he makes fresh cheese for the Sultanate every morning. He wears a simple tunic with a white soiled apron over it. He seems to be enjoying his work and hums a light melody as he goes about it.

mobShortDesc: Jabal the Jeweller is here valuing some exquisite gemstones.
mobLongDesc: You see a fat and greedy bald man seating behind the counter counting his gold coins. Jabal the Jeweller is known to have swindled many a traveller especially those who cannot identify fake gems. He wears expensive robes and a plethora of gold chains and necklaces. He seems to be eyeing your jewels very closely !

mobShortDesc: Hassan is here tending to his horses.
mobLongDesc: You see a tall and gentle man walking around tending his horses. He wears a brown robe and has long flowing black hair. Hassan talks to his horses like they actually understand him. He appears to be a very peaceful man as he turns towards you and offers you a saddle to try out some steeds.

mobShortDesc: Suleyman the Soothsayer is here trying to make contact with ethereal beings.
mobLongDesc: You see an old man with a hunched back and long white hair. Suleyman the Soothsayer is the most ancient Jal-Purian and his sayings are treated with respect. Suleyman has very thin watery eyes and he seems to be lost in his own dreams, mumbling to himself.

mobShortDesc: A Jal-Purian Bedouin stands here taking care of his business.
mobLongDesc: You see a simple man dressed in white desert robes and a flowing headdress. As he opens his mouth to spit in the sand, you glimpse at his teeth capped with pure gold. He seems to be minding his own business and does not seem to mind the heat nor does he acknowledge your presence.

mobShortDesc: The Demon Statue stands here waiting to be worshipped by you !
mobLongDesc: You see a large statue carved from fine red alabaster. The statue of the Demon-God of Jal-Pur stands here in grim silence waiting for worshippers to pay homage to it. The face of the statue is set in a diabolic grin and the eyes seem to follow your every move. Near the feet of the statue you can make out traces of blood and rotting bones and flesh - of humans !

mobShortDesc: The Blind Seeress writhes in agony, in the grip of a powerful vision.
mobLongDesc: You see a frail and sickly woman dressed in rags and other scrapings picked up from the garbage. Her hair is totally disheveled and her face is sticky from her tears. She seems to be laughing and crying at the same time. Between these bouts, she writhes out in agony and screams out her prophecies.

mobShortDesc: The Guide stands here protecting his blind mistress.
mobLongDesc: You see a tall and well-built wrestler standing guard here. He is a mute who has been chosen to protect the Oracle. He is bald and wears a dress made from the skin of a white panther. He seems to be unaffected by the pain and suffering his mistress is going through.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY INFRAVISION DODGE INVUL DUAL FURY

mobShortDesc: Malik, the great Emir of Jal-Pur is relaxing here.
mobLongDesc: His eminence the great Emir of the Sultanate is a stocky man with a long and thick moustache drooping over his lips. He wears rings on each of his fingers and a richly fashioned kaftan. He is a great fighter and a benefactor of his people, a just and righteous man.

mobShortDesc: The Grand Vizier sits here writing in his book.
mobLongDesc: You see a small fat and bald man sweating away in the heat. He is the genius who manages all the affairs of the Emir as well as all the trade in and out of Jal-Pur. He wears a simple white robe embroidered with platinum and silver sequins.
actionFlags: SCAVENGER ISNPC AGGRESSIVE STAY-ZONE WIMPY ARM
affectedByFlags: INVISIBLE DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY INFRAVISION DODGE FURY

mobShortDesc: Tregannis the tyrant stands here ready to inflict pain and torture.
mobLongDesc: This short dark man is one of the most vicious in the sultanate. He is the tyrant and the interrogator of all the poor souls who happen to fall into his clutches. He wears tight black leather pants and a black leather vest accompanied by a small black leather mask which covers his eyes.
actionFlags: SENTINEL ISNPC AGGRESSIVE STAY-ZONE MEMORY SHIELD
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY INFRAVISION DUAL FURY

mobShortDesc: The Uber Enlightened One sits here, folded blissfully like a pretzel.
mobLongDesc: The Uber Enlightened One sits here, his arms and legs twined about his lithe body in what must be a pose intended only for those who have reached complete Nirvana. Though it looks uncomfortable, he is bathed in a rainbow glow and wears a cheshire smile on his beaming face. He is here by choice, to guide the followers in his pagoda on their own path to enlightenment and teach them the ways of Karma.

mobShortDesc: The Enlightened One stands here holding both hands joined above his head.
mobLongDesc: The Enlightened One stands here bathed in a rainbow aura. You see a smile of intense joy and happiness on his face. He has reached Nirvana, but has chosen to remain among the mortals to guide them on the path of Karma.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SANCTUARY SPHERE INFRAVISION DODGE DUAL

mobShortDesc: The Guru stands here gazing at a corner deep in thought.
mobLongDesc: You are completely enthralled by the dominating personality and towering size of the Great Guru. He wears an ancient war armor even though he has forsaken violence. He wears a red turban on his head and has a long moustache. All in all, he looks terrifying and you wish you were anywhere else but here.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY INFRAVISION DODGE DUAL FURY

mobShortDesc: A proud old man is enjoying his day here.
mobLongDesc: This old man gazes at you with icy blue eyes.  He has perfectly trimmed white hair, and a well groomed beard. His age and wisdom is clearly visible in his tanned and weathered face.

mobShortDesc: A lovely young woman is here browsing through the plaza.
mobLongDesc: You see a young and lively woman.  She has flaming red hair, and deep brown eyes.  She smiles happily and fixes her long yellow gown.  She is wearing an expensive-looking golden necklace and matching bracelet. She seems to be enjoying the Plaza.

mobShortDesc: Morrick the Enchanter is here stirring some strange mixture.
mobLongDesc: An extremely old, frail man stands here.  He seems to be endlessly picking at some of the magical items he has created, that are now strewn about the shop.  You notice he can barely walk, as he slowly limps his way from one place to another.  He barely manages to make a smile as he notices you glancing at him.

mobShortDesc: Jaafer the Jewel Merchant is here showing you some quality rings.
mobLongDesc: A short, pot-bellied man is here chatting cheerfully to himself. He wears an expensive looking robe and cloak, which clings rather tightly to his fat body.  He wears a lot of jewelry, which hangs from around his neck, and large gaudy rings on his fingers which flash in the flickering candlelight illuminating the store. He looks pleasant enough, but you get the impression he's an experienced haggler.

mobShortDesc: Maia the Amazon proudly displays her crafty weapons.
mobLongDesc: A tall blonde-haired woman stands before you.  She has extremely large muscles and a well defined shape.  She is obviously a strong and proud warrior.  Sweat and ash runs down her face as she slaves over boiling hot metals and pounding out weapons on her anvil.

mobShortDesc: Tasha the Weaver is here trying to sell some clothing.
mobLongDesc: A dark skinned woman with long black hair sits here with here legs crossed.  She is a very maintained woman with delicate features.  She wears some fine looking woven garments, which she probably made herself judging from some of her wares which lie about.

mobShortDesc: A beast of a man in long robes stands here.
mobLongDesc: A really huge man strands triumphantly before you.  He has a thin moustache that hangs down far past his chin.  He wears a long black silk robe that drapes to the ground about him. He shows little or no emotion on his face, however, judging from the look of this man, you are probably the first contestant that he has seen in quite a while.

mobShortDesc: A Dragon Warrior is here gazing at you harshly.
mobLongDesc: A large man is here clanking about in some heavy looking armor. He bears the crest of a red dragon on it.  He does not seem to mind you being here, however, you get the impression that he isn't exactly inviting you in either.  You can tell that this man is a highly trained warrior, and not someone for the average joe to mess around with.

mobShortDesc: A Dragon Guardian stands here daring you to a fight.
mobLongDesc: A hulking brute of a man stands before you.  He wears strong looking armor, with the crest of a red dragon on it.  He seems very strong and powerful.  He is clean shaven, and very well groomed and disciplined.  However, his duty is to protect this pagoda, and he is aggravated by your presence.

mobShortDesc: A Bushi Guard is here waiting to fight you.
mobLongDesc: A long-haired man is lazily moving around here.  If it weren't for the fact that he was standing, you might think he was asleep. He emits many strange snorts and grunts as if he is in some sort of pain.  He glances up at you, almost too lazy to do anything.  However, judging by the muscles in his arms, he may be an interesting match.

mobShortDesc: A powerful looking Bushi is here willing to fight.
mobLongDesc: A fat and ugly man stands here with his arms folded.  A strong smell of sweat and some other unpleasant odors waft your way. You see disgustingly long hairs growing from the Bushi's face and shoulders.  He grunts in your general direction.  You get the idea that this man doesn't want you here.

mobShortDesc: A sinister looking ninja is here preparing to fight.
mobLongDesc: A strong, agile looking man is here jumping and practicing some moves. He appears to be quite a contestant, if you wish to fight him. His eyes tell you that you are not wanted here.  You can tell by his movements that he is not as experienced as yourself, however, you are sure he is a crude fighter.

mobShortDesc: A man in dark robes raises his arms in defense as you approach.
mobLongDesc: A man wearing a tight, yet flexible suit of clothes is here standing at his guard position.  He eyes you suspiciously as if you are a threat to his current post.  You notice his body twitching ever so slightly at each move you make.  He is obviously preparing to fight.

mobShortDesc: A dark man stands here in peaceful silence.
mobLongDesc: A large muscular man is here stretching his muscles.  He shows rem shield signs of emotion on his face, just the devotion he has in defending this Pagoda.  His eyes fix on you for just a moment, then they focus back to their normal position.

mobShortDesc: A Yogi is here practicing some stances.
mobLongDesc: A tall dark man stands before you.  He raises his arms and legs in some very uncomfortable looking positions.  You can tell by looking at this man that he is highly trained, and possibly very dangerous. He looks peaceful enough, however he probably wouldn't back down from a fight.

mobShortDesc: A slender, but huge dragon exhales a pillar of fire at your approach.
mobLongDesc: A huge but slender dragon towers high above your head.  His large scales appear to be bathed in a magical flame.  The dragon has huge green eyes which shows the ancient wisdom all dragons possess. However, he does  not seem too happy about your approach. He spreads his wings in defiance at you.

mobShortDesc: Chun Lui stands here next to the gong.
mobLongDesc: A short and fat man stands here next to his large gong.  He holds a slender mallet in his hands.  He does not seem to notice your appearance here.  He is obviously very disciplined, as his only movements are the rising and falling of his chest as he breathes.

mobShortDesc: A man clad in heavy armour stands here gazing at you.
mobLongDesc: A fierce looking warrior stands before you preparing to engage in combat.  He is clad in heavy armor, and he leers at you from below his wooden helm.  You feel a slight shiver as you realize you are about to face a master fighter.

mobShortDesc: A beautiful woman is here kneeling in her garden.
mobLongDesc: A beautiful pale-skinned woman is kneeling here with her eyes closed.  She appears to be in deep meditation.  Her silk robes cascade about her, the ribbons in her hair float around her head as if suspended by magic.  She slowly opens her eyes as she feels your presence.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY SPHERE INFRAVISION DODGE INVUL

mobShortDesc: A half-decomposed body is lying in the corner here
mobLongDesc: YUK! Its ugly, disgusting ...it smells ...it just also moving a bit!

mobShortDesc: The spectral wife of the etcher is very faintly floating here
mobLongDesc: Yes you can barely make her out...though it almost makes you vomit. She is missing half her head...the one half is smashed in horribly like she took a nasty fall. Her one damaged eye hangs on its own. She smiles insanely at you thru a broken jaw and missing teeth. One hand of hers is resting on the shoulder of the etcher...her husband.

mobShortDesc: The mad etcher is sitting here babbling to himself and working on the wall
mobLongDesc: Quite insane, the mad etcher has been here it seems for decades... His hair is white; he babbles nonsense to himself; a layer of dust covers his out of date clothing; and he seems to be working on the same portion of the wall near the base...oh and he seems quite blind.  He leers insanely at you and says 'heh heh what can I do for you children?  Please don't mind my wife, she is always like that...hello dear can you make some tea for our company? Oh good! Now sit right down will you? would you like hot or cold tea? Yes the weather is....'  And on he babbles....

mobShortDesc: A rock slug is slowly creeping along, leaving a slime trail behind it
mobLongDesc: It is a large brownish slug. Got any salt? Didn't think so...

mobShortDesc: The spirit of King Crotus is floating here lazing above the floor
mobLongDesc: Floating above the ground here and looking a bit dead, he whispers softly into the air : "The forces of evil have unlocked my spirit as well as one other. Free me from this misery anyone that can hear. The peace of the grave calls me but I am blocked from its quiet."

mobShortDesc: An X'ist flesh eater is sitting here munching on some coffin remains
mobLongDesc: A large hairy monstrous beast, the only LIVE thing you have seen down here. It stands approximately 8 feet tall and hunches over to fit in this small room. It has a pair of tremendous claws that he uses to rip and tear. It has dog-like face except ...different... Bright glowing eyes and a grimace lend you to believe that he knew that you were coming...

mobShortDesc: Snapper Joe is standing here leering at you chillingly
mobLongDesc: What an ugly fiend! He is about 6'6'' and has mostly greenish skin with bright red hair. Half his face is burnt off and he has a perpetual smile. He is called up from his service in hell in order to aid the Undying One.

mobName: Some cave weeds spring up out of the ground and
mobShortDesc: Some weeds are creeping across the floor
mobLongDesc: Just some unpleasant looking vine-like growths...

mobShortDesc: The hunting horror is here in wait of an unwary traveler...
mobLongDesc: Serving Nyarlathotep, and now Roch'tar these beings are hunting for victims. These beings resemble enormous ropy black serpents or worms possessing bat- like or umbrella-like wings.  Their forms continually shift and change, twitching and writhing, so it is hard to look at them.  They speak in great harsh voices. A hunting horror is HUGE, normally around 40 feet long.

mobShortDesc: A nightgaunt is standing here
mobLongDesc: ...shocking and uncouth black thing with smooth, oily, skin, unpleasant horns that curve inward toward each other, bat wings whose beating make no sound, ugly prehensile paws, and a barbed tail that lashes disquietingly.  And worst of all, it makes absolutely no sound or speech and smiles not at all because it has no face, only a suggestive blackness where a face ought to be...

mobShortDesc: A Mig-Go is walking around here
mobLongDesc: Mi-Go, the Fungi from Yuggoth...it is a pinkish being about five feet long; with a crustaceous body bearing a vast pair of or membranous wings and several sets of articulate limbs, and with a sort of convoluted ellipsoid, covered with multitudes of very small antennae, where a head would ordinarily be. ... These beings sometimes walk on all their legs and sometimes on the hindmost pair only

mobShortDesc: A priest of all gods stands here solemnly speaking words of praise.
mobLongDesc: Obviously a goodly man, you feel somehow...closer to the gods just by gazing upon this man.  Dressed in white, fine white hair, and a soft slightly wrinkled face...this man has an sacred beauty. You'd swear you saw a halo around his head.

mobShortDesc: A vampire is here hiding his face from your light source.
mobLongDesc: The guardian vampire looks quite EVIL.  Just by looking at him the hair on your arms raises. He looks mighty tough to be just a minor minion.

mobShortDesc: You spot a wraith advancing towards you from the shadows.
mobLongDesc: The wraith no longer has a material form.  He is wearing a tattered black robe which hides all but the darkness of his face and the glimmer in his eyes.

mobShortDesc: A ghoul is here staring at you hungrily.
mobLongDesc: The ghoul no longer resembles the adventurer he once was.  Nonetheless he looks like he hasn't forgot his fighting skills.

mobShortDesc: An undead zombie sits here munching on something...
mobLongDesc: His body is totally white and slowly rotting away.  Each Zombie looks quite different from the next because they were, of course, once alive and human.

mobShortDesc: A bony skeleton is here.
mobLongDesc: Brown bones with tufts of clothing still hanging from them. This skeleton looks very mindless but still dangerous...

mobShortDesc: The rabid rat scurries towards you.  Its eyes glowing deep red.
mobLongDesc: They scurry into the shadows and attack en-masse.

mobShortDesc: The guardian naga slithers toward you to protect her lair.
mobLongDesc: You are intruders, and you must die.

mobShortDesc: The nile crocodile swallows the last of his rat appetizer.
mobLongDesc: I bet you're next!

mobShortDesc: A black pudding oozes towards you.
mobLongDesc: It is gelantinous and gooey.

mobShortDesc: A rust monster squats here, eagerly eyeing your armor and weapons.
mobLongDesc: It looks hungry.

mobShortDesc: An ornate chest sits in the corner.
mobLongDesc: It looks well made.

mobShortDesc: Anubis sits in his throne, wearing a glowing key.
mobLongDesc: He has the body of a man, and the head of a jackal.

mobShortDesc: A statue of Akinra stands here, and blocks your path.
mobLongDesc: He looks really mean.

mobShortDesc: A mummy gasps in astonishment at your success thus far.
mobLongDesc: He looks like he wants to change your luck.

mobShortDesc: A spectre stands here, reaching out for you.
mobLongDesc: He looks sad.

mobShortDesc: A stone golem stands here
mobLongDesc: He looks large and granite.

mobShortDesc: A clay golem stands here.
mobLongDesc: He is large, and ceramic.

mobShortDesc: A large iron golem stands here.
mobLongDesc: He is large, and metallic.

mobShortDesc: A blank of primal clay stands here, waiting to be shaped
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.

mobShortDesc: A blank of primal clay stands here, waiting to be shaped
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.

mobShortDesc: A gigantic griffon stands before you.
mobLongDesc: This creature has the body of a lion and the wings and head of an eagle. Its gigantic body towers over you.

mobShortDesc: The Griffon Captain towers over you.
mobLongDesc: A griffon even larger than the others with a stare to freeze you in your tracks. He wears his field armor, prepared for battle at all times.

mobShortDesc: A large rat is here scurring about the ground.
mobLongDesc: A large rat glares at you through yellow eyes.

mobShortDesc: A large griffon stands before you.
mobLongDesc: A large creature, part lion, part eagle, it has a wingspan of ten feet or more.

mobShortDesc: Shargugh the Forest Brownie is here, grinning broadly at you.
mobLongDesc: This little fellow is only three foot tall with wild matted brown hair and long tangled brown beard.  He wears ragged brown and green clothing and looks as if he is having great fun.

mobShortDesc: The huge, bulky Queen Spider is here.
mobLongDesc: This disgusting creature is at the size of a small elephant.  It has eight huge, hairy legs that would give it a tremendous speed on almost any surface if it wasn't so immensely fat.  Its large, bulbous eyes stare back at you.

mobShortDesc: A huge, poisonous spider is here.
mobLongDesc: This disgusting creature is at the size of a human crawling on all four.  It has eight hairy legs that gives it a tremendous speed on almost any surface and sharp poisonous fangs to paralyze or kill its prey.

mobShortDesc: A huge green dragon is here, its narrow yellow eyes glowing with rage.
mobLongDesc: This enormous winged serpent has dark green scales covering most of its colossal body.  Numerous holes in its heavy wings tell of many fights as does the nicks in the horns on its head.  It smells as disgusting as only dragons do.

mobName: a huge, ancient tree, walking on giant roots,
mobShortDesc: A huge, ancient tree towers above you.
mobLongDesc: Its roots are extremely big and large parts of them are above ground.  > The enormous grey trunk emits a deep, moaning sound.

mobName: a huge, ancient tree, walking on giant roots,
mobShortDesc: A huge, ancient tree towers above you.
mobLongDesc: Its roots are extremely big and large parts of them are above ground.  > The enormous grey trunk shivers slightly, as if sighing deeply.

mobShortDesc: A large, black wolf is here, glaring hungrily at you.
mobLongDesc: The large, black wolf eyes you with interest while licking its lips.

mobShortDesc: A large, grey wolf is here, glaring hungrily at you.
mobLongDesc: The large, grey wolf eyes you with interest while licking its lips.

mobShortDesc: A ferocious warg is here, snarling angrily at you.
mobLongDesc: It is an exceptionally large wolf with thick, black fur.  Saliva is dripping quickly from its long, white fangs.  It looks quite dangerous and very angry.

mobShortDesc: A vicious warg is here, snarling angrily at you.
mobLongDesc: It is an exceptionally large wolf with thick, black fur.  Saliva is dripping quickly from its long, white fangs.  It looks quite dangerous and very angry.

mobShortDesc: A brown fox is here, looking for some rabbits to chew up.
mobLongDesc: It is a large fox with beautiful, red-brown fur and a long, thick brush.

mobShortDesc: A fallow deer is grazing peacefully here.
mobLongDesc: She is a graceful creature on long, slender legs, and with large, brown eyes looking back at you with an air of watchful interest.

mobShortDesc: A ferocious rabbit is here, glaring hungrily at you.
mobLongDesc: This small, furry creature with long ears and big feet has been attacked by the dreaded rabbit rabies, a horrible disease that turns helpless and innocent rabbits into ferocious and bloodthirsty monsters.

mobShortDesc: A big, brown, angry-looking bear is here.
mobLongDesc: The bear is a big, brown, furry animal with very large claws and very sharp teeth.  It doesn't resemble those cute little thingies from toy shops at all.

mobShortDesc: A cute rabbit is here.
mobLongDesc: It is a small, furry creature with long ears and big feet.

mobShortDesc: John the Lumberjack is here, looking for some trees to chop down.
mobLongDesc: He is six feet tall and looks quite strong, muscles bulging under his heavy, chequered shirt.  His features are worn with hard work and his expression is one of a peaceful man leading a simple life.

mobShortDesc: Franz the Requisitions Officer is in search of brave adventurers.
mobLongDesc: Franz has the wizened lines of an elder sage, but the youthful exuberance one has come to expect with kenders. His salt and pepper hair is pulled up into the traditional topknot revealing his pointy ears. Bright, childish eyes sparkle and dart curiously to any shiny objects in his periphery. A large sack made of jute is secured over his shoulders, full of what appear to be smaller canvas bags and other trinkets he may have borrowed.

mobShortDesc: A kender is dancing here.
mobLongDesc: She is Marlene. She is the most beautiful kender ever seen. She rolls her eyes at you. She invites you to dance with her.

mobShortDesc: A kender is here, looking for something.
mobLongDesc: A small kender is desperately seeking something. She seems to be missing her mirror. The sign in her chest says " Eva ".

mobShortDesc: A kender is staring at the sky.
mobLongDesc: This kender is quite small even for a kender. His name tag says " Herman ". Herman is planning to repair his vessel. He wants to return to Sithikus.

mobShortDesc: A kender is here, thinking hard about something.
mobLongDesc: You see a kender drawing some circles and lines in the ground. Seems like he is planning an attack to somewhere. In his uniform there is a sign which says: " Erwin ". He is muttering something about crushing those damn Barovians.

mobShortDesc: A beautiful kender is hopping around here.
mobLongDesc: Hilda is drinking some milk. She is preparing herself for a beauty contest.

mobShortDesc: A kender is casually walking by.
mobLongDesc: You see a stocky kender called Jurgen. He is eating a bratwurst while walking away.

mobShortDesc: A kender here wants to play with you.
mobLongDesc: The kender grabs your arm and tells you " Hi, I'm Hans. Let's play something."

mobShortDesc: A kender beams a smile at you.
mobLongDesc: This medium sized kender is named Dieter. You can tell that from the small sign that he has in his chest. Dieter asks you for a snack.

mobShortDesc: A kender is standing here.
mobLongDesc: He has a small sign in his chest that says " Karl ". Karl is picking his teeth. He is wondering why his teeth are so dull and pockets so full.

mobShortDesc: Scotty is standing here, hands itching for beaming.
mobLongDesc: Scotty's real name is Heinrich Kluge, but all his friends call him Scotty. It must be some kind of inside joke. Scotty loves to beam things.

mobShortDesc: Slaphoff the kender is hopping happily around here.
mobLongDesc: Slaphoff has an orange red hair with a long topknot. He is a happy little odd short fellow. When he sees you he greets you with wide smile and says : "Hi, new friends. Wanna play with me ?"

mobShortDesc: Baron von Kugelschitzel is comfortably resting here.
mobLongDesc: Baron von Kugelschitzel is levitating above the ground. He has a red topknot and long sharp pointy teeth. When he notices you looking at him, he grins evilly at you. There seems to be some blood in his handkerchief.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY INFRAVISION DODGE SNEAK DUAL

mobShortDesc: A statue of some bovine matriarch is standing here.
mobLongDesc: You instantly regret your decision to look at her!

mobShortDesc: A monstrous dog is here, growling at everything that moves.
mobLongDesc: This dog is well fed, huge, and pretty angry.

mobShortDesc: A Grizzly Bear is standing here.
mobLongDesc: This grizzly is relatively docile.  There seems to be something calming about this sanctuary that keeps it passive.

mobShortDesc: A stag is standing here.
mobLongDesc: A male deer is here, grazing.

mobShortDesc: A stray dog is wandering here, sniffing for scraps.
mobLongDesc: This stray dog is sniffing around, looking for food.  It's fur is matted, unkempt, and greasy.

mobShortDesc: The Black Market Vendor is standing here.
mobLongDesc: The Halfling Black Market, until recently, was only rumored to have existed.  The modern Black Market sells goods from all over the world at high prices.  Though many will say that the price is definitely worthwhile.

mobShortDesc: The halfling general store manager is here, sell goods.
mobLongDesc: The halfling general store manager sells basic supplies to passers-by and locals alike.

mobShortDesc: The halfling baker is here, baking.
mobLongDesc: The halfling baker is world famous.  Or, you know, he would be if people worldwide would try his baked goods. But they're pretty dang good, promise!

mobShortDesc: The Guild Master is here, and he's not happy with you!
mobLongDesc: The Guild Master was put in charge of the Thieves' Guild shortly after Middenheim's disappearance.  He is extremely dangerous and unpredictable, and notorious throughout the Halfling Village.

mobShortDesc: A halfling rogue is here, looking to pick a fight!
mobLongDesc: Halfling rogues are the scum of the halfling village, and the foot soldiers of the infamous Thieves' Guild.

mobShortDesc: A halfling thug is here, looking for money!
mobLongDesc: Halfling thugs rarely show their faces around town in the daytime.  However, they are always looking for a shakedown, especially when out-of-towners are around.

mobShortDesc: A halfling beggar is here, asking for coins.
mobLongDesc: A halfling beggar is here, begging for coins.  They are seen frequently around town.  Some actually make a decent living asking for money, others do not.

mobShortDesc: The Celestial Wizard's familiar hovers here.
mobLongDesc: This little demonic imp is the Celestial Wizard's Familiar. He doesn't have a name, but he's a fairly compelling reason why nobody fights or even comes to visit the Celestial Wizard.

mobShortDesc: The Grey Wizard's Apprentice is standing here.
mobLongDesc: The Grey Wizard's Apprentice is standing here, working on his spells, practices, and studies.

mobShortDesc: The Bright Wizard's Apprentice is standing here.
mobLongDesc: The Bright Wizard's Apprentice is here.  She completely ignores you as she attends to straightening up the Bright Wizard's study.

mobShortDesc: The Grey Wizard is standing here.
mobLongDesc: The Grey Wizard is a shady figure among the college.  He is highly respected for his magical competence.  Though he is also slightly removed from his colleagues due to his personal choices and mannerisms.

mobShortDesc: The Celestial Wizard is standing here.
mobLongDesc: He is the teacher of the Celestial College of Magic.  He is a known frequenter of the halfling chapel, and is renowned for his love of magic, his dedication to his hometown, and his calming nature.  However, he is also a very competent wizard in his own regard and should not be taken lightly.

mobShortDesc: The Bright Wizard is standing here.
mobLongDesc: He is the teacher of the Bright College of Magic.  The Bright Wizard has dedicated much of his life to studying the elusive halfling goddess.  Going so far as to hire the infamous Middenheim to procure information.  However, despite his ties to the king of the Thieves' Guild, the Bright Wizard is still highly respected among his colleagues.

mobShortDesc: The Middenheim is standing here.
mobLongDesc: The Middenheim was nobility of sorts once upon a time.  He dresses in blues and whites, with exotic and extravagant figures and painting about his equipment.  He is known as one of the halfling champions, despite the fact that he was banished from the Halfling Village for his creation and involvement of their notorious Thieves' Guild.

mobShortDesc: The Ostermark is standing here.
mobLongDesc: The Ostermark stands here, dressed in red and yellow.  He boasts a badge with a flying rabbit on it.  Known as one of the few true halfling champions.  Ostermark is a known hunter and poacher of wild and exotic game.  Ostermark was known for his love of the game, and cared little for trophies.  Instead, he preferred to sell his trophies to the black market, and use the money he received in doing so to fund his hunting expeditions.

mobShortDesc: The Averland stands here, reciting prayers to his goddess.
mobLongDesc: The Averland stands here, dressed in yellow and black.  He is one of the few known halfling champions of this part.  A true knight by every definition of the word, he stands ever vigil for his goddess's call.

mobShortDesc: The Halfling Priest is standing here, reciting a prayer.
mobLongDesc: The Halfling Priest is one of the last remaining worshippers of the Halfling Goddess.  Few know her, or more accurately, or exactly what she is.  However, the priest remains vigilant in his worship.  In the hopes that she, or her champion, may return.

mobShortDesc: The halfling magic pupil is studying here.
mobLongDesc: Halfling pupils spend almost their entire day practicing rudimentary magic taught to them by one of the three head halfling wizards, or their apprentices, in the hopes that they might become a respectable wizard themselves.

mobShortDesc: A halfling worker is here, instead of getting any work done.
mobLongDesc: Halfling workers are fairly common not only in their own, Halfling Village, but have been seen in other parts of the world as well.  Their size allows them to more easily access certain areas, and squeeze into places that other races just cannot.

mobShortDesc: A halfling citizen is standing here.
mobLongDesc: Halfling citizens are known for their cheerful, carefree nature, and love of all things fattening.  They are also mischievous, agile, and surprisingly coordinated both in and out of combat.

mobShortDesc: A halfling guard is standing here.
mobLongDesc: There is a rather short halfling guard standing here, and acting as a protector of this small village.  Despite his size, he projects an aura of confidence.

mobShortDesc: Shargugh the Forest Brownie is here, grinning broadly at you.
mobLongDesc: This little fellow is only three foot tall with wild matted brown hair and long tangled brown beard.  He wears ragged brown and green clothing and looks as if he is having great fun.

mobShortDesc: The huge, bulky Queen Spider is here.
mobLongDesc: This disgusting creature is at the size of a small elephant.  It has eight huge, hairy legs that would give it a tremendous speed on almost any surface if it wasn't so immensely fat.  Its large, bulbous eyes stare back at you.

mobShortDesc: A huge, poisonous spider is here.
mobLongDesc: This disgusting creature is at the size of a human crawling on all four.  It has eight hairy legs that gives it a tremendous speed on almost any surface and sharp poisonous fangs to paralyze or kill its prey.

mobShortDesc: A huge green dragon is here, its narrow yellow eyes glowing with rage.
mobLongDesc: This enormous winged serpent has dark green scales covering most of its colossal body.  Numerous holes in its heavy wings tell of many fights as does the nicks in the horns on its head.  It smells as disgusting as only dragons do.

mobName: a huge, ancient tree, walking on giant roots,
mobShortDesc: A huge, ancient tree towers above you.
mobLongDesc: Its roots are extremely big and large parts of them are above ground.  > The enormous grey trunk emits a deep, moaning sound.

mobName: a huge, ancient tree, walking on giant roots,
mobShortDesc: A huge, ancient tree towers above you.
mobLongDesc: Its roots are extremely big and large parts of them are above ground.  > The enormous grey trunk shivers slightly, as if sighing deeply.

mobShortDesc: A large, black wolf is here, glaring hungrily at you.
mobLongDesc: The large, black wolf eyes you with interest while licking its lips.

mobShortDesc: A large, grey wolf is here, glaring hungrily at you.
mobLongDesc: The large, grey wolf eyes you with interest while licking its lips.

mobShortDesc: A ferocious warg is here, snarling angrily at you.
mobLongDesc: It is an exceptionally large wolf with thick, black fur.  Saliva is dripping quickly from its long, white fangs.  It looks quite dangerous and very angry.

mobShortDesc: A vicious warg is here, snarling angrily at you.
mobLongDesc: It is an exceptionally large wolf with thick, black fur.  Saliva is dripping quickly from its long, white fangs.  It looks quite dangerous and very angry.

mobShortDesc: A brown fox is here, looking for some rabbits to chew up.
mobLongDesc: It is a large fox with beautiful, red-brown fur and a long, thick brush.

mobShortDesc: A fallow deer is grazing peacefully here.
mobLongDesc: She is a graceful creature on long, slender legs, and with large, brown eyes looking back at you with an air of watchful interest.

mobShortDesc: A ferocious rabbit is here, glaring hungrily at you.
mobLongDesc: This small, furry creature with long ears and big feet has been attacked by the dreaded rabbit rabies, a horrible disease that turns helpless and innocent rabbits into ferocious and bloodthirsty monsters.

mobShortDesc: A big, brown, angry-looking bear is here.
mobLongDesc: The bear is a big, brown, furry animal with very large claws and very sharp teeth.  It doesn't resemble those cute little thingies from toy shops at all.

mobShortDesc: A cute rabbit is here.
mobLongDesc: It is a small, furry creature with long ears and big feet.

mobShortDesc: John the Lumberjack is here, looking for some trees to chop down.
mobLongDesc: He is six feet tall and looks quite strong, muscles bulging under his heavy, chequered shirt.  His features are worn with hard work and his expression is one of a peaceful man leading a simple life.

mobShortDesc: An enraged chicken squawks and flutters.
mobLongDesc: This giant chicken has a red and black beak, black and white feathers and fluffy body. Its eye glow a dark red as it intensely focuses on you. It is not angry because it got turned into food, it is angry because it didnt get chosen to join Happy Bob's wonderful menu. Happy Bob had once told the chicken "BBQ sauce and chicken are the best together". But it was all a lie.

mobShortDesc: A sweaty man is screaming and yelling profusely.
mobLongDesc: An angry man yells and screams, angry over being fired for something dumb. The random excuses fly from his mouth, justifying his poor performance, lack of skills and ability to always cost the owner more money. Since it can't be his fault, he is going to take it out on you, as you are the root cause of all his problems.

mobShortDesc: A very fat pig oinks loudly.
mobLongDesc: A large pink pig lumbers towards you. Its girth is so wide it can barely walk but it continues on. Numerous scars cover its skin as it has survived many attempts to be turned into dinner.  The smell is horrible, as it is covered in blood, mud and many other unsavory things.

mobShortDesc: A bulky cow snorts and prepares to charge.
mobLongDesc: A large black and white cow snorts in contempt. Its red eyes seethe with anger as it stares straight through you. It opens it mouth and its teeth are pointed, dripping with blood and it looks to make you its next meal.

mobShortDesc: An employee swears as he drops with sweat, seasoning and sauce
mobLongDesc: A very greasy man leans to the side stretching his back. The long days in front of the smokers really does take its toll, due to the heavy slabs of meat, the sauces, spices, heat, and smoke. Spice can be seen in his hair, sauce running down his apron and heat has burned his eyebrows and eyelashes off.  The Happy Bob's BBQ apron can still be seen wrapped around his waist.

mobShortDesc: A mad bovine is going berserk
mobLongDesc: A large brown and white quadruped is seen attempting to buck and kick its legs and to smash its body into those who are close to it. Its large black hooves smash and dent the stainless-steel floor. Its body is taut with bulging muscles making this cow much more aggressive and larger than what you would expect.

mobShortDesc: A bbq sauce covered pig walks back and forth
mobLongDesc: A very large and fat pig oinks and grunts at you. For whatever mind boggling reason, it is also covered in barbeque sauce. It moves around in a back and forth motion, ramming and headbutting whatever is in its path. This pig is very angry and is determined to not be turned into some tasty ribs.

mobShortDesc: An overworked waiter hurriedly rushes back and forth.
mobLongDesc: This young boy looks flustered and panicked. Tears stream down his face as they take a constant plethora of verbal and physical abuse from the many rowdy patrons. They rush to the front and back of the restaurant carrying numerous plates of food for the many tables that all want service.

mobShortDesc: A patron is yelling and screaming about the long wait.
mobLongDesc: An angry patron is banging his hands on the table and foaming at the mouth. They demand service and demand that everything be here when they want it.  They see themselves as the most important person and simply treat all the employees like trash.

mobShortDesc: A hostess is ignoring your attempts to be seated.
mobLongDesc: A tall woman stands before you giving you the side eye as she calmly stares at her clipboard ignoring the requests from the many people waiting for seats.  The rowdy patrons yelling for help are ignored as she sings a tune in her head.

mobName: Happy Bob, Owner of Happy Bob's BBQ
mobShortDesc: The owner of the restaurant paces back and forth
mobLongDesc: A large and slightly overweight man stands behind his desk holding a phone and yelling into it. His balding head and beer belly jut out of his shirt which is way too tight for him. Hints of BBQ sauce can be seen smeared down the front of his shirt. He looks up at you and then continues chatting on the phone.

mobShortDesc: the shape of a small child can faintly be seen within a shooting star.
mobLongDesc: The small child is engulfed in a bright light that resembles a star.  He appears to be about three or four years old, yet eminates a wisdom of an old man.  From time to time, he darts about the room in a random like manner.

mobShortDesc: a bright star rapidly moves around the area
mobLongDesc: This seven point star is shooting around the room at a very fast pace. It is difficult to make out any detail as it is surrounded by a very bright light.  Occasional smaller stars shoot out from the main body, making the appearance of a tail of light emerge from behind the star.

mobShortDesc: a bright star rapidly moves around the area
mobLongDesc: This seven point star is shooting around the room at a very fast pace. It is difficult to make out any detail as it is surrounded by a very bright light.  Occasional smaller stars shoot out from the main body, making the appearance of a tail of light emerge from behind the star.

mobShortDesc: a bright star rapidly moves around the area
mobLongDesc: This seven point star is shooting around the room at a very fast pace. It is difficult to make out any detail as it is surrounded by a very bright light.  Occasional smaller stars shoot out from the main body, making the appearance of a tail of light emerge from behind the star.

mobShortDesc: a bright star rapidly moves around the area
mobLongDesc: This seven point star is shooting around the room at a very fast pace. It is difficult to make out any detail as it is surrounded by a very bright light.  Occasional smaller stars shoot out from the main body, making the appearance of a tail of light emerge from behind the star.

mobShortDesc: a bright star rapidly moves around the area
mobLongDesc: This seven point star is shooting around the room at a very fast pace. It is difficult to make out any detail as it is surrounded by a very bright light.  Occasional smaller stars shoot out from the main body, making the appearance of a tail of light emerge from behind the star.

mobShortDesc: a bright star rapidly moves around the area
mobLongDesc: This seven point star is shooting around the room at a very fast pace. It is difficult to make out any detail as it is surrounded by a very bright light.  Occasional smaller stars shoot out from the main body, making the appearance of a tail of light emerge from behind the star.

mobShortDesc: A bright light shines here, made of pure elemental energy.
mobLongDesc: It shines with a fierce light that almost blinds you as you try to get a better look.  Unfortunately, all you can see is a figure surrounded by a very bright light.

mobShortDesc: An evil looking demon-like creature is here, looking for it's master.
