mobLongDesc: This greater devil from the depths of hell is completely covered in black scales. It has massive wings that resemble that of a bat extending from the middle of it's back.  It is completely naked and fights with it's powerful claws and massive strength.  It's body seems to pull all the light in the room into it.
attackType: CLAW TAILSLAM DISARM TRAMPLE SPELL CAST

mobShortDesc: One of the many Saints of heaven is standing here.
mobLongDesc: William has been in heaven for some time.  He is one of the lesser known saints because he prefers to keep a low profile, researching the weaknesses of hell.

mobShortDesc: One of the many Saints of heaven is standing here.
mobLongDesc: Kathryn was once known for wearing a cloak which was named after her, but has since decided to keep it hidden as it was more of a personal item than one for show.  She is a kind and gentle soul, and would help anyone that needed it.
mobImmune: FIRE ELECTRIC POISON HIT BLUDGEON PIERCE WHIP HACK CHOP

mobShortDesc: One of the many Saints of heaven is standing here.
mobLongDesc: Saint Kevin is the newest saint in heaven.  He was recently promoted during the last major battle of heaven.  His prized possession is an axe that he was awarded at the heaven forge after that last battle.

mobShortDesc: One of the many Saints of heaven is standing here.
mobLongDesc: Mark is one of the apostles of heaven and now a saint.  He has been around for countless years and is a loyal servant of heaven.  However, when it comes time to fight, he usually prefers to stay out of direct combat, not because he is a coward, but because he serves heaven better by healing the wounded.

mobShortDesc: One of the many Saints of heaven is standing here.
mobLongDesc: Jessica is one of the female saints of heaven.  She is best known for a great piece of armor she no longer uses, but has hidden.

mobShortDesc: Your alter ego is here, looking rather sickened by your presence.
mobLongDesc: This figure is your complete opposite.  It seems to be everything which you hate about yourself.  If seems to have the same feelings towards you and will do anything to get rid of your presence, a solution you would like to enforce as well.

mobShortDesc: A tremendous rock blocks your path.
mobLongDesc: It's a gigantic rock.  It seems to move to get in your path, so you would guess it is alive.

mobName: The misty outline of an assassin
mobShortDesc: A shadowy mist covered figure approaches.
mobLongDesc: The shadowy figure moves silently through the mist, almost supernaturally. In an instant, you lose track of where he went, and the next second you feel a sharp pain in your back.
affectedByFlags: INVISIBLE DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SPHERE INVUL DUAL

mobShortDesc: A seasoned veteran of combat stands here, awaiting a challenge.
mobLongDesc: This man has dedicated his life to fighting evil for the powers of Heaven. However, he has sworn to only defend vileness, rather than provoke attacks.  He looks powerful indeed, and with several of his friends together, could be a very deadly force.

mobShortDesc: The Holy Guardian of Heaven Proper is on patrol here.
mobLongDesc: Alexander is one of the most honored guardians of the Heavens.  He has defeated many of the forces of hell in his day and serves as a role model for the younger angels.  One rank above Arch Angel, he is a feared opponent of the forces of hell and commands the utmost respect from all who he fights.  He has a huge set of white wings which could sweep you off your feet.
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST

mobShortDesc: A tremendously evil being is trying to escape this place.
mobLongDesc: Xalith'kragtar'kruk's attention is currently focused on escaping this place.  His skin is completely black and two huge wings protrude from his muscular back.  Battle scars line his body and when he occasionally flexes his muscles, they expand to nearly twice their normal size.  He evokes an aura of pure evil and combat is no stranger from him.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY SPHERE PROTECT-GOOD FLY INVUL DUAL
mobImmune: POISON CHARM PARALYSIS CLAIR SUMMON WHIP
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST TRAMPLE SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST
attackTarget: BUFFER RAN_ROOM ROOM BUFFER RAN_ROOM RAN_ROOM RAN_ROOM
attackSpell: blindness_dust UNKNOWN: 203  hell_fire vampiric_touch dispel_sanctuary conflagration

mobShortDesc: A beautiful Archangel is counting the infinite riches of Heaven.
mobLongDesc: Samantha is one of the female Archangels of Heaven.  Her talents of mathematics lend her to the unending job of counting the riches of Heaven.  She doesn't wear the normal robes, but instead chooses to wear a full set of battle armor, longing for the day she can fight the forces of Hell, but for now, she is stuck in this very room, counting, and counting......

mobShortDesc: An Archangel of Heaven is here, reading a book.
mobLongDesc: Michael is one of the greater Archangels of Heaven.  He is dressed in a pure white robe and emits a great aura of holiness.  He is currently reading one of the many books in the library of Heaven and his halo shines brightly.
attackType: PUNCH DISARM SPELL CAST SPELL CAST

mobShortDesc: A Scholarly Archangel is here, unlocking the secrets of the universe.
mobLongDesc: Charles, or Charlie as the other Archangels call him, is a rather nerdy guy.  He spends most of his day in this room, researching the secrets of the universe and performing various expariments. Although he looks fraile physically, the powers of Heaven would surely come to his aid if needed, wouldn't they?

mobShortDesc: A large, powerful looking Angel is flying here.
mobLongDesc: This Angel looks like one of the soldiers who fight for Heaven from time to time in the unending war against Hell.  Her wings span beautifully and her halo emits a faint light that serves as some sort of protection against evil powers.  She has some scars and looks very seasoned to combat.
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST

mobShortDesc: An angel hovers here, looking rather holy.
mobLongDesc: This angel's wings have matured, but look as if they are useless for flying in their current state.  Dressed in white robes, angels typically study literature and train for combat against the minions of Hell.  Once fully matured, they make excellent fighters as well as scholars.

mobShortDesc: A heavenly being is here, proclaiming the greatness of the Heavens.
mobLongDesc: The Archangel Gabriel is one of heavens greatest generals.  His courage is known throughout the heavens and hells.  A fierce warrior, there are many battle scars which line his body, but yet he looks proud to bear these.  He is currently speaking on the greatness of Heaven.

mobShortDesc: Saint Peter is here, busy reading a gigantic book.
mobLongDesc: Saint Peter is one of the archangels of heaven.  He is performing his duties here ensuring that only those who have lived good lives can enter Heaven Proper.  He is reading a book which contains the list of people who can enter, and you wonder if your name is on the list. His giant wings span nearly 15 feet and a faint halo floats above his head.
affectedByFlags: SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY SPHERE DODGE FLY INVUL DUAL
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST

mobShortDesc: A Gigantic Golden Wyrm sits here, pondering you intently.
mobLongDesc: A wyrm is resting here in it's nest.  It shines like gold and it's scales seem to be made of gold itself.  It notices you are here and is looking right at you, but you sense no imminent danger as it radiates an aura of friendliness.

mobShortDesc: An unholy presence surrounds this room.
mobLongDesc: This swirling mass of grayness emits an unholy aura.  It has no true physical form and is constantly changing how it looks, for an instant, you can see yourself within its swirling mass, perhaps an indication of the evil which lies within your soul.
affectedByFlags: SANCTUARY SPHERE DODGE PROTECT-GOOD FLY DUAL
mobImmune: PUMMEL KICK PUNCH BLUDGEON WHIP CRUSH
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST TRAMPLE BITE SPELL CAST

mobShortDesc: A tiny angel is walking around.
mobLongDesc: This angel is about 1/2 the size of an average human.  It has a very faint halo about it's head and a small pair of underdeveloped wings can be seen protruding from the white robes it wears.

mobShortDesc: A small cherub is happily fluttering about.
mobLongDesc: This small fellow is fluttering around, simply happy to be alive. In time, he could develop into an angel, but for now he is content, spreading his happiness around.

mobShortDesc: A gigantic winged demon brandishes its dirty talons at you.
mobLongDesc: The guard has leathery jet-black skin with spiked armor at his shoulders and a bleached skull on his head.  On his arm is buckled a disc with many razor edges, and he wields a wickedly pointed pitchfork.  His wings are beating jointly as he flails dark, marred talons in the air before your tender eye-sockets.
mobImmune: FIRE ELECTRIC POISON PUMMEL PUNCH SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DRAIN DISINTEGRATE SUMMON BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT

mobShortDesc: A gigantic winged demon brandishes its dirty talons at you.
mobLongDesc: The guard has leathery jet-black skin with spiked armor at his shoulders and a bleached skull on his head.  On his arm is buckled a disc with many razor edges, and he wields a wickedly pointed pitchfork.  His wings are beating jointly as he flails dark, marred talons in the air before your tender eye-sockets.
mobImmune: FIRE ELECTRIC POISON PUMMEL PUNCH SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DRAIN DISINTEGRATE SUMMON BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT

mobShortDesc: A huge winged demon is here standing across the passage of the bridge.
mobLongDesc: The guard has leathery jet-black skin with spiked armor at his shoulders and a bleached skull on his head.  On his arm is buckled a disc with many razor edges, and he wields a wickedly pointed pitchfork.  His wings unfurl to show a span of greater than that of the bridge.
mobImmune: FIRE POISON PUMMEL PUNCH SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DRAIN DISINTEGRATE SUMMON BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT

mobShortDesc: A huge winged demon is here standing across the passage of the bridge.
mobLongDesc: The guard has leathery jet-black skin with spiked armor at his shoulders and a bleached skull on his head.  On his arm is buckled a disc with many razor edges, and he wields a wickedly pointed pitchfork.  His wings unfurl to show a span of greater than that of the bridge.
mobImmune: FIRE POISON PUMMEL PUNCH SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DRAIN DISINTEGRATE SUMMON BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT

mobShortDesc: A large winged demon is here guarding the bridge.
mobLongDesc: The guard has leathery jet-black skin with spiked armor at his shoulders and a bleached skull on his head.  On his arm is buckled a disc with many razor edges, and he wields a wickedly pointed pitchfork.
mobImmune: ELECTRIC POISON PUMMEL PUNCH SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DRAIN DISINTEGRATE SUMMON BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT

mobShortDesc: A large winged demon is here guarding the bridge.
mobLongDesc: The guard has leathery jet-black skin with spiked armor at his shoulders and a bleached skull on his head.  On his arm is buckled a disc with many razor edges, and he wields a wickedly pointed pitchfork.
mobImmune: ELECTRIC POISON PUMMEL PUNCH SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DRAIN DISINTEGRATE SUMMON BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT

mobShortDesc: The Water Weird is here guarding the River.
mobLongDesc: The Water Weird looks like a huge serpentine form made entirely out of water.  The light seems to pass right through the body of this creature, and your weapons seem to have little effect!
mobImmune: PUMMEL KICK PUNCH HIT BLUDGEON PIERCE SLASH WHIP CLAW BITE STING CRUSH HACK CHOP SLICE BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT

mobShortDesc: A horrible little demon bounces around the room looking for a victim.
mobLongDesc: A buff-looking little demonspawn covered in your own flesh and guts, it seems to have a bone to pick with you..  It flies around in the air and attempts to engage with you again in order to propagate itself.
affectedByFlags: INVISIBLE DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE PROTECT-EVIL INFRAVISION DODGE SNEAK FLY
mobImmune: FIRE DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT

mobShortDesc: A winged serpent glides swiftly towards you, intent on gouging your face!
mobLongDesc: This is one of Lucifer's small pets, a 40-foot flying snake.  It hovers and glides around the pit, taking notice of each small detail in its surroundings with golden bright eyes.  The eyes settle on you just as you meet its gaze;  it flies speedily to greet you with fangs wide and drooling venom.
mobImmune: FIRE ELECTRIC POISON SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DRAIN DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE SUMMON BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT

mobShortDesc: A Health Nut is here, complaining and whining.
mobLongDesc: The health nut is here for paying too much attention to worldly matters. She screams as her silicone breasts and fake lips melt from her now-leprous body, leaving only a blubbering mess here in the Marsh of Styx.

mobShortDesc: A Glutton is here, half submerged in swamp muck.
mobLongDesc: The folds of fat rolling down from the glutton's body make you feel ill. Her six chins droop almost to her stomach, which has crushed her legs beneath her weight.  Her eyes are set so deep into her face that you cannot see them.

mobShortDesc: A tiny shadow melts along with a scent of brimstone, burning on the floor.
mobLongDesc: It has no form, merely a void of darkness which consumes the souls of the damned here in Hell.  It is sent to do Satan's bidding and banish you to the pits where you belong.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE INFRAVISION SNEAK HIDE IMINV DUAL

mobShortDesc: A hellspawn harpy flies about the forest, gnawing on souls.
mobLongDesc: A strange hellish creature takes shape here before you, flashing bloodstained razors for teeth.  This is the offspring of Satan and the Woodland Sorceress, a minion of all evil and devourer of the suicidal souls.  Its eyes flit back and forth, taking in its next potential victim.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SPHERE INFRAVISION DODGE FLY DUAL

mobShortDesc: A hellspawn harpy flies about the forest, gnawing on souls.
mobLongDesc: A strange hellish creature takes shape here before you, flashing bloodstained razors for teeth.  This is the offspring of Satan and the Woodland Sorceress, a minion of all evil and devourer of the suicidal souls.  Its eyes flit back and forth, taking in its next potential victim.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SPHERE INFRAVISION DODGE FLY DUAL

mobShortDesc: A soul of a human woman spins about in a torrent of air.
mobLongDesc: This is the soul of Francesca, a young woman whose guilt came in the guise of love consummated in adultery.  She has been banished here forever after being accidentally killed by her husband when she was caught with her lover Paolo, now caught forever in a whirlwind.

mobShortDesc: A soul of a human man spins about in a torrent of air.
mobLongDesc: This is the soul of Paolo, a man whose guilt came in the form of a love consummated in adultery.  He has been banished here forever for his sins of lust with Francesca, his lover, forever to be caught up in a whirlwind.

mobShortDesc: A horrendously obese figure squats in the muck.
mobLongDesc: This squat being is barely recognizable in the guise of a human. He dribbles grease from pores around his plump lips, drooling spittle even now in this cold, damp marsh.  Ciacco was cast here for his devotion to the life of sloth and gluttony, now forced to eat his own kind as they gather in the swampy muck around him.

mobShortDesc: The Woodland Sorceress appears here, directing her cunning gaze upon you.
mobLongDesc: A demented wood-nymph with scarlet eyes regards you with a threatening glare.  This is the Woodland Sorceress;  her form is small, but infinite powers lie beneath her green-tinged skin.  She guards the exit beyond to the Lake of Blood and lower Hell itself.  With a flick of her wrist, she prepares to discontinue your mortal life.
actionFlags: SENTINEL ISNPC STAY-ZONE WIMPY OPEN-DOOR MEMORY FLY AGGGOOD AGGRANDOM
affectedByFlags: DETECT-ALIGNMENT DETECT-INVISIBLE DETECT-MAGIC SENSE-LIFE PROTECT-EVIL INFRAVISION STATUE DODGE SNEAK HIDE PROTECT-GOOD DUAL
mobImmune: POISON PUMMEL PUNCH SLEEP CHARM DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE SUMMON SLASH BACKSTAB

attackSpell: UNKNOWN: 203 meteor call_lightning UNKNOWN: 135 searing_orb iron_skin cloud_of_confusion debilitate poison chill_touch

mobShortDesc: The Woodland Sorceress appears here, directing her cunning gaze upon you.
mobLongDesc: A demented wood-nymph with scarlet eyes regards you with a threatening glare.  This is the Woodland Sorceress;  her form is small, but infinite powers lie beneath her green-tinged skin.  She guards the exit beyond to the Lake of Blood and lower Hell itself.  With a flick of her wrist, she prepares to discontinue your mortal life.
actionFlags: SENTINEL ISNPC STAY-ZONE WIMPY OPEN-DOOR MEMORY FLY AGGGOOD AGGRANDOM
affectedByFlags: DETECT-ALIGNMENT DETECT-INVISIBLE DETECT-MAGIC SENSE-LIFE PROTECT-EVIL INFRAVISION STATUE DODGE SNEAK HIDE PROTECT-GOOD DUAL

mobShortDesc: Lucifer, Prince of Darkness towers over you.
mobLongDesc: You see before you the Ultimate exemplar of Evil.  Embodying every aspect of vileness, he is known by many names:  Lucifer, Satan, Shaitan, Beelzebub among many.  The fallen angel glares with great amusement as he regards your miniscule form.  He holds every aspect of Evil within himself and knows no fear of a mere mortal such as yourself.  His giant wings spread and stretch to encompass you, displaying engorged veins and emanating a wave of intense heat.  Flashing teeth drip from his thin lips, bright white and keen on sampling your flesh.  Your eyes meet with his, cat-like and yellow with no discernable pupils.  This is his favored form, and as he gathers strength, he yawns in boredom and motions toward your demise.
mobImmune: FIRE ELECTRIC POISON PUMMEL PUNCH SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DRAIN DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE SUMMON BACKSTAB
attackType: SPELL SKILL SPELL SKILL SPELL SKILL SPELL SKILL

mobShortDesc: A Diseased Creature is here, drool dripping from its chin.
mobLongDesc: The diseased creature in front of you is totally repulsive.  Strips of flesh hang from its carcass, and the remaining skin is blotched and moldy.  As he reaches for you, his fetid breath almost makes you swoon.

mobShortDesc: A Golden Robe is shuffling about here, straining under his heavy burden.
mobLongDesc: This figure wears a robe of what appears to be solid gold.  The incredible weight of this garment seems to press the poor soul into the soil of the pit. Whatever his crimes when in the world of the living, he is certainly paying for them now.

mobShortDesc: The flame is here burning brightly.
mobLongDesc: The flames flit back and forth, casting a strange glow about the pit.  As they come close to you, you feel your flesh start to singe, and jump back.

mobShortDesc: The lizard is here flittering around the melting room.
mobLongDesc: The small greenish reptile looks at you with an almost human curiosity. You wonder how he got here, until he bites you, at which point you wonder where else you can send him, since he is already _in_ Hell!

mobShortDesc: The Daemon-Lord Fayn is here, cackling madly at you and brandishing his scythe.
mobLongDesc: Fayn is an enormous daemon with huge leathery wings and what seems to be a giant sword clasped in his right hand.  Upon closer inspection, you see that it is actually his fingernail, almost 8 feet long and razor-sharp. This he uses to decapitate, disassemble, and dismember the hapless souls who circle around before him.
affectedByFlags: INVISIBLE DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE PROTECT-EVIL INFRAVISION DUAL
mobImmune: FIRE POISON PUMMEL PUNCH SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS DRAIN DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE SUMMON HIT BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT

mobShortDesc: A gigantic winged demon brandishes its dirty talons at you.
mobLongDesc: The guard has leathery jet-black skin with spiked armor at his shoulders and a bleached skull on his head.  On his arm is buckled a disc with many razor edges, and he wields a wickedly pointed pitchfork.  His wings are beating jointly as he flails dark, marred talons in the air before your tender eye-sockets.
mobImmune: FIRE ELECTRIC POISON PUMMEL PUNCH SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DRAIN DISINTEGRATE SUMMON BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT

mobShortDesc: A huge winged demon is here standing across the passage of the bridge.
mobLongDesc: The guard has leathery jet-black skin with spiked armor at his shoulders and a bleached skull on his head.  On his arm is buckled a disc with many razor edges, and he wields a wickedly pointed pitchfork.  His wings unfurl to show a span of greater than that of the bridge.
mobImmune: FIRE POISON PUMMEL PUNCH SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DRAIN DISINTEGRATE SUMMON BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT

mobShortDesc: A large winged demon is here guarding the bridge.
mobLongDesc: The guard has leathery jet-black skin with spiked armor at his shoulders and a bleached skull on his head.  On his arm is buckled a disc with many razor edges, and he wields a wickedly pointed pitchfork.
mobImmune: ELECTRIC POISON PUMMEL PUNCH SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DRAIN DISINTEGRATE SUMMON BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT

mobShortDesc: A damned soul wanders aimlessly.
mobLongDesc: The damned soul wails and whines constantly as he pitifully attempts to slap away the burning flakes of ash that fall on him.

mobShortDesc: The Lord Geryon, ruler of the Fifth Circle, stands here.
mobLongDesc: Geryon stands before you in his demonic glory.  Wide leathery wings spread out from his thickly muscled body, making the huge room you are in seem small by comparison.  The thick skin of his hide seems virtually impregnable to your pitiful mortal weapons.  He is one of the greatest of all demons, a titan among them, and the keeper of the belt which carries him across the River Styx safely beyond the reach of Chiron's deadly bow.
mobImmune: PUMMEL KICK PUNCH CHARM DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE SUMMON PIERCE BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT

mobShortDesc: The Murderer is here guarding his island.
mobLongDesc: These men are crazed from an eternity of trying to stay out of the lake. Wielding makeshift weapons, they try desperately to beat back the attacks of the newer damned as they struggle to gain the island.

mobShortDesc: The Guard is here preventing the damned from leaving the lake.
mobLongDesc: The guards are made up of soldiers from every possible walk of life, wielding weapons from every age.  Here, a Roman Legionnaire stands side by side with a member of the Waffen SS as they push a victim back into the lake.

mobShortDesc: Belial, Demon Supervisor of the 4th Circle is here.
mobLongDesc: Behind the massive desk there is a huge demon.  He stands more than 15 feet tall and has oversized fangs that seem to glow red.  The stench from this denizen of hell is such that you wonder what he eats.

mobShortDesc: The Shift Supervisor is here ensuring that the workers keep up the pace.
mobLongDesc: The shift supervisor is a smaller sort of demon, but no-one gets to see his boss without first coming to him.

mobShortDesc: The Compound Worker is here toiling away.
mobLongDesc: The worker is a huge and heavily-muscled man.  The look of insanity and rage on his face suggests that he has been here for quite some time.  Perhaps it would be best if you just avoided him.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SANCTUARY SPHERE INFRAVISION DUAL FURY

mobShortDesc: An Imp flies about here doing mischief.
mobLongDesc: The tiny imp has frail-looking wings and the most vile-looking grinning face you've seen.  Its ebon skin is smooth and glistens in the flickering light.

mobShortDesc: A Health Nut is here, complaining and whining.
mobLongDesc: The health nut is here, paying too much attention to worldly matters. His biceps certainly are bigger than any remnant of heart or of mind that might have existed inside him, so now he can only whine to himself here in the Marsh of Styx.

mobShortDesc: A Glutton is here, half submerged in swamp muck.
mobLongDesc: The folds of fat rolling down from the glutton's body make you feel ill. His six chins droop almost to his stomach, which has crushed his legs beneath him.  His eyes are set so deep into his face that you cannot see them.

mobShortDesc: Charybdis, the Father of Flame stands here in a veil of bright firelight.
mobLongDesc: Before you stands the ruler of the Second Circle.  Charybdis is the father of the minions and devils in the upper sections of Hell.  He was once right-hand man to Satan himself, but now finds his place here on his own tower built to worship Dis.  He is very powerful, able to call forth the energy of heat whenever he wishes.  Red skin covers his body, perhaps lending to his protection from the flaming torrent surrounding him.
mobImmune: FIRE ELECTRIC POISON PUMMEL PUNCH CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DRAIN DISINTEGRATE SUMMON BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT

mobShortDesc: A Wind Devil is standing here guarding the cliff.
mobLongDesc: The wind devil is a vaguely human form masked in a raging windstorm.  It seems to howl maliciously with the anticipation of beating down another of this place's residents.

mobShortDesc: The Lemure are shambling about.
mobLongDesc: The Lemure resemble a crowd of humans melted from their proximity to Charybdis, Lord of Flame and Shadow.
actionFlags: SENTINEL SCAVENGER ISNPC STAY-ZONE WIMPY AGGTH MEMORY

mobShortDesc: The Damned Souls wander aimlessly.
mobLongDesc: The wailing of the damned is loudest from this cloud of seething souls. These souls are just beginning their descent into Hell!

mobShortDesc: The Virtuous Pagan is wandering the streets.
mobLongDesc: These poor creatures do not enjoy a happy existence as they await judgement from the master of this place.

mobShortDesc: The Water Weird is here guarding the River.
mobLongDesc: The Water Weird looks like a huge serpentine form made entirely out of water.  The light seems to pass right through the body of this creature, and your weapons seem to have little effect!
mobImmune: PUMMEL KICK PUNCH HIT BLUDGEON PIERCE SLASH WHIP CLAW BITE STING CRUSH HACK CHOP SLICE BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT

mobShortDesc: Minos is here judging the damned.
mobLongDesc: Minos rules this Circle of Hell.  It is his duty to judge the souls of the dead brought before him and send them to whichever circle of Hell he deems fit! He has the body of an enormous human and the head of a giant bull.  His tail is tipped with a huge spiked ball which he continually whips back and forth with tremendous strength.

mobShortDesc: The Grim Reaper is swaying here in a slight breeze.
mobLongDesc: The Grim Reaper is DEATH!  His flaming red eyes peer out at you from under the folds of his cavernous black cloak.  Clutched in his skeletal hands is the Scythe of Death, which he uses to banish the chosen souls to the Planes of Hell.

mobShortDesc: The Cave Bear is here, looking for a way out.
mobLongDesc: Covered with shaggy hair matted with dried blood, the cave bear looks back at you with mournful hatred in its eyes.  It almost seems sorry to have to slap your scalp loose from your head.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SANCTUARY INFRAVISION DODGE DUAL FURY

mobShortDesc: The ant lion bursts from the stones and grabs you in its mandibles!
mobLongDesc: The ant lion looks like a cross between a mole and a giant ant. Covered by a leathery exoskeleton, its beady eyes glare hungrily at you as its mandibles click together in anticipation and it reaches out for your touch with the bristles that cover its body. The ant lion's huge mandibles, silvery gray in color, each have a single barb to impale and hold the victim -- that's YOU!

mobShortDesc: A huge mountain goat stands here, surveying his domain.
mobLongDesc: This huge mountain goat is quite a specimen.  Standing about 4 feet high at the shoulder, and about as long, he looks like he'd put up quite a fight.

mobShortDesc: A badger scuttles timidly out of your way.
mobLongDesc: This badger seems a little more timid than the others you've seen in these mountains...maybe you should take it easy on him?

mobShortDesc: A badger is here, watching you intently.
mobLongDesc: A small woodland creature, the badger has more trail-smarts than you'll ever come close to matching.  The badger's fine hair stands on end as you stare at it, and it freezes, tensing, getting ready to react to whatever you do next.

mobShortDesc: The Feral Trapper is here, incomprehensible hatred in his eyes.
mobLongDesc: Long, matted hair covers up all but the gleam of two hungry eyes staring back at you.  This trapper has definitely been living in the woods for far too long, judging by the way he flares his nostrils at you, as though trying to get your scent.  Better watch out -- all living creatures do desperate things when they're hungry!
actionFlags: SENTINEL SCAVENGER ISNPC AGGRESSIVE WIMPY MEMORY
affectedByFlags: SANCTUARY INFRAVISION DODGE SNEAK HIDE DUAL

mobShortDesc: The Unholy Deacon is standing here, lost in his own reality.
mobLongDesc: As you look into the swirling madness that is the unholy deacon's soul, your mortal body cries, 'Enough!' and turns to stone... Time to meet the Reaper.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-ALIGNMENT DETECT-INVISIBLE DETECT-MAGIC SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY SPHERE INFRAVISION STATUE DODGE

mobShortDesc: A hearty old frog is here, blissfully sitting.
mobLongDesc: It has often been written that frogs are very Zen creatures, always sitting, waiting, waiting for a fly to come their way, and this frog is no different.  Frogs are known to be able to survive for ages in dry, enclosed spaces -- this one's probably been here for years, just waiting, sitting.

mobShortDesc: An enormous creature made of wood angles towards you with a loud growl.
mobLongDesc: Shaggy bits of brown hair fluff and fall off this mangey badger as it growls and staggers towards you. White bubbles foam from its mouth, showing quite clearly that this badger MUST be rabid. A simple bite might just be enough to cause some real damage.

mobShortDesc: A stern looking woman demands that you take your clothes off.
mobLongDesc: With her hair in braids and the girlish smile she gives you, Doctor Winston hardly seems to be a threat.. until she begins to insist that you undress immediately so that she can give you a thorough examination.

mobShortDesc: A gentle looking woman offers to help clean up your wounds.
mobLongDesc: With a shy smile, Doctor Piglet, as she insists you call her, boldly attempts to get you on to the examining table where she can have a good look at you. You have the feeling she's interested in more than your health.

mobShortDesc: A playful woman walks towards you with a naughty pout on her face.
mobLongDesc: The most innocent eyes peer out at you from her curly mane of hair. With a wink and a nod, she moves towards you, attempting to touch places on you that you would rather she not. With each attempt to get her to remove her hands from you, she only seems to grow more aggressive as she grasps and grabs in the most embarrassing places.

mobShortDesc: A woman carrying a cat-o-nine tails approaches you with a sway in her hips.
mobLongDesc: As you catch the eye of this heavenly woman, you notice that she appears to be the twin of Zoot. With a sheepish grin, she appears to be absolutely nothing like her naughty sister. Just when you thought it was safe to smile at her, the oddest feeling of being looked at like a sex toy comes over your senses.

mobShortDesc: An alluring blonde is trying to decide which nightgown to wear.
mobLongDesc: Blue scarves are the only thing wrapped around this delicate beauty. Each step sends her hair into loose waves of sensuality. As her crystal blue eyes meet yours, she begins plucking one scarf at a time, off of her.

mobShortDesc: A breathtaking brunette seductively slides into a teddy.
mobLongDesc: As your eyes catch glimpse of this delicate woman, you see just how perfect her buttocks are shaped. As she begins to stand up straight, you can see a flimsy green teddy gliding into place.

mobShortDesc: A mischievous redhead is slowly undressing herself.
mobLongDesc: Freckles seem to be the most prominent thing all over the body of this delicious creature. Her nails have been painted a firey red, matching the bodice she seems to be slowly untying with each step closer to you. With a simple wiggle of her nose, she loosens wisps of her red hair, sending them floating around her head in a silent breeze.

mobShortDesc: A girl with raven hair cascades into your vision with naughty desires.
mobLongDesc: The first thing your eyes catch are the leather strap buckles holding on each of the shiny pieces of material covering her body. Her long, straight black hair hangs down in a school girl fashion, but this is definitely no school girl. Black, patent leather gloves fit firmly to her, covering her arm up to her elbow. Considering the appearance of this woman, she must want to be hurt in a most loving way.

mobName: a brunette in a pink teddy
mobShortDesc: A brunette in a pink teddy gyrates her hips slowly, moving towards you.
mobLongDesc: Long, dark legs connect up to devastatingly rich thighs. Brown locks of curly hair hang down to the top of this woman's lovely heart shaped buttock. A pink negligee shimmers over her body, making it look as though a mist surrounds her torso area.

mobShortDesc: A scantily clad blonde contorts her body into quite obscene positions.
mobLongDesc: Silky blonde wisps of hair twirl down the backside of this half naked feminine creature. Her milky white skin glows in the dim lights surrounding her.  Wearing only a pair of g-string panties, there isn't much to be hidden on this scantily clad goddess.

mobShortDesc: A delicious looking redhead shows off her pouting lips as she purrs at you.
mobLongDesc: With hair as red as an apple, this woman looks just as delicious as one. Her plump breasts sway and swell over the edge of her over-the-shoulder boulder holder. Creamy white legs peek out from beneath a flimsy pink lingerie. As you avert your head to look into her face, emerald green eyes tackle yours, sending shivers down your spine.

mobShortDesc: A Castle Guard stands close to the Prince he has been instructed to protect!
mobLongDesc: This guard looks pretty stupid trying to stop the Prince from getting out. You can tell that he has indeed had a bit too much to drink, and seems to be falling on the prince to keep him here, rather than actually holding him steady.

mobShortDesc: A moose slowly stumbles through the wood in a careless motion.
mobLongDesc: This tall moose just seems to stumble around without a care in the world. His brown coat shines when the sunlight hits it, making him look almost like a beautiful animal. The brown eyes that peer out at you from beneath half closed lids, look like those you would find on a teddy bear. Although, I wouldn't want to take this moose for granted.

mobShortDesc: A farmer is standing here complaining about the community.
mobLongDesc: This local farmer stands with his back hunched over as he works the dirt into a soft, agreeable place to plant seeds. So far, it seems that this farmer only likes to complain about the way the world is changing, and in his opinion, not for the better. His coveralls are covered with dark brown mud stains.

mobShortDesc: A man is walking around here collecting dead people from all around.
mobLongDesc: Looking much like an extra in a skit, this man walks around yelling for all to bring out their dead for pick up. His clothes are filthy and bloody from working in such a business. His cart is about half full with dead bodies. As you look closer, it would appear one of them isn't quite all the way dead, but suffocating to death in the stench and wretchedness of this old man's cart.

mobShortDesc: A cute little rabbit bounces around softly, without a care in the world.
mobLongDesc: This cute little rabbit appears to be a harmless little creature, that got lost in the big mountains. It's little pink nose wiggles about, making you think of the old days of easily catching and skinning rabbits for dinner. As you think of dinner, you remember it has been a while since you last ate. I don't think this is the right rabbit for your stew though.

mobShortDesc: Tim is standing here creating big explosions with his staff.
mobLongDesc: With the welcoming expression of one long in need of conversation, you see Tim in the light of friendship. As you draw nearer, you see that he is randomly throwing fire around and making it explode in various places. Upon closer sight, it would definitely seem that Tim isn't aiming at all, but merely cascading fire wherever it wants to land.

mobName: a Guard of the Bridge of Death
mobShortDesc: The Guard of the Bridge of death stands blocking the way over the bridge.
mobLongDesc: Although this man looks quite old and frail, do not be taken in by looks alone. The tiny twinkle in his eyes warns you that what you see must be an illusion, or perhaps just an elaborate hoax. The robes of this guard seem to bulk and bustle with ways and means of hurting you badly.

mobShortDesc: The Father of the Prince stands with his chest thrust out in a sort of victory.
mobLongDesc: Never has a man looked more happy to give his son a fate of sadness. By the look on his face, he seems to be more happy about getting some more land through this wedding. His large face almost boils over with the thoughts of things he can do with the land, making his pocketbook grow just as much larger as the land itself.

mobShortDesc: A Prince stands here looking quite ready to commit suicide.
mobLongDesc: You can tell by the look on this princes face that this marriage was not his idea. His lean body and muscular physique, is the complete opposite of that of the bride. Blondish brown locks frame his cherub face, as huge tears of sadness stroll down his cheeks.

mobShortDesc: The Father of the Bride stands tall and proud of his little girl.
mobLongDesc: This father stands with the largest smile a father could possibly have. If you hadn't already seen his daughter, you would think that he was just proud. Deep in his eyes you can read the relief he is feeling at finally being given the chance to get rid of the monstrous beast that is his little girl.

mobShortDesc: A bride of no beauty, and much fat stands here awaiting her marriage.
mobLongDesc: Rolls of fat seem to cascade and ripple on the body of this young girl. Pock marks, as well as gigantic boil-size blisters cover her face in a disgusting array of colors. Just when you think it can get no worse, she turns to you and smiles. You definitely feel the pain that the man she is to marry must be feeling right about now.

mobShortDesc: A girl accused of being a witch sits here in the balance scale.
mobLongDesc: This poor girls locks hang down around her dirty body. Within the caged area she is to occupy, there is straw and feces, as well as spoiled fruit which has been thrown at her by the crowd. She sits in a balance scale, as her fate becomes decided by the weight of the duck, which resides on the other half of the scale.

mobShortDesc: The Knight with Three Heads peers in three directions, searching for a victim.
mobLongDesc: Distorted fat heads twist and peer around looking in every direction but yours. If this knight were any more stupid, he might have another head. Just as you think you have a clean shot at bringing him to his death, all of his heads turn and acknowledge your presence.

mobShortDesc: A knight of Ni stands blocking your way any deeper into the forest.
mobLongDesc: Before you stands the ugliest, stupidest, tallest knight that has been seen in these parts for sometime. Brown stringy hair flops around on his head as he sites you, yelling something at you about trespassing. As you go to explain your situation, he begins to scream, 'Ni! Ni! Ni!'

mobShortDesc: A big crowd stands here arguing over what to do with the witch.
mobLongDesc: A large enough crowd of people has circled around the burning block. People of all statures and places in the chain have come to witness what would appear to be a hanging to some, and a burning to others. At the moment, it seems they are arguing on which way to kill the poor soul.

mobShortDesc: A French Guard stands guarding his fluently french fortress!
mobLongDesc: Looking quite scrawny and simple, this guard begins spouting out obscene things at you. At first, it would seem this man has had a few too many drinks, then you come to the realization that he is just french. His faces most prominent feature is the twirled mustache which covers a majority of his face. His hair is scrambled brown locks which just sit on top his head in disarray. While you were paying attention to his attire, it would seem he has continued to make remarks about you.

mobShortDesc: An african swallow swivels and soars around the surrounding areas.
mobLongDesc: With a coconut clenched tight in its beak, this swallow drifts lazily on the under current of breeze that is sifting through the air. With the grace of a long time flyer, it lands up on a high perch to sit and watch you as it snacks on its meal.

mobShortDesc: A european swallow waddles and loops around the area, trying to fly away.
mobLongDesc: The soft, down feathers of this pigeon-like bird float by you through the air. It seems that this swallow is attempting to fly, but having quite the difficult time of it. White, brown and grey feathers sift through the air, as the bird continues to attempt to fly away in vain.

mobShortDesc: A Black Knight is standing here blocking the way over the bridge.
mobLongDesc: A Knight with black armor is standing here blocking your way. You can see his breath as it sifts through the large helmet on his head. Each breath sounds like a wheeze and a hiss. As bits of light glide over the surface of his armor, you can see the flawless sheen of his armor's strength.

mobShortDesc: A lizard man, his eyes flickering red, stands guarding the vaults of ISA.
mobLongDesc: Sthisss T'hor is a strange cross of lizard and man. Hailing from the mystical caves of the east, he has come, braving hardship, ridicule and being shunned by all civilizations, he finally arrived in Fortress and was welcomed into the ISA castle to help guard the precious belongings of the brave people there.
mobImmune: POISON SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DRAIN DISINTEGRATE CLAIR SUMMON

mobKeywords: grulg dwarf chef cook rotund bloody spencer
mobShortDesc: A very rotund dwarf stands here, a spoon in one hand, a sword in the other.
mobLongDesc: Grulg the Chef Destroyer is a fearsome sight. Wearing a blood spattered apron and wielding a spoon in one hand and a blood soaked sword in the other, he bustles about the kitchen, stirring this, and skewering that. Descended from the Destroyer Clan, Grulg set out to become a chef when he discovered that meat could be extraordinarily good with just the right spices. His favorite dish, A chunk of raw wolf meat with a hint of chicken grease and two pints of rum. Let the whole thing sit for a week and it literally melts in your mouth. Found by Boba on one of his journeys into the woods west of Midgaard Grulg was more then happy to share his culinery skills with the ISA clan.
mobImmune: FIRE POISON SLEEP CHARM DISINTEGRATE CLAIR SUMMON

mobKeywords: butler receptionist doorkeeper asshole man alan
mobShortDesc: A man dressed in a black suit, wearing a white shirt, stands here quite stiffly.
mobLongDesc: After years of travel, working for some of the most prestigious and prominent members of Midgaards upper class, this butler had had his fill of snooty aristocrats. So after looting three castles of most of the family heirlooms, he fled to Fortress seeking to live out his days in comfort. However when the mighty Jearom came across him while searching for a good spot for a clan hall, he promptly relieved the butler of all his loot and invited him to come serve in the castle. With no cash and no choice he came to serve ISA until the day when he can strike back!
mobImmune: POISON SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DRAIN DISINTEGRATE CLAIR SUMMON

mobKeywords: widget captain pirate kender girl crazy
mobShortDesc: Captain Widget Stands here looking fearsome in her pirate getup
mobLongDesc: Captain Widget salutes you, looking a ridiculous character in her pirate getup. A fake mustache plastered across her upper lip gives a foppish air to her already laughable appearance. A painted wooden leg adorns her high topped boots that are turned down above the knee. Trying to keep a straight face is near impossible but it is necessary to get across the lake somehow....
mobImmune: FIRE ELECTRIC POISON PUMMEL KICK PUNCH SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DRAIN DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE CLAIR SUMMON HIT BLUDGEON PIERCE SLASH WHIP CLAW BITE STING CRUSH HACK CHOP SLICE BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT

mobKeywords: armor guard shining black figure isa
mobShortDesc: A Shining figure, resplendent in pitch black armor, blocks the way forward.
mobLongDesc: An empty suit of armor, quite ready to be torn apart defending its Masters in the ISA Clan.
mobImmune: FIRE ELECTRIC POISON PUMMEL KICK PUNCH SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DRAIN DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE CLAIR SUMMON BLUDGEON PIERCE SLASH BITE STING CRUSH HACK CHOP SLICE BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT

mobShortDesc: A small child stands here, trying to hide his pig like face and small hands.
mobLongDesc: This child, the result of a union between possibly the two ugliest people in the world, has a few defects. The features of a pig, the hands of a baby and the voice of a dying cow, this lad has made it this far by stealing and begging, and harping on peoples sympathies for the hideously ugly. Perhaps someday something heavy will end all his problems.

mobShortDesc: An ugly old woman, smelling of refuse and human waste, crouches here.
mobLongDesc: This woman has been beaten down with time and poverty. Ugly and deformed she is the object of much cruelty and ridicule. Scrambling for a crust of bread and eyeing you suspiciously she begins chattering wildly to her left hand about the evil in the world and the kindness of strangers.
actionFlags: SENTINEL SCAVENGER ISNPC WIMPY OPEN-DOOR MEMORY

mobShortDesc: A man stands here, bent with the wisdom of the ages.
mobLongDesc: He stands here thinking over the wisdom gained, and the wisdom lost in his years as an adventurer. To bad he lost his tongue to a pirate, He might have some interesting stories to tell otherwise.
actionFlags: SENTINEL SCAVENGER ISNPC WIMPY OPEN-DOOR MEMORY

mobShortDesc: A mighty warrior stands here, looking to be the greatest living fighter ever.
mobLongDesc: A once noble proud knight, he seems to be a bit lost and drifing without anything to fight for, or anyone to fight with.

mobShortDesc: The Dojo Master sits here meditating.
mobLongDesc: The Dojo Master is a proud patient man. Waiting here to teach those who wish to learn the martial arts, how to fight.
mobImmune: FIRE ELECTRIC POISON CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DRAIN DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE CLAIR SUMMON

mobKeywords: theodore wizard old magic user fake
mobShortDesc: A stout, grumbling Wizard is here frowning suspiciously
mobLongDesc: Wizard Theodore is a lonely, fat man who has no life outside making trouble for the other wizards in this city. A man who loves causing problems and annoyances that others have to fix.
mobImmune: FIRE ELECTRIC POISON PUMMEL KICK PUNCH SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DRAIN DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE CLAIR SUMMON HIT BLUDGEON PIERCE SLASH WHIP CLAW BITE STING CRUSH HACK CHOP SLICE BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT

mobKeywords: wizard old man stumpy ragged greybeard
mobShortDesc: A stumpy, ragged, lonely old man stands here muttering to himself...
mobLongDesc: A lonely old wizard, who has lost his marbles....
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST
attackTarget: LEADER LEADER LEADER LEADER LEADER LEADER
attackSpell: fireball UNKNOWN: 56 UNKNOWN: 57 regeneration remove_poison earthquake

mobShortDesc: A wise and venerable cleric, with the power of the gods behind him, stands here.
mobLongDesc: Long has this cleric been journeying, spreading the warmth and compassion of his class to all he comes in contact with. Now nearing the end of his journey, he has come here to live out his days in the tranquility of this frozen town.

mobShortDesc: An ancient paladin, withered and frail.
mobLongDesc: Once a strong and proud paladin, Horatio now shows his years and bends with the weight of the world.
actionFlags: SCAVENGER ISNPC SUBDUE ARM SHIELD AGGEVIL
mobImmune: SLEEP DISINTEGRATE SUMMON SLASH WHIP AMBUSH ASSAULT

mobShortDesc: The Baker is standing here up to his elbows in flour.
mobLongDesc: The Baker is a strong patient man. He has been here for a long time and will be here for an even longer time to come. He knows the tricks to this town and is silently confidant in his lot in life.
mobImmune: FIRE ELECTRIC POISON PUMMEL KICK PUNCH SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DRAIN DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE CLAIR SUMMON HIT BLUDGEON PIERCE SLASH WHIP CLAW BITE STING CRUSH HACK CHOP SLICE BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT

mobKeywords: podo potions dealer cheat fat huge man
mobShortDesc: Podo the potion dealer stands here busying himself with his shelves.
mobLongDesc: Podo is a pompous man, filled with his own self righteousness. He is fat beyond all belief and jiggles as he moves around. Most important in his life besides his food is his love of his potions, each one having its own small niche on the shelf where it was placed with precise care.
mobImmune: FIRE ELECTRIC POISON PUMMEL KICK PUNCH SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DRAIN DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE CLAIR SUMMON HIT BLUDGEON PIERCE SLASH WHIP CLAW BITE STING CRUSH HACK CHOP SLICE BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT

mobShortDesc: A mountain of books and scrolls stacked high in the corner.
mobLongDesc: Haphazardly thrown into a pile, this stack of books teeters precariously, appearing as if the faintest breeze will blow it over.
mobImmune: FIRE ELECTRIC POISON PUMMEL KICK PUNCH SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DRAIN DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE CLAIR SUMMON HIT BLUDGEON PIERCE SLASH WHIP CLAW BITE STING CRUSH HACK CHOP SLICE BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT

mobShortDesc: Gumbo, Sumo's attack budgie is flying around the room trying to crap on you.
mobLongDesc: You see before you a six foot tall budgie with a beak that could snap a sword blade easily.  He cocks his head to look at you and gives you what almost appears to be a grin.  He's been well trained as an attack budgie, so you'd best clear out now!

mobShortDesc: Runtly, Jarldian's favorite pet gator is crawling around here.
mobLongDesc: This beast is crawls around here, looking for some food.  Noticing your grand entrance, he snaps his jaws at you, eyeing you suspiciously.  A collar on his neck is engraved "Runtly".

mobShortDesc: Charlie, a rushing dove sits on the guitar.
mobLongDesc: Charlie is a redeyed dove grinding its teeth tuning Doobie's guitar. As you look at him, he offers you a big fat reefer.

mobShortDesc: Orko the Sadist is floating here.
mobLongDesc: Orko the sadist is here "smiling"!  You wonder what its been smoking for this odd effect?!?!

mobShortDesc: A gorgeous blonde maid is here dusting off papers and keeping the room tidy.
mobLongDesc: Helga the maid is absolutely stunning in her classic french maid outfit. She smiles at you politely before returning to her duties stacking papers and dusting off the older stacks. When you look around and notice how  relatively small and empty the room is, you wonder why the inhabitant is in need of a maid. You assume that he is very lazy, but must admit he has good taste in selecting maids. Helga is famous for her back massages and her excellent cooking. She doesn't seem to be the brightest person, but you assume she wasn't hired for her trivia knowledge...

mobShortDesc: A solitary locust buzzes about here, separated from the swarm. Poor thing.
mobLongDesc: It's very small, very fast, and green.

mobShortDesc: The sand dragon watches you carefully, it's tail swishing back and forth.
mobLongDesc: The Sand Dragon is a large creature, shorter than the length of the crystal within which he resides by the barest of margins.  His hide toughened by the desert winds and sand outside the crystal, he appears to be a lethal looking beast.  Loyal only to his master Samiel, the Sand Dragon is a wild, dangerous animal.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SANCTUARY DODGE FLY DUAL FURY

mobShortDesc: Grazz the Nycodemon is here looking for a meal.
mobLongDesc: Grazz the Nycodemon is a towering giant of muscle, fangs, claws and dark leathery wings.  His eyes glow with hellish violet fires.  He smells of sulphur and old blood.  As he looks at you, he starts to drool and smack his... er lips ..  This reveals row after row of needle sharp teeth.  Should you run now?

mobShortDesc: Gizmo, Borzoi's parrot is here, screeching occasionally.
mobLongDesc: Hey!  Its a parrot.  You know, green, wings, beak... a parrot.

mobShortDesc: A Bad Plant is here!
mobLongDesc: The Bad Plant stands before you.  It encompasses the entire view..  From its many branches, you see flowers, twisted, but still lovely.  The center of the plant seems to be glowing and you realize that after walking around in all of this Toxic Waste, you are glowing too!!

mobShortDesc: Cody's favorite cat is here purring with contentment.
mobLongDesc: You see a sleek well groomed cat.  It is healthy and very friendly. You should pet it a lot.

mobShortDesc: A dark figure, cloaked and hooded, slinks past muttering "shiny treasures".
mobLongDesc: This dark figure has something to hide. His cloak bulges slightly as he shifts furtively trying to avoid drawing unwanted attention. A dark dangerous air hangs heavy about him.
actionFlags: SENTINEL ISNPC AGGRESSIVE STAY-ZONE MEMORY ARM
mobImmune: KICK PUNCH SLEEP SUMMON BACKSTAB AMBUSH
attackType: PUNCH BASH SPELL CAST SPELL CAST PUMMEL SPELL CAST KICK SPELL CAST SPELL CAST
attackTarget: RAN_ROOM LEADER SELF RAN_ROOM LEADER SELF BUFFER ROOM RAN_ROOM

mobShortDesc: A magnificent white stallion with graceful, feathered wings stands here.
mobLongDesc: This is one of the legendary flying horses. There was a time in history when this amazing breed of animal was all but extinct, the great Pegasus himself believes to be the last. Over time Pegasus brought the breed back to health, and now they are proud mounts and excellent fighters.

mobShortDesc: Asclepeus is here, offering you a healing touch.
mobLongDesc: Asclepeus is the God of Healing, prayed to often in times of illness and plague. He is also the son of Apollo, the legendary Olympian God. He has decided to use his healing gifts in this place to help those who need healing, be it physical, emotional, or psychological. The place is empty at the moment and you can't help but wonder how the guy gets any business at all in this place.

mobShortDesc: An enormous bouncer is here blocking the entrance to the club.
mobLongDesc: Before you stands a massive beast of a man. You can only assume that he is in fact a man, because every inch of his body is covered by dark black robes. He stands in the doorway, leaving not an inch of room to pass by him. He looks like he could beat you senseless, yet he doesn't move to start a battle.

mobShortDesc: Pegasus is here, selling the best trained flying horses in the land.
mobLongDesc: Pegasus is the famous winged horse who was born from Medusa and the great god Poseidon. Pegasus is known for many great adventures including flying to the top of Mount Olympus, where he carried Zeus' thunderbolts. Pegasus was often ridden by the famous mortal hero Belleraphon on many great adventures. He has settled down in the after-life, it seems, and now runs this mount stable where he leases out the services of his fellow winged horses.

mobShortDesc: Eros is here selling valentines for you to send your friends (wink, nudge).
mobLongDesc: Also known as Cupid in some circles, Eros is the god of love. Eros appears in the form he is known most for, as a fat, naked, flying infant. Eros has been using his powers to unite lovers for centuries, shooting them with his magic arrows. He smiles and winks at you knowingly, a very strange looking gesture coming from the face of an infant.

mobShortDesc: Daedalus is here crafting a pair of wax wings.
mobLongDesc: Daedalus was a skilled Athenian craftsman and inventor. Among his creations was the great labyrinth of King Minos. When Daedalus later incurred Minos' wrath he was imprisoned in this labyrinth with his son, Icarus. In order to escape the labyrinth Daedalus constructed wings of wax and feathers for him and his son to use to fly to safety. Despite his repeated warnings, his son flew to near the sun and fell to his death when the wax of his wings melted.

mobShortDesc: Hestia is here offering the finest lodgings in town.
mobLongDesc: Hestia is the goddess of the hearth and its fire. She is worshiped as the protector of the home, the family, the city and the state. She is a Titan, one of the first children of Cronus and Rhea. She is one of the most beloved and worshiped gods. Zeus allowed her to remain worshiped after he conquered the Titans because she vowed to remain a virgin.

mobShortDesc: Epimetheus is here, offering up the finest in immortal arms.
mobLongDesc: Epimetheus is the infamous brother of Prometheus.  He was given the task of giving all of the creatures under Zeus unique gifts, which he fudged up when he ran out of goodies before he got to humans. Prometheus bailed him out by stealing fire for the humans, and was horribly punished for it. Epimetheus' punishment was to be married to the first woman, Pandora, and to be party to her releasing all the pain and anguish that exists in the world from her infamous box. Now he runs this little shop in hopes that nothing more can go wrong for him.

mobShortDesc: Hypnos is here offering you the miracle cure for insomnia.
mobLongDesc: Hypnos is the god of sleep, and father of the dreams. He has the power to lull anyone to sleep, even the mightiest gods. He uses his powers now to help any immortal suffering from insomnia. Since this alone wasn't enough to keep a business thriving, he widened his market by introducing some other magic items. He looks at you now with great interest.

mobShortDesc: Hermes is here keeping track of everyone's packages and postcards.
mobLongDesc: Hermes is the messenger of the gods. He is the protector of travelers and brings good luck to businessmen and thieves. He now uses his skill in business and his messenger abilities to run this Immortal Post Office. He is wearing his trademark winged sandals and hat which aid his flying ability.

mobShortDesc: Aphrodite is here offering the finest musical instruments in town.
mobLongDesc: Aphrodite is the Goddess of Love and Beauty. She isn't, however, much of a business-person. She once ran a very successful business as the leading seller of Beauty Aids to the people of this Immortal Village. Medusa then started her own Beauty Aid stand and eventually put Aphrodite out of business. This is unbelievable considering the beauty of this goddess and the putrid ugliness of her adversary, but this is a strange place.

mobShortDesc: Demeter is here selling her freshly baked goods.
mobLongDesc: Demeter is the goddess of the earth, agriculture, fertility and grain. She taught mortals the arts of farming, which allowed them to live and prosper. She is worshiped for good harvests. She now uses her talents to make wonderful breads for the immortals enjoyment.

mobShortDesc: Atlas is here showing off his high quality maps.
mobLongDesc: Atlas is a Titan, one of the group of gods which preceded the Olympian gods which now reign over the universe. The Titans were lead by Zeus' father Chronos, who was banished and forgotten after the Titans were defeated. Atlas, who is also the brother of Promethius, was punished after the war by having to hold up the sky on his shoulders forever. His intimate knowledge of the world has made him a terrific map maker.

mobShortDesc: Dionysus is here drinking merrily and offering you a bottle.
mobLongDesc: Dionysus is the god of wine, drinking and drunkenness. He is associated with all the violent and unpredictable actions caused by excessive drinking. Dionysus is a satyr, a creature with the torso of a man and the lower body of a goat. He is the son of Zeus and the mortal princess Semele of Thebes. His hooves click on the counter merrily as he offers you a drink.

mobShortDesc: Midas is here offering some lovely armors with the sparkle of pure gold.
mobLongDesc: Midas was the King of Phrygia who was given any wish he desired by the god Dionysus after he helped a satyr in distress. Midas wished that everything he touched would turn into gold. His ability turned into a curse when he couldn't touch his food or his loved ones without them turning to gold. In the afterlife, however, it has turned into a terrific business venture.

mobShortDesc: Medusa is here showing you how wonderfully her beauty products work.
mobLongDesc: Medusa seems to have toned down her mortal stoning ways. Snakes writhe all over her head in place of hair, and her skin is green and scaly. She is wearing a flowered dress which might be cute on anyone else. She appears to be wearing some sort of smudged makeup on her face. It crosses your mind that only a lunatic would buy beauty from this foul creature.

mobShortDesc: Heracles stands here offering you a great deal on fitness products.
mobLongDesc: Heracles is one of the greatest heroes in Greek history. He was born in Thebes, the son of a mortal princess Alcmene, and the god Zeus. This is the man who successfully completed the 12 tasks, including killing the fierce lion of Nemea and the deadly Hydra of Lerna, defeated Hippolyta, queen of the Amazons, and stealing the golden apples from the tree of life. He is also known for his adventures with the Argonauts. Heracles the great and mighty stands before you now, offering you top quality fitness products.

mobShortDesc: Cronus, King of the Titans, is standing here.
mobLongDesc: Cronus was the King of all Gods at one time, before he and his Titans were defeated and overthrown by his son Zeus. He always had a feeling this would happen, and so he ate all his children as they were born. His wife, Rhea, tricked him into eating a rock instead of his youngest son, Zeus, who then grew up and came back to kill him. He now resides below the city in this mock sewer system which is a very far cry from the peaks of Olympus he used to call home. It seems that living down here has made him angry.

mobShortDesc: Pandora, the first woman created, stands before you.
mobLongDesc: Before you stands Pandora, the first woman ever created. Zeus ordered Hephaestus to make her as punishment to men for getting fire from Promethius. Zeus gave Pandora to Promethius' brother Epimethius, knowing that he would mess up severely. Pandora is best known for opening the box that contained all the pains and evils of the world so that they could spread out and overtake mortal men.

mobShortDesc: The legendary hero Jason is standing here.
mobLongDesc: Jason was a great Greek hero and led the group of adventurers called the Argonauts. Their capture of the Golden Fleece was one of the greatest accomplishments of legend. Jason left a quarrel with his brother over the throne of Iokolos to organize a band of around 50 warriors to search for the fleece on the distant island of Kolchis. Jason looks like a very brave and noble warrior.

mobShortDesc: King Agamemnon is here, proudly surveying his surroundings.
mobLongDesc: Agamemnon was the King of Mycenae, also known as Argos, and the leader of the great Greek Army that conquered Troy in the Trojan War. He was always known for being at odds with the great warrior Achilles. He stands before you now proudly, his head held high, with the look of a true King if you've ever seen one. Death has treated this legend quite well.
attackType: SPELL SKILL SPELL SKILL SPELL SKILL SPELL SKILL

mobShortDesc: A staggering, drunken Immortal is swaying back and forth before you.
mobLongDesc: This is one of the many Immortals that you haven't heard of. This particular one seems to have gotten a bit carried away with his merriment and is now more then a little drunk. He staggers and sways his way down the streets, occasionally stopping in this shop or that. He constantly spouts out bizarre statements that seem to have no meaning.

mobShortDesc: Prometheus, the bringer of fire, stands before you.
mobLongDesc: Prometheus was a member of the Titans, who were overthrown from their place on Olympus by Zeus and his followers. Prometheus is known for saving humanity by stealing fire from the gods and giving it to mortals when Zeus planned to use the deprivation of fire to destroy them. Zeus punished him for this act by chaining him to a high peak and having a buzzard eat his liver every day, with it re-growing during the night.
attackType: SPELL SKILL SPELL SKILL SPELL SKILL SPELL SKILL

mobShortDesc: A freakish, beastly chimera is snarling and coming in your direction.
mobLongDesc: The chimera is a fire-breathing beast with the head of a lion, the body of a goat and the tail of a serpent. The original chimera terrorized the kingdom of Lycia until it was slain by the hero Bellerophon and his mount Pegasus. These chimera's are offspring of the original, created by Zeus to patrol this village and destroy those who have entered and don't belong. If you are in that category it might be wise to run away.
actionFlags: ISNPC AGGRESSIVE AGGCL AGGMU MEMORY AGGBA AGGCO
attackType: SPELL SKILL SPELL SKILL SPELL SKILL

mobShortDesc: Theseus, the great King of Athens, stands before you.
mobLongDesc: Theseus was a great King in early Athens. In those days Athens had to send out seven young men and seven young women each year as sacrifices to the great minotaur in Minos' labyrinth. Theseus, according to legend, decided to go for himself one year and defeated the beast. By the time he returned his father Aegeus was dead and he was crowned the new king. Theseus has a very noble and brave look to him.
attackType: SPELL SKILL SPELL SKILL SPELL SKILL

mobShortDesc: The tragic legend Oedipus is looking sad and distracted here.
mobLongDesc: Oedipus is a legendary tragic figure in greek lore. He was sent away to die as an infant by his father, who was told a prophecy that his son would kill him and marry his wife. His son didn't die but was found and raised. Eventually he found his way back to the city of his birth, and through a bizarre twist of fate ended up killing his father and marrying his mother. When he discovered this horrible fact, he tore his eyes out. He has them back in this immortal life, but there is still a sadness about him.
attackType: SPELL SKILL SPELL SKILL SPELL SKILL SPELL SKILL

mobShortDesc: Perseus, the great warrior of legend, stands here proudly.
mobLongDesc: Perseus, son of the King of the Gods Zeus and a mortal woman named Danae, was one of the great warriors of legend. Among his great accomplishments were slaying the hideous gorgon Medusa, and rescuing the fair Andromeda from the great sea monster. He has always been a favorite of the goddess Athena, who helped him defeat Medusa. She gave him her shield, which he bears proudly.

mobShortDesc: Odysseus, the legendary King of Ithaca, is standing here.
mobLongDesc: Odysseus was one of the great adventuring heroes of all Greek legend. Odysseus was the King of Ithaca who fought hard in the Trojan War and fought harder to return home afterward. The 10 year odyssey of his journey home is one of the most widely told legends there is. He was forced to battle the will of the gods, escape a great cyclops, travel through the underworld itself in order to get back to Ithaca and his wife. Upon returning he slayed all the noblemen who had camped in his home, desperately trying to overtake the presumed-dead king's place. Odysseus is truly a brave and noble warrior, more deserving of fame in the afterlife then most.
mobImmune: BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DISINTEGRATE CLAIR SUMMON BACKSTAB ASSAULT
attackType: SPELL SKILL SPELL SKILL SPELL SKILL

mobShortDesc: Achilles, the great hero of the Trojan War, stands proudly before you.
mobLongDesc: Achilles was one of the greatest Greek heroes of the Trojan War. After being born to Peleus, the King of Thessaly and Thetis, a Sea Nymph he was dipped into the River Styx for strength and protection. The one part missed by the river was his heel by which he was held as he was dipped. This turned out to be his downfall. After he killed Hector, Troy's greatest warrior, Hector's brother Paris shot him in the heel with an arrow and killed him.
mobImmune: POISON PUMMEL PUNCH SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DRAIN DISEMBOWEL CLAIR SUMMON

mobShortDesc: An anonymous Immortal is wandering around, enjoying the afterlife.
mobLongDesc: This is one of those Immortalized to walk this beautiful place for eternity that you don't recall ever hearing of. Certainly the afterlife is open to those who weren't well known heroes in life. You can't help but wonder what this person did to earn their right to live here amongst those great divinities. He doesn't seem pre-occupied with such questions himself, however. He gives you a serene smile and continues about his business, whatever it may be.

mobShortDesc: A crazed Pluto follower is here worshiping his master.
mobLongDesc: The minions of the great Pluto. Invisible to the eye, but deadly.

mobShortDesc: Cerberus the three-headed guard dog breaks into a satanic howl.
mobLongDesc: Cerberus is the ferocious 3-headed dog who guards the gates to hell. He allows only the dead to enter, and makes certain that they can't leave. Each of his heads is aimed in a different direction to make certain that he isn't missing anything. Cerberus has a mane and tail made of live, writhing snakes. Upon noticing your unwelcomed arrival he lets loose a blood-curdling howl and sets upon you.
attackType: BITE TAILSLAM SPELL SKILL SPELL SKILL SPELL SKILL SPELL SKILL SPELL SKILL
attackTarget: RAN_ROOM RAN_ROOM RAN_ROOM RAN_ROOM RAN_ROOM RAN_ROOM RAN_ROOM

mobShortDesc: Charon the underworldly ferryboat driver flashes you a ghastly grin.
mobLongDesc: Charon is the skeletal ferryboat driver in the underworld. For a small fee he takes the dead across the many rivers the underworld contains. All you can see of this creepy looking fellow is the jutting chin-bone from beneath the large black hood of the robe he wears. His hands are hidden beneath the long sleeves. Charon flashes you a ghastly, evil grin before he attacks.
attackType: CLAW SPELL SKILL SPELL SKILL SPELL SKILL SPELL SKILL SPELL SKILL
attackTarget: RAN_ROOM RAN_ROOM RAN_ROOM RAN_ROOM RAN_ROOM RAN_ROOM

mobShortDesc: You can't see Pluto standing here!
mobLongDesc: Pluto is the god of the dead, also known as Pater, Orcus, and Dis.
actionFlags: ISNPC WIMPY AGGCL AGGMU AGGBA AGGRANDOM
affectedByFlags: INFRAVISION DODGE SNEAK HIDE PROTECT-GOOD IMINV DUAL
attackType: SPELL SKILL SPELL SKILL SPELL SKILL SPELL SKILL SPELL SKILL SPELL SKILL SPELL SKILL SPELL SKILL SPELL SKILL
attackTarget: RAN_ROOM RAN_ROOM RAN_ROOM RAN_ROOM SELF RAN_ROOM RAN_ROOM RAN_ROOM RAN_ROOM
attackSpell: hell_fire vampiric_touch petrify dispel_sanctuary fury fireball lethal_fire fear conflagration

mobShortDesc: An anonymous Immortal is wandering around, enjoying the afterlife.
mobLongDesc: This is one of those Immortalized to walk this beautiful place for eternity that you don't recall ever hearing of. Certainly the afterlife is open to those who weren't well known heroes in life. You can't help but wonder what this person did to earn their right to live here amongst those great divinities. He doesn't seem pre-occupied with such questions himself, however. He gives you a serene smile and continues about his business, whatever it may be.

mobShortDesc: Typhon is standing here, blocking your path to Olympus.
mobLongDesc: Typhon is a huge beastly creature who once defeated Zeus in combat. The legends say that Typhon defeated Zeus, severed his tendons so he couldn't walk, and left him to die. Zeus recovered over time and came back to beat Typhon by throwing a mountain on him. Typhon's fits from beneath the mountain caused an eruption of lava and ash. Now Typhon is back with a purpose, to keep the unworthy from entering the sacred path to Mount Olympus.
mobImmune: FIRE ELECTRIC POISON PUMMEL KICK PUNCH SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DRAIN DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE CLAIR SUMMON HIT BLUDGEON PIERCE SLASH WHIP CLAW BITE STING CRUSH HACK CHOP SLICE BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT

mobShortDesc: Icarus is here, pouting over his punishment.
mobLongDesc: Icarus is the son of the great inventor Daedalus. He is known mostly for having flown too near the sun wearing his father's wax wings after using them to escape the labyrinth. The wings melted and he plummeted to his death. Now Daedalus punishes him in the afterlife by making him stay in this dark basement. Icarus looks sad and lonely, but he doesn't look like a weakling.
mobImmune: CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DISINTEGRATE CLAIR SUMMON HIT

mobShortDesc: A blank of primal clay stands here, waiting to be shaped
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.
