mobShortDesc: The Wizard is standing here talking to himself.
mobLongDesc: He is a very tough man.

mobShortDesc: The General ShopKeeper smiles and patiently waits for you to buy something.
mobLongDesc: He will fight like a madman to protect his store from riff raff like you.

mobShortDesc: The Food ShopKeeper smiles and patiently waits for you to buy something.
mobLongDesc: He will fight like a madman to protect his store from riff raff like you.

mobShortDesc: A Doctor is standing here.
mobLongDesc: He is a very good doctor.

mobShortDesc: A Roe is standing here.
mobLongDesc: A small Lovely Asiatic deer.

mobShortDesc: The Warrior Princess is standing here.
mobLongDesc: A proud female warrior roams these halls, obviously on a quest.

mobShortDesc: An Old Philosopher is standing here.
An Old Physicist is standing here.
mobLongDesc: He is very good at physic.

mobShortDesc: A Street Sweeper is here cleaning the floor.
mobLongDesc: He is a very hard working people. He wants to keep his place clean.

mobShortDesc: A Retired Knight is standing here.
mobLongDesc: Before you stands a great knight.  His quests are known far and wide.  His arms are thick and strong, his hands leathery from gripping a sword.  He still wears the armor of his guild, for he is the most pious of the Paladin.

mobShortDesc: An OldMan is standing here talking to himself.
mobLongDesc: He is a very old man. Once upon a time, he was a very brave fighter.

mobShortDesc: The Wiseman is standing here reading his book.
mobLongDesc: He is the owner of the Ivory Tower. He is very clever and very good at fighting.

mobShortDesc: The Wizard is standing here talking to himself.
mobLongDesc: He is a very tough man.

mobShortDesc: The General ShopKeeper smiles and patiently waits for you to buy something.
mobLongDesc: He will fight like a madman to protect his store from riff raff like you.

mobShortDesc: The Food ShopKeeper smiles and patiently waits for you to buy something.
mobLongDesc: He will fight like a madman to protect his store from riff raff like you.

mobShortDesc: A Doctor is standing here.
mobLongDesc: He is a very good doctor.

mobShortDesc: A Roe is standing here.
mobLongDesc: A small Lovely Asiatic deer.

mobShortDesc: The Negress is standing here.
mobLongDesc: This black skinned woman hails from a far off land.  She is one of many foreigners and travelers that come to visit this center of commerce.

mobShortDesc: A Philosopher wanders the city, in search of knowledge.
mobLongDesc: This Philosopher has come to live in this city because of all the knowledge and experiences that are traded in the city, and additionally has at his disposal the Wiseman that lives at the top of the tower.

mobShortDesc: An Old Physicist is standing here.
mobLongDesc: This old man wanders the city with a purpose.  He is seeking ingredients or rare and magical sources to use in his work.  But he appears to be more of the book worm type than a fighter.

mobShortDesc: A Street Sweeper is here, cleaning the streets.
mobLongDesc: In order for the Ivory City to maintain its beautiful appearance, it must maintain a large city cleaning staff.  This man is one of many of the city employed workers attempting to clean up the messes made by all of the citizens and visitors to the city.

mobShortDesc: The Retired Knight rests here in his chair.
mobLongDesc: Once upon a time, this Knight was known as a powerful fighter and protected the forces of good all across the world, but now he's old and has come here to this city of peace to relax before his last day comes.  But during his retirement, he gladly helps younger paladins learn the most advanced skills of their art.

mobShortDesc: An Old Man is standing here, talking to himself.
mobLongDesc: This is man looks befuddled and lost in the big city.  He doesn't look like he would be too tough in a fight, but may have been a warrior in the past.

mobShortDesc: The Wiseman sits here, legs crossed, thinking about the universe.
mobLongDesc: The Wiseman is human, although rumors elseways circulate because of his age.  There's not a man alive in the city that knows of a time when the Wiseman didn't sit here, atop the tower, examing the world as time passes and debating it's meaning with himself and those who come here to speak with him and share in this view from atop the world.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-ALIGNMENT DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY SPHERE PROTECT-EVIL DODGE PROTECT-GOOD INVUL DUAL

zoneName: Jungle of Despair by MonkeyBoy Sane
mobShortDesc: Fear strikes your heart as you gaze into the eyes of El Diablo!
mobLongDesc: Ancient and hungering, El Diablo plans to make YOU his next meal!

zoneName: Jungle of Despair by MonkeyBoy Sane
mobShortDesc: The queen termite debates matters of state here.
mobLongDesc: A small brown bug, just like all the other termites, but this one lays the eggs.

zoneName: Jungle of Despair by MonkeyBoy Sane
mobShortDesc: A termite drone guards his queen.
mobLongDesc: The termite drone will fight to the death to protect his queen.

zoneName: Jungle of Despair by MonkeyBoy Sane
mobShortDesc: A busy termite is digging away here.
mobLongDesc: A small brown bug.  Barely worth noticing, really.

zoneName: Jungle of Despair by MonkeyBoy Sane
mobShortDesc: The pygmy shaman rests here after a hard day of head shrinking.
mobLongDesc: He looks back at you with eyes like black coals, thinking to add you to his collection of shrunken heads that adorns his wall.

zoneName: Jungle of Despair by MonkeyBoy Sane
mobShortDesc: A sleepy pygmy sentry stands guard here.
mobLongDesc: This stout little fellow looks very sleepy.  His pointy spear dips ever lower as you look at him and he seems to be almost falling asleep at the post.

zoneName: Jungle of Despair by MonkeyBoy Sane
mobShortDesc: A pygmy warrior stands here with his spear pointed at YOU!
mobLongDesc: He needs rest after a long patrol in the jungle.

zoneName: Jungle of Despair by MonkeyBoy Sane
mobShortDesc: A fat pit bull gnaws on some bones here.
mobLongDesc: The pit bull terrier gnaws greedily at a corpse.  Maybe he will be gnawing yours soon.

zoneName: Jungle of Despair by MonkeyBoy Sane
mobShortDesc: An army ant is chewing on leaves here.
mobLongDesc: Tiny little insect, but a whole lot of them sure add up!

zoneName: Jungle of Despair by MonkeyBoy Sane
mobShortDesc: A pterodactyl watches you closely here.
mobLongDesc: Leathern wings spread out several meters in either direction.  The pterodactyl seems committed to some purpose you cannot guess.

zoneName: Jungle of Despair by MonkeyBoy Sane
mobShortDesc: The Blood Goddess is raving in a fit of bloodlust here.
mobLongDesc: Her mouth glistens with the red blood of the priests, which runs in driblets down her chin.  Her eyes glare an evil black glow as she stares wildly at you in her fit of bloodlust.

zoneName: Jungle of Despair by MonkeyBoy Sane
mobShortDesc: The King of the Monkeys is sitting here on his throne.
mobLongDesc: The King of the Monkeys has all the brains of a two-pound bag of oatmeal, but he thinks very highly of himself.  All the animals ignore him, but he doesn't care.  He is too vain to notice.

zoneName: Jungle of Despair by MonkeyBoy Sane
mobShortDesc: The Tyrannosaurus Rex rampages here.
mobLongDesc: His mighty jaws boast razor-sharp teeth almost a foot long!  His legs can shred a man in an instant!  Be VERY afraid!

zoneName: Jungle of Despair by MonkeyBoy Sane
mobShortDesc: A mastodon wanders lost.
mobLongDesc: The mastodon is lost.  In his thick fur coat he is very uncomfortable in this jungle heat.

zoneName: Jungle of Despair by MonkeyBoy Sane
mobShortDesc: A giant dragonfly buzzes around here.
mobLongDesc: The dragonfly is the size of your arm.  He doesn't look too dangerous though. Maybe he's just curious about this stranger in his valley.

zoneName: Jungle of Despair by MonkeyBoy Sane
mobShortDesc: A gigantic venus flytrap grows here.
mobLongDesc: The soil isn't good enough to support a plant that's THIS big! It must be supplementing its diet in some way.

zoneName: Jungle of Despair by MonkeyBoy Sane
mobShortDesc: A stegosaurus quietly chews the foliage here.
mobLongDesc: He pays no attention to you at all.  He only wants to be left alone so he can graze.

zoneName: Jungle of Despair by MonkeyBoy Sane
mobShortDesc: A baby brontosaurus snuggles close to his mom.
mobLongDesc: The baby brontosaurus is only a few weeks old and already he is bigger than you.  He depends on his mom to protect him.

zoneName: Jungle of Despair by MonkeyBoy Sane
mobShortDesc: A mother brontosaurus eyes you warily.
mobLongDesc: The mother brontosaurus doesn't like you standing here.  You pose a threat to her children.

zoneName: Jungle of Despair by MonkeyBoy Sane
mobShortDesc: A gigantic triceratops is blankly grazing the tall grass here.
mobLongDesc: A mighty beast, and heavily armored.  He can gore you with those three horns that protrude from his head.

zoneName: Jungle of Despair by MonkeyBoy Sane
mobShortDesc: A mountain gorilla pounds on his mighty chest!
mobLongDesc: The mountain gorilla stands on his hind legs and seems to boast of his great strength.

zoneName: Jungle of Despair by MonkeyBoy Sane
mobShortDesc: A small gorilla says 'ooo ooo ooo'
mobLongDesc: This gorilla one day will grow up to be a very BIG gorilla some day.

zoneName: Jungle of Despair by MonkeyBoy Sane
mobShortDesc: A chimp hops around and scratches himself here.
mobLongDesc: This monkey has a lot of fleas.  His friends pick them off of him and eat them.

zoneName: Jungle of Despair by MonkeyBoy Sane
mobShortDesc: A spider monkey is monkeying around here.
mobLongDesc: A small monkey with sharp claws and teeth.  He might be tougher than you think!

zoneName: Jungle of Despair by MonkeyBoy Sane
mobShortDesc: A native is standing here.
mobLongDesc: He wears the feathers and skins of other jungle creatures.  He looks like he is in a very good mood for some reason.

zoneName: Jungle of Despair by MonkeyBoy Sane
mobShortDesc: A black parrot flies through the trees here.
mobLongDesc: His plumage is black as night.  You have never seen a bird like this before.

zoneName: Jungle of Despair by MonkeyBoy Sane
mobShortDesc: A pygmy sentry patrols the area, looking for signs of intruders.
mobLongDesc: A tiny fellow, about 4 feet tall.  His pointy spear glints with poison.

zoneName: Jungle of Despair by MonkeyBoy Sane
mobShortDesc: A water snake undulates through the water.
mobLongDesc: The old water snake slithers through the water, looking for small rodents to eat.

zoneName: Jungle of Despair by MonkeyBoy Sane
mobShortDesc: A bengal tiger is prowling silently here.
mobLongDesc: The king of the jungle, he prowls in silence and strikes at will.

zoneName: Jungle of Despair by MonkeyBoy Sane
mobShortDesc: A creepy tarantula is crawling here.
mobLongDesc: Big hairy spider the size of you hand.  Icky icky icky.

zoneName: Jungle of Despair by MonkeyBoy Sane
mobShortDesc: A giant green parrot flies happily through the trees.
mobLongDesc: The size of a man, this parrot seems a throwback to prehistoric times. He is very happy to be flying around here in the jungle instead of trapped in a zoo.

zoneName: Jungle of Despair by MonkeyBoy Sane
mobShortDesc: A gila monster is slithering around here.
mobLongDesc: Big, green and scaly.  His tongue flickers in and out as he tastes the breeze.  He eyes you hungrily.

zoneName: Jungle of Despair by MonkeyBoy Sane
mobShortDesc: A black beetle is crawling around here.
mobLongDesc: A small, black beetle.  Hardly worth noticing, really.

zoneName: Jungle of Despair by MonkeyBoy Sane
mobShortDesc: A red parrot is flying here.
mobLongDesc: A deep-red parrot with a yellow belly.  Vibrantly colorful.

zoneName: Jungle of Despair by MonkeyBoy Sane
mobShortDesc: The urine monkey relieves himself on your head.
mobLongDesc: I wonder why its called the 'urine monkey'.

mobShortDesc: A tiny Pixie is here, spreading magic throughout the Glen.
mobLongDesc: A tiny pixie is here fluttering about.  As it flies through the air, it leaves a trail of very fine dust.  The pixie is very small, and fragile, yet they are known to be quite good magicians.  It has small eyes, and a delicate face. It makes a gentle smile as it sniffs some flowers which it has picked.  It appears to be a happy little creature.

mobShortDesc: A lanky elderly woman looms about the village.
mobLongDesc: An elderly woman looms about here.  She has long gray hair, that was once tied up in a bun, but has since came undone.  Her clothes are pieces of rags woven together to form a shanty version of a dress. Her old leather shoes have long since worn out their soles. Her frail body seems to quiver as she breathes.

mobShortDesc: A dirty old man is begging here.
mobLongDesc: A dirty old beggar sits up against the village wall here. He has a scruffy, mean looking face, however he has pale blue eyes that seem innocent enough.  He looks very weak, and sick and seems to only be half-conscious. He mumbles to himself as he barely manages to shake his empty cup.

mobShortDesc: An strange-looking fat man is hobbling about here.
mobLongDesc: An extremely fat man hobbles around here.  He has dark, course hair that is puffed up on the top of his head. Hair covers most of his face and neck, as well it pokes out from under his poorly pressed shirt.  He continually grunts and groans as he seemingly wanders about aimlessly.

mobShortDesc: A beautiful young lady is walking about here.
mobLongDesc: A beautiful young lady gracefully prances about here. Her long dark curls cascade down her back, and crowd her face.  She has deep, black eyes that seem somewhat haunting.  Her skin is dark, like that of a gypsy. She seems deep in thought, though she smiles and giggles to herself from time to time.  Though she is pleasant to look at, there is definitely something strange about this girl.

mobShortDesc: A handsome young man slowly walks about the village.
mobLongDesc: A handsome young man slow walks around here.  He appears somewhat nervous as he continuously glances behind his shoulder, then proceeds to scan the area.  He appears to be quite young - perhaps twenty or so.  His skin is quite pale, but he is a very well groomed person.

mobShortDesc: The Baker stands here, his face covered in flour.
mobLongDesc: A large man is here pounding some dough.  He wears the typical baker attire - a very large and baggy suit, with a big white apron.  His face and apron are covered with flour and pieces of dough.  He smiles happily as he takes a deep whiff of the aroma of his freshly baking goods.

mobShortDesc: The General Store Clerk is pacing about here.
mobLongDesc: A tall, skinny man stands here.  He has a thin moustache and long dark hair.  He is a well-dressed man, donning a long black jacket with expensive-looking trousers.  He is also wearing ruby cufflinks and a top hat.  He peers out from under has dark shaded glasses with round dark eyes.

mobName: The phantom of a young girl
mobShortDesc: A ghostly apparition fades in and out of reality here.
mobLongDesc: An apparition of a beautiful drow elf fades in and out of reality here. Though solid, it appears as though the banshee can be penetrated like thin air.  Her face twists with agony, as if the forces of the dead side and the living side are pulling her apart. Long drawn out moans emit from the creature.  Her eyes burn like the fires from hell as she slowly focuses her gaze upon you.
mobImmune: FIRE POISON PUMMEL KICK PUNCH SLEEP PARALYSIS DRAIN SUMMON HIT PIERCE SLASH WHIP CLAW BITE STING CRUSH HACK CHOP SLICE

mobShortDesc: A tall man adorned in beautiful white robes stands here.
mobLongDesc: An ancient cleric stands on a large stone here in deep prayer. His arms are raised to the sky as if this would some how make him closer to his god.  He wears long white robes embroidered with silver thread.  A large symbol hangs around his neck, it glows with pale light.

mobShortDesc: A grotesque wererat is here snarling at you.
mobLongDesc: A hunched-over wererat is here, growling.  This evil creatures eyes glow bright yellow with arcane power. Its arms are short, yet muscular.  It resembles a human in this form, however, its rat-like features are prominent. Spit froths at the mouth, and around the long teeth of the wererat. Evil radiates from its entire body.

mobShortDesc: A man with rat-like features is here calmly gazing at you.
mobLongDesc: Eduard is a very tall man, with strange looking features. His eyes are coal black, and slitted, and his hair is coarse-looking and greasy.  He has a pencil moustache, and his eye brows are so long they seem to jut off his head. He grins while smoking his pipe, showing his gnarled, yet sharp-looking teeth.

mobShortDesc: A stout-looking man is here watching you.
mobLongDesc: A tall and stern-looking man stands here.  He is fairly lean, yet obviously quite powerful.  His hands are very large, and his arms and legs are both extremely long. He carries a silver tray on his arm, and a small towel on his other.  He seems to be aimlessly wandering about the castle.

mobShortDesc: A fat man is here leaning over his stove.
mobLongDesc: A red-faced fat man is here slaving over a hot stove. His hair is long and greasy, and pinned back in a pony-tail. He wears a red kerchief and a white suit reminiscent of a professional cook.  Beads of sweat roll down the mans face and unto his collar.  He seems to enjoy his job however, as there is small pieces of food stuck in his beard.

mobShortDesc: A tall, blonde haired woman is cleaning here.
mobLongDesc: A beautiful and fragile-looking lady is scurrying about cleaning. She has long blonde hair tied back with a simple ribbon.  She wears a very tight maids outfit, and is equipped with a large box filled with various cleaning tools. She has clear, and crisp eyes that are in continuous motion as she hurriedly cleans and dusts.

mobShortDesc: An evil looking man gazes at you from under his dark cloak.
mobLongDesc: A huge man stands here cracking his knuckles.  He wears a long, hooded black cloak that touches the floor.  His coal black eyes peer out from under his hood.  An aura of evil radiates around this man.  His large frame is clearly visible beneath his clothes.  Long stains of blood cover his chest and cloak.

mobKeywords: Yorla sayer truth hag old wretched
mobShortDesc: A wretched old hag is looming about this area.
mobLongDesc: A wretched old hag wobbles about here.  Her ancient, leathered face looks like it has seen many a century.  Her bones crack with each step she takes.  She squints her eyes as if to see something in the distance.  She is constantly mumbling indiscernible words.  Her dress is old and ragged. Her worn leather shoes poke out from under the old rags.

mobShortDesc: The Banshee of a beautiful drow elf haunts the widow's walk.
mobLongDesc: An apparition of a beautiful drow elf faints in and out of reality here. Though solid, it appears as though the banshee can be penetrated like thin air.  Her face twists with agony, as if the forces of the dead side and the living side are pulling her apart. Long drawn out moans emit from the creature.  Her eyes burn like the fires from hell as she slowly focuses her gaze upon you.

mobShortDesc: A beautiful drow elf stands here.
mobLongDesc: A beautiful drow elf hovers in the air before you.  She gazes off into oblivion with cold brown eyes.  Her hair is long and white and cascades down her back.  Her finger nails are long and black, and she wears henna on each hand.  She wears expensive-looking robes and various jewels adorn her body.  On the centre of her forehead is a softly glowing emerald.
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST PUNCH

mobShortDesc: Boris the Royal guard is here on duty.
mobLongDesc: As all members of the Guard, Boris wears the chain mail required of them as uniform. He seems very well trained, and carries his scars with pride. This guy seems tough

mobShortDesc: Hans the Royal guard is here on duty.
mobLongDesc: As all members of the Guard, Hans wears the chain mail required of them as uniform. He seems very well trained, and moves like a fighter who has seen more than one battle, and longs to see the next!

mobShortDesc: Michael the Royal guard is here off duty, playing dice.
mobLongDesc: As all members of the Guard, Michael wears the chain mail required of them as uniform. He seems very well trained, and moves like an experienced fighter.

mobShortDesc: Jerry the Royal guard is here off duty, playing dice.
mobLongDesc: As all members of the Guard, Jerry wears the chain mail required of them as uniform. He seems very well trained, and moves like an experienced fighter.

mobName: Dick, the Guard of the Treasury
mobShortDesc: Dick, a big, mean-looking man, stands here, guarding the door.
mobLongDesc: He really is big, and you get the feeling he wouldn't take kindly to an attempt to get past him.

mobName: David, the Guard of the Treasury
mobShortDesc: David, a big, mean-looking man, stands here, guarding the door.
mobLongDesc: He really is big, and you get the feeling he wouldn't take kindly to an attempt to get past him.

mobShortDesc: There is a Cook here, making himself busy with a pot.
mobLongDesc: A junior cook, eager to do the Chef's bidding.

mobShortDesc: The Chef is here, shouting orders to the other cooks.
mobLongDesc: It seems he has been tasting his own food a bit too enthusiastically. He is, in other words, a bit fat.

mobShortDesc: Tom, the King's Lifeguard, is standing here.
mobLongDesc: This guy looks just like his twin, Tim. There seems to be no doubt that he is completely prepared to give his life for the King, if necessary.

mobShortDesc: Tim, the King's Lifeguard, is standing here.
mobLongDesc: This guy looks just like his twin, Tom. There seems to be no doubt that he is completely prepared to give his life for the King, if necessary.

mobShortDesc: The Astrologer is sitting here, studying a book.
mobLongDesc: He is old and white-haired, with a long beard. As you see him, you can almost believe the rumors about stars deciding Fate, and that astrology is capable of seeing the future.

mobShortDesc: A large Cockroach is crawling by the wall.
mobLongDesc: Very large indeed, and they say cockroaches are hard to kill...

mobShortDesc: There is a Cleaning Woman here, trying not be noticed.
mobLongDesc: Although she has a menial job, she seems to like it.

mobShortDesc: James the Butler is standing here, looking pompous.
mobLongDesc: The typical perfect butler: upper middle age, a bit bald and with an impressive belly.

mobShortDesc: Slumped in a corner you see Ergan, aka the Murderer of Townsbridge.
mobLongDesc: You remember a time almost a decade ago, when the news of the day was how this man had slaughtered the entire population of the little village of Townsbridge. He was imprisoned, and here he is: a shadow of the undoubtedly great warrior he once was, but still to be reckoned with.

mobShortDesc: The Royal Herald is standing here.
mobLongDesc: This is a young, powerfully built man, whose primary function is to make Royal Announcements.

mobShortDesc: The Training Master is here, supervising.
mobLongDesc: Aged, but experienced, the Training Master is skilled in the use of virtually every weapon type invented by Man.

mobName: Peter, the Captain of the Royal guard
mobShortDesc: Peter, the Captain of the Royal guard, walks around inspecting.
mobLongDesc: As all members of the Guard, Peter wears the chain mail required of them as uniform. Even though all the other guards seem well trained, you realize none of them would stand a chance against this man in a fight. He stands at least two meters tall, but still moves with an almost feline grace. He actually radiates strength and confidence, and you have to fight a sudden urge to come to attention as you see him.

mobShortDesc: Jeanette the Royal guard is here on duty.
mobLongDesc: As all members of the Guard, Jeanette wears the chain mail required of them as uniform. She seems very well trained, and carries her scars with pride. This girl could be nasty if she wanted to...

mobShortDesc: Bertram the Royal guard is here on duty.
mobLongDesc: As all members of the Guard, Bertram wears the chain mail required of them as uniform. He seems very well trained, and carries his scars with pride. This guy seems tough...

mobShortDesc: Andrew the Royal guard is here on duty.
mobLongDesc: As all members of the Guard, Andrew wears the chain mail required of them as uniform. He seems very well trained, and moves like a fighter who has seen more than one battle, and longs to see the next!

mobShortDesc: Anne the Royal guard is here on duty.
mobLongDesc: As all members of the Guard, Anne wears the chain mail required of them as uniform. She seems very well trained, and moves like a fighter who has seen more than one battle, and longs to see the next!

mobShortDesc: Jochem the Royal guard sits here, off duty.
mobLongDesc: As all members of the Guard, Jochem wears the chain mail required of them as uniform. He seems very well trained, and moves like a fighter who has seen more than one battle, and longs to see the next!

mobShortDesc: Matt the Royal guard is here on duty.
mobLongDesc: As all members of the Guard, Matt wears the chain mail required of them as uniform. He seems very well trained, and moves like an experienced fighter.

mobShortDesc: Mick the Royal guard is here, training with the Master.
mobLongDesc: As all members of the Guard, Mick wears the chain mail required of them as uniform. He seems very well trained, and moves like an experienced fighter.

mobShortDesc: Brian the Royal guard is here, training with the Master.
mobLongDesc: As all members of the Guard, Brian wears the chain mail required of them as uniform. He seems very well trained, and moves like an experienced fighter.

mobShortDesc: Jim the Royal guard is here on duty.
mobLongDesc: As all members of the Guard, Jim wears the chain mail required of them as uniform. He seems very well trained, and moves like an experienced fighter.

mobShortDesc: You hear a frightening wail, and see a horrible Ghost approaching.
mobLongDesc: The Ghost is almost translucent, and looks really SCARY!

mobShortDesc: The wise King Welmar sits here in his throne.
mobLongDesc: In his later middle-age, with his beard starting to grey, King Welmar is still very powerfully built, and wouldn't take kindly to an attack. Despite that, you know he is well-loved throughout the land, and has a reputation as a wise and just ruler.

mobShortDesc: A parasite is here, feeding on the dead tissue.
mobLongDesc: This gigantic tick-looking monster is feeding on the dead remains of the brain.  It looks very dangerous.  Scales cover it's body and it has some large claws and even larger fangs.  When it sees you, it decides that living flesh is more tasty than its dead counterpart.
mobImmune: PUMMEL SLEEP PARALYSIS CLAIR SUMMON HIT

mobShortDesc: A `fdark purple`q Kitzanti Captain is looking for a fight.
mobLongDesc: The Captain is about three feet taller than the other Kitzanti.  It wears the same armor as the warriors and Corporals and uses a shield, but in addition to the spear it is wielding, a brilliant helmet is also worn, emitting a dark light.  This dark purple insect doesn't need an excuse to kick your ass!
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY SPHERE DODGE PROTECT-GOOD INVUL DUAL

mobShortDesc: A `ddark yellow`q Kitzanti Corporal is here barking out orders.
mobLongDesc: This Kitzanti warrior looks to be stronger and fiercer than the normal bright yellow type.  It stands a little taller and carries a large shield.  The Corporals directly command the warriors.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY DODGE INVUL DUAL

mobShortDesc: A `kbright yellow`q Kitzanti warrior is on the patrol.
mobLongDesc: This insect looks like it must be some sort of warrior.  It carries a large spear and wears some weird sort of insectoid battle armor. Unlike the drones, it is bright yellow in color, rather than light green.  Although it doesn't look like a fierce opponent you guess that it does not overpower it's enemies by brute force, but rather sheer numbers.

mobShortDesc: A `jlight green`q Kitzanti drone scuttles about.
mobLongDesc: This insect-like creature looks like a giant praying mantis.  It scuttles about and seems to be doing some sort of manual labor.  It doesn't pay much attention to you.  It is light green in color and very fast.

mobShortDesc: A long strand of hair is attached to the nasal cavity.
mobLongDesc: This strand of massive hair sways slightly, but seems ready to attack you with a massive whip!

mobShortDesc: A scared little gnome is trying to hide here.
mobLongDesc: This poor little fellow looks scared out of his mind.  He entered this place looking for treasure and adventure and all he found was the inside of a giant corpse.  He looks like he is ready to attack anything he sees and it might be a wise idea to not try to help him escape this awful place.

mobShortDesc: A small heart worm wriggles around in front of your eyes.
mobLongDesc: This small worm must be in the infant stage of development.  It is simply wriggling around here.

mobShortDesc: A gigantic heart worm is here, eating the decayed heart.
mobLongDesc: This massive worm is slowly eating the decayed heart.  It looks like a larger version of a worm that has been known to infect dogs, but one of this size could be dangerous indeed.  It looks very dangerous and you think it would be best to leave it to it's business.
attackType: BITE BASH SPELL CAST SPELL CAST

mobShortDesc: A piece of flesh pulls away from the wall and attacks!
mobLongDesc: This decaying piece of flesh looks like it is slowly in the process of transforming from living flesh to that of the undead.  It's rotted stench fills the room and you feel sick just looking at it.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SPHERE FLY INVUL DUAL

mobShortDesc: A `bdark red blob`q hovers here, floating around aimlessly.
mobLongDesc: This blob-like mass is dark red and looks as if it is actually a container of some sorts.  It is bloated and doesn't move very fast, yet it continues to float around, with no real obvious purpose.

mobShortDesc: A `cdark green blob`q hovers here, looking very diseased.
mobLongDesc: This blob of cellular mass hovers around.  It seems to have no life force, but moves about aimlessly almost searching for things to destroy.  It is a dark green color and reminds you of disease.  It quivers and shakes violently every so often and now directs it's attention towards you.
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST

mobShortDesc: A gigantic eye is here, staring blankly at you.
mobLongDesc: The rotted, decaying eye peers lifelessly into your soul.  It simply looks at you, but then again, what else can an eye really do?

mobShortDesc: The strands come alive and lurch towards you!
mobLongDesc: The Neuron Beast looks like the collection of several strands of rope.  It twitches continually and generates tremendous amounts of static energy. Looking closer, you notice it has no arms or legs, or even a head for that matter, just strands.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY SPHERE INFRAVISION INVUL
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST

mobShortDesc: The King is here counting his gold coins.
mobLongDesc: An ugly greedy king. He will do anything to earn money.
actionFlags: SPEC SENTINEL ISNPC WIMPY MEMORY SHIELD
mobImmune: CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE CLAIR SUMMON BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT

mobShortDesc: The Green Guardian stands here and looks at you expectantly.
mobLongDesc: The guardian dressed in green robes waits patiently for some tokens.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY SPHERE DODGE INVUL DUAL FURY

mobShortDesc: The Blue Guardian stands here and looks at you expectantly.
mobLongDesc: The guardian dressed in blue robes waits patiently for some tokens.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY SPHERE DODGE INVUL DUAL FURY

mobShortDesc: The Red Guardian stands here and looks at you expectantly.
mobLongDesc: The Guardian dressed in red robes waits patiently for some tokens.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY SPHERE DODGE INVUL DUAL FURY

mobShortDesc: A blank of primal clay stands here, waiting to be shaped
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.

mobShortDesc: A blank of primal clay stands here, waiting to be shaped
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.

mobShortDesc: A Kombat Creature wanders aimlessly about the halls of battle.
mobLongDesc: This creature is forever trapped in this battle arena. How or when he became trapped here is impossible to know, as it seems to lack the capacity to speak. It merely wanders pitifully over this premisis for eternity.

mobShortDesc: The Kombat King welcomes you to his domain with a wicked attack!
mobLongDesc: The Kombat King is unhappy with your poor judgment in entering his room. From here he watches the kombatants, and keeps the ones who stray in line. Unfortunately, you fall into the category of stray, and now it's time you were kept in line...*comf*
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY SPHERE DODGE INVUL DUAL FURY

mobShortDesc: The Green Guardian stands here and looks at you expectantly.
mobLongDesc: The guardian dressed in green robes waits patiently for some tokens.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY SPHERE DODGE INVUL DUAL FURY

mobShortDesc: The Blue Guardian stands here and looks at you expectantly.
mobLongDesc: The guardian dressed in blue robes waits patiently for some tokens.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY SPHERE DODGE INVUL DUAL FURY

mobShortDesc: The Red Guardian stands here and looks at you expectantly.
mobLongDesc: The Guardian dressed in red robes waits patiently for some tokens.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY SPHERE DODGE INVUL DUAL FURY

mobShortDesc: A blank of primal clay stands here, waiting to be shaped
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.

mobShortDesc: A blank of primal clay stands here, waiting to be shaped
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.

mobLongDesc: This creature is forever trapped in this battle arena. How or when he became trapped here is impossible to know, as it seems to lack the capacity to speak. It merely wanders pitifully over this premisis for eternity.

mobLongDesc: The Kombat King is unhappy with your poor judgment in entering his room. From here he watches the kombatants, and keeps the ones who stray in line. Unfortunately, you fall into the category of stray, and now it's time you were kept in line...*comf*
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY SPHERE DODGE INVUL DUAL FURY

mobShortDesc: A blank of primal clay stands here, waiting to be shaped
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.

mobShortDesc: A bent old man, squinting eyes and steady hands, trims a tiny tree.
mobLongDesc: Lean hard muscle stands out firm against boney wrists and thin, grasping fingers. Thin wisps of grey hair poke out wildly from beneath his round cap. Bright blue eyes stab out from beneath thick eyebrows, their keen gaze fixed intently on his work.

mobShortDesc: Rashgugh is standing here, taunting you with a token.
mobLongDesc: Rashgugh is Shargugh the forest brownie's older brother. His thick matted fur gives him great protection from physical attack and his forest living has made him fearless.

mobShortDesc: A Postman is here collecting the mail.
mobLongDesc: He is a very hard working guy. No matter what day it is, he will be here waiting to serve you.  Watch out though, occasionally he goes bonkers and starts shooting.

mobShortDesc: The ink monkey runs around making papers.
mobLongDesc: Less than a foot tall, and black as ink, this monkey is a hard working guy.  His eyes are full of fear of the clanking press, and dart from moving part to moving part trying to avoid becoming an entry in the obituaries.

mobShortDesc: A teacher is standing here.
The strong figure of Hlin, the protector of Midgaard is standing here.
mobLongDesc: Silent and strong, Hlin stands watch over the city of Midgaard. Carefully protecting its citizens and the multitudes of adventurers that visit, she is beautifully armored and radiates a calm aura of strength and peace as she watches over her charges.

mobShortDesc: An Adventurer is standing here.
Mimir, bent and stooped with age and wisdom, carefully cleans his shelves.
mobLongDesc: Stooped and bent with countless years of wisdom, Mimir is bound to eternally serve Odin and the gods with sage advice and understanding. Though his head has been restored to him, he still remains indentured to Odin and bound to offer his wisdom and advice any time he requests it. Time has offered him the chance to pursue an interest in the mixing and brewing of potions which offers to Midgaards travelers and brave adventurers.

mobShortDesc: The town paperboy stands here, hawking papers.
mobLongDesc: The town crier is a short lizard-boy with a toothy grin.  He wanders the town, hawking his newspapers with a hoarse voice.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE PROTECT-EVIL INFRAVISION DODGE DUAL

mobShortDesc: A corpse is lying here.
Puff the Fractal Dragon is here, contemplating a higher reality.

zoneName: La SoudureII and Plane of Horrors
mobShortDesc: A grotesque soul with distended abscesses moves about haphazardly.
mobLongDesc: Maker of Worlds, Breaker of Realms: a paradox of a being heralded as both a creator and a destroyer.  But that was in life; here in this frozen desert stuck between death and the beyond it is a frumpy, miserably oafish thing. A wastrel, somehow both emaciated and fat, foolishly young yet frightfully old.  An odious loner, shuffling aimlessly without purpose or meaning; a fitting eternity after a life of unrealized potential and squandered power.

zoneName: La SoudureII and Plane of Horrors
mobShortDesc: A covetous, mistrustful wretch limps along feebly.
mobLongDesc: This manifestation of megalomania and paranoia is more terrifying and repulsive than you could have possibly imagined. Whatever universally despised humonculus fell to maroon this putrescent abomination here in this purgatory must have been truly foul. Amorphous, fleshy lumps lurch forth from the hideous mass, emitting horrendous squelching noises as it tries desperately to grasp onto anything it can.

zoneName: La SoudureII and Plane of Horrors
mobShortDesc: A molding, slothful pile of soul goo is here, trying not to move.
mobLongDesc: Struggling to maintain a cohesive form, this decrepit pile of soul goo is the most pathetic and detestable creature you have ever seen.  If not for the thick carpet of disease-ridden black mold coating its surface, the goo would spill forth over the land as a destructive tide of plague jelly. More slovenly sloth than man, the temporal being whose festering carcass bore this tainted goo contributed little and less, suckling life from the world around him like an obstreperous nursing infant leeches milk from its mother.

zoneName: La SoudureII and Plane of Horrors
mobShortDesc: A charred and still smouldering soul is here, ready to flame on.
mobLongDesc: The scorched soul of Scorch is no more than a floating pile of charred nothingness. Smoke emanates from every burnt orifice of this vile effigy and the acrid stench that bellows forth is as real and suffocating as the heat which visibly irradiates the air around it.  The nothing it began as is even less now, the foul damned soul of a loathsome creature few will remember.

zoneName: La SoudureII and Plane of Horrors
mobShortDesc: A spectral fungi with a spider-like form flails about wildly.
mobLongDesc: A demented and infested muse, no longer restrained by the confines of a sane and logical mind.  What poetry of creation its former self may have wielded has been mangled and rotted leaving this soul free to warp and pervert reality with utter disregard for the cataclysmic consequences. Its twisted spectral body is a distorted blend of various forms covered in bubbling pustules of a strange erotic fungi.  Galumphing about with a surprising speed and agility, it trails a wake of putrescence and death behind it.

zoneName: La SoudureII and Plane of Horrors
mobShortDesc: A hideously evil and foul soul floats here, eager to kill.
mobLongDesc: Hate is here: evil, vile and ugly.  Merely imagining such a thing would make most mortals wretch their guts out in painful agony.  Here, before you, it is nigh unbearable and you struggle to control the mutinous gag reflex it effects.  The sinister being whose shattered form birthed this depraved soul must have been the most contemptible and vulgar creature ever to have walked the planes of existence.

mobShortDesc: The flying fish is riding on the wings of the winds and the waves.
mobLongDesc: The flying fish arcs through the air in a graceful flight, only to plunge back into the icy depths of La Soudure.

mobShortDesc: The Albatross flies around here looking for food.
mobLongDesc: The albatross flies serenely through the air, secure in the fact that he will not be shot down by any seafarer.

mobShortDesc: The Death Jester prances around here, cackling madly.
mobLongDesc: As you look into his eyes your mind loses all grips on sanity.  Slowly, but surely, you feel your body petrifying from the intense aura of fear emanating from within the jester.
affectedByFlags: INVISIBLE DETECT-ALIGNMENT DETECT-MAGIC SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY INFRAVISION STATUE DUAL

mobShortDesc: A pale, red-eyed, eight legged monstrous bat crawls about on the ceiling here.
mobLongDesc: This red eyed, white furred monstrosity click at you with foul dripping mandibles as you look at it. Being a small thing, perhaps a cross between a spider and a bat, it preys on the foolish idlers of these labyrinthine depths.

mobShortDesc: A small, blood-coloured winged worm writhes on the ground here.
mobLongDesc: A blind, vicious creature apparently the misbegotten offspring of a bat and a parasitic leech, this creature exists for the sole purpose of draining the blood of idling adventurers. It flaps its little bat wings and gapes a toothy maw at you, ichor dripping from the saw-like cusps in its alien mouth.

mobShortDesc: The Dungeonmaster stands here, ready to kill anyone who wants to leave.
mobLongDesc: A tall man dressed in a dark green cloak stands before you.  His face is partially concealed by the darkness in here, you catch a glimpse of his bloodshot eyes and an involuntary shudder passes through you.  This is a man who's gone insane from being in here too long.  Death seems to be the only way out from here and his only purpose in life now is to allow others to escape this accursed place.

mobShortDesc: A tiny skulkrin sneaks about here.
mobLongDesc: The skulkrin is a humanoid dwarf with wild red hair and sharp, wicked fangs. They're experts at stealth which serves their cowardly ways well.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE INFRAVISION DODGE SNEAK HIDE

mobShortDesc: An old Red Wyrm spreads his wide, sinewy wings, shaking molten rock across the room.
mobLongDesc: A massive head looks down at you, glowing eyes filled with flickering flames, lazy curls of smoke drifting out of its nostrils. A long scaly neck connects to a massive body, thick wings spreading outwards as molten rock sloughs off crashing back into the boiling pool of lava around it.
attackType: TRAMPLE BITE CLAW DISARM SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST
attackTarget: RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP

mobShortDesc: A lizard, covered in molten scales, drags its huge body slowly along the floor.
mobLongDesc: Red scales glow brightly as waves of intense heat roll outwards from the thick crawling lizard. A huge fan of bone and sinew marches down the center of its spine, flickering flames dancing along the ridges, the smell of sulphur and ash filling the passage as it crawls along. Thick jaws grind slowly, jagged teeth showing brightly in a wicked, curving smile.

mobShortDesc: Grimhol is here, pacing the room in search of his next meal.
mobLongDesc: Awl's pet panther, Grimhol, is a lean, strong, fierce beast.  Much like Awl himself.  Grimhol enjoys toying with his prey before devouring it whole.
affectedByFlags: INFRAVISION DODGE SNEAK IMINV DUAL FURY

mobShortDesc: A G-man is here keeping watch over the area.
mobLongDesc: This fellow looks like he could easily fade into a crowd, in his plain grey suit and dark sunglasses...he is keeping an eye out for anyone who might steal one of Lem or Awl's secrets.

mobShortDesc: A Dark Creeper is here trying to hide in the shadows.
mobLongDesc: A small creature about the size of the dwarf is skulking here. He is dressed from head to toe in dark and somber clothes.

mobShortDesc: Mirissa the undead wife of Loftwick is sleeping here in eternal torment.
mobLongDesc: A beautiful female lies here on the bed. When she turns over you are horrified to see that one half of her face has been ritually and methodically burned away, leaving horrible scars.

mobShortDesc: A once powerful knight and brother of Redferne stands here.
mobLongDesc: This knight stands here in defiance to all that are living. He is a Lich of the greatest power. As you look at him a disembodied voice rasps....  I am LOFTWICK THE LICH-KING of the GITHYANKI! Prepare to meet your gods...

mobShortDesc: A Githyanki Priest is here praying to Sinat for his blessings.
mobLongDesc: A Githyanki Priest wearing the symbols of Sinat and Karn prays for someone to work his ministrations of Magic, Mayhem, Chaos, Destruction, and Death on. When you enter he states simply..."My prayers have been answered!".

mobShortDesc: A Githyanki Warlock is here making strange gestures in your direction.
mobLongDesc: A Githyanki Warlock the most feared of all Githyanki stands here. He is dressed in strange garb covered with arcane runes. As you enter his domain he looks at you and begins gesturing....

mobShortDesc: A Githyanki Royal Guard Stands here watching diligently.
mobLongDesc: The guard is dressed in what appears to be the finest Githyanki armor bearing the symbol of Loftwick.

mobShortDesc: A Githyanki Sergeant stands here watching over his underlings.
mobLongDesc: A Githyanki Sergeant, known throughout the world and planes as the most vicious creatures to ever exist, stands here glaring at you. Before you can even think he screams "DIE ADVENTURER SCUM!!" and attacks you...

mobShortDesc: The Githyanki warrior leaps to attack you!
mobLongDesc: A defender of the Githyanki race, this creature looks very deadly. He screams I AM GITHYANKI! DIE DIE DIE DIE!

mobShortDesc: A Githyanki Citizen is here going about his business.
mobLongDesc: A Githyanki Citizen walks about minding his own business, like buying slaves, buying humans for dinner, pieces of mindflayers as jewelry etc.

mobShortDesc: A child is here screaming at you...WAAAAAAAAAAAA!
mobLongDesc: A child with a big biscuit eatin' head stands here wailing at you!

mobShortDesc: The Dark Stalker is here stalking YOU!
mobLongDesc: The Dark Stalker is a tall figure dressed in black bandages, black as if he is covered in the dried blood of his victims.

mobShortDesc: A huge shadow dragon was lying here nursing, until you entered....
mobLongDesc: This mother is pissed off !  You never should have disturbed her or her children.  This might have been a bad idea on your part....

mobShortDesc: A tiny shadow dragon is here, being nursed by it's mother.
A small shadow dragon is here, looking around for it's mother.
mobLongDesc: You can barely make out the form of the shadow dragon.  It's wicked figure indicates that you might not be welcome.

mobShortDesc: A shadowy figure materializes from out of nowhere.
mobLongDesc: The wraith is not amused that you have disturbed him.

mobShortDesc: An Acolyte of Yunin is here acting silly (like her goddess).
mobLongDesc: An Acolyte of Yunin is wondering why the HELL Yunin put her here. She runs up to you and rubs against you asking for help, she seems to be carrying a bag full of snowballs.

mobShortDesc: A Human Slave stands here drooling and calling mindlessly for his master.
mobLongDesc: A creature that once human stands here. He is gibbering incoherently and calling for Githyanki master. He turns a blank stare upon you and drools on his chest.

mobShortDesc: A spectral figure continues about his business, unaware that you are here.
mobLongDesc: You see an ancient figure that is still attempting to complete his life's task. Githyanki like to keep them around as trophies and entertainment.

mobName: The Captain of The Githyanki Royal Guards
mobShortDesc: The Captain of the Githyanki Royal Guards is standing here.
mobLongDesc: The captain is dressed in the finest Githyanki armor bearing the symbol of Loftwick.  He is holding a large key ring that contains many keys.

mobShortDesc: The Royal Githyanki Gatekeeper is here watching the gate.
mobLongDesc: The impressive gatekeeper is dressed in the finest Githyanki armor bearing the symbol of Lofwick.  It is him that will decide if you are worthy to enter the great city of Loftwick.

mobShortDesc: A Dark Creeper is here trying to hide in the shadows.
mobLongDesc: A small creature about the size of the dwarf is skulking here. He is dressed from head to toe in dark and somber clothes.

mobShortDesc: Mirissa the undead wife of Loftwick is sleeping here in eternal torment.
mobLongDesc: A beautiful female lies here on the bed. When she turns over you are horrified to see that one half of her face has been ritually and methodically burned away, leaving horrible scars.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY INFRAVISION DUAL FURY

mobLongDesc: This knight stands here in defiance to all that are living. He is a Lich of the greatest power. As you look at him a disembodied voice rasps....  I am LOFTWICK THE LICH-KING of the GITHYANKI! Prepare to meet your gods...

mobLongDesc: A Githyanki Priest wearing the symbols of Sinat and Karn prays for someone to work his ministrations of Magic, Mayhem, Chaos, Destruction, and Death on. When you enter he states simply..."My prayers have been answered!".

mobLongDesc: A Githyanki Warlock the most feared of all Githyanki stands here. He is dressed in strange garb covered with arcane runes. As you enter his domain he looks at you and begins gesturing....

mobLongDesc: The guard is dressed in what appears to be the finest Githyanki armor bearing the symbol of Lofwick.

mobShortDesc: A Githyanki Sergeant stands here watching over his underlings.
mobLongDesc: A Githyanki Seargent, known throughout the world and planes as the most viscious creatures to ever exist, stands here glaring at you. Before you can even think he screams "DIE ADVENTURER SCUM!!" and attacks you...

mobShortDesc: The Githyanki warrior leaps to attack you!
mobLongDesc: A defender of the Githyanki race, this creature looks very deadly. He screams I AM GITHYANKI! DIE DIE DIE DIE!

mobShortDesc: A Githyanki Citizen is here going about his business.
mobLongDesc: A Githyanki Citizen walks about minding his own business, like buying slaves, buying humans for dinner, pieces of mindflayers as jewelry etc.

mobShortDesc: A child is here screaming at you...WAAAAAAAAAAAA!
mobLongDesc: A child with a big biskit eatin' head stands here wailin at you!

mobShortDesc: The Dark Stalker is here stalking YOU!
mobLongDesc: The Dark Stalker is a tall figure dressed in dirty black bandages. The bandages are splotched all over from blood, the black color appears to come from the dried blood of victims dispatched long ago. He returns your stare, not with the curiousity of yours, but with pure hatred only the dead could muster.

mobShortDesc: A huge shadow dragon lies contently as she nurses her young.
mobLongDesc: A massive, nondescript shadow moves about, seemingly fading in and out of existance as she moves slowly among the shadows cast across the ground. A truely majestic creature, she gazes upon you with firey eyes, as if she was sizing you up as a fight or a meal.

mobShortDesc: A tiny shadow dragon is here, being nursed by it's mother.
mobLongDesc: This tiny shadow gives only a vague glimpse of what it can become. Although it has the potential to become a full fledged nightmare, it's tiny claws and undeveloped spikes make you think it could be easily destroyed now, before it becomes that nightmare.

mobShortDesc: A small shadow dragon is here, looking around for it's mother.
mobLongDesc: You can barely make out the form of a small shadow dragon. It runs among the other shadows cast on the ground, making it impossible to follow. You can only catch a fleeting glance. Except for it's eyes. The eyes of this dragon burn with a flame not of this world.

mobShortDesc: A shadowy figure materializes from out of nowhere.
mobLongDesc: You cannot tell where this being begins and ends, it does indeed defy description. It is simply a shadow, as nimble and deceptive as light itself.

mobShortDesc: An Acolyte of Yunin is here acting silly (like her goddess).
mobLongDesc: An Acolyte of Yunin is wondering why the HELL Yunin put her here. She runs up to you and rubs against you asking for help, she seems to be carrying a bag full of snowballs.

mobShortDesc: A Human Slave stands here drooling and calling mindlessly for his master.
mobLongDesc: A creature that once human stands here. He is gibbering incoherently and calling for his Githyanki master. He turns a blank stare upon you and drools on his chest.

mobShortDesc: A spectral figure continues about his business, unaware that you are here.
mobLongDesc: You see an ancient figure that is still attempting to complete his life's task. Githyanki like to keep them around as trophies and entertainment.

zoneName: Loftwick revamp by Sane and Addict
mobShortDesc: A guard stands here guarding the check point.
mobLongDesc: Before you stands the lamest joke ever to hit ronin! Beware the bard!

zoneName: Loftwick revamp by Sane and Addict
mobShortDesc: A Dark Creeper is here trying to hide in the shadows.
mobLongDesc: A small creature about the size of the dwarf is skulking here. He is dressed from head to toe in dark and somber clothes.

mobLongDesc: The guard is dressed in what appears to be the finest Githyanki armor bearing the symbol of Lofwick.

zoneName: Loftwick revamp by Sane and Addict
mobShortDesc: A Githyanki Sergeant stands here watching over his underlings.
mobLongDesc: A Githyanki Seargent, known throughout the world and planes as the most viscious creatures to ever exist, stands here glaring at you. Before you can even think he screams "DIE ADVENTURER SCUM!!" and attacks you...

zoneName: Loftwick revamp by Sane and Addict
mobShortDesc: The Githyanki warrior leaps to attack you!
mobLongDesc: A defender of the Githyanki race, this creature looks very deadly. He screams I AM GITHYANKI! DIE DIE DIE DIE!

zoneName: Loftwick revamp by Sane and Addict
mobShortDesc: A Githyanki Citizen is here going about his business.
mobLongDesc: A Githyanki Citizen walks about minding his own business, like buying slaves, buying humans for dinner, pieces of mindflayers as jewelry etc.

zoneName: Loftwick revamp by Sane and Addict
mobShortDesc: A child is here screaming at you...WAAAAAAAAAAAA!
mobLongDesc: A child with a big biskit eatin' head stands here wailin at you!

zoneName: Loftwick revamp by Sane and Addict
mobShortDesc: The Dark Stalker is here stalking YOU!
mobLongDesc: The Dark Stalker is a tall figure dressed in dirty black bandages. The bandages are splotched all over from blood, the black color appears to come from the dried blood of victims dispatched long ago. He returns your stare, not with the curiousity of yours, but with pure hatred only the dead could muster.

zoneName: Loftwick revamp by Sane and Addict
mobShortDesc: A huge shadow dragon lies contently as she nurses her young.
mobLongDesc: A massive, nondescript shadow moves about, seemingly fading in and out of existance as she moves slowly among the shadows cast across the ground. A truely majestic creature, she gazes upon you with firey eyes, as if she was sizing you up as a fight or a meal.

zoneName: Loftwick revamp by Sane and Addict
mobShortDesc: A tiny shadow dragon is here, being nursed by it's mother.
mobLongDesc: This tiny shadow gives only a vague glimpse of what it can become. Although it has the potential to become a full fledged nightmare, it's tiny claws and undeveloped spikes make you think it could be easily destroyed now, before it becomes that nightmare.

zoneName: Loftwick revamp by Sane and Addict
mobShortDesc: A small shadow dragon is here, looking around for it's mother.
mobLongDesc: You can barely make out the form of a small shadow dragon. It runs among the other shadows cast on the ground, making it impossible to follow. You can only catch a fleeting glance. Except for it's eyes. The eyes of this dragon burn with a flame not of this world.

zoneName: Loftwick revamp by Sane and Addict
mobShortDesc: A shadowy figure materializes from out of nowhere.
mobLongDesc: You cannot tell where this being begins and ends, it does indeed defy description. It is simply a shadow, as nimble and deceptive as light itself.

zoneName: Loftwick revamp by Sane and Addict
mobShortDesc: An Acolyte of Yunin is here acting silly (like her goddess).
mobLongDesc: An Acolyte of Yunin is wondering why the HELL Yunin put her here. She runs up to you and rubs against you asking for help, she seems to be carrying a bag full of snowballs.

zoneName: Loftwick revamp by Sane and Addict
mobShortDesc: A Human Slave stands here drooling and calling mindlessly for his master.
mobLongDesc: A creature that once human stands here. He is gibbering incoherently and calling for his Githyanki master. He turns a blank stare upon you and drools on his chest.

zoneName: Loftwick revamp by Sane and Addict
mobShortDesc: A spectral figure continues about his business, unaware that you are here.
mobLongDesc: You see an ancient figure that is still attempting to complete his life's task. Githyanki like to keep them around as trophies and entertainment.

mobShortDesc: Volva, is sitting in a trance like state.
mobLongDesc: Sitting on a platform, Volva is slipping into a trance like state, to be able to communicate with spirits to learn the answers to questions.

mobShortDesc: A test character stands here, ready to be killed
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.

mobShortDesc: A viking is using his axe to make a road here.
mobLongDesc: This viking has lived his whole life here in the village. He is a stout man which has big working hands, which indicates that he is a good worker.

mobShortDesc: A viking woman is here, cleaning her clothes
mobLongDesc: This viking has lived his whole life here in the village. He is a stout man which has big working hands, which indicates that he is a good worker.

mobShortDesc: A Viking Guard stands guard, ignoring your precence.
mobLongDesc: This viking has lived his whole life here in the village. He is a stout man which has big working hands, which indicates that he is a good worker.

mobShortDesc: A shop keeper is here, winking you in
mobLongDesc: This shopkeeper is a well fed, well dress man. He trades with the other villages, and had made a living out of it. A good living actually.

mobShortDesc: A polar bear is looking for food in the snow.
mobLongDesc: This bear is completely white. White as snow is the perfect camouflage in this time of year.

mobShortDesc: Someone is crashing the test site here.
mobLongDesc: A tall, viking is standnig here, looking to KILL YOU!
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST
attackTarget: SELF SELF SELF SELF SELF SELF SELF BUFFER SELF SELF
attackSpell: blackmantle fortification orb_of_protection blade_barrier rage fury ethereal_nature poison_smoke miracle recover_mana

mobShortDesc: Elias Dugan Lord of Destruction
mobLongDesc: Elias Dugan Lord of Destruction, Master of death.
affectedByFlags: INVISIBLE DETECT-ALIGNMENT DETECT-INVISIBLE DETECT-MAGIC SENSE-LIFE HOLD SANCTUARY GROUP CONFUSION SPHERE PROTECT-EVIL INFRAVISION STATUE SLEEP DODGE SNEAK HIDE ANIMATE CHARM PROTECT-GOOD FLY SUBDUE IMINV INVUL DUAL FURY

mobShortDesc: A man is almost dozing off
mobLongDesc: The Viking Captain has been to the seven seas, he has travelled all over the realm, and he has seen it all. This is a rough viking who has lived for the sea, and he will die at the sea. The Viking Captain now lives on driving people around on his boat for new generations to experience the sea.

mobShortDesc: Hagar's daughter is cleaning the house
mobLongDesc: The daughter is dressed up in a traditional outfit for the vikings. Young, and not particular pretty, she does her job cleaning her father's house.
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST

mobShortDesc: Snorre, the wise, are reading a book.
mobLongDesc: This viking is the head of the other vikings in the village. Not without reason. His combat scars, and fierce apperance has scared many competitors to his throne, and he has killed even more of them.

mobShortDesc: Hagar is looking deep into your eyes, trying to scare you away.
mobLongDesc: This viking is the head of the other vikings in the village. Not without reason. His combat scars, and fierce apperance has scared many competitors to his throne, and he has killed even more of them.
actionFlags: SENTINEL SCAVENGER ISNPC AGGRESSIVE STAY-ZONE MEMORY

mobShortDesc: Grimdur is looking straight into your eyes.
mobLongDesc: Grimdur is a fierce warrior, like most vikings are. Since this is their leader, he must be more fierce than the fiercest of them. Grimdur's eyes are covered in a mist, it could have been something with the mushroom's he is eating.
actionFlags: SENTINEL SCAVENGER ISNPC AGGRESSIVE STAY-ZONE SUBDUE MEMORY

mobShortDesc: A merchant moose is here, carrying heavy load of goods.
mobLongDesc: This is a large animal. Not normally used for merchant purposes, but these fierce people are using every resources they can. The animal itself is covered with thick wool, so it can substain through the long and cold winter.

mobShortDesc: A Viking merchant is here, travelling with his goods.
mobLongDesc: This viking merchant is always in a hurry, transporting goods from one village to another. Its a hard work to be a merchant.

mobShortDesc: A nasty child is here, looking for people to bother.
mobLongDesc: When you look into these eyes, you wonder if there was ever so much purity in the world.. Before he kicks you in the legs.

mobShortDesc: A Viking guard stands here.
mobLongDesc: A Viking guard stands here.

mobShortDesc: The Elven tracker sneaks around, tracking unwanted creatures in the forest.
mobLongDesc: He really doesn't like you being here, but his directives are to let you get caught and questioned later, and hopefully even get killed.

mobShortDesc: The white wolf is standing here, fuming with anger.
mobLongDesc: You see a wolf which seems to have gone off his ordinary paths, looking kind of angry.

mobShortDesc: Celeborn's gardener is standing here, glancing at his works.
mobLongDesc: He looks like a jolly old elf, but he is watching you suspiciously as you clamps around in his garden.

mobShortDesc: The Elven citizen is strolling around in the city.
mobLongDesc: The Elf's face is split in a wide grin and you can't help smile.

mobShortDesc: Galadriel is sitting here by Celeborn's side.
mobLongDesc: She is completely dressed in white. Her hair gleaming as dark gold and eyes with an intense, piercing look. She looks very sad and thinking, although, or maybe because of it, she looks more beautiful than no other creature walking on this planet.

mobShortDesc: Celeborn, the king of Lorien is sitting here on his throne.
mobLongDesc: He is completely dressed in white, with hair as shining silver. The time doesn't seem to have made any marks on the face, but the eyes are glowing like the tip of a lance but nevertheless with a boundless depth.

mobShortDesc: The royal castle guard stands here protecting his king and queen.
mobLongDesc: He seems to be too proud of what he's doing to even notice you.

mobShortDesc: The Elven mystic stands here muttering some strange words.
mobLongDesc: He looks real mystic :)

mobShortDesc: The Elven citizen is sitting here contemplating.
mobLongDesc: He looks very concentrated.

mobShortDesc: An Elven youngster is here practicing gardening.
mobLongDesc: He is dirty all over.

mobShortDesc: The Elven veteran stands here gossiping.
mobLongDesc: He is old even measured in elven age.

mobShortDesc: The Elven gatekeeper stands here, hiding in the shadows.
mobLongDesc: He looks like he is a gatekeeper worthy his assignment.

mobShortDesc: The Elven mastersmith stands here, forging a sword.
mobLongDesc: He is sweating intensely.

mobShortDesc: The Elven baker is here baking some bread in the open air.
mobLongDesc: He has flour all over the body.

mobShortDesc: The keeper of the forest stands here talking with some birds.
mobLongDesc: He seems to be a man in harmony with nature.

mobShortDesc: The master-singer is standing here, practicing his singing.
mobLongDesc: He looks as if he has some problems with his throat, hacking and coughing.

mobShortDesc: The Elven sewing pupil is here sewing frenetically.
mobLongDesc: The pupil's attention is completely drawn to his works and doesn't notice you.

mobShortDesc: The Elven sailor stands here, his nose dipped in some drawings.
mobLongDesc: He looks like a peaceful and quiet elf.

mobShortDesc: The supervisor of the weaver's glade is here watching the works.
mobLongDesc: To be an elf she looks kind of boring and dull.

mobShortDesc: The head of the craftsmen is standing here, carving some wood.
mobLongDesc: He looks very confident and concentrated and as you look at him, he lifts his head and looks at you. By the look at his face he doesn't seem to enjoy being disturbed by some barbarian like you.

mobShortDesc: The Elven fighting pupil is here watching his masters every move.
mobLongDesc: The pupil hasn't noticed your appearance yet, his attention is completely drawn to his master. Although he is just a pupil, he doesn't seem to be totally helpless.

mobShortDesc: The Guardian training master is here waiting eagerly for his trainees to come.
mobLongDesc: You see a tall and well-built man in his best years. You see by the scars that he must have been in many battles. He seems like he's wanting to make a fight with you, teaching you his techniques, just by wellmean.

mobShortDesc: The elven guard stands here protecting his forest.
mobLongDesc: He wouldn't hesitate a second to get a chance defending his forest against unwanted visitors. Although tall and slender you realize that he has more power than what is shown by just looking at him.

mobShortDesc: A small squirrel jumps from tree to tree.
mobLongDesc: The squirrel freezes his moves as you look at him. He seems to be VERY upset at you, you'd better leave quick to avoid getting killed by it.

mobShortDesc: Rolmnedar, the all-powerful wizard and protector of Ospenpri, lies here ill.
mobLongDesc: He looks like all the great wizards of lore have before him. He wears a long, full white beard and a long silken robe covered in runes. He lies in this cot unconcious. The villagers he has protected for so long and allowed to prosper have left him here to die, not knowing any way to cure his ailment. The only sign of life around him is the small fire which a simple spell burns for all eternity. If only you could find the cure...

mobShortDesc: A cannibal warrior stalks his prey here.
mobLongDesc: A tall and lean man with no body hair, his entire body is covered with tattoos which glow faintly in the twilight of the forest.

mobShortDesc: A member of the Roman Imperial Guard stands watch here.
mobLongDesc: Only the strongest and most resourceful warriors were admitted into the ranks of the Imperial Guards.  They were given the best armour and weapons available and each one took an oath to serve their master for the rest of their lives.

mobShortDesc: A frail-looking man is peddling his goods here.
mobLongDesc: He's a gangly and frail-looking man dressed in dirty rags.  His face bear the marks of vermin and disease and his right arm has wasted away into useless- ness. He smiles a toothless grin when he sees you approaching.

mobShortDesc: A cannibal warrior stalks his prey here.
mobLongDesc: A tall and lean man with no bodily hair.  His entire body is covered with tattoos which glow faintly in the twilight of the forest.

mobShortDesc: A small Quazit is sneaking about here.
mobLongDesc: A tiny impish-looking creature with scaley hide and glowing eyes, the quazit stands about 2 feet tall.  It is a common familiar to spellcasters which have ties to the infernal powers.

mobShortDesc: A velociraptor eyes you hungrily and licks its teeth as it attacks.
mobLongDesc: The velociraptor is a predatory dinosaur that hunts in packs of 3-4 and uses its considerable cunning to ambush unsuspecting prey.

mobShortDesc: A shadowy warrior is here, brooding to himself.
mobLongDesc: The shade was once a living being but became so bored with life he lost all his color. Now his only aim is to cause as much grief as possible.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE DODGE HIDE IMINV DUAL

mobShortDesc: A giant tyrannosaurus rex snaps its huge jaws at you.
mobLongDesc: The Tyrannosaurus Rex is a huge lizard, 40 ft. tall and over 60 ft. from head to tail.  This monstrosity weighs over 20tons, and is rushing at you. Erm, I said 'rushing at you'...PANIC!!!!!!!

mobShortDesc: A JuJu-Zombie stands here, hatred burning in its eyes.
mobLongDesc: A shriveled corpse, the JuJu-Zombie is the result of evil magic that prevents its soul from departing the body.  As a result it hates life and all living things.

mobShortDesc: A huge brontosaurus is grazing here.
mobLongDesc: A gargantuan dinosaur weighing around 70 tons.  The brontosaurus regards you calmly as it munches on some mucky plants from the swamp.  It has about as much interest in you as you might have in a small harmless insect buzzing nearby.

mobShortDesc: Bundolo the king of the jungle is here acting like a gorilla.
mobLongDesc: Bundolo is the king of the jungle and a fierce warrior.  He was adopted by a gorilla when an infant and as a result his manners are that of a wild animal.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SANCTUARY SPHERE DODGE SNEAK HIDE DUAL

mobShortDesc: The Cannibal Witchdoctor is here chanting arcane phrases.
mobLongDesc: The witchdoctor is wearing a suit made entirely of human bones and carries a staff covered with arcane symbols.  He looks up, straight into your eyes and chuckles.

mobShortDesc: A Roman soldier stands here, guarding the gates of Pompeii.
mobLongDesc: A soldier of Imperial Rome, he has served the Emperor faithfully for twenty years and will lay down his life for him without hesitation.

mobShortDesc: A citizen of the Roman Empire strolls by.
mobLongDesc: Clad in flowing white silk garments, the Roman citizen looks haughtily at you and dismisses you with a glance, you are not worthy.

mobShortDesc: A roman gladiator is here, displaying his skills to a roaring crowd.
mobLongDesc: You see before you Damoclese, the most famous gladiator in Pompeii.  He has slain countless opponents and has a reputation for showing no mercy in the arena. He glares at you and motions for you to approach.
actionFlags: SENTINEL ISNPC STAY-ZONE AGGMU MEMORY ARM
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY SPHERE DODGE DUAL

mobShortDesc: The Tribune of Pompeii is here, granting audience to the citizens.
mobLongDesc: The Tribune smiles as you meet his gaze and beckons you closer.  You approach and notice something peculiar about him - His eyes glow a crimson red, a clear sign of demonic possession.

mobShortDesc: The Centurion of Pompeii is here, studying his maps.
mobLongDesc: The Centurion is the veteran of many campaigns and is a dangerous enemy.  He has about him an aura of power that is almost visible to the naked eye.

mobShortDesc: Azul stands here performing a sacret ritual.
mobLongDesc: You are looking at the oldest known vampire alive.  He is the vampire's god of gods.  He looks at you with cold, aged eyes.  He appears to be about thirty years old, but the few lines that he has in his face are too deep to be that of a thirty year old.  He is very pale and looks very wise.

mobShortDesc: A Vampire is held prisoner here.  He looks awful hungry.
mobLongDesc: This vampire looks as though he hasn't fed in a while.  He is all shriveled and turning a waxy white colour.  He is much more pale than any of the other vampires that you have seen.  You can see that his eyes are bulging and large blue veins protrude from his skin.  You take a moment to wonder what he might have done to be put here, but then again these are vampires and who has the time to think.  Especially when you are face to face with one that hasn't fed in a while.

mobShortDesc: The Vampiress turns to meet your terrified stare.
mobLongDesc: The Vampiress is very beautiful despite her pale complextion.  Something about her enchants you.  Her long black hair compliments her icy blue eyes. Her long white teeth glimer as you stare at her.

mobShortDesc: An ancient vampire stands here, ecstatic to see you.
mobLongDesc: This vampire is very pale and moves at speeds which you can not even see. He is very old but looks as though he is still in the prime of his life. He appears as though he is floating toward you and then disappears into the darkness.

mobShortDesc: A young vampire stands here.
mobLongDesc: The vampire's skin is very pale.  He glares at you with his dark purple eyes that almost appear black.  He grins evilly at you and you catch a glance at the sparkle from his long white teeth.  He still has a little tint to his skin and is a little clumsy at using his vampire skills.  He apparently hasn't been a vampire for very long.

mobShortDesc: A huge ugly Ogre stands here waiting for someone to fall from the bridge.
mobLongDesc: The Ogre is wading waist deep in the river.  He has bits of fish flesh and bone hanging from his teeth.  You look like something that might taste a little better than a trout.
affectedByFlags: INVISIBLE DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY SPHERE INFRAVISION DODGE

mobShortDesc: The Golden Dragon of JuanPablo is standing here.
mobLongDesc: Before you stands a giant golden dragon.  Stories of this dragon say that San JuanPablo rode this dragon to victory over a vampire clan somewhere nearby.  That was supposed to be just stories.

mobShortDesc: The Guru is sitting here reading a book.
mobLongDesc: The Guru glows as though he were made out of the same stone as the house and temple are.  He is very learned in everything including the skills of fighting.

mobShortDesc: The High Priest is here chanting and praying.
mobLongDesc: This man is dressed in white and red.  He is an older man that seems to have found peace until you walked in and disturbed him.  Although his age shows through his white hair and bald spot, you can still see the wisdom and strength from his deeply cut eyes and large strong hands.

mobShortDesc: A drake is here chanting and dancing.
mobLongDesc: The drake is dressed in a beige colored robe and beads.  He looks like he's a little drunk but is still rather large.

mobShortDesc: One of the lost Cavaliers from the ancient Tarion city is wandering the dunes.
mobLongDesc: As you gaze upon this seemingly broken man, your eyes happen upon his faded blue stare.  He doesn't speak, merely nods your way and scans the horizon, perhaps still seeking his place in the Holy City of Tarion.  He is a part of the elite squadron loyal still to the lost city, disbanded when the great Sandstorm bore down and swallowed everything.  Perhaps you should leave him alone, as he moves to continue along the endless dunes.

mobShortDesc: The mighty god of war Hachiman prepares to strike you dead.
mobLongDesc: You see before you a large and rather unusual looking samurai, wearing bright red armor and wielding a deadly dragon handled tanto. He grins wickedly at you, knowing full well that your soul will be his when you die.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY SPHERE INFRAVISION DODGE HIDE INVUL DUAL

mobShortDesc: The Shogun stands here, angered that you have disturbed him.
mobLongDesc: He is a samurai of very noble birth, and from looking at him you believe the tales told of his honor and prowess as a warrior. It is painfully apparent that you have angered him by your intrusion, and now he just seems intent on killing you.
actionFlags: SENTINEL ISNPC WIMPY AGGWA MEMORY AGGNO ARM SHIELD

mobShortDesc: Tajjo, emissary of death, wanders these burrows leaving a trail of poisoned earth.
mobLongDesc: A silent, human-like form regards you with disdain as you invade the recesses of his domain.  He is the bane of existence, a demon with only one purpose to serve, and that is death itself.  His face breaks into a demented snarl as he saunters forth to claim your mortal soul and condemn you to these catacombs for eternity.
mobImmune: FIRE ELECTRIC POISON PUMMEL KICK PUNCH DRAIN DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT

mobShortDesc: Nergal, Lord of corruption stands here, oozing.
mobLongDesc: His stomach protrudes, bloated and white.  Open sores and pustules burst upon his skin, even as you look at him.  One touch of his skin is sure to bring about endless agony.

mobShortDesc: A man in dark robes is standing here.
mobLongDesc: A relatively young man, Marcus is just beginning to show the signs of age. Looking to be in his mid-thirties, it is hard to believe the stories that he is actually centuries old.
mobImmune: FIRE ELECTRIC POISON SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DRAIN

mobShortDesc: Malik, the great Emir of Jal-Pur is relaxing here.
mobLongDesc: His eminence the great Emir of the Sultanate is a stocky man with a long and thick moustache drooping over his lips. He wears rings on each of his fingers and a richly fashioned kaftan. He is a great fighter and a benefactor of his people, a just and righteous man.

mobShortDesc: The Grand Vizier sits here writing in his book.
mobLongDesc: You see a small fat and bald man sweating away in the heat. He is the genius who manages all the affairs of tha Emir as well as all the trade in and out of Jal-Pur. He wears a simple white robe embroidered with platinum and silver sequins.
affectedByFlags: INVISIBLE DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY INFRAVISION DODGE FURY

mobShortDesc: Brother Kenji is here, practising his martial arts techniques.
mobLongDesc: Brother Kenji is going through a very complicated and taxing series of maneuvers to hone them to the level of perfection. His punches and kicks are executed like as brilliantly as his stature implies. Definitively a master of both martial arts and armed combat.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY PROTECT-EVIL INFRAVISION DODGE SNEAK DUAL FURY

mobShortDesc: A huge, red dragon is here, licking his lips hungrily.
mobLongDesc: You have heard legends of this beast!! Pyrak the Red! The deadliest dragon that ever existed upon this world.
