Intelligent and cunning, he is considered to be the greatest menace to ever terrorize the innocent farmers and herders of the world. He is a scourge, but a scourge that you can rid the world of. That is, if you are strong enough.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SANCTUARY PROTECT-EVIL INFRAVISION DODGE INVUL DUAL

mobShortDesc: The Cannibal Witchdoctor is here chanting arcane phrases.
mobLongDesc: The witchdoctor is wearing a suit made entirely of human bones and carries a staff covered with arcane symbols.  He looks up, straight into your eyes and chuckles.

mobShortDesc: The Ancient Statue of Justice stands tall here, motionless.
mobLongDesc: Gazing into her eyes, you feel at ease knowing your evil deeds have been cleansed and forgiven.  As you turn to stone, Lady Justice gently whispers to you, "Justice is done."
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SPHERE PROTECT-EVIL STATUE DODGE INVUL DUAL

mobShortDesc: An Elven Beastmaster is resting his body after a hard day of hunting.
mobLongDesc: Long silvery hair covers the sleeping face, but the stature of his muscular body hints of the explosive strength lying within his frame. Definitively a terrible opponent for any man, when awake. Obviously, hunting monsters pays off.

mobShortDesc: A strange lizard sneaks in and out of the shadows.
mobLongDesc: Neyuv is hissing loudly, he must have been what you heard coming through the tunnels. He looks very strong, and not very friendly. His tail must be about 8 feet long, and he is about 7 feet tall.  He could make quick work of you.
affectedByFlags: INVISIBLE DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE INFRAVISION STATUE SNEAK INVUL FURY

mobShortDesc: The Count Strahd von Zarovich is here, looking over his domain.
mobLongDesc: Strahd is a cruel, vicious vampire, who rules this domain, Barovia. He drains blood from maidens, and turns them into slave vampires for him. He looks to know much about magic, and you better leave before he turns you into a toad.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY SPHERE DODGE INVUL DUAL

mobShortDesc: You sense a tremendous demonic power in the room, waiting to strike!
mobLongDesc: Arago is indeed a fearsome looking creature. It stands about the size of an ogre. Blackened, charred skin hangs loosely on its body in wrinkled folds. Its eyes are bloodshot and blood flows from them where tears normally would. It has four long fangs, two extending upward nearly to its eyes, and two extending well below its chin. It emits a throaty growl and you truly wish you were anywhere but here!
affectedByFlags: DETECT-ALIGNMENT DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SPHERE INFRAVISION DODGE FLY INVUL DUAL FURY

mobShortDesc: The Enlightened One stands here holding both hands joined above his head.
mobLongDesc: The Enlightened One stands here bathed in a rainbow aura. You see a smile of intense joy and happiness on his face. He has reached Nirvana, but has chosen to remain amoung the mortals to guide them on the path of Karma.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SANCTUARY SPHERE INFRAVISION DODGE DUAL

mobShortDesc: Tregannis the tyrant stands here ready to inflict pain and torture.
mobLongDesc: This short dark man is one of the most vicious in the sultanate. He is the tyrant and the interrogator of all the poor souls who happen to fall into his clutches. He wears tight black leather pants and a black leather vest accompanied by a small black leather mask which covers his eyes.
actionFlags: SENTINEL ISNPC AGGRESSIVE STAY-ZONE MEMORY SHIELD
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY INFRAVISION DUAL FURY

mobShortDesc: The Crystal Daemon is here, sitting in the corner and gazing at you.
mobLongDesc: What a strange life form. A bipedal humanoid made completely of crystalline shards that pulse with life. It's eyes resemble small rubies, but also they twinkle with the light of life energy.

mobShortDesc: The Ultimate Mystic is resting here, trying to understand the universe.
mobLongDesc: The Ultimate Mystic has retreated from all things material and has devoted himself to attaining new and developing the existing level of his of mental powers. The world as a place of the greedy and loathsome has almost ceased to exist for him. Nevertheless, He is still a mighty opponent, when he utilizes his talent for martial arts and the mental powers.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE PROTECT-EVIL INFRAVISION DODGE SNEAK DUAL

mobShortDesc: The huge queen ant snaps and gnaws her teeth as she crouches here.
mobLongDesc: The queen ant has huge jaws that easily could cut you to pieces. Her long tenuous legs twitch and creep into position to fight you. As you look deep into her eyes, a light flashes, and you become stone.
actionFlags: SPEC SENTINEL ISNPC AGGRESSIVE STAY-ZONE MEMORY
affectedByFlags: INVISIBLE DETECT-INVISIBLE SANCTUARY INFRAVISION STATUE DODGE INVUL DUAL

mobShortDesc: A blank of primal clay stands here, waiting to be shaped
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.

mobShortDesc: A blank of primal clay stands here, waiting to be shaped
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.

mobShortDesc: A blank of primal clay stands here, waiting to be shaped
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.

mobShortDesc: A blank of primal clay stands here, waiting to be shaped
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.

mobShortDesc: Master Hikotoka, the abandend Ninja is standing here.
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.

mobShortDesc: Master Jukamani, Ruler of Temple Jikonika is standing here.
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.

mobShortDesc: Tishara, The mother dragon is flying here guardian hers eggs.
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.
mobImmune: FIRE SLEEP CHARM SUMMON BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT

mobShortDesc: a stunted Zombie Offspring is crawling about, shrieking loudly!
mobLongDesc: Screaming and kicking, wailing and and clawing, abominable monstrosity, drooling and gnawing! Naturally born rotten, reeking of decay, by its own mother rejected, in disgust and dismay!

mobShortDesc: Jana the decaying banker is sitting here.
mobLongDesc: Once working with coins, weighing much gold, the devil has claimed, her soul twice twofold.

mobShortDesc: Brina the undead madcap is sitting here.
mobLongDesc: wild in life, apathic in the afterlife, stabbed in the back, with a rusted fish knife.

mobShortDesc: Zlata the illegitimate zombie-child is sitting here.
mobLongDesc: Born in sin, from the sins of our fathers, a daughter was raped, not that it bothers. Cruelty and lust, rained down uppon her, a child bore forth a child, God deter.

mobShortDesc: Zarya the decomposing seamstress is sitting here.
mobLongDesc: Sowing fabrics is a thing of the past, Zarya now focuses on what really lasts. Skin of men, women and children as well, all who to her scissors, victims fell.

mobShortDesc: Valeska the undead mistress is sitting here.
mobLongDesc: Selling herself, to whoever would pay, now the devil has her, whenever he may.

mobShortDesc: Raisa the zombie slave-girl is sitting here.
mobLongDesc: Born free, brought up in captivity, even in death, there is no festivity. As if born to serve, eternally toiling, inside her heart, hate keeps boiling.

mobShortDesc: Mira the rotting bride is sitting here.
mobLongDesc: Once luckily engaged, soon to be married, Across the dark lake, the boatmat her ferried. Her husband to be, could not the pain bear, dark magic resurrected, turned out a Hell's mare.

mobShortDesc: Kalina the decomposing nurse is sitting here.
mobLongDesc: Full of compassion, caring for others, one day her own, baby dead smothers. Two bleeding wrists, one beating heart, not much time pass, before all goes dark.

mobShortDesc: Ivana the undead baker is sitting here.
mobLongDesc: Bread, cakes and pastries, was once her life, now she does her work, with a butcher's knife. Hacking and slashing, clawing and biting, a murderous hag, have townsfolk been sighting.

mobShortDesc: Katinka the zombie prostitute is sitting here.
mobLongDesc: Conservative upbringing, pained by restrictions, thrown out on the street, after many convictions. All on her own, in the cold harsh cruel world, right into the arms, of a pimp herself hurled.

mobShortDesc: Biljana the rotten shopkeeper is sitting here.
mobLongDesc: Once quite successful, her popular shop, fell victim to her husbands, envious chop. Her head decapitated, though not completely, attached to the spine, stuck there quite neatly.

mobShortDesc: Alina the dead mother of Branislav is sitting here.
mobLongDesc: Impregnated in death, tainted foul semen, her rotting crotch, penetrated by a deamon. The Devil's seed, from her womb forth sprung, smelling worce, than a pile of dung.

mobShortDesc: Branislav the zombie-son of Alina is sitting here.
mobLongDesc: Born from sin, from a rotting within, stillborn alive, no need to revive. His rotten face, crawling with worms, decomposing body, shakes and squirms.

mobShortDesc: Andrik the decaying bar-keeper is sitting here.
mobLongDesc: Serving drinks in life, serving Satan in death, praising the Lord, with his loathsome breath.

mobShortDesc: Zander the zombie horse-breeder is sitting here.
mobLongDesc: His pretty horses, are all but dead, now its demons, that needs to be fed. Rotten and foul, unable to remember, eternaly searching, for limbs to dismember.

mobShortDesc: Tibor the decomposed librarian is sitting here.
mobLongDesc: His books and scrolls, and now bust lost, his cold dead heard, is covered with frost.

mobShortDesc: Jaroslav the undead twin is sitting here.
mobLongDesc: Together in life, together in death, a perfect fit, like knife in sheath.

mobShortDesc: Miroslav the undead twin is sitting here.
mobLongDesc: Together in life, together in death, a perfect fit, like knife in sheath.

mobShortDesc: Ivan the decomposing chemist is sitting here.
mobLongDesc: Once brewing potions of healing, now poisons are more appealing. Coroding liquids, chocking gas, hurts more than shitting glass.

mobShortDesc: Damek the rotten mason is sitting here.
mobLongDesc: Once a talented mason, made works of art, now the beast, has consumed his heart.

mobShortDesc: Casimir the zombie poet is sitting here.
mobLongDesc: Heroic poems, are but past, the darkness fills his heart at last. Poems of hate, appraisal of greed, worship of sins, does the beast uppon feed.

mobShortDesc: Boris the decomposing painter is sitting here.
mobLongDesc: Skillfull hands, formed paintings of beauty, creating works of dark, is now his duty. Paintings of deamons, spawn of Hell, painting in blood, the demon's death knell.

mobShortDesc: Bialas the rotting writer is sitting here.
mobLongDesc: Once writing novels, now gutting bowels. clawing out eyes, slurping them down, blood and guts, covers his gown.

mobShortDesc: Andrei the undead carpenter is sitting here.
mobLongDesc: Working with wood in life, cherishing his wife, now working with death, shaping bones with his knife.

mobShortDesc: Svetlana the Deranged Nun is roaming here, mumbling to herself...
mobLongDesc: A pious womb, this child forth bore, to much regret, turned out a whore. Inside her heart, a burning desire, lasciviousness wild, unleashed like fire.

mobShortDesc: Mirek the bell-ringer is standing here, contemplating suicide...
mobLongDesc: Hooded stands, the Devil's lackey, eyes filled with tears, heart with sorrow, hoping that, there will be no tomorrow. Slave to the darkness, deep and cold, only pain, does his future hold.

mobShortDesc: Blanka the Undead Organist is here, playing a dismal tune...
mobLongDesc: Unkempt hair, unclean skin, eyes are empty, heart filled with sin. Once composing, now de-composing, works of art, now works of wrath.

mobShortDesc: Alexej the altarboy is sitting here.
mobLongDesc: Short soft brown hair, big anxious blue eyes, only the vicar knows, what fears therein lies. Head lowered in shame, his innocence taken, all hopes and all dreams, are now but forsaken.

mobShortDesc: The perverted Vicar is here, ravaging the remains of a young woman...
mobLongDesc: A empty shell, of a once holy man, once holy blessings, are now but sand. His hollow skull, holds burning eyes, the seering gaze, unveals all lies. His withered hands, claws and scratches, pray to Sane he no one catches. A heart of coal, smoulders within, ever longing, appalling sin.

mobShortDesc: `pa Hideously Deformed creature stands here, Chopping up corpses...`q
mobLongDesc: The unbaptised dead, this creature created, the death of a child, the demon has catered. Its body elongated, as thin as spindle, A burning hate, this creature will kindle. One second a monster, the other a child, your imagination must really, be running quite wild.

mobShortDesc: `pan Unholy Creature is crouched here, veiled by Shadows!
mobLongDesc: Satan's lackey, this cursed creature, its wretched body, a loathsome feature. Long sharp fingernails, razor claws, jagged teeth, adorns its jaws. Souless eyes, like bottomless pits, mezmerizing gaze, freezes your wits.
attackType: BITE SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST CLAW

mobShortDesc: A faint shape of a young, beautiful girl is resting here.
mobLongDesc: Suddenly the sad face of the girl turns to you, and smiles to you. She tries to say something, but stops suddenly. Her shape is faint and sometimes you can see through it.

mobShortDesc: The black larvae is squirming around restlessly on the ground.
mobLongDesc: The larvae has a black and leathery body and its body is soft and moist, covered with smelly and slick substance, like oil. They are mainly made of two parts, the body and four tentacles that seem very flexible and agile.

mobShortDesc: You see a large shadow moving in the murky waters near you, without a sound.
mobLongDesc: You are staring at a hulking, musclebound humanoid with tough, black, leathery skin. Its glowing red eyes seem to pierce straight into you, flickering on and off constantly. As the thing moves through the murky waters, the only thing you hear is a slight splashes of water.

mobShortDesc: Suddenly you notice a faint glimmer of red in the corner of your eye.
mobLongDesc: Against the dark background of the passage, you can hardly discern a huge black skinned humanoid with white glowing fangs. It has a pair of glowing red eyes that draw your attention like a magnet. Every once in a while, you can hear a silent hissing coming from this shadowy giant.
affectedByFlags: INVISIBLE SANCTUARY INFRAVISION DODGE SNEAK HIDE IMINV DUAL

mobShortDesc: The Hive Queen is lying here, on the top of a pile of gold mixed with slime.
mobLongDesc: Roughly 11 feet tall, the Hive Queen is a swollen, spidery nightmare. Her hide is glistening black, mottled with red. Her humanoid torso extends from that abhorrent abdomen supported by four legs, along with four arms projecting from her rib cage. Thin, muddy hair hangs about her head in an oily corona, long fangs protrude from her wide mouth, dripping venom. A poisonous stinger juts from the rear of her drooping abdomen.

mobShortDesc: An old man is resting quietly on the cold, stony floor.
mobLongDesc: The sight of the man on the floor in front of you makes you feel uneasy. His almost lunatic face and eyes seem to pierce right into your soul, but at the same time, his continuous, mindless blabbering lulls you into a feeling of safety...

mobShortDesc: Feign, The Intelligence Operative
mobLongDesc: Blonde, curly hair clumsily hangs over a long, gloomy face. Bright golden eyes stare at nothing as they slowly pan from left to right. Fire has left a mark stretching from the left side of the forehead , running towards her left nostril and ending on her left nostril.  A larger tattoo of a cat is seen extending from the scar.
mobImmune: FIRE ELECTRIC POISON PUMMEL KICK PUNCH SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DRAIN DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE CLAIR SUMMON HIT BLUDGEON PIERCE SLASH WHIP CLAW BITE STING CRUSH HACK CHOP SLICE BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT

mobName: Fuse, Armory Master of the Black Market
mobShortDesc: Fuse, Black Market Armorer
mobLongDesc: Purple, shoulder-length hair tight in a bun reveals a cheerful face. Glittering gray eyes watch cautiously over the market they've disassociated with for so long. Scars stretching from the top of the left cheek first running towards thin lips are covered with a tattoo of a royal seal.
mobImmune: FIRE ELECTRIC POISON PUMMEL KICK PUNCH SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DRAIN DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE CLAIR SUMMON HIT BLUDGEON PIERCE SLASH WHIP CLAW BITE STING CRUSH HACK CHOP SLICE BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT

mobShortDesc: Mime, the Black Market investigator
mobLongDesc: White, curly hair slightly covers a chiseled, gloomy face. Lidded black eyes stare forward with a powerful and intense glare. A sword left a mark reaching from just under the right eye, covered by a tattoo of fire.  It runs towards the tip of the nose and ending on her forehead.
mobImmune: FIRE ELECTRIC POISON PUMMEL KICK PUNCH SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DRAIN DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE CLAIR SUMMON HIT BLUDGEON PIERCE SLASH WHIP CLAW BITE STING CRUSH HACK CHOP SLICE BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT

mobShortDesc: Echo, Commander of the Black Market
mobLongDesc: Brown, dreadlocks is pulled back to reveal a chiseled, menacing face. Small green eyes, set deep within their sockets, watch vigorously over the market they've protected for so long.  A tattoo of a fanged creature is seen stretching from the bottom of the left cheekbone, running towards the tip of the nose and ending on his right cheek.
mobImmune: FIRE ELECTRIC POISON PUMMEL KICK PUNCH SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DRAIN DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE CLAIR SUMMON HIT BLUDGEON PIERCE SLASH WHIP CLAW BITE STING CRUSH HACK CHOP SLICE BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT

mobShortDesc: Spector, The Oddities Purveyor
mobLongDesc: A short and stout man sits on the ground intently staring through a magnifying glass at an unknown object that glows in the light. The aged lines on his face and head, along with the small tufts of gray hair show the age of this man. A tattoo of a lizard is seen surrounding the left ear, indicating allegiance to this market.
mobImmune: FIRE ELECTRIC POISON PUMMEL KICK PUNCH SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DRAIN DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE CLAIR SUMMON HIT BLUDGEON PIERCE SLASH WHIP CLAW BITE STING CRUSH HACK CHOP SLICE BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT

mobShortDesc: A Small Man in a long trench coat stands nonchalantly, and aimlessly stares.
mobLongDesc: Gray, shoulder-length hair slightly covers a smiling face that peers out from his covered face.. Glittering hazel eyes, sit rooted within their sockets, gaze at you as you enter the camp. A tattoo of a skull is proudly worn just below his left eye shows the affiliation to the black market. Although his stature is short, his frame is tough and is ready for action at a moments notice.
mobImmune: FIRE ELECTRIC POISON PUMMEL KICK PUNCH SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DRAIN DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE CLAIR SUMMON HIT BLUDGEON PIERCE SLASH WHIP CLAW BITE STING CRUSH HACK CHOP SLICE BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT

mobShortDesc: A Water Elemental rises out of the pool, it's not happy to see you!
mobLongDesc: A huge trembling mass of surface tension squirts you playfully.

mobShortDesc: A Fire Elemental burns here, consuming all in sight.
mobLongDesc: A flickering flame stands before you, raging to consume...the world is tinder for its desire.

mobShortDesc: A Earth Elemental stands here, contorting his ugly face in a silent scream.
mobLongDesc: A man-like creature rises out of the ground, with fists the size of small boulders.  It doesn't appear to like you very much at all!

mobShortDesc: An Aerial servant is here, racing madly about the room.
mobLongDesc: A legless humanoid made of sparkling blue smoke looks back at you with empty eye sockets.  It opens its slit of a mouth, and blows a fierce wind towards you.
affectedByFlags: INVISIBLE DETECT-INVISIBLE SANCTUARY INFRAVISION DODGE INVUL

mobShortDesc: A female drow warrior stands here looking very displeased.
mobLongDesc: A female drow warrior is standing here balancing a dagger on her finger. She says in a high pitched squeal, "Leave now, or DIE!"  She then draws her weapons.  You'd better do something fast!

mobShortDesc: A grey-elf warrior stands here, guarding a doorway into the unknown.
mobLongDesc: A tall but slender man, with pointed ears and green almond eyes stands here mindlessly fingering his sword and muttering words in an arcane fashion. He says in a rich baritone voice, "Please go away, I don't have time to talk -- I must guard this portal with my life."

mobShortDesc: The Projection of Berbalang stands here licking his wicked blade.
mobLongDesc: A huge projection of a leathery half-man half-bat creature is here. Berbalang has sent his spectre out to take care of troublemakers.

mobShortDesc: A Priest stands here uttering arcane words.
mobLongDesc: This Priest is a minion of the dread demon lord Berbalang.  Covered from head to toe with tattoos in unspeakable scripts, he is a minion of evil, nothing else.

mobShortDesc: A Portal guard stands here to prevent creatures from leaving the depths.
mobLongDesc: A huge burly man stands here.  He tells you "Don't enter, or you will surely die." He is wearing full plate mail and carries some very nasty looking weapons.  He says "IF you do enter make sure you have a recall... You've been warned."

mobShortDesc: The Black Dragon is hungry, you are her food, DINNER time
mobLongDesc: The Black Dragon is huge and strong...  Her hide is thick, hard, and jet black. She flaps wings, slaps her tail and the cavern shakes, as she leaps at you.

mobShortDesc: The Berbalang stands here guarding his domain.
mobLongDesc: The Berbalang is a deadly creature, even though it looks a bit undersized.  Covered with black, leathery skin, this gaunt creature's eyes glow with the light of evil.

mobShortDesc: A small dandelion puff floats by on the breeze here...
mobLongDesc: It's a freakin' Dandelion? You get statue-fied for even thinking there was some saucy desc here!
actionFlags: SCAVENGER ISNPC AGGRESSIVE AGGWA AGGTH AGGCL AGGMU MEMORY AGGNI AGGNO AGGPA AGGAP AGGCO AGGGOOD AGGNEUT AGGRANDOM
affectedByFlags: DETECT-ALIGNMENT DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY INFRAVISION STATUE DODGE DUAL
mobImmune: FIRE ELECTRIC POISON PUMMEL KICK PUNCH SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DRAIN DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE
attackType: TAILSLAM DISARM TRAMPLE SPELL SKILL SPELL SKILL SPELL SKILL SPELL SKILL SPELL SKILL
attackTarget: RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP GROUP RAN_GROUP ROOM ROOM ROOM BUFFER

mobShortDesc: The urine monkey casually relieves himself on your head.
mobLongDesc: A happy looking little monkey is standing before you, you think @ ed mob 19898 full I wonder why its called the 'urine monkey'.
mobImmune: FIRE ELECTRIC POISON PUMMEL KICK PUNCH SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DRAIN DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST

mobShortDesc: A small blue dog pisses on your leg and goes for your throat!
mobLongDesc: This small dog has a really pretty blue pelt! You'd like to take him home and love him in your special way, but he seems determined to kill you.
mobImmune: FIRE ELECTRIC POISON PUMMEL KICK PUNCH SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DRAIN DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE

mobShortDesc: A midget sumo wrestler is here, trying to look intimidating.
mobLongDesc: A dwarf sumo wrestler stands here, trying to look as ferocious and scary as possible, however it seems unlikely that this approach ever works given that he's only 2 FEET TALL!! As he notices you, he puffs out his chest and lets out a loud (but rather squeaky) war cry. BAAAAAANNNNNZZZAAAAAIIIIIII!!!!
attackType: TRAMPLE DISARM BASH BASH BITE PUMMEL
attackTarget: BUFFER BUFFER BUFFER BUFFER BUFFER BUFFER

mobShortDesc: A Fat, mustachioed Cossack stands here greasily.
mobLongDesc: You can barely see this man's hairy breasts poking out of his small red vest from where you stand; below his gigantic belly. You see the ends of a long handlebar moustache sticking out like a bird's wings from somewhere above his quivering mass... you assume that's about where his face must be.

mobShortDesc: Lemgugh the Bathroom Brownie is here, licking a toilet bowl clean.
mobLongDesc: Lemgugh spews crusty turd bits and vomit all over you as he catches you looking at him
mobImmune: FIRE ELECTRIC POISON PUMMEL KICK PUNCH SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DRAIN DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE

mobShortDesc: A Gay Little Elf curtseys before you, singing a little song!
mobLongDesc: This little fellow is in full regalia, from the ends of his greasy moustache to the tips of his work boots. He has a pink triangle tattooed on his forehead and is wearing a black leather jacket with a pretty rainbow painted on the back. He has very tight denim pants, and has a disproportionately large codpiece. He asks you politely - with only a slight lisp - whether or not you have seen his mysterious, powerful, Ranger-like lover around anywhere.
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST

mobShortDesc: A small brown sugar glider nibbles a leaf and stares at you in wonder.
mobLongDesc: This cute little beast has large flaps of skin under its arms which enable it to glide silently through the canopy, escaping its enemies.

mobShortDesc: Erik, the Happy Retail Guy stands here, happy!
mobLongDesc: Erik smiles happily as you walk up to the register.... he greets you with a happy "Hi there! You all ready?"

mobShortDesc: A two-headed tabby mog is caterwauling a duet here.
mobLongDesc: Like something from the nightmares of a frightened dog, this beast has two heads, both inquisitive and cute orange tabby with cream spots near the whiskers and above the eyes. It seems somewhat confused as it caterwauls a terrible duet, and you notice that it has rather large, yellowed teeth.

mobShortDesc: A Mogling with smooth, creamy fur plays with a bit of string here.
mobLongDesc: This little powderpuff looks like he just stepped out of a bucket of flour or lady's cosmetics. His eyes are a strange shade of green, similar to jade, and it doesn't seem like he has any prominent pointy bits like the other Moglings you've seen...

mobShortDesc: A small, black mogling sniffs your boot here.
mobLongDesc: This little ball of charcoal has large pools of copper for eyes. Its lower teeth jut out from under its chin in an almost cutely threatening manner.

mobShortDesc: A small bundle of fur mewls cutely at your feet here.
mobLongDesc: This Mogling is almost an almost perfectly spherical ball of hair. You can barely see large, limpid grey eyes staring up at you cutely through the dense foliage on this small creature's face. The Mogling, however, does have tremendously long, nasty claws...

mobShortDesc: A mog with a pretty tortoise-shell patterned fur looks up at you.
mobLongDesc: This mog looks as though it's had just about as much human attention as it feels necessary, and as though it won't tolerate much more. But, boy oh boy is it pretty! Its fur is a beautiful patchwork of browns, tans, reds, and greys in a nice tortoise-shell pattern, and its eyes are the nicest color of grey. Even the long, nasty claws sticking out of its paws are kinda cute!

mobShortDesc: A Darkmog crouches in the corner here, hissing and looking fearsome.
mobLongDesc: The Darkmog is a dusky grey color, his hair long enough that you can barely see the tips of his ears and whiskers poking out of his pelt. Down by where his hairiness brushes the ground you can see many long, yellowed claws sticking out. As you look in his direction, the Darkmog hisses loudly and lays his ears flat against his skull.

mobShortDesc: A Small Mog sniffs the ground here, switching his fluffy tail back and forth.
mobLongDesc: This Mog is smaller than your average Mog, only about a foot long and about a foot tall. Completely covered in hair, as most Mogs seem to be, this one's pelt is a fine orange color. His eyes are large, and they glow an uncanny shade of blue. The Small Mog's whiskers extend a full six inches to either side of his face from just above enormous fangs. A drop of drool seems on the verge of tumbling from the end of one of these monstrous teeth as the Small Mog turns his head to face you.

mobShortDesc: A tan mog with dark splotches around its eyes and feet and tail sits here.
mobLongDesc: This mog is less fluffy than most, and has very distinctive markings. Its pelt is a creamy tan, and darker brown markings on its ears, tail, feet and eyes remind you of a siamese cat. Its ears have very little space between them, and its eyes are a bright green. It stops licking its sharp claws to stare at you.

mobShortDesc: A fluffy mog looks up from licking itself as you enter the room.
mobLongDesc: A ball of fur with luminous yellow eyes looks at you blankly, wondering what you plan on doing and if your plans include a dish full of trout.

mobShortDesc: A tiny maus squeaks as it scurries around the room.
mobLongDesc: Das Maus is small. Das Maus is brown. You might say Das Maus is small and brown. This cute little critter looks terrified, as if he might die of fright any second. That is, if something else doesn't get him first.

mobShortDesc: A charcoal-black Mog looks up at you, smoke rising from his nostrils.
mobLongDesc: This Mog is completely black, as if he just crawled out of a chimney flue. When he meows, you notice a strange tubular tongue instead of a normal Mog's tongue. His eyes are a bright, unnatural orange. Smoke follows this Mog wherever he goes, and he seems to be having digestion problems, as he is continually releasing small, delicate belches. You notice that the product of his belches seems to be.... small gouts of flame??? Could this be the legendary FlammenvefferMog which the adventurer Gerhardt Glockenspiel claimed to have lost his eyebrows to? Nah! Gerhardt said he killed Der FlammenvefferMog!

mobShortDesc: A huge, grey-pelted Mog sits here, looking regal.
mobLongDesc: As you gaze upon Der GrauMog, he regally curls his furry lip in a magnificent display of condescension. This tremendous beast could be mistaken for a small grey cloud from a distance. His fur is an amazingly deep, dark grey color, and is very luxuriant as well. Der GrauMog looks like he's been around the block, regardless of his apparent nobility. A few small scars are visible about his face and wherever else on his body you can spot a slightly less hairy patch. Der GrauMog is feared by all other Mogs, and respected -- in a Moggish manner -- as a great and fearsome leader. This might have something to do with the fact that he's well over five feet long and three feet tall at the shoulder. His claws are seven-inch long yellowed daggers, when he extends them, and his fangs are chipped from the many battles that Der GrauMog has been in. Basically, a very tough customer.

mobShortDesc: A tiger-striped mog blinks charmingly up at you, a bit of yarn dangling from its mouth.
mobLongDesc: This mog has yellow and black stripes, almost like those of a tiger. Its fur is extremely long and full, extending almost a full foot from the meat of its body without pulling it out straight. The Stripedy Mog seems to be fond of yarn, as miscellaneous bits of colored string dangle from various protuberances of the creature's body. It also has very, very sharp and long claws.

mobShortDesc: A small hedgehog snuffles in the mulch here, seeking cheese.
mobLongDesc: You peer through the prickles of this strange beast and are rewarded with a loud belching sound and a raunchy odor! It just farted on you! How utterly disgusting! And is that a dress it's wearing??? It grunts at you and says "Gimme cheese."

mobShortDesc: A cute brown squirrel nibbles cutely on a nut here.
mobLongDesc: This cute little fella is nibbling cutely on a cute nut that he probably got from a very cute little tree. His short brown fur looks comfy and, on him, very cute.

mobShortDesc: A small grey squirrel nibbles on a pine-nut here.
mobLongDesc: This fluffy grey creature must live in the stunted trees around here. Not a bit frightened by your heavy footsteps, this creature obviously has seen little of man. His pelt is a gorgeous pale grey, save the very tips of his ears, which are covered in a russet fur.

mobShortDesc: Dindae, the Siberian tiger, is lying here on the rug, purring loudly.
mobLongDesc: This is Val and Kat's pride and joy.  Large fanged, powerfully built, and very rare this Siberian tiger could rip you apart in the time it took you to breath.   His black stripes crisscross his pure white back and make him look a lot more tame then he really is.

mobShortDesc: A sacrificial slave is here, screaming for mercy.
mobLongDesc: He has been bathed, washed, and basically prepared, to be sacrificed at midnight to whatever god fits the mood.  His screams are loud and hoarse but are of no avail.  He is destined to die.

mobShortDesc: Felnor, the High Priest of Morgoth, is here performing sacrifices.
mobLongDesc: The high priest of Morgoth, Felnor is in charge of all the sacrificing. Grand master of all the orders, Felnor wears the platinum sash of his office. His loyalty to his followers is extreme and he does his job very well.  He has no qualms about his job, however, it was what he was raised to do.

mobName: A cleric of the black robes
mobShortDesc: A cleric, wearing black robes, is here chanting strange mantras to himself.
mobLongDesc: This cleric serves the black order of healing.  He uses all the bad emotions to gain his energy for healing.  Guilt, Lust, Hate, Envy, all add to this cleric's power.  Although in the end his result is just, his means are questionable.

mobName: A cleric of the green robes
mobShortDesc: A cleric, wearing green robes, is here chanting strange mantras to himself.
mobLongDesc: This cleric serves the green order of healing.  He uses nature as his power source for his healing.  Birth, Death, Age, Time, all add to this cleric's power.  As life progresses and nature takes its course the green order grows in power.

mobName: A cleric of the white robes
mobShortDesc: A cleric, wearing white robes, is here chanting strange mantras to himself.
mobLongDesc: This cleric serves the white order of healing.  She uses all the good emotions to power her heals.  Love, Kindness, Compassion, Trust, all add to this cleric's power.  Her love for the world and its companions carry her through to the end.

mobShortDesc: A griffin stands here guarding his lair from intruders like you.
mobLongDesc: Half-Lion, Half-Eagle, this monstrous creature looks like a match for anything.  Standing nearly 7 feet tall his huge maw could probably swallow you whole.  Stick around, find out.

mobShortDesc: A small baby condor is here chirping for food.
mobLongDesc: It's hungry.  It's mad.  It wants to eat YOU!

mobShortDesc: A giant mother condor is here tending to her young ones.
mobLongDesc: A large bird, the condor makes its nest high in the mountains.  Normally she is a peaceful creature but your careless intrusion has upset her babies, and she is pissed.

mobShortDesc: Trien, the ancient keeper of Morgoth, stands here wondering why you came.
mobLongDesc: Since the beginning of time (or close too) Trien has stood in this same tower guarding a long forgotten secret.  Made of cooled lava-rock Trien is almost impervious to the elements, although some cracking is evident.

mobShortDesc: A beautiful white stallion with a horn on his head stands here peacefully.
mobLongDesc: Grace, Beauty, Style, this wonderous creature has it all.  As tall as any stallion you have ever seen this radiant unicorn and his magic keep paradise protected from the weather outside.  His horn shines bright with magical energy.

mobShortDesc: A cat, the color of snow, is snarling at you.
mobLongDesc: This is one fierce predator.  Its pure white coat helps it blend in with the snow that covers the peaks of Morgoth.  Fangs, the size of fingers, project from the top of its mouth.

mobShortDesc: A learned man dressed in elegant fashions is wandering here.
mobLongDesc: Wandering the mountain range is how this wizard got his name.  Dressed in heavy winter clothes and a cup of something that is steaming hot, he traverses the range in all weather.  His faithful walking stick never leaves his hands.

mobShortDesc: A large horned mountain goat is grazing peacefully here.
mobLongDesc: A goat, with long curved horns, nothing more.

mobShortDesc: a ninja stands here, devoted to the ancient ways.
mobLongDesc: Drawn from across the ocean in a quest of good vs evil, the faithful Ninja is seeking his destiny beneath the mountain.  In search of righting the wrongs of this dark place, the ninja is steadfast in his pursuit.

mobShortDesc: a murderous anti-paladin hides here, planning your death.
mobLongDesc: The anti-paladin hides here, at home in the darkness.  Recruited by the dark necromancer to serve his nefarious purposes, the dark thief instead is looking for ways to destroy the magician and usurp his power and position.

mobShortDesc: A burly commando stands here at attention, itching for a fight.
mobLongDesc: The burly commando took a commission from King Welmar to rid the kingdoms of the evil within the mountain.  Overcome by magic, the commando has failed in his task, and wanders the darkness with his reputation in tatters.

mobShortDesc: a holy paladin glares at you, secure in his righteousness.
mobLongDesc: The holy paladin was on an adventure to purge the evil from the mountain of Morgoth, when he was betrayed by the anti-paladin. stabbed in the back and thrown into the dungeons in the dark, the Paladin hopes to bring light to the darkness.

mobShortDesc: The cunning thief lingers in the corner, eying your valuables.
mobLongDesc: The cunning thief hides in the corner, eyeing your goods with a mischievous look in his eyes.  Having been kidnapped in a failed attempt to steal a valuable book from the library of Midgaard, the thief was thrown in the mountain to die.

mobShortDesc: A fierce warrior sits here, sharpening his blade.
mobLongDesc: The fierce warrior was lured down here in a quest for a hidden cache of mythical weapons.  The denizens of the mountain depths destroyed the rest of his party, leaving him to wander alone, lost high spirits.

mobShortDesc: A bard is here, singing and dancing amongst the ruins.
mobLongDesc: The mirthful bard wanders the tombs here, searching for fun and adventure. Having followed some other heroes down here in a failed quest for redemption and glory, the bard nevertheless has high spirits.
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST

mobShortDesc: A devious mage is here, planning your doom.
mobLongDesc: The devious mage lurks in the darkness here.  As a student of the Necromancer, this dark mage practices unspeakable acts against nature.

mobShortDesc: The humble cleric wanders here, lost in his thoughts.
mobLongDesc: A cleric wanders the passages here, humble in his faith.  Tricked by the devious templar Felnor into a life of fear and uncertainty, this pious man wanders the darkness, lost and afraid.

mobShortDesc: An undead ninja stands here, awaiting his masters' command.
mobLongDesc: The undead ninja has been summoned from the nether, here to do the bidding of his master.

mobShortDesc: An undead anti-paladin stands here, awaiting his masters' command.
mobLongDesc: The undead anti-paladin has been summoned from the nether, here to do the bidding of his master.

mobShortDesc: An undead commando stands here, awaiting his masters' command.
mobLongDesc: The undead commando has been summoned from the nether, here to do the bidding of his master.

mobShortDesc: a holy paladin glares at you, secure in his righteousness.
mobLongDesc: The undead paladin has been summoned from the nether, here to do the bidding of his master.

mobShortDesc: The dark necromancer is here conjuring his foul horde.
mobLongDesc: The master of the dark arts crouches here before you, working on his intricate conjuring.  Weaving his hands in intricate patterns, you are almost hypnotized be the ease and grace with which he moves.
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST

mobShortDesc: An undead thief stands here, awaiting his masters' command.
mobLongDesc: The undead thief has been summoned from the nether, here to do the bidding of his master.

mobShortDesc: An undead warrior stands here, awaiting his masters' command.
mobLongDesc: The undead warrior has been summoned from the nether, here to do the bidding of his master.

mobShortDesc: An undead bard stands here, awaiting his masters' command.
mobLongDesc: The undead bard has been summoned from the nether, here to do the bidding of his master.
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST

mobShortDesc: An undead mage stands here, awaiting his masters' command.
mobLongDesc: The undead mage has been summoned from the nether, here to do the bidding of his master.

mobShortDesc: An undead cleric stands here, awaiting his masters' command.
mobLongDesc: The undead cleric has been summoned from the nether, here to do the bidding of his master.

mobShortDesc: Dindae, the Siberian tiger, is lying here on the rug, purring loudly.
mobLongDesc: This is Val and Kat's pride and joy.  Large fanged, powerfully built, and very rare this Siberian tiger could rip you apart in the time it took you to breath.   His black stripes criss-cross his pure white back and make him look alot more tame then he really is.

mobShortDesc: A groveling proselyte is here, begging for mercy.
mobLongDesc: He has been bathed, washed, and basically prepared, to be sacrificed at midnight to whatever god fits the mood.  His screams are loud and hoarse but are of no avail.  He is destined to die.

mobShortDesc: Felnor, the High Priest of Morgoth, is here performing sacrifices.
mobLongDesc: The high priest of Morgoth, Felnor is in charge of all the sacrificing. Grand master of all the orders, Felnor wears the platinum sash of his office. His loyalty to his followers is extreme and he does his job very well.  He has no qualms about his job, however, it was what he was raised to do.

mobShortDesc: A black robed fanatic is looking at you with malicious intent.
mobLongDesc: This cleric serves the black order of healing.  He uses all the bad emotions to gain his energy for healing.  Guilt, Lust, Hate, Envy, all add to this cleric's power.  Although in the end his result is just, his means are questionable.

mobShortDesc: A green robed cleric is here, studying scriptures.
mobLongDesc: This cleric serves the green order of healing.  He uses nature as his power source for his healing.  Birth, Death, Age, Time, all add to this cleric's power.  As life progresses and nature takes its course the green order grows in power.

mobShortDesc: A white robed zealot is here chanting strange matras.
mobLongDesc: This cleric serves the white order of healing.  She uses all the good emotions to power her heals.  Love, Kindness, Compassion, Trust, all add to this cleric's power.  Her love for the world and its companions carry her through to the end.

mobShortDesc: A hungry, mangy rat cringes in the corner.
A magnificent griffon is sitting here, poised to strike.
A small baby condor is here chirping for food.
mobLongDesc: It's hungry.  It's mad.  It wants to eat YOU!

mobShortDesc: A giant mother condor is here tending to her young ones.
Trien, guardian of the faith, keeper of the key, watches you closely.
mobLongDesc: Trien was the former high priest of the Temple of Morgoth.  Banished for crimes unspoken, he now spends his time watching the world turn from the top of the tower.  His one goal in life is to keep his former Brotherhood safe from interlopers such as yourself.
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST

mobShortDesc: A beautiful white stallion with a horn on his head stands here peacefully.
mobLongDesc: Grace, Beauty, Style, this wonderous creature has it all.  As tall as any stallion you have ever seen this radiant unicorn and his magic keep paradise protected from the weather outside.  His horn shines bright with magical energy.

mobShortDesc: A savage wolf crouches here amongst the rocks.
A learned man dressed in elegant fashions is wandering here.
mobLongDesc: Wandering the mountain range is how this wizard got his name.  Dressed in heavy winter clothes and a cup of something that is steaming hot, he traverses the range in all weather.  His faithful walking stick never leaves his hands.

mobShortDesc: A large horned mountain goat is grazing peacefully here.
mobLongDesc: A goat, with long curved horns, nothing more.

mobShortDesc: A mean looking thug prepares to jump you.
mobLongDesc: A scarred faced thug glares at you from behind his icy blue eyes.  His lip curls up in an un friendly snarl.  He has long white hair, that hasn't been cut in ages, it hangs down his back in an ugly mass.  This man looks brutal.  He raises his hands to fight.

mobShortDesc: A stone dragon peers around, omnipotent and unconcerned.
mobLongDesc: A massive stone dragon towers above you.  Each claw easily large enough to grasp several horses.  It moves with incredible agility given the sheer size and immensity of the creature.  When it roars, the earth itself shivers and quakes.  This is an ancient being, countless centuries old, during which it probably faced far more capable and armed foes than yourself.
mobImmune: PIERCE SLASH CLAW BITE STING HACK CHOP SLICE

mobShortDesc: A Huge Stone Dragon rises up from the rocks here.
mobLongDesc: A massive stone dragon towers before you.  It lets out a tremendous roar that sounds like thunder.  You cower mercifully before it.  It has huge glowing red eyes and long dagger-like teeth.  You gawk in sheer terror and amazement.  Then your senses kick in and you realize its probably a good idea to get the hell out of here.
mobImmune: PIERCE SLASH CLAW BITE STING HACK CHOP SLICE

mobName: Grydon the Guardian of the Gates
mobShortDesc: Grydon stands here guarding the city gates.
mobLongDesc: Grydon is a very tall and slender man.  He shows no expression on his face, he just keeps attending to his duty as the Guardian of the Gates. You notice fierce looking scars on his arms and shoulders.  You guess that he is an experienced warrior, after all, would the King put someone who isn't in charge of the gates?

mobShortDesc: The Morian Jeweler stands here admiring his stones.
mobLongDesc: A jolly fat man is here admiring his crafts.  He is tall and chubby, with short, curly white hair.  For some reason he has a bit of colour in his cheeks unlike the rest of the Morians around here.  He is dressed in fine linen robes and wears masses of expensive looking chains, rings, and pendants. You guess that he must make a fine living off of this shop, as he lives what seems to be a very lavish life.

mobShortDesc: The Morian Blacksmith is here pounding on some iron.
mobLongDesc: An old fat man is here pounding on some iron.  There is sweat pouring down his face and cheeks as he works at the intense flame.  He has burns and welts covering his body, no doubt from the time he has spent at this work.  He gazes up at you and nods as you approach.  You should try and make this quick, as he is a very busy man.

mobShortDesc: The Morian Weapons Keeper stands here with her arms folded.
mobLongDesc: A brute of a man stands before you with his arms folded.  He has a shiny bald head and a long white beard.  The muscles in his arms ripple every few minutes.  He gazes at you without showing any kind of expression on his face.  He may be good with weapons, but he definitely isn't a good shopkeeper.

mobShortDesc: The Morian Postman is here sorting out some mail.
mobLongDesc: A man wearing big rimmed glasses peers up at you from his work station. He is a funny looking man, short and fat, with curly white hair and dark blue eyes.  Though he seems nice enough. He smiles politely and tips his hat at you.

mobShortDesc: The Morian Grocer stands here waiting for some business.
mobLongDesc: A pretty looking thin girl stands behind the counter.  She smiles at you as you enter.  She is very tall with long braided hair that cascades down her shoulders and back.  Her blue eyes sparkle at you.  Maybe you should buy something and make her happy.

mobShortDesc: A Morian Commoner is here roaming about the city.
mobLongDesc: A Morian commoner is busy roaming the streets, carrying out his busy tasks. He looks like the rest of the Morians, he has pale blue eyes and snow white hair. He does not seem to notice you as he roams the busy city streets.  Perhaps these Morians prefer to be left alone.

mobShortDesc: Mykras spreads his wings and prepares to attack.
mobLongDesc: A massive demon spreads its giant wings as you look at it.  Its long sharp blood covered teeth protrude from the sides of its jaw.  Huge glowing red eyes burn with fierce anger that you have entered its domain. It grips its huge fists and screeches a war cry as it prepares to make you its lunch.
mobImmune: HIT BLUDGEON PIERCE SLASH WHIP CLAW BITE STING CRUSH HACK CHOP SLICE

mobShortDesc: A Dark Priest stands here with his head bowed.
mobLongDesc: You gaze at a large man covered in masses of dark robes and godly coverings. His eyes glow a with a yellow tint.  He is the High Priest of Mykras, the Morian God.  He is the Gods mortal servant and bows to its every whim.  He appears to not welcome the presence of outsides, as he slowly raises his dagger, and apparently it seems aimed towards you.

mobShortDesc: Terral the Castle Guard is here protecting the gates.
mobLongDesc: A husky brute of a man looms before you.  Terral is one of the Castles best of guards, and he makes sure no one does the wrong thing. He appears to have much more brawn than brains, but he gets the job done.  It would be a good idea to make sure you don't conduct anything to piss off this guy, it might turn out to be a big mistake.

mobShortDesc: Rupert the Weapon Master is here cleaning some swords.
mobLongDesc: A funny looking man strand proudly before you.  He holds his nose high in the air.  Rupert has short cut white hair and a finely trimmed white moustache.  He looks a bit goofy, though he is known in Moria for his expertise ability to forge and wield his weapons. He is now working in the castle, as the Kings very own weapon master.
actionFlags: SENTINEL ISNPC AGGWA MEMORY AGGNO SHIELD

mobShortDesc: Aldrene the Bard stands here admiring her instruments.
mobLongDesc: A fat and jolly woman stand here singing away.  She smiles at you and beckons you to join in her singing.  She is a short, round woman with curly white hair that is in a mass on the top of her head.  Like the rest of the Morians, she has pale skin, and blue eyes.  She utterly glows with pleasure.  Her presence makes you feel comfortable.

mobShortDesc: Griselda the Tyrannical Queen of Moria is chained up in shackles here.
mobLongDesc: A small and ghastly figure is before you coiled up in chains.  She has a long tangled mess of hair and her clothes are made of dirty rags. Her skin has turned to a greenish hue and she moans and cries in a dream like state.  This is the imprisoned Queen of Moria.  After plundering her people, they rebelled and placed her in this dark prison to rot.  They then placed her younger brother, Mandrial on the throne to become a just leader of Moria.

mobShortDesc: Ulric the Advisor glares up from his papers at you.
mobLongDesc: A tall and slender man stand before you.  He has long black hair that curls down his back and coal black eyes.  He appears to be a very intelligent man but still a force to be reckoned with.  He gazes up at you with an angry look. You do not belong here, and it seems as if he is ready to throw you out.

mobShortDesc: Adrel the Sage stands here gazing at you angrily.
mobLongDesc: A tall and striking woman towers over you here.  She glares at you with an evil grin as you approach.  She has long black hair curling down her back, tied in many dark coloured ribbons.  She has coal black eyes that seem to gaze right through your soul.  She wears long a long silk robe that drapes to the floor.  You get the idea that this woman means business, its probably a good idea to get out of her way.

mobShortDesc: Mandrial, the Morian King
mobLongDesc: Before you is the king of Moria.  Though he is actually rather young, his face is lined with signs of stress.  He has high cheekbones and a very long chin. From what you know, he treats his people very kindly, but still manages to rule his kingdom with an iron fist.  His pale eyes loom at you calmly.  He shows little expression towards you, except what appears to be a permanent frown. You get the impression that something is bothering him.

mobShortDesc: The Morian Magician is standing here behind a counter.
mobLongDesc: A pale and frail looking Morian stands before you.  He has pale blue eyes and very white skin.  He has a long white beard that lies near the bottom of his grey tunic.  Though you imagine that he is very intelligent, he looks a little "out to lunch" as he talks to one of his invisible "friends" that visit him from time to time.  The Magician seems to run a good shop here however, so it probably is a good place to buy something.

mobShortDesc: A Cave Ogre roams about the tunnels here.
mobLongDesc: You gaze up at an extremely ugly ogre.  He seems to be an old ogre, and is very hunched over.  His beard is long and stringy.  He flashes a toothless grin as he realizes you could be his next meal.  It would be a good idea to get out of here as soon as possible, instead of risking dealing with this old, fierce monster.

mobShortDesc: A small furry grim sniffs at your feet here.
mobLongDesc: A furry little creature stares up at you with wide black eyes. You think you can recognize this creature as a Grim. He seems to be friendly enough.  He seems interested in your presence here, but be careful.  Grims like to collect things they may "find".  It may be a bit of a challenge to get something back from this little guy, as his teeth as very long and sharp. You should probably keep your distance, just to be safe.

mobShortDesc: The Morian Protector is standing here.
mobLongDesc: A tall, well built man stands here in the onyx cave.  His skin is a very pale white colour and his eyes are a light grey.  He has very large hands that could probably crush you in seconds, however he looks very friendly towards you and smiles in your general direction.  He looks rather lonely, but as a warrior he is used to do what he is assigned to.

mobShortDesc: The Ancient Statue of the Orcish Ruler Nim stands here.
mobLongDesc: A huge statue is here before you.  It is the great Orc, Nim. He is one of the orcs most powerful leaders.  This statue is controlled by magic, you should be careful around it, because if Nim's magic is involved, it is definitely dangerous.

mobShortDesc: The Orcish Archmage is here anticipating your arrival.
mobLongDesc: A huge orcish mage stands before you.  He looks up at you and his eyes glow an eerie red.  He utters a strange mantra, then grins evilly.  He is definitely NOT someone to mess with.  Run, if you still can.

mobShortDesc: A Kobold is here trying to practice her magic.
mobLongDesc: This Kobold looks as if she has weathered a thousand storms.  Her face is withered and frail.  A film of slime seems to cover her entire body. What is left of her eyes seem to have sank back into her head.  She seems harmless enough, but you do sense a powerful magic.

mobShortDesc: A lost warrior wanders aimlessly through the caves.
mobLongDesc: A hard looking warrior stands in front of you.  He has long lost his mind, and now wanders these mines looking for someone to kill.  His face is contorted into a look of severe mental anguish.

mobShortDesc: A harmless looking centipede squirms in the soft ground.
mobLongDesc: Well it doesn't seem to pay any attention towards you.

mobShortDesc: An old man cowers in the shadows here.
mobLongDesc: An old man is here cowering in the shadows.  He fears you being here.  Maybe you should just leave this poor old soul alone?

mobShortDesc: A thief hides here in the shadows.
mobLongDesc: You see a sneaky little man standing here grinning at you. He seems to be eyeing your purse.  Perhaps you should stay away from this man, he might do something you don't want him to do.

mobShortDesc: A black snake is coiled here in the dirt.
mobLongDesc: A snake sits here in the dirt, seemingly unmoved by its magical surroundings.  The snake is rather large, and has long fangs.  Perhaps you should beware of this snake.

mobShortDesc: A fat and lazy troll wanders about here.
mobLongDesc: As you stare into the trolls eyes he flashes you a big grin.  Looks like lunch time has finally come for him!

mobShortDesc: A short orcish mage experiments with his spells here.
mobLongDesc: This small but dangerous little orc glares at you in pure contempt. Looks like his magic might be powerful.  Perhaps its a good idea to leave before he hurts you.

mobShortDesc: The Orcish Captain stands here, arms folded.
mobLongDesc: Before you stands the Orcish Captain.  He has been assigned as Captain of this mountain, and has command over almost all the Orcs in it.  He is a master of battle, you had better run, unless you want to be the next one the captain decides to mutilate.

mobShortDesc: An Orcish Sorcerer stands here.
mobLongDesc: You gaze into the eyes of an ugly Orcish Sorcerer.  Her teeth are all crooked and blood stained, and her eyes glow red.  Her hair is long and straw-like.  She utters a few enchantments and prepares herself to destroy you!

mobShortDesc: An Orcish Guard is standing here.
mobLongDesc: You look upon an Orcish Guard.  He grins at you bearing his yellow teeth. There is blood stained on his lip.  You shiver as he emits a loud grunt. You had better run, unless you want to become this guys meal!

mobShortDesc: An Orcish Cleric towers over you here.
mobLongDesc: You gaze into the eyes of an evil old orc.  He grins evilly and utters some unknown words.  You wonder if he is channeling the power of his gods. You had better be very careful around this orc.  He is very dangerous and powerful.

mobShortDesc: A Frothing Orc is here looking for someone to eat.
mobLongDesc: An ugly Frothing orc stands before you.

mobShortDesc: An Ugly Hobgoblin is here muttering to itself.
mobLongDesc: The hobgoblin looks quite dangerous.

mobShortDesc: A Small Hobgoblin stands here lost.
mobLongDesc: The hobgoblin looks quite lost.

mobShortDesc: A Proud Warrior stands tall here.
mobLongDesc: A tall and proud warrior stands tall in defiance here.  His flesh is wrinkled and aged from years of battle.  Despite his old age he is still a notable opponent.

mobShortDesc: A Kobold is here trying to practice her magic.
mobLongDesc: This Kobold looks as if she has weathered a thousand storms.  Her face is withered and frail.  A film of slime seems to cover her entire body. What is left of her eyes seem to have sank back into her head.  She seems harmless enough, but you do sense a powerful magic.

mobShortDesc: A lost warrior wanders aimlessly through the caves.
mobLongDesc: A hard looking warrior stands in front of you.  He has long lost his mind, and now wanders these mines looking for someone to kill.  His face is contorted into a look of severe mental anguish.

mobShortDesc: A harmless looking centipede squirms in the soft ground.
mobLongDesc: Well it doesn't seem to pay any attention towards you.

mobShortDesc: A black snake is coiled here in the dirt.
mobLongDesc: A snake sits here in the dirt, seemingly unmoved by its magical surroundings.  The snake is rather large, and has long fangs.  Perhaps you should beware of this snake.

mobShortDesc: A fat and lazy troll wanders about here.
mobLongDesc: As you stare into the trolls eyes he flashes you a big grin.  Looks like lunch time has finally come for him!

mobShortDesc: An Orc is here guarding the caves.
mobLongDesc: He looks dreadful.

mobShortDesc: A serpent slithers in the sand here.
mobLongDesc: A majestical serpent slithers in the sand here.  You gaze into its black eyes and find yourself entranced by them.  An echo sounds in your head, in between the hissing you make out the words "BEWARE".  You should be careful around this snake, it may be poisonous.

mobShortDesc: A blank of primal clay stands here, waiting to be shaped
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.

mobShortDesc: A blank of primal clay stands here, waiting to be shaped
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.

mobShortDesc: A blank of primal clay stands here, waiting to be shaped
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.

mobShortDesc: A blank of primal clay stands here, waiting to be shaped
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.

mobShortDesc: A Muscular old man wearing Monk's attire is standing here.
mobLongDesc: This old man looks anything but frail. Anyone who would consider this elderly an easy target would quickly learn their mistake.
mobImmune: FIRE ELECTRIC POISON PUMMEL KICK PUNCH SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DRAIN DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE CLAIR SUMMON PIERCE CLAW BITE STING BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT

mobShortDesc: An old Monk with a long flowing gray beard stands here.
mobLongDesc: This old man is the head scholar for this order. It is an extremely important position in the ranks of the followers of the deity of knowledge. Though he spends his time roaming the rows of books in the sublevel of the Abbey, from the scars criss-crossing his arms it is obvious that he has spent atleast some time using a sword.

mobShortDesc: An old man wearing dark robes is standing here.
mobLongDesc: This old man seems to radiate a power unlike any you have ever seen. Perhaps interrupting him is not the wisest thing in the world to do.

mobShortDesc: A large humanoid rat is searching for food here.
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.

mobName: One-eye, the Captain of the Sarthian Guard
mobShortDesc: A scarred fighter dressed in black and wearing a patch is here.
mobLongDesc: One-Eye was once known by another name, but since his eye was taken by the dragon years ago the nickname has since replaced it.

mobShortDesc: A soldier dressed in the livery of Sarth patrols this part of the City.
mobLongDesc: This guardsman looks to be a veteran of several battles. If all of the city's guardforce are this experienced then the city is well protected indeed.

mobShortDesc: An old woman stands here leaning on an old straw broom.
mobLongDesc: This little old lady seems almost too frail to stand up. In fact she is leaning heavily on her broom for support. You can hardly imagine a woman in her shape even making the climb to reach this lofty perch. You do notice, howver, that her eyes are as active as those of a person of less than one-quarter of her age.

mobShortDesc: A thin, wiry, rat-like humanoid is glaring at you with evil intent.
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST

mobShortDesc: A thin young man is behind the bar serving drinks.
mobLongDesc: Mel isn't the normal bartender, which explains his total lack of skill behind the bar. He is actually the dishwasher for this establishment. He's a short, blonde-haired man who is constantly being picked on by the rowdy sailors who frequent this Tavern. From the expression on his face, he might lose his temper at any second.

mobShortDesc: A short figure with a long nose is sitting behind the counter.
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.

mobShortDesc: A scarred mercenary is sitting in the corner.
mobLongDesc: This thin, wiry fighter is armed to the teeth. You notice the hilts of no less than five knives sticking out of sheaths attached to various pieces of his armor. You can't help but notice that he also bears the scars of many hard-fought campaigns. He is missing a finger off of his right hand and, though there are no obvious scars he seems to be missing part of his tongue... his words make no sense at any rate.
affectedByFlags: INVISIBLE SANCTUARY PROTECT-EVIL DODGE PROTECT-GOOD INVUL DUAL

mobShortDesc: A huge man wearing a kilt and carying bagpipes is standing here.
mobLongDesc: Here stands a wild looking individual. From his long blond hair to his hairy bare legs, this man exudes an unconquerable spirit (along with an odor of the unwashed). The only thing on his body that is louder than his garish red and purple kilt is his foul mouth. It is hard to believe that anyone would pay him for anything... except, maybe, to leave. However, even a farm-boy like you has heard of the renown bard named McDurran. It is said that when he plays his bagpipes people sometimes forget to breathe... though you have a sneaking suspicion that that may have more to do with his total lack of sanitation.

mobKeywords: greybeard grey beard blind man blindman beggar
mobShortDesc: A poor old blind beggar is here, tapping the ground with his cane.
mobLongDesc: This man is almost a sight to make even an Anti-Paladin show pity. His clothes have been patched many more times than you thought anything could be. Where his eyes should be there is only an angry red scar. This poor blind beggar is... is walking down the street tapping his cane and avoiding everything that crosses his path. at closer glance you notice that he may be wearing old tattered clothes, but they, and him, are clean and odor free. There is something about this poor blind man that makes you wonder about his abilities... and his life before his sight was taken.

mobShortDesc: A seven foot tall broad-shouldered Cyclops is standing behind the bar.
mobLongDesc: One word describes this bartender... SCARY!!. His stature? He has the body of a 7' tall Dwarf. His fists are the size of catapult stones, and seem capable of atleast as much damage. His face? It is pock-marked and scarred and if you add that to his teeth, fangs actually, it equals up to a frightful countenance. Surely he is the scariest creature you have ever seen inside the walls of a town not under siege.

mobShortDesc: A short, chubby, bronze-skinned woman is behind the counter mixing dough.
mobLongDesc: This little old woman is busy making treats to sell to the customers of her shop. You do notice, however, that she almost seems determined to eat a pastry for every one she puts on the shelves.

mobShortDesc: A handsome elf is standing here.
mobLongDesc: This ?young? elf owns this restaurant. If you want to buy something you'd better be nice to him.
mobImmune: FIRE ELECTRIC POISON PUMMEL KICK PUNCH SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DRAIN DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE

mobName: Weazel, The Chief of the Were-Rats
mobShortDesc: A short man with a pointed nose and a long thin mustache is standing here.
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.

mobShortDesc: A lithe scaled warrior is sneaking around here.
mobLongDesc: A lizard warrior who seems to be making maps of the region for his master.

mobShortDesc: A large winged serpent is crouched here.
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.

mobShortDesc: A man outfitted with black armor stands here.
mobLongDesc: This is a quest, not a permanent mob... give me a break  :p

mobShortDesc: A lithe scaled figure is skulking around here.
mobLongDesc: A scaled warrior beaming with pride that his master entrusted him with so valuable a dispatch.

mobShortDesc: A caretaker is sitting here.
mobLongDesc: Once upon a time, he was a very brave fighter, but now you can notice that he is out of wits.

mobShortDesc: A Guard of the Evil Palace is standing here, protecting his city.
mobLongDesc: A very strong and tough guard is standing here to protect his palace.

mobShortDesc: A cute rabbit is standing here.
mobLongDesc: Watch out, it can drive a nail into your coffin.

mobShortDesc: Pyrver is standing beside his bed.
mobLongDesc: He is a man without a soul and he is thinking of something very hard. He says "I am warning you, don't go into my lab".

mobShortDesc: An Evil dog is standing here.
mobLongDesc: You notice a very evil look in its eyes, and its teeth are so sharp that it makes you shiver.

mobShortDesc: A Ghoul is standing here.
mobLongDesc: It will robe your grave and eat your corpse.

mobShortDesc: A Giant Glowworm is flying in front of you.
mobLongDesc: It looks like a glowing lantern floating in the dark.

mobShortDesc: A Horned-Owl is flying in front of you.
mobLongDesc: A night-flying bird. OOOWWWWOOOOO

mobShortDesc: A ghost is floating here.
mobLongDesc: You notice an evil look in its eyes, get away from it.

mobShortDesc: A Skeleton is here waiting for a fight.
mobLongDesc: You see a bony framework of a body staring at you, waiting for a fight.

mobShortDesc: A Mummy is standing here.
mobLongDesc: You see a pair of evil's eye looking at you.

mobShortDesc: A Phantom is floating in front of you.
mobLongDesc: You see a ghastly looking thing floating in the air.

mobShortDesc: a disfigured person mutilating his face is standing here shivering with insanity.
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.

mobShortDesc: a dark assailant waits patiently in the dark shadows of the room.
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.

mobShortDesc: A stocky bartender resides behind the bar glaring at you with his black eyes.
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.

mobShortDesc: The Guardian of The Gates stands here vigilant awaiting to judge those who wish to pass.
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.

mobShortDesc: A Grotesque Figure is sitting in the shadows murmuring jibberish.
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.

mobShortDesc: A Twitching Figure stands here impatiently scanning the room for a target.
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.

mobShortDesc: A training dummy sits here waiting for a newbie.
mobLongDesc: This is a training dummy created to help give you some practice in fighting mobs.  Go ahead and try it out!

mobShortDesc: Gremdor the Secretary stands here barring entry through the door.
mobLongDesc: He doesn't take kindly to unannounced visits, I hope you have a good reason for being here.

mobKeywords: Ghert the Chief Instructor of the Academy
mobShortDesc: Ghert the Chief Instructor of the Academy stands here looking impatient.
mobLongDesc: She is a stern looking woman in her late sixties who has been the Chief Instructor of the Academy for many years.

mobShortDesc: The Shopkeeper is here, cleaning the musical instruments.
mobLongDesc: This shopkeeper is a very tough old man.

mobShortDesc: A Club Guard is here guarding the club.
mobLongDesc: He will not let any non-member to get into the club. No matter who you are, he can kill you with a needle.

mobShortDesc: A Fat Newt lounges and breathes heavily.
mobLongDesc: The supposed fire newt god stands before you. A large and fat newt lazily sits next to the throne, slime and spit running down its face. It breathes heavily as it simply eats what is within its reach. It emits weird noises from its large gaping mouth. Small newts in the area hesitantly come to fulfill their gods wishes.
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST
attackTarget: RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP ROOM SELF
attackSpell: burning_hands fireball flamestrike lethal_fire hell_fire firebreath

mobShortDesc: A Giant Fire Lizard, basks in the heat of lava flows.
mobLongDesc: A larger fire lizard skulks around the room. Its long tail swaying back and forth as its tongue flicks in and out of its mouth. The large orange scales that cover its body reflect the light in the room and glow to a certain degree after absorbing the heat emitted by the flowing lava.

mobShortDesc: A Muscular Newt paces the room looking for a fight.
mobLongDesc: This is a fire newt ruffian. Another large variant that has evolved after being trapped underground for untold ages. Their scales have hardened and plates of obsidian and other volcanic materials coat their bodies providing additional protection.

mobShortDesc: A Lanky Newt slinks into the shadows.
mobLongDesc: This is a fire newt thief. A very tall and thin creature creeps on the walls. Their hands and feet have adapted to provide perfect grip on almost any surface. Their skin flickers between multiple colors as it attempted to blend into the background.

mobShortDesc: A Large Brutish Newt glares menacingly.
mobLongDesc: This is a fire newt brute. A larger and stronger version of the newts encountered before. The harsher environment has lead to increased strength and mass. They wear assorted torn armor and wield a large rock club.

mobShortDesc: An enormous fire lizard is lurking in the shadows.
mobLongDesc: The enormous fire lizard is breathing heavily as smoke comes out of its nostril.  He stares at you and pretends to attack as you shield yourself.  You then see him dart back into the shadows and you figure he must be checking you out before he attacks.

mobShortDesc: The Legendary Phoenix is here, rising from the ashes.
mobLongDesc: This large, flaming bird stares at you with burning eyes.  It's pupils are hot embers and its feathers are engulfed in flames.  It's 18-decimeter long claws are covered with blood.  It has a wingspan of about 10 meters.  Its two meter long beak is razor sharp and it opens its mouth and leads out a shriek as you stare at it.

mobShortDesc: A fire lizard is crawling here.
mobLongDesc: The fire newt lizard flicks its tongue at you as you look at it.  It then scurries off to a corner for it does not want to fight.  It is used only for breeding and producing more fire newts.  That is the only purpose an adult fire lizard has.. other than guarding the eggs.

mobShortDesc: A fire newt priest is standing here.
mobLongDesc: The fire newt priest is praying for all of the souls of the fire newts.  He hopes that one day they will all reach their final destiny and that they will all live happily ever after that.  He isn't very big but he glows and is taking note of your every move.  You'd better watch your step around him for he may just know what he's doing.
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST

mobShortDesc: A fire newt leader is standing here.
mobLongDesc: This is the leader of the fire newts.  He looks very sternly at you.  He awaits you in a very finely-crafted chair made from solid oak.  This is the big boss. If you mess up and the general finds you guilty, you are sent here. The fire newt leader kills and eats the bad fire newts.  This is probably why they are so endured.  Resistance is futile for you can not run away from him.. his men would catch you if he didn't.
attackType: PUNCH BITE CLAW DISARM SPELL CAST

mobShortDesc: A fire newt general is standing here.
mobLongDesc: This is a fire newt general.  He makes sure the sergeants aren't goofing off or abusing their power.  He also makes sure everything is done correctly around here.  If something were to go wrong, he's the man to whom you'd have to answer. He doesn't look very nice.  He has many badges on his uniform and has a straight poker face.

mobShortDesc: A fire newt sergeant patrols this area.
mobLongDesc: This is a fire newt sergeant.  He controls the fire newt guards and workers. He is controlled by the fire newt generals.  His main priority is to make sure the guards and workers are doing their jobs and to make sure that someone doesn't get as far as you have.  Unfortunately they didn't do their jobs so he'll have to do it for them.

mobShortDesc: A fire newt baby is crawling here.
mobLongDesc: The fire newt child runs around his mother.  He looks at you and is shocked for he has never seen such a sight.  He stares at you trying to figure out what you are and whether or not to be afraid.  He decides you're friendly and comes over to play.  Then mother sees you...

mobShortDesc: A fire newt mother is standing here.
mobLongDesc: The fire newt mother is here playing with her young.  She doesn't like anything to come between her and her time with the children.  She especially hates it when that interception isn't a fire newt of any kind.  You should probably leave before she sees you.

mobShortDesc: A fire newt guard is standing here.
mobLongDesc: This guard is here to protect the young fire newts.  She is ordered to kill anything at all costs so that the children may survive.  She will force you to take her life before she quits.  She wields a weapon and stares at you very coldly.

mobShortDesc: A fire newt worker is standing here.
mobLongDesc: This fire newt is very tired and sweaty.  Her shirt is totally drenched and she pants like a very hot dog.  She still continues on for fire newts are known not for their strength but for their endurance and self-discipline.  She sees you and decides after she puts this bag of grain down you're gonna get hurt...

mobShortDesc: A fire newt guard is standing here.
mobLongDesc: This is a fire newt.  He has orange skin and is about four feet tall.  His muscular structure is quite impressive.  He wears brown pants and a white vest.  His job is to guard against intruders like you.  His long snout sticks out about a foot long and his tail drags about two feet behind him.

mobShortDesc: A fire newt worker is standing here.
mobLongDesc: The fire newt worker looks very strong.  He is muscular and sturdy.  He is extremely self disciplined and looks as though he could take on any opponent. His skin is fire red and he doesn't seem to be bothered by the heat at all. His impressive thick tail lags behind him and his snout sticks out as he flicks his skinny tongue at you.  He wears a small jacket and leather gloves.  He also has a bandana around his head.

mobShortDesc: A mountain kid is standing here.
mobLongDesc: The kid snorts as you pass it.  It then gallops around in a circle ending where it started.  It looks so cute!  It is nice and furry and keeps its coat very clean.  It lets out a strange noise as it trips during its movement.  Even though it is very clumsy you still want to take it home.

mobShortDesc: A mountain ewe is standing here.
mobLongDesc: The ewe sits here gazing upon you as you pass her.  She kindly steps aside so that you may cross safely.  Until now you probably never noticed how nice and understanding animals can be.  She looks at you almost as if she were smiling but that's impossible... or is it?

mobShortDesc: A mountain goat is standing here.
mobLongDesc: Searching for food, the mountain goat looks very hungry.  He slowly moves along while trying to find something on which to nibble to ease his stomach pain.
