Finding nothing here to eat, he lies down as if giving up.  He looks at you with sheepish eyes and begs for some food.  He then sighs and puts his head in between his front legs.

mobShortDesc: Immortalis, Guide of the Fates, sits here upon his mighty throne.
mobLongDesc: Immortalis, also known as the Guide of the Fates, resembles a man of massive proportions and ageless identity. Corded muscles ripple beneath the loose white robes worn easily over his mighty frame. An endless series of delicate runes have been woven into the lining of the garment with metallic thread. Long silver hair hangs majestically from under his simple platinum crown, his chiseled face and ice-blue eyes clearly visible between the cascade of strands. Elegant leather sandals adorn his feet, buckled ankle-high. A ring of platinum and of similar design to the crown on his brow adorns a single finger on his left hand, its meaning unknown to all but its owner. As old as time itself, Immortalis has sat here upon his mighty throne, observing the world and its citizens, and giving guidance to the Fates themselves.
actionFlags: SENTINEL ISNPC STAY-ZONE MEMORY ARM SHIELD
affectedByFlags: DETECT-ALIGNMENT DETECT-INVISIBLE DETECT-MAGIC SENSE-LIFE PROTECT-EVIL INFRAVISION DODGE PROTECT-GOOD DUAL FURY
mobImmune: FIRE ELECTRIC POISON PUMMEL KICK PUNCH SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DRAIN DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE SUMMON HIT BLUDGEON PIERCE SLASH WHIP CLAW BITE STING CRUSH HACK CHOP SLICE BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT

mobShortDesc: Grobyan the Hide Trader is here pacing the room and cursing.
mobLongDesc: Grobyan, while he has a foul temper, seems to love his job as he's bedecked in an amazing assortment of hides, as well as the shell from some sort of turtle and he's wearing on his head a makeshift helmet made from the head of some giant ant.

mobShortDesc: Freyja the Healer stands tall and striking, watching over her wards.
mobLongDesc: White robes hang delicately from delicate shoulders. Long dark hair hanging in long tresses from beneath a carefully pressed white cap. Thin lips twitch upwards in a slight smile as bright blue eyes twinkle with hidden amusement. A soft light is ever present, carefully wrapping her in a warm golden glow.
affectedByFlags: SANCTUARY SPHERE PROTECT-EVIL DODGE INVUL DUAL

mobShortDesc: A large, trained Wolf is here.
mobLongDesc: The Wolf looks like a strong, fearless fighter.

mobShortDesc: A large, loyal Rottweiler is here.
mobLongDesc: The Rottweiler looks like a strong, fierce fighter.

mobShortDesc: A small, quick, loyal Beagle is here.
mobLongDesc: The Beagle looks like a fierce fighter.

mobShortDesc: A small loyal Puppy is here.
mobLongDesc: The Puppy looks like a cute, little, fierce fighter.

mobShortDesc: A small loyal Kitten is here.
mobLongDesc: The Kitten looks like a cute, little, fierce fighter.

mobShortDesc: Omus the dog catcher walks around, looking for dogs to catch.
mobLongDesc: Before you is a slim man wearing a red uniform. He clutches a long rod with a hoop on the end between his hands' nine fingers. After finally catching all the dogs around town, his future plans include slaying the evil dog Cerberus and taking over the world.

mobShortDesc: The Vault Guard stands here.
mobLongDesc: A tall, dark and handsome brute with brawns but no brains.  Imported directly from the far Kudzul-Ur jungles to the south, he knows no fear. He really doesn't, the tribe has no word for it.  He watches your every move out of the corner of his eye and you shiver ever so slightly at the thought of facing this monster of a man in combat.

mobShortDesc: A cityguard stands here, protecting the innocent.
mobLongDesc: A very big, strong, helpful, trustworthy guard.

mobShortDesc: A cityguard is here, guarding the gate.
mobLongDesc: A big, strong, helpful, trustworthy guard.

mobShortDesc: Odif Yltsaeb is here, walking backwards.
mobLongDesc: Odif is a small god that has been reversed by some dog.

mobShortDesc: A beggar is here, asking for a few coins.
mobLongDesc: The beggar looks like she is fed up with life.

mobShortDesc: A singing, happy Drunk.
mobLongDesc: A drunk who seems to be too happy, and to carry too much money.

mobShortDesc: A shabby looking sellsword wanders around, looking desperately for work.
mobLongDesc: Worn leather adorns a thin jerkin and small coif hanging by a thin line around a dirt covered neck. Hard eyes and calloused hands twitch nervously in a sporadic twisted habit formed after years of battlefield surprises. Worn and rotting boots show many patched and worn holes, filthy leggings tied up with twine and covered in thick pig grease.

mobShortDesc: A shaggy coated mutt sidles along the walls, alert for any scraps of food.
mobLongDesc: Dark matted fur drips urine and chunks of feces on the ground. Decaying chunks of meat and intestine hang limply from broken and rotted teeth. Yellowed eyes roll wildly from beneath busy brows while the curved arch of sharp ribs poke up under thick skin.

mobShortDesc: A janitor is walking around, cleaning up.
A cityguard stands here.
mobLongDesc: A big, strong, helpful, trustworthy guard.

mobShortDesc: A wizened cartographer is here pouring over his maps.
mobLongDesc: Thick glasses frame the cartographers face as he peers down at his maps. Steady hands hold his tools as he mutters about north, east, up, boulders, rotten logs and an underground river. Oblivious to the world he happily lives in the world of paper, lines and rulers. His hands are very steady as he carefully inks notes on the margins of his latest work.
affectedByFlags: SANCTUARY SPHERE INFRAVISION DODGE INVUL DUAL
mobImmune: FIRE ELECTRIC POISON PUMMEL KICK PUNCH SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DRAIN DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE CLAIR SUMMON HIT BLUDGEON PIERCE SLASH WHIP CLAW BITE STING CRUSH HACK CHOP SLICE BACKSTAB ASSAULT

mobShortDesc: Dorje the map maker sits here shuffling through a stack of dusty papers.
mobLongDesc: The Map Maker is a hunched bespectacled old man, hands cramped with age and arthritis. His white shirt is covered in ink blotches while a flashy pair of red suspenders holds up his worn slacks. A bit absent minded he waves a hand toward the sign hanging from the ceiling.
affectedByFlags: SANCTUARY SPHERE INFRAVISION DODGE INVUL DUAL
mobImmune: FIRE ELECTRIC POISON PUMMEL KICK PUNCH SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DRAIN DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE CLAIR SUMMON HIT BLUDGEON PIERCE SLASH WHIP CLAW BITE STING CRUSH HACK CHOP SLICE BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT

mobShortDesc: Filthy is standing here, eager to serve you a special drink.
mobLongDesc: Filthy looks real, ehm, dirty. He likes to keep his costumers happy, but do not mess with him or else he'll get upset.

mobShortDesc: A waiter, completely encased in platemail, moves slowly about the room.
A waiter who knows where all his costumers has their money.
A robed Acolyte moves about, carefully tending to the needs of all who enter.
mobLongDesc: The Acolyte wears plain white robes which reach to the floor, long sleeves covering even his hands, a simple cowl pulled up over his face shrouds his face in deep shadow. Carefully tending to the patrons of the bar he serves with passion and tenderness everyone who enters.

mobShortDesc: A young initiate in the dark arts waits quietly behind the bar.
mobLongDesc: A young face looks outwards, showing no expression. Simple robes with wide sleeves cover scrawny arms, small hands hidden deep inside. Intricate symbols and designs cover the hems, small light flickering and dancing amongst the patterns.
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST

mobShortDesc: A waiter is going around from one place to another.
mobLongDesc: A tired looking waiter.

mobShortDesc: Saga the bartender looks up with a knowing eye from behind the counter.
mobLongDesc: Twin braids of thick blonde hair cascade over wide shoulders. A small leather corset strains to cover an ample bosom that threatens to escape with every movement. Tight leggings reveal long legs and shapely calves. A large, wicked looking axe hangs over her shoulder, while a massive drinking horn hangs by her hip.

mobShortDesc: The Super Robot is standing here.
mobLongDesc: A funny looking robot, but very tough.

mobShortDesc: A Robot is here guarding the entrance.
mobLongDesc: A funny looking robot.

mobShortDesc: Your Guildmaster is standing here.
mobLongDesc: He is the Guildmaster of Anti-Paladin. From his strong eyes, you notice that he must be a very tough knight.
mobImmune: FIRE ELECTRIC POISON PUMMEL KICK PUNCH SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DRAIN DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE CLAIR SUMMON HIT BLUDGEON PIERCE SLASH WHIP CLAW BITE STING CRUSH HACK CHOP SLICE BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT

mobShortDesc: An Erratic Knight is here guarding the entrance.
mobLongDesc: He is a knight who is irregular in behaviour and likely to do unusual or unexpected things.

mobShortDesc: Your Guildmaster is standing here.
mobLongDesc: He is the Guildmaster of Paladin. From his strong eyes, you notice that he must be a very tough knight.
mobImmune: FIRE ELECTRIC POISON PUMMEL KICK PUNCH SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DRAIN DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE CLAIR SUMMON HIT BLUDGEON PIERCE SLASH WHIP CLAW BITE STING CRUSH HACK CHOP SLICE BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT

mobShortDesc: A Holy Knight is here guarding the entrance.
mobLongDesc: He is the knight with courage, honour, courtesy, and loyalty.

mobShortDesc: Your guildmaster is standing here.
mobLongDesc: He is the person skilled in music. You can learn very good music from him.
mobImmune: FIRE ELECTRIC POISON PUMMEL KICK PUNCH SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DRAIN DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE CLAIR SUMMON HIT BLUDGEON PIERCE SLASH WHIP CLAW BITE STING CRUSH HACK CHOP SLICE BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT

mobShortDesc: A Percussionist is here guarding the guild.
mobLongDesc: He is very good at playing percussion instruments, but he is also very good at fighting.

mobShortDesc: Your guildmaster is standing here.
mobLongDesc: A giant muscleman who is wearing a very beautiful army suit. His past was just killing, he saw corpses more than you saw people.
mobImmune: FIRE ELECTRIC POISON PUMMEL KICK PUNCH SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DRAIN DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE CLAIR SUMMON HIT BLUDGEON PIERCE SLASH WHIP CLAW BITE STING CRUSH HACK CHOP SLICE BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT

mobShortDesc: A commander is standing here guarding the guild.
mobLongDesc: He is the commander of the Commando. This 6 feet height handsome muscleman is now guarding the entrance of the Commando's Guild.

mobShortDesc: A knight is guarding the entrance.
mobLongDesc: He is an expert warrior who has attained knighthood through countless chivalrous deeds.  His duty is to protect the Guild of Swordsmen and his extreme skill combined with his experience in warfare makes him a deadly opponent.

mobShortDesc: An assassin is guarding the entrance.
mobLongDesc: He is a thief who has specialized in killing others as effectively as possible, using all sorts of weapons.  His superior knowledge of how and where to use them combined with his extraordinary stealth makes him a deadly opponent.

mobShortDesc: A Knight from the holy order of the Templars, stands watch over the guild.
mobLongDesc: White scars stand out sharply against the tanned and leather skin of a weather beaten face. Heavy armor hangs from massive shoulders, thick corded muscles support a burnished shield and a hefty mace, dented and scuffed with years of war. The shining emblem of his holy order gleams brightly upon the center of his chest.

mobShortDesc: A bent and gnarled figure dressed in long flowing robes, guards the entrance.
mobLongDesc: Heavy robes brush the floor, wide sleeves hiding wizened hands. A thick beard hangs heavy against mystical symbols and gold chains, waving softly as he walks. Dark eyes peer out from under heavy brows, a careful sparkle lighting winking from inside.
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST

mobShortDesc: Your guildmaster is standing here.
mobLongDesc: This is your master. Big and strong with bulging muscles. Several scars across his body proves that he was using arms before you were born. He has a calm look on his face.
mobImmune: FIRE ELECTRIC POISON PUMMEL KICK PUNCH SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DRAIN DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE CLAIR SUMMON HIT BLUDGEON PIERCE SLASH WHIP CLAW BITE STING CRUSH HACK CHOP SLICE BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT

mobShortDesc: Your guildmaster is standing here.
mobLongDesc: You realize that whenever your guildmaster moves, you fail to notice it - the way of the true thief. She is to be dressed in poor clothing, having the appearance of a beggar.
mobImmune: FIRE ELECTRIC POISON PUMMEL KICK PUNCH SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DRAIN DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE CLAIR SUMMON HIT BLUDGEON PIERCE SLASH WHIP CLAW BITE STING CRUSH HACK CHOP SLICE BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT

mobShortDesc: Head bowed, the Guildmaster of the Clerical order, prays in the rooms center.
mobLongDesc: Peace and calm radiate from the benevolent face of this master of the healing arts. Plain white robes hang from solid, wide shoulders, while a simple cord binds it close at his waist.
mobImmune: FIRE ELECTRIC POISON PUMMEL KICK PUNCH SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DRAIN DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE CLAIR SUMMON HIT BLUDGEON PIERCE SLASH WHIP CLAW BITE STING CRUSH HACK CHOP SLICE BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST
attackTarget: BUFFER BUFFER SELF SELF SELF SELF SELF
attackSpell: holy_word earthquake cure_light dispel_evil blindness cure_critic miracle

mobShortDesc: Your guildmaster is standing here.
mobLongDesc: Even though your guildmaster looks old and tired, you can clearly see the vast amount of knowledge she possesses. She is wearing fine magic clothing, and you notice that she is surrounded by a blue shimmering aura.
mobImmune: FIRE ELECTRIC POISON PUMMEL KICK PUNCH SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DRAIN DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE CLAIR SUMMON HIT BLUDGEON PIERCE SLASH WHIP CLAW BITE STING CRUSH HACK CHOP SLICE BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT

attackTarget: RAN_GROUP BUFFER SELF BUFFER BUFFER BUFFER BUFFER BUFFER BUFFER
attackSpell: fear colour_spray imp_invisibility vampiric_touch death_spray paralyze curse burning_hands lightning_bolt

mobShortDesc: Your guildmaster is standing here.
mobLongDesc: Even though your guildmaster looks old and tired she is still a skilled ninja that can kill you with a single blow.
mobImmune: FIRE ELECTRIC POISON PUMMEL KICK PUNCH SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DRAIN DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE CLAIR SUMMON HIT BLUDGEON PIERCE SLASH WHIP CLAW BITE STING CRUSH HACK CHOP SLICE BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT
attackType: KICK PUMMEL BASH SPELL CAST SPELL CAST

mobShortDesc: A wide shouldered man, wearing a leather jerkin and pants, stands quiet here.
mobLongDesc: This is your master. Big and strong with bulging muscles. Several scars across his body proves that he was using arms before you were born. He is very old and tired. Once upon a time, he was the master of the forest.
mobImmune: FIRE ELECTRIC POISON PUMMEL KICK PUNCH SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DRAIN DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE CLAIR SUMMON HIT BLUDGEON PIERCE SLASH WHIP CLAW BITE STING CRUSH HACK CHOP SLICE BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT

mobShortDesc: A forest walker is guarding the entrance.
mobLongDesc: He is a here protecting his guild.

mobShortDesc: A shadowman is guarding the entrance.
mobLongDesc: He is a here protecting his guild.

mobShortDesc: The Armourer stands here, waiting to help you.
mobLongDesc: An old but very strong armourer, he has made more armours in his lifetime than you have ever seen.

mobShortDesc: The Jeweler of Midgaard stands here, a large grin on his face.
mobLongDesc: This obese and filthy person was chosen by the former Mayor to take care of Midgaard's tradebar business.  His bald head glistens with sweat and the air in here is heavy with the strong, musky odour of his huge body.  His rich clothing leads you to believe his business is thriving.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE DETECT-MAGIC SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY SPHERE INFRAVISION DODGE

mobShortDesc: The Auctioneer is standing here holding an auction board.
mobLongDesc: He looks very old and tired, yet radiates an aura of strength.  His powerful voice echoes through the room.

mobShortDesc: A Sailor stands here, waiting to help you.
mobLongDesc: He looks like a strong, fit sailor.

mobShortDesc: A retired Captain stands here, selling boats.
mobLongDesc: This Captain has eaten more sharks than you have killed peas.

mobShortDesc: A perky blonde receptionist named Hilda stands behind the counter.
mobLongDesc: Long blonde hair drapes casually across a prim, well cut coat and blouse. Bright blue eyes twinkle over small, black rimmed glasses perched low on a petite nose. Small red lips pout prettily in greeting.

mobShortDesc: The Armourer's Apprentice stands here.
mobLongDesc: While young for an armourer, this man has already lived the life of a warrior and is trained in the use of anything he could sell.

mobShortDesc: Thick corded arms heft a mighty hammer over a white hot rod of steel.
mobLongDesc: Sweat rolls down a high sculpted forehead, dripping through thick eyebrows shading deep-set eyes. A thick leather apron covers a formidable chest covered in coarse dark hair. Heavy trousers protect stout legs, while massive hands dwarf the mighty hammer and pair of thick tongs he grasps as he works.

mobShortDesc: Olgga the grocer moves about the store, arranging items on each shelf.
mobLongDesc: Short and compact, her skirt brushes the floor as she walks between the shelves. Two large ponytails rise up from the back of her head, long silky hair shimmers with a glossy brown. Tiny green eyes peer up from beside a button nose that twitches as if it's trying to find some lost scent.

mobShortDesc: A squat woman, triple chins wagging, kneads large mounds of dough.
mobLongDesc: Rolls of fat hang from a thick waist, stiff white apron hanging down like a regimental flag. Deep set eyes peer out from immense cheeks that sag down to a triple chin that waggles ceaselessly. Thick calloused hands are covered in flour and dried bits of dough and frosting. A thick wooden rolling pin hangs from a sling on her wide hips.

mobShortDesc: Tocka the Wizard Wonder shuffles along the counter mumbling quietly.
mobLongDesc: Drab robes covered in moth holes hang limply from his gaunt frame. Once a tall man, his back is stooped from the weight of his tall pointed hat. Gnarled fingers bend and twist forming intricate patterns that no longer have meaning. A small dribble of spittle runs down the side of his chin as he mumbles quietly.

mobShortDesc: The Shopkeeper is here, cleaning the musical instruments.
mobLongDesc: This shopkeeper is a very tough old man.

mobShortDesc: A Club Guard is here guarding the club.
mobLongDesc: He will not let any non-member to get into the club. No matter who you are, he can kill you with a needle.

mobShortDesc: A large bear with dark brown fur hides behind a tree.
mobLongDesc: This is a large, male bear.  It weighs at least 400 kilos and looks very annoyed indeed, which is unusual for brown bears other than mothers with cubs.  The bear is dark brown and very muscular and its paws must be two feet wide.

mobShortDesc: A stocky wolverine pads around clumsily.
mobLongDesc: The wolverine makes up for its relatively modest size by its incredibly powerful build and its bone-crushing bite.  Its fur is very dense to shield the animal from the harsh temperatures of winter.

mobShortDesc: A viper writhes around, looking for prey.
mobLongDesc: This viper is reddish grey with distinct black markings along the whole length of its back.  The adder's broad head contains a large mouth with long, hollow fangs.  At the back of the head there is a characteristic V-shaped marking: V for Viper.

mobShortDesc: A small rodent skips about, hissing at everyone.
mobLongDesc: This tiny rodent runs around madly, hissing at any other creature crossing its path.  Its soft fur is very colourful but ends in only a very short tail.

mobShortDesc: A brown bear trods around in the background.
mobLongDesc: This is a large bear with reddish-brown fur.  This powerful animal is not always carnivorous or aggressive, but when it does hunt for meat it is an awesome sight.

mobShortDesc: A roe deer grazes here.
mobLongDesc: This small species of deer is very graceful.  Its hide is golden red and it grazes on grass and leaves.  The roe deer stays very wary of its surroundings since there are many predators around.

mobShortDesc: A reindeer with impressive antlers walks about eating birch leaves.
mobLongDesc: This animal is brown except on its chest, where it is white. His antlers are impressive considering the modest size of the animal.  The reindeer is plucking birch leaves off a tree, seemingly enjoying every bite.

mobShortDesc: A lynx is sneaking around in the shadows.
mobLongDesc: The lynx is a ferocious animal.  It is a very shy animal and is a very skilled hunter.  It will sneak up on its unsuspecting prey and lunge at them at a terrific pace.  Its large paws allow it to walk on snow with ease.  Lynx are easily distinguishable by their short, stubby tail and characteristic tufts of black hair on their ears.

mobShortDesc: A silvery wolf prones behind some rocks to surprise his dinner for the evening.
mobLongDesc: Under a thick, silvery fur coat, a vicious predator resides. This is a lone, male wolf that has left his old pack behind. The wolf is a young adult, and therefore slender, but also very powerful.

mobShortDesc: A large moose is wandering about.
mobLongDesc: A large, brown coated animal, the moose wanders carelessly about the forest.  This, the biggest of all the animals in this land, has no natural enemies because it can seriously injure or kill any big predator that tries to take it on.

mobShortDesc: A red fox is wandering around shyly in the background.
mobLongDesc: You see a healthy red fox with an amazingly thick tail. The fox is a shy animal, so he tries to keep out of your way.

mobShortDesc: A farmer is walking around here, his back so crooked that his forehead almost touches the ground.
mobLongDesc: You see an old farmer who has worked every single day, all day, since he was 5 years old.  After decade upon decade of hard work, his back is very crooked.  His clothing is made of wool and he is carrying a rusty shovel.

mobShortDesc: A beautiful woman draped in leaves stands here proudly.
mobLongDesc: This beautiful woman stands roughly six feet tall, with beautiful chestnut skin, long red hair, and leaves covering her... but only just.  Her eyes are the blue of a still forest pool, and seem to beckon to you to lay down your arms and rest beneath her tree.
affectedByFlags: SANCTUARY SPHERE PROTECT-EVIL INFRAVISION DODGE PROTECT-GOOD INVUL
mobImmune: FIRE POISON SLEEP BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DISINTEGRATE SUMMON

mobShortDesc: A large, hairy goblin is standing here, glaring about.
mobLongDesc: This creature appears to be a gigantic goblin, with the facial features of a large, somewhat deformed bear.  It seems to move awkwardly, and its dull claws don't look to be good for much other than digging in the dirt.

mobShortDesc: A withered lizard sits here, hissing venomously at you.
mobLongDesc: This dark brown lizard seems on the verge of death. But then, anyone who dares to look at it will probably be joining it shortly. Suffice it to say, it has spines along its back, deep green eyes, and a wicked spiked tail.

mobShortDesc: A writhing pile of vines and garbage is here.
mobLongDesc: This strange creature is thick-skinned and covered in refuse of all sorts.  A large vine stretches from its center, with two squid like eyes and a nose on it.  A gaping maw sits somewhere in what you imagine to be the center of its body, filled with glistening teeth and oozing a sickening sticky saliva.  From either side of its grotesque heap jut long tentacles, with thick and extremely sharp looking thorns embedded in them.  The stench emanating from its bulk is nothing less than soul-shattering.
actionFlags: SENTINEL SCAVENGER ISNPC WIMPY ARM AGGRANDOM

mobShortDesc: An evil demon coalesces from smoke.
mobLongDesc: This is one of the Great Demons of the Prime Evil plane, summoned years ago by the Ogre Sorcerer Eowadriendir to battle beside him against the Storm Giant King Calaphas.  After the battle, however, Xalwithr refused to return to his home plane, and so Eowadriendir was forced to confine him in this pentagon, where he has remained for hundreds of years.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SANCTUARY SPHERE DODGE DUAL FURY
mobImmune: PUMMEL KICK PUNCH DISEMBOWEL SUMMON HIT BLUDGEON PIERCE SLASH WHIP CLAW BITE STING CRUSH HACK CHOP SLICE BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST

mobShortDesc: A starving faun is here, food for once the first thing on his mind.
mobLongDesc: This faun is most definitely starving.  His hair has begun falling out in clumps, his hooves have taken on a sickly hue, and his ribs are showing quite visibly. You have the feeling that even were a nubile nymph to come rushing by, he would hardly make an attempt to frolic.

mobShortDesc: A tiny pixie flutters here, wings broken and battered.
mobLongDesc: This pixie appears to be living her last few moments. Her wings have been wickedly torn and her body has been abused.  Her eyes have a glazed look in them already--perhaps she is imagining the fields where she once flew free.

mobShortDesc: An elven warrior is here, his spirit broken.
mobLongDesc: A once proud elven warrior, this fighter's spirit has been shattered by whatever the ogres have done to him and his fellow prisoners. He wears a sword hilt with a bit of shattered sword about his neck, whether as a remembrance, or as a sign of humiliation, you are unsure.

mobShortDesc: An elven lass sits here, bedraggled and maimed.
mobLongDesc: An elven lass in her middling years is sitting here, lacerations covering her body, her clothing torn and tattered. Her eyes have the look of one who has seen much more than they were ever meant to see.

mobShortDesc: An emaciated girl cowers here, begging for a scrap of bread.
mobLongDesc: A girl of about 14 is here, her ribs poking out through her skin from lack of food.  She whimpers softly, rocking gently back and forth as though waiting to awaken from a horrible dream.

mobShortDesc: A frightened boy is here, whimpering in the corner.
mobLongDesc: A boy of about 16 is here, obviously scared out of his wits.  His eyes dart around frantically, as though expecting a horrible death around every corner.

mobShortDesc: A black creature made up almost entirely of claws struggles against the walls.
mobLongDesc: This creature is an abomination against all that is good and holy in the world--and even much that is evil and sickly. It is the jettest black, seeming to almost ooze darkness from its pores, and is covered in claws, constantly gripping and slashing at the air, the walls, and anything else that might enter its space.
mobImmune: FIRE PUMMEL KICK PUNCH BLINDNESS DISEMBOWEL CLAIR SUMMON PIERCE SLASH WHIP CLAW BITE STING HACK CHOP SLICE BACKSTAB

mobShortDesc: Eowadriendir is here, checking on his wards.
mobLongDesc: Eowadriendir is an immensely ancient Magi of the ogre folk, who has dedicated himself to the pursuit of evil magics for more than three-thousand years.  In that time he has trained many disciples, but has allowed none to reach anything near his skill level before he drained them of their energy and sent them to their deaths. He holds many dark secrets in his heart, and lines of fear and worry crease his face, that someday one of his great mistakes will catch up with him.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE DODGE PROTECT-GOOD IMINV DUAL FURY
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST

mobShortDesc: Anawyn is here, crying softly to herself.
mobLongDesc: This ogre is smaller than those in the village, with almost no tusks, and short little claws. She wears his hair up in a top-knot, and is wearing some strange red scale-mail.
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST

mobShortDesc: Meldur sits here, patiently deciphering an ancient manuscript.
mobLongDesc: This ogre is smaller than those in the village, with almost no tusks, and short little claws. She wears his hair up in a top-knot, and is wearing some strange red scale-mail.
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST

mobShortDesc: Fumbor is here, trying to summon a demon.
mobLongDesc: This ogre is smaller than those in the village, with almost no tusks, and short little claws. He wears his hair up in a top-knot, and is wearing some strange red scale-mail.
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST

mobShortDesc: Celil-Gandil is here, brewing up an evil potion.
mobLongDesc: This ogre is smaller than those in the village, with almost no tusks, and short little claws. He wears his hair up in a top-knot, and is wearing some strange red scale-mail.
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST

mobShortDesc: The ogre chieftain, Erashnak, is here, taking care of business.
mobLongDesc: Erashnak stands almost ten feet tall, towering over even the largest of the other ogres. His two immense incisors are plated in steel and encrusted with blood-red rubies. His enormous mitts are covered by a pair of gleaming gauntlets, engraved with runes from the language of the giants. Despite all his battle trappings, however, he seems to have quite a jovial air about him.
actionFlags: SENTINEL ISNPC STAY-ZONE AGGCL MEMORY AGGGOOD
affectedByFlags: DODGE HIDE PROTECT-GOOD INVUL DUAL FURY

mobShortDesc: Gragor is napping here, snoring so loudly the ground shakes.
mobLongDesc: This ogre's biceps seem to be about the size of most men's torsos, and when he flexes it looks strangely like two carts moving around each other. His body is covered in a pelt so thick it's difficult to tell what color his flesh is, and lice, fleas and larger creatures seem to have set up a permanent residence within. It's hard to say which is more worrying--the eleven inch tusks protruding from his face, or the iron-hard fists the size of small dogs.  Either way, this is not a foe to be underestimated.

mobShortDesc: Vrarg is here, making strange bellowing noises.
mobLongDesc: This ogre's biceps seem to be about the size of most men's torsos, and when he flexes it looks strangely like two carts moving around each other. His body is covered in a pelt so thick it's difficult to tell what color his flesh is, and lice, fleas and larger creatures seem to have set up a permanent residence within. It's hard to say which is more worrying--the eleven inch tusks protruding from his face, or the iron-hard fists the size of small dogs.  Either way, this is not a foe to be underestimated.

mobShortDesc: Gilg is playing a strange game with a stick here.
mobLongDesc: This ogre's biceps seem to be about the size of most men's torsos, and when he flexes it looks strangely like two carts moving around each other. His body is covered in a pelt so thick it's difficult to tell what color his flesh is, and lice, fleas and larger creatures seem to have set up a permanent residence within. It's hard to say which is more worrying--the eleven inch tusks protruding from his face, or the iron-hard fists the size of small dogs.  Either way, this is not a foe to be underestimated.

mobShortDesc: Grigdish is waiting for his mate to get home.
mobLongDesc: This ogre's biceps seem to be about the size of most men's torsos, and when he flexes it looks strangely like two carts moving around each other. His body is covered in a pelt so thick it's difficult to tell what color his flesh is, and lice, fleas and larger creatures seem to have set up a permanent residence within. It's hard to say which is more worrying--the eleven inch tusks protruding from his face, or the iron-hard fists the size of small dogs.  Either way, this is not a foe to be underestimated.

mobShortDesc: Hudush is breaking bones into sharp pieces here.

His body is covered in a pelt so thick it's difficult to tell what color his flesh is, and lice, fleas and larger creatures seem to have set up a permanent residence within. It's hard to say which is more worrying--the eleven inch tusks protruding from his face, or the iron-hard fists the size of small dogs.  Either way, this is not a foe to be underestimated.

mobShortDesc: Pralg is here, withering flowers with his breath.
mobLongDesc: This ogre's biceps seem to be about the size of most men's torsos, and when he flexes it looks strangely like two carts moving around each other. His body is covered in a pelt so thick it's difficult to tell what color his flesh is, and lice, fleas and larger creatures seem to have set up a permanent residence within. It's hard to say which is more worrying--the eleven inch tusks protruding from his face, or the iron-hard fists the size of small dogs.  Either way, this is not a foe to be underestimated.

mobShortDesc: Vunk is here breaking boulders for entertainment.
mobLongDesc: This ogre's biceps seem to be about the size of most men's torsos, and when he flexes it looks strangely like two carts moving around each other. His body is covered in a pelt so thick it's difficult to tell what color his flesh is, and lice, fleas and larger creatures seem to have set up a permanent residence within. It's hard to say which is more worrying--the eleven inch tusks protruding from his face, or the iron-hard fists the size of small dogs.  Either way, this is not a foe to be underestimated.

mobShortDesc: Dubrylla is here, screaming for her children.
mobLongDesc: This ogress means business.  She is big boned and full-fleshed, just the way her mate likes her.  Her skin is covered in a thick, almost silken black fur, and her tusks are decorated with various bits of metal and brands.  She bares herself proudly to the world, wearing not a scrap of clothing, aside from an ornamental belt.

mobShortDesc: Merella is here, sweeping dirt on to her floor.
mobLongDesc: This ogress means business.  She is big boned and full-fleshed, just the way her mate likes her.  Her skin is covered in a thick, almost silken black fur, and her tusks are decorated with various bits of metal and brands.  She bares herself proudly to the world, wearing not a scrap of clothing, aside from an ornamental belt.

mobShortDesc: Seadda bustles about busily preparing a meal.
mobLongDesc: This ogress means business.  She is big boned and full-fleshed, just the way her mate likes her.  Her skin is covered in a thick, almost silken black fur, and her tusks are decorated with various bits of metal and brands.  She bares herself proudly to the world, wearing not a scrap of clothing, aside from an ornamental belt.

mobShortDesc: Jara sits here, combing her hair into more knots.
mobLongDesc: You can only assume this is the kind of lass an ogre male would find incredibly attractive.  Her face is like rotten mush, and the sight of it could probably curdle milk in about three seconds flat.  Her breasts are two mishappen lumps, and her body is covered in oozing wounds that are probably the height of beauty.

mobShortDesc: Nwna stands here, singing in a voice that would put a wyvern to shame.
mobLongDesc: You can only assume this is the kind of lass an ogre male would find incredibly attractive.  Her face is like rotten mush, and the sight of it could probably curdle milk in about three seconds flat.  Her breasts are two misshapen lumps, and her body is covered in oozing wounds that are probably the height of beauty.

mobShortDesc: Sona is here, curdling milk with her visage.
mobLongDesc: You can only assume this is the kind of lass an ogre male would find incredibly attractive.  Her face is like rotten mush, and the sight of it could probably curdle milk in about three seconds flat.  Her breasts are two misshapen lumps, and her body is covered in oozing wounds that are probably the height of beauty.

mobShortDesc: Rink is biting a stick here, waiting for his brother, Runk, to find him.
mobLongDesc: This is a small ogre whelp, just coming into his true nastiness. His body isn't yet completely covered with the thick pelt that will later serve as a home to a virtual ecosystem of lice and mites, and patches of sickly pink skin can be seen.  His tusks seem quite ample, however, and ready to tear into flesh.

mobShortDesc: Runk is moping here, looking for his brother, Rink.
mobLongDesc: This is a small ogre whelp, just coming into his true nastiness. His body isn't yet completely covered with the thick pelt that will later serve as a home to a virtual ecosystem of lice and mites, and patches of sickly pink skin can be seen.  His tusks seem quite ample, however, and ready to tear into flesh.

mobShortDesc: Gorg runs about, frantically screaming and chomping at the air.
mobLongDesc: This is a small ogre whelp, just coming into his true nastiness. His body isn't yet completely covered with the thick pelt that will later serve as a home to a virtual ecosystem of lice and mites, and patches of sickly pink skin can be seen.  His tusks seem quite ample, however, and ready to tear into flesh.

mobShortDesc: Graaa is here, torturing small insects.
mobLongDesc: This is a small ogre whelp, just coming into his true nastiness. His body isn't yet completely covered with the thick pelt that will later serve as a home to a virtual ecosystem of lice and mites, and patches of sickly pink skin can be seen.  His tusks seem quite ample, however, and ready to tear into flesh.

mobShortDesc: Athena, the goddess of war, kneels here in solemn thought.
mobLongDesc: Athena is the goddess of Wisdom and Warfare. She is said to have been born fully dressed and clothed in armor from Zeus' forehead. Athena represents the more intellectual aspects of war, while Ares, the God of War, represents the bloody parts. Athena is one of the more respected of the Gods. She kneels in solemn thought, clutching a small, bland-looking wooden crucifix to her breast as she concentrates on worlds of knowledge.

mobShortDesc: A monstrous octopus whirls about the room, protecting his master.
mobLongDesc: This octopus is far greater than any you have ever known to roam the ocean depths. He was summoned here to protect the Ocean God, Poseidon, from those who would do him harm, you.

mobShortDesc: An enormous stringray whips around the room with venemous fury!
mobLongDesc: This stingray is unlike any that you have ever known to exist. He was summoned here at the behest of the master of the seas, Poseidon, to destroy you and your group.

mobShortDesc: A hideous mountain yeti is here, blocking you from proceeding.
mobLongDesc: You seem to have found the reason that no animals roam on the cliffs and trails of Mount Olympus. One of the reasons, anyway. Zeus set a band of these monstrous Yetis to guard the slopes of the mountain and keep away any mortals that might somehow make it this far. The Yeti is immense, with thick white hair and very pointy teeth. He also looks hungry.

mobShortDesc: Hephaestus, artison of the gods, is here working away in secret.
mobLongDesc: Hephaestus, the god of fire and the forge, is the artisan of the gods and the patron for all metalworkers who strive to duplicate his amazing craftsmanship. Among his great creations are the armor of the great warrior Achilles and the amazing throne upon which Zeus sits. Hephaestus, married to the goddess of beauty and love Aphrodite, appears lame and crippled. He is frequently the butt of the jokes of the Immortals. No one jokes about the quality of his work, however.

mobShortDesc: Artemis is here, fiddling with her mystical bow and arrows.
mobLongDesc: Artemis, who some call Diana, is the daughter of Zeus and the mortal woman Leto and twin brother of Apollo.  She is the goddess of the chase, of hunting, of woodland and wild creatures, and of the moon.  She is prayed to by young maidens and hunters alike. She is both a beauty and a fierce killer. She is most often symbolized by the crescent moon.
mobImmune: PUMMEL KICK PUNCH DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE CLAIR HIT BLUDGEON PIERCE SLASH WHIP CLAW BITE STING CRUSH HACK CHOP SLICE BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT

mobShortDesc: Apollo is here, playing a sweet melody on his lyre.
mobLongDesc: Apollo, also known as Phoebus is the son of Zeus and a mortal woman named Leto and twin brother to Artemis. He was born on the island of Delos and raised as a shepherd and a musician. It is said he can play his lyre so sweetly as to turn all anger away from him and to control mortal minds.  He is a symbol of peace, wisdom and purity. He is the god of the sun and of truth.

mobShortDesc: Ares is here polishing his well used blade.
mobLongDesc: Ares, also knows as Mars, is the God of War. He is the son of Zeus and Hera. Dispicable, murderous and cowardly, Ares is one of the least liked of the Olympian gods.  He doesn't get the respect he feels he deserves so he takes it with his not inconsiderable force.  His sister is Discord and his daughters are the amazons and his sons named Terror and Fear. He is known for his armor, his war dogs and vultures, and his unpredictable nature.
attackType: PUMMEL PUNCH DISARM SPELL CAST SPELL SKILL SPELL SKILL
attackTarget: RAN_ROOM RAN_ROOM RAN_ROOM RAN_ROOM RAN_ROOM RAN_ROOM

mobShortDesc: Poseidon is here watching over all the oceans in the world at once.
mobLongDesc: Poseidon is Zeus' brother and fought alongside him in the battle against the Titans.  Despite Zeus' incredible temper and unstoppable wrath, it is Poseidon who is the least talked about, most worshipped and most feared of all the gods. Poseidon controls all of the waters of the world and all of the creatures who live within them.
affectedByFlags: SANCTUARY SPHERE PROTECT-EVIL DODGE INVUL DUAL

mobShortDesc: Hera is sitting here, lost deep in her own thoughts.
mobLongDesc: Hera is the sister and wife of the King of the Gods, Zeus. She is the god and protector of all women. She is known for having an intense jealous temper toward Zeus' many mistresses. She is known for being very beautiful, dignified, and matronly. According to legend, however, when she gets angry she is capable of doing serious damage.
actionFlags: SENTINEL ISNPC NICE-THIEF AGGRESSIVE MEMORY AGGGOOD AGGLEADER
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST

mobShortDesc: Zeus is here, pondering the life of all humanity.
mobLongDesc: Zeus is the king of all the gods and all the universe. He was born the last son of Chronus, who ate all his previous children. Zeus' mother, Rhea, hid him in a cave so that Chronus couldn't eat him. He grew to be very powerful and rescued his siblings from the pits of Chronus' stomach. He led them in a revolt against Chronus and the Titans, eventually becoming victorious and ruling all from his perch high on Mount Olympus. Zeus is known to all as a tempermental, strong, and vindictive god. He is definitely not to be trifled with.
attackType: SPELL SKILL SPELL SKILL SPELL SKILL SPELL SKILL SPELL SKILL

mobShortDesc: A blank of primal clay stands here, waiting to be shaped
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.

mobShortDesc: A very small and very hostile snake is coiled here.
mobLongDesc: A rather small snake is coiled here, hissing. It sure looks angry! Dont get too close, or it will surely sink its fangs into you.

mobShortDesc: Sssss'tak'sss'tyl, the Serpentine Lord of Murder and Death towers here before you!
mobLongDesc: Sssss'tak'sss'tyl's monolithic form looms before you, and you gaze upward in horror as you realize that you are no bigger than insects to him. Just one of his mighty clawed hands could flatten half of Midgaard. A booming hiss reverberates throughout the cavern as Sssss'tak'sss'tyl rears up to his full height and flexes his titanic muscles. Gazing down at your puny forms a horrible hissing laugh escapes his fanged mouth. You stand awestruck before him, trembling uncontrollably, your mind numb with fear.  `cMY THANKSSSSSSS PUNY ONESSSS. LONG HAS IT BEEN SINCE I'VE TASTED THE FLESH OF MORTALS AND DRANK OF THEIR BLOOD AND FEAR! YOU HAVE MY GRATITUTE, AND YOU SHALL HAVE THE SUPREME HONOR OF DYING BY THE HANDS OF A GOD! PREPARE YOURSELVES FOR OBLIVION!`q'  What have you done releasing this hell spawned horror upon the world? You muster enough sense and courage to draw your weapons and prepare to die fighting.
attackType: CLAW CLAW BITE TRAMPLE TAILSLAM SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST
attackTarget: RAN_GROUP GROUP RAN_GROUP GROUP GROUP GROUP BUFFER GROUP

mobShortDesc: A pitch-black horse of titanic size is here, flames flaring from its nostrils as it paws the ground.
mobLongDesc: The biggest warhorse you have ever seen, rippling with muscle and wearing plate-mail barding of superb craftsmanship. Fire and smoke flare from its nostrils with every breath and it rears up on its hindlegs, lashing out at you in an attempt to crush your head.

mobShortDesc: A giant warrior clad all in black is here, raising his massive blade in a challenge to your party.
mobLongDesc: A giant humanoid figure, clad in black platemail and wielding a mighty battleblade towers here before you. The armor he wears looks ancient and drawn about it is a tattered black cloak. He hefts his massive blade and prepares to do battle.

mobShortDesc: A towering skeletal figure is here, standing guard for eternity in its undead state.
mobLongDesc: A giant six-armed skeletal warrior stands here, the eternally vigilant guardian of this final resting place. It is clad in a giant suit of chainmail and wields some wicked looking polearms, as well as a massive shield of iron. It begins to move the instant you step foot into the chamber, and it is clear that you are not welcome here.

mobShortDesc: A skeletal warrior stands at attention here, guarding this crypt for all eternity.
mobLongDesc: A skeletal warrior stands guard here, armed with a spear and clad in chainmail of fine quality. A battered shield hangs limply from its left arm and upon closer inspection it bears the faded remnants of a coat of arms, one that you have never seen. As you ponder what this means, the undead warrior seems to come to life, like a puppet on a string it shambles towards you.....

mobShortDesc: A large green reptile lies coiled here.
mobLongDesc: Over seven feet long with dull green scales, this reptile lies coiled here, poised to strike at anyone foolish enough to wander close to it.

mobShortDesc: A twisted mass of congealed blood and gore thrashes about here.
mobLongDesc: A gigantic, gore covered, serpentine monstrosity rises up from the pool of blood. Its body is covered with a thick coat of glistening crimson scales. It grins down at you in wicked anticipation, as it flexes its massive, clawed hands and begins to coil, as if to strike. A powerful voice booms inside your skull, and you fear your head will explode from the sheer power of this demons will.  `iHisssss....Your pitiful mortal forms have only served to carry your souls to me. Now I shall devour both, body and soul, and your pathetic existance shall be at an end.`q
attackType: TAILSLAM TRAMPLE CLAW BITE SPELL CAST SPELL CAST
attackTarget: GROUP GROUP RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP GROUP BUFFER

mobShortDesc: A tall woman with scaly green skin meditates here.
mobLongDesc: Tall and slender, with shimmering green skin, Kysss the serpent priestess sits here. Clad only in a loose fitting cloak, she barely seems to notice your intrusion, and sits here motionless in deep meditation. She wields no weapons and wears no armor, perhaps you could slit her throat before she notices you are here?
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST

mobShortDesc: A Giant floating Coil of smoke seems to float here.
mobLongDesc: A giant serpent formed from billowing coils of smoke floats here. It hisses faintly and rears its nearly transparent head as you approach the portal. It clearly does not want you to enter.

mobShortDesc: A strange serpentine figure, seemingly formed of smoke lurks here.
mobLongDesc: A whispy serpent formed out of smoke drifts about here, you can barely make out tiny, glowing red eyes and a gaping mouth with glowing green fangs.

mobShortDesc: A huge green-scaled humanoid is here, wearing a horned crown.
mobLongDesc: Towering a full eighteen feet tall and covered head to toe in thick green scales, this mighty ruler fears nothing. With a flick of his wrist he could kill a mortal man. He snarls and hisses at your intrusion, and prepares to kill you for your arrogance. He snarls 'Come and die! Your soul and blood shall be MINE!'
attackType: CLAW BITE TAILSLAM DISARM SPELL CAST SPELL CAST
attackTarget: RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP GROUP ROOM GROUP ROOM

mobShortDesc: A writhing mass of entwined serpents is here.
mobLongDesc: A huge mass of serpents, all twisted together and slithering about. There are all shapes and sizes of serpent, all entwined together like a single living organism.

mobShortDesc: A massive black serpent coils itself to strike.
mobLongDesc: This is the biggest serpent you have ever seen, easily fourty feet long from head to tail. The massive head seems too large for its body, and it is lined with razor sharp fangs. Despite its massive size, it moves with alarming speed, and despite your small size, it seems intent on eating you. It rears up to strike and lets out a booming 'HISSSSSSSSSSSSSSSS!'

mobShortDesc: A huge green-scaled humanoid lurks here, its gaping maw full of razor sharp fangs.
mobLongDesc: Standing over ten feet in height and covered in a gleaming coat of scales, with a giant maw that is far too big for its body. This demonic creation is a thing to be feared. It grins in wicked anticipation and you see burning venom drip from its six inch fangs. It knows no fear, only hunger, and hatred.
attackType: BITE SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST DISARM SPELL CAST
attackTarget: RAN_GROUP GROUP RAN_GROUP BUFFER RAN_GROUP BUFFER

mobShortDesc: A hideous and misshapen creature writhes in agony here.
mobLongDesc: This beast appears to be non-sentient, but clearly has a keen animal instinct. It has the lower body of a huge serpant, and the torso of a man with a serpentine head, but its arms are made up of dozens of smaller serpents, all lashing about and biting each other in a fury. This creature is clearly in pain, but that does not stop it from wanting to kill and eat you, and it lunges for you, with dozens of hissing serpent heads biting and lashing at you.

mobShortDesc: A huge jet black serpent warrior slowly circles you.
mobLongDesc: Over fourteen feet high and jet black, this mighty serpent warrior has seen more combat then you ever will. Countless numbers of warriors and innocents alike have died at his hands, and in his mind there is no difference, all must die. Perhaps he was banished to this secluded place for his indiscriminate killing, perhaps even the priests could not control his bloodlust. Whatever the reasons for his isolation, he clearly is enraged by your presense.
attackType: SPELL SKILL TAILSLAM PUMMEL CLAW BITE SPELL CAST
attackTarget: RAN_ROOM GROUP BUFFER RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP SELF

mobShortDesc: A ravenous serpent hisses hungrily at you.
mobLongDesc: A huge serpent, well over 20 feet long, lies coiled here. It looks a bit thin, and it must be hungry. That would explain why it is hissing at you and trying to swallow your head.

mobName: A High Priest of the Serpent.
mobShortDesc: A Serpent Priest is here, performing horrfic blood-rites.
mobLongDesc: Standing full well over nine feet tall and rippling with muscle, this priest of the serpent is clearly a capable warrior as well as a high priest of considerable power. He pulls back his hood to reveal his hideous serpentine face, and he licks his lips with his forked tounge. He slowly hisses, and extends his fangs towards you at an almost leisurely pace. Clearly he has no fear of your pitiful band, and in the blink of an eye, he is upon you, fangs and claws ripping into you, and all the while chanting horrible mantras of unspeakable power.
attackType: CLAW SPELL CAST BITE SPELL CAST SPELL SKILL

mobShortDesc: A badly disfigured prisoner is huddled here, barely alive.
mobLongDesc: A wretched prisoner is here with a totally blank expression on his face. He does not acknowledge your presense, nor does he seem capable of speaking. Whatever has happened to him has left him a shadow of his former self. You pity the poor fool, for now his mind does not even know the meaning of freedom. He just sits here, awaiting death.

mobShortDesc: A Serpentman Jailer is here, hissing angrily at you.
mobLongDesc: A tall humanoid with the head of a serpent patrols this area looking for any intruders or escaped prisoners. He hisses angrily when he notices your intrusion and bares his fangs for the attack!

mobShortDesc: Red-Eye, the orcish prisoner stands here gibbering and drooling.
mobLongDesc: Red-Eye, once a proud and mighty champion of the orcish legions, is now nothing more than a half-crazed lunatic.  Clearly he has been driven quite insane since his imprisonment here. He glares at you through blood-shot eyes and snarls something unintelligible. Perhaps he is hungry?

mobShortDesc: Vysss the butcher is here, sharpening his cleaver.
mobLongDesc: Vysss the butcher is a tall muscular serpentman warrior, with hugely sadistic tendancies. His job is to butcher the prisoners when fresh meat is needed, or whenever he feels like it. Countless prisoners have suffered and died most horribly at his clawed hands. He hisses sharply as he senses your presense and licks his massive bloody cleaver in sadistic exhilaration at the thought of new victims.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SANCTUARY DODGE SNEAK PROTECT-GOOD DUAL

mobShortDesc: A Warrior Priest stands here, surrounded by a black aura of power.
mobLongDesc: A short bearded man stands here, his hands resting on a massive hammer. He is clad in pitch black armor, with a blood red emblem of the serpent emblazoned upon his breastplate. As you enter the room he holds up his hand for you to stop and begins to speak, 'I am the master of all you see before you, and I alone wield the power of the serpent. My guardians are strong and fierce, but they are as blades of grass when compared unto me. You have fought well, and now, you will die well, for no one comes here unbidden. No Infidel shall enter my house and live to tell of it! YOUR LIFE IS FORFEIT UNTO ME, AND UPON YOUR DEATH I SHALL FEAST UPON YOUR SOUL!'
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SANCTUARY SPHERE DODGE PROTECT-GOOD DUAL
attackType: DISARM PUMMEL PUNCH KICK SPELL CAST SPELL CAST
attackTarget: RAN_GROUP BUFFER RAN_ROOM ROOM SELF GROUP

mobShortDesc: A mighty Balrog is chained here, its mangled wings beating slowly.
mobLongDesc: A huge red-skinned demonic figure stands here, wreathed in smoke and flames.  The room is barely big enough to contain this hell-spawn, and deep scars in the stone walls attest to this beasts fury. A titanic metal chain runs from a set of iron rings in the wall to a huge spiked collar around the demons neck. It snorts and rises to its full height as it senses your presence and belches forth an acrid cloud of burning sulfur. It glares at you with its burning eyes of hellfire and clenches its fists. It slowly circles towards you beating its wings.  It is then you notice that its wings are torn and mangled and uncapable of flight. You cannot help but wonder who or what could possess such power as to imprison and humiliate such a powerful demon of hell. This does not bode well at all.
attackType: CLAW PUMMEL SPELL CAST SPELL CAST

mobShortDesc: A giant ebon-skinned man with the head of a bull is chained to the wall here.
mobLongDesc: Standing over 9 feet tall and rippling with muscles, a mighty minotaur warrior stands here grumbling under his breath and pawing at the ground with his cloven feet. About his wrists are thick steel shackles and attached to these are massive steel chains that run up the wall and are connected to two iron rings set into the wall. This creature is clearly a prisoner here, although judging from the spattered blood and fragments of bone scattered about that it has not been idle. Suddenly it cries out in a bestial voice, 'COME FOOLS! COME AND DIE! I AM DOOMED, DOOMED TO FIGHT ALL THOSE THAT WOULD STAND AGAINST THE SERPENT! DEATH IS MY ONLY FREEDOM, COME THEN AND FREE ME OR DIE BY MY HAND!'

mobShortDesc: A dark priest is here, chanting the unholy matras.
mobLongDesc: A dark robed figure is here, lost, for the moment, in thought. Slowly he begings chanting, dark and ominous are the words and though you can only guess its meaning, it is clearly evil.  The very sound of it makes your heart skip a beat and your knuckles clench. Suddenly, the chanting stops, and the priest is glaring at you with hostile intent. A wicked smile crosses his face and he reaches out with arms outstretched as if to embrace you.  As he nears you, his face suddenly changes into a mask of rage and hatred and his black forked tongue hangs out of his mouth as he hisses 'DIE INFIDEL!'

mobShortDesc: A Huge Serpent is here, angered by your intrusion.
mobLongDesc: A huge fanged serpent is swimming here, it quickly turns and prepares to eat its next meal, YOU!

mobShortDesc: A large man in black robes is here, awaiting those faithfull to the darkness.
mobLongDesc: A large man stands watch over the sacred pool of the serpent. Here in this fetid pool he annoints the cultists and purges their souls of all goodness. When their hearts are as black as the darkness they serve, then they may pass into the temple of the serpent as true brothers and sisters of darkness.

mobShortDesc: A robed man is here, growling and muttering to himself.
mobLongDesc: A man in dark robes is here, muttering to himself at a frenzied pace. He suddenly stops and twitches violently and begins growling incoherently. A moment later he stands upright and composes himself, throwing back his hood to reveal the wild eyes of a madman. In the blink of an eye he is rushing at you, his eyes blazing with murderous intent.

mobShortDesc: A robed cultist is here, chanting softly.
mobLongDesc: A figure dressed head to toe in pitch black robes is here, chanting in a low voice. You cant make out the words, but you get the distinct impression that this is not a very friendly or even sane individual.

mobShortDesc: A very tall, fat man is here, sipping whiskey and serving drinks.
mobLongDesc: Over six feet tall and nearly as wide, Otto the barkeep is standing here, lauging and joking with the customers.  Every few moments he stops and takes a sip from a rather large glass full of whiskey. He smiles at you and waves you over for a drink.

mobShortDesc: A large grey wolf is here, its eyes burning with hunger.
mobLongDesc: A lean grey wolf paces back and forth before you clearly with the intent to fill its belly with your remains.

mobShortDesc: A petrified skeleton is here seeking to end your life!
mobLongDesc: Covered in cobwebs and dust, this skeleton seems to be made of stone! Either a result of some unknown magics or an ancient curse, you may never know, but it seems clear that it would like nothing more than to end your puny existance.

mobShortDesc: A ferocious looking dog is here growling at you.
mobLongDesc: This pitbull is easily as big as a small horse and it seems to be hungry, whatever you do, do NOT try to pet him.

mobShortDesc: A man dressed in wolfskins is here, with longbow in hand.
mobLongDesc: A tall lean man dressed head to toe in wolfskins is here, scanning the ground for footprints. He holds a longbow at the ready and looks to be quite an expert.

mobShortDesc: A buxom beauty is here dodging drunk patrons and serving beer.
mobLongDesc: A pretty young thing with long blonde hair is serving drinks. She's gracefully dodging some of the more drunken patrons. She winks at you as she passes by, hoisting 3 giant beer steins in each hand.

mobShortDesc: A farmer is here enjoying the local specialty.
mobLongDesc: A mud stained individual is here, enjoying a cold one. From the looks of it, he's had a lot more than just one.

mobShortDesc: A drunken halfling stumbles around the room.
mobLongDesc: This short little fellow is obviously very drunk and in his left hand he clutches a mug of ale that is nearly as big as he is. He takes a gulp and waves to you. He shakes his head as if to clear it and rubs his eyes. He starts to say something, but out comes a gargantuan belch. He laughs to himself and stumbles away from you.

mobShortDesc: A huge smith looms before you, clenching his hammer and glaring at you.
mobLongDesc: A muscle bound Jotun is working here, covered head to toe in soot. He grips a piece of steel in his bare hands and heats it in the forge till it glows white hot, then he begins to pound it with mighty blows from his hammer. He looks up for a moment and glares at you through his bushy red eyebrows and snarls something unintelligible. He then continues his work seeming oblivious to your presence.  If he wasnt over 7 feet tall and so obviously powerful, you might consider giving him a lesson in manners. But you think turning around and leaving with all due haste would be a much better and safer idea.

mobShortDesc: A short fat man stands here wearing a heavily stained apron.
mobLongDesc: A short, rotund man stands here wearing a heavily stained apron. He smells even worse than his workshop and seems to be missing quite a few teeth. He wipes his hands on his apron in a wasted effort to try and clean them, as he reaches out to shake your hand.

mobShortDesc: A blank of primal clay stands here, waiting to be shaped
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.

mobShortDesc: A blank of primal clay stands here, waiting to be shaped
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.

mobShortDesc: A bald headed man wearing grey robes is here.
mobLongDesc: A middle aged man stands here, his head shaven completely bald. The grey robes of a Zen Priest hang loosesly from his wiry frame and he looks friendly enough, but his eyes blaze with an unholy light as he glares up at you. He beings to mutter arcane chants and grins at you, and in the blink of an eye the grin becomes a snarl of rage and he rushes at you!

mobShortDesc: A empty suit of samurai armor stands here, swords bared and ready.
mobLongDesc: A decrepit and battered set of samurai armor stands here, empty and lifeless, yet it holds two tarnished and rusty swords out before it, barring your way. It is completely motionless, yet seems poised to strike, like a coiled serpent. Looking closer, the armor is completely empty, nothing supports it. Clearly powerful magic is at work.

mobShortDesc: A mystical deer-like creature is here, its hooves floating above the ground.
mobLongDesc: With the body of a deer, the tail of a cow, the hooves of a horse, and a head like a cross between a dragon and a horse, the `kKi-Rin`q is truely a strange beast. A shimmering mane of many colors trails down its neck and back, and a single gleaming horn sprouts from its forehead. What impresses you most is how its feet never seem to touch the ground, it seems to float above the ground, and it has no trouble what so ever keeping its balance on this shifting mound of rubble.

mobShortDesc: A massive wooden dummy is mounted here.
mobLongDesc: A exceptionally thick wooden dummy is here, its various wooden limbs bound with thick strips of leather.

mobShortDesc: A stout wooden dummy is mounted here, with wooden arms and legs protruding.
mobLongDesc: A stout wooden dummy, with various wooden appendages protruding from it. It appears to be mounted on a swivel, so that any strike upon its surface will cause it to rotate, and anyone standing close to it would most likely have to dodge its wooden appendages.

mobShortDesc: A woman with a shaven head, donning a grey robe is here.
mobLongDesc: A woman with a shaven head is here, wearing a simple grey monks robe. She bows her head and averts her eyes and continues on her way.

mobShortDesc: A man with a shaven head, wearing a simple grey robe is here.
mobLongDesc: A shaven headed man donning a drab grey novice's robe. He appears lost in thought but smiles as he sees you and bows his head.

mobShortDesc: A blank of primal clay stands here, waiting to be shaped
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.

mobShortDesc: The guardian spirit of elephants shimmers in the air here,
mobLongDesc: The legends speak of the elder elephants, whose wisdom was said to rival the gods. That may have been the reason  for their destruction at their hands, in the years that followed the Godslayer wars.

mobShortDesc: A pale man in rags crouches here, waiting for an opening.
mobLongDesc: Appearing almost alive, the ghoul mimics that which he hates the most.  The eyes are glowing red with hatred for the living and you can see bits of flesh sticking from between his teeth as he flashes a wicked grin in your direction.

mobShortDesc: A wyrd loremaster stands here.
mobLongDesc: The wyrd loremasters are skilled warriors as well as being adept in the use of offensive and healing magic in battle.  The loremasters are the ruling class among the wyrds and the clan warriors and the lesser wyrds obey them without question, even giving up their lives in the process.  A loremaster usually travels with 2-3 clan warriors at his side.

mobShortDesc: A lithe wyrd clan warrior stands here hissing at you.
mobLongDesc: The wyrd clan warriors are trained in the arts of assassination and the use of minor spells.  The wyrd's natural aptitude for killing and their cruelty is said to be comparable only to the pit fiends of the nether hells.  To fall captive to a wyrd hunting party is guaranteed to bring a slow and agonizing death followed by the consumption of the victim.

mobShortDesc: A solitary dark oak grows here.
mobLongDesc: This tree is a carnivorous plant that feeds on the blood of the living. It poses as a harmless tree and waits for victims to pass underneath the branches where it tries to snag them with vines that have the rough shape of nooses.  Also known as a hangman tree, it then chokes the hapless victim to death and stuffs the carcass into it's gaping maw, after which it digests it slowly for days.

mobShortDesc: A frog-like green slaad hops around here.
mobLongDesc: The frog-like race of the slaadi come from the plane of Limbo, where they roam around, seeking to further the means of chaos an anarchy through scheming or random acts of violence.  This particular slaad is of the green servant race, often enslaved by powerful magic-users.

mobShortDesc: The wyrd warmaster stands here growling at you.
mobLongDesc: The lord of the wyrd clan is the most powerful of the adepts of the clan. He commands the wyrd loremasters, who in turn each commands several clan of the clan warriors.  To achieve the rank of warmaster a wyrd must first kill the existing warmaster in a duel.  Not surprisingly, the warmaster's fighting skills are the finest among his clan.

mobShortDesc: Skelos the Mad stands here, his skeletal frame dressed in rags.
mobLongDesc: You see before you the skeletal form of the archmage Skelos the Mad. What remains of his flesh still clings tentatively to his bones here and there, creating a nauseating mixture of crawling maggots, decaying flesh and bones that jut out from underneath. His finely embroidered robes have long since rotted away into tattered rags while his rings and crown cling to their owner's withered frame which no longer properly supports them.  Two bright red lights burn in his hollow sockets and pierce you to the soul as he looks your way.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-ALIGNMENT DETECT-INVISIBLE DETECT-MAGIC SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY SPHERE INFRAVISION

mobShortDesc: A wyrd loremaster stands here.
mobLongDesc: The wyrd loremasters are skilled warriors as well as being adept in the use of offensive and healing magic in battle.  The loremasters are the ruling class among the wyrds and the clan warriors and the lesser wyrds obey them without question, even giving up their lives in the process.  A loremaster usually travels with 2-3 clan warriors at his side.

mobShortDesc: A lithe wyrd clan warrior stands here hissing at you.
mobLongDesc: The wyrd clan warriors are trained in the arts of assassination and the use of minor spells.  The wyrd's natural aptitude for killing and their cruelty is said to be comparable only to the pit fiends of the nether hells.  To fall captive to a wyrd hunting party is guaranteed to bring a slow and agonizing death followed by the consumption of the victim.

mobShortDesc: A swarm of killer bees buzzes angrily in circles here.
mobLongDesc: The killer bees swarm back and forth, occasionally descending upon hapless victims.  Their bites, while individually merely irritating, can cause death if sufficient numbers gather in the swarm.

mobShortDesc: An enraged gorilla lumbers towards you, fangs bared.
mobLongDesc: This 7 foot tall mountain of muscles seems to be upset by somthing and perfectly willing to take it out on you.  It's razor-sharp canines glisten with saliva and it's mouth foams with froth.

mobShortDesc: A large, drooling rabbit stands here, holding a strangely glowing egg.
mobLongDesc: A rabbit stands here holding a colorful egg.  This rabbit doesn't seem to be the kind of rabbit that should be trusted with an egg.  Perhaps you should kill him and relieve him of the burden...

mobShortDesc: A dangerous black rabbit stands here holding a stolen egg.
mobLongDesc: A rabbit stands here holding a colorful egg.  This rabbit doesn't seem to be the kind of rabbit that should be trusted with an egg.  Perhaps you should kill him and relieve him of the burden...

mobShortDesc: A red rabbit stands here holding an Easter Egg flexing his muscles as you approach.
mobLongDesc: A rabbit stands here holding a colorful egg.  This rabbit doesn't seem to be the kind of rabbit that should be trusted with an egg.  Perhaps you should kill him and relieve him of the burden...

mobShortDesc: A rabbit stands here holding a stolen, though still colorful egg.
mobLongDesc: A rabbit stands here holding a colorful egg.  This rabbit doesn't seem to be the kind of rabbit that should be trusted with an egg.  Perhaps you should kill him and relieve him of the burden...

mobShortDesc: A large pumpkin floats here.
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.

mobShortDesc: A menacing dragon whelp skulks through the red, white and blue balls.
mobLongDesc: A strange dragon from a netherworld of circuses and fun, this fiend appears bored by the mundane realm he finds himself in.

mobShortDesc: A loathsome eagle squawks loudly, then burps and vomits onto its wings.
mobLongDesc: This crazed denizen from another realm has brought terror and destruction to the tranquil domain of Ronin. A horrifying daemon driven by hatred, fear and beer. Its eyes appear to have strange red, white and blue glyphs instead of pupils. The disdain with which this creature treats other beings exemplifies its wicked arrogance.

mobShortDesc: A crimson red statue looms, hell bent on enslaving all of Midgaard.
mobLongDesc: This crazed denizen from another realm has brought terror and destruction to the tranquil domain of Ronin. A horrifying daemon driven by hatred, fear and beer. Its eyes appear to have strange red, white and blue glyphs instead of pupils. The disdain with which this creature treats other beings exemplifies its wicked arrogance.
mobImmune: PIERCE SLASH SLICE BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT
attackType: SPELL SKILL SPELL SKILL SPELL SKILL SPELL SKILL SPELL SKILL SPELL SKILL
attackTarget: SELF GROUP GROUP RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP

mobShortDesc: A patriot screams about the communist uprising happening around him.
mobLongDesc: This crazed denizen from another realm has brought terror and destruction to the tranquil domain of Ronin. A horrifying daemon driven by hatred, fear and beer. Its eyes appear to have strange red, white and blue glyphs instead of pupils. The disdain with which this creature treats other beings exemplifies its wicked arrogance.

mobShortDesc: A snooty mountie lectures on draconian rules while looking for his horse.
mobLongDesc: This once calm, kind creature has been driven mad by the free reign it was granted in its kingdom. Easy access to contraband, booze and medicine has left it as but a shell: its insides worn to dust and ooze by a reckless lifestyle. A large maple leaf brand upon its back identifies it as a daemon from Canadia, the most feared realm by Midgaardians.
attackType: SPELL SKILL PUMMEL PUNCH SPELL SKILL

mobShortDesc: A tortured hockey fan screams obscenities and curses the Red Wings.
mobLongDesc: This once calm, kind creature has been driven mad by the free reign it was granted in its kingdom. Easy access to contraband, booze and medicine has left it as but a shell: its insides worn to dust and ooze by a reckless lifestyle. A large maple leaf brand upon its back identifies it as a daemon from Canadia, the most feared realm by Midgaardians.

mobShortDesc: A friendly country bumpkin smiles welcomely as you approach.
mobLongDesc: This friendly farmer smiles pleasantly with a subdued look upon his face. Recent global concern about the future of our world have filled his otherwise empty pockets. Midgaard's own Trade Commision recently invested heavily in alternative fibers and vitamin sources. As com- prehension dawns on a visitor's face at the recognition of the sudden turn of events for this country bumpkin, he spreads a cheshire grin and offers a pipe.
