mobShortDesc: A mob for testing is here, waiting to be tested.
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.

mobShortDesc: A leprechaun is here, gazing at a shamrock held in its tiny hand.
mobLongDesc: A wicked grin on the wrinkled face of this ne'er-do-well bespeaks ill intentions. The leprechauns enjoy practical jokes and hijinx, any mischief that complicates the lives of the foolish big people.
affectedByFlags: INVISIBLE SANCTUARY SPHERE PROTECT-EVIL SNEAK PROTECT-GOOD DUAL
mobImmune: PUMMEL SLEEP CLAIR SUMMON HIT BLUDGEON WHIP CRUSH
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST
attackTarget: SELF SELF RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP
attackSpell: teleport miracle teleport disenchant imp_invisibility miracle

mobShortDesc: A turkey of mystical origins is here, gobbling meditatively.
mobLongDesc: This breed of mystical turkey gurus was long since thought extinct. Decades of over-hunting for the fall harvest feasts changed the once common bird to a rarity only the most dedi- cated ornithologists could glimpse on occasion. Now, having gathered their strength in numbers for ages and plotting their triumphant return they have exploded like a plague across the land, gobbling meditatively and sowing the seeds of destruction in every city and village.
affectedByFlags: INVISIBLE SANCTUARY PROTECT-EVIL SNEAK PROTECT-GOOD DUAL
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST

mobShortDesc: An old reindeer is here, an escapee from Santa's despotic stables.
mobLongDesc: This reindeer is clearly past its prime, only a cruel tyrant would force it to continue the back-breaking task of pulling a giant sleigh.

mobShortDesc: A nervous elf is here, attempting to hide from Santa.
mobLongDesc: A slave under the despotic rule of Santa Claus for an eternity, this poor little elf is a desperate soul. Forced to work in the toy factory since his elvish birth centuries ago, it knows only the hard life of manual labor.

mobShortDesc: A plump, surly, white-bearded man is here grumbling to himself.
mobLongDesc: The centuries spent in the cold north have turned Santa's heart to ice. Now a brutal taskmaster of the elvish toymakers and repeat offender for reindeer abuse, he has completely lost touch with the joy and merriment of Christmas.

mobShortDesc: The dark form of a Zyca Necromancer lurks here.
mobLongDesc: invalid
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY SPHERE INFRAVISION DODGE IMINV
mobImmune: FIRE ELECTRIC POISON SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DRAIN DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE SUMMON BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT
attackType: SPELL SKILL SPELL SKILL SPELL SKILL SPELL SKILL SPELL SKILL

mobShortDesc: Prince Ulrich, The Emperor's Heir stands here.
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it. The Necromancer's are the Zyca King's latest recruits.  Their unholy ties with the infernal powers grants them the power to raise the dead to serve their master.

mobName: the Commander of the Zyca Skyknights
mobShortDesc: The Commander of the Zyca Skyknights is here
mobLongDesc: The Commander of the Skyknights is chosen from one of the King's sons. He carries a sceptre of power and wears the finest steel armor enchanted to ward him against blows.

mobName: the Captain of the Zyca Skyknights
mobShortDesc: The Captain of the Zyca Skyknights is here
mobLongDesc: The Captain of the Skyknights must be a member of the Royal family and must show outstanding skill with weapons to be chosen.  He wears a crown that indicates his noble heritage.

mobShortDesc: A noble Zyca Skyknight is here
mobLongDesc: The Skyknights wear beatufully plumed steel helmets and golden capes.  They are the elite of the regular Zyca Army, chosen from the best cavalry officers. Their steel-tipped lances are much feared throughout the realm and they are noted for showing no mercy in battle.

mobShortDesc: Santa Clause stands here, calm smile filling the room with warmth.
mobLongDesc: Massive tummy jiggling and shaking, Santa fills his red coat to the bursting point. Small red stains ruin the perfect white of the cuffs and lining, the only evidence of the massive battle raging outside.
mobImmune: FIRE ELECTRIC POISON PUMMEL KICK PUNCH SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DRAIN DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE CLAIR SUMMON HIT BLUDGEON PIERCE SLASH WHIP CLAW BITE STING CRUSH HACK CHOP SLICE BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT

mobShortDesc: An elf crouches here, clad in black latex and sunglasses, he is ready to fight.
mobLongDesc: Hands at the ready, this elf is Santa's personal bodyguard. Ready and able to fight, he assumes everything and everyone is a threat to the big man's time table.
mobImmune: FIRE ELECTRIC KICK SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DRAIN DISINTEGRATE SUMMON WHIP CLAW STING ASSAULT
attackType: SPELL CAST PUMMEL BASH DISARM PUNCH BASH
attackTarget: RAN_ROOM RAN_ROOM RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP

mobShortDesc: A gaily wrapped present sits here, one corner leaking small amounts of fluid.
mobLongDesc: Looking inside the present reveals a horrifying swirl of elf bones, meat and fecal matter. One eye floats up amidst the mess, staring upwards wildly. The stench rising from within makes you want to scream!
mobImmune: FIRE ELECTRIC POISON PUMMEL SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DRAIN DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE CLAIR SUMMON CLAW BITE STING BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT
attackType: TRAMPLE DISARM SPELL CAST SPELL CAST

mobShortDesc: A reindeer paws the ground, an elf impaled and wriggling on his antlers.
mobLongDesc: Blood drips down his antlers, thick fur matted and clotted, his eyes rolling wildly in his head. Hot breath creates clouds of moisture in the air, sharpened teeth showing between his lips. Pawing the ground he looks to be trying to impale something on his remaining antler.
actionFlags: SENTINEL ISNPC AGGRESSIVE MEMORY FLY SHIELD
mobImmune: FIRE ELECTRIC POISON PUMMEL SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DISINTEGRATE CLAIR SUMMON WHIP CLAW BITE STING BACKSTAB ASSAULT

mobShortDesc: An elf worker stands here, completely encased in armor made from wrapping paper.
mobLongDesc: Tiny papercuts line his face and hands from long hours wrapping presents. Red spittle drips from his lips onto the paper armor he wears, causing it to buckle and warp.
mobImmune: POISON PUMMEL PUNCH SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DRAIN DISINTEGRATE WHIP CLAW AMBUSH

mobShortDesc: An elf toy maker stands here, eyes rolling wildly, foam dripping from his mouth.
mobLongDesc: Thick calouses cover his hands from gripping tools day after day making toys. A slight whiff of something stronger then rum comes from his breath, as little globs of spittle fly from his mouth.
mobImmune: FIRE POISON KICK SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS DRAIN DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE CLAIR SUMMON BLUDGEON BACKSTAB
attackType: BITE DISARM SPELL CAST SPELL CAST

mobLongDesc: Wielding the torn and bleeding legs of Rudolph, Mrs. Clause drools slowly from her mouth while her eyes roll wildly in her head. All semblence of sanity has left her as she charges forward wildly.

mobLongDesc: The King's Knight is a loyal servant of the king.  He will serve his Liege until death.  The King does not want Humpty Dumpty back together again and if you intend to try, you must go through this brave knight.

mobShortDesc: An Enormous two headed mutated Turkey is walking around, looking for something to EAT.
mobLongDesc: This ugly monster has 2 head, and is BIG! Bigger than your self.. when you look close you see that the turkey has a tattoo: I gonna Eat LEMON!

mobShortDesc: A big Turkey is jumping around here saying "Gobble Gobble Eat Lemon Gobble Gobble"
mobLongDesc: Gooble Gooble Gobble Gobble, thats all you notice when look upon this wierd looking monster!! Gobble?

mobShortDesc: A Sith Lord stands here infused with the power of the force.
mobLongDesc: Purest evil stands before you. Bathed in the power of the force, lightning radiating from his outstretched hands, you know that death walks the land. No other can promise oblivion as does the Sith Lord.
affectedByFlags: INVISIBLE DETECT-INVISIBLE SANCTUARY INFRAVISION DODGE INVUL DUAL

mobShortDesc: A figure swathed in black stands here.
mobLongDesc: A figure of total darkness stands before you. Robed head to toe in black, you can feel the hatred radiating in waves towards you. You glimpse red and black whorles completely covering the hood shrouded face that gazes back at you.

mobShortDesc: Beastly Fido is here.
mobLongDesc: Fido is a small dog that has a foul smell and pieces of rotted meat hanging around his teeth.

mobShortDesc: A figure swathed in black stands here.
mobLongDesc: A figure of total darkness stands before you. Robed head to toe in black, you can feel the hatred radiating in waves towards you. You glimpse red and black whorles completely covering the hood shrouded face that gazes back at you.

mobShortDesc: A trooper of the Imperial Fleet stands here.
mobLongDesc: A trooper of the Imperial Fleet stands before you. Encased in white body armor, his snow white cape swirls around him. He is unwavering in his duty and a deadly foe.

mobShortDesc: A guard of the Imperial Fleet stands here.
mobLongDesc: A guard of the Imperial Fleet stands before you. Encased in red body armor, his blood red cape swirls around him. He is unwavering in his duty and deadly to behold.

mobShortDesc: A figure swathed in black stands here.
mobLongDesc: A figure of total darkness stands before you. Robed head to toe in black, you can feel the hatred radiating in waves towards you. You glimpse red and black whorles completely covering the hood shrouded face that gazes back at you.

mobShortDesc: Mr. Bigglesworth is here, waiting for Doctor Evil.
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.

mobShortDesc: A Guard is here, looking for Austin Powers.
mobLongDesc: Here is one of Doctor Evil's lackeys, trained to serve.  His only weaknesses are truely beautiful women and a lack of brain power.

mobShortDesc: Doctor Evil is here, being eeeeeeevil.
mobLongDesc: Before you stands a bald, very evil man.  He had a bad childhood, but that is no exuse for his misdeeds.  He is wearing an obsurd looking ring on his right hand.

mobShortDesc: A Fembot is here, trying to woo you with her beauty.
mobLongDesc: She is a truely beautiful thing. She may be a robot, but she looks like a full fledged goddess. Her breats and thighs are rounded and shaped, and made of steel. You are not sure you have the will power to destroy such a beatiful thing.
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST

mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.

mobShortDesc: Jason is walking slowly after you, gripping his machete coldly.
mobLongDesc: Jason is wearing a lovely plastic white hockey mask with maggots squirming underneath and a trendy dirty coverall. To compliment his outfit he accessorizes with a rusty machete.

mobShortDesc: A teen who has seen Jason nearby runs in frenzied panic.
mobLongDesc: This teen is wearing very trendy clothes and appears to have been at some sort of party when Jason struck. They don't even register your prescence, just continue running in circles screaming bloody murder.

mobLongDesc: A very big, strong, helpful, trustworthy guard. Something about him seems less trustworthy then the others tho...

mobShortDesc: A cityguard is here, guarding the gate.

mobShortDesc: A cityguard stands here.
mobLongDesc: A big, strong, helpful, trustworthy guard. or so it would appear...

mobShortDesc: A singing, happy Drunk.
mobLongDesc: A drunk who seems to be too happy, and to carry too much money. In between his hiccups he glances around himself knowingly.

mobShortDesc: A Mercenary waiting for a job.

mobShortDesc: A janitor is walking around, cleaning up.

mobShortDesc: A devious looking cupid seems to be plotting your demise.
mobLongDesc: This cupid looks like the normal ones but is somehow...darker..

mobShortDesc: A wandering gypsy is here offering up some helpful(?) potions.
mobLongDesc: This aging nomadic gypsy looks just kind enough to be helpful to you... and at the same time just clever enough to rip you off.

mobShortDesc: The Mayor of Midgaard stands here proudly surveying his surroundings.
mobLongDesc: This stunt double of the mayor is a newrly perfect likeness. Only upon close inspection can you see the glue under the facial hair..

mobShortDesc: The Mayor of Midgaard stands here surveying his surroundings proudly.
mobLongDesc: This stunt double of the mayor is a nearly flawless likeness. Only upon close inspection can you notice that the facial hair is glued on..

mobLongDesc: invalid

mobShortDesc: Prince Ulrich, The Emperor's Heir stands here.
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it. The Necromancer's are the Zyca King's latest recruits.  Their unholy ties with the infernal powers grants them the power to raise the dead to serve their master.

mobName: the Commander of the Zyca Skyknights
mobShortDesc: The Commander of the Zyca Skyknights is here
mobLongDesc: The Commander of the Skyknights is chosen from one of the King's sons. He carries a sceptre of power and wears the finest steel armor enchanted to ward him against blows.

mobName: the Captain of the Zyca Skyknights
mobShortDesc: The Captain of the Zyca Skyknights is here
mobLongDesc: The Captain of the Skyknights must be a member of the Royal family and must show outstanding skill with weapons to be chosen.  He wears a crown that indicates his noble heritage.

mobShortDesc: A noble Zyca Skyknight is here
mobLongDesc: The Skyknights wear beatufully plumed steel helmets and golden capes.  They are the elite of the regular Zyca Army, chosen from the best cavalry officers. Their steel-tipped lances are much feared throughout the realm and they are noted for showing no mercy in battle.

mobShortDesc: A menacing dragon whelp skulks through the red, white and blue balls.
mobLongDesc: A strange dragon from a netherworld of circuses and fun, this fiend appears bored by the mundane realm he finds himself in.

mobShortDesc: A loathsome eagle squawks loudly, then burps and vomits onto its wings.
mobLongDesc: This crazed denizen from another realm has brought terror and destruction to the tranquil domain of Ronin. A horrifying daemon driven by hatred, fear and beer. Its eyes appear to have strange red, white and blue glyphs instead of pupils. The disdain with which this creature treats other beings exemplifies its wicked arrogance.

mobShortDesc: A crimson red statue looms, hell bent on enslaving all of Midgaard.
mobLongDesc: This crazed denizen from another realm has brought terror and destruction to the tranquil domain of Ronin. A horrifying daemon driven by hatred, fear and beer. Its eyes appear to have strange red, white and blue glyphs instead of pupils. The disdain with which this creature treats other beings exemplifies its wicked arrogance.

mobShortDesc: A patriot screams about the communist uprising happening around him.
mobLongDesc: This crazed denizen from another realm has brought terror and destruction to the tranquil domain of Ronin. A horrifying daemon driven by hatred, fear and beer. Its eyes appear to have strange red, white and blue glyphs instead of pupils. The disdain with which this creature treats other beings exemplifies its wicked arrogance.

mobShortDesc: A snooty mountie lectures on draconian rules while looking for his horse.
mobLongDesc: This once calm, kind creature has been driven mad by the free reign it was granted in its kingdom. Easy access to contraband, booze and medicine has left it as but a shell: its insides worn to dust and ooze by a reckless lifestyle. A large maple leaf brand upon its back identifies it as a daemon from Canadia, the most feared realm by Midgaardians.
attackType: SPELL SKILL PUMMEL PUNCH SPELL SKILL

mobShortDesc: A friendly country bumpkin smiles welcomely as you approach.
mobLongDesc: This friendly farmer smiles pleasantly with a subdued look upon his face. Recent global concern about the future of our world have filled his otherwise empty pockets. Midgaard's own Trade Commision recently invested heavily in alternative fibers and vitamin sources. As com- prehension dawns on a visitor's face at the recognition of the sudden turn of events for this country bumpkin, he spreads a cheshire grin and offers a pipe.

As com- prehension dawns on a visitor's face at the recognition of the sudden turn of events for this country bumpkin, he spreads a cheshire grin and offers a pipe.

mobLongDesc: This friendly farmer smiles pleasantly with a subdued look upon his face. Recent global concern about the future of our world have filled his otherwise empty pockets. Midgaard's own Trade Commision recently invested heavily in alternative fibers and vitamin sources. As com- prehension dawns on a visitor's face at the recognition of the sudden turn of events for this country bumpkin, he spreads a cheshire grin and offers a pipe.

mobShortDesc: A mob for testing is here, waiting to be tested.
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.

mobShortDesc: A leprechaun is here, gazing at a shamrock held in its tiny hand.
mobLongDesc: A wicked grin on the wrinkled face of this ne'er-do-well bespeaks ill intentions. The leprechauns enjoy practical jokes and hijinx, any mischief that complicates the lives of the foolish big people.
affectedByFlags: INVISIBLE SANCTUARY SPHERE PROTECT-EVIL SNEAK PROTECT-GOOD DUAL
mobImmune: PUMMEL SLEEP CLAIR SUMMON HIT BLUDGEON WHIP CRUSH
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST
attackTarget: SELF SELF RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP
attackSpell: teleport miracle teleport disenchant imp_invisibility miracle

mobShortDesc: A turkey of mystical origins is here, gobbling meditatively.
mobLongDesc: This breed of mystical turkey gurus was long since thought extinct. Decades of over-hunting for the fall harvest feasts changed the once common bird to a rarity only the most dedi- cated ornithologists could glimpse on occasion. Now, having gathered their strength in numbers for ages and plotting their triumphant return they have exploded like a plague across the land, gobbling meditatively and sowing the seeds of destruction in every city and village.
affectedByFlags: INVISIBLE SANCTUARY PROTECT-EVIL SNEAK PROTECT-GOOD DUAL
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST

mobShortDesc: An old reindeer is here, an escapee from Santa's despotic stables.
mobLongDesc: This reindeer is clearly past its prime, only a cruel tyrant would force it to continue the back-breaking task of pulling a giant sleigh.

mobShortDesc: A nervous elf is here, attempting to hide from Santa.
mobLongDesc: A slave under the despotic rule of Santa Claus for an eternity, this poor little elf is a desperate soul. Forced to work in the toy factory since his elvish birth centuries ago, it knows only the hard life of manual labor.

mobShortDesc: A plump, surly, white-bearded man is here grumbling to himself.
mobLongDesc: The centuries spent in the cold north have turned Santa's heart to ice. Now a brutal taskmaster of the elvish toymakers and repeat offender for reindeer abuse, he has completely lost touch with the joy and merriment of Christmas.

mobShortDesc: A large crocodile standing on its hind legs is guarding here.
mobLongDesc: You see a large green scaly human with a crocodile head, jaw, arms, and tail. You can sense no emotion in his glassy eyes. But a chill of fear runs through you as you peer into them.
actionFlags: SPEC SENTINEL ISNPC STAY-ZONE AGGTH AGGAP

mobShortDesc: Relaidan, Raid Organizer is here, making some sort of deal.
mobLongDesc: You see a young quickling who holds a strong pride where the other quicklings hold arrogance. When you look into his eyes you see no evil or remorse.

mobShortDesc: An incredibly large humanoid with a crocodiles head towers before you.
mobLongDesc: You see a Colossal were-crocodile with a scaly body, and human arms. When you attempt to gather some facial expression from his oddly humanesque head, the only thing you can pick up is benevolence about your death.

mobShortDesc: An unclothed skiddish human is here, cowering away from you.
mobLongDesc: A very rugged man stands before you. He is completely naked and appears to have had very little contact with human society. He responds to your presence with fear and surprise.

mobShortDesc: A large green crocodile is crawling on the ground here.
mobLongDesc: You see a large scaly, green crocodile. It appears to be a normal crocodile, but when you look into its eyes there is an uncanny familiarity about them.

mobShortDesc: A large green creature is hunched over in the dark.
mobLongDesc: You see a large crocodile standing on two legs with the arms of a human. He has sharp claws and a large jaw, you don't feel getting near him is a wise idea.

mobShortDesc: A Quickling Archer is here, on the lookout for unwanted visitors.
mobLongDesc: You see a young quickling. He appears to be smaller than the rest and was most likely left behind because they didn't want to risk taking him on raids. He mumbles something about wanting a country bumpkin of his own.

mobShortDesc: Tephonal, Son of the Late King Tephanis is here, organizing the raids.
mobLongDesc: You see a large Quickling with deep blue eyes. He looks so gentle you can't help but suspect he was the one who took his father's life.

mobShortDesc: One of the Quickling's Slaves is being forced to work here.
mobLongDesc: This country bumpkin has been worked quite a bit, with little opportunity to snore noisily. When it sees you it cries out, "Please, rescue me! Take me back to my smial!"

mobShortDesc: A Quickling Commoner is here, resting between raids.
mobLongDesc: You see a young quickling with a arrogant air about her. Even the simplest of her motions is executed with a remarkable speed which you can only pray she doesn't have the skill to put to great advantage in combat.

mobShortDesc: A Quickling Commoner is here, resting between raids.
mobLongDesc: You see a young quickling with a arrogant air about him. Even the simplest of his motions is executed with remarkable speed and you can only pray he doesn't have the skill to use it to great advantage in combat.

mobShortDesc: A Quickling Commoner is here, resting between raids.
mobLongDesc: You see a young quickling with a arrogant air about her. Even the simplest of her motions is executed with a remarkable speed which you can only pray she doesn't have the skill to put to great advantage in combat.

mobShortDesc: A Quickling Commoner is here, resting between raids.
mobLongDesc: You see a young quickling with a arrogant air about him. Even the simplest of his motions is executed with remarkable speed and you can only pray he doesn't have the skill to use it to great advantage in combat.
