mobLongDesc: You see a young quickling with a arrogant air about her. Even the simplest of her motions is executed with a remarkable speed which you can only pray she doesn't have the skill to put to great advantage in combat.

mobShortDesc: A Quickling Commoner is here, resting between raids.
mobLongDesc: You see a young quickling with a arrogant air about him. Even the simplest of his motions is executed with remarkable speed and you can only pray he doesn't have the skill to use it to great advantage in combat.

mobShortDesc: A Quickling Commoner is here, resting between raids.
mobLongDesc: You see a young quickling with a arrogant air about her. Even the simplest of her motions is executed with a remarkable speed which you can only pray she doesn't have the skill to put to great advantage in combat.

mobShortDesc: A Quickling Commoner is here, resting between raids.
mobLongDesc: You see a young quickling with a arrogant air about him. Even the simplest of his motions is executed with  a remarkable speed which you can only pray he doesn't have the skill to put to great advantage in combat.

mobShortDesc: A Quickling Commoner is here, resting between raids.
mobLongDesc: You see a young quickling with a arrogant air about her. Even the simplest of her motions is executed with a remarkable speed which you can only pray she doesn't have the skill to put to great advantage in combat.

mobShortDesc: A Quickling Commoner is here, resting between raids.
mobLongDesc: You see a young quickling with a arrogant air about him. Even the simplest of his motions is executed with  a remarkable speed which you can only pray he doesn't have the skill to put to great advantage in combat.

mobShortDesc: An Ancient Red Dragon flies around in rage.
mobLongDesc: Poets have tried to capture the beauty and majesty of the ancient horn-nosed red dragon but none have lived long enough in its presence to record even one stanza of the epic this creature deserves.  A long triumphant and feathery frill runs the length of the tail and neck, framed by the metre long horns jutting prominently from atop its head.  Its enormous smooth red wings, tipped with a single vicious talon, cast a dreadful shadow as it lopes through the air.  The elegant movement of the thick scales which sheath the dragon's heart serve as inspiration for Welmar's royal blacksmith's scaled armours.  Behind the unsettling horny features of its head lies a mouth of even more frightening teeth and a mind cleverer than even a sphinx.
mobImmune: FIRE PUMMEL KICK PUNCH CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DISINTEGRATE SUMMON

mobShortDesc: An Elder Red Dragon flies around here.
mobLongDesc: With its wings spread in flight, this elder red dragon is an awesome sight to behold.  The ruggedness of the scales and the odd scar on its skin and wings shows that this dragon has seen many battles.  The dragons majestic presence is ominous as it navigates its lair with grace and confidence.  A burning glow of crimson pierces your eyes as the dragon opens its mouth and expels its inner fire.
mobImmune: FIRE PUMMEL KICK PUNCH CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DISINTEGRATE CLAIR SUMMON

mobShortDesc: An Elder Red Dragon is flying around here.
mobLongDesc: With its wings spread in flight, this elder red dragon is an awesome sight to behold.  The scales covering its huge body sparkle and gleam in the cave's fiery light.  The long, strong tail steers the powerful creature through the heights of the tall cavern.  Streams of fire spew forth from the large mouth, adding to the heat and intensity of the cave.
mobImmune: FIRE PUMMEL KICK PUNCH CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DISINTEGRATE SUMMON

mobShortDesc: An adult red dragon lies coiled up against the granite wall.
mobLongDesc: The adult red dragon emits an inner heat in this otherwise cold chamber. It is covered in scales and two curved horns adorn its head. Its wings are tipped with razor-sharp talons and from the horny nose, to the tip of its powerful tail, this tremendous creature's presence is ominous.
mobImmune: FIRE PUMMEL KICK PUNCH CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DISINTEGRATE SUMMON

mobShortDesc: An adult red dragon flies around here.
mobLongDesc: The adult red dragon's scales gleam in the crimson rays of light in the chamber.  Its wings are tipped with razor-sharp talons and two curved horns adorn its head.  From the horny nose, to the tip of its powerful tail, this tremendous creature's presence is ominous.
mobImmune: FIRE PUMMEL KICK PUNCH CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DISINTEGRATE SUMMON

mobShortDesc: A young red dragon lies on the ground, coiled up against the wall.
mobLongDesc: The young red dragon's scales gleam in the crimson rays of light in the chamber.  Its wings are tipped with razor-sharp talons and two curved horns adorn its head.  From the horny nose, to the tip of its powerful tail, this tremendous creature's presence is ominous.
mobImmune: FIRE PUMMEL KICK PUNCH CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DISINTEGRATE SUMMON

mobShortDesc: The Innkeeper stands here awaiting your order.
mobLongDesc: The Innkeeper is a jolly old halfling who spends his days eavesdropping on local gossip.  In his younger days, he was quite a seasoned traveler.

mobShortDesc: A country bumpkin dreams of pipeweed and its many uses.
mobLongDesc: The country bumpkin snores noisily.

mobShortDesc: A chic urbanite sits here, enjoying his class status.
mobLongDesc: The urbanite seems very much at home in his surroundings.  His clothes are all of the latest fashions and his manners impeccable.  He offers you some coins if you'd be so good as to order a drink for him.

mobShortDesc: A trainee screams a death cry as he delivers the fatal blow to a dummy.
mobLongDesc: The trainee smiles smugly, aware of your interest in him.  He's a little fresh, but his enthusiasm and desire to please more than make up for what he lacks in skill.

mobShortDesc: A halfling beauty stares dreamily into your eyes.
mobLongDesc: She is the most beautiful creature you've seen in quite some time.  As you stare at her, thoughts of all else vanish.  You get the sudden urge to grovel at her feet, hoping she'll take you in like a lost puppy.  You wouldn't dare harm a hair on her precious little head.

mobShortDesc: A local gossip asks you, "Have you heard the latest?"
mobLongDesc: The gossip is all talk and no action.  You're transfixed by her ability to talk so much so quickly.

mobShortDesc: A seasoned adventurer sits here, telling tales of fame and fortune.
mobLongDesc: The seasoned adventurer has seen his share of glory days.  Although he is past his prime, he still looks like he could put up more than his share of a good fight.

mobShortDesc: A halfling youth stands here, waiting for nothing in particular.
mobLongDesc: The halfling youth is not yet quite in the prime of his youth.  He's knee high and you get the sudden urge to step on him.

mobShortDesc: The battle master offers you the services of his fine trainees.
mobLongDesc: The battle master is a wizened fighter, with many scars to prove his worth.

mobShortDesc: The blacksmith bids you welcome to his humble store.
mobLongDesc: The blacksmith is a lean and mean fighting machine.  His knowledge of weapons and armour would certainly help him in any fight against riff raff like you.

mobShortDesc: The grocer offers you the finest breads in all the land.
mobLongDesc: The grocer is a large, jovial halfling who knows how to enjoy his pipeweed. However, he also knows that it's worth protecting and so will do everything in his power to prevent riff raff like you from stealing it.

mobShortDesc: The shopkeeper smiles and patiently waits for you to buy something.
mobLongDesc: The shopkeeper will fight like a madman to protect his store from riff raff like you.

mobShortDesc: The dwarven prince sits here patiently for the return of his king.
mobLongDesc: Grim and cold, the dwarven prince is quite strong and bulky, even for the dwarves of his land.  His glowing eyes peer out of his bushy face and stare beyond your gaze.

mobShortDesc: The elven warrior watches you solemnly.
mobLongDesc: The tall elven warrior is light and fair-skinned.  The expression that he wears on his countenance is solemn and tragic.  He cares not for this world any longer and wearies of it.

mobShortDesc: The mill worker runs to and fro.
mobLongDesc: The mill worker is in fine shape from the hard labor that he does at the mill.  He doesn't notice your presence, but he looks like he could break you in two without thinking about it.

mobShortDesc: The Miller is here, overseeing his busy mill workers.
mobLongDesc: The Miller is an impatient young halfling, always trying to command more respect from his workers than he can get.  He looks like the type of person who deserves a spanking but never got one.

mobShortDesc: The Innkeeper stands here awaiting your order.
mobLongDesc: The Innkeeper is a jolly old halfling who spends his days eavesdropping on local gossip.  In his younger days, he was quite a seasoned traveler.

mobShortDesc: The Thain commands respect from all Shire folk.
mobLongDesc: A personable yet serious halfling, the Thain looks at you and yells a deep 'Hullo'.  He walks about comfortably, secure in the knowledge that as long as he's in office, the Shire will always remain a safe haven for Shire folk.

mobShortDesc: A shiriff of the Shire looks for signs of trouble.
mobLongDesc: The shiriff is over waist high, quite tall for a halfling.  His eyes are ever roaming, looking for signs of trouble from riff raff like you.  In his belt is a thin dagger, and on his body he wears a suit of leather armor. This is one halfling you don't want to mess with.

mobShortDesc: A shiriff of the Shire looks for signs of trouble.
mobLongDesc: The shiriff is over waist high, quite tall for a halfling.  His eyes are ever roaming, looking for signs of trouble from riff raff like you.  In his belt is a thin dagger, and on his body he wears a suit of leather armor. This is one halfling you don't want to mess with.

mobShortDesc: A horse becomes frightened by your presence.
mobLongDesc: The horse looks at you and turns away.  You can tell that it is afraid of you.

mobShortDesc: A bull scratches at the ground and lowers his head.
mobLongDesc: The bull is in top condition.  He looks like quite a fighter, nothing to be reckoned with.  With his horns and his hooves he can attack just about anything.

mobShortDesc: A chicken sits on her nest.
mobLongDesc: The chicken is bright and healthy.  She has no weapons but her beak.

mobShortDesc: A pig wallows in the mud and oinks in contentment.
mobLongDesc: The pig appears quite happy to be a pig.  He is oblivious to your presence and cares only for the care-free life that he leads.  It is enormously fat and consequently cannot move around very quickly.

mobShortDesc: A cow is here, chewing her cud.
mobLongDesc: The cow looks like it hasn't been milked in quite some time.  Although she is past her prime, you see that she still has a lot of years left, and that if provoked, her rear kick can be quite deadly.

mobShortDesc: A nursemaid wanders about, trying to keep track of all the toddlers.
mobLongDesc: The nursemaid looks rather tired and worn out.  Taking care of so many toddlers for too long has evidently taken its toll.  She looks to you and in her eyes you can see her longing for a better life.

mobShortDesc: A toddler crawls about, looking for something to chew on.
mobLongDesc: The toddler is dressed in nothing but his birthday suit.  He crawls about for he hasn't learned to walk yet.  He peers up at you and asks "da da?"

mobShortDesc: Farmer Gamgee sniffs the air, wondering if harvest time is near.
mobLongDesc: Farmer Gamgee is a short, stout halfling of thirty years.  His skin has been tanned from working the fields night and day.  He's quite a jolly chap, always ready to befriend an injured bunny rabbit.

mobShortDesc: The Keeper of the Ring is here, guarding his treasure jealously.
mobLongDesc: The Ring Keeper is a rather big but short halfling.  His short stature and bulbous nose belie his true nature.  An elven sword that glows with a blue light hangs from his belt, and on his finger you see the One Ring.  Although usually a halfling of peace, he will fight you to the death if you attempt to take away that which belongs to him.

mobShortDesc: An Elven Wizard is here, creating fireworks for the festivities.
mobLongDesc: The Elven Wizard looks at you in a solemn sort of way.  His gaze seems penetrate through your innermost being.  He is wearing a silvery cloak and holding a multi-colored staff.  Although he appears to be older than the oldest man, he seems to have an inner strength which most mortals cannot overcome.

mobShortDesc: An old captain stands at the wheel of his vessel.
mobLongDesc: Weather beaten by years at sea, this rugged old man is full of stories. Leather hands grip the wheel with a strength that could only come from decades of back breaking work.  A small pipe dangles from the left side of his wind chapped mouth.  On his head is a tattered old captains hat that has seen more than it share of use.

mobShortDesc: A blank of primal clay stands here, waiting to be shaped.
mobLongDesc: A blank of primal clay, waiting to be shaped.

zoneName: Sandy Shore plus Beach, by Ai
mobShortDesc: The Kingfisher is perched here.
mobLongDesc: The Kingfisher is eyeing you and tracking your every movement with its powerful beak. An excellent fisher, this bird is one of the most maneuverable, most dexterous birds of prey.

zoneName: Sandy Shore plus Beach, by Ai
mobShortDesc: The Lost Fisherman is lounging here.
mobLongDesc: The Lost Fisherman used to be a mighty seafarer, but was banished from the great sea by Neptune. He is doomed to stay here forever in this lagoon, the closest he can be to his home.

zoneName: Sandy Shore plus Beach, by Ai
mobShortDesc: A dune rat is standing here.
mobLongDesc: An angry dune rat is here. It apparently doesn't like visitors to its domain.

zoneName: Sandy Shore plus Beach, by Ai
mobShortDesc: The Sand Worm is waiting here for its first meal of the day.
mobLongDesc: This is apparently the source of the mysterious holes in the sand. The Sand Worm is an impressive creature, many times larger than any normal worm you've ever seen. It seems to think you'd make a good appetizer.

zoneName: Sandy Shore plus Beach, by Ai
mobShortDesc: An utterly lost, shipwrecked sailor is standing here.
mobLongDesc: The man who stands before you used to be a mighty and proud seafarer, but is now lost beyond all hope on this wretched sandy shore. He has gone quite mad, but does not attack. He's merely looking for food and water. You see the leg of a sand crab hanging from the corner of his mouth.

zoneName: Sandy Shore plus Beach, by Ai
mobShortDesc: A land shark is swimming in the sand here.
mobLongDesc: This is a small shark that swims through the sands of the shore, hoping one day to find its way back to the sea.

zoneName: Sandy Shore plus Beach, by Ai
mobShortDesc: The Queen Pit Viper is coiled here.
mobLongDesc: The Queen Pit Viper has a nasty bite, beware her tongue. To her, you are today's meal.

zoneName: Sandy Shore plus Beach, by Ai
mobShortDesc: A pit viper is slithering here, waiting to attack.
mobLongDesc: You see a slimy reptile, who scavenges for small animals and the occasional adventurer.

mobShortDesc: There be a huge shark here, watch out.
mobLongDesc: You see a man, with the torso of a human. However, instead of legs, he has a long scaly tail, similar to that of a fish.

mobShortDesc: A Captain is here selling his boats.
mobLongDesc: A very hard working man.

mobShortDesc: A Whale is here.
mobLongDesc: A kind of large sea-animal with a little fount on its head.

mobShortDesc: A sea gull is flying here.
mobLongDesc: A large lovely long-winged sea-bird.

mobShortDesc: A seal is here looking for some small fish.
mobLongDesc: A kind of fish-eating sea-animal.

mobShortDesc: The Neptune is standing here.
mobLongDesc: He is the God of the Sea.

mobShortDesc: A dolphin is here happily.
mobLongDesc: A lovely sea animal.

mobShortDesc: A Mermaid is swimming here.
mobLongDesc: A woman with a fish's tail in place of legs.

mobShortDesc: A Water Weird is swimming here looking at you with interest.
mobLongDesc: This wormlike monster swims around and glares at you with intensity. He doesn't seem dangerous or rather friendly in that matter. Hopefully you won't wind up being his dinner for tonight.

mobShortDesc: The Supreme Slug is sitting here laughing at you!
mobLongDesc: Waddling in his tub of slime, this huge slug laughs and giggles at your entrance. Although he seems harmless, you have a funny feeling that he can kick your ass.
affectedByFlags: INVISIBLE DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY DUAL FURY

mobShortDesc: Bob the insurance salesman is standing here trying to sell you insurance!
mobLongDesc: Persistent is the word to describe this sleezy guy. He wears a pink suit and a toupee to match. He rubs his hands fiendishly and grins to himself, thinking of the many ways to steal your money.

mobShortDesc: A Cloaker Lord isn't very happy to see you is standing here.
mobLongDesc: Legends said that these monsters had vanished off the face of the earth.  You have just proven them wrong. Endowed with sharp fangs and a lethal tail, this Cloaker Lord proves a formidable foe. Say your prayers cause coming here was a big mistake, he doesn't like visitors.

mobShortDesc: A Large Radioactive Slug slithers before you!
mobLongDesc: This poor creature looks like an experiment gone totally wrong. Sparks fly from his 30 ton body and each step makes it scream out in obvious pain. You can see his burnt flesh and almost feel sorry for the poor thing. He stares at you with no expression whatsoever, but it's as if he's telling you to end his misery.

mobShortDesc: The Fungus King is sitting here looking bored.
mobLongDesc: This huge behemoth of a fungus looks bored out of his skull. He eats everything in sight and belches rudely at your entrance.  Glancing in your direction, the huge fungoid quivers and shakes in utmost laughter.  Maybe he had too much to drink?  Or maybe not impressed by your appearance.  Why don't you be a nice guy and teach him some respect?

mobShortDesc: A lazy looking sewer repairman is sitting here dozing off.
mobLongDesc: This is a poor and overworked repairman. He spends most of his time down here cleaning the sewers, because someone actually pays him for it. He looks tired and could use some rest, but if that happened,  - Who would clean these sewers? Dressed in a floppy raincoat and holding a grungy mop, this repairman looks extremely worn out.

mobShortDesc: A strange looking Osquip is bouncing around here.
mobLongDesc: Bouncing onto your lap is a very happy multi-legged rodent the size of a dog. It is completely hairless, and you can see his huge buck teeth protruding from his huge head. Although always friendly, the Osquip will attack if provoked.

mobShortDesc: A Large Fungus is standing here.
mobLongDesc: This is a pretty large fungus for fungus standards, but its a sorry sight to see.  Look at him bounce off the walls!

mobShortDesc: A Fungus is standing here.
mobLongDesc: This pathetic piece of Fungus roams around on his belly, oblivious to the world.

mobShortDesc: A Water Weird is swiming here looking at you with interest.
mobLongDesc: This wormlike monster swims around and glares at you with intensity. He doesnt seem dangerous or rather friendly in that matter. Hopefully you won't wind up being his dinner for tonight.

mobShortDesc: The Supreme Slug is sitting here laughing at you!
mobLongDesc: Waddling in his tub of slime, this huge slug laughs and giggles at your entrance. Althought he seems harmless, you have a funny feeling that he can kick your ass.
affectedByFlags: INVISIBLE DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY DUAL FURY

mobShortDesc: Bob the insurance salesman is standing here trying to sell you insurance!
mobLongDesc: Persistant is the word to describe this sleezy guy. He wears a pink suit and a toupe to match. He rubs his hands fiendishly and grins to himself, thinking of the many ways to steal your money.

mobShortDesc: A Cloaker Lord isn't very happy to see you is standing here.
mobLongDesc: Legends said that these monsters had vanished off the face of the earth.  You have just proven them wrong. Endowed with sharp fangs and a lethal tail, this Cloaker Lord proves a formidable foe. Say your prayers cause coming here was a big mistake, he doesn't like visitors.

mobShortDesc: A Large Radioactive Slug slithers before you!
mobLongDesc: This poor creature looks like an experiment gone totally wrong. Sparks fly from his 30 ton body and each step makes it scream out in obvious pain. You can see his burnt flesh and almost feel sorry for the poor thing. He stares at you with no expression whatsoever, but it's as if he's telling you to end his misery.

mobShortDesc: The Fungus King is sitting here looking bored.
mobLongDesc: This huge behemoth of a fungus looks bored out of his skull. He eats everything in sight and belches rudely at your entrance.  Glancing in your direction, the huge fungnoid quivers and shakes in utmost laughter.  Maybe he had too much to drink?  Or maybe not impressed by your appearance.  Why don't you be a nice guy and teach him some respect?

mobShortDesc: A lazy looking sewer repairman is sitting here dozing off.
mobLongDesc: This is a poor and overworked repairman. He spends most of his time down here cleaning the sewers, because someone actually pays him for it. He looks tired and could use some rest, but if that happened,  - Who would clean these sewers? Dressed in a floppy raincoat and holding a grungy mop, this repairman looks extremely worn out.

mobShortDesc: A strange looking Osquip is bouncing around here.
mobLongDesc: Bouncing onto your lap is a very happy multi-legged rodent the size of a dog. It is completely hairless, and you can see his huge buck teeth protruding from his huge head. Although always friendly, the Osquip will attack if provoked.

mobShortDesc: A Large Fungus is standing here.
mobLongDesc: This is a pretty large fungus for fungus standards, but its a sorry sight to see.  Look at him bounce off the walls!

mobShortDesc: A Fungus is standing here.
mobLongDesc: This pathetic piece of Fungus roams around on his belly, oblivious to the world.

mobShortDesc: The Servant's Kid is here beating up his toys.
mobLongDesc: He is a healthy robust kid of a working class family.  His grubby little hands grasp the shattered remnants of a broken toy.

mobShortDesc: The Maid is here cleaning the kitchen.
mobLongDesc: The Maid is hustling around cleaning the kitchen.  She seems friendly enough but watch out!

mobShortDesc: The Butler is here storing food.
mobLongDesc: He stands ramrod straight wearing a snappy butler's uniform.  He doesn't seem old but there's an age in his eyes, probably from all the children in the other room.

mobShortDesc: A Ferocious Guard Dog is here looking rather hungry.
mobLongDesc: The dog is massive with long fangs and saliva dripping from his maw.  He is especially trained to eat newbies.  Beware!

mobShortDesc: A Guard is here watching the grounds.
mobLongDesc: He looks like a very tough and capable guard.  He is very loyal to his mistress.

mobShortDesc: The Doorman is standing here guarding his mistress.
mobLongDesc: The doorman has a rather disdainful look as he peers at you through wire-rimmed glasses.

mobShortDesc: The Mayor's Sister is here fixing her make-up.
mobLongDesc: She may have been beautiful 10 years and 6 inches of make-up ago, but the years have not been kind.

mobShortDesc: A blank of primal clay stands here, waiting to be shaped
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.

mobShortDesc: A blank of primal clay stands here, waiting to be shaped
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.

mobShortDesc: A potter is trying to sell his vessels.
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.

mobShortDesc: A farmer walks around here selling his produce.
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.

mobShortDesc: A blank of primal clay stands here, waiting to be shaped
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.

mobShortDesc: A Restaurant's guard is standing here protecting the restaurant.
mobLongDesc: The guard says 'due to the waiter here always die, so our boss asked us to protect here.' This is a very tough guard.

mobShortDesc: A Sonicity Shopkeeper is standing here.
mobLongDesc: He is a honest man.

mobShortDesc: A Sonicity Shopkeeper is standing here.
mobLongDesc: He is a honest man.

mobShortDesc: A restaurant waiter is standing here, ready to take your order.
mobLongDesc: He is a hardworking man.

mobShortDesc: A Sonicity Shopkeeper is standing here.
mobLongDesc: He is a honest man.

mobShortDesc: A golem is standing here.
mobLongDesc: You see a 7 feet high golem standing in front of you.

mobShortDesc: Odey is standing here.
mobLongDesc: He has killed 100 people in 1 night, and he needed 3000 cops to catch him.

mobShortDesc: A prisoner is standing here.
mobLongDesc: They are no good.

mobShortDesc: The Cop's Leader is standing in front of you.
mobLongDesc: He is a very tough guy.

mobShortDesc: A quester is standing here.
A Sonicity Cop is here, protecting his city.
The Mayor is sitting in his huge chair, snoring loudly.
mobLongDesc: He is a stocky, middle-aged man with thin, grey hair.

mobShortDesc: A cityguard stands here, looking very upset.
mobLongDesc: A big, strong, angry guard.

mobShortDesc: The Chief Guard is looking very upset.
mobLongDesc: A very angry chief.

mobShortDesc: A duck is here, quacking happily.
mobLongDesc: The duck is quite fat.  It looks like it is enjoying life.

mobShortDesc: A sparrow is flapping around on the ground.
mobLongDesc: The sparrow looks like it is enjoying life.

mobShortDesc: A duckling is swimming around in the pond.
mobLongDesc: The duckling is adorable, it looks most of all like a tiny furball.

mobShortDesc: A swan is swimming around in the pond.
mobLongDesc: The white swan is very elegant.

mobShortDesc: A Sexton is sitting here, drinking hot tea.
mobLongDesc: The Sexton looks like he is relaxing after another gravedigging job.

mobShortDesc: The Maid is waiting for your order.
mobLongDesc: She is very beautiful with golden hair, and deep blue eyes. A good reason for coming here more often.

mobShortDesc: A raving old woman in strange clothes mutters to herself.
mobLongDesc: A wiry but sturdy woman leans heavily on a hickory cane, her thumb gently strokes a disturbingly alert-looking eyeball which has been fused into the wood. Her small frame and unimposing presence bely her mischievous and cutthroat nomadic history. Adorned in gawdy jewelry and beads and clad in a ratty robe soaked in the stench of mold and decay she smirks at you from beneath a ragged scarf. There is nothing clueless or naive in those eyes; her cold distant stare bores into your soul revealing your most precious secrets and confidences to her entrancing gaze.

mobShortDesc: A tall, stately, well dressed man is shaking hands here.
mobLongDesc: A calm smile radiates from a smooth face. Dark blue eyes peering out from under thick eyebrows search quickly from side to side. Wide hands hang loosely at his sides, soft skin worn smooth from constantly shaking hands. Clean polished shoes and a well cut suit fit his frame perfectly.

mobShortDesc: A cityguard stands here, looking very upset.
mobLongDesc: A big, strong, angry guard.

mobShortDesc: The Chief Guard is looking very upset.
mobLongDesc: A very angry chief.

mobShortDesc: A duck is here, quacking happily.
mobLongDesc: The duck is quite fat.  It looks like it is enjoying life.

mobShortDesc: A sparrow is flapping around on the ground.
mobLongDesc: The sparrow looks like it is enjoying life.

mobShortDesc: A duckling is swimming around in the pond.
mobLongDesc: The duckling is adorable, it looks most of all like a tiny furball.

mobShortDesc: A swan is swimming around in the pond.
mobLongDesc: The white swan is very elegant.

mobShortDesc: A Sexton is sitting here, drinking hot tea.
mobLongDesc: The Sexton looks like he is relaxing after another gravedigging job.

mobShortDesc: A sharply dressed clerk stands behind the desk, awaiting your command.
mobLongDesc: Wesley is a prim and proper man.  He stands ramrod straight, his posture never wavering.  The impeccably tailored suit he wears is a subdued shade of gray and covers a heavily starched shirt.  He speaks precisely, choosing the every word with care and delivering them with the slight hint of an accent. His bearing never wavers as he efficiently addresses the needs of the previous client to approach his work space, and then turns to greet the next.

mobShortDesc: The Maid is waiting for your order.
mobLongDesc: She is very beautiful with golden hair, and deep blue eyes. A good reason for coming here more often.

mobShortDesc: A spider is here following the wizard.
mobLongDesc: The spider is nothing to be scared of, yes, it is a big spider, but you are still bigger than it. It's the wizard you should worry about, and not his followers.

mobShortDesc: There is a great sprite here surrounded by smoke.
mobLongDesc: The great wizard is not a very big troll, but from the searing look of his eyes you know you should fear him. He must have been banished from the village for some reason or another, I guess that's why the chief had him under lock and key.

mobShortDesc: The sprite chief is here suffering from an ailment.
mobLongDesc: The chief of the sprites is an old fella, he looks really sick at the moment. The nurse is trying her best to save him, but it looks like he hasn't much time left. Lets hope you have your sprite shot.

mobShortDesc: A cute little nurse is here trying to heal the sick.
mobLongDesc: This cute little number makes sure all the sprites are healthy. If I were a sprite I think I'd be glad to have a nurse of such beauty at my bedside.

mobShortDesc: An old sprite is here carving a piece of wood.
mobLongDesc: This old sprite gets great pleasure from making others happy, he has been around for a while and his work is outstanding.

mobShortDesc: A great sprite is here covered in furs.
mobLongDesc: This great hunter has never feared anything in his life, so what makes you think you can handle him? You better run while you have a chance.

mobShortDesc: The blacksmith is here pounding on some iron.
mobLongDesc: The blacksmith is a hefty looking sprite, his forearms are huge. He is one of the more powerful sprites you have encountered.

mobShortDesc: The baker is here making tasty delights.
mobLongDesc: The baker is a small sprite, his face is covered in flour, and a small apron covers his body.

mobShortDesc: The repairman is here fixing something.
mobLongDesc: The repairman seems to know how to fix everything. No wonder the village is running so smoothly.

mobShortDesc: The banker is here, counting his money.
mobLongDesc: The banker is a small little sprite, his little hands sure can hold a lot of money. He is wearing an odd pair of glasses.

mobShortDesc: A sprite is here, picking mushrooms.
mobLongDesc: A small sprite is quietly picking mushrooms.  He seems to hardly notice you.

mobShortDesc: A small sprite is here trying to avoid your feet.
mobLongDesc: A cute little sprite is here doing sprite stuff.

mobShortDesc: The Mayor of Midgaard is here.
mobLongDesc: He is a stocky, middle-aged man with thin, grey hair.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-ALIGNMENT DETECT-INVISIBLE DETECT-MAGIC SENSE-LIFE SPHERE INFRAVISION DODGE

mobShortDesc: A seedy-looking thug stands guard here.
mobLongDesc: He looks bored since few people come here.  He glances at you briefly then goes back to picking dirt from under his fingernails with a stiletto. A stifled yawn escapes his lips as he leans against the wall.

mobShortDesc: A scrawny vulture
mobLongDesc: A scavenging avian that will eat almost anything.  It has an uncanny ability to sense impending death and destruction and as such is so reviled as a bird of ill omens.

mobShortDesc: The mighty Celestial Dragon, master of the skies, is here.
mobLongDesc: The Celestial Dragon is one of the largest dragons alive today, measuring 120 feet from head to tail.  Its slender body is completely covered with glittering scales that shine like diamonds and its ruby eyes burn with the fires of the sun.

mobShortDesc: The Master of the Midgard Stables tends to his beasts here.
mobLongDesc: The Master of the Stables is a mysterious creature with the head of an eagle and a human body.  No one know his origin, but his uncanny ability to communicate with avians has earned him his position here.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY INFRAVISION DODGE INVUL DUAL

mobShortDesc: A hunchbacked, beady-eyed dwarf eyes you warily and chews on some tobacco.
mobLongDesc: This is the infamous hunchback Igor, sentenced by the previous Mayor to life in prison for stealing a loaf of bread.  The current mayor had him released a few years ago, but by that time it was too late; Igor had lost his mind and been crippled by the grueling labour in the old mines.  Out of pity the mayor lets him tend to the animals here in return for a meal and a place to sleep.

mobShortDesc: A flesh golem awaits your commands.
mobLongDesc: This thing is a hodge-podge of collected human and Trog parts, all sewn together with twine and bound with some primitive magic. It glares around with mismatched eyes, drooling a huge string to the ground and scratching its not-so-private parts as it grunts incomprehensibly.

mobShortDesc: A huge bull-lizard stares balefully at you from independently moving eyes.
mobLongDesc: This beast has the body of a bull and the head of a white lizard. Fungus grows on its back, and encrusting its eyes are mineral deposits of some sort. It has apparently lived for a long time, and it doesn't look like many creatures will dare to fight this powerful beast.

mobShortDesc: An incredibly huge tarantula scuttles about here.
mobLongDesc: A hairy spider is frightening, yes, but a 12-foot hairy spider is blood- curdling! This creature audibly clicks its mandibles, poison drool dripping and hairy legs scuttling madly. It is incredibly fast, and it looks like a great fighter.

mobShortDesc: A giant scorpion lashes its poisoned sting at you.
mobLongDesc: This huge, nasty creature is almost completely translucent. You can see the internal workings of the arthropod, but those are not nearly as interesting as the poison-bearing sting it is lashing about blindly...

mobShortDesc: A large racing snail is slithering by here.
mobLongDesc: This large gastropod wears a tremendous, spiraled shell on its back, with distinctive Trog runes carved into it. Some brave trapper obviously ventured into the deep caves of the deadly Trogs to recover a mount to sell at market, a price hardly worth the risk.

mobShortDesc: A small blue dragon swoops down from the sky here.
mobLongDesc: This small dragon was forced out of the great northern wastelands by its larger brethren. It is still rather massive compared to YOU, but it seems to be rather pleasant and content, a large smile on its blue face.
actionFlags: SPEC SENTINEL ISNPC SUBDUE MOUNT FLY

mobShortDesc: A hungry wyvern flaps its wings impatiently here.
mobLongDesc: A great feathered serpent hisses at you as you look at it, flicking its bright tongue in and out while gazing at you with baleful reptilian eyes. Its huge feathered wings are extended, ready to take off with a primordial scream of cold-blooded hate and fury, little else being known to its tiny brain.
actionFlags: SPEC SENTINEL ISNPC SUBDUE MOUNT FLY

mobShortDesc: A giant eagle glides effortlessly here.
mobLongDesc: This great bird screams a haunting cry to the wind and flaps its great wings as you examine it.  Its yellow eyes sharply considering you from its large white head. This predatory bird has evolved into a humongous freak of nature, making it a very valuable mount whilst making it almost incapable of creating a secure niche for itself in a sky full of lighter, more maneuverable birds.
actionFlags: SPEC SENTINEL ISNPC SUBDUE MOUNT FLY

mobShortDesc: A noble griffon flaps its wings here.
mobLongDesc: This frightening beast clacks its bright yellow beak as you look at it, raking its talons along the ground and crouching with its lion's tail swishing in the air. All in anticipation of the freedom of a long flight.
actionFlags: SPEC SENTINEL ISNPC SUBDUE MOUNT FLY

mobShortDesc: A giant bat flaps its leathery wings here.
mobLongDesc: This huge bat is a deep brown in color, its visible skin black as night. It makes an eeping sound as you approach, raising its wings in preparation for flight, dodging and diving amongst the night skies it loves so much.
actionFlags: SPEC SENTINEL ISNPC SUBDUE MOUNT FLY

mobShortDesc: A large elephant trumpets with derision here.
mobLongDesc: You see the huge, grey, wrinkled flank of an elephant. It peers at you with small, wise eyes and curls its trunk into a wheedling question mark, seeming to ask "Will you be my friend?", presenting its foreleg for an easy step up to howdah-position.

mobShortDesc: A haughty camel regards you with disinterest.
mobLongDesc: This camel is a rather chubby specimen, having been well-fed recently. His hump is nice and full, ready for a long wander in the desert. He chews on something complacently as you examine him, looking directly into your face without moving his head. He looks very very bored.

mobShortDesc: A proud warhorse snorts in defiance at you.
mobLongDesc: This massive stallion is a very dark grey in color, typical of the wild horses of the Vilosian wastelands. A fierce black mane stands erect on his thick, ropy neck, and his fetlocks are each larger than your full chest. He snorts fiercely and rolls his eyes, stamping in eagerness for battle!

mobShortDesc: A riding horse shakes its mane here.
mobLongDesc: This tall, slender horse is a light chestnut in color, with a white stripe down its forehead. It prances and capers about as it considers the idea of galloping through wonderful forests and plains, whinnying in horsey delight, its shaggy mane cascading over its neck.

mobShortDesc: A stubborn mule stands here.
mobLongDesc: The mule sneers in indignation as you look at her. She flattens her long ears along her skull as you consider mounting her, swishing her tail back and forth to swipe away flies.

mobShortDesc: The stable boy is here waiting to serve you.
mobLongDesc: You see a rather young man, seemingly untouched by the ravages of life. However, if rumors are true he was once a great warrior and he now works here to get away from the horror of battle.

mobShortDesc: a hulking Lion is here breathing life into the land with powerful magic.
mobLongDesc: A fantastic golden lion stands before you. You look deep into his eyes and all your worries in the world vanish immediately. You are entranced by the kindness that he exudes. You know that you are safe from all ills while you are in his presence. The magic that he portrays is incredibly powerful, but you are more worried about the magic that he does not perform, but you are quite aware he has at his command.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY PROTECT-EVIL INVUL DUAL
mobImmune: PUMMEL HIT BLUDGEON PIERCE SLASH WHIP CLAW BITE STING CRUSH HACK CHOP SLICE BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT
attackType: CLAW BASH SPELL CAST SPELL CAST

mobShortDesc: The Tree of Right is here, making sure only the worthy reap the garden's benefits.
mobLongDesc: An animated tree is something that doesn't surprise you from this world. The tree gives you the evil eye, or is it an evil knot? He is going to make sure that your resolve is sufficient to take the apple of protection.

mobShortDesc: The Ice Queen of Decilon is here, wakened from her eons long respite!
mobLongDesc: The queen's skin is very, very pale. Her hair is a silvery white and shimmers even though there is very little light in the room - a sign, perhaps, of how much magic is flowing through her body. Her eyes give an ice-cold stare and her rage is entirely evident. The lives of millions of people which she has taken do not weigh on her conscience, why would yours?

mobShortDesc: Roland, the Part-Time Wizard is here his face illuminated in a green-yellow glow.
mobLongDesc: This gentlemen has to be in his late sixties. He has a tall, incredibly lean frame, white thinning hair and wrinkled skin. His health is failing him which comes from the amount of time he spends shut inside his study, usually failing at performing any magic. He seems to have stumbled upon something now and is obsessed with finding a way to test it.

mobShortDesc: The Hansom's Cabby is here looking distraught over the shape of his vehicle.
mobLongDesc: This cabby has a sharp look about him that has been developed over years and years of darting through the heavy traffic of this city hauling various well- off passengers to their fancy galas and important dinners. His accent is quite simple, and his wit great, but you can tell by looking at him that there's still a bit of the country life left in his eyes.

mobShortDesc: A proper gentleman walks down the street in tails and a top hat.
mobLongDesc: This gentleman walks around the town with all the pomp that his social position has given him the right to display. His haughty appearance is only heightened by the monocle he wears in one eye, and the immaculate neatness of his attire. His suit is perfectly creased and cleaned, and his white shirt has been starched and bleached professionally.

mobShortDesc: A prissy socialite is using her parasol as a fashion statement not sun protection.
mobLongDesc: This middle aged lady walks about in the fanciest clothes. Her current garment is a long white, lacy dress that you just know had to cost quite a sum of gold. For her though, it's the cost of the thing rather than its actual functionality. She walks down the street pretending everyone she passes is her best friend.

mobShortDesc: The Chief Dwarf is here lording over the mountainous parts of the land.
mobLongDesc: The Chief Dwarf is one of the more important creatures in this world. When security issues arise he is always summoned before the king and the queen and asked his advice. Looking at him you can tell he is experienced in the ways of advanced combat and it would be rather wise not to anger him in any way.

mobShortDesc: A Common Dwarf is here surveying the newly created land for ore deposits.
mobLongDesc: This squat fellow look like he does not wish to be bothered. Despite his overall diminutive stature, the size of his muscles gives you the impression that maybe you shouldn't bother him afterall.

mobShortDesc: You can smell a Dumb Warthog from a mile away!
mobLongDesc: Even though regular sized, most adventurers will tell you that getting in a scrape with a warthog is not a good idea. They can mess you up. Good. From the look of this fellow he seems to have reaped the bounty of this countryside quite well.

mobShortDesc: A Talking Warthog is here convinced you are some type of tree.
mobLongDesc: This is one large pig. Not overly fat though, but well proportioned. Its sturdy look, low to the ground stance, and ample tusks make it look like it could be a tough opponent.

mobShortDesc: A Talking He-Owl is here, prefering to stay silent and sleep through the days.
mobLongDesc: This gigantic owl appears wise and learned, yet incredibly lazy. This mass of feathers likes to spend most of his time resting, and will only go out to hunt when he absolutely needs to. He still maintains his incredible stealth flying ability which makes him very difficult to spot in the wild.

mobShortDesc: A Talking Jackdaw is here laughing at itself.
mobLongDesc: Even though the jackdaw is one of the smaller birds in the raven family this bird appears to you the biggest raven you've ever seen. The jackdaw has jet black feathers with a grey nape and distinctive white irises. This jackdaw is very open with its ability to talk, and is rather social and to be frank annoying.

mobShortDesc: A Dumb Mole is here poking its head out of one of its many holes.
mobLongDesc: You are amazed that despite the fact that this mole is its regular weenie size that it is able to fight as well as it can. The magic of this world is quite powerful indeed.

mobShortDesc: A Talking Mole is here busily digging holes to plant his friends in!
mobLongDesc: Like all other of the talking varieties of animal in this world, their size has been augmented to bring them closer to the size of human. Therefore, this usually small mole has been enlarged quite severely. This has an unintended side effect that is dangerous for the casual passerby because of the sheer size of the hole they now dig. As opposed to maybe twisting your ankle in a mole hole now it is a definite possibility to be completely swallowed up in one!

mobShortDesc: A Dumb Rabbit is hopping about nibbling on just about everything it can reach.
mobLongDesc: You see a cute and cuddly rabbit, with a pure white, cotton tail, and large ears that stick straight up from its head. Its large hind legs give it the useful ability of jumping far and fast.

mobShortDesc: A Talking Rabbit is here trying to keep track of its young.
mobLongDesc: You see a huge rabbit, that is nearly half a human's height tall. It also tends to stand in a more erect position than most rabbits in your world. Even more astonishing yet is that this rabbit is able to talk!

mobShortDesc: A Dumb Donkey is here ferrying less sure-footed creatures up and down the canyon.
mobLongDesc: This donkey spends its time climbing and descending the walls of the canyon. Why? Because it can, of course! The frequency with which he makes this trip makes the route perilous for all other trying to make the same journey due to the sheer amount of scat he leaves in his wake. Maybe you should find a different route up the canyon.

mobShortDesc: A Talking Donkey is here befouling the trail up the canyon with numerous droppings.
mobLongDesc: You see a grey donkey with big floppy ears. The hair on the back of his neck and on the tip of his tail is jet black. He doesn't seem to pleased with how things are going so far.

mobShortDesc: A Dumb Beaver is here trying to thwart the River God by building a dam.
mobLongDesc: You see your average looking beaver. He's an adept swimmer and capable of quick movements on land, making him particularly difficult for predators to catch. He is always working hard to create new fisheries for himself by creating dams in various places in the river.

mobShortDesc: A Talking Beaver is here discussing politics with the Naiads.
mobLongDesc: Much larger than your average beaver, this beaver has been given the gift of speech. He still maintains his thick brown coat, wide flat tail, and sharp front teeth.

mobShortDesc: A Naiad is here helping the River God maintain the waterways.
mobLongDesc: This Naiad appears as a beautiful woman, swimming in the waters of the river. Despite her beauty she is still capable of revenge and jealousy, so you had better watch your step.

mobShortDesc: The River God is here floating in a patch of turbulent white water.
mobLongDesc: Half man, half serpent, the god of the river looks exactly like you'd expect from picture books. He is incredibly muscular, has a white beard and a large golden crown. In his hand he holds a menacing looking trident. In his eyes you see a level of wisdom unsurpassed by most creatures in this world.

mobShortDesc: A Dumb Frog is here looking for a place to sit and croak loudly.
mobLongDesc: Green and with long spindly legs, this frog is a great swimmer and jumper. Eyes bulge out on each side of his head, keeping a sharp lookout for insects that venture within range of his sticky tongue.

mobShortDesc: A Talking Frog sits on a rock singing a song.
mobLongDesc: Larger than any frog you've seen before, the magic of this land has enlarged this frog and given it the ability to talk. This green and warty frog, despite its size, looks like any you have seen before, however, its apparent like of operatic music confounds you.

mobShortDesc: a Dumb Horse is galloping around, leaving a trail of dust behind it.
mobLongDesc: You see what you've come to expect from a horse, mane, tail, hooves, head, the regular accoutrements. It takes great pleasure in using its incredible speed to try and beat all the other animals in races.

mobShortDesc: a Talking Horse contemplating the ethics of taking on riders is standing here.
mobLongDesc: You see every little girl's dream: a talking horse! This particular horse is a beautiful, clean white, with seemingly perfectly groomed mane and tail. You suppose that this world isn't even old enough yet for the horse to get them dirty yet. Your observations of this horse suggest that it is particularly fond of strawberries as it seeks them out before other grasses and berries in the environment.

mobShortDesc: a Dumb Panther is here looking for a tree to curl up in.
mobLongDesc: You see a large black panther, eager to learn new things about his surroundings. He moves silently throughout the environment, each movement seemingly well-planned.

mobShortDesc: A Talking Panther slinks along keeping close to the shadows.
mobLongDesc: You see a large black panther, eager to learn new things about his surroundings. He moves silently throughout the environment, each movement seemingly well-planned.

mobShortDesc: A Dump Tapir has found a mud pit to wallow in to keep the insects away.
mobLongDesc: This dumb tapir spends much of his time browsing around with his prehensile snout for fresh young sprouts of plants.

mobShortDesc: a Talking Tapir is here looking squat and happy.
mobLongDesc: This talking tapir still spends much of his time browsing around with his prehensile snout for fresh young sprouts of plants.

mobShortDesc: a Dumb Elephant is standing around flapping his ears and swishing his tail.
mobLongDesc: This hulking creature moves around the world very slowly. With his tough skin and enormous size he doesn't need to worry much about predators. One look at the large tusks on the beast makes you think that predators need worry more about him!

mobShortDesc: a Talking Elephant discusses security tactics with other disinterested animals.
mobLongDesc: All talking animals in this world have had their size modified so they are closer to the equal size of the rest of the talking animals. The smallest have grown and the largest have shrunk. Therefore this talking elephant seems to you almost like a baby elephant, but the size of his tusks tells your he is indeed full grown. He uses his trunk to hose himself off under the hot sun.

mobShortDesc: A Large Oak Tree is here walking on its unearthed roots.
mobLongDesc: Your eyes widen in amazement when you hear this tree open its mouth and speak to you. It uses two of its lower branches very similar to arms, and it waddles about on two large sets of roots. Its great bulk causes to the ground to shake as it moves it root legs, and its leaves rustle wildly as it sweeps its branch arms, making it very hard for it to sneak up on anyone.

mobShortDesc: a Dumb Bear is hear foraging in the underbrush for berries and insects.
mobLongDesc: Slightly larger then his talking counterpart this bear has not been given the gift of speech. He behaves like most bears, fiercely protective of its young, yet with the intelligence of most omnivores. He can be seen catching fish near the plentiful streams, foraging for berries, or scavenging his favorite bee- hives.

mobShortDesc: a Talking bear sits on his haunches looking at you with a cocked head.
mobLongDesc: Talking Bears have been magically shrunk in this world to be more the size of humans. Though smaller they are no less ferocious than their dumb counter- parts, for they still have nasty claws and enormous buggling muscles.

mobShortDesc: a Satyr is here viewing you from a safe distance behind a tree.
mobLongDesc: Despite the flowing horse tail and prominent goat horns on his head, this satyr looks very much like a smaller human male. Naked, of course, for this world has yet to invent clothing, he romps around the forest mostly in search of the nymphs to satisfy his salacious desires. He carries around a set of pipes, maybe if you make him feel comfortable enough he'll play a tune for you.

mobShortDesc: A Playful Faun is here, prancing about without a care in the world.
mobLongDesc: This odd looking creature appears to have been created half goat, half humanoid. The bottom half being the goatish part.

mobShortDesc: A Dumb Elk is bent over eating the plentiful grass.
mobLongDesc: A little smaller than his talking relative, this non-talking elk seems to enjoy life no less. He can be seen prancing about the countryside, eating grass and all manner of other things elk enjoy doing.

mobShortDesc: A Talking Elk is bounding through the forest from hiding place to hiding place.
mobLongDesc: Much larger than your average elk this majestic creature stands before you. You don't get long to observe the fantastic antlers or perfectly colored coat of the animal before it is spooked by some noise you make or odor that it smells.

mobShortDesc: A small guinea pig darts about, he seems the cutest in the world.
mobLongDesc: The cutest guinea pig in the world. He has spots of orange and white fur covering his body which has occasional whorls that just add to the amount of character he displays. His eyes are just black and his little lips bright pink. He seems ever so pleased to live his life in this land full of fantastic grass.

mobShortDesc: The high priest stands before you practicing kung-fu.
mobLongDesc: The priest is an old man.  He is very small, and appears to be blind in one eye.  Surely an experienced fighter like yourself is a match for a feeble old man like this -- or are you in for the surprise of your life.

mobShortDesc: An old monk is here practicing the monkey style of kung-fu.
mobLongDesc: The monk is getting up in years, but his mastery of this lethal form of kung-fu is unquestionable.  Lets hope that in his age he has lost a step or two.

mobShortDesc: The giant ape stands before you forbidding entrance to the temple.
mobLongDesc: This ape is huge!  What are they feeding these guys?  Lets hope its a vegetarian diet, or you could find yourself ape food.  Wait a minute, what are you scared of, you have killed larger monsters in your sleep.  I still would not count your eggs before they hatch.  The ape has a strange look in his eye.  He must know something you don't.

mobShortDesc: A large chimpanzee is standing here guarding passage downward.
mobLongDesc: The chimpanzee is larger than other chimpanzee you have ever seen.  It appears to be almost human.  Its arms are huge, and it is at least a foot taller than you.  You have your work cut out for you if you want to see what it is protecting.

mobShortDesc: A small spider monkey is here hanging from a tree.
mobLongDesc: The monkey is very small and agile.  Don't would not take its size for granted, though. Its claws are very sharp, and could make quick work of your pretty little face.

mobShortDesc: A giant sea turtle is here laying her eggs in the sand.
mobLongDesc: You have never seen anything like it before -- this turtle must be a hundred years old.  The turtle's shell is dull, and covered in barnacles.  You are lucky that the turtle is old, or you would have a huge battle ahead of you.

mobShortDesc: A parrot is here talking to itself.
mobLongDesc: A colorful looking parrot is perched on the branch in front of you.  It doesn't look like much but look out for those razor-sharp claws!

zoneName: Swamp Secret Caves revamp by Leha
mobShortDesc: A gigantic mushroom grows up from the mush of the land here.
mobLongDesc: HEEHEE... FOOD! Wait!! It seems to have eyes with in the circular dots all around it's head. As you look closer, you become sure that this is indeed a living creature. From within the fans under it's cap, you can make out the shapely arms of this planted animal.

zoneName: Swamp Secret Caves revamp by Leha
mobShortDesc: A Large Ettin screams from both heads, looking for prey.
mobLongDesc: Both of his over-inflated heads scream with rage as they look about with a vicious terror to find someone, or something, to ravage. The dark grey skin of this monstrosity shows tears and rips all along his flank and arms. With another hideous scream, his wild eyes look upon you with victory.

zoneName: Swamp Secret Caves revamp by Leha
mobShortDesc: An Ettin stands here, poised to defend its land.
mobLongDesc: A large two-headed giant with muscular legs and arms, he looks like an excellent fighter. If anything, his endurance might just be high. Huge eyes, black with no whites, peer from each head, taking in all of you. His grey skin ripples, as he assesses the danger.

zoneName: Swamp Secret Caves revamp by Leha
mobShortDesc: A small lizard is running around in circles here.
mobLongDesc: This small creature is totally harmless. It lives here in the darkness trying to survive. Its almost blind because it is never been out in the sunlight. It's green scales sparkle and glitter like emeralds in the light you shed upon it.

zoneName: Swamp Secret Caves revamp by Leha
mobShortDesc: A Brown Rat sneaks about, searching for prey.
mobLongDesc: This brown rat seems to be a quite peaceful creature. Almost like a cat, his hair is well-groomed, although snarfs of it seem to be missing in a few untimely places. Dark brown eyes acknowledge your presence with a hint of mischief.

zoneName: Swamp Secret Caves revamp by Leha
mobShortDesc: A Black Rat is here searching for something to eat.
mobLongDesc: This black rat smells like that of a putrid, rotting corpse. It seem to be quite harmless but perhaps looks are deceiving. The ghastly hair which covers him, is twisted in knots, and appears to be missing in some places. His beady black eyes show a hint of hunger as he turns to attack you.
actionFlags: SPEC SCAVENGER ISNPC AGGRESSIVE STAY-ZONE WIMPY ARM

zoneName: Swamp Secret Caves revamp by Leha
mobShortDesc: A Giant Rat is here, looking for someone to attack!
mobLongDesc: This big and aggressive creature is hiding here inside his cave. His hair is gnarled and thick, with tuffs missing in a few places. As your eyes meet, you feel your skin begin to harden. With your last glance of horror, you see two brown tinged teeth grin with satisfaction.
affectedByFlags: INVISIBLE DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY INFRAVISION STATUE DODGE HIDE

zoneName: Swamp Secret Caves revamp by Leha
mobShortDesc: The Ettin Thief is here, hiding in the shadows.
mobLongDesc: This thief is the ultimate thief. His skills are all superb. He likes to sneak behind adventurers and backstab them. Only a few players can say 'I killed that horrible thief in the ettin cave!'
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SANCTUARY INFRAVISION STATUE DODGE SNEAK HIDE INVUL

zoneName: Swamp Secret Caves revamp by Leha
mobShortDesc: Ettin Cleric is here, thinking up some new spells.
mobLongDesc: This huge two-headed cleric is a master of healing and harming. He knows how to use effective spells and he is very skillful fighter. His clawed hands bend and twist with fluidic motion as he catches view of you from the corner of his eye.
actionFlags: SPEC SENTINEL ISNPC AGGRESSIVE STAY-ZONE WIMPY MEMORY
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY INFRAVISION DODGE INVUL

mobShortDesc: The Hartland Town Patrol is on the move!
mobLongDesc: A grizzled veteran of the field, now protects his town from the evils beyond.

mobShortDesc: The Hartland Town Patrol is on the move!
mobLongDesc: A grizzled veteran of the field, now protects his town from the evils beyond.

mobShortDesc: The Hartland Town Patrol is on the move!
mobLongDesc: A grizzled veteran of the field, now protects his town from the evils beyond.

mobShortDesc: The Hartland Town Patrol is on the move!
mobLongDesc: A grizzled veteran of the field, now protects his town from the evils beyond.

mobShortDesc: The Hartland Town Patrol is on the move!
mobLongDesc: A grizzled veteran of the field, now protects his town from the evils beyond.

mobShortDesc: The Hartland Town Patrol is on the move!
mobLongDesc: A grizzled veteran of the field, now protects his town from the evils beyond.

mobShortDesc: A large burly man covered from head to toe in weapons.
mobLongDesc: A large man stand before you.  This is Chase, leader of the Boundary Wardens.  He stands straight, and upright.  His eyes are constantly moving; his guard is always up, and you have no chance of catching him off it.

mobShortDesc: A tall woman is sweeping the floors
mobLongDesc: A tall woman stands before you.  Although she looks young, she seems to have been through a lot.  Her hazel eyes probe you, but she doesn't seem bothered by your presence.

mobShortDesc: A Small Glowing Mass
mobLongDesc: A small glowing mass sits before you.  Its normal radiance seems to be fading.  The pace at which the radiance pulses also seems to be slowing. Its final moments are rough, so hopefully you can help.
affectedByFlags: SANCTUARY CURSE SPHERE POISON INVUL FURY

mobShortDesc: A Short Tailed Beast swats the flies circling around it.
mobLongDesc: A large beast stands before you.  His wings spread out behind him and he glares down at you with his large, white fangs.  A short tail swishes behind him.  Large, red flies circle around his stomach, where the remains of some poor creature have been spread.

mobShortDesc: A Long Tailed Beast swats the flies that circle around it.
mobLongDesc: A large beast stands before you. His wings spread out behind him and he glares down at you with his large, white fangs. A long tail swishes behind him.  Large, red flies circle around his stomach, where the remains of some poor creature has been spread.

mobShortDesc: The Hartland Town Patrol is on the move!
mobLongDesc: A grizzled veteran of the field, now protects his town from the evils beyond.

mobShortDesc: Fred, the Gatekeeper of Hartland stand vigilant.
mobLongDesc: A tall man stands in front of you.  He stands vigilant, and watches for any threat that could pose a danger to his town.  He watches you closely; but doesn't make any other movements.

mobShortDesc: Boundary Warden is standing here.
mobLongDesc: You see a man toughened by a long life of dedication.  He is well muscled, and looks ready to tear heads off if threatened.  He is covered in equipment designed for work in the shadows.  Rumor is, if a warden does not want to be seen, then he is not
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY SPHERE INFRAVISION IMINV DUAL

mobShortDesc: A servant is here, moping the floors.
mobLongDesc: A servant for the First Councilor.

mobShortDesc: Michael, the First Councilor of Hartland is standing here
mobLongDesc: Here stands the First Councilor of Hartland.   He is protecting his people from the monsters and other more vile things coming from the boundary.  He rules with an honest and just hand.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY SPHERE INFRAVISION INVUL

mobShortDesc: Jason, the first councilor's aide
mobLongDesc: A man in his early twenties, he was just appointed to the position of "aide to the First Councilor." He is willing and very eager to prove his worth.

mobShortDesc: A clerk stands behind the counter, eyeing you as you browse.
mobLongDesc: The Hartland general store clerk

zoneName: Tanchico, Ebu Dar, Bandar Eban, by Alexander
mobShortDesc: A man is standing here.
mobLongDesc: The Gholam looks like an ordinary man at first glance but certainly is not. It moves unnaturally fast and sinuous like it has no bones in its body. Gholams are immune to the One Power and most known weapons.

zoneName: Tanchico, Ebu Dar, Bandar Eban, by Alexander
mobShortDesc: Suroth is standing here.
mobLongDesc: The sides of her scalp are shaved so that only a wide crest of black hair remained to fall down her back. The first two nails of each hand are lacquered blue.

zoneName: Tanchico, Ebu Dar, Bandar Eban, by Alexander
mobShortDesc: Semirhage is standing here.
mobLongDesc: Semirhage is taller than most men, with a smooth dark face and dark eyes. She has long, slender fingers. Her hair is short and wavy.

zoneName: Tanchico, Ebu Dar, Bandar Eban, by Alexander
mobShortDesc: Grendeal is standing here.
mobLongDesc: Grendeal is beautiful but somewhat fleshy with elaborately curled red-gold hair. Her hair hanging down over her shoulders.

zoneName: Tanchico, Ebu Dar, Bandar Eban, by Alexander
mobShortDesc: Alsalam Saeed Almadar is standing before you.
mobLongDesc: A large muscular man with dark blue eyes. He wears fine silk clothes under his breastplate with the symbol of his house.

zoneName: Tanchico, Ebu Dar, Bandar Eban, by Alexander
mobShortDesc: An innkeeper is here, taking care of the patrons.
mobLongDesc: The innkeeper is a fat man with a white apron around his considerable waist.

zoneName: Tanchico, Ebu Dar, Bandar Eban, by Alexander
mobShortDesc: A shopkeeper is standing here.
mobLongDesc: The shopkeeper wears a brown apron and brushes his hands on it preparing to show of his wares. He is an old man with gray in his hair and a limp to his walk.

zoneName: Tanchico, Ebu Dar, Bandar Eban, by Alexander
mobShortDesc: A dock master is writing in his book of registrations.
mobLongDesc: The dock master looks darkly at you for disturbing his attention of registering all in and out bound ships.

zoneName: Tanchico, Ebu Dar, Bandar Eban, by Alexander
mobShortDesc: A fisherman is fishing off the docks.
mobLongDesc: The fisherman wears a brown cloak and beside him lays his catch for the day, 4 small fishes.

zoneName: Tanchico, Ebu Dar, Bandar Eban, by Alexander
mobShortDesc: A servant is cleaning here.
mobLongDesc: The servant wears a white robe and carries a tray.

zoneName: Tanchico, Ebu Dar, Bandar Eban, by Alexander
mobShortDesc: A chef is stirring a pot over a fireplace.
mobLongDesc: A large round man is standing here stirring a pot of stew. His white apron is stained and only some spots show that it once was all white, He has shortblonde hair and a nose too big for his face.

zoneName: Tanchico, Ebu Dar, Bandar Eban, by Alexander
mobShortDesc: A palace guard is walking here, keeping the palace safe.
mobLongDesc: A armed guard is wearing armor painted in the colors of the royal house. His duty to protect the queen from any attack.

zoneName: Tanchico, Ebu Dar, Bandar Eban, by Alexander
mobShortDesc: A city guard is walking here, watching for a sign of trouble.
mobLongDesc: A armed guard is wearing armor painted in the colors of the city. He has an open eye watching out for the well being of the citizens.

zoneName: Tanchico, Ebu Dar, Bandar Eban, by Alexander
mobShortDesc: A hooded man is stalking about.
mobLongDesc: A man in a black cloak with the hood over his head looks back at you. His pants and boots are covered with mud from the alleys. In one hand he carries a long knife, ready to cut a purse from a belt or a throat if needed.

zoneName: Tanchico, Ebu Dar, Bandar Eban, by Alexander
mobShortDesc: A merchant is traveling past you.
mobLongDesc: The merchant is leading his team of wagons containing his goods past you. With his fine coat and shirt he must be a successful trader in whatever he is trading in. At his belt he is wearing a long knife.

zoneName: Tanchico, Ebu Dar, Bandar Eban, by Alexander
mobShortDesc: A citizen is walking past you.
mobLongDesc: The citizen has a ragged brown cloak and worn boots. Living conditions are hard in a city and many citizens cant afford spending money on new clothes.

zoneName: Tanchico, Ebu Dar, Bandar Eban, by Alexander
mobShortDesc: The Panarch is standing here.
mobLongDesc: She has many of the physical characteristics that are common to Taraboner females. She wears her long, dark hair in multiple braids and has large dark eyes. She has a pouty, rosebud mouth with a petulant look to it. She has not yet reached middle age and is quite beautiful.

zoneName: Tanchico, Ebu Dar, Bandar Eban, by Alexander
mobShortDesc: Moghedien is standing here.
mobLongDesc: She is a sturdily handsome woman with shoulder-length hair worn loose. She has large, dark eyes and smooth cheeks.

mobImmune: FIRE ELECTRIC POISON SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DRAIN DISINTEGRATE CLAIR SUMMON BLUDGEON PIERCE SLASH WHIP CLAW BITE STING CRUSH HACK CHOP SLICE BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT

mobShortDesc: A cherished pet of the Paktats, this mankey likes to party!
mobLongDesc: This appears to be a strange looking man-beast, mankey with a bad attitude.  It flies about the room, urinating on things and being a general pest to all that enter.  Of course, it's a wonderful pet, and it loves to party with you.

mobShortDesc: A fuzzy purple creature hops toward you with an amiable grin.
mobLongDesc: You can't help but smile as you encounter this happy little fuzzball. It regards you with warmth, speaking in a strange language.  But be warned, these are the Minions of Good, and the unknowing destroyers of Tarion.  Untethered, their smothering kindness is devastating to all.

mobShortDesc: A fuzzy purple creature hops toward you with an amiable grin.
mobLongDesc: You can't help but smile as you encounter this happy little fuzzball. It regards you with warmth, speaking in a strange language.  But be warned, these are the Minions of Good, and the unknowing destroyers of Tarion.  Untethered, their smothering kindness is devastating to all.

mobImmune: FIRE ELECTRIC POISON SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DRAIN DISINTEGRATE CLAIR SUMMON BLUDGEON PIERCE SLASH WHIP CLAW BITE STING CRUSH HACK CHOP SLICE BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT

mobShortDesc: A dying man lies here, clutching a message in one hand.
mobLongDesc: As you glance at this poor human, his eyes slowly leak bitter tears.  He is ancient, worn away by the years he has lain here dying.  Tarion had learned to harness the power of Good in order to slow aging, and this man must have been here forever by the look in his eyes reflecting the ruined surroundings.  Fear touches him as he warns you of the dangers that lurk here.

mobShortDesc: A large paktat whistles as he dices vegetables into a steaming cookpot.
mobLongDesc: This paktat exists only in service to its fellows as the culinary expert.  Paktats, Good in every manner in their own culture, find that the taste of human is best served as a dish slightly warmed but as fresh as possible.  You appear to be the next culinary triumph at the Paktat dinner-table if you don't get out of here soon.
mobImmune: PUMMEL KICK PUNCH DISINTEGRATE CLAIR SUMMON

mobShortDesc: A fuzzy purple creature hops toward you with an amiable grin.
mobLongDesc: You can't help but smile as you encounter this happy little fuzzball. It regards you with warmth, speaking in a strange language.  But be warned, these are the Minions of Good, and the unknowing destroyers of Tarion.  Untethered, their smothering kindness is devastating to all.

mobShortDesc: A fuzzy purple creature hops toward you with an amiable grin.
mobLongDesc: You can't help but smile as you encounter this happy little fuzzball. It regards you with warmth, speaking in a strange language.  But be warned, these are the Minions of Good, and the unknowing destroyers of Tarion.  Untethered, their smothering kindness is devastating to all.

mobLongDesc: You can't help but smile as you encounter this happy little fuzzball. It regards you with warmth, speaking in a strange language.  But be warned, these are the Minions of Good, and the unknowing destroyers of Tarion.  Untethered, their smothering kindness is devastating to all.

mobLongDesc: You can't help but smile as you encounter this happy little fuzzball. It regards you with warmth, speaking in a strange language.  But be warned, these are the Minions of Good, and the unknowing destroyers of Tarion.  Untethered, their smothering kindness is devastating to all.

mobShortDesc: A fuzzy purple creature hops toward you with an amiable grin.
mobLongDesc: You can't help but smile as you encounter this happy little fuzzball. It regards you with warmth, speaking in a strange language.  But be warned, these are the Minions of Good, and the unknowing destroyers of Tarion.  Untethered, their smothering kindness is devastating to all.

mobShortDesc: A Fracture Hunter is standing here studying his surroundings.
mobLongDesc: The hunter is wearing a long brown coat with a white shirt and tan jeans in the air above.

mobShortDesc: Ungarnaz the Master of the Void has arrived. Time to die!
mobLongDesc: Ungarnaz is truly a creature from the void. It has the shape of a big beast like a bear or an ogre, with what looks like fur, black as night. In stead of eyes, its eye-sockets seem like caverns into the void itself. Long shadowy tentacles grow out from its back whipping around hitting and crushing everything around it.

mobShortDesc: The Voidbringer stands with his arms raised to the sky summoning the master of the Void.
mobLongDesc: This long creature looks to me a mix of a man and a snake, its skin covered with scales and with a long tail which trails behind it, yet it has human features in its face and form.

mobShortDesc: The Doombringer stands proudly and wait.
mobLongDesc: The Doombringer is a man who looks to be in his 40s. But with the black eyes, you are not really sure if it still is a man. He holds the Staff of Doom ready to summon his master from the void.

mobShortDesc: A man with pale white skin is walking about muttering incantations.
mobLongDesc: The man has skin as white as ivory which stand in contrast to his dead black

mobShortDesc: A long black and purple wormlike creature is crawling about here.
mobLongDesc: The long wormlike creature, crawls around on it hundreds of small legs. The ground seems to wither away where it places its feet, and soon the whole area looks like the life has been sucked away from it. Its head has large black eyes and sharp black teeth fills its mouth in rows upon rows, able to rip its victims apart when devouring them.

mobShortDesc: A fully armored knight is standing here in his black armor.
mobLongDesc: The knight is all covered in blackened steel and none of its skin is visible. It might be a human inside or it might not. No way to tell. The armor seems light as the knight skillfully moves through some sword stances.

mobShortDesc: A Soul Ripper is lurking in the shadows.
mobLongDesc: The small creature has large eyes in its relatively small head. The eyes are jet black which makes them look like holes in the head that lead into nothingness. Its arms are long and the long nails on its hands scrape the ground as it walks.

mobShortDesc: A Dark Shadow is floating through the air aimlessly.
mobLongDesc: A jet black shape floating in the air with no distinct features.

mobShortDesc: A cityguard stands here.
mobLongDesc: A big, strong, helpful, trustworthy guard.

mobShortDesc: A cityguard stands here.
mobLongDesc: A big, strong, helpful, trustworthy guard.

mobShortDesc: A cityguard stands here.
mobLongDesc: A big, strong, helpful, trustworthy guard.

mobShortDesc: A cityguard stands here.
mobLongDesc: A big, strong, helpful, trustworthy guard.

mobShortDesc: A tremendous Killer Bee buzzes in to stab you in the throat!
mobLongDesc: Goddam, that stinger is huge!  Oh man, it's dripping poison, too...what are these killer bees doing up here is your last thought as the bee stabs you in the throat with its stinger...

mobShortDesc: The Death Lord stands here, ready to fight.
mobLongDesc: This creature is the result of a powerful mage, animating the dead remains of a once mighty warrior. Its eyes glimmer and are fixed coldly upon you.

mobShortDesc: Balor stands here, surrounded by electrical fire
mobLongDesc: This powerful creature has bull horns and clawed hands. Flame surrounds its dark skin and it is wielding a sword and a flaming whip.

mobShortDesc: Marilith slithers here
mobLongDesc: This six-armed creature has the upper body of a woman and a long and powerful snake's tail. In each hand it wields a sword.

mobShortDesc: Nalfeshnee stands here
mobLongDesc: This creature resembles both an ape and a boar and is winged with a couple of very small wings.

mobShortDesc: A demon Glabrezu stands here
mobLongDesc: This is a large four-armed creature with a dog's head with horns.

mobShortDesc: A demon Hezrou stands here.
mobLongDesc: This is a humanoid creature with black skin and a toad-like face.

mobShortDesc: A Vrock stands here
mobLongDesc: This creature resembles both human and vulture. It is a very ugly sight.

mobShortDesc: A giant acid blob is here
mobLongDesc: he looks like a huge blob of acid

mobShortDesc: An acid blob is here
mobLongDesc: he looks like a big blob of acid

mobShortDesc: A gatling goblin is here!  Duck!
mobLongDesc: He looks like a walking gatling gun

mobShortDesc: A goblin cannon is here, warming up
mobLongDesc: He looks like a tank

mobShortDesc: The goblin king is here.
mobLongDesc: He looks like david bowie

mobShortDesc: The Sultan of fire elementals stands before you, making you feel crisp.
mobLongDesc: The Sultan has a vaguely man-shaped form and consumes everything in his fiery wake.

mobShortDesc: A huge tornado is squeezed into this impossibly small space.
mobLongDesc: This huge tornado picks up and devours everything in its path.

mobShortDesc: The King of earth elementals stands here.. cower fool!
mobLongDesc: It is a large stone figure, emitting coldness.

mobShortDesc: The prince of water elementals flows here
mobLongDesc: He looks like a giant wave, about to swoop down upon you.

mobShortDesc: A huge warrior stands here, guarding the portal beyond.
mobLongDesc: He is a huge man. His strong, muscular body stands about 8 feet tall. He guards the portal beyond him angrily.

mobShortDesc: A shadowy figure stands here, looking you over with greed.
mobLongDesc: This creature has almost no form, it looks like some sort of shadow with wings.

mobShortDesc: A large, disgusting, vile creature stands here, smelling putrid.
mobLongDesc: This creature is covered with a slime like substance, many tentacles protrude from its disgusting body.

mobShortDesc: The death knight stands here, preparing to do you in.
mobLongDesc: This creature is the result of a powerful mage, animating the dead remains of a once mighty warrior. Its eyes are fixed coldly upon you. Unsheathing its sword, it charges for battle.

mobShortDesc: Kalas, the knight and guardian of the castle, stands here preparing himself for battle.
mobLongDesc: Kalas is a large, muscular man. He is clad in a magical suit of armour. His sword is burning fiercely.

mobShortDesc: A disgusting creature of ethereal nature stands here, its body completely wrapped in bandages.
mobLongDesc: This man-sized creature is completely covered in bandages. Its eyes glow with a brilliant red fire and in its grasp is an extremely sharp blade of magical nature.

mobShortDesc: A large tree-like creature reaches out for you with its many limbs.
mobLongDesc: It is a rather large creature, resembling a tree. At the base of the trunk is a large opening that looks very much like a mouth.

mobShortDesc: A large squid-like creature erupts from the waters beneath you!
mobLongDesc: This large creature is a close relative to the squid, but is much larger in size. Its huge tentacles grasp something, but you can't make out what it is grasping.

mobShortDesc: A huge eight headed hydra is sleeping here
