mobLongDesc: This huge, scaled creature has eight heads, each capable of breathing a dangerous stream of fire. An amulet hangs around its central neck.

mobShortDesc: A huge flaming figure stands here with a glint of evil in its eyes.
mobLongDesc: The efreet is formed entirely of flames and gives off an intense heat.

mobShortDesc: A statuesque manticore stands here, crafted entirely of white gold.
mobLongDesc: This beautifully crafted statue is formed entirely of white gold. Its eyes seem to watch your every move... It almost appears as if it is alive!

mobShortDesc: A storm giant stands here, angered by your presence.
mobLongDesc: This huge creature is approximately 8 feet tall. He grasps a huge bolt of lightning in his right hand... He doesn't look happy to see you.

mobShortDesc: A ghostly apparition floats here, staring at you in utter hatred.
mobLongDesc: The lost soul is a ghostly apparition, seeking revenge on the living.

mobShortDesc: A huge, shadowy figure materializes from the shadows around you.
mobLongDesc: The black slayer is a shadowy figure, about 7 feet tall, garbed in a heavy, black cloak. In his right hand he wields a wicked dagger.

mobShortDesc: A mist daemon hovers here, in a cloud of grey mist.
mobLongDesc: A large, demon like creature hovers above you, in a cloud of grey mist. Its winged form stares down at you in utter hatred.

mobShortDesc: A crimson death materializes from a dense patch of mist.
mobLongDesc: Its skeletal form is garbed in a robe of crimson; the blood of its many victims stain the robe. Its skeletal figure resembles that of the angel of death. Its eyes glow with a furious fire to kill.
actionFlags: SPEC SENTINEL SCAVENGER ISNPC AGGRESSIVE STAY-ZONE

mobShortDesc: Keftab, the Ancient One stands here, calmly searching ceaselessly.
mobLongDesc: A writhing, quivering mass of horrific, unspeakable flesh-like material, this ancient one stares coldly about through its many multifaceted eyes. Viscous, vile smelling liquid seeps through its flesh in many places, originating from the ghastly, crater like pores which pepper his body. Disgustingly, large portions of its flesh seem to bubble with an alien life of their own. The surface of its body, where not oozing, is covered with mottled, grey, mossy protrusions, like some strange malignant blemishes. It emits low, guttural mewlings from its fange, quivering orifice.

mobShortDesc: The Demi-Lich leaps from his throne as you enter the room, his evil eyes fixed dead upon you!
mobLongDesc: The Demi-Lich is, perhaps, the single, most powerful undead creature known to exist. Greatly resembling a wight or mummy, gaunt and skeletal in form, it is nevertheless a being of foreboding might. Its eye sockets are black and empty, save for the fierce pinpoints of light which serve as eyes. An aura of cold and darkness radiates from it, which makes it an ominous and fearsome sight. Despite the wasted, rotten flesh, it is garbed in the rich clothes of nobility.

mobShortDesc: A Heavy browncap fungus is here decomposing the log.
mobLongDesc: A blank of primal clay, waiting to be shaped.
actionFlags: SPEC SENTINEL SCAVENGER ISNPC NICE-THIEF AGGRESSIVE STAY-ZONE WIMPY SUBDUE OPEN-DOOR AGGWA AGGTH AGGCL AGGMU MEMORY AGGNI AGGNO ARM MOUNT FLY AGGPA AGGAP AGGBA AGGCO SHIELD AGGEVIL AGGGOOD AGGNEUT AGGLEADER AGGRANDOM

mobShortDesc: a parastic nematode is here digesting something unspeakable.
mobLongDesc: A blank of primal clay, waiting to be shaped.

mobShortDesc: A grotesque fungi-infested centipede is here hunting through the log.
mobLongDesc: A blank of primal clay, waiting to be shaped.

mobShortDesc: A fat dark-colored beetle is here drilling through the wood.
mobLongDesc: A blank of primal clay, waiting to be shaped.

mobShortDesc: A small fairy-bonnet fungus is here looking for similiar mushrooms.
mobLongDesc: A blank of primal clay, waiting to be shaped.

zoneName: The Archaic Caverns of Millenias Past, by Luthien
mobShortDesc: a Brimstone Shadow drifts back and forth inbetween the rocky landscape.
mobLongDesc: Before your eyes appears a dust devil made up of soot and sulfur. It seems to fade in and out if existence as if its not really there.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-ALIGNMENT DETECT-INVISIBLE DETECT-MAGIC SENSE-LIFE PROTECT-EVIL INFRAVISION PROTECT-GOOD IMINV

zoneName: The Archaic Caverns of Millenias Past, by Luthien
mobShortDesc: a Daemonic Pit Viper is coiled on the ground, ready to rip you to shreds!
mobLongDesc: This enormous Reptile cannot possibly be from this world! Its skin, bright red and its razor sharp scales adorning its sleek and muscular body makes this Fiend of a Pit Viper look as if its origins were from the burning pits if Hell itself! Its large fangs are stained yellow and brown, and its very breath is a whiff of sulfur! It would appear that this Viper also possesses primitive arms with sharp claws on its shriveled and twisted fingers. As this Daemonic creature looks straight into your eyes you feel a sharp sting in your chest. Its gaze penetrates you completely, making you feel weak and vulnerable...
affectedByFlags: INVISIBLE DETECT-INVISIBLE DETECT-MAGIC SENSE-LIFE SPHERE INFRAVISION DODGE

zoneName: The Archaic Caverns of Millenias Past, by Luthien
mobShortDesc: a Translucent Spectral Wyrm slithers here, hiding in plain sight!
mobLongDesc: This large Wyrm appears to have evolved in complete isolation from the world above. It has lost all forms of pigmentation, and judging from its milky white eyes you'd guess that it is blind as well. Its sleek scaly body is transparent like crystal glass, and its innards are all glowing with a pale purple hue. Through the translucent hide you can see all of its glass-like bones and its cranium, as the light refracts through its bones and soft tissue.
affectedByFlags: INVISIBLE DETECT-INVISIBLE DETECT-MAGIC SENSE-LIFE PROTECT-EVIL DODGE

zoneName: The Archaic Caverns of Millenias Past, by Luthien
mobShortDesc: a Carapaced Cave Serpent creeps about, stalking its prey...
mobLongDesc: This quite astonishing Serpent is extremely large, and its scaly body is nearly fossilized. Its color is a dirty grey, and moss grows uncon- trolably on its back. This old cave- dweller is surely a remnant of the past. Its eyes does not blink, and appears as almost blood-red rubies as they twinkle and sparkle whenever light hits their surface.

zoneName: The Archaic Caverns of Millenias Past, by Luthien
mobShortDesc: a Ferocious Black Worm slithers about, looking for its next meal!
mobLongDesc: Covered in a thick scaly hide, this Ferocious Black Worm is well protected from the perils of the surrounding environment. Its hide is completely black, and its fangs are stained and yellow. Its eyes reflects the light from your torch, making them glisten and shine like the stars in the sky...

mobShortDesc: A man shrouded in a black cloak is standing here.
mobLongDesc: Balthamel, one of the Forsaken, is standing before you. His captivity close to the edge of the Dark On'es prison have had him age normally for over three millennia, making him look more like a corpse than a man He was even worse off than Aginor and shrouds himself in a black cloak, his face covered with a grinning mask.

mobShortDesc: A man aged beyond belief is standing here grinning at you.
mobLongDesc: Aginor, one of the Forsaken, is standing before you. His captivity close to the edge of the Dark One's prison have had him age normally for over three millennia, making him look more like a corpse than a man.

mobName: Someshta, the last of the Nym
mobShortDesc: Someshta, the last of the Nym is rooted in the ground.
mobLongDesc: Someshta is a Nym, a race which look more like trees than humans. He reaches twenty feet over the ground and his whole body is covered with branches and leaves, his skin like old brown bark. Two gentle hazel eyes protrude from the crown of leaves that makes up his head.

mobShortDesc: A grown jumara is searching for food.
mobLongDesc: The grown jumara is ten feet long. It has dark green scales over the length of its body. The large fangs looks like they easily will tear skin and draw blood. Alot of it.

mobShortDesc: a small jumara is crawling here.
mobLongDesc: The newborn jumara is just a couple of feet long. It has dark green scales over the length of its body. The small fangs looks like they easily will tear skin and draw blood.

mobShortDesc: A long worm is feeding from a pile of human bodies.
mobLongDesc: The Jumara is a long worm with scales in dark green and black covering its entire body. Its tail has a long sharp sting, dripping with poison. Its mouth almost smiles when it looks at you, blood dripping from its fangs.

mobShortDesc: Shadar Haran is here guarding the entrance to the mountain.
mobLongDesc: Shadar Haran has the same white skin and eyeless face as a Myrdraal, but there the resemblance ends. He is much taller, and he can smile where Myrdraal cannot. He has long dark hair and wears an armor made of dark leather sewen with blue thread. Every time that eyeless gaze finds you, you feel a sudden terror and a difficulty of moving and thinking straight. In the Old Tongue, Shadar Haran is translated to: Hand Of The Dark.
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST

mobLongDesc: Something keeps your eyes from looking to closely at the man. But what you see is a very ordinary man that you don't think you would have noticed in a group of four.

mobShortDesc: A Darkhound searches for your trail.
mobLongDesc: The Darkhound has the stature of a small horse and has thick dark fur. It looks back at you with dark red eyes and growls, drool dripping from its mouth. It has long claws on its paws that will inflict great damage to its prey.

mobShortDesc: A Myrdraal leads his fist of Trollocs.
mobLongDesc: The Myrdraal has the shape of a man but is far from it. Its dark hair frame a face with white skin, and where its eyes should have been, it has sockets with the same pale skin as on the rest of its body. In the borderlands they have a saying: The look of the eyeless is fear, and whenever that gaze reaches you, you feel a sudden terror in your bones. The Myrdraal's cloak hangs undisturbed in the wind.

mobShortDesc: A Trolloc is on your trail, hunting you!
mobLongDesc: The trolloc is half again as high and wide as a man, with broad shoulders. Its head is covered with fur like a wolf, but with human eyes. Its strong arms wield an axe twice the size of any axe you have seen before. The trolloc is running on goat legs with sharp hooves.. This horrid blend of human and animal sickens your stomach.

mobShortDesc: The Black Rook stands at attention and watches over the halls.
mobLongDesc: The Black Rook stands before you clad in the trappings of his fellow knights, with the lone exception that his is painted a brilliant black. The black rook is the basic foot soldier of the Canticle, assigned to all the basic and menial tasks. Their job is to protect the keep from all intruders and also maintain order amongst the other creatures of the moor.

mobShortDesc: A black snake slithers through the muck.
mobLongDesc: A long black snack slithers through the mud and short grass. Its many small scales form an intricate pattern on its back that blend into its surroundings.  The small eyes on top of its head blink slowly as it moves stealthily towards its prey. The nose has a small ridge at the front, adding a slight variation to the very flat head.

mobShortDesc: A tiny snipe hops around the moor.
mobLongDesc: A small bird with longer legs slowly walks through the small pools of water slowly scanning the water for smaller prey. A long narrow beak darts into the water and retrieves a small frog or lizard that it quickly consumes. As it stands still, it barely moves but still notices your presence.

mobShortDesc: A tiny owl swivels its head from side to side.
mobLongDesc: A small owl moves its head back and forth looking for small prey to consume. Its large eyes allow it to see even the tiniest movement and its pupils dial in as it focuses.  Large talons protrude from its feet, ready to crush its target rendering it helpless.

mobShortDesc: A small lark flutters through the moor.
mobLongDesc: A small and dull brown bird flutters from spot to spot around the moor. The small eyes on its head dart back and forth. Its numerous feathers on its short wings stretch out wide as it gathers the wind underneath.  The short tail goes back and forth as it looks for a direction of flight.

mobName: Humfridus, Captain of the Order of the Light
mobShortDesc: Humfridus, the Last Captain of the Order waits for the next challenger.
mobLongDesc: A large muscular man sits here. He is the captain of the Order of the Light and he is the last of his command. Just like his comrades in arms, he has survived many encounters and continues to do his duty. Guard the keep and protect it against evil. He looks at you with a blank yet serious stare.

mobName: Vulzala, Troll Witch of the Canticle
mobShortDesc: Vulzala, the troll witch of the canticle skulks in the shadows.
mobLongDesc: An old yet still large troll stands next to the fire. She has been a servant of the Canticle for a very long time. Why she was relegated to living under a bridge is unknown, but she continues to listen for signs of those returning to the fortress. She calmly stirs the contents of the cauldron and barely registers your presence.

mobName: The fallen knight of the order.
mobShortDesc: The fallen knight of the order crouches here in the darkness.
mobLongDesc: This former knight is now a prisoner in disgrace.  Stripped of all his armor and trappings of the Order, he now wanders these tunnels in search of food, water, and a way to restore his honor in the eyes of Ustan and the Overlord.

mobName: Ustan, Knight of the Order of the Light
mobShortDesc: Ustan, the revered Knight of the Order of the Light stands here.
mobLongDesc: Ustan the Just.  Ustan the Holy.  Ustan the Righteous.  These are all names that have been associated with this powerful knight that you see before you.  Now in his declining years, you can see that this man was once a powerful warrior.  Ustan spends the golden years of his service here in the Tower, keeping his eyes on the horizon at all times, ever vigilant of the forces of evil.

mobShortDesc: The Overlord of the Canticle stands before you.
mobLongDesc: The Overlord is here dressed in a full suit of bronze battle armor.  His face is covered with a mask of the purest silver.  From the edges of the mask you can see a blue light emanate, bringing to mind the rumors of the origins of this creature.  Is it true that the Overlord is the spawn of some demon?  Could this explain the Demi-Wolves that guard these chambers? Whatever it's origins, this creature is enormous, standing well over seven feet tall.  His glowing eyes penetrate you as you try to determine your next move.

mobShortDesc: A Demi-Wolf sits in the shadows, guarding the door.
mobLongDesc: The Demi-Wolf is a dangerous animal born of magic and darkness.  Half demon and half wolf, this evil creature has been bent to the will of the master of the Canticle.  Loyal to none but the Overlord, this creature makes the perfect protector.

mobShortDesc: The Sentinel of the Guard stands here at his post.
mobLongDesc: The knights chosen for the Sentinel of the Guard are truly the elite of the Order.  Weapons ever at the ready, these knights have been chosen for their blind allegiance to the order.  Standing here to guard the Tower, and it's inhabitant Ustan, these men are not to be trifled with.

mobShortDesc: The Blue Rook is standing quietly, eyes closed, and arms raised to the heavens.
mobLongDesc: The Blue Rook stands before you clad in the trappings of his fellow knights, with the lone exception that his is painted a brilliant blue. The lieutenant of the other troops in the Canticle, the Blue Rook passes his time in deep meditation here in his isolated chamber.  While he does not immediately acknowledge your presence, you know instinctively that he is watching your every move very carefully.

mobShortDesc: The Gargon, chained to the wall, is hunched over an evil looking brew.
mobLongDesc: This ragged looking witch that is chained to the wall is truly a pitiful sight. She is filthy and covered from head to toe in warts.  Sweating and working over a foul looking brew (which you hope isn't someone's dinner), she is quite disgusting.

mobShortDesc: An Old Frump hobbles past you, leaning heavily on her cane.
mobLongDesc: This pitiful old maid hobbles around the kitchens on a cane.  Mumbling constantly under her breath, you wonder if she is talking to you, or the voices in her head.  This ancient woman appears to have seen many ages come and go, and as you walk by her, she looks up at you with a scowl.

mobShortDesc: A Rook, warrior of the light stands his guard.
mobLongDesc: You stand in the presence of one of the storied heroes of the Light Crusades, of a time now vanished from our world.  This noble warrior wears his tarnished golden armor with pride, re-living the exploits of his past.  Banished now to patrol the halls of the Canticle, the Rook vigilantly performs his duty, protecting the overlord and the artifacts he protects.

mobShortDesc: The Overlord stands here.
mobLongDesc: A great Demi-God, the Overlord.  His eyes flicker gold and his face is pure bronze.  He tells you it would be wise to leave now.

mobShortDesc: A Demiwolf skulks here, guarding the entrance.
mobLongDesc: A viscious wolf grinds its teeth and growls at you.

mobShortDesc: The Sentinel stands at his post.
mobLongDesc: A stolid, stoic soldier.  He glares icily at the surrounding area.

mobShortDesc: The Blue Rook is sitting here at this desk.
mobLongDesc: A grand knight.  He looks extremely strong, and glows with a blue haze.

mobShortDesc: The Gargon stands here mixing the brew.
mobLongDesc: The kitchen witch is a horrible sight.  She is filthy and covered with warts.  The witch looks ready to cast a spell.

mobShortDesc: An Old Frump sweeps past you.
mobLongDesc: An old Frump stands here cleaning up.  The ugly hag appears to be at least 100 years old.  She looks at you with a scowl.

mobShortDesc: A Rook is standing here.
mobLongDesc: A tall knight of Canticle.  The Rook, a veteran of many holy wars is dressed in golden armor.

mobShortDesc: A blank of primal clay stands here, waiting to be shaped
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.

mobShortDesc: A blank of primal clay stands here, waiting to be shaped
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.

mobShortDesc: A blank of primal clay stands here, waiting to be shaped
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.

mobShortDesc: A blank of primal clay stands here, waiting to be shaped
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.

mobShortDesc: A blank of primal clay stands here, waiting to be shaped
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.

mobShortDesc: The Chaos Master stands before you, his features a blur of changes.
mobLongDesc: As you look at him (it?) you find yourself drawn into a swirling mass of colours and random images.  One minute she looks like a brave knight, the next like a fearsome demon.  The only thing constant about this 'creature' seems to be a large bag that it keeps near it.

mobName: A golem, crafted from the mud of the river.
mobShortDesc: A golem fashioned out of mud stands guard here.
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.

mobShortDesc: In the corner you see a large, stone golem faithfully standing watch.
mobLongDesc: It is a big chunk of rock that has been magically formed into a giant stone creature. He stands here still guarding the city.

mobShortDesc: A small horned lizard flicks his tongue and slithers away.
mobLongDesc: A cute little lizard, that is, if you like reptiles!

mobShortDesc: A few wooden planks lie stacked on a low shelf.
Some broken shards of pottery lie strewn about the floor.
The stone floor of this house has been ripped apart.
Two skeletons lie crushed under a large boulder.
A strong chest lies in one corner of the room.
mobLongDesc: A strong, wooden chest bound with iron straps and a heavy pad-lock on the front.

mobShortDesc: A strange lamia stands here waiting for her next meal.
mobLongDesc: This is a creature with the upper torso of a beautiful woman, but the lower body of a four-legged beast. She licks her lips as she looks at you greedily.

mobShortDesc: You meet a beholder's deadly gaze!
mobLongDesc: It has a large central eye that projects an anti-magic ray and ten eyestalks atop the round body which can do anything from charm you to disintegrate you.  Beholders are not known for their personality.

zoneName: The City of Thalos, Revamp by Boreal
mobName: A golem, crafted from the mud of the river.
mobShortDesc: A golem fashioned out of mud stands guard here.
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.

zoneName: The City of Thalos, Revamp by Boreal
mobShortDesc: In the corner you see a large, stone golem faithfully standing watch.
mobLongDesc: It is a big chunk of rock that has been magically formed into a giant stone creature. He stands here still guarding the city.

zoneName: The City of Thalos, Revamp by Boreal
mobShortDesc: A small horned lizard flicks his tounge and slithers away.
mobLongDesc: A cute little lizard, that is, if you like reptiles!

zoneName: The City of Thalos, Revamp by Boreal
mobShortDesc: A few wooden planks lie stacked on a low shelf.

zoneName: The City of Thalos, Revamp by Boreal
mobShortDesc: Some broken shards of pottery lie strewn about the floor.

zoneName: The City of Thalos, Revamp by Boreal
mobShortDesc: The stone floor of this house has been ripped apart.

zoneName: The City of Thalos, Revamp by Boreal
mobShortDesc: Two skeletons lie crushed under a large boulder.

zoneName: The City of Thalos, Revamp by Boreal
mobShortDesc: A strong chest lies in one corner of the room.
mobLongDesc: A strong, wooBden chest bound with iron straps and a heavy pad-lock on the front.

zoneName: The City of Thalos, Revamp by Boreal
mobShortDesc: A strange lamia stands here waiting for her next meal.
mobLongDesc: This is a creature with the upper torso of a beautiful woman, but the lower body of a four-legged beast. She licks her lips as she looks at you greedily.

zoneName: The City of Thalos, Revamp by Boreal
mobShortDesc: You meet a beholder's deadly gaze!
mobLongDesc: It has a large central eye that projects an anti-magic ray and ten eyestalks atop the round body which can do anything from charm you to disintegrate you.  Beholders are not known for their personality.

mobShortDesc: Sensei Ryo, master of this dojo stands here, teaching his students the way.
mobLongDesc: You see before you a very strong and lithe man, his muscles toned to perfection from years of hard training.  Even though he is a great deal shorter than you, he would still make a formidable opponent.

mobShortDesc: Seijuro, first student of the One True Way is here, practicing yari techniques.
mobLongDesc: Seijuro, the oldest son of the Shogun stands here, seemingly bored with the lessons that ryo is trying to teach.  He has no use for the warrior arts, preferring to spend his time lounging about in geisha houses drinking sake.

mobShortDesc: Kempo, novice student of the way stands here with a yari in hand.
mobLongDesc: Kempo stands before you , wielding a razor-edged yari.  Even though he is the Shogun's younger son and therefore lacks the prestige of his brother, you can tell that he is a much better warrior than Seijuro.

mobShortDesc: A large, shadowy panther prepares to pounce on you!
mobLongDesc: A large, black panther stalks about here silently. Just as you get the feeling that you've gone unnoticed, its rock hard leg muscles tamp down as it prepares to pounce!

mobShortDesc: A priest dressed in fine silks kneels here in meditation.
mobLongDesc: You see a middle-aged man, forty to fifty years of age, wearing a finely embroidered white silk kimono and a tall, pointed hat. He is absolutely motionless, seeking nothing more than enlightenment.

mobShortDesc: A black garbed ninja stands ready to attack!
mobLongDesc: Standing before you is one of the Shogun's personal assassins, one of the most lethal and skilled ninja that money can buy. He wears entirely black clothing, including the hood typical of ninja garb. In addition, you notice a dark leather strap, which holds his Ninja-to diagonally across his back. A dull looking silver buckle holds the two ends of the strap together and you can make out the faintly engraved crest of the Shogun upon it.

mobShortDesc: The Shogun stands here, angered that you have disturbed him.
mobLongDesc: He is a samurai of very noble birth, and from looking at him you believe the tales told of his honor and prowess as a warrior. It is painfully apparent that you have angered him by your intrusion, and now he just seems intent on killing you.
actionFlags: SENTINEL ISNPC WIMPY AGGWA MEMORY AGGNO ARM

mobShortDesc: A darkly-clothed assassin is here, waiting to bring your life to an end.
mobLongDesc: He coolly examines you, searching for your weaknesses, A wicked smile crosses his lips, then he attacks!

mobShortDesc: An immense jade dragon skeleton prepares to smite you!
mobLongDesc: The huge beast turns its head to face you and bellows out a huge roar! Obviously furious at you, it readies its huge bulk to crush you like the insect that you are. Its massive body of jade 'bones' seems to be held together by the same powerful magical forces that held the throne together just a few seconds earlier. It slithers its body around to strike, not enough time to do anything but run or fight!
attackType: BITE TAILSLAM SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL SKILL SPELL CAST SPELL CAST
attackTarget: RAN_ROOM BUFFER RAN_GROUP SELF SELF SELF RAN_ROOM

mobShortDesc: The mighty god of war Hachiman prepares to strike you dead.
mobLongDesc: You see before you a large and rather unusual looking samurai, wearing bright red armor and wielding a deadly dragon handled tanto. He grins wickedly at you, knowing full well that your soul will be his when you die.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY SPHERE INFRAVISION DODGE HIDE INVUL DUAL

mobShortDesc: A ragged-looking samurai stands here, almost ghostly in appearance.
mobLongDesc: He is a ghostlike apparition, apparently caught between the land of the living and the realm of the dead.

mobShortDesc: A large warhorse is here, its transparent mane billowing in the wind.
mobLongDesc: You see a horse.. A very large horse with transparent skin which allows you to see the barely visible skeleton beneath.

mobShortDesc: A spectral warlord is here, pondering strategy for the battle.
mobLongDesc: He appears to have been a very high ranking samurai, a general or some other highly respected officer.  His earthly position means nothing here, as he now serves the war god Hachiman.

mobShortDesc: Miyamoto Musashi, the uber-deadly swordsman, calmly surveys the battlefield.
mobLongDesc: There is a battle-hardened look to this samurai which speaks of tremendous experience and expertise.  Armed with a gleaming katana and a smaller sword - a wakizashi - at his side, he is the original master of the two swords style of combat.  There is a glint in his eye as he gazes back at you which makes you think he might not even need a second sword...
affectedByFlags: DETECT-ALIGNMENT DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY SPHERE DODGE DUAL
mobImmune: KICK CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DISINTEGRATE SUMMON BACKSTAB ASSAULT

mobShortDesc: Miyamoto Musashi, the deadliest swordsman ever blocks your way.
mobLongDesc: You see a samurai whose movements remind you of a panther, strong yet graceful. He has a fire in his eye that lets you know he isn't afraid to die, but if you attack you surely will. You also notice that he is wielding two identical katana, and you suddenly realize that this is the renowned swordsman Musashi.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-ALIGNMENT DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY SPHERE PROTECT-EVIL DUAL
mobImmune: FIRE ELECTRIC POISON PUMMEL DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE
attackType: PUMMEL PUNCH BASH KICK PUMMEL DISARM
attackTarget: RAN_GROUP BUFFER RAN_GROUP GROUP LEADER RAN_GROUP

mobShortDesc: Raiden, the God of Thunder, stands ready to barrage you with thunderbolts.
mobLongDesc: A very large bearded man with rough, scaly skin the color of burnt leather and hands ending in razor-sharp talons stands here, ready to put an end to your pitiful mortal existence.
attackType: KICK PUNCH SPELL CAST SPELL CAST

mobShortDesc: A castle guard armed with a yari charges at you screaming!
mobLongDesc: Upon seeing you, the guard grips his spear tightly, lets out a loud scream and charges right at you!! Perhaps you should have asked before coming up here?

mobShortDesc: An old man dressed in simple clothes stands here in silent contemplation.
mobLongDesc: You see an old withered up man, standing behind the counter mixing herbs into a strange concoction.

mobShortDesc: The grand shukenja, guardian of this temple, kneels here in meditation.
mobLongDesc: You see before you an ancient man who has fully devoted his life to the task of gaining knowledge and spiritual enlightenment. He wears the typical garb of a priest: a faded orange sash and straw sandals, hidden beneath his priestly garb you notice a suit of O-yoroi, the sacred armor of the samurai.

mobShortDesc: A monk is here, striking the gong in a perfect rhythm.
mobLongDesc: You see a yamabushi, a travelling warrior-priest, dressed in the typical orange sash of monks, yet he carries a katana at his side. He has devoted his life to perfecting his skill and to the pursuit of reaching inner peace.

mobShortDesc: One of the shogun's elite bushi guards is here, eyeing you suspiciously.
mobLongDesc: You see a large and very muscular guard, he is armed with only a yari and a wakizashi, but he would still make a very dangerous foe.  He has sworn to protect the shogun at any cost and would gladly die to attain this end.

mobShortDesc: You sense a tremendous demonic power in the room, waiting to strike!
mobLongDesc: Arago is indeed a fearsome looking creature. It stands about the size of an ogre. Blackened, charred skin hangs loosely on its body in wrinkled folds. Its eyes are bloodshot and blood flows from them where tears normally would. It has four long fangs, two extending upward nearly to its eyes, and two extending well below its chin. It emits a throaty growl and you truly wish you were anywhere but here!
affectedByFlags: DETECT-ALIGNMENT DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SPHERE INFRAVISION DODGE FLY INVUL DUAL FURY

mobShortDesc: An ancient oni female is here, preparing for her next dark ritual.
mobLongDesc: She is an ancient creature, her body twisted and deformed by centuries of exposure to strange and powerful magicks. Even though her physical form looks frail and unthreatening, you get the distinct impression that she could turn you into a smoking heap of ash with but a thought.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY PROTECT-EVIL INFRAVISION DODGE INVUL DUAL FURY
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST

mobShortDesc: A small Oni is here, picking its teeth and grinning at you.
mobLongDesc: You see a small ogre-like creature with small, blunt horns protruding from its head, strange pinkish skin and three fingers and toes. It appears friendly enough, but then you notice the sharp claws and fangs which it seemed to be hiding.
affectedByFlags: INVISIBLE PROTECT-EVIL INFRAVISION DODGE HIDE DUAL

mobShortDesc: A baby oni is here, tearing hungrily at the corpse.
mobLongDesc: Looking at it, what you notice most is the blood. Blood is dripping from its fangs and claws, and when it looks back at you all it sees is its next meal.
actionFlags: SENTINEL ISNPC AGGAP AGGBA SHIELD AGGGOOD

mobShortDesc: Sojobo, king of the tengu, rests here upon his strange throne.
mobLongDesc: You see before you a venerable old tengu with a thick mane of white hair on his head, atop which he wears a small, round cap much like those worn by yamabushi priests.  His tiny, hummingbird-like feathers glimmer brightly in the dim light that is present here.  He looks right into your eyes and beams a warm smile.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY SPHERE PROTECT-EVIL DODGE DUAL
attackType: SPELL SKILL SPELL CAST SPELL SKILL SPELL CAST

mobShortDesc: The master of all the Shogun's guards is here, watching everything closely.
mobLongDesc: He stands before you confidently, knowing full well that any aggressive move against him will bring dozens of guards rushing to his aid.  He has served the Shogun many years and has worked his way through the ranks to become the master of all his guards.

mobShortDesc: A very large tengu is here, waiting for another victim to play a trick on.
mobLongDesc: The tengu is a strange creature indeed, clearly of magical nature he has the body of a man, but the wings and head of a bird. around his neck is draped a rather unusual looking straw cloak.
actionFlags: SENTINEL SCAVENGER ISNPC STAY-ZONE AGGTH ARM AGGAP SHIELD

mobShortDesc: A small, frail-looking tengu stands here, seemingly frightened of you.
mobLongDesc: You see a small tengu, a part bird part man creature with wings and arms and a funny looking beak that is quite long.  He wears a small black hat on his head, as well as an unusual cloak made of feathers.

mobShortDesc: Tanoshi the Sumo wrestler stands here, waiting for a challenger.
mobLongDesc: Standing before you is an incredibly fat man wearing only a skimpy loincloth around his waist.  His bloated arms and legs are the size of tree trunks, and the swollen belly matches them in stature.  His hair is tied neatly into a topknot, which is held in place by several pin-like sticks.  He scowls at you and drops into the squat fighting position of the sumo wrestler, making the earth tremble beneath your feet.

mobShortDesc: A poor-looking peasant sits here enjoying his steaming bowl of noodles.
mobLongDesc: This fellow appears to be a very hard-working soul, the dirt under his fingernails and the wild, unkempt mass of hair on his head tell you that all that matters to him is the completion of his day's work, in duty to the Shogun.

mobShortDesc: A drunken ronin sits here, waiting for an excuse to make trouble.
mobLongDesc: He looks as if he was once an honorable warrior, but now is nothing more than a drunken ruffian.
actionFlags: SENTINEL SCAVENGER ISNPC AGGNI AGGPA AGGAP AGGCO

mobShortDesc: Yoshi is standing here, cooking like a madman.
mobLongDesc: Yoshimitsu is a true master of the culinary arts. It is even rumored that he was the personal chef to the shogun.

mobShortDesc: Kinshu is standing here, ready to show you his weapons.
mobLongDesc: Kinshu's arms look as if they've been forged from the same steel he uses to make his weapons from, not a trace of weakness can be seen in his visage. He is perhaps one of the strongest men you've ever met.

mobShortDesc: A small man dressed in ninja's clothing is crouched in the shadows.
mobLongDesc: From his well-scarred face and arms, you can tell that he is well acquainted with the warrior arts and the pain that is inflicted by them. The cold stare he levels at you lets you know right away he doesn't give a damn if you live or die.
affectedByFlags: SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY DODGE SNEAK HIDE DUAL
attackType: PUMMEL PUMMEL DISARM SPELL SKILL PUNCH SPELL SKILL KICK SPELL SKILL BASH
attackTarget: RAN_GROUP BUFFER RAN_GROUP SELF RAN_ROOM ROOM GROUP GROUP RAN_GROUP

mobShortDesc: The Tea Master is sitting here stirring his tea.
mobLongDesc: You see a very old man, older by far than anyone you know, but he still exudes a sense of strength and wisdom. You feel like he could answer any question asked of him.

mobShortDesc: A shifty-looking farmer stands here, almost as if he's guarding something.
mobLongDesc: His dark eyes tell you he'd cut your throat as soon as look at you. Maybe it's best if you left him alone.

mobShortDesc: An enormous Oni leaps out of the shadows towards you!
mobLongDesc: This Oni is rather different from the small pink ones you've seen. Aside from its bluish skin color, it is more than twice as tall as the pink oni, and its claws and fangs are much larger and deadly looking.
affectedByFlags: INVISIBLE DETECT-ALIGNMENT DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE PROTECT-EVIL DODGE SNEAK HIDE DUAL

mobShortDesc: A warhorse from the fabled line of Tarion stands silently here.
mobLongDesc: This animal is a fine specimen, one of the few war-charger horses left from the ancient lost Tarion city.  They were bred for endurance, speed, and agility, and in the deep green eyes you can sense the power which this warhorse still commands. The art of War is its specialty, and it would hesitate at nothing to follow the commands of its master.
mobImmune: FIRE ELECTRIC POISON PUMMEL KICK PUNCH SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DRAIN DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT

mobShortDesc: One of the lost Cavaliers from the ancient Tarion city is wandering the dunes.
mobLongDesc: As you gaze upon this seemingly broken man, your eyes happen upon his faded blue stare.  He doesn't speak, merely nods your way and scans the horizon, perhaps still seeking his place in the Holy City of Tarion.  He is a part of the elite squadron loyal still to the lost city, disbanded when the great Sandstorm bore down and swallowed everything.  Perhaps you should leave him alone, as he moves to continue along the endless dunes.

mobShortDesc: A tiny scorpion scuttles in front of you.
mobLongDesc: Although its a miniscule creature, its sting can be very deadly!

mobShortDesc: A small snake wiggles in the sand here.
mobLongDesc: A tiny creature, the snake is of little threat to you.

mobShortDesc: There is a giant snake here.
A mazekeeper is here.
mobLongDesc: He looks VERY tough.

mobShortDesc: A man in waiting is here.
A barrack guard is here.
An unwanted daughter is here.
An unwanted son is here.
A dwarf is here.
A dwarven peon is awaiting help here.
The dwarven doctor is here.
mobLongDesc: He is a very skilled surgeon, with hands of steel.

mobShortDesc: A dwarven mine leader is here.
mobLongDesc: The mine leader is very big and very strong.

mobShortDesc: A dwarven mineworker is here.
mobLongDesc: The mineworker is very tired, and very dirty, and he has bulging muscles.

mobShortDesc: A giant is here.
mobLongDesc: The giant is about 8 feet tall, with arms of steel, and looks in excellent physical condition.

mobShortDesc: A giant lizard is here.
mobLongDesc: This scaly creature looks like it is well adapted to it's underground habitat.  He looks very powerful.

mobShortDesc: Granite Head, the baker, is waiting for a customer here.
mobLongDesc: Granite Head is covered with flour and grains.

mobShortDesc: There is the Hide & Tooth storekeeper standing here, waiting patiently.
mobLongDesc: The storekeeper is very rotund, but looks in excellent condition.

mobShortDesc: A wraith is awaiting your first move here.
mobLongDesc: A black, almost transparent wraith.

mobShortDesc: A dwarven mining worker is here.
mobLongDesc: He is very dirty, and looks extremely over-worked.

mobShortDesc: A dwarven guard is here.
mobLongDesc: The guard looks very tough and mean.

mobShortDesc: An alchemist wanders by in search of magical herbs.
mobLongDesc: Rare herbs are rumored to grow only in the canyon.

mobShortDesc: The illusionist seeks the aid of the elemental forces.
mobLongDesc: He seeks their aid for a powerful new spell of deception.

mobShortDesc: A warrior of the Rainbow Cult  swears his loyalty.
mobLongDesc: The Rainbow Cult has received special powers for their service to the elemental forces.

mobShortDesc: An elemental magician seeks magical stones for a spell.
mobLongDesc: The elemental magician has come here in search of the fabled Stone of Surrender which can be used to render opponents senseless.

mobShortDesc: A Hurricane rages across the sky.
mobLongDesc: A humanoid figure seems to be trapped in the rushing wind.

mobShortDesc: The Rock Monster considers you in stony silence.
mobLongDesc: A humanoid figure trapped in stone seems alive.

mobShortDesc: The Ice Bandit strikes cold fear in your heart.
mobLongDesc: A humanoid figure encased in ice but still apparently alive.

mobShortDesc: The Magneto considers zapping you for the heck of it.
mobLongDesc: A humanoid figure seems to be trapped in the field of magnetism.

mobShortDesc: The Blue Flame burns mysteriously here.
mobLongDesc: As you look you see what seems to be a face and almost a humanoid figure somehow trapped in the fire.

mobShortDesc: A small eddie current swirls junk around here.
mobLongDesc: The magical eddie current is a manifestation of air elemental.

mobShortDesc: A dust cloud blowing by makes you sneeze.
mobLongDesc: The magical dust cloud is a cross between air and earth.

mobShortDesc: A sub-atomic particle is too small for you to see.
mobLongDesc: The magical manifestation of energy.

mobShortDesc: The air is magically misty here.
mobLongDesc: The magical mist is a cross between water and air.

mobShortDesc: A mud monster slops around.
mobLongDesc: The magical mud monster is a cross between water and earth.

mobShortDesc: A lava beast spews from place to place.
mobLongDesc: The magical lava beast is a cross between fire and earth.

mobShortDesc: A small blob of acid eats away at the stone aimlessly.
mobLongDesc: The magical blob of acid is a cross between lightning and water.

mobShortDesc: A small spark of electricity fizzles here.
mobLongDesc: Zipping from place to place at the speed of light is tough work.

mobShortDesc: A small rock.
mobLongDesc: It seems to be a small living pebble!

mobShortDesc: A frozen snowflake water elemental.
mobLongDesc: It looks a little blue.

mobShortDesc: A small flickering flame elemental is here.
mobLongDesc: It smolders along the grass aimlessly

mobShortDesc: A small puddle of water elemental.
mobLongDesc: It trickles along the ground and gets your feet wet.

mobShortDesc: The Ruler of the Water elementals.
mobLongDesc: As you look at him he changes to mist, which swirls around you.  Just as you get scared, it reforms in elemental form.

mobShortDesc: The Ruler of the Lightning elementals.
mobLongDesc: As you examine him there is a blinding flash of light and a deafening boom!  You rub your eyes and look and the ruler is there grinning at you.

mobShortDesc: The Ruler of the Air elementals.
mobLongDesc: As you peer at him you seem to be looking at the sky itself.

mobShortDesc: The Ruler of the Fire elementals is standing here.
mobLongDesc: As you look at him he seems to blend in with the fire in his throne.

mobShortDesc: The Ruler of the Earth elementals is blocking earth.
mobLongDesc: He looks as old as the earth itself.  He seems to know all the secrets and knowledge of the Earth.  You cant really tell where he begins and the rock wall ends.

mobShortDesc: A large elemental power blows by.
mobLongDesc: A large elemental, a resident of the canyon.

mobShortDesc: A medium-sized elemental presence can be felt here.
mobLongDesc: A medium elemental, a resident of the canyon

mobShortDesc: A small, rather non-descript elemental thing wanders about.
mobLongDesc: A small elemental, a resident of the canyon.

mobShortDesc: The Elemental Guardian of the canyon.
mobLongDesc: You can't tell which kind of elemental it is, maybe its a bit o all of them?

mobShortDesc: A tiny elemental form wanders about.
mobLongDesc: Rather small for an elemental form, looks like a reject.

mobShortDesc: A hungry cyclops snarls at you!
mobLongDesc: He looks like he's about to have dinner(maybe its you?).

mobShortDesc: A mountain climber is making the same trek that you are.
mobLongDesc: He wants to see what's on the other side of the mountain too.

mobShortDesc: The Great Air Elemental stands guarding the altar.
mobLongDesc: A huge creature made of the most powerful elemental winds is swirling around you. Its towering shape and the huge fists look very dangerous.

mobShortDesc: The Small Air Elemental stands here, guarding something.
mobLongDesc: A small humanoid-shaped creature of made of pure elemental air is swirling in front of you. It looks very threatening.

mobShortDesc: The Great Earth Elemental stands guarding the altar.
mobLongDesc: A huge creature made of the darkest and toughest earth is looming ahead of you. Its towering shape and the huge fists look very dangerous.

mobShortDesc: The Small Earth Elemental stands here, guarding something.
mobLongDesc: A small humanoid-shaped creature of made of pure elemental earth is standing in front of you. It looks very threatening.

mobShortDesc: The Great Fire Elemental stands guarding the altar.
mobLongDesc: A huge creature made of the purest and brightest fire is looming ahead of you. Its towering shape and the huge fists look very dangerous.

mobShortDesc: The Small Fire Elemental stands here, guarding something.
mobLongDesc: A small humanoid-shaped creature of made of pure elemental fire is standing in front of you. It looks very threatening.

mobShortDesc: The Great Water Elemental stands guarding the altar.
mobLongDesc: A huge creature made of the most blue and clear water is looming ahead of you. Its towering shape and the huge fists look very dangerous.

mobShortDesc: The Small Water Elemental stands here, guarding something.
mobLongDesc: A small humanoid-shaped creature of made of pure elemental water is standing in front of you. It looks very threatening.

mobShortDesc: The Animated Tree attacks you by swinging it's branches.
mobLongDesc: The tree has risen from the ground to walk on its roots, and to attack the unwary and violent visitors.

mobShortDesc: The Elven Beastmaster is resting here, after a hard day of hunting.
mobLongDesc: Long silvery hair covers the sleeping face, but the stature of his muscular body hints of the explosive strength lying within his frame. Definitively a terrible opponent for any man, when awake. Obviously, hunting monsters pays off.

mobShortDesc: The blood-thirsty piranha is eagerly trying to bite your leg off.
mobLongDesc: The small fish seems to be nothing but teeth, sharp and vicious teeth. The whole 10" body is silvery in color and has a saw-edged belly. Those teeth close in a scissor-bite dangerously close to your feet.

mobShortDesc: The Treant is standing here, looking like a tree.
mobLongDesc: You are looking at a tree. No, wait! The tree limbs start moving and a face appears in the middle of the trunk. The "skin" is a thick, textured, brown bark. It says : 'Leave my trees at peace! *frown*'

mobShortDesc: Small mole is burrowing its way through the soil.
mobLongDesc: The small mole has just stuck it's head above ground and is looking at you curiously.

mobShortDesc: An innocent-looking elven child is playing with friends.
mobLongDesc: Always ready for some innocent mischief when the protective eye of the mother slips away. No matter how wild'n'playful, this child is polite and kind to his fellow elves. Humans have to just watch for their steps. *grin*

mobShortDesc: The Elven Woman is watching over her children while they play.
mobLongDesc: Sitting in front of a hut on a small bench, the elven woman has a look of peace and restfulness on her face. The playing of her children obviously brings joy to her.

mobShortDesc: The Black Pudding is resting heavily on the floor.
mobLongDesc: The Black Pudding is a 8 feet wide lump of black sticky substance. When it occasionally moves, the floor sizzles underneath it. Small ripples go through the "body" of the pudding, sending tiny lumps of it around itself.

mobShortDesc: The small squirrel is sitting on a branch nearby.
mobLongDesc: Small, happy-looking squirrel is hopping in the trees, from branch to branch, and is chewing a nut.

mobShortDesc: The huge owlbear is snapping it's beak at you menacingly.
mobLongDesc: The huge owlbear is standing in front of you. You can sense it's power, the raw strength of it embodied in it's gigantic paws. It snaps it's beak at you.

mobShortDesc: The sleek and beautiful black panther is pacing back and forth.
mobLongDesc: Never before have you seen such a wonderful beast. Truly, the cat's sleek muscles and graceful movements define it as a silent hunter of the night.

mobShortDesc: The Elven Alchemist is here, selling his potions and scrolls.
mobLongDesc: The elven alchemist is looking very powerful. He points at the sign at the wall and says : 'Take a look at that.' Then he peek under the counter and picks up some potions and puts them on the shelf.
affectedByFlags: SANCTUARY PROTECT-EVIL DODGE INVUL DUAL FURY

mobShortDesc: The Elven Gardenkeeper is digging a hole to plant yet another tree.
mobLongDesc: A young elf, looking fairly strong and able-bodied, is putting his shovel to the best possible use by digging hole for the sapling lying near-by.

mobShortDesc: The Elven Gardenkeeper is tending to her flowers.
mobLongDesc: A beautiful young elven lady is looking after the flowers in the garden. She whispers something to them, and they immediately grow stronger.

mobShortDesc: The Elven Sage is here, browsing through some ancient tomes.
mobLongDesc: Absolutely the oldest elf you have ever seen. Browsing through the huge tomes and scrolls with vigor and enthusiasm like there would be no tomorrow, and thus doesn't notice you at first.

mobShortDesc: The village guard is standing here, looking alert.
mobLongDesc: The elven guard is here just as a precaution, not to persecute you or slay you for the tiniest offence. Regardless of that, mind your manners.

mobShortDesc: The Elven Druid is sitting on a large wooden bench and grinding something.
mobLongDesc: The Druid is grinding many kind of seeds with a grinding stone. The dust has all the colors you can find in a forest.

mobShortDesc: The Elven Druid is here, gathering seeds from a strange plant.
mobLongDesc: The Druid is busy with preparing to tonight's ceremony by gathering the seeds of several different plants.

mobShortDesc: The Elven Archdruid is walking back and forth and tending to the plants.
mobLongDesc: The Archdruid looks old, which is uncommon for elves. Wisdom unattainable for us shortlived humans is visible in her eyes. Her main concern seems to be the surrounding nature's welfare.

mobShortDesc: An elven Champion is standing here looking at the trophies.
mobLongDesc: You first notice his bulging muscles beneath the clothing intended to be loose fitting. You then notice his size, he does not appear to be any normal elf.  He towers over all other elves you have ever seen.  It is easy to see why this is the champion Warrior.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SANCTUARY SPHERE PROTECT-EVIL INFRAVISION INVUL DUAL

mobShortDesc: An Elven Guard is playing cards at the table.
mobLongDesc: This elf is a younger guard. Judging by the way he handles his weapon, he's rather new to this whole guarding thing. Until he learns more, he will not be much of a match for any fighter.

mobName: The Chief of the elven guard
mobShortDesc: A lazy-looking Elf lies on his bed snoring loudly.
mobLongDesc: This elf looks somehow more experienced than any guard in the village guard. By the look of the uniform he is probably the chief of the village guard. You notice some scars on the hands and one on the neck of the elf. He has obviously been in battle in his days.

mobShortDesc: A nice-looking Elf is standing in the reception.
mobLongDesc: You notice a tired look on her face.

mobShortDesc: A fat Elf is standing behind the bar taking orders.
mobLongDesc: You notice a tired look on his face.

mobShortDesc: An Elf named Quintor is here counting money behind the counter.
mobLongDesc: You notice a tired look on his face.

mobShortDesc: A Tiny Elven mage is floating behind the counter.
mobLongDesc: You notice a tired look on his face.

mobShortDesc: A Large Elven armoursmith is walking around behind the counter.
mobLongDesc: You notice a tired look on his face.

mobShortDesc: A Large Elven weaponsmith is walking behind the counter.
mobLongDesc: You notice a tired look on his face.

mobShortDesc: An Elven Guard is walking around, protecting the villagers.
mobLongDesc: This pretty young elf stands guard along the path, watching for intruders. She allows the peaceful to pass, but will defend her land with her life.

mobShortDesc: An Elven Soldier is standing here guarding the path.
mobLongDesc: He is a young, yet powerful elf. He was sent by the chief of the village to guard the path from any intruder.

mobShortDesc: An Elven Guardian is standing here guarding the portal.
mobLongDesc: This is a robust built elf in his best years and as far as you can tell in prime physical condition.  Indeed, he can fight.

mobShortDesc: A large kobold wearing a candle on his head, leans over some plans.
mobLongDesc: A small pair of glasses perches precariously on his piglike nose as he scratches his chin. Wisps of hair sprout from his skull, sticking out in all directions. Clumps of grease dot his head shining brightly in the candle light.
attackType: PUMMEL BASH SPELL CAST SPELL CAST

mobShortDesc: A small green skinned humanoid toils with a small pick.
mobLongDesc: A piglike snout protrudes from a small face. Beady eyes peer out from thick brows darting across the walls in search of ores and shiny gems. A small candle is perched on his head, melted wax running down on his large forehead. Thick green hands grasp a small pick, rusted tines streaked with rock scars and dust.

mobShortDesc: A delicate deer like creature grazes quietly, ears and tail twitching quickly.
mobLongDesc: A soft tail twitches as a faint breeze carries a collection of scents across the grass. A soft face holds a small nose in the air, sniffing carefully as it supports a towering set of twirling antlers.

mobShortDesc: A mass of thrashing coils twist and writhe in chaos below the surface.
mobLongDesc: Thick green coils thrash wildly merging into a frothing swirl of scales and water. Beady eyes peer out from the center, a wedge shaped head bobbing in and out of the looping body.

mobShortDesc: The huge reptilian Demon is slashing around with its tail.
mobLongDesc: Lying atop a huge podium of marble, there is an enormous horned lizard with huge, blood-dripping fangs. It's gigantic paws are also dripping blood. Just hope it won't be your blood next time.

mobShortDesc: The Greater Oglozt is pointing at you with it's hand and muttering.
mobLongDesc: The gigantic lizard man is shoving you back and raises it's huge fist to pound you to slimy pulp. It's eyes are glowing hellishly, in red.

mobShortDesc: A Lesser Oglozt is reaching out with it's 4 clawed forefeet at you.
mobLongDesc: The huge lizard man has warts and scars all over it's slimy body. The seemingly bottomless ravenous jaw is clasping shut with anger. It flails it's arms and charges towards you eyes glowing hellish red. Ominous silence seems to surround it.

mobKeywords: hag night nelgatha disfigured female humanoid
mobShortDesc: A hideously ugly and disfigured female humanoid is here, grooming herself.
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.
actionFlags: SCAVENGER ISNPC AGGRESSIVE STAY-ZONE OPEN-DOOR MEMORY
affectedByFlags: DETECT-ALIGNMENT DETECT-INVISIBLE DETECT-MAGIC SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY CURSE INFRAVISION DODGE

mobKeywords: nightcrawler night crawler grey centipede creature
mobShortDesc: A grey centipede-like creature crawls about the ground, seeking prey.
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.
mobImmune: SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DISEMBOWEL SUMMON

mobShortDesc: A terrifying undead beast is here, searching for victims.
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.
mobImmune: SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DISEMBOWEL SUMMON

mobShortDesc: The zombie form of an undead troll shambles about, looking for victims.
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.
mobImmune: SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DISEMBOWEL SUMMON

mobShortDesc: The Griffon Captain towers over you.
mobLongDesc: A griffon even larger than the others with a stare to freeze you in your tracks. He wears his field armor, prepared for battle at all times.

mobShortDesc: A large rat is here scurrying about the ground.
mobLongDesc: A large rat glares at you through yellow eyes.

mobShortDesc: A gigantic griffon stands before you.
mobLongDesc: A large creature, part lion, part eagle, it has a wingspan of ten feet or more.

mobShortDesc: An oppressive shadow unfurls in the middle of the room and surrounds you.
mobLongDesc: An absence of light, a being unto itself, pulses in the middle of the room, a severe event horizon of darkness at its edges.  It is ever- changing, always moving, if that is even the correct term for the way it winds and rends its way through space.  A being of pure shadow and exceptional power, thirsty for lifeforce, it stalks the realm.

mobShortDesc: A shadow emerges from the darkness, and takes a wild slash at you.
mobLongDesc: The shape of that creature of darkness is not a very solid one. Anything that might resemble a face is located at approximately the same height as your own face. In the middle of that face there are two reddishly glowing orbs.

mobShortDesc: A Mirror Image is standing here.
mobLongDesc: You seem to be looking at someone very familiar. There is something so friendly and nice on that face, but at the same time it is twisted and corrupted, making shivers run through your spine.

mobShortDesc: A withered hand is scurrying towards you on the floor.
mobLongDesc: You see a severed hand scurrying to reach your legs. The only thing that scares you with the appearance of these hands, are the claws on those hands. The claws are razor sharp and long enough to tear your legs apart.

mobShortDesc: A withered looking wight is attacking you with a loud scream.
mobLongDesc: You are looking at a shriveled corpse of a human, with it's eyes glowing in hellish red light. It reaches out at you with its clawed hands, making a low moaning noise at the same time.

mobShortDesc: A wraith emerges in front of you from the ether, and reaches out for you life.
mobLongDesc: You are looking at a suffering spirit of a man clad in tight leather outfit. It attacks you with both its shadowy arms, draining your life with it's mere presence.

mobShortDesc: A skeleton dripping with black water rises from the stagnant waters.
mobLongDesc: The skeleton you're looking at, has bony claws and the fleshless grin on its skull. Laughing at you, even when its jaw bone has almost dropped, this undead attacks you. The bones and tattered rags are dripping with stagnant water.

mobShortDesc: A skeleton wearing tattered rags is reaching out with its bony claws at you.
mobLongDesc: The skeleton you're looking at, has bony claws and the fleshless grin on its skull. Laughing at you, even when its jaw bone has almost dropped, this undead attacks you.

mobShortDesc: A decaying corpse is walking towards you, with its claws reaching out for you.
mobLongDesc: The ghoul is a creature of undeath, with it's reddishly glowing eyes and claws dripping with blood. You have heard of the paralyzing powers of these horrible creatures.

mobShortDesc: An ancient statue stands in the room, guarding the way.
mobLongDesc: You are looking at a statue towering in the height of 8 feet. It is made of solid granite, and has rune inscribed metal bands here and there to keep the statue alive and unmarred by time.

mobShortDesc: A shadowy presence rises from the center of the room and surrounds you.
mobLongDesc: As you try to find something specific to look at, the shadows all around you take several different shapes. Suddenly the shadows form a figure of a man clad in dark clothing, and in the next moment, it resembles a huge black bird. All the time, during the changes, there are enough of shadows to fill the room.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE INFRAVISION DODGE HIDE DUAL FURY

mobShortDesc: An apparition of a young girl is sitting here, combing her long, flowing hair.
mobLongDesc: You see a young girl combing her hair in front of a largish table mirror. Her long, flowing hair has already turned almost white, and the change has surely been a shock to her, happening at such a young age. Just as you are about to leave, she turns and looks straight at you. Her eyes have lost their life, and the face is also a dead one.

mobShortDesc: An apparition of a girl is standing here, looking out and waiting.
mobLongDesc: You see a strikingly beautiful girl standing by the panorama window, looking outside. Her flowing robes make rustling noises as she shifts her position from time to time. Suddenly, just by looking at her, you notice that you can see the scenery outside the window, even where she is standing.

mobShortDesc: An apparition of a beautiful, young girl is here, sleeping in the bed.
mobLongDesc: You see a truly beautiful girl sleeping peacefully on the large canopy bed, partly covered by the bluish silk covers. Her face is a bit pale and after looking at her for a while, you notice a slight transparency in her features. You can just barely make out the bed through her figure.

mobShortDesc: A transparent figure of a man is looking out of the window.
mobLongDesc: As you look at the figure, you see the madness burning behind those glassy eyes. The man standing in front of you has obviously been dead for ages, but he isn't a corpse anymore. He has become one of those heinous creatures, a ghost.

mobShortDesc: Kalten the Necromancer is resting here at his table.
mobLongDesc: Kalten is tall and old.  Staring at him, you become awed at the knowledge he must possess.  Kalten is the Kings' advisor.

mobShortDesc: Lorin the Warder is standing here.
mobLongDesc: He has a smile on his face.  This man is a faithful servant to the king.

mobShortDesc: Sphen is here organizing his goods.
mobLongDesc: He is very old and feeble, yet with his obvious magical abilities, he would be a harsh foe in battle.

mobShortDesc: A Zyekian commander stands here.
mobLongDesc: He has extremely large muscles.

mobShortDesc: A large elk is here.
mobLongDesc: It has very large antlers.

mobShortDesc: A baby woolly bear is here gnawing on some wood.
mobLongDesc: Even though it is a baby, it is taller than your knees.

mobShortDesc: A large woolly bear sits here watching for her young.
mobLongDesc: She has many legs, and is covered with large hairs.

mobShortDesc: A large black dragon evolves from the water.
mobLongDesc: His fangs, like swords, his claws, daggers.  He bellows loudly. You have disturbed his rest.

mobShortDesc: Charon awaits his payment.
mobLongDesc: He is covered in a pitch-black cloak.  Your knees give way to fear as you look at him.  Slowly he reaches a skeletal hand towards you.

mobShortDesc: A merchant is here trying to make a bargain.
mobLongDesc: He is finely dressed and smells of scented oils.

mobShortDesc: A baby is crawling around on all fours.
mobLongDesc: Isn't he adorable?

mobShortDesc: A blue conger grabs onto your leg and starts gnawing away.
mobLongDesc: It is long and thin.  This eel-like creature loves the taste of blood.

mobShortDesc: A young boy is playing here.
mobLongDesc: His face is covered with dirt and his clothes are dirty, but all he cares about is playing.  You see him act out a great battle of a knight fighting a dragon.

mobShortDesc: The castle cook is here preparing some gourmet foods.
mobLongDesc: He is very short and bald.  The only hair on his head is a long mustache which curves upwards.  He claps his hands and a few servants start running in different directions.

mobShortDesc: A servant is here carrying a tray.
mobLongDesc: She looks calm.  There is no hatred in hers eyes, only love.

mobShortDesc: The Zyekian Queen is resting here.
mobLongDesc: She looks very peaceful.  Nothing could harm a hair on this beautiful beings head.

mobShortDesc: A legendary nomad stands proudly before you.
mobLongDesc: The legend of the beastman standing before you is known far and wide in the land.  He fears nothing that breathes.  He has fought proudly and victoriously in many battles.  One look at him tells you why.  He is truly the Lord of Nomads.

mobShortDesc: Something rushes at you.
mobLongDesc: Oh yea, something got a hold of you.

mobShortDesc: A giant leech jumps from beneath the water at you.
mobLongDesc: You see large needle-like fangs come from an opening underneath its bulging eyes.

mobShortDesc: The King is here, sitting on his throne.
mobLongDesc: He is dressed in fine clothing.  Clean shaven and well mannered, he looks at you with all knowing eyes.  A broad smile covers his face as he greets you.  He is the last survivor of the great Jiran race.

mobShortDesc: A Zyekian mage is here carving something into his staff.
mobLongDesc: He is covered only by a simple robe.

mobShortDesc: A Zyekian cleric is studying a book he has picked up here.
mobLongDesc: Deep in study, he barely notices you, or simply, ignores you.

mobShortDesc: Orak is here, feeding on small fish.
mobLongDesc: He has very large tusks protruding from his mouth, making you feel a little uneasy, yet you find yourself fascinated by this beast.

mobShortDesc: A small grey owl is resting on a fallen log here.
mobLongDesc: The grey owl is no larger than a small melon, but its talons make it a fierce survivor.

mobShortDesc: A large white owl is sitting on a branch here.
mobLongDesc: The owl is very beautiful, having large white feathers and midnight black eyes.  It is a very graceful creature.

mobShortDesc: An extremely large ox is resting here.
mobLongDesc: The ox is very large, and smells none to pleasant.

mobShortDesc: A field worker is here tending to his crop.
mobLongDesc: He was sewing the ground with small seeds, but as you look at him, he raises he hoe, leans upon it, and whips a small bead of sweat from his brow.

mobShortDesc: A Zyekian guard stands here on the alert.
mobLongDesc: Obviously this man takes pride in his job, as you notice his armor and equipment are very clean and organized. From the looks of his muscles, you can see why he was chosen to be a guard.

mobShortDesc: A small Zyekian scout is here.
mobLongDesc: From the looks of him, he has been awake for days searching the woods for signs of trouble.

mobShortDesc: A dynzee jumps at you from the trees.
mobLongDesc: The dynzee is a small, spider-like creature.  It's no taller than your knees, but its fangs make it a sizable opponent.

mobShortDesc: The Gatekeeper is here, polishing his sword.
mobLongDesc: The Gatekeeper stands against the gate here.  He is very tall, with dark black hair, making him appear young, but as you look into his eyes you feel that this man is much older and wiser than he appears to be.

mobShortDesc: The digger prototype is breaks the earth.
mobLongDesc: The original digger, birthed directly from the replicator. Unlike the diggers you've seen thus far, it's body isn't made from stone and earth.  It appears to be composed of dense metals unlike anything found on this plane.  The script on its body is blinding.  It's army of legs cut through the earth like water.

mobName: A staggering sixty four legged digger
mobShortDesc: A staggering sixty four legged digger tears the earth.
mobLongDesc: It's hard to grasp the scale of this machine.  You'd hurt your neck trying to pan your view from one side of its body to the other.  The armored plates on its side look like they'd function just well as castle walls.  The sheer number of legs is dizzying, each tearing the earth apart with each step. It's a terrifying large machine.  Luckily, it's paying absolutely no attention to you.

mobName: An enormous thirty two legged digger
mobShortDesc: An enormous thirty two legged digger works the ground.
mobLongDesc: This slow moving machine is massive.  It looks like a tangle of legs that is waging war on the earth itself.  It has no apparent sensors, but it's body is absolutely stacked with armor.  Each of its legs looks like a man sized incisor designed to pierce solid rock.

mobShortDesc: The crawler prototype is a model worker.
mobLongDesc: The original crawler, birthed directly from the replicator.  Unlike the crawlers you've seen thus far, it's body isn't made from stone and earth.  It appears to be composed of heavy metals not found on this plane.  The script's on its body are almost blinding.  It's a vessel of barely contained potential energy.

mobShortDesc: A sturdy sixteen legged crawler
mobLongDesc: Designed for a more demanding environment, this crawler has double the number of legs and is more heavily armored.  It's body shines with energy as it lumbers along moving burdens that are beyond its diminutive sisters.

mobShortDesc: An industrious eight legged crawler is hard at work.
mobLongDesc: The machine workhorse.  This crawler is the most common machine to be found. It's versatile, moderately armored, but with limited senses.  It's entire purpose is to serve and fulfills its purpose without deviation.

mobShortDesc: The buzzer prototype sees everything.
mobLongDesc: The original buzzer, birthed directly from the replicator.  Unlike the buzzers you've seen thus far, it's body isn't made from stone and earth.  It appears to be composed of metals not of this plane.  The scripts on it's body shine brightly.  It's a sleek, killing machine.

mobShortDesc: A menacing four legged buzzer scans the room.
mobLongDesc: This hunter killer acts as flying security.  It has four legs with razor sharp talons.  It flies in formation with the rest of its pack, buzzing aggressively towards any perceived intruders.  It has sturdy light armor about it's torso, but only has a single eye.  It's sensors are not as good as it's two legged cousin, but it packs more of a punch.

mobShortDesc: A slight two legged buzzer tracks you.
mobLongDesc: This fragile looking machine is little more than a couple of legs attached to a pair of wings.  It has three eyes that glow crimson red.  Very little can escape it's detection.  It swivels back and forth as it's gaze sweeps across the area, looking for intruders.

mobShortDesc: A major techno virus adapts before your eyes.
mobLongDesc: The source of the corruption.  The major techno virus assimilates everything it touches, subverting it's will, and converting it's being.  It's an amorphic being, capable of adapting on the fly to any situation it faces. It draws deeply from the surrounding power, using the energy funneled from the scripts in the ruins.  Perhaps, that is its weakness?

mobShortDesc: The corrupted replicator waits for input.
mobLongDesc: The machine race does not have parents strictly speaking.  Instead, they are born fully formed from the replicator.  This machine looks unlike anything you've ever seen before.  It's composed of metals similar to the prototypes, but in pattern and shape that is wholly different.  It doesn't appear to be able to move from where it sits.  It's body is covered in intricate script circles that glow with an unhealthy hew.  Perhaps it's the veins of organic matter growing throughout its body.  The replicator has a multitude of crimson eyes, all focusing on you.
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST

mobShortDesc: You see a faint, man-sized figure standing in the middle of the room.
mobLongDesc: As you try to see the incredibly fast-moving figure in front of you, you hear a slight hissing sound emanating from the vision. 'Go awayy..', it says and charges towards you...
affectedByFlags: INVISIBLE DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE DODGE SNEAK HIDE DUAL

mobShortDesc: Brother Yagyu is here, waiting for new initiates to arrive.
mobLongDesc: Brother Yagyu is standing and waiting. The permanent sneer on his face isn't because of his dislike for this world, but of a snapped tendon on his facial muscles. His bold head gleams from sweat in this light.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY SPHERE PROTECT-EVIL INFRAVISION DODGE SNEAK DUAL

mobShortDesc: Brother Kyoki is here, in meditative seance.
mobLongDesc: Brother Kyoki have engaged in meditative seance to explore the distant reaches of the Astral plane. His attention is not here, but somewhere over the rainbow. His bald head hints of devotion and dedication to the faith.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY SPHERE PROTECT-EVIL INFRAVISION DODGE SNEAK DUAL

mobShortDesc: Brother Genshi is here, enjoying the food with great enthusiasm.
mobLongDesc: Brother Genshi has a well formed body, a fair amount of overweight, though. His table manners suggest that the food is of utmost importance to him. So hastily he stuffs all edible down his gob.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY SPHERE PROTECT-EVIL INFRAVISION DODGE SNEAK DUAL

mobShortDesc: Brother Kenji is here, practicing his martial arts techniques.
mobLongDesc: Brother Kenji is going through a very complicated and taxing series of maneuvers to hone them to the level of perfection. His punches and kicks are executed like as brilliantly as his stature implies. Definitively a master of both martial arts and armed combat.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY PROTECT-EVIL INFRAVISION DODGE SNEAK DUAL FURY

mobShortDesc: Brother Senjin is here, sleeping without any fear.
mobLongDesc: Brother Senjin looks very tired and worn-out. His breath is shallow and very weak. The extreme physical training has taken its toll. There is no strength at all left in his impressive frame.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY SPHERE PROTECT-EVIL INFRAVISION DODGE SNEAK DUAL

mobShortDesc: Brother Kansatsu is here, meditating to find inner peace.
mobLongDesc: Brother Kansatsu has been disturbed by violent nightmares of Death and Destruction. That is the reason why he has spend the past few days in constant meditation. His bald head trickles with sweat.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY SPHERE PROTECT-EVIL INFRAVISION DODGE SNEAK DUAL

mobShortDesc: The Crystal Daemon is here, sitting in the corner and gazing at you.
mobLongDesc: What a strange life form. A bipedal humanoid made completely of crystalline shards that pulse with life. It's eyes resemble small rubies, but also they twinkle with the light of life energy.

mobShortDesc: The Dazzling Haze appears to protect the maiden.
mobLongDesc: Formed of pure light, the Haze will sacrifice its existence to save the innocent and the worthy. This form of energy is widely known for its relentless pursuit of combat.

mobShortDesc: The Sacred Maiden is here, meditating to purify her surroundings.
mobLongDesc: The Maiden isn't the most beautiful of fair ladies that you have seen, but she has an aura of purity and innocence that makes you reconsider your ways. Her clothes are clean white, tied from the waist with a blood red belt. She turns on you and smiles at you with so much emotion and joy, that all you want to do is to stay by her side.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SANCTUARY SPHERE DODGE SNEAK INVUL

mobShortDesc: The wailing Apparition emerges from the sarcophagus, and attacks you.
mobLongDesc: Flowing through the air, the Apparition reaches out with its incorporeal hands that resemble bony claws at you with the intent to drain the life from you. Some shreds of clothes remain clinging to its hazy form, but they are nearly decayed beyond being anything but dust.

mobShortDesc: The Great Mystic is here, studying the ancient records of history.
mobLongDesc: Chosen by the members of the brotherhood, the Great Mystic has devoted his time to running the day-to-day things for all of them. But as his title implies, he isn't just a desk clerk, but a master of fearful and unknown powers.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SANCTUARY PROTECT-EVIL DODGE SNEAK DUAL

mobShortDesc: The Ultimate Mystic is resting here, trying to understand the universe.
mobLongDesc: The Ultimate Mystic has retreated from all things material and has devoted himself to attaining new and developing the existing level of his of mental powers. The world as a place of the greedy and loathsome has almost ceased to exist for him. Nevertheless, He is still a mighty opponent, when he utilizes his talent for martial arts and the mental powers.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE PROTECT-EVIL INFRAVISION DODGE SNEAK DUAL

mobShortDesc: The Huge Whirlwind is storming its way to you.
mobLongDesc: Summoned from its own plane by the Mystical Powers, The Whirlwind isn't enjoying the stay here. And since the only thing preventing it from leaving is its mental bonding to you, you must be prepared to suffer its wrath.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE DODGE INVUL DUAL FURY

mobShortDesc: The Mystic Brother is walking the hallways and corridors.
mobLongDesc: The Mystic Brother is looking at you in anticipation. He is obviously waiting for you to greet him or be on your way. He is wearing the simple robe of a mystic. As a brother, he has shaved his head to show the proper stoic attitude.

mobShortDesc: The initiate mystic is sitting here in meditation, waiting to pass the pit.
mobLongDesc: A young boy anxiously wanting to expand his mind beyond that of an average person. He is meditating here to gain enough courage to try and walk past through the ropes and poles of the Pit. he believes that through devotion and concentration, anything can be achieved.

mobShortDesc: A Chinese man wearing an almost white apron is standing here, opening a crate.
mobLongDesc: The cook is a big and strong man. He is grinning evilly at you. He looks really weird. Maybe he is not playing with full deck.

mobShortDesc: There is a skeleton here, standing and guarding the pirate treasure.
mobLongDesc: The Skeleton seems to have a big bullet hole in his head. It is reaching with his hands towards you.

mobShortDesc: A huge scorpion has appeared from the sands.
mobLongDesc: The huge scorpion looks really dangerous. It's sting is dripping with venom.

mobShortDesc: A pelican is here, chewing on half of a fish.
mobLongDesc: The Pelican seems to have its mouth full of something.

mobShortDesc: The Observer is sitting here, keeping a look-out to the ocean.
mobLongDesc: The observer is looking out to the ocean. He looks to be quite bored.

mobShortDesc: A Pirate is standing here, maintaining the ship.
mobLongDesc: He is a really mean sailor. He's a really greedy man, and will do almost anything for gold. He seems to be afraid of the captain.

mobShortDesc: The First Mate is standing by the helm, taking care of his ship.
mobLongDesc: First mate is a really mean guy. He's afraid of nothing, except maybe the captain, and will tolerate no resistance from you. He takes a good care of the ship and the ship takes good care of him.

mobShortDesc: The Pirate Captain is sitting by the table and swearing loudly.
mobLongDesc: Captain is a really tall and strong man. Years on the sea have made him really tough and vicious killer. He seems to be very angry about something and is muttering something about thieves.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE INFRAVISION DODGE DUAL FURY

zoneName: The Polished Battlefield Village by Kith
