mobShortDesc: A Mage paces the room here muttering things to him self.  He looks up at you,  "Are you he?" he asks, shaking his head he muttering.
mobLongDesc: The Mage paces back and forth accross the threadbare carpet, wringing his hands and casting disparing glances at the door east of here.

zoneName: The Polished Battlefield Village by Kith
mobShortDesc: The Beast is shrowded in dark mist, it moves towards you with utter confidence.
mobLongDesc: All you can see is a dim bulking Beast, behind it is a foul red light. You start to move out of the room realising whtat it is.

zoneName: The Polished Battlefield Village by Kith
mobShortDesc: The Guard beast is loping towards you, jaws gaping looking to take your ass out of your body.
mobLongDesc: You can't quite place the origins of the beast charging you, anyway, its time to hit it for six.

mobShortDesc: A Dark Spirit drifts towards you, silent, dark, deadly.
mobLongDesc: You can only see a mass of dark mist moving, pulsating.

mobShortDesc: The Etheral guard sees you and jumps towards you, shimmering sword glittering.
mobLongDesc: The Etheral guard shimmers with a bright light, human form bearly visible behind a corrona of light, its eye pin pricks of light.

mobShortDesc: The Etheral Master takes an interest in you, its eyes burning through you concience.
mobLongDesc: The Master is seated on a ghostly throne of light, the Master gathers his robes to rise and.... and deal with you.

mobShortDesc: The Etheral guards senses you and jumps towards you, shimmering sword glittering.
mobLongDesc: The Etheral guard shimmers with a bright light, human form bearly visible behind a corrona of light, its eye pin pricks of light.

mobShortDesc: A scruffy Fido is sniffing at the ground here.
mobLongDesc: The scruffy Fido sniffs around your feet, you kick it as it raises a leg to take a leak on your leg.

mobShortDesc: An Old man is here hobbling along with the aid of a stick.  He looks up, greets you and continues on his way.
mobLongDesc: The Old man is very thin, hair is whispy white and his cloths are ragged, his stick is gnarled and flecked with dried blood.

mobShortDesc: A hard working Commoners Wife is here tending to household chores.
mobLongDesc: She looks up from her work and makes 'shooing' gestures out the door. She then turns back to her task at hand.

mobShortDesc: A hard working Commoner eyes the new stranger in the village, YOU!.
mobLongDesc: The Commoner is here cuffing brats over the head for their mischeif. He eyes you suspiciously then reluctantly moves on.

mobShortDesc: The scruffy Brat takes an interest in your cloths.
mobLongDesc: The thieving little Brat sneaks close to you, he is covered more with dirt than cloths.  He attempts to steal a penny from you.

mobShortDesc: A Nomads woman follow her man at a distance, she casts you a strange look from beneth her dusty mantle, she suffles on silently.
mobLongDesc: The Nomad woman is grey with dust from the surrounding lands, her face hidden in the folds of a hood, hands buried deep within her dusty robes.

mobShortDesc: A Nomad wanders accross your path, on a jouney to nowhere inparticular.
mobLongDesc: The Nomad is grey with dust from the surrounding lands, his face hidden in the folds of a hood, a hand hovers near his sword.

mobShortDesc: The assistant cowers in a dark corner far away from you.
mobLongDesc: The Assistant is dressed in sruffy, sooty cloths torn in many places, cowering in a corner he clutches a wicked looking dagger.

mobShortDesc: A Dark Commando is skulking about the dark recesses of the room, agitated by your presence.
mobLongDesc: The warrior-mage's skin is blackened with soot from the forge, his eyes spark brightly in the dim light, advancing on you with his huge broadsword.

mobShortDesc: What you can only describe as a an Amorphous Gelatinous Blob is restrained in one corner of the room.
mobLongDesc: The 'Amorphous Gelatinous Blob is restrained by something. It's frantic attempts to 'bounce' your way fall short.

mobShortDesc: An old Hag is here puttering around in her hut.
mobLongDesc: The Hag is dressed in scraps of armor and raw cloth.  She grins at you toothlesly, raises her stick and advances on you.

mobShortDesc: An Etheral Spirit drifts past, oblivious to you.
mobLongDesc: The Etheral Spirit is just visible to you in your hightened state.  It is utterly formless in shape, just a patch of grey.

mobShortDesc: A translucent Spirit wanders accross the landscape.
mobLongDesc: The Spirit drifts silently accross the landscape bearly visible in the gloom.

mobShortDesc: A fellow Adventurer passes by to lands unknown.
mobLongDesc: The dwarven Adventurer looks very seasoned and experienced.  He passes you with a nod, hand on weapon.... just in case.

mobShortDesc: The dirty Bandit is here tossing its sword from hand to hand, waiting for you.
mobLongDesc: The filthy Bandit is here eyeing your equipment with greedy eyes, its eyes fastening upon your pouch of gold.

mobShortDesc: The large Bandit leader regards you, all the while fingering his sword.
mobLongDesc: The Bandit leader is filthy beyond belief, the smell from him is almost to much. He eyes your cloths with great interest.

mobShortDesc: An over eager Bandit sees you as its next mark.
mobLongDesc: A filthy well armed Bandit is here with sword drawn, its greed little eyes flicking over you equipment and money pouch.

mobShortDesc: A huge raven is circling close over head, its beedy eyes mocking you.
mobLongDesc: The raven is larger and blacker than any you have ever seen. Its beady red eyes watching you with an unnerving intensity.

mobShortDesc: A huge Raven is circling close over head, its beedy eyes mocking you.
mobLongDesc: The Raven is larger and blacker than any you have ever seen. Its beady red eyes watching you with an unnerving intensity.

mobShortDesc: One of the Undead is here seaking solace somewhere, somehow.
mobLongDesc: One of the Undead is wandering aimlessly around here, its guant eyes roving the landscape looking for something.

mobShortDesc: An undead animal is here seaking solace somewhere, somehow.
mobLongDesc: One of the Undead creatures of the field is loping accross the landscape, its hooves making strangly little sound.

mobShortDesc: One of the Undead is here seaking solace somewhere, somehow.
mobLongDesc: A semivisible Undead is slowly moving around, its gaunt eyes roving the landscape for something.

mobShortDesc: One of the Undead is here seaking solace somewhere, somehow.
mobLongDesc: A semivisible Undead is slowly moving around, its gaunt eyes roving the landscape for something.

mobShortDesc: A Dawnman is here lumbering towards you.
mobLongDesc: A Dawnman for times lost is here groping its way towards your life force, its arms outstreched and reaching for your throat.

mobShortDesc: A dirty Rat is running around here.
mobLongDesc: A dirty Rat is running around at your feet, its eyes are red and its feet clawed, it boldly takes a bite out from your shoe.

mobShortDesc: A dirty Rat is running around here.
mobLongDesc: A dirty Rat is running around at your feet, its eyes are red and its feet clawed, it boldly takes a bite out from your shoe.

mobShortDesc: A dirt Rat is running around here.
mobLongDesc: A dirty Rat is running around at your feet, its eyes are red and its feet clawed, it boldly takes a bite out from your shoe.

mobShortDesc: A dirty Rat is running around here.
mobLongDesc: A dirty Rat is running around at your feet, its eyes are red and its feet clawed, it boldly takes a bite out from your shoe.

mobShortDesc: A very dirty Scavenger is here digging in the ruined earth.
mobLongDesc: The filthy Scavenger is here digging in the dirt for lost treasures.  Around you are holes dug by the Scavenger.

mobShortDesc: A very dirty Scavenger is here digging in the ruined earth.
mobLongDesc: The filthy Scavenger is here digging in the dirt for lost treasures.  Around you are holes dug by the Scavenger.

zoneName: The Waste, Horn of Valere, By Alexander
mobShortDesc: Rogosh Eagle-eye is standing here.
mobLongDesc: He is fatherly looking with white hair and very sharp eyes.

zoneName: The Waste, Horn of Valere, By Alexander
mobShortDesc: Gaidal Cane is standing here.
mobLongDesc: He is swarthy. He is dark and strongly muscled. His face is wide and flat. His heavy nose is too big and his mouth is a too broad gash. He is a short man and he speaks with a harsh voice.

zoneName: The Waste, Horn of Valere, By Alexander
mobShortDesc: Birgitte Silverbow is standing here ready to knock an arrow to her bow.
mobLongDesc: Birgitte has long golden hair intricately braided. She is tall and wears her golden hair in a waist-long braid. She has blue eyes, and carries her silver bow with which she never miss.

zoneName: The Waste, Horn of Valere, By Alexander
mobShortDesc: Arthur Hawkwing is standing here.
mobLongDesc: He is tall and hook-nosed with dark, deep-set eyes and a deep voice.

zoneName: The Waste, Horn of Valere, By Alexander
mobShortDesc: The wind picks up and  the dust forms a shape guarding the gate.
mobLongDesc: The dust has settled to the shape of a huge giant guard. Its features constantly change as wind ripples its form.

zoneName: The Waste, Horn of Valere, By Alexander
mobShortDesc: An aiel is guiding some merchants through the lands.
mobLongDesc: The aiel is almost invisible when standing still, clothes blending in with the rocks and sand in this dry place. All clothes are made to stay hidden until the attackers are right on top of them. The aiel has grey eyes and reddish hair and a piece of cloth hangs down his shoulders.

zoneName: The Waste, Horn of Valere, By Alexander
mobShortDesc: A wise one is standing here.
mobLongDesc: The wise one is garbed shirt and skirt all in brown in different hues to blend in with the ground. She looks at you with hard eyes and says: "No wetlander is allowed here. Go back with you!"

zoneName: The Waste, Horn of Valere, By Alexander
mobShortDesc: Your sight detects movement, but at as you look closer you see nothing.
mobLongDesc: She is a tall and lovely woman with blue-green eyes. Her reddish hair is short with a tail in the back. She wears her spears and buckler as they where a part of her.

zoneName: The Waste, Horn of Valere, By Alexander
mobShortDesc: Your sight detects movement, but at as you look closer you see nothing.
mobLongDesc: He is a tall and handsome man with a strong, square face and a good smile. His dark red hair is graying. He has broad shoulders and blue eyes.

zoneName: The Waste, Horn of Valere, By Alexander
mobShortDesc: Your sight detects movement, but at as you look closer you see nothing.
mobLongDesc: The aiel is almost invisible when standing still, clothes blending in with the rocks and sand in this dry place. All clothes are made to stay hidden until the attackers are right on top of them. The aiel has grey eyes and reddish hair and a piece of cloth over his mouth and nose. Weiled and ready to kill.

zoneName: The Waste, Horn of Valere, By Alexander
mobShortDesc: Asmodean is standing here awaiting your arrival.
mobLongDesc: He is a man in his middle years and has dark hair. He is handsome and tall with dark, deep-set eyes. He has an odd way of holding his head cocked sideways when looking at you.

mobShortDesc: A large pulsating mass of alien origin is here.
mobLongDesc: It looks vaguely like The Blob.

mobShortDesc: The 50 Headed Hydra is here, gyrating, screaming, snorting, salivating...
mobLongDesc: It's a lot to look at.

mobShortDesc: One of the larger hounds of Hades is here, howling loudly.
mobLongDesc: The hound is fearsome, with huge teeth, and eyes that glow.

mobShortDesc: Hypnos, the God of Dreams, is here.
mobLongDesc: Hypnos may be kindest of the gods of the underworld.

mobShortDesc: A eunuch is milling about.
mobLongDesc: The eunuch was brought here to help (guard?) Proserpina.

mobShortDesc: Hades, the King of the Underworld, is standing here.
mobLongDesc: Hades fears nobody, save perhaps Zeus.

mobShortDesc: Proserpina, the Queen of the Underworld, is wandering about.
mobLongDesc: Proserpina looks unhappy.  Perhaps because Hades abducted her from her garden and brought her to the Underworld?

mobShortDesc: Hecate, the Goddess of Sorcery and Witchcraft, is here.
mobLongDesc: Hecate was rumored to be visible only to dogs.

mobShortDesc: One of the hounds of Hades is here, howling.
mobLongDesc: The hound is fearsome, with large teeth, and eyes that glow yellow.

mobShortDesc: Minos, a lesser god of the underworld, is here.
mobLongDesc: During his earthly life, Minos was the King of Crete.

mobShortDesc: Radamanthus, a lesser god of the underworld, is here.
mobLongDesc: Radamanthus is a mystery.

mobShortDesc: Aeacus, a lesser god of the underworld, is here.
mobLongDesc: During his earthly life, Aeacus was King of Aegina.

mobShortDesc: Megaera, the Third Fury, is here.
mobLongDesc: The furies where born of the blood of the wounded Uranus, attendants of Proserpina.  Their heads are wreathed with serpents.

mobShortDesc: Tisiphone, the Second Fury, is here.
mobLongDesc: The furies where born of the blood of the wounded Uranus, attendants of Proserpina.  Their heads are wreathed with serpents.

mobShortDesc: Alecto, the First Fury, is here.
mobLongDesc: The furies where born of the blood of the wounded Uranus, attendants of Proserpina.  Their heads are wreathed with serpents.

mobShortDesc: The monoceros is here.
mobLongDesc: The monoceros is a close relative to the unicorn, and is a noble beast.

mobShortDesc: Medusa, the Third Gorgon, is here.
mobLongDesc: A gorgon is a creature with snakes for hair, and that is not the end of her charms.

mobShortDesc: Euryale, the Second Gorgon, is here.
mobLongDesc: A gorgon is a creature with snakes for hair, and that is not the end of her charms.

mobShortDesc: Stheno, the First Gorgon, is here.
mobLongDesc: A gorgon is a creature with snakes for hair, and that is not the end of her charms.

mobShortDesc: A lifelike statue of Hades, the ruler of the underworld, is here.
Celeno, the Third Harpy, is here.
mobLongDesc: A harpy has the head and body of a woman, with the wings, legs, and talons of a bird of prey.

mobShortDesc: Ocypete, the Second Harpy, is here.
mobLongDesc: A harpy has the head and body of a woman, with the wings, legs, and talons of a bird of prey.

mobShortDesc: Aello, the First Harpy, is here.
mobLongDesc: A harpy has the head and body of a woman, with the wings, legs, and talons of a bird of prey.

mobShortDesc: A snarling hyena is here.
mobLongDesc: The hyena is pack animal.  She is rather helpless alone, but can be trouble in a large group.

mobShortDesc: A marauder is here, wandering these wastelands.
mobLongDesc: The marauder looks deceptively human.  But there is no hint of intelligence - he is just a rapacious beast.

mobShortDesc: A Wyvern is here, swishing its tail back and forth in anticipation of a meal.
mobLongDesc: To say that the wyvern is huge would be like saying that the Queen Ant is a little tough. You wonder how it manages to fit its massive body in such a confining cavern. Its tail bristles with spikes, and as it opens its great mouth to roar at you, you notice several rows of teeth the size and sharpness of longswords. There are scrapes in the floor where the wyvern must have been sharpening its nails, and it looks like that has been its main activity other than eating.

mobShortDesc: The Guardian of Lawful Neutrality stands here.
mobLongDesc: This vague figure watches over the prime material plane, reporting back to the gods of Nirvana.

mobShortDesc: The Guardian of Neutral Evil stands here.
mobLongDesc: This vague figure watches over the prime material plane, reporting back to the gods of Hades.

mobShortDesc: The Guardian of Chaotic Neutrality stands here.
mobLongDesc: This vague figure watches over the prime material plane, reporting back to the gods of Limbo.

mobShortDesc: The Guardian of Neutral Good stands here.
mobLongDesc: This vague figure watches over the prime material plane, reporting back to the gods of Elysium.

mobShortDesc: A vegepygmy is wandering about in search of food.
mobLongDesc: The vegepygmy is a being made from plant matter. It must have some way of getting sunlight to live....

mobShortDesc: A moss monster hangs from the wall.
mobLongDesc: The moss monster is simply a large piece of living moss, most likely created magically.

mobShortDesc: Shang-Ti is standing here.
mobLongDesc: Shang-Ti appears to be an aged man with a long white beard, dressed in tattered robes.
actionFlags: SPEC SENTINEL ISNPC AGGRESSIVE MEMORY ARM

mobShortDesc: Chih Sung-Tzu is standing here.
mobLongDesc: Chih Sung-Tzu is Lord of Rain. He is a very muscular man, wearing a blue war helm. He rides a huge storm cloud, and is wearing a suit of terribly rusted scale mail.
actionFlags: SPEC SENTINEL ISNPC AGGRESSIVE MEMORY ARM

mobShortDesc: Feng Po is standing here.
mobLongDesc: Feng Po is Count of the Wind. He is a man-shaped being riding a small windstorm, and wear a suit of finely wrought plate mail. His skin is jet black, his eyes blaze fire, and he wields a huge broadsword.
actionFlags: SPEC SENTINEL ISNPC AGGRESSIVE MEMORY ARM

mobShortDesc: Fei Lien is standing here.
mobLongDesc: Fei Lien is Count of the Wind. He is a man-shaped being riding a small windstorm, and wear a suit of finely wrought plate mail. His skin is jet black, his eyes blaze fire, and he wields a huge broadsword.
actionFlags: SPEC SENTINEL ISNPC AGGRESSIVE MEMORY ARM

mobShortDesc: Lei Kung is standing here.
mobLongDesc: Lei Kung appears to be a man with smoking black skin and eyes with pupils like lightning bolts. He has two large tusks and a huge nose. His red spotted wings span forty feet, and he wields a pitch black warhammer.
actionFlags: SPEC SENTINEL ISNPC AGGRESSIVE MEMORY ARM

mobShortDesc: A holy ghost stands watch over the resting place of the dead.
mobLongDesc: The Holy Ghost is a spirit who was granted the right to stay in the prime material plane, existing as a ghost and protecting the interests of the gods of its elemental plane.

mobShortDesc: A skeleton stands here silently.
mobLongDesc: The skeleton is made from nothing but bleach-white bones. It was once a humanoid, as far as you can tell.

mobShortDesc: A zombie shuffles about.
mobLongDesc: The zombie seems to have been living recently, as bits of rotten flesh still fall from its limbs. It is a creature raised from the dead by an evil cleric, bound to do that one's bidding.

mobShortDesc: The Zan Mine Leader is here, screaming non stop at the workers.
mobLongDesc: This Zan is quite possibly the worst one yet.  Along with it's disfigured body it also is screaming without any signs of stopping By the way he is screaming you'd guess that he will be killed if they do not get this new found ore out fast enough.

mobShortDesc: A Rebel Zan is here, barely getting by.
mobLongDesc: This Zan rebel is looking quite thin.  It seems these rebels are having a hard time getting enough food when they hide in these caves, although, that isn't much different from the ordinary workers. At least this one is fighting against the oppression.

mobShortDesc: The Zan Rebellion Leader is here, waiting for a chance to strike.
mobLongDesc: The Zan Rebellion Leader sits here, planning out his next attack against the guards keeping his people in chains. By the look of him, he could finish off all the guards himself, but he most likely saves those duties for his rebels.

mobShortDesc: A Rebel Zan is here plotting against his oppressors.
mobLongDesc: This Zan looks like he has been training to be a warrior for some time. It looks as though these rebels have found a way to live quite well while hiding.  He would certainly put up more of a fight than one of the malnourished workers.

mobShortDesc: An Erratic Farmer is here babbling about strange creatures.
mobLongDesc: The farmer standing here is a man of average build. He is wearing a pair of overalls that are covered in mud, and he will not stop babbling.  As he continually babbles on it is unclear who he is actually trying to talk to though.

mobShortDesc: The Queen of the Zans sits here, a dark fire glowing in her eyes.
mobLongDesc: he king of the Zans is not even a Zan at all, but an ugly man with a hunch back.  A large growth is protruding from his large, bent nose with a few hairs growing out of it. His hair is a long greasy mess that hangs loosely around his temples.  Huge bags hang loosely from under his eyes, and his eyes are completely bloodshot.  His limbs are incredibly disproportionate to the rest of his body, suggesting that he does not do much but sit on his throne all day.

mobShortDesc: An Ugly King is sitting here, watching his wealth grow.
mobLongDesc: The king of the Zans is not even a Zan at all, but an ugly man with a hunch back.  A large growth is protruding from his large, bent nose with a few hairs growing out of it. His hair is a long greasy mess that hangs loosely around his temples.  Huge bags hang loosely from under his eyes, and his eyes are completely bloodshot.  His limbs are quite tiny compared to his bulbous body, suggesting that he does not do much other than sit on his throne all day.

mobShortDesc: A Zan Cook is here, rushing madly to prepare the next meal.
mobLongDesc: This Zan cook looks like an average chef, apart from the ugly face.  He is dressed in a white garb, with goofy pants on and a large fluffy chef hat.  He rushes around the room with a certain finesse that is rarely seen in the Zans.

mobShortDesc: A Castle Servant is here, running around hurriedly for the king and queen.
mobLongDesc: This poor creature is only a servant in title, he lives much more like a slave than anything else. As he runs around the room it looks as if he forgot what he was about to do because he is so nervous.

mobShortDesc: A Castle Guard stands here blocking you off from any further travel.
mobLongDesc: This guard is probably the most trusted zan of them all. The king and queen do not seem to particularly care for their populous, but these ones they can actually deal with. Unlike the other Zans, this one has large bulging muscles that are clearly defined through his cloth armor.

mobShortDesc: A Zan Guard is sitting here, angry at your presence.
mobLongDesc: A large Zan stands here, shouting orders and relaxing.  The guard looks after the workers in the mines, under direct order from the king and queen.  It looks as though the guards get much more food than the workers, since this one is much larger than most of the workers in the mines.

mobShortDesc: A Zan Guard stands here laughing about his superiority.
mobLongDesc: A large Zan stands here, shouting orders and relaxing.  The guard looks after the workers in the mines, under direct order from the king and queen.  It looks as though the guards get much more food than the workers, since this one is much larger than most of the workers in the mines.

mobShortDesc: A Severely Overworked Worker is here working through exhaustion.
mobLongDesc: This poor creature looks as though he has never seen a day off. The look of weariness in him is almost enough to distract from his horrific features.  Even though he obviously works hard, the worker is grotesquely thin, almost as though he is simply wasting away.

mobShortDesc: A Zan Nurse is here rushing around caring for the young Zans.
mobLongDesc: This nurse looks like it is completely worn out. Its clothes are completely ragged and hang limply from its body.  It rushes around the room trying to tidy up a bit and keep everything in line, but it doesn't look as though much is getting done.

mobShortDesc: An Adolescent Zan stands here causing trouble.
mobLongDesc: This adolescent Zan is looking much more imposing than the children in the other room, but they still are not very intimidating. These Zans seem to have nothing to do so they end up causing all sorts of trouble.

mobShortDesc: A small zan child is here, playing with its toys happily.
mobLongDesc: This small child looks completely carefree, and not nearly as revolting as the rest of its kin.  The little Zan almost looks cute in an ugly sort of way.  He runs around the room playing with toys and being a seemingly normal child.

mobShortDesc: A little baby zan lies in a crib here.
mobLongDesc: It is always unfortunate when babies are ugly, but this one is way beyond ugly.  It has a pool of nasty slime forming about its little body, which bubbles a little while the baby lies in it.

mobShortDesc: A Large Breeder is here, waiting for it's next meal.
mobLongDesc: A disgusting beast of a Zan is lying here.  It has an enormous belly, which just happens to be covered in a thick coating of slime.  Whenever any parts of it moves a large string of the slime flies off in the same direction.  Eggs pile up at the bottom of the breeder while it continually stuffs its face full of food.  Its tiny eyes dart in every direction as it examines its surroundings constantly.

mobShortDesc: A City Guard lazing about at the gates.
mobLongDesc: A monstrous ant stands upright here, guarding a pair of gates. The guard has a huge pair of mandibles, with drool slowly oozing down them.  Its tiny arms are folded gently across its chest while it looks around with a rather spiritless expression on its face.

mobShortDesc: The Dark Lord Urynder sits on his dark throne here
mobLongDesc: The Dark Lord Urynder is the god of all the Zans.  Looking at him you cannot make out any features on him at all, it seems he is a large area of darkness in the shape of a man with dark wings sprouting from behind.  Across his whole body a thin blue smoke rises into the air, and every once in a while a small faint light moves within his dark body.
mobImmune: POISON PUMMEL SLEEP BLINDNESS DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE

mobShortDesc: The High Priest of Urynder is here, trying to summon his god!
mobLongDesc: This is the High Priest of the lesser god Urynder.  It looks as though he has devoted his entire life to this ritual, and now he is finally realizing his dream.  As he continues in his summoning his eyes start to grow red, and he starts making strange noises.
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST

mobShortDesc: There is a large imposing guard standing here, blocking entrance to the temple.
mobLongDesc: This is a large, dangerous looking guard.  He stands upright as a human would but unlike a human he has a very insectile head and arms.  His large mandibles look like they could crush through steel, he'd definitely put up a very good fight against any opponent.

mobShortDesc: A priest is lying here in bed, sleeping.
mobLongDesc: This sleeping priest looks quite easy and unintimidating, although if you wake him up he might be a bit cranky at you.

mobShortDesc: A cloaked priest is here chanting and staring at the center of the room.
mobLongDesc: This dark cloaked priest is fully covered in a long black cloak. No features can be made out about its body, but you can guess that it looks very similar to the guards outside the temple.  As you stare at it it does not even acknowledge your presence, and it may not even know you are there.

mobName: the undead form of Theldon the Grim
mobShortDesc: The undead form of Theldon the Grim stands here.
mobLongDesc: You see before you the decayed remains of Theldon Wolfsbane.  This proud warrior is now reduced to a skeleton dressed in moldy rags that drip bits of flesh as he moves.

mobShortDesc: The skeletal form of an ancient warrior stands here.
mobLongDesc: The skeleton's bones are yellow and utterly devoid of meat.  It wears the tattered remnants of some clothing and uses its bony fingers as claws to rake out your eyes.

mobShortDesc: A starving ghoul crawls along the ground here.
mobLongDesc: This ghoul clearly hasn't had a decent meal in ages.  His ribcage is sticking out, his eyes have all but disappeared into their sockets and he looks just about ready to croak.

mobShortDesc: A blank of primal clay stands here, waiting to be shaped
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.

mobShortDesc: You see a human casually chopping up a few logs with.... HIS HANDS!
mobLongDesc: He calmly looks you over with a very impassive face. You also realize that this guy could easily rip you apart with his bare hands from the way that he can chop those logs. He also carries around a pouch with the money of the monastery (after all, can you think of a safer place?).

mobShortDesc: Ron the monk is sitting here drinking some beer and telling army stories.
mobLongDesc: This particular fellow has close cropped hair that came from when he was serving in Midg17rd's Cityguards. He also seems to be able put down a good amount of beer as he is often draining his mug.

mobShortDesc: Dorek the human monk is walking around looking big and strong.
mobLongDesc: This monk is quite strong looking and if he wasn't a monk, you would probably find this guy working as a bouncer at a bar.

mobShortDesc: A human monk is sitting here praying and humming.
mobLongDesc: This monk has some noticeable callouses built up on his hands and feet and you get the impression that a lot of time went into getting them that way.

mobShortDesc: A human monk is sitting here going over new acquisitions and making notes.
mobLongDesc: Though very skilled in the arts of unarmed combat, this quiet fellow likes to spend a lot of his time taking care of the library and trying to increase the contents of the library.

mobShortDesc: A human monk is here going about his daily duties.
mobLongDesc: From the way that this monk walks and acts, you get the impression that this guy is quite confident in his abilities to handle any problems that might come his way.

mobShortDesc: A dwarven monk is here snoring loudly.
mobLongDesc: This tough little guy is all tuckered out from a full day of being a monk. Though no one could probably sleep through his snores, it would not be a good idea to wake him and tell him about it.

mobShortDesc: A dwarven monk is here going about his daily duties.
mobLongDesc: From the way that this monk walks and acts, you can tell that he is still fairly new as he grumbles as much as most dwarves when looked at.

mobShortDesc: A human female monk is resting here.
mobLongDesc: A few human females just get fed up with the troubles that men cause them so they come to the monastery to find out how to defend themselves. This one is probably no exception to the majority.

mobShortDesc: A human monk is here cleaning up the monastery.
mobLongDesc: This poor guy gets the unenvied job of cleaning the monastery. Not only does he have to clean the floors and walls, but he has to pick all of the loose trash and stuff that the occasional adventurer leaves lying around.

mobShortDesc: A human monk is here maintaining the library.
mobLongDesc: This lucky chap has the easy job for this week as he gets to give his tired body a rest while he goes through the books - sorting and dusting as he goes around.

mobShortDesc: A human monk is resting here.
mobLongDesc: This poor fellow has spent the day training, cleaning, praying, and eating few small meals. All he really wants to do is just stay here and rest for a week.

mobShortDesc: A human monk is sitting here praying and humming.
mobLongDesc: You think that this young man is probably fairly new to being a monk as occasionally he slightly stumbles over a difficult phrase in his prayers.

mobShortDesc: A human monk is here going about his daily duties.
mobLongDesc: From the way that this monk walks and carries himself you can tell that he is fairly new to being a monk as he seems too much like a normal person (except for the monk robes he is wearing).

mobShortDesc: A human female monk is sitting here praying and humming.
mobLongDesc: A quite attractive female, however, from the callouses on her hands and feet, it would be advisable for you not to try anything on her that might get her upset.

mobShortDesc: A dwarven monk is quietly resting here.
mobLongDesc: A closer look reveals that this monk is obviously somewhat skilled though not quite a master in unarmed combat.

mobShortDesc: A human monk is sitting here, copying some manuscripts.
mobLongDesc: This chap spends almost all of the time that he is not improving his skills in unarmed combat by copying fading manuscripts and books.

mobShortDesc: A human monk is quietly resting here.
mobLongDesc: A closer look reveals that this monk is obviously somewhat skilled though not quite a master in unarmed combat.

mobShortDesc: A bobcat is on the prowl here.
mobLongDesc: This bobcat is slightly larger than a big house cat and has a yellowly pelt like that of a lion, except with some black splotches.  It's doesn't look extremely dangerous, but it's still a feline and can get angry and violent when cornered.

mobShortDesc: A red fox sneaks around here.
mobLongDesc: A playful, red fox is walking around.  These cute, furry scavengers are known to wander in town and cause mischief for the local shop owners.

mobShortDesc: Your guardian is here taking care of the low level players.
mobLongDesc: This is the famous guardian that newbies have been turning to for help at the start of their careers for ages. She has taken the aging well and still looks quite vital despite the affects of time. If you stay in the room with her for a few moments she will heal your wounds.

mobShortDesc: A porcupine is standing here, fiercely guarding its home.
mobLongDesc: Covered with strong, stiff quills on its back, sides, and tail, this creature has an amazing defense mechanism. If you get too near him he will strike at you with his tail, leaving his quills embedded deep within your flesh. The creature itself is slow, pudgy, and very vulnerable looking if not for the barbed quills. It is standing in front of a burrow you assume to be its home, eyeing you carefully. Best not to disturb him. This creature seems about fit for a level 4 adventurer.

mobShortDesc: A prairie dog is peeking up out of its hole, looking for predators.
mobLongDesc: This rodent greatly resembles a chipmunk but barks like a small dog. It has short legs, long sharp claws, and a short flat tail. Its fur is a dusty brown color. It looks about the area very alertly, not only with its eyes but with its nose and ears as well. It isn't a creature to be toyed with and it will defend its home at all cost. This creature seems about right for a level 3 adventurer.

mobShortDesc: A scrawny field mouse is scurrying about foraging for food.
mobLongDesc: This small rodent has soft dusty fur and a small pointed snout. It has shiny round eyes that look like small beads or oil drops. It regards you intently, seeming prepared to run at the first sign of trouble. This creature seems about right for a level 2 adventurer.

mobShortDesc: A small dragonfly is droning about in search of a good spot to land.
mobLongDesc: This flying insect has four large fragile wings which shimmer and gleam in the sunlight during its flight. It has a long, slender body and a small head filled with its large bead-like eyes. It darts too and fro in search of its next meal, a smaller unfortunate insect. This creature seems to be right for a level 1 adventurer.

mobShortDesc: A large lizard stands here wrapped in crocodile skins.
mobLongDesc: Typik towers over you.  He is covered in crocodile skins from head to toe.  Around his neck are heavy necklaces made from bones and crocodile teeth.  The humanoid features he possesses are very unsettling. It sounds like he is chanting something under his stale breath.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-ALIGNMENT DETECT-INVISIBLE DETECT-MAGIC SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY SPHERE SNEAK INVUL DUAL FURY

mobShortDesc: A small red-bellied fish swims here.
mobLongDesc: The fish is small with a red belly.  At first glance it appears to be quite harmless. Then you notice its razor sharp teeth and quickly realize that the cute red-bellied fish is a vicious piranha!

mobShortDesc: A large lizard with humanoid features is swimming here.
mobLongDesc: The large lizard has many humanoid features.  Its front legs are as much like arms as they are legs.  The claws on the front legs are very much like fingers.  The forked tongue slithering in and out of its mouth sounds like it is saying something. You also notice a necklace around its neck that appears to be made from crocodile teeth.

mobShortDesc: A large salt water crocodile swims here, waiting for its next meal.
mobLongDesc: The old crocodile is very strong.  It must be at least one hundred years old.  The mighty crocodile has spent many hard years at sea.  It is very content to live out the rest of its life in this moat waiting for its next meal.

mobShortDesc: Cotka is here knitting.
mobLongDesc: This poor old troll is a typical mother, she is overworked and unappreciated. She is busy at work now too, she must never stop. She is mending clothes with one hand and cooking with the other. She sure looks tired.

mobShortDesc: A very hefty troll is busily working here.
mobLongDesc: This troll looks like he wants to work, better get out of his way. He is very strong looking and looks peacefull enough, but I would not get in his way.

mobShortDesc: A very hefty troll is busily working here.
mobLongDesc: This troll looks like he wants to work, better get out of his way. He is very strong looking and looks peacefull enough, but I would not get in his way.

mobShortDesc: A very hefty troll is busily working here.
mobLongDesc: This troll looks like he wants to work, better get out of his way. He is very strong looking and looks peacefull enough, but I would not get in his way.

mobShortDesc: A small bat hangs from the ceiling.
mobLongDesc: The bat is very small but still has the potiential to be very dangerous, I mean haven't you ever heard of rabies?

mobShortDesc: An overweight troll is here selling his poisons.
mobLongDesc: The bartender looks very friendly, as do most of the trolls in this village, he is a very large troll that has thrown more than one drunken troll into the street in the past, and he very easily do the same to you.

mobShortDesc: A peddler is standing here selling his wares.
mobLongDesc: It is hard to get a good look at this peddler because he is wear a cloak that completely covers his face, he looks realy tough and very protective of his belongings.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY SPHERE INFRAVISION INVUL DUAL FURY

mobShortDesc: A saucy little troll is here planing something evil.
mobLongDesc: This little troll is an evil little creature, the other children were much more loveable, than this beast from hell. His parents must hate him.

mobShortDesc: A small troll is here playing on the ground.
mobLongDesc: The troll is very small, but kinda cute(for a troll that is). It is easy to tell that trolls care greatly for thier children.

mobShortDesc: A dirty troll is here begging for money
mobLongDesc: The bum looks up at you and says 'Can you spare a coin for a poor old soul?'. You feel bad and let him have some of your fortune, he thanks you and hurrys off to get a meal.

mobShortDesc: A overworked troll is here mending clothes.
mobLongDesc: This poor old troll is a typical mother, she is overworked and unapreaciated. She is busy at work now too, she must never stop. She is mending clothes with one hand and cooking with the other. She sure looks tired.

mobShortDesc: A very hefty troll is busily working here.
mobLongDesc: This troll looks like he wants to work, better get out of his way. He is very strong looking and looks peacefull enough, but I would not get in his way.

mobShortDesc: A very big leach is swimming here in the dirty water.
mobLongDesc: This ugly creature is much larger than a normal leach, it must be at least three feet long. It looks more like a snake then a leach, but from the way it bites into your neck, it is real easy to tell it is a leach.

mobShortDesc: A Strange Lizard sneaks in and out of the shadows hissing loudly
mobLongDesc: The lizardman is hissing loudly, he must have been what you heard comeing through the tunnels. He looks very strong, and not very friendly. His tail must be about 8 feet long, and he is about 7 feet tail. He could make quick work of you and your group.
affectedByFlags: INVISIBLE DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE INFRAVISION STATUE SNEAK INVUL FURY

mobShortDesc: A small fairy is flying here!
mobLongDesc: The fairy is very small and looks very out of place in this dirty tunnel. How did she get here? This is a very dangerous tunnel for somebody of your size, let alone a tiny fairy. This place is truely magical.

mobShortDesc: A withered old troll is here hideing from the world!
mobLongDesc: This old troll has seen better days, he hides in the corner and speeks to himself about something terrible that lives under the fountain. You can't understand a lot of what he is saying, but from what you understand you know that there is something big out there, and it has realy scared him.
affectedByFlags: SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY INFRAVISION DODGE HIDE INVUL FURY

mobShortDesc: a Very Large Troll is waiting here to tell your fortune!
mobLongDesc: Sitting here behind an old table forseeing the future with his deck of tarot cards, is the largest troll you have ever seen, this guy must be twice the size of a normal troll. I'd bet hes a freak in his socity. He looks up at you with a stare that seems to see deep into your very soul and says "I knew you were comeing.". Lets hope that his cards didn't see you as a threat or you could find yourself is some very serious danger..............
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY SPHERE INFRAVISION INVUL DUAL

mobShortDesc: Cotka is here knitting.
mobLongDesc: This poor old troll is a typical mother, she is overworked and unappreciated. She is busy at work now too, she must never stop. She is mending clothes with one hand and cooking with the other. She sure looks tired.

mobShortDesc: Phie is here mending clothes.
mobLongDesc: This poor old troll is a typical mother, she is overworked and unappreciated. She is busy at work now too, she must never stop. She is mending clothes with one hand and cooking with the other. She sure looks tired.

mobShortDesc: Sunca is here cooking.
mobLongDesc: This poor old troll is a typical mother, she is overworked and unappreciated. She is busy at work now too, she must never stop. She is mending clothes with one hand and cooking with the other. She sure looks tired.

mobShortDesc: Noaki is here mending clothes.
mobLongDesc: This poor old troll is a typical mother, she is overworked and unappreciated. She is busy at work now too, she must never stop. She is mending clothes with one hand and cooking with the other. She sure looks tired.

mobShortDesc: A small bat hangs from the ceiling.
mobLongDesc: The bat is very small but still has the potential to be very dangerous, I mean haven't you ever heard of rabies?

mobShortDesc: An overweight troll is here selling his poisons.
mobLongDesc: Luthi looks very friendly, as do most of the trolls in this village.  He is a very large troll that has thrown more than one drunken troll into the street in the past, and he very easily could do the same to you.

mobShortDesc: A peddler is standing here selling his wares.
mobLongDesc: It is hard to get a good look at this peddler because he is wearing a cloak that completely covers his face, he looks really tough and very protective of his belongings.  A human businessman in these parts, he is lucky the trolls are a friendly race.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY SPHERE INFRAVISION INVUL DUAL FURY

mobShortDesc: A saucy little troll is here planning something evil.
mobLongDesc: This little troll is an evil little creature, the other children were much more lovable than this beast from hell. His parents must hate him.

mobShortDesc: A small troll is here playing on the ground.
mobLongDesc: The troll is very small, but kinda cute(for a troll that is). It is easy to tell that trolls care greatly for their children.

mobShortDesc: A dirty troll is here begging for money.
mobLongDesc: The bum looks up at you and says 'Can you spare a coin for a poor old soul?'. You feel bad and let him have some of your fortune, he thanks you and hurries off to get a meal.

mobShortDesc: Juktoa is here looking over blueprints.
mobLongDesc: Juktoa is an old hefty looking troll.  His large calloused hands have seen many years of hard labour, he is well deserving of his current position.  He is head over all the worker trolls and answers to nobody except the king himself.

mobShortDesc: A very hefty troll is busily working here.
mobLongDesc: This troll looks like he wants to work, better get out of his way. He is very strong looking and looks peaceful enough, but I would not get in his way.

mobShortDesc: A very big leach is swimming here in the dirty water.
mobLongDesc: This ugly creature is much larger than a normal leach, it must be at least three feet long. It looks more like a snake then a leach, but from the way it bites into your neck, it is real easy to tell it is a leach.

mobShortDesc: A strange lizard sneaks in and out of the shadows.
mobLongDesc: Neyuv is hissing loudly, he must have been what you heard coming through the tunnels. He looks very strong, and not very friendly. His tail must be about 8 feet long, and he is about 7 feet tall.  He could make quick work of you.
affectedByFlags: INVISIBLE DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE INFRAVISION STATUE SNEAK INVUL FURY

mobShortDesc: A small fairy is flying here!
mobLongDesc: The fairy is very small and looks very out of place in this dirty tunnel. How did she get here? This is a very dangerous tunnel for somebody of your size, let alone a tiny fairy.  This place is truly magical.

mobShortDesc: A withered old troll is here hiding from the world!
mobLongDesc: This old troll has seen better days, he hides in the corner and speaks to himself about something terrible that lives under the fountain. You can't understand a lot of what he is saying, but from what you understand you know that there is something big out there, and it has really scared him.
affectedByFlags: SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY INFRAVISION DODGE HIDE INVUL FURY

mobShortDesc: A Very Large Troll is waiting here to tell your fortune!
mobLongDesc: Sakdul is sitting behind an old table foreseeing the future.  He has to be the largest troll you have ever seen, this guy must be twice the size of a normal troll. I'd bet he's a freak in his society. He looks up at you with a stare that seems to see deep into your very soul and says "I knew you were coming."  Lets hope that his cards didn't see you as a threat or you could find yourself in some very serious danger....
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY SPHERE INFRAVISION INVUL DUAL

mobShortDesc: An Undead Turkey Zombie
mobLongDesc: A turkey that was offered in the past has come back for revenge.  This simple form has decayed down to bones and chunks of flesh. Its eyes show a small ounce of life as it lunges at the calamity.

mobShortDesc: An Undead Turkey Shadow
mobLongDesc: A turkey that was offered in the past has come back for revenge.  A mere shadow of what it used to be, this phantom moves forward to support the pilgrims and other turkeys that have returned to fight back.

mobShortDesc: An Undead Turkey Lich
mobLongDesc: A turkey that was offered in the past has come back for revenge.  A turkey that has evolved into a greater undead. Its eyes hollow, its feathers stripped bare but it moves to prevent the calamity from cancelling the festival of thanks.

mobShortDesc: An Undead Turkey Deathknight
mobLongDesc: A turkey that was offered in the past has come back for revenge.  Reanimated for the sole purpose of preventing the destruction of thanksgiving. Its red eyes glow with a dull hue, and the fire of revenge fuels them forward to prevent the calamity from continuing.

mobShortDesc: A Long Lost Pilgrim Archmage
mobLongDesc: A pilgrim of the previous age that has been brought back. Long hair flows down her back as her staff is illuminated in holy runes that cause light to explode in every direction.

mobShortDesc: A Long Lost Pilgrim Vanguard
mobLongDesc: A pilgrim of the previous age that has been brought back. Wielding a large sword and shield, she moves to protect her fellow pilgrims and drive the evil back to whence it came.

mobShortDesc: A Long Lost Pilgrim Berserker
mobLongDesc: A pilgrim of a previous age that has been brought back. Large, muscled arms wield a large battle axe and he screams in rage as he battles to protect thanksgiving.

mobShortDesc: A General of the Turkey Army
mobLongDesc: A general of the turkey army stands before you. A large crest is emblazoned on its chest, as large red eyes stare with murderous intent.

mobShortDesc: A commander of the Turkey Army
mobLongDesc: A larger turkey marches forward holding the banner of his army. Numerous soldiers march behind him and follow his squawks with a louder squawk each time. Large red eyes state forward with confidence, aiming to destroy the pilgrims and prevent thanks from being given.

mobShortDesc: A turkey solider marches into battle
mobLongDesc: A normal turkey wearing a small breastplate marches towards you with angry red eyes. It squawks and marches another step forward. The feathers on its back ruffle and shake as it nears closer to you.

mobShortDesc: A turkey flows with ethereal magic
mobLongDesc: A smaller turkey glows with a red and black glow. Magic pules out from its feathered body. Its red eyes stare ahead as it squawks in a series of repeating clucks.

mobShortDesc: A Berserking Turkey pecks wildly.
mobLongDesc: A large turkey with steel welded onto its claws stalks towards you. Large red eyes stare at you intensely as it screeches wildly and lunges.

mobShortDesc: A Bard of the Pilgrim Army
mobLongDesc: A happy tune is song with a sweet warm voice as she strolls around. She lightly glides around the room and continues her march north to assist her allies in the fight.

mobShortDesc: A Mage of the Pilgrim Army
mobLongDesc: She grasps her staff and runes glow as words are softly chanted. A barrier forms around her and she stares north. Her long brown hair and blue eyes gaze north, showing no hesitation or fear for what she marches into.

mobShortDesc: A Solider of the Pilgrim Army
mobLongDesc: A warrior of the pilgrim army. He wears his armor proudly and marches north towards the invaders. The short blonde hair is cut square, and the pike that he carries is sharp and ready to carve into the army that approaches.

mobShortDesc: The Leader of the Pilgrim Forces
mobLongDesc: A strong and bold figure stands before you. She has a set of three scars on her arm, all in a row. Short black hair flows in the wind as she stares to the north, the black cloud providing an ominous sign for the future. She leads the pilgrims of the town in a prayer and moves forward to face the oncoming waves of evil.

mobShortDesc: A Steadfast Priestess bows her head in prayer
mobLongDesc: A young woman wearing a set of white and gold robes kneels and prays to the altar. Long black hair and brown eyes convey a sense of worry. This is her first year as the priestess of Thanks.

mobShortDesc: A Steadfast Priest stands praying to the heavens
mobLongDesc: An older gentleman covered in robes holds his hands together and prays to the gods thanking them for all that they provide. Short black hair and green eyes show a calm happy expression and while the horrors of time and space are breaching the temple, he shows no signs of worry or distress.

mobShortDesc: Gobbles, The Terror of the Turkey World
mobLongDesc: A tall bird glowing in red and black light emerges from the portal. A long black beak dripping with a black ooze snaps back and forth as its eyes pierce into everything it looks at.  The eyes convey a sheer evil will and hatred for the pilgrims and the thanks that they offer the gods.

mobShortDesc: A tweef housecleaner sweeps the spotless carpet.
mobLongDesc: Her hair tied back with a blue bandanna, the housecleaner uses a small broom to vigorously sweep around the room, despite the fact that the floor is spotless. Her servant uniform is barely wrinkled, but her socks have fallen down, exposing most of her leg below her knee length skirt.  She stoops to pull them up as you look at her, she is apparently embarrassed by your attention.

mobShortDesc: Queen Larienne cracks her riding crop in the air, riding her husband with reckless abandon.
mobLongDesc: The queen is clothed in what appears to be riding attire, leather brassiere and skirt, which thankfully covers parts best unseen. She holds a riding crop in one hand and her other holds her husband's hand, a touching bond between man and wife during their private interlude.

mobShortDesc: King Vandimar stares at you in shock, mid shout, from beneath his wife.
mobLongDesc: The King is lying on the bed in a most compromising position, as you interrupted what appears to be private time for the royal couple. His sword is lying next to the bed, and because the king has been upset, he is reaching for it.

mobShortDesc: A tweef sentry stands by the curtain, daring you to pass.
mobLongDesc: The guard wears a breastplate engraved with the Daal Manor emblem: horses and bunnies standing bravely against their enemies. His helmet is rounded and the visor is open, his unemotional face tells you that he is unafraid to draw the massive sword at his side to protect the royal family.

mobShortDesc: Natiana's Priestess stands here, playing a lute and singing hymns.
mobLongDesc: The priestess is covered in a flowing silk robe, and her long blonde locks are twisted in an elaborate fashion to compliment the loose robe. She holds a lute, and while strumming it, she sings worship hymns to the patron saint of the tweefs, Natiana.

mobShortDesc: A devoted worshipper bows his head, mumbling praise to his goddess.
mobLongDesc: This devout tweef holds his hat in his hands, wringing it nervously as if it were full of water. He bows humbly in the sanctuary of his precious goddess, Natiana. He mumbles words under his breath, and he appears to be weeping.

mobShortDesc: Taliphe leans against the table, watching Juste with longing in her eyes.
mobLongDesc: Taliphe is wearing a short red skirt and white peasant blouse, with one side hanging off her shoulder. Her dark brown fur looks ragged and unkempt like she just rolled out of bed, but it is a look that took her hours to perfect. She watches Juste strut in the glass door, and sighs with longing.

mobShortDesc: Juste the Strong stands by the glass door, flexing and strutting.
mobLongDesc: Juste is not really dressed for a classy dinner party. His tank top and ripped jeans look out of place amongst the beauty of the room and other guests. But he doesn't seem to mind as he admires his muscles in the glass door. His black fur shines as if it had been waxed.

mobShortDesc: Shevral the Polite waits at the table with his hands folded in his lap.
mobLongDesc: Shevral's blonde fur daintily graces his collar in a neat straight style favored by rich, important persons in the tweef world.  His royal blue jacket has decorative shoulders, and flares down past his waist. Gold cords fashion lines around the extraneous material around his shoulder, meeting each other in one gold bracelet halfway down his upper arm.

mobShortDesc: Hamille sits delicately in a dining chair, waiting for the guest of honor.
mobLongDesc: Hamille's dress is made of pure silk, with silver embroidery on the floor length skirt. The bodice is decorated with tiny white pearls that line the neck and waistline of the pale blue dress. Her fur is neatly combed, and the majority of it has been coiffed in a classic upsweep, with delicate white flowers placed among her brunette locks.

mobShortDesc: Erton, Larandi's fiance, looks at his watch impatiently.
mobLongDesc: Erton is dressed in a brightly colored outfit, perfect for entertaining. He looks like a perfect gentleman, even though he paces the floor impatiently waiting for his fiancee, Larandi, to present herself. His shoes click on the white marble floor, an indicator of his rising anxiety, and the only other sound he makes is a long sigh after checking the door.

mobShortDesc: A servant rushes between kitchen and banquet room, carrying a large platter of food.
mobLongDesc: The servant looks harried, for he has been bustling between the kitchen and the banquet hall for hours, carrying platter upon platter of food for the hungry guests.  Her hair is poking out beneath her hat, and her white robe is becoming dirty, it must be almost to the end of her shift.

mobShortDesc: An apprentice chef tends to an oven full of fresh loflop.
mobLongDesc: The apprentice has on a white button up robe and his hair is tucked neatly beneath a clean white hat.  He appears to be training on baking right now, since he is busy making and baking loflop and plankt. He also appears to be rather flustered, since he is working double time to keep up food on the counters as servants whisk fresh baked goods away to a party elsewhere in the manor.

mobShortDesc: A tweef scientist bustles from table to table, muttering to herself.
mobLongDesc: The busy scientist holds a notebook filled with loose papers that could fall out at any second. Her white robe has a small nametag that reads "Diminea". Flaming red hair draws attention away from her black, horn-rimmed glasses. She wears a pair of heavy black boots, obviously so she can continue working when there's broken glass on the floor.

mobShortDesc: A domestic shehanth stretches lazily.
mobLongDesc: This cat-like animal gazes at you unconcernedly, flexing her paws in a relaxed way. The claws of this beast are at least three inches long, they look pretty deadly. Nonetheless, you feel the strange desire to pick up and cuddle this mammoth pet.

mobShortDesc: A school of happy glyops swim around happily.
mobLongDesc: A school of glyops, multi-colored and happy, with bright fins and smiling eyes.

mobShortDesc: A vicious mafrin stalks about, guarding his palace.
mobLongDesc: This hairless mafrin stands about as tall as a shetland pony, with a long tail tipped by extremely sharp spikes. He growls in his throat at any motion in the bushes, you get the feeling you should leave... quickly.

mobShortDesc: The manor gardener busies himself trimming dead leaves off bushes.
mobLongDesc: The gardener's overalls are grass stained and covered in dirt. He holds a pair of shears in one hand and a watering can in the other. He tips his hat to you politely as he wanders around the garden tending to his plants.

mobShortDesc: A slightly tipsy servant rests here on the bench, and he offers you a drink.
mobLongDesc: The servant's clothes are dirty from the cellar walls that he obviously uses to keep his balance while wandering from bench to keg to refill his tankard. His fur is dirty and matted, and his filthy clothing are indicators of how long he has been down here, since all the other servants you've seen have been clean and tidy.

mobShortDesc: The busy astronomer furiously scribbles in a small notebook.
mobLongDesc: Resting casually, Leinard gazes through his telescope at his true love, the stars. He holds a notebook and pen, and he is scribbling furiously without looking at the page, whatever he is seeing must be important. His shirt is unbuttoned, and his undershirt is untucked. His blue pants are high-water, and his socks are too short.

mobShortDesc: A brightly colored, spotted fletarbie flits from flower to flower.
mobLongDesc: Colors of all shades draw your attention immediately to the wings of this lovely fletarbie, and you notice how carefree it is.

mobShortDesc: Smitter relaxes sozzled at a table, unnoticed by the dancers.
mobLongDesc: Leaning heavily with his elbows on his table, Smitter, a lonely, inebriated blarf grasps his tankard of Chandelier Ale with both hands. His colorful mop of hair covers his eyes, and he mutters quietly, "Hafadrinkwifme".

mobShortDesc: Teinfort glowers with the deep evil that pulsates within him.
mobLongDesc: Gazing upon this malevolent being, you feel a crushing sensation, throughout your body and your mind, and from your toes up you cease to exist.

mobShortDesc: Hifgatte bustles around the kitchen, humming loud and off-key.
mobLongDesc: A white robe is tied loosely about Hifgatte's waist, and her chef hat is held in her right hand. It is tossed frequently about, especially when Hifgatte's temper gets the best of her. She seems to be looking for something in the pantry, and she doesn't look happy to see you. Intruders in the kitchen are never taken lightly.

mobShortDesc: Hero dances wildly about the room, his body moving rhythmically to the music.
mobLongDesc: A cheery, fat blarf with red cheeks, huffs and puffs with the excitement of the atmosphere. The glow of the chandelier seems to have penetrated his skin, he glows as brightly as the light. The luminescence has infused him with a power that is extraordinary, and his energy transcends the mortal plane.

mobShortDesc: Larandi stands here, holding one of her many pets.
mobLongDesc: The tweef princess has astoundingly deep emerald eyes.  Her sheer robe covers little of her actual body, but her thick fur, indicative of her social standing, covers the rest. She lazily pets one of her domestic shehanths, who purrs loudly.

mobShortDesc: The Uber Blue Rook is standing tall, and fiercely looking at you as you intrude upon her domain.
mobLongDesc: The Uber Blue Rook stands before you clad in magnificent blue armor. She is a rarity amongst the knights of this order due to the fact that she is a woman. No other member of the order dared to challenge her because of her immense strength, cunning and finesse. She is the reason why the fortress has not yet fallen to the darkness that lies to the north.
mobImmune: PUMMEL CHARM PARALYSIS DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE SUMMON

mobShortDesc: The True Fire Newt God basks in the pale light of lava.
mobLongDesc: The large newt stands thirty feet in the air. She opens her gaping maw to show numerous rows of jagged white teeth. Thin lines of lava descend down her back, as her scales move to the sway of her gigantic form. The black, red and orange scales shimmer i
mobImmune: PUMMEL CHARM PARALYSIS DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE SUMMON

mobShortDesc: The Uber Fire Newt Phoenix is engulfed in a cloud of ash.
mobLongDesc: She towers above her male counterpart.  A wingspan that easily reaches 25 meters, it brushes against the edges of the cavern. He vibrant colors exude a radiance not seen with the fire newts.  She is truly the leader of the group and has the beautiful te
mobImmune: PUMMEL CHARM PARALYSIS DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE SUMMON
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST

mobShortDesc: The Uber Zyca Prince stands and smirks at those that are beneath him.
mobLongDesc: The Uber Zyca Prince gleams with a huge smile across his face. This man is no longer bound to be married and can live a life he wants.
mobImmune: PUMMEL CHARM PARALYSIS DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE SUMMON

mobShortDesc: The Uber Huge Whirlwind is generating a squall at you.
mobLongDesc: Summoned from the deepest parts of its plane, it only answers the call of those that are truly powerful.  It only wants to complete the wish of the summoner so it can return to its domain, and that means murdering you.

mobShortDesc: The Uber Ultimate Mystic has unlocked the secrets of the universe.
mobLongDesc: The Uber Ultimate Mystic has attained what few ever have. The knowledge of the universe is a fearsome and powerful tool to have. Looking slightly bored, he has decided to test out this new knowledge on you.
mobImmune: PUMMEL CHARM PARALYSIS DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE SUMMON

mobShortDesc: The Uber Great Mystic stands studying the final records of recent history.
mobLongDesc: The Uber Great Mystic was not chosen, but has designated himself to be lead figure of this brotherhood. He refuses to do any day-to-day activities and instead spends his time reading and furthering his own mystical powers.
mobImmune: PUMMEL CHARM PARALYSIS DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE SUMMON

mobShortDesc: The Uber King Spider stares and bares its bloody fangs.
mobLongDesc: Huge, sleek and very tall, this large purple and black spider towers over you. The crown it commands sits at the bottom of one of its legs, not large enough to go any further. The ground slightly shakes as it steps delicately around the room.
mobImmune: PUMMEL CHARM PARALYSIS DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE SUMMON

mobShortDesc: The Dark Knight is standing here, eyeing you carefully.
mobLongDesc: The Dark Knight seems to be shrouded in a cloak of darkness, or perhaps he just draws all the surrounding light into his being, leaving an empty void. The only truly remarkable thing you can seem to focus on are his eyes. His eyes leave you feeling as though he has looked into your soul and found the darkness that you are hiding even from yourself. As if from a trance, you start back to reality just in time to see the Dark Knight descend upon you.

mobShortDesc: A borgh is here, getting ready to tear you to shreds.
mobLongDesc: The borgh is an ugly creature.  It walks on all fours, but will sometimes rear up on its hind legs in order to fight better.  It has massive, piercing claws and a thick protective hide.  Horns protrude from the side if it's jaw, curving forward along its snout.

mobShortDesc: A moredhel, evil cousin to the dwarf, is here.
mobLongDesc: The moredhel is a fierce fighter.  It looks nearly identical to a dwarf, except for the darker skin, but unlike a dwarf, its first instinct upon seeing you is to destroy you.

mobShortDesc: A firedrake eyes you carefully, smoke building in his lungs.
mobLongDesc: The drake is cousin to the dragon, and as such, looks like a smaller version of a dragon.  While smaller, they can be just as dangerous.

mobShortDesc: A ferocious Scorpat spins his tail towards you.
mobLongDesc: The Scorpat was an attempt at a guardian, by the Dark Knight.  The experiment failed...what you see before you is the result...a mix between a scorpion and a bat...it has small sharp fangs and a thin, wispy tail with a stinger on the end.

mobShortDesc: A dangerous-looking bee heads right for you.
mobLongDesc: The bee has a long sharp stinger, pointed right at YOU!

mobShortDesc: A fly dashes back and forth aimlessly.
mobLongDesc: The fly seems to be in search of food.

mobShortDesc: A large mosquito buzzes around your head.
mobLongDesc: The mosquito has a long pointed sucker in the middle of his face.

mobShortDesc: A warrior bat wanders aimlessly about.
mobLongDesc: The warrior looks tired from hours of training.  He stands about six feet tall, but will be absolutely huge when fully grown.  He scowls at you when he notices you, and you feel faint.

mobShortDesc: A large bat, scarred from many battles, prepares to attack.
mobLongDesc: The bat is REALLY quite large, and he looks pissed!

mobShortDesc: A huge warrior bat is here, ready to fight.
mobLongDesc: The bat is scarred from many battles, but he is always ready for a good fight.  His wings spread out almost four feet on each side, and they have lethally sharp claws on the ends of them.

mobShortDesc: A huge bat stands here guarding the entrance.
mobLongDesc: The bat is very large.  He also looks very powerful.  He seem to tighten up as he sees you, but appears as though he is not going to make the first move.

mobShortDesc: An earthworm slowly slides along the ground at your feet.
mobLongDesc: The worm appears harmless and rather friendly.

mobShortDesc: A muskelounge swims aimlessly here.
mobLongDesc: The large fish appears rather harmless.

mobShortDesc: A snarling hell hound prepares to lunge at you.
mobLongDesc: The hell hound looks like a cross-breed between a rottweiler and a wolverine.  It has round, muscular legs and a broad chest.  It lips are pulled back in a permanent snarl and its fur it matted with blood.

mobShortDesc: The large, nasty-looking leech pokes his razor sharp tongue at you.
mobLongDesc: The leech is much larger than the others, maybe 4 feet long and a one foot in diameter.  It is a murky reddish-brown.  It could probably suck you dry within minutes.

mobShortDesc: A leech crawls along towards you and creeps up your leg.
mobLongDesc: The leech is one of the smaller leeches you'll find here, only about two feet long.  It looks thirsty.

mobShortDesc: A large, white slug oozes before you, blocking your path.
mobLongDesc: The slug is about 12 feet in diameter and must weigh over fifty tons. It's body pulsates, and it sort of just rolls as it moves.  Apparently it doesn't want you to continue down this path.

mobShortDesc: A small, red demon grins evilly at you.
mobLongDesc: The demon, while only two feet tall, looks incredibly ferocious.  He glows red and has sharp claws, nearly as long as his entire body.  His feet, also, are long and pointy, and he large, powerful legs.

mobShortDesc: A large bat is here looking very protective.
mobLongDesc: The bat appears to be nesting...nursing her young.  She seems happy that the food has come to her this time.

mobShortDesc: A nasty-looking, Rabid Bat stands here, ready to spread its disease.
mobLongDesc: The bat is about three feet tall, with sharp, pointy fangs.  As it turns to look at you, blood drips from its fangs and your ears ring with a high screeeeeech!

mobShortDesc: A lookout claps a gleaming spyglass to his eye as he surveys the forest below.
mobLongDesc: Wavy blonde hair frames a handsome chiseled face, two clear blue eyes gazing intently out across the far landscape. A narrow frame carries a well tailored uniform, buttons and trappings shiny and clean.
mobImmune: POISON SLEEP BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DISINTEGRATE SUMMON
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST KICK SPELL CAST

mobShortDesc: A small black and brown creature cowers down, hissing wildly.
mobLongDesc: Beady red eyes flare brightly as his lips curl upwards in a dark snarl showing teeth covered in decayed meat and clotted blood. Grey brown fur shows a distinctive white stripe covered in dirt and thick with broken twigs.

mobShortDesc: A spider, green legs glinting between the bushes, scuttles up a branch.
mobLongDesc: Long sticklike legs click furiously as the swirling green and black colors mesh into the forest floor. Thick strands of cobweb are strung along the path as it spins a net to catch wandering forest creatures.

mobShortDesc: A gaudily dressed vagabond struts proudly, chest hair leading the way.
mobLongDesc: Thick curly hair sprouts from his tanned, muscled chest. Ragged suspenders hold up a loose pair of shredded pantaloons. The pungent smell of gunpowder and a special blend of smoked herbs permeates his greasy hair.

mobShortDesc: A slinkily dressed vagabond struts by, a little wiggle in her hips.
mobLongDesc: A tattered shirt barely contains a heaving bosom. Long hair streams down her narrow back as a pair of leather breeches fit snugly over solid legs and a healthy curving derriere.

mobShortDesc: A tall humanoid, clad in bark and wearing small spectacles, glances up.
mobLongDesc: A towering mountain of claws and fur rears upwards in the cramped house. Sharp daggerlike claws flash in the dim light as giant mandibles drool thick globs of phlegm on the splintered wood floor. Countless eyes glint in the darkness staring down at you unblinking.

mobShortDesc: A tall, bearlike creature shuffles along in the dirt.
mobLongDesc: Mandibles clack loudly as a multitude of eyes roll quickly around searching for danger. Thick fur covers its lumbering body, sharp claws flashing wickedly from massive paws.

mobShortDesc: A gaudily dressed vagabond struts proudly, chest hair leading the way.
mobLongDesc: Thick curly hair sprouts from his tanned, muscled chest. Ragged suspenders hold up a loose pair of shredded pantaloons. The pungent smell of gunpowder and a special blend of smoked herbs permeates his greasy hair.

mobShortDesc: A slinkily dressed vagabond struts by, a little wiggle in her hips.
mobLongDesc: A tattered shirt barely contains a heaving bosom. Long hair streams down her narrow back as a pair of leather breeches fit snugly over solid legs and a healthy curving derriere.

mobShortDesc: A pudgy creature stands at attention as you approach.
mobLongDesc: The best of the best, these guards have been hand-picked by the highest minions of the tower to guard the secret exits and entryways.  He stands proudly before you, transparent gut hanging disgustingly below his belt. Although jelly-like, his skin is thick and tough, practically impervious to any attack.  He sneers at you as he looks you over.

mobName: A Lesser Minion of the King
mobShortDesc: A Lesser Minion of the King stands here, guarding the path to his master.
mobLongDesc: A skeleton in blazing red armor, the Minion prepares to flay you alive for trespassing on his Master's territory.  He guards these halls, wandering aimlessly with no mind and no soul.
affectedByFlags: INVISIBLE DETECT-INVISIBLE INFRAVISION SNEAK INVUL DUAL

mobShortDesc: A hooded being darts in and out of the shadows.
mobLongDesc: This strange scurrying creature hides under his hood, running from place to place. All you can recognize are the fluorescent, beady eyes peering out to regard you with curiosity.

mobShortDesc: A disfigured creature seems to be following you, looking for a bite to eat.
mobLongDesc: This mutated being is stumbling along behind you.  Its organs are visible through its transparent, jelly-like skin.  The form of the body seems to be human, but it has been transformed by some unknown cause into this horrid thing. It is mumbling some alien words as it chases you.

mobShortDesc: A circle of ivory stones has been built here, a voice from within speaks...
mobLongDesc: The spirit residing within the protective circle is one of the ancient fortune tellers from beyond time.  The Oracle was conjured here by some unknown force and left to guard against any potential intruders.  It seems to be protecting a strange orb within its grasp.
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST

mobShortDesc: Maerlyn, Wizard of Eternity, is standing here speaking strange incantations.
mobLongDesc: The great sorcerer of the higher planes of reality, Maerlyn has been summoned here by forces more powerful even than himself.  He holds in his hand the key to all knowledge of being, and he isn't about to give it up to just anyone. Archaic symbols cover his cloak, and a wizard's cap sits atop a white-haired head. He sits here patiently waiting for his leave and contemplating other necromantic matters to pass the time.
mobImmune: FIRE ELECTRIC POISON SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DRAIN DISINTEGRATE
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST

mobShortDesc: A shady figure clad in a monk's black garb turns toward you in anger.
mobLongDesc: Using the shadows to his advantage, Marten has hidden himself in this topmost spire of the tower.  He is less than cordial with you as he makes a hissing sound and tears holes in the air around him.  Perhaps you should come back later when he might be in a better mood.

mobShortDesc: A mysterious man is leaning against the wall here, singing to himself.
mobLongDesc: Twixt is a legendary bard, originally hailing from Midworld.  Deep lines and furrows cover his leathery face.  He stands here before a portal, guarding the way into the higher reaches of the Tower.  Not one to cause trouble, he bids you a safe departure and farewell, providing you leave now...
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST

mobShortDesc: A pile of sand lies snarling, waiting to eat its next helpless victim.
mobLongDesc: A shuddering pile of dirty sand.  An opening appears right before your eyes, and scores of small, sharp teeth begin to grow out of the pit.  A deep growl begins issuing from the mouth.  Apparently, it is hungry.
mobImmune: FIRE ELECTRIC POISON PUMMEL KICK PUNCH SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DRAIN DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE

mobShortDesc: Vermilion, the `bCrimson `hKing, is levitating before his eternal scarlet throne.
mobLongDesc: Flowing scarlet robes are draped over his broad shoulders.  Although he must be as old as time itself, the form he has taken is of a man in middle age. His skin is a bright red, glowing with power.  Eyes like garnets blaze in anger at your unwanted presence here.  As supreme ruler of the tower, he must defend what he has rightfully stolen.  He begins to take his true form as he lashes out with the fury of all-powerful evil...
actionFlags: SENTINEL ISNPC AGGRESSIVE STAY-ZONE ARM FLY

mobShortDesc: Atropos, agent of the Random, stands here guarding something.
mobLongDesc: A bald, hideous creature clad in dirty surgeon's scrubs and holding a rusty scalpel. He intends to gut you and add your ears to the grisly necklace he wears about his filthy neck.  He cares not who you are.  You have dared to stumble upon his domain, and you shall face his wrath.
actionFlags: SENTINEL SCAVENGER ISNPC AGGRESSIVE STAY-ZONE MEMORY ARM

mobShortDesc: The Count Strahd von Zarovich is here, looking over his domain.
mobLongDesc: Strahd is a cruel, vicious vampire, who rules this domain, Barovia. He drains blood from maidens, and turns them into slave vampires for him. He looks to know much about magic, and you better leave before he turns you into a toad.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY SPHERE DODGE INVUL DUAL

mobShortDesc: A barovian is here, chatting merrily with his friends.
mobLongDesc: The barovian looks older than he really is, and he has a weary look in his eyes. He is a honest worker, trying to bring up his children, and care for his wife.

mobShortDesc: a very angry looking vampire is here, ready to eat your entrails.
mobLongDesc: The vampire looks very pale, and he needs blood quick. You'll be his next meal, if you don't run away quick !
actionFlags: SPEC SENTINEL SCAVENGER ISNPC AGGRESSIVE STAY-ZONE MEMORY

mobShortDesc: Bartender is here, ready to serve you.
mobLongDesc: Bartender looks very friendly, but beware, he has big muscles, and he's used to getting rid of unwanted customers.

mobShortDesc: A ghost is floating here in its eternal agony.
mobLongDesc: The ghost looks just like a thick fog, nothing interesting in it. But he solves people for breakfast, so be wary.

mobShortDesc: Jander is here, trying to bring life to the garden.
mobLongDesc: Jander is an old vampire, but he's not evil, like most of his kind. He seems to be very sad, like he has no meaning in life. He looks up at you, and tells you to leave this place quick, before Strahd finds you.

mobShortDesc: The Count Strahd von Zarovich is here, looking over his domain.
mobLongDesc: Strahd is a cruel, vicious vampire, who rules this domain, Barovia. He drains blood from maidens, and turns them into slave vampires for him. He looks to know much about magic, and you better leave before he turns you into a toad.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY SPHERE DODGE INVUL DUAL

mobShortDesc: a pale looking vampire is here.
mobLongDesc: The vampire looks very pale, and he needs blood quick. You'll be his next dinner, if you don't run away quick !
actionFlags: SPEC SENTINEL SCAVENGER ISNPC AGGRESSIVE STAY-ZONE MEMORY

mobShortDesc: Lord Soth is here, raging madly.
mobLongDesc: You can hardly see anything except his burned and charred armor. Only his eyes flare in his skull. His bones are black, and you can see the black rose on his breast plate. He is the knight of the Black Rose. And he will kill you with his touch, flee, while you still can.

mobShortDesc: A ghoul is here, eating some old bones.
