mobLongDesc: The ghoul looks hideous, half of his head has fallen off, and his guts are hanging from his stomach. He is grinning insanely at you.

mobShortDesc: A zombie is here, ready to tear you apart !
mobLongDesc: This zombie has rotting flesh all over him, with worms twisting in it. He is created by Strahd, and is very powerful, beware !

mobShortDesc: a skeleton is here, prepared to kill everything it sees.
mobLongDesc: This skeleton is one of Strahd's horrible creations, some flesh still rotting on its bones.

mobShortDesc: The Seeress is here, waiting for your questions.
mobLongDesc: The Seeress is old and weary. She has told fortunes for people for ages and ages, and they rarely go wrong.

mobShortDesc: A gipsy is here, singing and dancing merrily.
mobLongDesc: The gipsy looks happy, he is enjoying his life while it lasts, dancing with his dear friends in this camp, away from all the death and cruelty outside.

mobShortDesc: a wolf is here, looking for something to kill.
mobLongDesc: The wolf looks like a normal wolf, with long teeth and fiery looks in its eyes.

mobShortDesc: A deer is here, looking for something to eat.
mobLongDesc: The deer is looks a bit scared, and has beautiful fur and huge antlers.

mobShortDesc: a small cute rabbit is here.
mobLongDesc: The rabbit looks cute, jumping here and there, eating something every now and then.

mobShortDesc: A weary looking farmer is here, trying to get some rest from work.
mobLongDesc: The farmer works for long each day, and comes selling his vegetables and grain to get some money to buy something for his family.

mobShortDesc: A barovian is here, minding his own business.
mobLongDesc: The barovian looks older than he really is, and he has a weary look in his eyes. He is a honest worker, trying to bring up his children, and care for his wife.

mobShortDesc: Alys is here, playing with her toys.
mobLongDesc: Alys is a very cute little girl. She is the eldest of Burgonmaster's children, but still very young. It's her duty to look after her little brother, Abel.

mobShortDesc: Abel is here, playing with his toys.
mobLongDesc: Abel is a young boy, who seems to like his toys very much.

mobShortDesc: Karen, burgonmaster's wife is cooking food for the family here.
mobLongDesc: She is weary, but beautiful woman. Cooking and child care are her jobs.

mobShortDesc: The Burgonmaster is here, counting his money.
mobLongDesc: He's a fat old man, with an evil look in his eyes. Tax collectin is his job in Barovia, so he's used to fighting. You better be careful with him.

mobShortDesc: A slack-jawed corpse lumbers around aimlessly, groaning, arms outstretched.
mobLongDesc: A reanimated corpse of unknown age and origin, the only certainties are its mindlessness and odor. Clearly there is more to reanimation and necromancy than waving an enchanted pentacle about, as this zombie lacks the same oomph and pizzazz as the ones Strahd churned out. Still, it will serve its purpose well enough, onward to battle you bloated oaf.

mobShortDesc: A slack-jawed corpse lumbers around aimlessly, groaning, arms outstretched.
mobLongDesc: A reanimated corpse of unknown age and origin, the only certainties are its mindlessness and odor.  It is difficult to know whether this was simply a convenience corpse for Strahd's experiments, from a local hospital perhaps, or, more sinister, a hapless traveller to Barovia who found oneself a brief pampered lifestyle in the castle Ravenloft.  Fortunately, none of that makes any difference, it would still try to eat your brains if it were your best and oldest friend.... Wait! Larry, is that you?

mobShortDesc: A figure, veiled in `pshadow`q, stands tall with an inspiring presence.
mobLongDesc: The Nameless One - there is nothing else to know.

mobShortDesc: Strahd von Zarovich the uber vampire is here, idly meddling in necromancy.
mobLongDesc: Gaze upon Strahd von Zarovich, one of the eldest vampires alive.  A master necromancer and ruler of Barovia, he has long dwelt in the castle Ravenloft. But this is no mere earthly vampire, this is a darkness-infused demi-god from beyond time and space.  Here, in his own pocket dimension he awaits the reincarnation of Tatyana - his ill-conceived, bittersweet desire - while he toils with the unholy arts of reanimation.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SANCTUARY SPHERE DODGE INVUL DUAL
mobImmune: SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS DISINTEGRATE SUMMON HIT BLUDGEON CRUSH

mobShortDesc: An angry wolf is crouching here, ready to pounce at you!
mobLongDesc: The wolf is large, with thick gray fur. In several places on its body, the fur is missing and scars tell of previous fights. Teeth bared in a snarl, its menacing growl makes you think twice before attacking.

mobShortDesc: Elyas is standing here, seemingly unaware of you.
mobLongDesc: The man before you is in his 40s and grey is starting to show at the temples. What immediately strikes you about him, is his yellow eyes! What man has yellow eyes? You'd better tread carefully.

mobShortDesc: Luc is standing here, sharpening his blade.
mobLongDesc: A tall man with dark reddish hair, Luc looks menacingly at you. He wears a brown traveling cloak over a well used plate armor. His boots are trimmed with fur and look worn from long days of walking.

mobShortDesc: A city guard is standing here, watching for signs of trouble.
mobLongDesc: An armed guard is wearing full armor, painted green and red. He keeps control of who enters the city.

mobShortDesc: A city guard is standing here, watching for signs of trouble.
mobLongDesc: An armed guard is wearing full armor, painted green and red. He keeps control of who enters the city.

mobShortDesc: A city guard is standing here, watching for signs of trouble.
mobLongDesc: An armed guard is wearing full armor, painted green and red. He keeps control of who enters the city.

mobShortDesc: A city guard is standing here, watching for signs of trouble.
mobLongDesc: An armed guard is wearing full armor, painted green and red. He keeps control of who enters the city.

mobShortDesc: A city guard is standing here, watching for signs of trouble.
mobLongDesc: An armed guard is wearing full armor, painted green and red. He keeps control of who enters the city.

mobShortDesc: A city guard is standing here, watching for signs of trouble.
mobLongDesc: An armed guard is wearing full armor, painted green and red. He keeps control of who enters the city.

mobShortDesc: A city guard is standing here, watching for signs of trouble.
mobLongDesc: An armed guard is wearing full armor, painted green and red. He keeps control of who enters the city.

mobShortDesc: A Whitecloak is guarding the fortress.
mobLongDesc: The Whitecloak is wearing armor, polished to perfection, with the sunburst of the Children of the Light on the breast. A snow white cloak hangs around his shoulders.

mobShortDesc: A city guard is standing here, watching for signs of trouble.
mobLongDesc: An armed guard is wearing full armor, painted green and red. He keeps control of who enters the city.

mobShortDesc: A member of the queen's guard is watching the gates to the city.
mobLongDesc: Long white collars hang down over his mail and plate, while his cloak and undercoat have a bright red hue. His conical helmet shines like silver, and thin red streamers flutter beneath the head of his lance. A cage of steel bars mask his face.

mobShortDesc: The Seeker is walking around, tending his caravan.
mobLongDesc: The Seeker looks friendly, and smiles at you as you walk by.

mobShortDesc: A Tinker child is playing here.
mobLongDesc: The Tinker child is running around playing with his friends. He wears the same bright colored clothes as the adults do.

mobShortDesc: A Tinker in colorful clothes is standing here.
mobLongDesc: The Tinker is clothed in the colorful and patched garments.

mobShortDesc: An explorer is searching for the Horn Of Valere
mobLongDesc: The hunter of the horn is a powerful warrior, the only breed suitable for this most important task: finding the fabled Horn Of Valere, which prophecy say must be found before the Last Battle against the Dark One.

mobShortDesc: A merchant is traveling here counting his coins.
mobLongDesc: The trader is leading his train of wagons along the road. His fine cloak and fit horses suggest that he has done well in trading his goods.

mobName: a member of the Supreme Council of the Black Ajah
mobShortDesc: A member of the Supreme Council of the Black Ajah is standing here.
mobLongDesc: She appears just short of her middle years and has blue eyes. Her hair is black and falls to her shoulders. She wears a white dress with a low neckline.

mobName: Mesaana is standing here, tilting her head as she watches you.
mobShortDesc: Mesaana is standing here, tilting her head as she watched you.
mobLongDesc: She appears just short of her middle years and has blue eyes. Her hair is black and fall to her shoulders. She wears a white dress with a low neck line.
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST

mobShortDesc: A boy is standing here practicing with his sword.
mobLongDesc: This boy is practicing to be a Warder, but has still far to go. His skills not quite dangerous enough.

mobShortDesc: A Warder is standing here aware of all around him.
mobLongDesc: The Warder's cloak makes the warder blend in with the surroundings.

mobName: an Aes Sedai of the Red Ajah
mobShortDesc: A woman in a red shawl is standing here.
mobLongDesc: You see a woman wearing a grey robe with a red shawl around her shoulders. Her face is ageless and it is impossible to tell how old she is. She wears a ring shaped like a serpent biting its own tail on one of her fingers.
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST
attackTarget: SELF RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP BUFFER RAN_GROUP
attackSpell: miracle super_harm poison blindness disrupt_sanctuary meteor

mobName: an Aes Sedai of the Red Ajah
mobShortDesc: A woman in a red shawl is standing here.
mobLongDesc: You see a woman wearing a grey robe with a red shawl around her shoulders. Her face is ageless and it is impossible to tell how old she is. She wears a ring shaped like a serpent biting its own tail on one of her fingers.
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST
attackTarget: SELF RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP BUFFER RAN_GROUP
attackSpell: miracle super_harm poison blindness disrupt_sanctuary meteor

mobShortDesc: Hammar, the blademaster is standing here practicing his sword forms.
mobLongDesc: Hammar is the leader of the Warders and is in charge of the training of the Warders and those who seek to be Warders. He is tall with wide shoulders and face that looks carved from stone. His long dark hair hangs down his back and you unwillingly take a step back as you meet his gaze.
mobImmune: POISON CHARM BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DISINTEGRATE SUMMON

mobName: a Sitter for the Brown Ajah
mobShortDesc: A Sitter for the Brown Ajah is standing here.
mobLongDesc: The Sitter has the ageless face like the Aes Sedai, but her hair is white streaked with grey. She must be very old to have hair like that.
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST
attackTarget: SELF RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP BUFFER RAN_GROUP

mobName: An Aes Sedai of the Green Ajah
mobShortDesc: A woman in a green shawl is standing here.
mobLongDesc: You see a woman wearing a grey robe with a green shawl around her shoulders. Her face is ageless and it is impossible to tell how old she is. She wears a ring shaped like a serpent biting its own tail on one of her fingers.
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST
attackTarget: SELF RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP BUFFER RAN_GROUP
attackSpell: miracle super_harm poison blindness disrupt_sanctuary meteor

mobLongDesc: You see a woman wearing a grey robe with a white shawl around her shoulders. Her face is ageless and it is impossible to tell how old she is. She wears a ring shaped like a serpent biting its own tail on one of her fingers.
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST
attackTarget: SELF RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP RAN_GROUP BUFFER RAN_GROUP
attackSpell: miracle super_harm poison blindness disrupt_sanctuary meteor

mobShortDesc: A young girl in grey is standing here.
mobLongDesc: The Accepted is a young girl in her twenties. She wears a serpent ring on her finger.

mobShortDesc: A girl in a white robe is scurrying about doing her tasks.
mobLongDesc: This young girl is clad in white. She walkes carefully, looking over her shoulder in case an Aes Sedai should be present.

mobName: Alviarin, the Keeper of the Chronicles
mobShortDesc: Alviarin, the Keeper of the Chronicles reading some notes.
mobLongDesc: She has the ageless face of the Aes Sedai, that makes it hard determining her age. The Keeper looks angrily at you for entering her office without permission.
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST

mobShortDesc: Elaida, the Amylin Seat is standing here.
mobLongDesc: The Amyrlin Seat in all her powers stand before you. Her fiery red hair hangs down on her shoulders. Her dark eyes scowl at you for disturbing her study.
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST

mobShortDesc: The Wolf Priest is standing here.
mobLongDesc: They recruit new brothers, oversee their training and minister to their spiritual needs. In battle they perform heroic feats of field medicine, swiftly patching up wounded comrades and sending them back into the fray with words of encouragement.

mobShortDesc: The Queen of the Wolves is standing here.
The King of the wolves is standing in front of you.
mobLongDesc: He is the King, the strongest and toughest wolf.

mobShortDesc: The Wolf Lord is standing here.
mobLongDesc: Bravest of the Brave, mightiest of the mighty, the Wolf Lord leads the Wolf Guard. Each Wolf Lord has proven himself again and again in battle. He is selected from the ranks of the Wolf Guard on the death of the previous Wolf Lord.

mobShortDesc: A wolf guard is here protecting the other wolves.
mobLongDesc: The wolf guards are the bravest warriors. Each has distinguished himself with some truly exceptional feat of bravery or martial prowess, and each would give his life to protect the life or honour of the Wolf Lord.

mobShortDesc: A wolf is standing in front of you.
mobLongDesc: You see a big blue wolf in front of you. This fierce wolf has a pair of fiery red eyes which are staring at you!

mobShortDesc: A stunningly-beautiful angel floats here, wreathed in golden light.
mobLongDesc: This angelic creature possesses a tragic beauty.  A single tear wends its way down its porcelin cheek, and the golden light that wreathes its form seems reflected from another plane entirely.

mobShortDesc: An enormous squid swims here, its long black tentacles churning the water.
mobLongDesc: This giant squid is as black as the inky water that surrounds it.  Its beak is jagged, and covered in the remnants of various aquatic creatures it has feasted on.  Its tentacles are covered with spiked suckers, and bits of blubber are stuck to them.

mobShortDesc: A long pike breaches the surface here, gnashing its razor-sharp teeth.
mobLongDesc: Nearly twelve feet long, this pike could easily be a century old.  Its long needle-sharp teeth form three distinct layers in its mouth, and it gnashes them wickedly in anticipation of a fresh meal.

mobShortDesc: A sickly albino eel slithers at the water's surface here, occasionally glowing slightly.
mobLongDesc: This disgusting creature seems to have been summoned from the depths of the endless pool.  It is completely white, and where its eyes should be are only thick sheets of flesh.  It hums with an eerie energy, and occasionally its form is wreathed in a halo of iridescent blue light.

mobShortDesc: A sickly ooze crawls along the floor, coalescing into a demonic beast.
mobLongDesc: This beast is one of the nether creatures which had been kept at bay for the thousands of years the Vaurons ruled the land.  Now, with the coming of darkness, they have moved up, inhabiting the now empty cave networks.  These beasts share only one similarity:  Their absolute love for the taste of human flesh.

mobShortDesc: A reptilian guard stands watch over the toll-booth.
mobLongDesc: Sent by the High-Sorcerer Nil to protect the path to his tower, this guard stands a good eight feet tall, each foot lined with scales which make the nicest armor you've ever seen pale in comparison.  Thick rows of teeth fill its mouth, and saliva runs down its chin at the thought of your delicate flesh.

mobKeywords: magi mage arch-magi arch wizard sorcerer
mobShortDesc: An imposing sorcerer smiles and rubs his hands with anticipation at the thought of killing you.
mobLongDesc: Dressed in robes woven from captured starlight, this sorcerer is one of the most powerful ever to inhabit this plane of existance. Coaxed to the realm of Xandolap by promises of even more power, he has taken up residence in this cave due to its strange properties.  Magical energies seem to crackle about his head, and he grins down at you with an amused look, as if wondering why you think you even have a chance at defeating him.  "Ah well,"  He mutters under his breath, "Have to keep in practice I suppose."  With that he begins weaving his hands in a series of complex gestures, all the while humming a soft tune.
affectedByFlags: INVISIBLE SANCTUARY SPHERE PROTECT-EVIL DODGE INVUL
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST
attackTarget: LEADER RAN_GROUP SELF RAN_GROUP ROOM SELF SELF
attackSpell: wrath_of_ancients frost_bolt blade_barrier vampiric_touch conflagration frost_bolt orb_of_protection

mobShortDesc: A twisted and mutated human form stands slavering here at the entrance.
mobLongDesc: This beast was once human, you can tell that by its general shape. Sometime in the past however, a crazed sorcerer got his hands on this poor soul, and worked his art to create the beast you see in front of you.  Instilled with only one purpose, the man has no need of brain mass, and it seems instead that this excess mass has been transfered to create the long, imposing claws which seem to be heading towards your body.
mobImmune: SLEEP BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DISEMBOWEL BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT

mobShortDesc: A statue of basalt stands sentry here.
mobLongDesc: This sentry was created from basalt by the lord of the city, Chorlach-Togna.  His hard chiseled features betray his only true purpose:  To protect his lord and master by whatever means neccesary. He wields a long onyx glaive, and you do not relish the thought of finding yourself on the other end of this horrific weapon.

mobShortDesc: A medium-sized creature vaguely resembling an anteater comes moving towards you.
mobLongDesc: This creature doesn't appear to be physically dangerous in any way. You do notice, however, that it seems to leave behind it a trail of shattered weapons, decayed armor, and melted glass.  While you don't think it would cause you much harm, your possessions seem to be trying to pull away from it with an almost sentient will.

mobShortDesc: A large mass of flesh shambles towards you.
mobLongDesc: A grotesque form, made entirely of what appears to be human flesh, comes shambling towards you.  You're not sure what will happen once it reaches you, but you have a sneaking suspicion it won't be asking you over for tea and crumpets.
actionFlags: SENTINEL ISNPC STAY-ZONE AGGWA AGGTH AGGCL AGGMU AGGNI
mobImmune: ELECTRIC POISON PUMMEL KICK PUNCH SLEEP BLINDNESS PARALYSIS DRAIN DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE PIERCE SLASH CLAW BITE STING HACK CHOP SLICE BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT

mobShortDesc: A long-hidden warrior of the old regime stands in the shadows, smiling at you.
mobLongDesc: Once the right-hand fighter for the king, Paltro was one of the few who managed to escape the pogrom launched by the Dark Lord upon the old inhabitants of the realm.  He is perhaps the only one of these few to retain his sanity, and it is with a relieved smile that he looks upon your countanence.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SANCTUARY SPHERE PROTECT-EVIL DODGE DUAL

mobShortDesc: The Ixthian Leopard smiles slowly at you, showing its many rows of teeth.
mobLongDesc: This visitor from far beyond is certainly nothing to tangle with. While at first it appears to be a simple relation to the mountain lion, upon closer examination, something else stands out. A superior intellect is hidden beneath this feline exterior, and something about the way its eyes light over you sends shivers down your spine.
affectedByFlags: INVISIBLE DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY SPHERE INFRAVISION DODGE INVUL

mobShortDesc: A large, misshapen beast rises from a pit in the ground.
mobLongDesc: It is impossible to say what this beast once was, only that it has fallen so far as to be unrecognizable.  Perhaps once an angel in the pantheon of the old inhabitants of the city, it too fell as its masters did.  Now it lives merely for the thrill of murder.  Not to survive, but to enjoy.
actionFlags: SENTINEL SCAVENGER ISNPC STAY-ZONE MEMORY FLY AGGPA AGGGOOD
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SANCTUARY SPHERE PROTECT-EVIL INFRAVISION STATUE DODGE DUAL

mobShortDesc: A large basalt figure carved to resemble a warrior keeps guard.
mobLongDesc: These guardians were created from basalt by the lord of the city, Chorlach-Togna.  Their hard chiseled features betray their only true purpose:  To protect their lord and master by whatever means neccesary. They wield long onyx glaives, and you do not relish the thought of finding yourself on the other end of one of these horrific weapons.

mobShortDesc: A tall man sits perched atop his throne, smiling with insane glee.
mobLongDesc: This is the puppet figure Chorlach-Togna chose to run the affairs of state in his city.  He holds sway over the basalt guardians, and once even over his own mind.  Now, alas, too long has he been in service of his lord, and his sanity has fallen as surely as his many foes.  His brain still retains enough cohesion to recognize you as an enemy however, and his eyes take on a purposeful look as he unsheathes his sword.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SANCTUARY SPHERE DODGE DUAL FURY

mobShortDesc: Chorlach Togna, one of the greater lords of darkness, waits patiently for the fall of light.
mobLongDesc: The greatest of Xandolap's lords, Chorlach-Togna was born of the rift between Chaos and Order, during the early days of the universe. Feeding on the discontent which was in the hearts of his parents at seeing their creation fall, he grew in the outer reaches of Void, awaiting the day when his purpose would become clear.  When the Dark Lord came upon him, he bound him to service with the promise that one day even his powerful mater and pater would one day bow before him.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY PROTECT-EVIL INFRAVISION DUAL
mobImmune: FIRE POISON PUMMEL PUNCH SLEEP CHARM BLINDNESS DRAIN DISEMBOWEL DISINTEGRATE SUMMON HIT BACKSTAB AMBUSH ASSAULT
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST
attackTarget: ROOM ROOM ROOM ROOM GROUP GROUP GROUP GROUP ROOM ROOM
attackSpell: searing_orb tremor UNKNOWN: 182 rimefang UNKNOWN: 242 UNKNOWN: 135 sleep paralyze poison_smoke blindness_dust

mobShortDesc: A miserable figure of a human is here, whimpering in a corner softly.
mobLongDesc: It is impossible to say how this poor wretch earned his fate, but you know there is nothing you can do to save him at this point.  Forced to live with the knowledge that he would be sacrificed when it pleased the priests forced to live with the knowledge that every meal meant one less companion and one more rung down the ladder of humanity forced to live with the knowledge that the land he once knew was now enveloped in darkness, this man is mad, as would you be, were you in his position.

mobShortDesc: A sallow man dressed in robes the color of darkness stands here in worship.
mobLongDesc: A lesser priest of the night, this man has sworn away all semblence of his former humanity in order to serve his new master, Chatundah the Unspeakable.  For a moment you think you see a glimmer of recognition in his eyes as he gazes upon you, but then something seems to rise up within him and crush that recognition.  You do not feel safe in the presence of this man.

mobName: the High Priest of the Night
mobShortDesc: A tall man in long flowing robes of darkness sits here in meditation.
mobLongDesc: A darkness seems to cloak this man, and his features are nearly lost to the night.  What you do see of his face sends a shiver down your spine.  Nothing in his eyes could be called evil as such, but such a chilling air eminates from them, you are sure he would kill you as soon as look at you, if he felt it would further the cause of his Dark master, Chatundah the Unspeakable.  He himself has promised his life away by accepting the position of high-priest, a position which lasts a mere four years, and culmunates in his inevitable sacrifice to his lord, Chatundah.
actionFlags: SENTINEL ISNPC AGGRESSIVE STAY-ZONE AGGTH AGGCL AGGMU MEMORY
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SANCTUARY SPHERE PROTECT-EVIL DODGE INVUL DUAL
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST

mobShortDesc: A large human-shaped statue of basalt wanders the city.
mobLongDesc: These servitors were created from basalt by the lord of the city, Chorlach-Togna.  Their hard chiseled features betray their only true purpose:  To protect their lord and master by whatever means neccesary. They wield long onyx glaives, and you do not relish the thought of finding yourself on the other end of one of these horrific weapons.
actionFlags: ISNPC AGGRESSIVE STAY-ZONE AGGMU MEMORY AGGNI

mobShortDesc: An enormous, writhing mass of tentacles stirs up the water here.
mobLongDesc: An amorphous black tentacled creature, Octalon is one of the lords of night that the Dark Lord brought to help rule his kingdom.  Out of the darkness he was spawned, many aeons ago.  Ruler of the murky depths and the horrific creatures which live there, he possesses power far surpassing that of any of his minions.  While he is not confined to the water, his strength is far greater when in his native element.
actionFlags: ISNPC AGGRESSIVE STAY-ZONE AGGMU MEMORY AGGNI
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY SPHERE DODGE PROTECT-GOOD INVUL DUAL

mobShortDesc: A pile of salt has formed into a ghastly parody of a human shape.
mobLongDesc: A truly startling apparition, this creature takes a somewhat human form, created by a swirling mass of salt crystals.  One of the rarer elemental beings, it is rumored they are the spawn of a fire and water elemental.  This has yet to be proven.
mobImmune: PIERCE SLASH WHIP CLAW BITE STING SLICE BACKSTAB

mobShortDesc: Bautzan, the Great Beast from the Outer Realms is here, contemplating reality.
mobLongDesc: A visitor from a distant realm, Bautzan arrived one day, streaking through the heavens.  Observers mistook his shape for that of a rogue meteor plunged to earth, and many would-be collectors found their end in trying to collect a sample.  While not evil in any strict sense of the word, that which Bautzan requires to sustain himself, namely the life-energy of planets, has earned him his reputation.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE SANCTUARY SPHERE INFRAVISION INVUL DUAL

mobShortDesc: a Claegon is here, hovering above the Abyssal Plane.
mobLongDesc: This malformed beast was brought by the Dark Lord from his home realm to help patrol the outlying lands of his new kingdom.  Twice the size of a normal man, it hovers just above the silent abyssal plane. Nearly ursine in its shape, the features that draw your attention most are the razor-sharp claws, measuring almost four feet in length.

mobShortDesc: A warrior-villager is here, protecting his divine creator.
mobLongDesc: A large lizard-like being, standing eight feet tall, and covered in a thick reptilian hide, the Shantak is not your average humanoid.  Though technically a "warrior," this Shantak is an average representation of the race as a whole.  There are no non-warriors in this tribe, each member is taught to use his or her natural defenses and weapons at a very young age, and use them well.  While this might lead you to percieve the Shantak as another of the evil races inhabiting this land, you would be mistaken in doing so.  They have fought the Dark Lord since he arrived, although a tenuous aliance has existed at times between them.
affectedByFlags: INVISIBLE DETECT-INVISIBLE DETECT-MAGIC SENSE-LIFE PROTECT-EVIL SNEAK FURY

mobShortDesc: A shadow moves across your field of vision.
mobLongDesc: Darkness.  That's all you can make out, no matter how hard you look, all you see is a black splotch in your vision.  It's as though a tear in the fabric of space were manifesting before you.  Something about it sets your mind ill at ease.

mobShortDesc: A dark being, spawned at the inception of the universe sits here, waiting.
mobLongDesc: This is the being responsible for the race of Shantak, for the Guardian which lurks nearby, and even for the island beneath which you now find yourself.  A daughter of Order, she was chosen to protect the holiest of holies, and given the according power.  Now she sits, awaiting the day when once more Chaos and Order come into alignment, the day when the beings which have lain dormant since the dawn of Time arise and take their place in the pinnacle of heaven.

mobShortDesc: A large etheral creature protects the holiest of holies from the likes of you.
mobLongDesc: Impossible to describe, this ineffible creature is older than anything mortal man can concieve of.  From the time of the Great Old Ones, the time when Void spawned Chaos and Order, the time of the Great Coalescence, the Guardian is the protector of the holiest of holies.

mobShortDesc: A large, feline-rat scurries about the tunnels.
mobLongDesc: A twisted mixture of a cat and a rat, this vermin preys in these lower caves on lesser mice.  With the sickly disproportioned body of a rat, the perky, extra-sensitive ears of a cat, the thin whip-tail of a rat, and the skillful cunning of a cat, this beast is something that even you, as a seasoned adventurer, feel deserves some respect.

mobName: the Chief of the Shantak People
mobShortDesc: The chief of the Shantak is here, fuming over the state of affairs in the land.
mobLongDesc: At first this female Shantak seems wholely unimpressive to you.  Then you notice the subtle hints in her movements which indicate a complete assurence in her prowess.  The way her muscles glide beneath her scales assure you that she could, indeed, slay you if she so choose.  But so far at least, she seems to greet you with veiled hope.  What exactly she wants of you, you can't be sure, but you think you should wait to hear her offer before mindlessly attacking her.

mobShortDesc: A warrior-villager is here, keeping an eye on his town.
mobLongDesc: A large lizard-like being, standing eight feet tall, and covered in a thick reptilian hide, the Shantak is not your average humanoid.  Though technically a "warrior," this Shantak is an average representation of the race as a whole.  There are no non-warriors in this tribe, each member is taught to use his or her natural defenses and weapons at a very young age, and use them well.  While this might lead you to percieve the Shantak as another of the evil races inhabiting this land, you would be mistaken in doing so.  They have fought the Dark Lord since he arrived, although a tenuous aliance has existed at times between them.
affectedByFlags: INVISIBLE DETECT-INVISIBLE DETECT-MAGIC SENSE-LIFE PROTECT-EVIL SNEAK FURY

mobShortDesc: The Shaman for the Shantak village is here, rattling bones and spreading mojo.
mobLongDesc: Standing nearly nine feet tall at the spikes, and holding himself with dignity, the Shantak shaman is a creature to be respected.  Reminding you of nothing more than a righteous lizard, you wonder what exactly it is a shaman does that differs from a priest.  While at one point he specialized in rituals of healing, and led the village towards spiritual betterment, now the darkness which has taken over the land has driven him towards insanity.  He hasn't fallen into the pits of evil, as have some lords and holy-men of the realm, but he has lost his faith in those around him, and as such, has lost all sense of ethical law.

mobShortDesc: A small boarish creature is rooting around in the underbrush here.
mobLongDesc: Zartugs once ran free on this island, but with the coming of the dark, the entire ecosystem was launched into chaos, disrupting their mating habits catastrophically.  Now only a handful exist, and these are being hunted to extinction by the Shantak villagers who share this island home.  Though once the hunting merely weeded out a small portion of the population, with the lowered birth rates this last food source is growing scarce.

mobKeywords: behemoth big gigantic gargantuan huge enormous
mobShortDesc: A Gargantuan creature towers above you menacingly.
mobLongDesc: Over 60 feet tall, the behemoth is one of the largest and most solid creatures in the world.  The earth shakes at the smallest step taken by this monster, and you can easily imagine yourself crushed beneath those enormous feet.  Luckily for you, its head seems to be so high up that it doesn't notice your passing.  Perhaps you should leave while you still have the option.

mobShortDesc: The Xandian Bandersnatch is here, rooting through the grass.
mobLongDesc: About seven feet long and covered with a thin layer of black hair, this creature is obviously not in possession of any sort of intelligence.  It spends its life rooting for food, thinking of nothing but the next meal.  Its snout pulsates as small matter is sucked into it to be digested.

mobKeywords: nil sorcerer dark mage wizard archmage enchanter
mobShortDesc: Nil, the High-Sorcerer of Darkness is here, casting his evil invocations.
mobLongDesc: Veiled in robes of utter darkness, Nil looks you over cooly.  His pale blue eyes make you shiver involuntarily, and the thin wisp of a smile he flashes at you makes you feel sick.  He utters no word, makes not the slightest hand gesture, but you find yourself faced with an uncontrolable compulsion to sit.  You obviously came here with the idea of fighting, but the more you think about it, the worse this idea seems.  Perhaps if you left now, he would forget this entire encounter ever happened, forget you slew his guards, his companions, his familiar...  but no, it is far too late for that.  You will die now, the least you can do it stand up and take it with honor.

mobShortDesc: A very intelligent looking black cat lounges peacefully on a couch.
mobLongDesc: A feline of the first degree, this cat dispels all doubt you ever held about the superiority of the species.  Its eyes seem to hold more wisdom than any mortal you've ever met, and the grace with which it moves casually about rivals that of the greatest dancers.  You are, unfortunately, on your way to slay its soulmate and master, and it does not seem to regard this as one of the better things you could be doing.
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SANCTUARY SPHERE DODGE INVUL DUAL

mobShortDesc: A large pile of leaves rises up in the form of an ogre.
mobLongDesc: An elemental on the bottom of the hierarchy of creatures from the elemental plane, it nonetheless makes a moderately challenging opponent.  While you're not sure exactly how it plans on damaging you with leaves, you're sure it has some way of defending itself.  And the telekinesis through which it shapes its body could prove a challenging weapon.

mobShortDesc: A large white bear seems to blend into the snow here.
mobLongDesc: This large white bear would be more at home on an Artic coast or an ice flow.  Nonetheless, it is white, and it does make its home in the snow.  While it appears large and cumbersome, you have heard it can easily outrun a reindeer on land, so running is probably not a wise idea.  On the other hand, it also feeds chiefly on seals and fish, so you shouldn't be in too much danger.

mobShortDesc: a Doe grazes on the grass here.
mobLongDesc: You know the sort.  A doe, that is to say, a deer.  Or more precisely, a female deer.  Bathed in golden rays from the sun.  If you ask me, it's out of place in a place such as this, so far from where you'd expect it to be.  So be careful, or you may find yourself a late adventurer.  This deer epitomizes to a T what a doe is.

mobShortDesc: A small songbird chirps cheerfully here.
mobLongDesc: This bird seems quite out of place in the Kingdom of Darkness. Something about its happy song makes you fearful.  How could something be so sure of itself?  It must be backed by powers from far below.  It must be a demon bird!  Kill it!  Kill it!

mobShortDesc: A cloud of yellow-powder coalesces into a vaguely human form.
mobLongDesc: The scent of rotton eggs emenates from this strange form.  One of the lesser beings from the elemental plane, this creature is nonetheless quite formidable.  The yellow vapor which makes up its essence begins forming into long tendrils, and you have a feeling it harbors some sort of ill feelings towards your kind.
attackType: SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST SPELL CAST

mobShortDesc: A Spoldovian Fish is here, swimming aimlessly through the ether.
mobLongDesc: This transparent fish appears to be swimming in some sort of liquid which is invisible to your untrained eye.  Its gills pulsate as it absorbs energy from the ether surrounding it, and occasionally it freezes as though studying some non-existant prey, then quickly darts ahead and perfectly mimes the movements of a creature devouring some hapless victim.
affectedByFlags: SANCTUARY SPHERE INFRAVISION DODGE INVUL DUAL

mobShortDesc: A dark, mishapen creature shambles towards you.
mobLongDesc: Years of being kept in this cold pit have made the Atlag a creature to be reckoned with.  As it makes its way towards you, shambling over bits of its previous prey, you get a sinking feeling in your stomach. What appeared at first glance to be a large mass of rusty swords sitting in a corner seems in fact to be its teeth, and as it swings its maw about to face you, you are struck full force with the odor of it, and nearly faint dead away.

mobShortDesc: A Night-Gaunt hovers here, absorbing the light into itself.
mobLongDesc: The pure incarnation of evil, this flying beast is nothing which would be seen in the light of day.  A monster conjured up only by the sickest of Necromancer imaginations, its talons stretch almost three feet long, its teeth drip with deadly poison, and its rough black hide appears as impenetrable as the greatest suit of full plate.
actionFlags: SENTINEL ISNPC AGGRESSIVE WIMPY AGGMU MEMORY
affectedByFlags: INVISIBLE DETECT-INVISIBLE SENSE-LIFE DODGE SNEAK HIDE FLY INVUL FURY

mobShortDesc: A formless shape hovers above the ground here, protecting its city.
mobLongDesc: A formless shape, some spirit summoned from the void to protect the city of Hlanith.  This minion is a mindless automoton, serving only the will of its master.  It will fight you until it dies, and if it dies, it will not mind.  There are, after all, many more forms a minion can take to finish a foe.

mobShortDesc: A servant of the Dark is here, looking for things to do.
mobLongDesc: A servant of the Dark, this minion was once a Priest of Darkness, but when his life ended, he was transformed into one of the Everliving, to serve the cause he worked so hard at during his life.  You are an enemy to the Dark, and therefore most likely an enemy to him.  Be wary.

mobShortDesc: Xandolap the Cruel is here, smiling wickedly.
mobLongDesc: A tall being, stately and poised, Xandolap has been called the Reaver of a Thousand Souls, the Despoiler of the Greater Realms, and for concision's sake, merely, the Cruel.  A thousand years ago he conquered the kingdom of Vauron and enslaved or slew the immortal Farrow people who dwelt there.  Now he has over-run the land with his dark minions, and even greater evil lords who he tempted to his service with promises of power.  To fight Xandolap is to fight death itself, to fight the undying spirit incarnate of Darkness.  It is a foolish, foolish venture.
affectedByFlags: SANCTUARY SPHERE PROTECT-EVIL DODGE INVUL DUAL

mobShortDesc: A form is here, hunched over a manuscript in deep thought.
mobLongDesc: Some sort of a demon companion brought to this world by Xandolap, this creature acts as librarian to the mounds of horrific tomes which line these walls.  Its job does not include slaying helpless adventurers, so it pays you no heed.  Should you attempt to touch any of the books however...  well, it could quickly learn to fight.

mobShortDesc: A blank of primal clay stands here, waiting to be shaped
mobLongDesc: Featureless and non-descript, the blank of primal clay waits for someone to breath life into it.

mobKeywords: chatundah darkness overlord evil unspeakable dark
mobShortDesc: A mound of quivering flesh takes up most of this cavern.
mobLongDesc: Oh dear God.  This is the most horrendous sight you have ever laid eyes upon.  It makes you want to run yourself through with your sword. Anything not to have to set eyes on this monstrosity.  Everything wrong in the Universe, it seems, can be traced back to this shape.  This horrible, horrific, abhorrent shape.  Every inch of your body is filled with such repulsion that you are petrified in fear and terror.

mobShortDesc: A member of the elite guard is here, protecting the palace's treasure.
mobLongDesc: The Elite Guard is the most trusted of the Dark Lord's regiments.  Why he has them guarding this door, you cannot guess, but truly beyond it must lay something the Lord holds in highest esteem.  What that would be is beyond your wildest dreams.  It seems he flaunts treasures and prisoners by keeping them out in the open, which leaves little room for guarded doors.
actionFlags: SCAVENGER ISNPC AGGRESSIVE AGGWA AGGTH MEMORY

mobShortDesc: A withered form is here, producing ghastly music.
mobLongDesc: The gods only know what this form once was.  It seems it suited the Dark Lord to retain him, to play this horribly beautiful music day and night for an eternity.  His flesh seems to be falling off of his body, and his eyes are sunk deep within their sockets.  There is little evidence of life at all, save for the fingers moving gracefully across the organ's keys.

mobShortDesc: A servant of the palace is here, awaiting the day the reign of dark shall end.
mobLongDesc: One of the Farrow nobles who was spared when their kingdom fell, he awaits the day the foul reign of Xandolap shall be ended.  On this day he hopes to pick up the ashes of his once glorious race, and recreate their proud kingdom.  Though no signs of age line his face, you feel a great heaviness in his eyes, the sort of heaviness which comes from watching your land be raped for over a thousand years.  He looks up sadly at you when you focus on him, then lifts his arm slowly, pointing towards the main throne room.

mobShortDesc: A floating spirit, wielding a great sword, hovers menacingly here.
mobLongDesc: The captured spirit of one of the greatest warriors ever to walk this plane of existance, the captain of the Formless Minions is a ruthless being, with no time for petty games, or the likes of you.  If his minions weren't able to deal with you, they shall be duly punished at a future date, but for now, he has but one thought on his mind, and that is killing you.

mobShortDesc: An alligator floats in the water here, biding it's time.
mobLongDesc: Alligators are known as the patient hunter.  They'll wait, floating in the water until they see a weakness in their victim.  Then, they pounce on their victim, a giant reptilian maw gaping.

mobShortDesc: A giant reptilian beast wanders through the sand, looking for dinner.
mobLongDesc: This large reptile is about twenty feet long from head to tail and has it has a very large mouth, inside which you can see a number of very pointy-looking teeth.  It's home is inside the sand, and it comes up the surface when it gets hungry.  The beast is quite the embarrassment to the zoo staff, as it prefers to eat zoo keepers over what the zoo keepers would wish to feed it. Unfortunately for you, you happen to be a lot more similar to a zoo keeper than a carcass of some dead animal.  It might also be embarrassing to you if you were eaten whole.

mobShortDesc: A tiny mosquito buzzes about, looking for people to bite.
mobLongDesc: This tiny mosquito is barely visible at it buzzes around in the air. The mosquito may be incredibly tiny, but it's the common annoyance to all swamp travelers and natives.  It makes no discretion on who it bites, and it can land and bite without warning, spreading disease and causing itchy swelling.

mobShortDesc: A mysterious-looking gazelle prances through the grass here.
mobLongDesc: This gazelle is from another realm.  You've never seen a creature like it near Midgaard.  It's colored similarly to the small deer you see around here, but it's larger, has a pointed head, and a pair of wicked-looking horns that are shaped like the horns of a unicorn.

mobShortDesc: A small deer hides in the grass, afraid that predators might be nearby.
mobLongDesc: This small deer barely reaches up to your waist.  She must be a young deer. She appears timid and is easily frightened when zoo patrons attempt to get close to her.

mobShortDesc: A mighty elk grazes in the tall grass, unafraid of the other animals.
mobLongDesc: This mighty elk stands high in the grass, proud of his majestic antlers, and without fear of the other grazing animals.  His pelt is of short brown hair, and he has a mane of slightly longer, darker hair around the neck.

mobShortDesc: A smelly yak snorts at you, and stomps its hooves on the ground.
mobLongDesc: This yak smells horrible.  Small pieces of victims cling to it's long fur, and rot slowly.  He's not a very friendly fellow, and he likes his personal space, so you might want to leave him alone.

mobShortDesc: A polar bear stands here, his eyes sizing you up.
mobLongDesc: This large white bear is at home in the cold, it's thick layer of fur protecting it from the arctic winds.  The bear is the largest bear of its kind that you have ever seen.  The polar bear doesn't look very kind either.

mobShortDesc: An otter stands here, a playful look in his eyes, and a mischievous grin.
mobLongDesc: This otter is about four feet long and crawls along the ground on four feet. Its body is close to the ground, but it still has remarkable speed.  It appears to be an incredibly playful animal.  It constantly harasses the penguins, but it doesn't eat them because the zoo keepers keep him well fed to avoid a drop in the penguin population.

mobShortDesc: A penguin plays in the snow here, at home in the frigid air.
mobLongDesc: This strange looking bird stand straight up on two small feet. It's black with a white belly, and a small amount of orange and yellow around the neck.  It waddles around on the land, looking pitiful, but in the water, it "flies" around, making fish look foreign to the watery depths.

mobShortDesc: A tiny fire ant crawls across the sands here.
mobLongDesc: This tiny ant is only a centimeter long, and is of a bright red color. It crawls across the sand in a great rush, as though it has some place important to visit.  The ants are of a very communal nature, so they travel in large groups and usually defend themselves if attacked.

mobShortDesc: The head zookeeper is here, filling out a paper.
mobLongDesc: You see the zoo keeper, he apparently is overworked but paid well by the mayor.
actionFlags: SENTINEL ISNPC STAY-ZONE WIMPY AGGTH MEMORY AGGAP

mobShortDesc: A zoo keeper is here, studying a chart on the wall.
mobLongDesc: You see the zoo keeper, he apparently is overworked but paid well by the mayor.

mobKeywords: bat giant ugly fang poisonous poison
mobShortDesc: A giant bat is hanging from a rafter here.
mobLongDesc: This giant bat lives in the dark storeroom where it feeds upon zoo keepers and other unfortunate travelers.  Poison dribbles from its fangs and it lunges at you, trying to feed on your blood.  He's obviously not the sort of animal that can be lured away with a dog biscuit, you're going to have to run or fight him.

mobShortDesc: A squirrel sits in a tree here, eyeing you suspiciously.
mobLongDesc: This small brown squirrel scampers about in the trees, collecting nuts in its mouth. It hops from tree to tree, its bushy tail following behind it.  As you approach, it peers at you, making sure you don't try and steal any of its nuts.

mobShortDesc: A giant tree is here, looking for zoo patrons to eat.
mobLongDesc: Normally a giant tree wouldn't be all that frightening.  This tree, however, breaks that rule.  The giant treanti towers above you and looks awfully angry. It waves it's limbs around viciously and crawls around looking for zoo patrons to eat.

mobShortDesc: A pygmy goat is here, making weird noises.
mobLongDesc: This little pygmy goat has a mean streak.  He is headbutting all of the other goats and making goat noises at them.

mobShortDesc: A smelly llama grazes in the grass here.
mobLongDesc: This llama has a strange smell to it, it makes your nose curl just to be near it.  The llama also appear to be ugly and makes weird chewing noises as it looks at you.

mobShortDesc: The zoo keeper is here, carrying bales and buckets.
mobLongDesc: The zoo keepers perform a variety of jobs, that run the gamut from tediously mundane to incredibly dangerous.  They may be the butt of jokes of the patrons and gain little respect, and they smell horrible of carrying animal food around all day, but they do get a great life insurance plan...  Unfortunately for them, it often takes affect much earlier than they may had hoped.  Sometimes an animal does them in, sometimes a drunk patron, get's a little to trigger happy and does in a zoo keeper instead of an animal, but the zoo keepers have a horrible habit of short lives.  Maybe you could help?

mobShortDesc: A bengal tiger is here, roaring!
mobLongDesc: The bengal tigers are the head zoo keepers favorite animals, and one of the mayor's prized exhibit.  The tigers are both majestic and deadly.  While the tigers may not be as big as a grizzly bear, they make up for it in speed and ferocity.  Tigers have a tremendous leaping pounce that can knock any man off his feet, leaving him pinned beneath a tiger with deadly claws and a mean temper.  You might not want to get too close.

mobShortDesc: A young lion is here.
mobLongDesc: The lion, the king of the jungle, the mightiest of all the beasts.  While this lion may be but a babe, it can still be a vicious killing machine, so be careful and try not to anger it.

mobShortDesc: A bobcat is here.
mobLongDesc: This bobcat is slightly larger than a big house cat and has a yellowly pelt like that of a lion, except with some black splotches.  It's doesn't look extremely dangerous, but it's still a feline and can get angry and violent when cornered.

mobShortDesc: A large grizzly bear is here.
mobLongDesc: This giant bear towers over your head, wondering as to what the meaning of the sign, "Don't feed the bears." might mean.  You reflect on what it would feel like to have your head crushed by the gaping maw of this grizzly bear, and you're left with a feeling of awe for this tremendous beast.  He would be a powerful foe to fight with, be careful.

mobShortDesc: A black bear is here, hiding in the shadow of the trees.
mobLongDesc: This black bear easily blends into the shadows of the trees, and is only seen by you because he wants to be seen.  He watches you carefully, discerning your business.

mobShortDesc: A brown bear is here.
mobLongDesc: The brown bear is known as the baby of the bear family, but this bear still looks extremely dangerous.  He has large claws that drag across the ground, and when he grins, you can see a set of very sharp-looking and very big-looking teeth.

mobShortDesc: A huge gila monster is here, beware of its poison!
mobLongDesc: This lizard is one of the biggest creatures you have ever seen.  It's well over ten feet long and bulges with giant muscles.  Its hard scales also look like formidable armor again other animals. Its giant maw looks as though it's formidable at eating other animals.

mobShortDesc: A monty python is here, dressed up as an old lady.
mobLongDesc: The monty pythons are a troupe of painstakingly trained snakes that have learned numerous comic routines at great cost to the mayor of the city. However he loves the pythons and he can't get enough of their jokes, so he finds them to be worth the costs. Currently, the pythons are busy entertaining the crowd by dressing up as old ladies and telling jokes.

mobShortDesc: A horned lizard is here.
mobLongDesc: These lizards are almost two feet long and have a horn similar to that of a triceratops.  Perhaps, it's a relative of the dinosaur, but no matter the relationship, the horn still looks sharp, it might be best to avoid it.

mobShortDesc: A giant gorilla is here, looking for arms to tear out.
mobLongDesc: Gorillas, some of the strongest animals on the planet are known for their ferocity and strength.  The particular gorillas in this exhibit have also been known to develop the habit of ripping people's arms out of their sockets.

mobShortDesc: A chimpanzee is here, looking for food.
mobLongDesc: Chimps, known for their great feats of acrobatics, are also known to be incredibly hungry creatures.  They'll do almost anything for food, but they also hate to be disappointed, and if somebody gives them something they can't eat, they get mad.

mobShortDesc: A spider monkey is here, acting silly.
mobLongDesc: The spider monkey is a small breed of monkey, known for its acrobatics and stunts.  They're happy to play around for the amusement of the crowd.

mobShortDesc: A nasty scorpion is here.
mobLongDesc: This poisonous scorpion is the favorite of those patrons that like bugs.  While scorpions aren't insects (and neither are spiders), they're still in the insect exhibit.  The head zoo keeper was never known for his taxonomy, but he seems to have imported some big and nasty looking scorpions.  That stinger could leave you with a huge welt if you tried to attack the scorpion.

mobShortDesc: A large spider is here.
mobLongDesc: If you're the type of person that detests spiders, than this large spider makes you scream in terror.  The spider is almost twelve inches from the end of one leg to another.  It stands stationary on its web, waiting for something to eat.  If this spider were to bite you, you'd probably get a pretty bad wound from it, especially since the spider might be poisonous.

mobShortDesc: A black fire beetle is here.
mobLongDesc: This small black beetle is not even two inches long, and it wanders around this part of the exhibit, doing nothing exciting or entertaining.  Somebody must have named it a fire beetle for some reason, but that reason eludes you at the moment.

mobShortDesc: A giant parrot is here, guarding its nest from predators.
mobLongDesc: While the various breeds of Norwegian parrots are endangered species, the giant green is the rarest of the rare.  The bird is easily susceptible to predators because the eggs that it lays are so big that the nests must be on the ground, where wild animals can easily steal or eat the eggs.  Here, in the zoo, the birds can lay their eggs on the ground where the other animals can't get to them.  The zoo keepers warn patrons not to touch the eggs, because the birds are extremely protective and will attack those that try to take the eggs.

mobShortDesc: A norwegian red parrot is here.
mobLongDesc: Norwegian parrots are an endangered species, and Midgaard's collection is one of the most extensive in the world.  The birds are known for their beautiful plumage.  The Norwegian red has especially beautiful feathers that lore says are filled with magical power that will grant luck to any who possess a feather of the bird.

mobShortDesc: A laughing hyena is here, grinning and resting.
mobLongDesc: Hyenas are scavenger animals and are known as laughing hyenas because they tend to follow wounded animals and torment them or laugh. In large groups, hyenas can be vicious creatures, so the zoo keepers have purposely kept their number down.  When hyenas get extremely hungry, they've been known to attack healthy animals and people, so you hope that this hyena has been fed recently.

mobShortDesc: A starving coyote is here, gnawing on a root.
mobLongDesc: This coyote runs around, wildly looking for something to eat. Even the tree roots lacing through the ground in this part of the exhibit have been gnawed down to almost nothing.  Are you going to be his dinner?

mobShortDesc: A frothing dog is here, acting rabid.
mobLongDesc: An outbreak of rabies seems to have hit this part of the canine exhibit. This dog froths at the mouth and madly attacks anything that it sees.

mobShortDesc: A scruffy mutt is here, digging for bones.
mobLongDesc: This little mutt is extremely playful.  He runs around, nipping at people and looking for hands to pet him.  Whenever you go near one of the holes, he eyes you carefully and growls, telling you that the bones are his.

mobShortDesc: A norwegian black parrot is flying around here.
mobLongDesc: Caw... Caw!!

mobShortDesc: A baby brontosaurus is here, looking green and cute.
mobLongDesc: Baby dinosaurs are still dinosaurs.  This bronto is about eight feet tall, and makes this nursery look small. You wonder where the adult brontos end up.

mobShortDesc: A baby crocodile is here, looking for ducks to eat.
mobLongDesc: This crocodile might be little, but its teeth don't look so little.  Lucky for you, it doesn't seem to have developed a mean streak yet, it just sits in a pool of water.

mobShortDesc: A baby llama is here, nibbling on grass.
mobLongDesc: This llama can barely walk on its own.  It stumbles about the nursery, nibbling on grass and trying to stay away from the crocodiles.

mobShortDesc: A cute rabbit is here.
mobLongDesc: This small fuzzy bunny is just a little critter.  These rabbits wander around the zoo as they please, looking for little kids to pet them.

mobShortDesc: A gigantic, ugly ant lurches forward to DESTROY YOU!!!
mobLongDesc: Black as the darkest night, this ant looks as though it's been waiting for you for a long time...its mandibles scrape together as it approaches, making a high-pitched, keening noise.

mobShortDesc: The Leader of the Guards is here shouting at the guards.
mobLongDesc: He shouts 'I don't like any lazy guard!!!!'.

mobShortDesc: A white kitten is here playing with a wool ball.
mobLongDesc: A lovely little kitten.  Meooooww!

mobShortDesc: A trained wolf is here guarding the castle.
mobLongDesc: It is a very big wolf. Its long sharp teeth make you feel uncomfortable.

mobShortDesc: A cleaner is here cleaning the castle.
mobLongDesc: He is a very hard working cleaner.

mobShortDesc: A cook is here making food for the King.
mobLongDesc: This fat man makes very good food.

mobShortDesc: A mage of Zyca wanders about, draped in dirty black robes.
mobLongDesc: The King has always considered the Zyca mages to be one of his most trusted advisors and loyal subjects.  The bowels of the castle have long since been set aside for their lodging and as a place for them to practice and study the dark arts that make them so valuable to the kingdom. Long flowing robes of black, sullied with dust and months between washings, drape the frame of an unimposing human. But the eyes, there is something dark and powerful lurking behind those eyes...
affectedByFlags: DETECT-INVISIBLE SANCTUARY SPHERE INFRAVISION INVUL DUAL

mobShortDesc: A Zyca City Commoner is standing here.
mobLongDesc: All his gold goes to pay the King's extreme taxes so he never has any coins left to buy bread for his starving family.

mobShortDesc: A Body Guard is here protecting his King.
mobLongDesc: The King has paid a great deal of gold to employ this guard.  He is a very tough adversary and he will do anything to protect the King. So be careful if you want to kill the king.

mobShortDesc: A guard is here protecting his city.
mobLongDesc: A very strong guard is smiling at you!

mobShortDesc: The King is here counting his gold coins.
mobLongDesc: An ugly greedy king. He will do anything to earn money.

mobShortDesc: The Queen is here thinking something very deeply.
mobLongDesc: She was a very beautiful lady 20 years ago. When you look at her face, you notice that she is quite worried about her son.

mobShortDesc: The Prince is here sighing loudly.
mobLongDesc: This handsome prince is very unhappy at the moment, because his father has forced him to marry the ugly Princess of the Darkness Kingdom.

mobShortDesc: A Mage paces the room here muttering things to him self.  He looks up at you,  "Are you he?" he asks, shaking his head he muttering.
mobLongDesc: The Mage paces back and forth across the threadbare carpet, wringing his hands and casting disparaging glances at the door east of here.

mobShortDesc: The Beast is shrouded in dark mist, it moves towards you with utter confidence.
mobLongDesc: All you can see is a dim bulking Beast, behind it is a foul red light. You start to move out of the room realizing what it is.

mobShortDesc: The Guard beast is loping towards you, jaws gaping looking to take your ass out of your body.
mobLongDesc: You can't quite place the origins of the beast charging you, anyway, its time to hit it for six.

mobShortDesc: A Dark Spirit drifts towards you, silent, dark, deadly.
mobLongDesc: You can only see a mass of dark mist moving, pulsating.

mobShortDesc: The Ethereal guard sees you and jumps towards you, shimmering sword glittering.
mobLongDesc: The Ethereal guard shimmers with a bright light, human form barely visible behind a corona of light, its eye pin pricks of light.

mobShortDesc: The Ethereal Master takes an interest in you, its eyes burning through you conscience.
mobLongDesc: The Master is seated on a ghostly throne of light, the Master gathers his robes to rise and.... and deal with you.

mobShortDesc: The Ethereal guards senses you and jumps towards you, shimmering sword glittering.
mobLongDesc: The Ethereal guard shimmers with a bright light, human form barely visible behind a corona of light, its eye pin pricks of light.

mobShortDesc: A scruffy Fido is sniffing at the ground here.
mobLongDesc: The scruffy Fido sniffs around your feet, you kick it as it raises a leg to take a leak on your leg.

mobShortDesc: An Old man is here hobbling along with the aid of a stick.  He looks up, greets you and continues on his way.
mobLongDesc: The Old man is very thin, hair is wispy white and his cloths are ragged, his stick is gnarled and flecked with dried blood.

mobShortDesc: A hard working Commoners Wife is here tending to household chores.
mobLongDesc: She looks up from her work and makes 'shooing' gestures out the door. She then turns back to her task at hand.

mobShortDesc: A hard working Commoner eyes the new stranger in the village, YOU!.
mobLongDesc: The Commoner is here cuffing brats over the head for their mischief. He eyes you suspiciously then reluctantly moves on.

mobShortDesc: The scruffy Brat takes an interest in your cloths.
mobLongDesc: The thieving little Brat sneaks close to you, he is covered more with dirt than cloths.  He attempts to steal a penny from you.

mobShortDesc: A Nomads woman follow her man at a distance, she casts you a strange look from beneath her dusty mantle, she shuffles on silently.
mobLongDesc: The Nomad woman is grey with dust from the surrounding lands, her face hidden in the folds of a hood, hands buried deep within her dusty robes.

mobShortDesc: A Nomad wanders across your path, on a journey to nowhere in particular.
mobLongDesc: The Nomad is grey with dust from the surrounding lands, his face hidden in the folds of a hood, a hand hovers near his sword.

mobShortDesc: The assistant cowers in a dark corner far away from you.
mobLongDesc: The Assistant is dressed in scruffy, sooty cloths torn in many places, cowering in a corner he clutches a wicked looking dagger.

mobShortDesc: A Dark Commando is skulking about the dark recesses of the room, agitated by your presence.
mobLongDesc: The warrior-mage's skin is blackened with soot from the forge, his eyes spark brightly in the dim light, advancing on you with his huge broadsword.

mobShortDesc: What you can only describe as a an Amorphous Gelatinous Blob is restrained in one corner of the room.
mobLongDesc: The 'Amorphous Gelatinous Blob is restrained by something. It's frantic attempts to 'bounce' your way fall short.

mobShortDesc: An old Hag is here puttering around in her hut.
mobLongDesc: The Hag is dressed in scraps of armor and raw cloth.  She grins at you toothlessly, raises her stick and advances on you.

mobShortDesc: An Ethereal Spirit drifts past, oblivious to you.
mobLongDesc: The Ethereal Spirit is just visible to you in your heightened state.  It is utterly formless in shape, just a patch of grey.

mobShortDesc: A translucent Spirit wanders across the landscape.
mobLongDesc: The Spirit drifts silently across the landscape barely visible in the gloom.

mobShortDesc: A fellow Adventurer passes by to lands unknown.
mobLongDesc: The dwarven Adventurer looks very seasoned and experienced.  He passes you with a nod, hand on weapon.... just in case.

mobShortDesc: The dirty Bandit is here tossing its sword from hand to hand, waiting for you.
mobLongDesc: The filthy Bandit is here eyeing your equipment with greedy eyes, its eyes fastening upon your pouch of gold.

mobShortDesc: The large Bandit leader regards you, all the while fingering his sword.
mobLongDesc: The Bandit leader is filthy beyond belief, the smell from him is almost to much. He eyes your cloths with great interest.

mobShortDesc: An over eager Bandit sees you as its next mark.
mobLongDesc: A filthy well armed Bandit is here with sword drawn, its greed little eyes flicking over you equipment and money pouch.

mobShortDesc: A huge raven is circling close over head, its beady eyes mocking you.
mobLongDesc: The raven is larger and blacker than any you have ever seen. Its beady red eyes watching you with an unnerving intensity.

mobShortDesc: A huge Raven is circling close over head, its beady eyes mocking you.
mobLongDesc: The Raven is larger and blacker than any you have ever seen. Its beady red eyes watching you with an unnerving intensity.

mobShortDesc: One of the Undead is here seeking solace somewhere, somehow.
mobLongDesc: One of the Undead is wandering aimlessly around here, its gaunt eyes roving the landscape looking for something.

mobShortDesc: An undead animal is here seeking solace somewhere, somehow.
mobLongDesc: One of the Undead creatures of the field is loping across the landscape, its hooves making strangely little sound.

mobShortDesc: One of the Undead is here seeking solace somewhere, somehow.
mobLongDesc: A semi visible Undead is slowly moving around, its gaunt eyes roving the landscape for something.

mobShortDesc: One of the Undead is here seeking solace somewhere, somehow.
mobLongDesc: A semi visible Undead is slowly moving around, its gaunt eyes roving the landscape for something.

mobShortDesc: A Dawnman is here lumbering towards you.
mobLongDesc: A Dawnman for times lost is here groping its way towards your life force, its arms outstretched and reaching for your throat.

mobShortDesc: A dirty Rat is running around here.
mobLongDesc: A dirty Rat is running around at your feet, its eyes are red and its feet clawed, it boldly takes a bite out from your shoe.

mobShortDesc: A dirty Rat is running around here.
mobLongDesc: A dirty Rat is running around at your feet, its eyes are red and its feet clawed, it boldly takes a bite out from your shoe.

mobShortDesc: A dirt Rat is running around here.
mobLongDesc: A dirty Rat is running around at your feet, its eyes are red and its feet clawed, it boldly takes a bite out from your shoe.

mobShortDesc: A dirty Rat is running around here.
mobLongDesc: A dirty Rat is running around at your feet, its eyes are red and its feet clawed, it boldly takes a bite out from your shoe.

mobShortDesc: A very dirty Scavenger is here digging in the ruined earth.
mobLongDesc: The filthy Scavenger is here digging in the dirt for lost treasures.  Around you are holes dug by the Scavenger.

mobShortDesc: A very dirty Scavenger is here digging in the ruined earth.
mobLongDesc: The filthy Scavenger is here digging in the dirt for lost treasures.  Around you are holes dug by the Scavenger.
